40001001	Uyu kuli kwihela kwa shibyalilwe sha ng'wa Yesu Kilisto wa luganda lwa ng'wa Daudi, mu bubyile wa ng'wa Abulahamu.
40001002	U Abulahamu wali ise wa ng'wa Isaka, Isaka umyala Yakobo, Yakobo umyala Yuda na baana ba ng'wawe.
40001003	Yuda umyala Falesi na Zala, kufuma muli Tamali. Falesi umyala Hezelomu, Hezelomu umyala Alamu.
40001004	Alamu umyala Aminadabu, Aminadabu umyala Naasoni, Naasoni umyala Salimoni.
40001005	Salimoni umyala Boazi kufuma muli Lahabu, Boazi umyala Obedi kufuma muli Luzi, Obedi umyala Yese.
40001006	U Yese akamyala ntemi Daudi, Daudi umyala Solomoni kufuma muli nkima uyo wali nke wa ng'wa Ulia.
40001007	U Solomoni umyala Lehoboamu, Lehoboamu umyala Abia, Abia umyala Asa.
40001008	Asa umyala Yosafati, Yosafati umyala Yolamu, Yolamu umyala Uzia.
40001009	Uzia umyala Yotamu, Yotamu umyala Ahazi, Ahazi umyala Hezekia.
40001010	Hezekia umyala Manase, Manase umyala Amosi, Amosi umyala Yosia.
40001011	Yosia umyala Yekonia na baana ba ng'wawe; u mu shiku jenijo a banhu busaamiwa, butwalwa Babuloni.
40001012	Aho lyabita i likanza lya kusaamijiwa Babuloni, u Yekonia akamyala Salatieli, Salatieli umyala Zelubabeli.
40001013	Zelubabeli umyala Abiudi, Abiudi umyala Eliakimu, Eliakimu umyala Azoli.
40001014	Azoli umyala Akimu, Akimu umyala Eliudi.
40001015	Eliudi umyala Eleazali, Eleazali umyala Matani, Matani umyala Yakobo.
40001016	U Yakobo akamyala Yosefu u ngoshi wa ng'wa Malia, u nina wa ng'wa Yesu, uyo akitanagwa Kilisto.
40001017	Huna luulu, u kufuma u kuli Abulahamu kushika hali Daudi, i shibyalilwe i shose shili ikumi na shine; nu kwinga a hali Daudi kushika ng'wikanza lya banhu kusaamijiwa Babuloni, shibyalilwe ikumi na shine. Hama nu kufuma u ng'wikanza lya banhu kusaamijiwa Babuloni kushika hali Kilisto, nasho ikumi na shine.
40001018	Huna luulu, u kubyalwa kwa ng'wa Yesu Kilisto kukaja giki, u nina u Malia wali alunjiwe na Yosefu; aliyo aho bataali kwitoola, ubonwa ali nda kulwa budula bo ng'wa Moyo Ng'wela!
40001019	U Yosefu aho wagudeeba u mhayo gwenuyo, ubona aneke. Aliyo iki wali munhu ntungilija, akandya kwiganika nzila ya kuneka chiza; atizungoola.
40001020	Kwike aho ataali uyiganika i mihayo yeniyo, malaika wa ng'wa Seeba ung'wilongela mu shilooti; ung'wila giki, "Yosefu ng'wana wa ng'wa Daudi, utogohage u kunsola u nke wako u Malia; nguno u Ng'wana uyo ali u mu nda yakwe aliho kulwa budula bo ng'wa Moyo Ng'wela.
40001021	Akubyala Ng'wana ngosha, u bebe ukung'wilika i lina lyakwe Yesu; nguno hu ng'wene uyo akubapija a banhu bakwe kufuma mu shibi shabo."
40001022	I yose yeniyi ikaja giko kulwa kushikilijiwa kwa mhayo uyo Seeba wali waguhaya kufuma kale kubitila muli nghangi wakwe; giki,
40001023	"Munhya ng'wilindu akubuucha nda, na akubyala ng'wana ngosha, uyo bakung'wilika i lina lyakwe Emmanueli." Makulu gaho, "Mulungu ali hamo na bise."
40001024	U Yosefu aho wamisha kufuma u mu tulo, wita git'umo akawililwa nu malaika wa ng'wa Seeba; unsola u nke wakwe.
40001025	Kwike atalaalile nanghwe kushisha umyala u Ng'wana, huna ung'wilika i lina lyakwe i lya Yesu.
40002001	U Yesu akabyalilwa mu nzengo gwa Betelehemu ya Buyudaya, mu shiku ja ntemi Helode. Kuhayimanila biza u mu Yelusalemu bamani ba mihayo ya sonda, bafumile mhandi ja kiya.
40002002	Aho bashika bubuja giki, "Ali hali u Ntemi wa Bayudaya uyo wabyalilwe? Nguno a bise i kiya twabonile sonda yakwe, na luulu twizaga kunamya."
40002003	U ntemi Helode aho wigwa i mihayo yeniyo akazwangana no, pye na a bangi abo baali hamo nanghwe i Yelusalemu.
40002004	Ubakuminga pye a bagabiji bataale na a balangi ba banhu, wandya kubabugilija i lipandi lya kubyalilwa u Kilisto.
40002005	Nabo bung'wila, "Betelehemu ya Buyudaya, nguno u muli nghangi handikilwe giki,
40002006	Bebe Betelehemu mu si ya Buyudaya, uti ndo na hado yaya u mu basugi ba Buyudaya, nguno u kufuma muli bebe akwilonga Nsugi, uyo akubadiima banhu bane, a Baisilaeli.' "
40002007	Huna u Helode ukalalwa kumana kufuma u ku bamani ba mihayo ya sonda benabo. Ubapunja ha mhujo kubagisilija chiza i likanza lya kilongele ka sonda yeniyo.
40002008	Ha numa ya henaho ubatuma baje i Betelehemu; ubawila, "Jagi mukigisilije mu welwa-ngholo i mihayo ya ng'wana. Ulu mulamone ng'wize muniwile, nguno nane natogilwe kujunamya!"
40002009	Aho bamala kundegeleka u ntemi, bubuuka bajile. Bibona hangi i sonda ibatongeelile, git'umo yali yabatongeelela u kufuma i kiya. Yahayushika a h'ipandi ilo wali u Ng'wana, yoya u kuselema.
40002010	Aho bibona i sonda bakayega na kayegele kataale no!
40002011	Bahayingila u mu numba, bumona u Ng'wana nu nina u Malia, butuja mazwi bunamya. Baali na manongho gabo, bugataligula bung'winha shakwinha: zahabu, bubbani, na ngazu.
40002012	Aho bahaya kuja kaya, u Mulungu ubahugula mu shilooti giki batizubita u kuli Helode. Na nghana bubitila nzila yingi buja ku si yabo.
40002013	Aho binga, malaika wa ng'wa Seeba ung'wilongela u Yosefu mu shilooti; ung'wila giki, "Buukaga unsole u Ng'wana nu nina, upeelele Misili, ukikale kwenuko kushisha nakuwile. Nguno u Helode ali hihi kwandya kunkooba u Ng'wana amulage."
40002014	Na nghana umisha, unsola u Ng'wana hamo nu nina, bubuuka kuja Misili i bujiku yeniyo.
40002015	Akikala kwenuko kushisha ucha u ntemi Helode. I mihayo ikaja giko kulwa kushikilijiwa kwa buhangi bo ng'wa Seeba; umo nghangi wakwe ahayilile giki, "Nakang'witana u Ng'wana wane kufuma Misili."
40002016	U Helode akabona giki wagimva nyachilu na a bamani ba mihayo ya sonda, na luulu upelana no. Ulagila babulagwe a banigini a bagosha, a ba mu Betelehemu, ni chalo isho shibimbikanilwe nayo; pye a b'ilika lya kwandija myaka ibili na kwika ha silili ya henaho, kulenganila ni likanza ilo bakang'wila a bamani ba mihayo ya sonda, aho wabagisilija.
40002017	U mu kwita giko gubiza gwashikiila u mhayo uyo guhayiwe na nghangi Yelemia; giki,
40002018	"Ilaka likigwiwa mu Lama, nghungu na kuganghila kutaale; Laheli alililiila baana bakwe, nu kuhuumujiwa alemile nguno batiho!"
40002019	Aho waacha u Helode, malaika wa ng'wa Seeba ung'wilongela hangi u Yosefu mu shilooti aho ali Misili. Ung'wila giki,
40002020	"Buukaga unsole u Ng'wana nu nina ushoke ku si ya Isilaeli; nguno baachile abo balubukoobaga u bupanga bo Ng'wana."
40002021	Nghana aho wamisha unsola u Ng'wana nu nina, bubuuka bajile; bushika u mu si ya Isilaeli.
40002022	Aliyo aho wigwa giki Akelao watemile u mu si ya Buyudaya a ha ng'wanya go ng'wa ise u Helode, akogoha u kuja ko u kwenuka. Uhugulwa mu shilooti, uja mhandi ja Galilaya,
40002023	uukazenga Nazaleti. Gubiza gwashikiila uyo guhayiwe na bahangi giki, "Alitanwa muna Nazaleti."
40003001	U mu shiku jenijo Yohana Matiija akiza ku matogolo ga Buyudaya; uyulomeela
40003002	alihaya, "Galukagi, nguno u butemi bo ng'wigulu wegeelaga."
40003003	U ng'wenuyo hu ng'wene uyo ahayiwe na nghangi Isaya, giki, "Ilaka lya munhu akuhamukaga mu matogolo, 'Beeja-beejagi ikuuwa lya ng'wa Seeba, jigoloolagi i nzila jakwe.' "
40003004	I shizwalo sha ng'wa Yohana shali sha booya bo ngamila, u mu nkimbili witungaga ngwasho gwa nkoba, i shiliwa shakwe shali njige na buuki bo mu matogolo.
40003005	Banhu bingi bakayiza uko wali; bafumaga Yelusalemu na hose-hose u mu si ya Buyudaya, nu mu si pyi i ja ku mbalama ya mongo gwa Yolodani.
40003006	Buli bene bashikaga batambuula i shibi shabo wababatiija u mu mongo gwenuyo.
40003007	Kwike aho wabona Bafalisayo bingi na Basadukayo baliza u ku bubatiija bokwe; ubawila, "Bing'we bubyile wa shipili, nani wamuhugulile giki mugupeele u nsango uyo guliza?
40003008	Ali luulu, twajagi matwajo kulwa koolecha bukaaniji bo kugaluka kwing'we.
40003009	Mutiganikage mukwiwilaga giki, 'Tuli na nkulugenji wise Abulahamu.' Nguno nalimuwila nuulu kufuma mu mawe git'aya, u Mulungu adugije kumuukija baana u Abulahamu.
40003010	Niyo i haha iliho mbasa ituulilwe nghana-nghana a ha matina ga miti. Hu kuhaya buli nti uyo gututwaja matwajo gawiza, gukubbutwa guponyiwe mu moto.
40003011	"U nene nghana nalimubatiija mu minzi kulwa kugaluka; aliyo a ha numa yane aliza uyo anikilile u budula. U nene natigeleelilwe nuulu ni kumuukija shilatu shakwe, u ng'wenuyo h'uyo akumubatiija na Moyo Ng'wela, na moto.
40003012	U luhungo lokwe ali nalo mu nkono gokwe wei ng'wenekili, hama u lubuuga lokwe akulupyagula alweje lwele pe. U busiga abukuminge chiza abutuule ng'wibikilo lyakwe; aliyo a meela a gene ugapemba mu moto guti gwa kujima!"
40003013	Huna u Yesu winga i Galilaya, uja uko wali u Yohana, u ku mongo gwa Yolodani, nanghwe akabatiijiwe.
40003014	Aliyo u Yohana unemeja alihaya, "Nibuli uliza kuli nene, aliyo u nene hu inigeleelile unibatiije u bebe?"
40003015	Nanghwe u Yesu unshokeja ung'wila, "Nizunilijage i haha, nguno ili yawiza tubushikilije u butungilija u bose." Huna unzunilija.
40003016	U Yesu aho wamala u kubatiijiwa, haho na haho ufuma u mu minzi. I likanza lyenilo lyukunduka i ligulu, umona u Moyo wa ng'wa Mulungu alika giti nghuulu, izile a hali we.
40003017	N'ilaka lyufuma u ng'wigulu lilihaya giki, "Uyu ng'wene Ng'wana wane Ntogwa, uyo aniyegije hataale no!"
40004001	Ha numa ya yeniyo, u Yesu utongeelwa na Moyo kuja ku matogolo, kujugeng'wa na Shetani.
40004002	Uukikala kwenuko shiku makumi ane, akudilaga nzala liimi na bujiku; nose utuuba!
40004003	U ngemi ung'wiziila ung'wila giki, "Ulu uli Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu, gawilage a mawe genaya gabize shiliwa."
40004004	Nanghwe ushosha uhaya, "Yandikilwe giki, 'U munhu atudula kubiza mpanga kulwa shiliwa kwike, aliyo kulwa buli mhayo uyo gufumile mu nomo go ng'wa Mulungu.' "
40004005	Huna u Shetani untwala ku nzengo ng'wela, aho wanshisha koi untuula higulya ya hekalu.
40004006	Ung'wila giki, "Ulu uli Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu al'iponejage ha si shi; nguno gwandikilwe giki, 'Akulagila bamalaika bakwe kulwako, nabo bakukubuucha mu makono gabo, utizipama lupambala lwako h'iwe!' "
40004007	Nanghwe u Yesu unshokeja ung'wila, "Yandikilwe hangi giki, 'Yaya u kungema u Seeba Mulungu wako.' "
40004008	Ha numa hangi u Shetani untwala ku lugulu lulihu; uukandya kung'oolekeja pye a mabusugi ga mu si, hamo ni likujo lyago.
40004009	Huna ung'wila giki, "Nakukwinha bebe pye a genaya, ulu ugwa ha si kunilamya."
40004010	A henaho u Yesu ung'wila, "Ingaga a henaha Shetani, nguno gwandikilwe giki, 'Namyage Seeba Mulungu wako, na untumamile wei duhu!' "
40004011	Huna u Shetani ung'wingila, bamalaika biza kuntumamila.
40004012	U Yesu aho wigwa giki u Yohana waponyiwe mu jeela, akaja Galilaya.
40004013	Kwike atalendile i Nazaleti, winga koi uja uukikala Kafalanaumu, mhandi ja Zabuloni na Nafutali; hihi na nyanza.
40004014	U mhayo gwenuyu gubiza gwashikilija iyo ihayiwe na nghangi Isaya; giki,
40004015	"Si ya Zabuloni na si ya Nafutali, nzila ya ku nyanza, ku nkilo gwa Yolodani; Galilaya ya banhu ba mahanga.
40004016	A banhu ba mu giiti baabonile isana itaale, alichene, isana lyabaakilile abo wikalo wabo buli mu nengeeji gwa lufu!"
40004017	Kufuma ikanza lyenilo, u Yesu wandya kulomeela alihaya giki, "Galukagi, nguno u butemi bo ng'wigulu wegeelaga!"
40004018	Lushiku lumo aho alishimiza ku mbalama ya nyanza ya Galilaya, akababona banhu babili ba shikulu na shizuna, Simoni uyo witanagwa Petelo, na Andelea ng'wanong'wawe; baategaga ntego mu nyanza, nguno baali bategi ba ndilo.
40004019	Ubawila giki, "Nilondeelagi, nakung'wita mubize bazubi ba banhu."
40004020	Nghana haho na haho bileka i mitego yabo bunondeela.
40004021	Aho waja ha butongi hado, ubabona bangi babili ba shikulu na shizuna, Yakobo ng'wana Zebedayo, na Yohana ng'wanong'wawe. Nabo baali mu lyato hamo na saabo Zebedayo, bakubeeja-beejaga mitego yabo: na a bene ubitana.
40004022	Nabo haho na haho bunondeela, buneka u saabo ni lyato lyabo.
40004023	Huna wandya kuja hose-hose u mu Galilaya akulangaga mu masinagogi gabo, na kulomeela Nghulu Jawiza ja butemi, hamo na kupija busaatu bo banhu, na bulemehazu bo buli mbika.
40004024	U lukumo lokwe lusambaala hose pye, kushisha lushika mu si ya Sulia. Buyung'wenhela pye abo baali basaatu, na a babo baali na bulemehazu bungi na bungi bo mili. Pye wabapijaga, na a babo baluhiagwa masamva, na a ba lusalo lwa kugwa, na a ba busaatu bo kupola mili.
40004025	Mabita mataale kufuma u mu Galilaya ng'wenumo guyunondeela; na bangi bafumaga Dekapoli, bangi Yelusalemu, ni Buyudaya i yose. Bamo bafumaga ku nkilo gwa mongo gwa Yolodani.
40005001	Aho wagabona a mabita ga banhu, ulinha mu lugulu uukigasha. Bahayung'wegeela a bahemba bakwe,
40005002	wandya kubalanga alihaya giki,
40005003	"Bali na mbango a bahabi mu moyo; nguno u butemi bo ng'wigulu buli wabo.
40005004	Bali na mbango abo bali na bupina; nguno bakulungujiwa.
40005005	Bali na mbango a bidohya; nguno bakubiza bingiji ba si.
40005006	Bali na mbango abo lutuubo na nota yabo shili ha kukooba butungilija; nguno bakushikiligijiwa i nghumbu jabo.
40005007	Bali na mbango a bachiji ba shigongo; nguno bakuchilwa shigongo.
40005008	Bali na mbango a beela mu moyo; nguno bakumona u Mulungu.
40005009	Bali na mbango a batuuji ba mhola; nguno bakwitanwa bali baana ba ng'wa Mulungu.
40005010	Bali na mbango abo bakuluhiagwa kulwa kwita yawiza; nguno u butemi bo ng'wigulu buli wabo.
40005011	"A bing'we muli na mbango ulu bakumusondagulaga na kumuluhya, na kumulembekeja ya bubi bo buli mbika kulwa nguno yane.
40005012	Yegagi na kuzalabana, iki muli na mheela nhaale u ng'wigulu. Nguno h'umo babaluhijaga na a bahangi a ba kale, abo baaliho aho bing'we mutaali kubiza ho!"
40005013	"A bing'we muli munhu gwa si, aliyo u munhu ulu gulinda gusuuka, angu gudugije kusanduchiwa ki hangi? Gukubiza gwamalaga i ngofyoolo ku buli nimo gose-gose, ulu iti kuponyiwa hanze duhu na kupandagilwa na banhu!
40005014	A bing'we mul'isana lya si, u nzengo ulu guzengelilwe ha ngulya gutudula kushikijiwa.
40005015	Na hangi a banhu batabachaga tala bikundikija itangwa, aliyo bakikindikaga h'ikindikilo lya tala; u mu giko h'ikubatiimila pye abo balimo u mu numba.
40005016	H'umo ili nu ku bing'we, shiigelile i lisana ling'we liyubatiimila a banhu, bashibone i shitile shing'we i shawiza, bankuje u Sing'we uyo ali ng'wigulu."
40005017	"Mutiziganika giki u nene nizile kushinja i shilagilo nuulu a bahangi. Yaya natizile kwita giko, nizile kwishikilija i yeniyo.
40005018	Nguno nalimuwila mu nghana yose giki, katinga ho kadone nuulu ka nuguta kamo u mu shilagilo, kushisha aho igulu na si shikubita, na buli mhayo gushikilijiwe.
40005019	Huna luulu nalimuwila giki, ose-ose uyo ukenaagula shilagilo shimo shaho, nuulu shibize shido na ginehe, hama ubalanga na bangi kwita giko, u munhu ng'wenuyo akubiza ati na ngofyoolo nuulu hado u mu butemi bo ng'wigulu. Aliyo uyo wita git'umo ili, huna ubalanga na bangi kwita chene; u ng'wenuyo akubiza ntaale u mu butemi bo ng'wigulu.
40005020	Kulwa nguno nalimuwila giki, u butungilija wing'we ulu butakilile a ha butungilija bo balangi ba shilagilo nu bo Bafalisayo, mutudula u kwingila u mu butemi bo ng'wigulu.
40005021	"Mukigwaga guhayiwe u ku bakulugenji giki, 'Yaya u kubulaga; na buli ng'wene uyo ubulaga wigeleelagwa nsango.'
40005022	Aliyo u nene nalimuwila giki, buli ng'wene uyo ampelanilile ng'wiye igeleelilwe kupandika nsango. Niyo nuulu munhu ung'wila munhu ungi mhayo gwa koolecha kundalaha, u ng'wenuyo nanghwe shing'wigeleelilwe kushishiwa kwibanza. Nuulu hamo ung'wila giki, 'U bebe uli likuduhu.' U nghayi ng'wenuyo wigeleelagwa nsango gwa mu nyanza ya moto!
40005023	Nose luulu ikubeelela ibize giki, nuulu ulifunya shakwinha shako ha ng'walilo, huna wizukwa giki uli na wilemeelwa na nduguyo,
40005024	shilekage henaho ha butongi bo ng'walilo, uje tame ukigwindanye nu nduguyo, huna wize ushifunye i shakwinha shako.
40005025	Iyangulage nu ng'wilemeelwa wako, wiyigwe nanghwe wangu aho mutaali mu nzila. Atizukushisha kuli namuji, nanghwe u namuji akutuule mu makono ga nshilikale uponyiwe mu jeela.
40005026	Nalikuwila gwa nghana giki, utufuma mo kushisha umale u kulipa pyi u bugasa wako; kushisha senti ya kumalija!"
40005027	"Mukigwaga guhayiwe giki, 'Yaya u kushihya.'
40005028	Aliyo u nene nalimuwila giki, buli ng'wene uyo unola nkima mu kung'wikumva, wamalaga kushihya nanghwe u mu moyo gokwe.
40005029	Na luulu, nuulu liso lyako lya ku bulyo lyukwipamya likobolage uliponye ulekane nalyo, nguno ili hambu-hambu lijimiile ibudika lya mili gwako, kutinda i giki pyi u mili guponyiwe mu nsango gwa moto.
40005030	Hama nuulu nkono gwako gwa bulyo gukuhubya, gubbutage uguponye, ulekane nago; nguno ili hambu-hambu lijimiile ibudika lya mili gwako duhu, kutinda i giki pyi u mili guponyiwe mu nsango gwa moto!"
40005031	"Hangi guhayiwe giki, 'Ose-ose uyo uneka nke wakwe shiigelile ang'winhe talaka.'
40005032	Aliyo u nene nalimuwila giki, uyo uneka nke wakwe kulwa nguno yingi yose-yose, ulu iti kulwa nguno ya bushihani, wang'witaga kubiza nshihani; hangi nu ngosha uyo untoola nkima alekilwe, nanghwe wingilaga mu bushihani."
40005033	"Na hangi mukigwaga guhayiwe u ku bakulugenji giki, 'Yaya u kulahila nyamaama, aliyo nshikiligijage u Seeba i shilahilo shako.'
40005034	Kwike u nene nalimuwila giki, yaya gete u kulahila kunu mukulihayaga igulu, nguno i lyoi lil'isumbi lya ng'wa Mulungu.
40005035	Yaya nuulu kwihaya si, nguno i yoi ili butuulo wa mhambala jakwe; pyi nuulu nzengo gwa Yelusalemu yaya, nguno guli nzengo gwa Ntemi ntaale.
40005036	Niyo nuulu kuguhaya ntwe gwako ni chene yaya; nguno u bebe uti na budula bo kubeeja luywili nuulu lumo duhu, lwape nuulu lwapi!
40005037	Aliyo u mhayo gwing'we ulu gubiza 'Ehe,' ni ibizage 'Ehe.' Ulu 'Yaya,' numho 'Yaya.' Nguno pyi i yingi i ya kukila a ha yeniyi, ikafumaga kuli ng'wanishi!"
40005038	"Mukigwaga guhayiwe giki, 'Liso kulwa liso,' na giki, 'Lino kulwa lino!'
40005039	Aliyo u nene nalimuwila yaya u kwilwisha na munhu nghunga; huna luulu ulu ose-ose ukupaala ipi ku lusaya lo ku bulyo, ngalukijage nu lwandi u lungi!
40005040	Nuulu ungi ugaagaana kukutwala kwibanza kulwa kukooba kukutaaja ishadi lyako, nekelage ni nghanjo yako.
40005041	Nuulu hamo ungi hangi ukuhadikija kuja nanghwe lugendo lwa mailo imo, jaga nanghwe mailo ibili.
40005042	Uyo ukulomba shikolo ng'winhage, niyo ulu munhu alitogwa kusola bugasa kufuma kuli bebe, yaya u kung'wima."
40005043	"Mukigwaga guhayiwe giki, 'Ntogagwe nzenganwa ng'wiyo, aliyo u ng'wanishi wako nkolagwe!'
40005044	Kwike u nene nalimuwila batogagwi na a banishi bing'we, hangi ng'ubalombela abo bakumuluhyaga.
40005045	U mu giko hu mukubiza baana bakwe u Sing'we uyo ali ng'wigulu. Nguno u ng'wene ati na busolanhya, akabaakijaga i liimi lyakwe pye a banhu, a babubi na a bawiza; ni mbula akabinhaga a batungilija na a bati batungilija.
40005046	I gisi mukupandika mheela ki ulu ng'ugelela kubatogwa duhu abo bamutogilwe a bing'we? Duhaya na a batobisha ba goodi bakiitaga giko duhu!
40005047	Nuulu ng'ugelela kuyugisha badugu bing'we duhu, mukubiza mubalebije ki abo bataamanile Mulungu?
40005048	Huna luulu, shiigelile mubize bashikanu git'umo ali u Sing'we uyo ali ng'wigulu."
40006001	"Niyo ilanghanagi nuulu mukubeejaga yawiza, yaya u kwiyoolecha ku banhu; nguno ulu ng'wita giko mutupandika mheela yose-yose u kufuma u kuli Sing'we uyo ali ng'wigulu.
40006002	Nose ulu ulifunya shakwinha shako shawiza, yaya u kwitulila lupundu bebe ng'wenekili, git'umo bakiitilaga bibeeleja mu masinagogi na mu mayila. Nguno a bene batogilwe kukumilijiwa na banhu. Na nghana nalimuwila bakapandikaga i mheela jabo.
40006003	Aliyo u bebe ulu ulifunya shakwinha shako shawiza, nuulu nkono gwako u gwa lumoso gutizumana umo guliitila u nkono u gwa bulyo.
40006004	U mu kwita giko a kafunije kako kakubiza ka mu mbisila, aliyo u So uyo akabonaga nuulu mu mbisila akukwinha iyo ikwigeleelilwe."
40006005	"Na hangi nuulu mukulombaga mutiziikolanija na bibeeleja abo batogilwe kulomba mu masinagogi na mu mapanda giki babonwe na banhu; na nghana nalimuwila bakapandikaga i mheela jabo.
40006006	Aliyo u bebe ulu uhaya kulomba, ingilaga mu numba yako, ku chumba sha mu gati ulugale nu nyango gwako, huna unombe u So mu kwidohya. Nanghwe u So uyo akabonaga nuulu mu mbisila akukubeegeja iyo ikwigeleelilwe.
40006007	Ulu mulilomba, yaya u kukwija mihayo giti banhu abo bataamanile Mulungu; a bene bakiganikaga bakwigwiwa kulwa kukwija mihayo.
40006008	Yaya u kwilenganija nabo, nguno a bing'we nuulu aho mutaali kulomba, u Sing'we ayimanile iyo yigelile kumugunaana.
40006009	Huna luulu, mulalombage giki, 'Siswe uyo uli ng'wigulu, lina lyako lyeela likujiwe.
40006010	Butemi wako wize, iyo utogilwe ishikiile nu mu si, giti ng'wigulu.
40006011	Twinhage ni lelo i shiliwa shise i sha buli lushiku.
40006012	Tulekejage nu buhubi wise, git'umo na a bise tukabalekejaga abo bali na bugasa ku bise.
40006013	Na utizututwala mu kugeng'wa, aliyo tupijage twinge u muli Wabubi. [Nguno u butemi buli wako, nu budula ni nguzu; kushisha welelo na welelo, Alichene].'
40006014	Nguno ulu ng'ubalekeja a banhu u buhubi wabo, na a bing'we akumulekeja u Sing'we uyo ali ng'wigulu.
40006015	Aliyo ulu mutubalekeja a banhu, na a bing'we atumulekeja u Sing'we u buhubi wing'we."
40006016	"Hangi nuulu ng'ufunga, mutizubiza bonzololoku git'umo bakiitilaga bibeeleja. Nguno a bene bakibipya-bipyaga u bushu wabo kulwa kwiyoolecha ku banhu giki bali ng'wikanza lya kufunga. Na nghana nalimuwila bakapandikaga i mheela jabo.
40006017	Aliyo u bebe ulu uli ng'wikanza lya kufunga, boojage u bushu wako; nu ntwe gwako ugubile maguta.
40006018	Utiziyoolecha ku banhu giki ufungile, ulu iti kuli So duhu uyo atabonekanaga. U mu kwita giko u So uyo akabonaga nuulu mu mbisila, akukubeegeja iyo ikwigeleelilwe."
40006019	"Yaya u kwibikija mu si i sabo jing'we, nguno jidugije kukenaagulwa fufuuji nuulu bubozu; nuulu basambo badugije kukambula bujiiba.
40006020	Aliyo jibikagi ng'wigulu, uko jitudula kukenaagulwa fufuuji nuulu bubozu; hama nuulu basambo batadugije kukambula na kwiba.
40006021	Nguno aho ubisilile sabo yako, h'aho ilolelile ni ngholo yako."
40006022	"I tala ya mili lili liso, na luulu i liso lyako ulu lili mhola, numho u mili gwako guli n'isana pyi u gose.
40006023	Aliyo i liso lyako ulu lyupandika kaagede, pyi u mili gwako gukubiza mu giiti. Nose hu kuhaya i lisana lyako ulu lyugaluka kubiza giiti, i giiti shene shikubiza shitaale no!"
40006024	"Atiho uyo adugije kubatumamila bataale babili; nguno akumbyeeda umo wabo, untogwa u ungi; nuulu akubiza na gwinda nu umo, aliyo u ungi unsuucha. Nose hu kuhaya mutudula u kubiza batumami ha silili ya ng'wa Mulungu, na ha silili ya sabo!"
40006025	"Huna luulu, nalimuwila yaya u kwikala mukukoya-koyelaga bupanga wing'we, giki mukulya ki, nuulu mukung'wa ki; nuulu mili gwing'we, giki mukuzwala ki. Angu, u bupanga buti na mpango ntaale kutinda shiliwa? Nu mili gutashiheebile i shizwalo?
40006026	Alijilolagi i noni ja kulala ijo jitabibaga nuulu jitagesaga na kukumingila mu maluuli; angu, u Sing'we uyo ali ng'wigulu, atajilishaga? A bing'we mutajiheebile i noni?
40006027	I gisi aliho nani nuulu umo wing'we uyo adugije kwiyongeleleja i likanza lya bulamu bokwe kulwa kwiyanga-yangila wei ng'wenekili?
40006028	Na hangi nibuli mukuzwanganaga kulwa nguno ya shizwalo? Aligiganikilagi a mabonji ga mu matogolo umo gakakulilaga, a goyi gatatumamaga, nuulu shizwalo gatabeejaga.
40006029	Aliyo nalimuwila giki nuulu u Solomoni hamo n'ikujo lyakwe pyi i lyose umo lyali, wali atadugije kuzwalila chiza kushisha ulenganila nuulu na limo lyago.
40006030	Bing'we ba kuzunya kudo, u Mulungu uyo akazwalikaga maswa ga mu matogolo chiza giko, ayo galiho i lelo, aliyo a ha ntondo gaponyiwa mu moto; angu, a bing'we atudula kung'witila mitaale kutinda?
40006031	"Huna luulu, oyagi gete u kwikala mukukoya-koyaga mulihaya giki, 'Tukulya ki'; nuulu, 'Tukung'wa ki;' nuulu, 'Tukuzwala ki!'
40006032	Nguno abo bataamanile Mulungu hu bene abo bakakoyaga kushikooba i shose ishi; aliyo a bing'we, u Sing'we uyo ali ng'wigulu amanile giki shing'wigeleelilwe mubize nasho i shose ishi.
40006033	A bing'we bene bukoobagi tame u butemi bokwe nu butungilija bokwe, ni shenishi mukongejiwa pyi i shose.
40006034	Lekagi u kwikala ng'ukoya-koyela ya ha ntondo, nguno i ya ntondo nayo ikulonjiwa ng'wikanza lyayo; buli lushiku luli na makoye ga kulwigela."
40007001	"Mutabalamulage a biching'wi, hu mutulamulwa na a bing'we.
40007002	Nguno umo mukubalamulilaga banhu bangi, na a bing'we h'umo mukulamulilwa. Niyo i ngelekelo iyo mukubagelekelaga bangi, h'iyo mukugelekelwa na a bing'we.
40007003	Nibuli ukunojaga ng'wiyo kasasala ka kapalala ako kali mu liso lyakwe, aliyo u bebe u mu liso lyako gulimo ngamba, uyo utugulonjaga?
40007004	I gisi, ulu gulimo ngamba u mu liso lyako u bebe, ukudula ginehe u kung'wila u nduguyo giki, 'Lembeelaga nakwingije kasasala ka kapalala, kalimo u mu liso lyako'?
40007005	Bebe ng'wibeeleja, gwinjage tame u ngamba uyo gulimo u mu liso lyako, hu ukudula u kubona chiza, ung'wingije nu ng'wiyo a kasasala ka kapalala ako kalimo u mu liso lyakwe!
40007006	I shikolo i shawiza mutajinhage mva, ni shikolo shing'we i sha mpango ntaale galihayiwa mawe malebe ga mpango ntaale, gakasimbagwa kufuma ha si.'E" yaya u kushiponeja ngulubi, nguno jikushipandagila duhu shisosohale, hama jimugalukile jimugulaje!"
40007007	"Lombagi mukwinhwa, koobagi mukupandika, tulagi hoodi ha nyango mukulugulilwa.
40007008	Nguno buli ng'wene uyo akalombaga akinhagwa, nu yuyo akakoobaga akapandikaga, hama nu yuyo akatulaga hoodi ha nyango akalugulilagwa.
40007009	I gisi aliho munhu ki u mu bing'we uyo ashikile kulomva numbu nuulu: ngati.' na ng'wana wakwe, nanghwe ung'winha iwe?
40007010	Nuulu hamo ulomva ndilo, nani uyo adugije kung'winha nzoka?
40007011	Na luulu manilagi henaho; a bing'we nuulu iki muli babubi, nahene mumanile u kubinha a baana bing'we shikolo shawiza, ili kutinda no u kuli Sing'we uyo ali ng'wigulu. U ng'wene akubinha shakwinha shawiza no pye abo bakunombaga.
40007012	Kwike shing'wigeleelilwe kubiitila a banhu git'umo mutogilwe bang'witile a bing'we, nguno h'umo shihayilile i shilagilo na a bahangi."
40007013	"Bitilagi mu nzila mhine, nguno i likuuwa i ligali nu mita u ngali shijile mu kuyagala; na bali bingi abo bakabitilaga mo.
40007014	Aliyo i nzila iyo ijile mu bupanga, i yene ngololoku; kwike mhine, pyi nu nyango mpine. Hama bali bagehu abo bakibonaga!"
40007015	"Bilanghanagi a bahangi a balemba-lembi, abo bakung'wiziilaga giti shiinu ng'wikunza lya ngholo, aliyo u mu gati bali mhuge ndaku.
40007016	A benabo mukubamanila ku matwajo gabo. Angu, a banhu badugije kuyoba mizabibu kwingiila mu magwata, nuulu shisuumo sha ntini kwingiila mu malula?
40007017	H'umo ijilile, u nti gwawiza gukatwajaga matwajo gawiza, nu nti u gwabubi nago gukatwajaga matwajo mabi.
40007018	U nti u gwawiza gutudula kutwaja matwajo mabi, nu nti u gwabubi nago gutudula kutwaja matwajo gawiza.
40007019	Buli nti uyo gutatwajaga matwajo gawiza gukabbutagwa gwaponyiwa mu moto.
40007020	Huna luulu, mukubamanila ku matwajo gabo."
40007021	"Iti giki pye abo bakanitanaga Seeba, Seeba, bakwingila u mu butemi bo ng'wigulu, aliyo duhu uyo akiitaga iyo yinyegije Baba uyo ali ng'wigulu.
40007022	U mu lushiku lwenulo bingi bakunidayiila, balihaya giki, 'Seeba, Seeba, twali tutahangaga mu lina lyako? Na hangi twali tutapeejaga masamva, na kubeeja milimo mitaale mu lina lyako?'
40007023	Nane nakubashokeja nalibawila hape giki, 'Natamumanile nuulu hado a bing'we biiti ba shibi, ningilagi aha!' "
40007024	"Ali luulu, buli ng'wene uyo uyigwa i mihayo yane huna widilila na kwishikilija, akwikolanijiwa na ngosha wa masala, uyo akazenga numba yakwe ya madafaali h'itale.
40007025	Huna yutula mbula ya kuseja mihuumo, kunu na miyaga ikuhembaga; pyi i shose shenisho shuyikiila i numba yeniyo, aliyo itagwile; nguno u nsingi gwayo gwali h'itale.
40007026	Kwike buli ng'wene uyo uyigwa i mihayo yane aliyo uleka u kwidilila, nuulu kwishikilija, u ng'wene akwikolanijiwa na munhu mbuuli, uyo akazenga numba yakwe ha maseni.
40007027	Yahayutula mbula ya kuseja mihuumo, kunu na miyaga ikuhembaga; aho pyi i shose shenisho shayikiila i numba yeniyo, ikagwa na kagwile ka kukamaaja no!"
40007028	U Yesu aho wamala u kusomboola i mihayo i yose iyi, pye a mabita ga banhu abo bandegelekaga bakabukumya na kakumije kataale no u bulangi bokwe.
40007029	Nguno wabalangaga na budula, wali atabalangaga git'umo biitilaga a balangi babo ba shilagilo.
40008001	Aho wika u mu lugulu, mabita mataale ga banhu gunondeela.
40008002	Kuhayimanila munhu umo wa mbiji ong'wegeela, ugwa ku magulu gakwe unamya, kunu aling'wila; "Seeba, ulu utogwa udugije kuneeja."
40008003	Nanghwe u Yesu ugoloola nkono unkuumya, kunu aling'wila; "Natogagwa elaga!" Haho na haho jeela i mbiji jakwe.
40008004	Huna u Yesu ung'wila giki, "Ilanghanage, utizuwila munhu nuulu umo, aliyo jaga ukiyooleche kuli ngabiji, ukafunye na shakwinha git'umo Musa alagilile; bubize ho bukaaniji kubo."
40008005	Huna u wei uja Kafalanaumu, aho washika u mu nzengo, munhu umo, ntaale wa bashilikale igana ung'wegeela. Ung'wikumbilija
40008006	alihaya giki, "Seeba, aliho nsese wane alaalile mu kaya, ali na makoye mataale no kulwa busaatu bo mangwisha!"
40008007	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Tujage nakampije."
40008008	Aliyo u ntaale wa bashilikale igana ng'wenuyo, unshokeja uhaya giki; "Seeba, u nene natigeleelilwe u bebe ushike a ha ng'wane, hayaga mhayo duhu, akupila u nsese wane.
40008009	Nguno nane nali munhu uyo ali ha silili ya busugi; nu nene nali na bashilikale a ha silili yane. Nadugije kung'wila uyu giki, 'Jaga;' nghana akuja. Nuulu ungi giki, 'Nzugu;' nghana akwiza. Hama nuulu nsese wane nashikile kung'wila, 'Itaga giki;' na nghana akwita!"
40008010	U Yesu aho wigwa giko ukumya, abo banondeelaga ubawila, "Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, nataali kubona kuzunya kwa mbika giti iyi na hado yaya pye a hose u mu Isilaeli.
40008011	Niyo nalimuwila bingi bakwiza, kufuma kiya na ng'weli, bigashe u mu butemi bo ng'wigulu hamo na Abulahamu na Isaka na Yakobo.
40008012	Aliyo a baana ba ng'wikulu bakuponyiwa hanze ku giiti, bakalile na kushelanya mino kwenuko!"
40008013	Huna u Yesu ung'wila u ntaale wa bashilikale igana ng'wenuyo giki; "Jaga, n'ibizage git'umo kusanya kwako kuli." I likanza lyenilo upila u ntumami wakwe.
40008014	Huna u Yesu uukingila mu numba ya ng'wa Petelo, unsanga nina-bukwi wa ng'wa Petelo ali mu ndili adadililwe nswiza.
40008015	Ushika unkuumya ha nkono gunekela u nswiza, ubuuka umeegeja shiliwa.
40008016	Aho lyabiza lya mhindi a banhu bandya kung'wenhela bingi abo bakoyiagwa masamva, nanghwe uyugapeeja bo guhaya mhayo duhu; na a babo basaataga ubapija pye.
40008017	U mu kwita giko akagushikilija uyo guhayiwe na nghangi Isaya giki, "U bugokolo wise akabubuucha wei; ni ndwala jise ujinja we."
40008018	Ha numa ya yeniyo u Yesu aho wabona giki i libita lya banhu lyayung'okaliila na kumpindya hose-hose, ulagila baje ku nkilo.
40008019	Kuhayimanila nangi nebe wa shilagilo wang'wegeela; ushika ung'wila giki, "Nangi natogilwe kukulondeela buli kwene uko ulaaje."
40008020	Nanghwe u Yesu unshokeja uhaya giki, "I nyamhawa jili na myobo, ni noni ja kulala jili na chanjo; aliyo u Ng'wana wa Munhu ati na ha kulaaja nuulu ntwe gokwe!"
40008021	Umo wa bahemba bakwe nanghwe ung'wila giki, "Seeba, nizunilijage naje tame nakanjike baba."
40008022	Aliyo u Yesu ung'wila, "Bebe ng'wene nilondeelage duhu, balekage a bafu babajike a bafu babo."
40008023	Huna wingila mu lyato, na a bahemba bakwe bunondeela mo.
40008024	Kuhayimanila gwabuuka nyaga ntaale, yubipa no i nyanza, guyubuuka mahuuli gashikile kulitubija i lyato. Aliyo u wei wali walaala tulo.
40008025	A bahemba bakwe bumisha balihaya; "Seeba tupijage twashila!"
40008026	Nanghwe ubawila giki, "Bing'we ba kuzunya kudo, nibuli mulogoha giko?" Huna ubuuka uguhama u nyaga ni nyanza, hubiza sele-sele!
40008027	A banhu benabo bakakumya kingi nasho, bandya kwibuja balihaya giki, "U ng'wenuyu i gete ni munhu ki, wakwigwiwa buyaga na miyaga na manyanza hose?"
40008028	Bahayushika mu si ya Bagadala u ku nkilo gwa nyanza, banhu babili baali na masamva bumanhya nanghwe baling'wiziila kufuma ku mashigila. Baali bakali kibi no; nose i nzila yeniyo yali shilambu kubitilwa na munhu ose-ose.
40008029	Kuhayimanila a banhu benabo bandya kulila balihaya giki, "Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu uli na mhayo ki na a bise? Nibuli wiza kutuluhya, aliyo i likanza litaali u kung'wa?"
40008030	Likasangwa lyaliho idale lya ngulubi ningi jadiimaga katanaalo u kwinga aho baali henaho.
40008031	Huna a masamva gundayiila galihaya giki, "Ulu ulitupeeja tutwalage u ng'widale lya ngulubi ijo."
40008032	Nanghwe ugawila, "Jagi." Nghana gufuma gukingila u mu ngulubi jenijo. Pyi i lidale liyita nhambo kujiliila ku lugegu lo nyanza, jukagwila mu minzi jung'wa nhuli, jucha!
40008033	A badiimi bajo bupeela nhambo, buja buukikumucha u mu nzengo i mihayo yeniyo, ni ya banhu abo baali na masamva.
40008034	Pye a banhu bufuma u mu nzengo kuja kunola u Yesu; aho bamona bung'wikumbilija inge u mu si yabo!
40009001	Na nghana u Yesu wingila mu lyato, ukila ku nkilo uja ku nzengo go ng'wawe.
40009002	Kuhayimanila bang'wenhela munhu wa busaatu wa mangwisha alaalile ha shilago. U Yesu aho wakubona u kuzunya kwabo ung'wila u nsaatu, "Bebe ng'wana, timbyaga ngholo, walekejiagwa i shibi shako."
40009003	Bamo ba balangi ba shilagilo bandya kwiwila giki, "Bing'we, u munhu ng'wenuyu ngimu!"
40009004	U Yesu ugadeeba a maganiko gabo, huna ubawila giki, "Nibuli muliganika mihayo mibi giko u mu ngholo jing'we?
40009005	I gisi, u nogu ni guli ginehe? U gwa kuhaya giki, 'Walekejiagwa i shibi shako,' nuulu hamo u gwa kuhaya giki, 'Buukaga ushimize?'
40009006	Ali luulu, shiigelile mumane giki u Ng'wana wa Munhu ali nabo u budula bo kulekeja shibi u mu si." Huna ung'wila u nsaatu giki, "Buukaga ushisole i shilago shako uje kaya."
40009007	Nghana ubuuka, ugumha ajile kaya!
40009008	A mabita ga banhu aho gabona giko gakogoha no, gunkuja Mulungu uyo akabinhaga banhu budula buli giko!
40009009	U Yesu winga a henaho, aho ajile umona munhu umo, witanagwa Matayo; wali igashije ng'witobisijo lya goodi, ung'wila, "Nilondeelage." Nghana ubuuka unondeela.
40009010	Bahayushika mu kaya, u Yesu wigasha kulya shiliwa. Na batobisha ba goodi hamo na banhu ba shibi bingi bakigasha kulya nanghwe, na a bahemba bakwe.
40009011	Aliyo a Bafalisayo aho babona giko, bubawila a bahemba bakwe giki, "Nibuli u Nangi wing'we akulyaga na batobisha ba goodi, buyaga na banhu ba shibi?"
40009012	U Yesu aho wigwa uhaya, "A bapanga bati na nguno na nfumu, aliyo a basaatu h'abo bakankoobaga.
40009013	Na luulu, jagi mukilange a makulu ga mhayo uyu, giki: 'Natogilwe shigongo, iti shitambo;' nguno u nene natizile kwitana batungilija, aliyo ba shibi!"
40009014	A bahemba ba ng'wa Yohana bakiita biza u kuli Yesu, bumuja balihaya giki, "Nibuli a bise na a bahemba ba Bafalisayo tukafungaga, aliyo a bahemba bako batafungaga?"
40009015	Nanghwe u Yesu ubawila giki, "U ntooji ulu ataali hamo nabo a bageni ba ha bukwilima, bakupinihajiwa ki hangi? Jikushika i shiku ja kwingijiwa u ntooji; a henaho hu bakuyufunga.
40009016	Atiho uyo akasumilijaga shilaka sha ng'wenda mpya ha ng'wenda nkulukulu; nguno ulu wita giko shikugutandula u ng'wenda u nkulukulu, gukenaaguke kutinda.
40009017	Na hangi atiho uyo akabikaga divai mhya ng'wibikilo ikulukulu, ulu wita giko likutanduka i libikilo likenaaguke, ni divai yidike ha si! Aliyo i divai i mhya bakibikaga ng'wibikilo ipya; na luulu, u mu giko shikwikala mhola i shose."
40009018	Aho ataali ubawila giko, kwimanila wiza ngosha umo nsugi; ushika untugija mazwi mu kwidohya, kunu aling'wila giki, "Kashike kane kazumalika i haha iyi, kwike nzugu ukatuulile nkono gwako kakupila duhu!"
40009019	Nghana u Yesu na a bahemba bakwe bubuuka bunkuubija u munhu ng'wenuyo.
40009020	Nkima nebe wakoyiagwa busaatu bo ngeji, nose umala myaka ikumi n'ibili; ung'wiziila u Yesu ku numa, ushika ukuumya h'ipindo lya nghanjo yakwe.
40009021	Nguno wiwilaga giki, "Nuulu nukuumya shizwalo shakwe duhu nakupila!"
40009022	U Yesu aho wagaluka ung'wila, "Injaga u booba nshike wane, u kuzunya kwako kwakupijaga." U nkima ng'wenuyo upila kufuma ikanza lyenilo.
40009023	Huna u Yesu ushikiila a ha kaya ya nsugi ng'wenuyo, usanga ibita lya banhu bingi balifuutagila bakulijiagwa bupina; na bafuuji ba mhembe ja nghungu bakujifuulaga.
40009024	Ubawila giki, "Ingagi a henaha, u ng'waniki atachile, alaalile duhu." Bunseka nyachilu-chilu kulwa kundalaha!
40009025	Na luulu aho lyafunyiwa hanze i libita, u wei wingila uukandima nkono u ng'waniki, ubuuka!
40009026	U mhayo gwenuyo gung'winha kukumuka u Yesu, pye a hose u mu si yeniyo.
40009027	Ha numa ya yeniyo, u Yesu winga a henaho uja ipandi lingi. Babboku babili bunondeela, kunu balindayiila n'ilaka lya higulya balihaya giki, "Ng'wana wa ng'wa Daudi, tuchilage shigongo!"
40009028	Uukingila mu numba, aliyo nu ng'wene bunondeela; nanghwe ubabuja, "Mulizunya giki nadugije kung'witila u mhayo gwenuyu?" Bunshokeja, "Alichene Seeba!"
40009029	Huna ubakuumya u ku miso gabo; ubawila, "N'ibizage git'umo kuzunya kwing'we kuli."
40009030	Na nghana a miso gabo guloleecha, bandya kubona. U Yesu ubahugula ubawila giki, "Ali luulu, langhanagi atizumana munhu ose-ose."
40009031	Aliyo aho bafuma i hanze, haho na haho bandya kuja bakunkumuchaga u mu si yeniyo.
40009032	Kwinga duhu a benabo, na bangi bung'wenhela u Yesu munhu umo shimuumu, niyo wali n'isamva!
40009033	Aho wingijiwa i lisamva udula u kuyomba. A mabita ga banhu guyukumya galihaya giki, "U mhayo gwa mbika yeniyi gutaali kwilonga na hado yaya u mu Isilaeli!"
40009034	Aliyo a Bafalisayo a bene buyuhaya, "U ng'wenuyu akugapeejaga a masamva mu budula w'itaale lya masamva!"
40009035	Huna luulu u Yesu wandya kuja hose-hose u mu mizengo nu ku machalo. Wajaga akulangaga u mu masinagogi gabo na kulomeela Nghulu Jawiza ja butemi, hamo na kupija buli mbika ja busaatu nuulu bulemehazu.
40009036	Aho wagabona a mabita ga banhu ubasaatwa, nguno baali bazongu-zongu, na basalanghanile giti ngholo jiti na ndiimi!
40009037	Ubawila a bahemba bakwe giki, "U nimo gw'igesa guli ntaale no, aliyo a batumami bagehu.
40009038	Nombagi u Seeba wa magesa atume batumami u ku nimo gokwe."
40010001	Akiita ubitana a bahemba bakwe abo ikumi na babili, ubinha budula bo kuheeba myoyo misoso nuulu myoyo mibi iyo ikakoyaga banhu: giti masamva na mahugi.'; badule kwipeeja, na kupija buli mbika ja busaatu na bulemehazu.
40010002	A mina ga batung'wa ikumi na babili benabo gaya: wa kwandya Simoni, uyo akinhwa lina lya Petelo, na Andelea ng'wanong'wawe. Na Yakobo ng'witunja wa ng'wa Zebedayo, hamo na Yohana ng'wanong'wawe.
40010003	Filipo na Batolomayo; Tomaso na Matayo, uyo wali ntobisha wa goodi. Yakobo ng'wana Alifayo na Tadayo;
40010004	Simoni muna Kanaani, na Yuda Isikaliote, uyo akabiza nodeeji wa ng'wa Yesu.
40010005	Abo ikumi na babili benaba, u Yesu akabatuma, ubakomeleja alibawila giki, "Mutizuja ku banhu ba mahanga gangi, yaya nuulu kwingila mu nzengo gwa Basamalia.
40010006	Aliyo i no-no-no jagi ku ngholo ja numba ya Isilaeli, ijo jijimiilile!
40010007	Jagi ng'ulomeela mulihaya giki, 'U butemi bo ng'wigulu wegeelaga.'
40010008	Ng'ubapija a basaatu, na a bafu ng'ubajuucha, pye na a ba mbiji ng'ubeeja, na a masamva ng'ugapeeja. Ng'wanukulaga dalali, ning'we inhagi dalali.
40010009	Yaya u kuja na zahabu nuulu feza, nuulu hela mu mhinda jing'we.
40010010	Nuulu ifulushi lya shikolo sha mu lugendo yaya u kubuucha. Yaya nuulu nghanjo ibili, nuulu shilatu; pyi nuulu nangha yaya. Nguno u ntumami shing'wigeleelilwe alanghanwe.
40010011	Hama niyo ulu ng'wingila mu nzengo nebe, nuulu chalo shilebe, bugilijagi mo ulu alimo munhu ntengeke, ng'wikale ha ng'wakwe kushisha ng'winge i lipandi lyenilo.
40010012	Buli ha kaya yene ulu ng'ushika bagishagi.
40010013	I kaya yeniyo ulu yubiza ya longe, i mhola ying'we yikale hamo nabo, aliyo ulu iti chene, ikumushokela i mhola ying'we!
40010014	Na hangi ulu atiho wa kung'wanukula, nuulu kwidegeleka i mihayo ying'we, ulu mulinga a ha kaya yeniyo, nuulu u mu nzengo gwenuyo, lukung'unhagi nu lubuubu ulo luli ku mhambala jing'we.
40010015	Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, a ha lushiku lo kulamulwa, u nsango gwa banhu ba mu nzengo gwenuyo gukubiza ntaale no, kutinda u gwa bana Sodoma na bana Gomola."
40010016	"Managi giki nalimutuma giti ngholo kuja kwisanja ng'widale lya mhuge; bizagi bachaguku giti nzoka, aliyo balyehu giti nghuulu.
40010017	Hangi bilanghanagi a banhu, nguno bakuyumutwala ku mabanza na ku masinagogi gabo kujumutula.
40010018	Mukuyushishiwa na ku butongi bo basugi na batemi kulwa nguno yane, bubize ho bukaaniji kubo na ku mahanga.
40010019	Aliyo ulu bumutwala giko, yaya u kwandya kwiganika-ganika, giki himba mukusomboola ki nuulu mukushosha ginehe. Nguno u ng'wikanza lyenilo mukwinhwa u gwa kuhaya.
40010020	Mutubiza mukuyombaga bing'we benekili, Moyo wa ng'wa Sing'we h'uyo akubiza akuyombaga u mu bing'we.
40010021	"Bukubiza ho wilodeeji bo kwenheleja banhu nuulu kucha; ikudulikana u munhu kunodeela nuulu ng'wanong'wawe giki abulagwe. Nuulu u myaji akung'witila giko u ng'wana wakwe; niyo a baana bakuyubatalukila a babyaji babo bababulaga!
40010022	Hama buli kwene pye a banhu bakumukolwa, kulwa nguno ya lina lyane. Aliyo u wa kwiyumilija kushisha ku ngelelo akupila.
40010023	Na luulu ulu bumuluhya mu nzengo uyu, peelelagi mu gungi; nguno nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, mutudula u kwitang'anhya pyi i mizengo ya Baisilaeli aho ataali kwiza u Ng'wana wa Munhu!
40010024	U nghemba atudula kunkila u nangi wakwe; pyi nu nsese atudula kubiza higulya ya ng'wa ise-bugonzo.
40010025	U nghemba ulu ulenganila nu nangi wakwe wigejaga; pyi nuulu u nsese ulu ulenganila nu ise-bugonzo. Ulu baligima kung'witana Belizebuli u ng'wenekili kaya, a ba mu kaya yakwe pye a bose bakubiitila yabubi na kutinda ho!"
40010026	"Mutabogohage a banhu, nguno gutiho mhayo gukundikigije, uyo gutukundulilwa; nuulu gwibisile, uyo gututendwa ha ng'wape.
40010027	Ali luulu, iyo nakumuwilaga mu mbisila, a bing'we ihayagi bo hape-hape; ni yiyo nakumuhwehwetelaga, a bing'we linhagi kwigulya ya numba ng'wihamuke, biyigwe pye a banhu.
40010028	Hangi mutabogohage abo bakabulagaga mili, aliyo bati na budula bo kugubulaga u moyo. Aliyo i no-no-no ng'ogohagi uyo ali na budula bo kugubulaga u mili nu moyo, ha numa ushiponya mu nsango gwa moto!
40010029	Angu, i tuju ij'ibili, jitudula kujinjiwa nuulu shilingi imo duhu? Aliyo nalimuwila giki, itiko kugwa ha si nuulu imo yajo aho atamanile u Sing'we.
40010030	Lelo a bing'we, ni nzwili jing'we i ja mu ntwe pyi i jose jibalilwe.
40010031	Nose hu kuhaya mutogohage, nguno a bing'we mujiheebile kule i tuju, nuulu jikakwila na ginehe!"
40010032	"Huna luulu, uyo unizunya na unikaanila ku butongi bo banhu, nu nene nakunkaanila u ku butongi bo ng'wa Baba uyo ali ng'wigulu.
40010033	Aliyo uyo unilema ku butongi bo banhu, nu nene nakunema u ku butongi bo ng'wa Baba uyo ali ng'wigulu."
40010034	"Lekagi u kwiganika giki nenhile mhola u mu si; yaya natenhile mhola, nenhile lilushu.
40010035	Nguno nenhile wilemeelwa: ng'witunja kwilemeelwa na ise, nu nshike kwilemeelwa na nina, u ng'winga nanghwe kwilemeelwa na nina-bukwi.
40010036	Niyo a banishi ba ng'wa munhu bakubiza ba mu kaya, umo akwikalaga.
40010037	Uyo antogilwe ise nuulu nina kutinda kunitogwa nene, u ng'wenuyo atanigeleelilwe. Nu wa kuntogwa ng'witunja nuulu nshike wakwe kutinda nene, nanghwe atanigeleelilwe.
40010038	Hama nu yuyo atibuukija nsalaba gokwe na kunilondeela, nu ng'wene atanigeleelilwe.
40010039	Niyo uyo wipandikila bupanga bokwe, akubujimiija; aliyo uyo ubujimiija u bupanga bokwe kulwa nguno yane, u ng'wenuyo akubupandika."
40010040	"Ulu munhu ose-ose ung'wanukula a bing'we, u ng'wenuyo wananukulaga nene. Hama uyo unanukula nene, numho wang'wanukulaga uyo anitumile.
40010041	Uyo ung'wanukula nghangi mu lina lya giki ali nghangi, nanghwe akwinhwa mheela ya nghangi. Nu yuyo ung'wegeleja ntungilija mu lina lya giki ntungilija, nanghwe akwinhwa mheela ya ntungilija.
40010042	Na hangi ulu munhu ung'winha shikombe sha minzi ga kung'wa, nuulu umo wa bahemba bane a bado-bado aba, iki ali nghemba wane, nalimuwila gwa nghana u munhu ng'wenuyo atugayiwa mheela na hado yaya."
40011001	Huna luulu u Yesu aho wamala kubalagila a bahemba bakwe abo ikumi na babili, akinga a henaho uja akulangaga na kulomeela mu mizengo yabo.
40011002	U Yohana aho ali mu jeela akigwa i shitile sha ng'wa Kilisto; huna utuma babili ba bahemba bakwe baje u kuli Yesu bakamuje giki,
40011003	"U bebe hu uli ng'wene uyo izile, nuulu tunindiile ungi?"
40011004	Nanghwe u Yesu ubashokeja uhaya giki, "Jagi mukang'wile u Yohana iyo muliyigwa na kwibona.
40011005	A babboku balibona, na a balema balishimiza, a ba mbiji bakwelaga, a bagulu nabo bakwigwaga; pye na a bafu bakujuukaga, na a bahabi balilomeelwa Nghulu Jawiza.
40011006	Niyo ali na mbango buli ng'wene uyo ati na kwipama kulwa nguno yane."
40011007	Aho binga a benabo, u Yesu wandya kubawila a banhu mihayo ya ng'wa Yohana. Uhaya giki, "Aho ng'wajaga ku matogolo, ng'wajaga kulola ki? Kadete kakuyengejiagwa nyaga?
40011008	Ng'wali mutogilwe kubona ki? Hamo munhu azwalilile myenda ya nyasabi? Managi giki abo bakazwalaga myenda ya nyasabi bakikalaga mu kaya ja nyatemi.
40011009	Na luulu, i gete ng'wajaga kwita ki? Hamo kulola nghangi? Alichene, niyo nalimuwila ali ntaale kutinda nghangi!
40011010	U wei hu ng'wene uyo gwandikilwe kulwakwe giki, 'Managa giki, nalintuma ntumijiwa wane ku butongi wako, akutonga kukubeeja-beegeja nzila.'
40011011	Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, u mu bose abo babyalilwe na bakima, atiho nuulu umo uyo ali ntaale kuntinda Yohana Matiija. Aliyo uyo ali ndo wa bado u mu butemi bo ng'wigulu ankilile u wei.
40011012	Niyo kwingiila mu shiku ja ng'wa Yohana kushisha lelo iyi, u butemi bo ng'wigulu bukuluhiagwa hataale, kwike a bigaganija bakubupandikaga.
40011013	Nguno pye a bahangi ni shilagilo bakahanga kwiza kukaja hali Yohana.
40011014	Na luulu ulu mutogilwe kuzunya zunyagi, nguno u ng'wenuyu huna ng'wene u Eliya uyo shiigelile ize.
40011015	Uyo ali na matu ni igwage.
40011016	"Aliyo himba nashiikolanije na ki i shibyalilwe shenishi? Shitikilile na baana bigashaga ng'wigulilu bakwihamukilaga na bichabo;
40011017	bakuhayaga giki, 'A bing'we, ni ginehe twalumufuulilaga mbiilulu aliyo ning'we u kubina yaya; hama hangi aho twandya kulila nghungu nahene mutapinihalile!'
40011018	Nguno u Yohana akiza atulyaga nuulu kung'wa yaya; buyuhaya, 'Ali n'isamva.'
40011019	Hama u Ng'wana wa Munhu aho wiza akulyaga na kung'wa, hangi nahene bandya kuhaya giki, 'Nolagi u munhu uyu; naku na neevi, niyo anwanile na batobisha ba goodi, buyaga na banhu ba shibi!' Kwike a masala gakiyoolechaga mu katumamile kago."
40011020	Huna wandya kwiyoolomya i mizengo iyo yali yalema kugaluka, nuulu iki mihayo mingi ya koolecha budula bokwe yali yabeejiwa muyo.
40011021	Uyiwila alihaya giki, "Uli mu kwihiga Kolasini, nu bebe Betisaida uli mu kwihiga. Nguno i shitwa sha koolecha budula butaale isho shabeejiwe mu bing'we ulu ni shabeejiwa mu Tulo na Sidoni, a bazengi baamo ni bagaluka kale, mu kuzwala magunila na kwifudika mu mabu.
40011022	Aliyo i haha nalimuwila giki, u mu lushiku lo kulamulwa, ikubiza hambu-hambu u ku bana Tulo na a bana Sidoni, kutinda u ku bing'we!
40011023	U bebe nangho Kafalanaumu, uliganika giki ukugunguhiwa kushisha ng'wigulu? Ukwichiwa kushisha kulimu! Nguno i milimo ya koolecha budula butaale iyo yabeejiwe muli bebe ulu ni yabeejiwa mu Sodoma, i si yeniyo ni itaali iliho ni lelo iyi!
40011024	Huna luulu nalikuwila giki, u mu lushiku lo kulamulwa, ikubiza hambu-hambu u ku bana Sodoma kutinda u kuli bebe."
40011025	I likanza lyenilo u Yesu uhaya giki, "Nalikukumilija Baba, bebe uyo uli Seeba w'igulu na si; nguno pyi i mihayo yeniyi wibisile u ku ba masala na a bitegeleja, wiyoolecha u ku baana.
40011026	Alichene Baba, nguno h'umo ibeelelile u kuli bebe.
40011027	U Baba ashituulile pyi i shose mu nkono gwane; na atiho nuulu umo uyo aamanile u Ng'wana ulu ati Baba iyene. Hangi atiho nu yuyo aamanile u Baba, ulu ati Ng'wana iyene, na buli ng'wene uyo Ng'wana alatogwe kunfubolela.
40011028	Nzugi kuli nene pye abo muli na makoye, na mubunilwe miligo midito; u nene nakung'wifuuja.
40011029	Solagi ijoki lyane, ng'wilange kufuma kuli nene, nguno u nene nali nfula na nali ng'widohya u mu ngholo; u mu giko hu bukwifuula u bupanga wing'we.
40011030	Nguno ili shinogu u kulitumamila i lijoki lyane; hama nu nigo gwane guli mbupu."
40012001	I likanza lyenilo u Yesu ubuuka ajile, ubitila mu migunda ya busiga, niyo yali sabato. A bahemba bakwe baali batuuba, na luulu buyubinza mangala banuka masha, balya i mbeke.
40012002	A Bafalisayo aho bababona baliita giko, bung'wila u Yesu giki, "Alibalolage a bahemba bako; baliita mhayo uyo guli ngilo kwitwa ha sabato!"
40012003	Nanghwe ushosha alibawila giki, "A bing'we mutaali u kusoma umo akiitila u Daudi na a babo wali nabo aho baali batuuba?
40012004	I giki akingila mu numba ya ng'wa Mulungu, uukalya migati ya kutuulwa ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu, iyo yali ngilo u kwilya u wei na a biye, ulu iti bagabiji duhu?
40012005	Nuulu hangi mutaali u kusoma umo shihayilile i shilagilo, i giki u mu lushiku lo sabato a bagabiji bakikenaagulaga i sabato u mu hekalu, aliyo a boi bikala bati na shisembo?
40012006	Aliyo nalimuwila i haha aliho a henaha ntaale kutinda hekalu.
40012007	Ulu ni mumanile a makulu ga mhayo uyu, giki: 'I shigongo shiniyegije kutinda shitambo;' ni mutabasolile bubi abo bati na bubi.
40012008	Nguno u Ng'wana wa Munhu hu Seeba wayo ni sabato."
40012009	Aho winga u kwenuko, uukingila ng'wisinagogi lyabo.
40012010	Walimo na munhu wa nkono guhaamalalile. Huna luulu iki baali batogilwe kunsola bubi u Seeba, bumuja giki, "Idulikanile u kupija a ha sabato?"
40012011	Nanghwe ubashokeja uhaya, "U mu bing'we, aliho nani uyo ali na ngholo imo, huna yugwila ng'wichongo ha sabato uyo atibuucha kwifunya mo?
40012012	Al'u munhu atikilile kule i ngholo? Hu kuhaya idulikanile gete u kubeeja yawiza a ha sabato!"
40012013	Huna ung'wila u munhu ng'wenuyo giki, "Gugoloolage u nkono gwako." Nghana ugugoloola gupila, gulenganila nu ng'wichago.
40012014	Bufuma hanze a Bafalisayo, buukandya kubeeja long'we ya kunyagaja!
40012015	U Yesu aho wagudeeba u gwenuyo winga ho a henaho, na banhu bingi bunondeela. Uukabapija pye abo baali basaatile.
40012016	Kwike wabalemejaga batizuja bakunkumuchaga.
40012017	Gubiza gwashikiila uyo guhayiwe na nghangi Isaya giki,
40012018	"Nolagi u Ntumami wane u Nsolwa, hu ng'wene u Ntogwa wane, uyo ngholo yane yinyegelile; Nakuntuulila Moyo wane, nanghwe akulomeela butungilija ku mahanga.
40012019	Atalagaagaana nuulu atalayoganya; munhu ataliigwa ilaka lyakwe mu mapanda.
40012020	Nuulu kadete kalabukile atiko kukamalija. Hangi nuulu kalutambi kakuzukiilaga lyochi atiko kukajimya, kushisha u butungilija abutuule mu bupyeni.
40012021	Hama u kwisagilwa kwa mahanga gose kukubiza mu lina lyakwe."
40012022	Waliho munhu w'isamva, hangi wali mboku na shimuumu, akenhwa u kuli Yesu upijiwa; udula u kuyomba nu kubona.
40012023	Pye a banhu bukumya no, buyiwila giki, "U ng'wenuyu akuduuma kubiza Ng'wana wa ng'wa Daudi?"
40012024	Aliyo a Bafalisayo aho bigwa, a bene buyuhaya giki, "U ng'wenuyu atudula u kugapeeja a masamva ulu iti mu budula w'itaale lya masamva i Libelizebuli!"
40012025	Nanghwe u Yesu ugamana a maganiko gabo, ubawila giki, "Buli butemi ulu bugabanika huna wandya kwilwisha boi wenekili na wenekili, bukwimala. Nuulu nzengo gose-gose ulu gwandya kwiyubukila goyi na goyi, gukugwa; pyi nuulu kaya itulama!
40012026	I gisi luulu, u Shetani ulu wandya kumpeeja Shetani, angu numho ogabanikile. Hama a henaho bukwimiila ginehe luulu u butemi bokwe?
40012027	Niyo hangi, u nene ulu nakugapeejaga a masamva mu budula bo ng'wa Belizebuli, al'a baana bing'we a bene bakagapeejaga mu budula ki? Huna luulu managi giki, a benabo hu bakubiza balamuji bing'we!
40012028	Aliyo ulu nakugapeejaga a masamva mu nguzu ja ng'wa Moyo wa ng'wa Mulungu, numho hu kuhaya u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu bong'wiziilile!
40012029	"Nuulu, adugije ginehe munhu ose-ose kwingila mu numba ya ngosha o nguzu, wandya kwinja shikolo shakwe bo makaala? Duhaya akwandya antunge tame u ng'wenekili kaya, h'adule u kwiyiboneela i kaya yeniyo?
40012030	Uyo ati hamo na nene, ali ng'wilwisha wane; nu yuyo atukumingaga hamo na nene, akubbalasanyaga!
40012031	Na luulu nalimuwila giki, a banhu badugije kulekejiwa pyi i shibi, nuulu busondaguji. Aliyo u mhayo gwa kunsondagula Moyo Ng'wela, u gwene guti gwa kulekejiwa na hado yaya!
40012032	Hangi nuulu munhu unghaya kibi u Ng'wana wa Munhu, adugije u kulekejiwa. Aliyo uyo unghaya kibi Moyo Ng'wela, atiko kulekejiwa na hado yaya; ibize ng'wikanza ili, nuulu ilo liliza!"
40012033	"U nti ulu ng'ugugoyela gubeela, na a matwajo gakubiza gawiza. Ulu gulekanijiwa gubipa, na a matwajo gakubiza ga sagala-sagala, nguno u nti gukamanilagwa ku matwajo gago.
40012034	Bing'we bubyile wa shipili, mudugije ginehe u kuhaya mihayo mitengeke aliyo a bing'we benekili muli babubi? Nguno u nomo gukayombaga iyo yokalile mu moyo!
40012035	U munhu wawiza akafunyaga shawiza u kwinga u mu shawiza isho ibikigije; nu wa malofu nanghwe akafunyaga sha malofu u kwinga u mu sha malofu isho ibikigije.
40012036	Aliyo nalimuwila giki, u mu lushiku lo kulamulwa, a banhu bakufunya busombooji kulwa buli mhayo gwa sagala-sagala uyo bakuguyombaga.
40012037	Nguno ukubalilwa butungilija kulenganila ni mihayo iyo ukwiyombaga, nuulu ukubalilwa nsango kulenganila ni mihayo iyo ukwiyombaga!"
40012038	Huna balangi balebe ba shilagilo hamo na Bafalisayo, bunshokeja bung'wila giki, "Nangi, tutogilwe utoolekeje shimanikijo."
40012039	Nanghwe ubashokeja uhaya, "Shibyalilwe shabubi na shitankugije Mulungu, shikukoobaga shimanikijo. Aliyo shitinhwa shimanikijo, ulu iti sha ng'wa Yona duhu!
40012040	Nguno git'umo Yona akadila mu nda ya ndilo nhaale shiku idatu liimi na bujiku, nu Ng'wana wa Munhu shing'wigeleelilwe kudila mu gati ya si shiku idatu, liimi na bujiku!
40012041	Niyo u mu lushiku lo kulamulwa, a banhu ba Ninawi bakwimiila nasho i shibyalilwe ishi bashenheleje kwinhwa nsango; nguno a bene aho bawigwa u bulomeeji bo ng'wa Yona bakagaluka. Aliyo i haha uyo aliho aha ng'wene ntaale kutinda Yona.
40012042	U mu lushiku lwenulo nu ntemi nkima wa si ya dakama akwimiila nasho i shibyalilwe ishi ashenheleje kwinhwa nsango; nguno u ng'wene akafuma ku si ya kule, wiza kuli Solomoni kudegeleka mihayo yakwe ya masala, aliyo i haha uyo aliho aha ng'wene ntaale kutinda Solomoni."
40012043	"Ali luulu, u moyo nsoso ulu gwinga muli munhu, gukajaga uko na uko gukuhuhuulijaga mu matogolo makalamuku gati na minzi, gulikooba ha kwifuulila. Aliyo ulu gugayiwa,
40012044	gukahayaga giki, 'I gete nashoke u ku numba yane umo naafumile!' Gwakuhayiza, gwisanga ili buyiki; niyo ipyagulilwe, na kugaliilwa chiza.
40012045	Huna guja kusoleleja myoyo yingi mpungati, misoso kuguheeba u goyi, gwiza nayo; pyi yingila yikala mo. I nghalilo ya ng'wa munhu ng'wenuyo ikabizaga yabubi no, kutinda umo wali i kwandya. H'umo ili nu ku shibyalilwe i shabubi ishi!"
40012046	Aho ataali ubasomboolela a banhu, kuhayimanila u nina wimiila hanze, hamo na a baana ba ng'wawe u Yesu; baali batogilwe kulungalunga nanghwe.
40012047	Munhu umo ung'wila giki, "U noko ali hanze wimiilaga na a bazunayo; balitogwa kulungalunga nangho."
40012048	Nanghwe unshokeja uhaya, "Nani u mayu u nene? Na a bazuna bane banani?"
40012049	Huna ugoloola nkono aliboolecha a bahemba bakwe, kunu alihaya giki, "Baaba mulibabona aha a bamayu na a bazuna bane.
40012050	Nguno buli ng'wene uyo akwitaga iyo Baba wa ng'wigulu atogilwe, u ng'wenuyo hu nzuna wane, n'ilumbu lyane, na mayu."
40013001	U lushiku lwenulo, u Yesu aho wafuma u mu kaya akaja uukigasha ku ng'walo gwa nyanza.
40013002	Banhu bung'okaliila koi, mabita na mabita; kushisha nose wingila mu lyato wigasha, a mabita ga banhu gimiila ha ng'walo.
40013003	Wandya kubalomeela mihayo mingi mu shigemenghejo; uhaya giki, "Mibi akafuma, uja kubiba mbiyu.
40013004	Aho alibiba, jingi jugwila mu nzila; jiza noni jujilya.
40013005	Jingi jugwila mu si ya mawe-mawe, jugehelwa i si ya kujifukiila; ahene jikanguha u kuzwa iki jali jitafukiililwe chiza.
40013006	Aliyo aho lyaseba i liimi, lyujoocha jujiga, nguno jali jiti na miji ya kwigela.
40013007	Jingi jugwila mu minghwa, aho jilikula na a minghwa gukulanija najo, gujishiteleja.
40013008	Aliyo jingi jikagwila mu si yawiza jutwaja matwajo: jimo igana, jingi makumi atandatu, na jingi makumi adatu.
40013009	Uyo ali na matu ni igwage."
40013010	Huna a bahemba bakwe biza bumuja giki, "Nibuli ukutumamilaga shigemenghejo duhu ulu ukubalangaga?"
40013011	Nanghwe ubashokeja uhaya, "A bing'we ng'winhilwe bumani, mujimane i mbisila ja butemi bo ng'wigulu; aliyo a boi batinhilwe.
40013012	Nguno buli ng'wene uyo ali na shikolo, akongejiwa na shingi; aliyo uyo ati na shikolo akutaajiwa ni shisho ali nasho.
40013013	Nakutumamilaga shigemenghejo ulu nalibalanga, nguno: bakulolaga, aliyo u kubona yaya. Nu kudegeleka bakudegelekaga, aliyo u kwigwa yaya; nuulu kwitegeleja nduhu.
40013014	Na luulu u buhangi bo ng'wa Isaya bukushikilijiagwa u mubo; ubo buhayile giki, 'U kwigwa mukwigwa, aliyo mutitegeleja; nu kulola mukulola, aliyo mutubona.
40013015	Nguno i ngholo ja banhu benaba ngunu no, na a matu gabo ayo bakudegelekelaga gachibile; na a miso gabo gabbokulile. Ulu iti chene, ni balibona na miso gabo, nu kwigwa ni baliigwa na matu gabo, nu mu ngholo jabo ni bitegeleja, bugaluka, nubapija!'
40013016	"Aliyo a bing'we muli na mbango iki a miso ging'we gakubonaga, na a matu ging'we gakwigwaga.
40013017	Nguno nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, bahangi na batungilija bingi baali batogilwe kwibona iyo mukwibonaga aliyo batibonile; na kwiyigwa iyo mukwiyigwaga aliyo batiyigwile."
40013018	"Huna luulu, degelekagi a makulu ga shigemenghejo sha mibi.
40013019	Buli munhu ulu ugwigwa u mhayo gwa butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu aliyo uleka u kugwitegeleja, akizaga u Mi ogupula u mu ngholo yakwe umo gukahambagwa; u ng'wenuyo ali git'umo jili i mbiyu ijo jikagwila mu nzila.
40013020	Aliyo i mbiyu ijo jikagwila mu si ya mawe-mawe, u ng'wene al'uyo akagwigwaga u mhayo wagwanukula wangu-wangu na buyegi.
40013021	Kwike gwikala guti na miji u muli we. Gukangunaanaga ikanza iguhi duhu, aliyo ulu gilonga makoye nuulu buluhi kulwa nguno yago u mhayo, haho na haho akagwaga.
40013022	Hama i mbiyu ijo jikagwila mu minghwa, u ng'wene ali uyo akagwigwaga u mhayo, kwike gwashitelejiwa na myatila ya buli lushiku, na bulemba-lembi bo sabo; gwagaiwa a matwajo!
40013023	Aliyo i mbiyu ijo jikagwila mu si yawiza, u ng'wene h'uyo akagwigwaga u mhayo wagwitegeleja, watwaja matwajo: hamo igana, ungi makumi atandatu, ungi makumi adatu."
40013024	Ubawila shigemenghejo hangi alihaya giki, "U butemi bo ng'wigulu bushikile kwikolanijiwa na munhu uyo akabiba mbiyu jawiza mu ngunda gokwe.
40013025	Aliyo aho balaalile a banhu, wiza ng'wanishi wakwe utulagulila mo mbiyu ja pungu, huna winga!
40013026	Jahayuzwa na kwandya kutwaja, jubonekana mo na pungu.
40013027	Biza a batumami bakwe bung'wila giki, 'Baba, utabibile mbiyu jawiza u mu ngunda gwako? Hama jafumaga hali hangi i pungu?'
40013028	Nanghwe ushosha alibawila giki, 'Ng'wanishi wagubeegije u gwenuyo.' A batumami bumuja, 'Hamo ulitogwa tukajidubbagule i pungu?'
40013029	Ubashokeja alihaya, 'Yaya, mutizubuhubila nu busiga bone. Nguno u ng'wikanza lya kujidubbula i pungu, mudugije kuhubila ng'ubudubbula nabo.
40013030	Jilekagi jikulanije duhu, likushika i likanza lya kugesa; u ng'wikanza lyenilo hu nakubawila a bagesi giki: Jikumingagi tame i pungu mujitunge maganda-maganda mujipembe mu moto. U busiga bugolanyagi chiza mubutuule ng'wiluuli lyane.' "
40013031	Hangi ubinha shigemenghejo shingi alihaya giki, "U butemi bo ng'wigulu bubange giti kabiyu ka haladali, ako munhu akakasola uukakahamba ng'wilaale lyakwe.
40013032	A koyi kali kado ka bado u mu mbiyu pyi i jose, aliyo ulu kuuzwa na kukula, likabizaga isaka itaale kutinda pye i miti ya masaka. Gukabizaga nti ntaale no, na noni ja kulala jikapandikaga wikalo u mu matambi galyo."
40013033	Hangi ubawila shigemenghejo shingi alihaya giki, "U butemi bo ng'wigulu wikolile na shibimbya, isho nkima akasola ugulanya mu ngele idatu ja busu, shubududumya pyi u bose."
40013034	I yose yeniyi u Yesu wabasomboolelaga a banhu mu shigemenghejo; atabasomboolelile mhayo nuulu gumo, ulu iti mu nzila ya shigemenghejo.
40013035	U mu giko gushikilijiwa uyo guhayiwe kubitila muli nghangi giki, "Nakulungalunga sumo na nomo gwane, nakufubola mbisila ja kufuma ku shiku ja wandijo."
40013036	Huna u Yesu ubalaga a banhu, u wei ushoka kaya, wiza wingila mu numba. A bahemba bakwe bunsanga mo; bung'wila, "Tuwilage a makulu ga shigemenghejo sha pungu mu ngunda."
40013037	Nanghwe ushosha alihaya giki, "U mibi wa mbiyu jawiza ali Ng'wana wa Munhu.
40013038	U ngunda gwene si, i mbiyu i jawiza bene baana ba mu butemi, i pungu jene baana ba Ng'wanishi.
40013039	U ng'wanishi, u nghambi wa pungu ng'wene Shetani. A magesa buli bukalikijo w'ikanza, a bagesi bamalaika.
40013040	Ali luulu, umo pungu jikakumingilagwa japemva mu moto, h'umo ikubizila nu ku bukalikijo w'ikanza.
40013041	U Ng'wana wa Munhu, akubatuma a bamalaika bakwe hose-hose u mu butemi bokwe, baje balikuminga buli shikolo isho shikenhelejaga kwipama; pye na a bagomi a bose.
40013042	Huna bakubaponya ng'wichongo lya moto, umo kukubiza kulila na kushelanya mino.
40013043	Aliyo a batungilija, bakubiza ba kung'weka-ng'weka giti liimi u mu butemi bo ng'wa Saabo. Uyo ali na matu ni igwage."
40013044	"U butemi bo ng'wigulu bubizile giti sabo, iyo yali yifumbikile ng'wilaale limo, wahayibona munhu nebe ongeja u kwibisa. Huna kulwa buyegi bokwe, uja uukajinja pyi i shikolo isho wali nasho, uukaligula i lilaale lyenilo.
40013045	Na hangi u butemi bo ng'wigulu bubizile giti nsuluja, nchooji wa mawe ga mpango.
40013046	Aho wabona iwe lya mpango ntaale, uja uukajinja pyi isho wali nasho, uligula i liwe lyenilo."
40013047	Uhaya na giki, "U butemi bo ng'wigulu bubange giti igokoolo, ilo likaponejiagwa mu nyanza lyagobanija shikolo sha buli mbika.
40013048	Lyakuhayudutwa, ulu lyashishiwa a ha ng'walo, bakigashaga kusolanhya. I shawiza batuula mu shiseme, lelo a ga sagala-sagala bagaponanja!
40013049	H'umo ikubizila nu ku bukalikijo w'ikanza; a bamalaika bakuja balibasolanhya a babubi kubinja u mu batungilija.
40013050	Bakubaponya ng'wichongo lya moto, umo kukubiza kulila na kushelanya mino!"
40013051	Hanuma u Yesu ubabuja, "Ahene muliyitegeleja pyi i yeniyi?" Nabo bushosha, "Alichene."
40013052	Ubawila hangi giki, "Huna luulu, buli ng'wene uyo alangilwe mihayo ya butemi bo ng'wigulu, abizile giti namugi ha ng'wakwe, uyo akafunyaga shikolo shipya na shikulukulu, kwingiila mu wibikija bokwe."
40013053	U Yesu aho washikalicha i shigemenghejo shenisho, winga a henaho.
40013054	Wahayushika u mu nzengo go ng'wawe wingila ng'wisinagogi lyabo, wandya kubalanga. Buyukumya baliwila giki; "Bing'we, u ng'wenuyu wafunije hali pye a masala genaya, nu budula wenubu?
40013055	Tuhaya hu ng'wene u ng'witunja wa ng'wa selemala, niyo nu nina akitanagwa Malia? Angu na a bazunaye ba Yakobo na Yosefu na Simoni na Yuda!
40013056	Ati hu ng'wene uyo na balumbuye tukwikalaga nabo ng'wenumu umu? Hama u wei wifunije hali pyi i yeniyi?"
40013057	Yubatabanya i mihayo yakwe, bipama! Nanghwe U Yesu ubawila giki, "U nghangi atadalahagwa hose-hose, ulu iti mu nzengo go ng'wawe na mu kaya ya ng'wawe."
40013058	Na luulu atabeegije mingi i ya koolecha budula, kulwa nguno ya butuzunya wabo.
40014001	U mu shiku jenijo u Helode aho wigwa u lukumo lwa ng'wa Yesu,
40014002	uyubawila a batumami bakwe giki, "Tambala shilanga u ng'wenuyu Yohana Matiija, wajuukile kufuma mu bafu. H'uyo akwenhelejaga yitwe mihayo ya koolecha budula butaale giki!"
40014003	Na luulu, u Helode hu ng'wene uyo wali wandima u Yohana untunga na umponya mu jeela, kulwa nguno ya ng'wa Helodia, uyo wali nke wa ng'wa Filipo ng'wanong'wawe.
40014004	U Yohana akanghama ung'wila giki, "Iti yawiza u bebe u kunsola u nkima ng'wenuyo!"
40014005	Nose oli atogilwe kumulaga kulwa mhayo gwenuyo, kwike oli abogohile a banhu, nguno bamonaga u Yohana giki wali nghangi.
40014006	Aliyo nose lukashika lushiku lo kwizukwa kubyalwa kwakwe u Helode, nshike wa ng'wa Helodia ubabinila chiza pye a bose, uyega no u Helode.
40014007	I likanza lyenilo, ung'wila u ng'waniki giki akunsamba shikolo shose-shose isho alanombe; niyo ung'wilahilila.
40014008	U ng'waniki nanghwe kulwa kusamilijiwa na nina, uhaya giki; "Aha nali aha nisambage ntwe go ng'wa Yohana Matiija, guli ng'wilangahe!"
40014009	U ntemi uzwangana no, aliyo iki wali wamala kwilahila, niyo ku butongi wa bageni abo wali wabalaalika kwiza ku shiliwa, ukalila kulagila duhu giki u ng'waniki inhwe u ntwe!
40014010	Untuma munhu uja u mu jeela, uukamuta u ntwe u Yohana!
40014011	Bung'wenhela nghana u ng'waniki guli ng'wilangahe, biza bung'winha; nanghwe untwalila nina!
40014012	A bahemba bakwe u Yohana biza bugubuucha u mimba gokwe buukagujika, ha numa buja u kuli Yesu, kujung'wila u mhayo gwenuyo.
40014013	U Yesu aho wagwigwa u mhayo gwa kucha kwa ng'wa Yohana, wingila mu lyato winga a h'ipandi lyenilo; uja kwipandi liti na banhu giki akalembeele iyene kwenuko. Aliyo a banhu aho bigwa buyinga u mu mizengo mabita na mabita, bakunondeelaga lo magulu.
40014014	Wahayukola a ha ng'walo ugabona a mabita ga banhu ubasaatwa, ubapija a basaatu babo.
40014015	Aho lyabiza lya mhindi, a bahemba bakwe bung'wegeela bung'wila giki, "U ng'wenumu tuli ng'witogolo duhu, niyo ni likanza lyaja. Hambu-hambu ni wabalaga a banhu baje ku machalo bakigulile na shiliwa!"
40014016	Aliyo u Yesu ubashokeja alihaya giki, "A banhu bati na nguno ya kuja, binhagi a bing'we i shiliwa."
40014017	Nabo bung'wila, "Tuti na shiliwa sha kwigela a henaha, tuli na migati itano na ndilo ibili duhu."
40014018	Nanghwe ubawila, "Nenhelagi aha i shenisho."
40014019	Huna ulagila a banhu bigashe ha maswa. Wisola i migati yeniyo butano wayo ni ndilo ij'ibili. Ulangamila ng'wigulu, ulumba, ushimeganya ubinha a bahemba bakwe, a bahemba nabo bubagabanhya a banhu.
40014020	Pye bakalya bigeja; aho bashisoleela isho shikasaaga, bokaja matangwa ikumi na abili ga mamenyagulwa.
40014021	Abo bakalya baali bagosha giti shihumbi shitano, kuleka kubisaaba a bakima na a baana.
40014022	Huna i likanza lyenilo, u Yesu ubakomeleja a bahemba bakwe kwingila mu lyato, batonge kuja ku nkilo gwa nyanza. U wei usaaga alimalija kubalaga a banhu.
40014023	Aho wamala u kwilaga nabo, ulinha mu lugulu iyene kujulomba; nose wila u bujiku ataali ko iyene duhu.
40014024	I likanza lyenilo i lyato lyali ku bujiba kule ni si, likukoyiagwa mahuuli, nguno u nyaga gwabafumiilaga ku butongi.
40014025	Mu madilu mataale ga ngoko ja kwandya, bahayimanila u Yesu wabasanga alishimiza higulya ya nyanza.
40014026	A bahemba aho bamona alishimiza higulya ya nyanza, bogoha no. Bulila balihaya, "Lilo linghangi!"
40014027	Aliyo haho na haho u Yesu ubayombya alibawila; "Timbyagi ngholo, mutogohage nali nene."
40014028	Huna u Petelo ung'wila, "Seeba ulu uli bebe, niwilage nane nize aho uli henaho nalishimiza higulya ya minzi."
40014029	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Nzugu." U Petelo wika nghana u mu lyato, wandya kushimiza ajile aho wali u Yesu.
40014030	Kwike aho wagukalalila u nghuyembo gwa nyaga ogoha, wandya kulibila; ulila alihaya, "Seeba nanguhilage!"
40014031	Haho na haho u Yesu ugoloola nkono unzubula, kunu aling'wila giki, "Bebe wa kuzunya kudo, nibuli wiganilija?"
40014032	Aho bingila bubili wabo u mu lyato, gulembeela na kulembeela u nyaga.
40014033	Pye a bose abo baali u mu lyato bunamya kunu balihaya giki, "Nghana uli Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu!"
40014034	Bahayukila i nyanza, bushika ku si ya Genesaleti.
40014035	A banhu ba kwene bundeeba u Yesu, bandya kulagija hose-hose u mu mapandi ga hihi-hihi, bang'wenhele pye abo baali basaatu.
40014036	Buyung'wikumbilija bakuumye nuulu ha neno ya shizwalo shakwe duhu. Na nghana pye abo bakuumyaga bapilaga.Shimile sha kulekwa na bataale
40015001	Huna Bafalisayo na balangi ba shilagilo ba kufuma Yelusalemu, bunsanga u Yesu kumuja giki,
40015002	"Nibuli a bahemba bako bakushikenaagulaga i shimile isho twalekelwa na bataale, batukalabaga tame a makono gabo ulu bahaya kulya i shiliwa?"
40015003	Nanghwe ubashokeja uhaya giki, "Hama i gisi, nibuli a bing'we mukashikenaagulaga i shilagilo sha ng'wa Mulungu kulwa kudima shimile shing'we?
40015004	Iki u Mulungu ahayile giki, 'Nkujage so na noko'; na giki, 'Uyo unduka ise nuulu nina shing'wigeleelilwe kubulagwa!'
40015005	Aliyo a bing'we muhayile giki, ose-ose ulu ulinda ung'wila ise nuulu nina giki, 'I shikolo shane ishi ni shakugunaana, kwike shafunyiwe kubiza inongho kuli Mulungu!'
40015006	Na nghana u munhu ng'wenuyo atudula u kunkuja u ise nuulu u nina. U mu giko mukagukenaagulaga u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu kulwa nguno ya shimile shing'we!
40015007	Bing'we bibeeleja, u Isaya atungiligije u mu buhangi ubo abuhayile kulwa nguno ying'we; umo ahayilile giki,
40015008	'A banhu aba banikugije bo ha nomo duhu, aliyo u mu ngholo bali kule nu nene.
40015009	Bakanilamyaga dalali, aliyo kunu bulanga malange ga kulagilwa na banhu.' "
40015010	Huna u Yesu ulitana i libita lya banhu bung'wegeela; ubawila giki, "Bing'we, degelekagi ng'witegeleje.
40015011	Giki, isho shikingilaga mu nomo go ng'wa munhu shitansosohajaga, aliyo isho shikafumaga mu nomo gokwe h'isho shikansosohajaga U busoso ubo buhayiwe mu shandikwa, ili mbika iyo kang'witaga munhu aleke kwigeleelwa kubiza na busangi na Mulungu (lola. na Yoh 18:28; Blm 1:24; 12:9).'."
40015012	Ha numa ya yeniyo, a bahemba bakwe bung'wegeela bung'wila, "Umanile i giki a Bafalisayo bakolagwa no u kugwigwa u mhayo gwenuyo?"
40015013	Nanghwe ubashokeja uhaya, "Buli shene i shizwile, isho shitahambilwe na Baba uyo ali ng'wigulu, shikudubbulwa.
40015014	Balekagi; nguno a benabo babboku, na batongeeji ba babboku. U mboku ulu untongeela mboku ng'wiye, bakujugwila ng'wichongo bubili wabo!"
40015015	A henaho u Petelo ung'wila u Yesu giki, "Tuwilage a makulu ga lusumo lwenulo."
40015016	Nanghwe ushosha uhaya, "Na a bing'we mutaali u kwitegeleja?
40015017	Mutamanile giki buli shene isho shikingilaga mu nda kubitila mu nomo, i nghalilo yaho ikabizaga kufuma hanze kwitogolo?
40015018	Aliyo isho shikafumaga mu nomo, shikingaga mu ngholo. I shenisho h'isho shikansosohajaga u munhu!
40015019	Nguno isho shikafumaga mu ngholo, shili maganiko mabi, bubulagi, bushihani, bujingi, wibi, bulomolomo na budalahi.
40015020	I yeniyi h'iyo ikansosohajaga u munhu; lelo u gwa kulya na makono gatakalabije, u gwene guti gwa kunsosohaja munhu na hado yaya."
40015021	Huna u Yesu winga a henaho, uja mhandi ja Tulo na Sidoni.
40015022	Kwitulwa nkima umo, muna Kanaani wa mhandi ja kwenuko, wiza akulilaga alihaya giki, "Nikulilagwe Seeba Ng'wana wa ng'wa Daudi, nali na nshike wane akukoyiagwa isamva!"
40015023	Aliyo u Yesu atanshokegije nuulu hado; a bahemba bakwe bung'wegeela bung'wikumbilija balihaya, "Nzunilijage aje, nguno alikala utukuubilija no, kunu akulilaga!"
40015024	Nanghwe ubashokeja giki, "U nene natumilwe ku ngholo ja numba ya Isilaeli, ijo jijimiilile."
40015025	U nkima ung'wegeela wiza untugija mazwi, ung'wikumbilija uhaya, "Nigunaanage baba!"
40015026	Nanghwe u Yesu unshokeja aling'wila giki, "Iti chiza u kusola shiliwa sha baana ushiponegeja tuwa."
40015027	U nkima ng'wenuyo uhaya, "Na nghana guli chene baba, aliyo nahene nu tuwa nato tukasolelejaga a malagalikwa ayo gakalagalaga ulu balilya a beneto."
40015028	A henaho u Yesu ung'wila u nkima ng'wenuyo giki, "Bebe mayu, uli na kusanya kutaale. N'ibizage git'umo nghumbu jako jili." Nghana u nshike wakwe upila i likanza lyenilo.
40015029	Winga nu kwenuko u Yesu, uja akushimizaga hihi-hihi ya nyanza ya Galilaya. Akiita uja uukalinha mu lugulu, wigasha ng'wenumo.
40015030	Nu kwene gunkuubija mabita mataale ga banhu, galing'wenhela pye abo baali basaatu, babboku, balemehazu, buyaga na bashimuumu. Na bangi bingi duhu, buyushika babatuula ku magulu gakwe wabapija.
40015031	A mabita ga banhu genayo, gukumya u kubabona a bashimuumu bayuyomba, na a basaatu bayupila, na a balemehazu bayushimiza, na a babboku bayubona. A banhu benabo bunkumilija Mulungu wa Isilaeli.
40015032	Huna u Yesu ubitana a bahemba bakwe ubawila giki, "Nalibasaatwa a banhu nguno i haha jashikaga shiku idatu bali hamo nane, aliyo bati na shiliwa. Natatogilwe u kubalaga baje bali nzala, nguno badugije nuulu kugwa-wesa mu nzila."
40015033	Nabo a bahemba bakwe bung'wila giki, "U mu matogolo umu tukapandikile hali shiliwa shingi sha kubigela a banhu na wingi aba?"
40015034	Nanghwe u Yesu ubabuja, "Muli na migati yinga?" Buhaya, "Mpungati, na tudilo tugehu."
40015035	Huna ulagila gigashe ha si a mabita ga banhu.
40015036	Wisola i migati iyo mpungati nu tudilo twenuto; ulumba, ushimeganya. Ubinha a bahemba bakwe, nabo a bahemba bubagabanhya a banhu.
40015037	Pye bulya bigeja; aho bagasoleela a masaajiwa, bokaja matangwa mpungati.
40015038	A banhu abo bakalya baali shihumbi shine, kuleka kubisaaba a bakima na a baana.
40015039	Huna ugalaga a mabita ga banhu, u wei wingila mu lyato, uja ku si ya Magadani.
40016001	Bafalisayo na Basadukayo bung'wegeela u Yesu kwiza kungema; aho bashika bunomba aboolekeje shimanikijo sha kufuma ng'wigulu.
40016002	Nanghwe ubashokeja alibawila, "Ulu ng'ubona lyalalukaga i lilunde makanza ga liimi lya mhindi, mukahayaga; 'Lelo ng'wanga.'
40016003	Nuulu makanza ga dilu ulu ng'ulibona i lilunde lyahindihalaga lyuditibija, mukahayaga ; 'Lelo ikutula mbula.' A bing'we ulu ng'walola u ng'wilunde mukamanaga umo ilijila i wangaluke, lelo u gwa kushideeba i shimanikijo sha makanza aya u gwene gumulemeelile gete!
40016004	Shibyalilwe shabubi na shitankugije Mulungu, shikukoobaga shimanikijo. Aliyo shitudula kwinhwa i shimanikijo, ulu iti sha ng'wa Yona!" Ubaleka henaho uja.
40016005	A bahemba bakwe baali biba u kusola migati aho balija u ku nkilo.
40016006	Kwimanila u Yesu wabawila giki, "Kalaganagi, ng'wilanghane u ku shibimbya sha Bafalisayo na Basadukayo."
40016007	Aliyo a bene bandya kwilunjalunja balihaya, "Kolaga hamo shi iki tutasolile i migati!"
40016008	U Yesu ugudeeba u mhayo gwenuyo, ubawila giki, "Bing'we ba kuzunya kudo, nibuli muliwila giki, hamo iki muti na migati?
40016009	Mutaali duhu u kwitegeleja? Mutuyizukagwa i migati itano iyo ikalyiwa na banhu shihumbi shitano, na a matangwa ayo mukokaja?
40016010	Mutuyizukagwa nuulu i migati mpungati iyo yali yabigela banhu shihumbi shine lelo iyi, na a matangwa ayo ng'wali ng'okaja?
40016011	Nibuli mutitegelejaga giki natumuwilaga mihayo ya migati? Na luulu kalaganagi ng'wilanghane gete u ku shibimbya sha Bafalisayo na Basadukayo!"
40016012	Huna bitegeleja giki wali atahayaga kwilanghana kulwa shibimbya sha mu migati, aliyo wahayaga mihayo ya malange ga Bafalisayo na Basadukayo.
40016013	U Yesu aho washika mhandi ja Kaisalia Filipi, ubabuja a bahemba bakwe alihaya, "A banhu bakunghayaga u Ng'wana wa Munhu giki ali nani?"
40016014	Nabo buhaya, "Bamo bakunghayaga giki ali Yohana Matiija, bangi Eliya, aliyo bangi hangi Yelemia, nuulu umo wa bahangi."
40016015	Huna ubawila, "Al'a bing'we mukunihayaga nali nani?"
40016016	Simoni Petelo ushosha uhaya, "Uli Kilisto Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu mpanga!"
40016017	U Yesu ung'wila giki, "Uli na mbango Simoni ng'wana Yona, nguno u mhayo gwenuyu utafubolelilwe na munhu, aliyo na Baba uyo ali ng'wigulu.
40016018	U bebe nalikuwila uli Petelo Makulu ga Petelo gene Shiganga, nuulu Iwe.', niyo i kanisa yane nakwizengela a ha shiganga shenishi; hama nuulu mibita ya kulimu ituyiheeba na hado yaya.
40016019	Nakukwinha i fungulo ja butemi bo ng'wigulu, na luulu buli mhayo uyo ulagutunge u mu si, gukubiza gwatungagwa ng'wigulu, nuulu gose-gose ulu uguzunilija mu si, gukubiza gwazunilijiagwa ng'wigulu."
40016020	Huna ubahana a bahemba batizung'wila munhu nuulu umo, giki u wei hu wali ng'wene u Kilisto.
40016021	Huna luulu kufuma ikanza lyenilo, u Yesu wandya kuboolekeja a bahemba bakwe, giki shing'wigeleelilwe kuja Yelusalemu, uko banamhala na bagabiji bataale hamo na balangi ba shilagilo bakunuhya mu mihayo mingi; na giki akubulagwa. Aliyo akujuuka ha lushiku lo kadatu lwaho.
40016022	U Petelo umpunja ha mhujo u Yesu, wandya kunghama alihaya giki, "Seeba, u mhayo gwenuyo ni gukachilage kule uko, gutizukugwila bebe!"
40016023	Nanghwe ungalukila u Petelo ung'wila giki, "Ingaga u ku butongi bone Shetani. Uli ishiki u kuli nene; nguno u bebe utiganikaga ya ng'wa Mulungu, uli mu ya banhu duhu!"
40016024	Huna u Yesu ubawila a bahemba bakwe giki, "Ose-ose uyo atogilwe kunilondeela ni idalahage wei ng'wenekili, hama ibuukije nsalaba gokwe ng'wenekili h'anilondeele.
40016025	Nguno buli ng'wene uyo atogilwe kubupija bupanga bokwe akubujimiija, aliyo uyo ubujimiija u bupanga bokwe kulwa nguno yane, u ng'wenuyo akubupandika.
40016026	Angu, u munhu akubiza na solobo ki nuulu akipandika pyi i si, aliyo ubujimiija u bupanga bokwe? Nuulu hangi, u munhu adugije kufunya ki kulwa kukomoola bupanga bokwe?
40016027	Nguno u Ng'wana wa Munhu akwiza ng'wikujo lya ng'wa Ise ali hamo na bamalaika bakwe; huna akungabila buli ng'wene ngabo gwa kulenganila na shitwa shakwe.
40016028	Kwike nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, u mu banhu abo bimiilaga aha, baliho bamo batuliloja i licha na hado yaya, kushisha bamone u Ng'wana wa Munhu aliza mu butemi bokwe!"
40017001	Ha numa ya shiku itandatu, u Yesu unsola u Petelo, hamo na Yakobo na Yohana ng'wanong'wawe; benabo duhu. Ubatongeela kuja mu lugulu lulihu, ulinha nabo.
40017002	Kuhayimanila i lihanga lyakwe lyagaluka balolile; u bushu bokwe buyuteemagila giti liimi, ni shizwalo shakwe sheela pe giti isana.
40017003	Bahayimanila babilongela ba Musa na Eliya, balilungalunga nanghwe.
40017004	U Petelo ung'wila u Yesu giki, "Seeba yabeelela u kubiza tuliho aha; ulu ulitogwa tuzenge maheema adatu, u bebe limo, nu Musa limo nu Eliya limo!"
40017005	Aho ataali uyomba giko, kwimanila bafikijiwa ilunde ing'weku, n'ilaka lyufuma u ng'wilunde lilihaya giki, "Uyu ng'wene Ng'wana wane Ntogwa uyo nanyegelile hataale no, ng'wigwagi wei."
40017006	Aho bigwa giko a bahemba bogoha kingi nasho, bugwa bachimigije.
40017007	Aliyo u Yesu ubegeela ubakuumya, ubawila giki, "Bing'we buukagi mutogohage."
40017008	Bahayubuucha a miso gabo, batamonile ungi ose-ose, ulu ati Yesu duhu iyene.
40017009	Aho balika u mu lugulu u Yesu ubahana, ubawila giki, "Mutizung'wila munhu ose-ose i nghulu ja mhayo uyo ng'oolekejiwa gwenuyu, kushisha aho Ng'wana wa Munhu alajuuke kufuma mu bafu."
40017010	Huna a bahemba bumuja balihaya; "Hama nibuli a balangi ba shilagilo bakahayaga giki shiigelile ize Eliya tame?"
40017011	Nanghwe ubashokeja alihaya, "U Eliya u ng'wene nghana ng'wizi kulwa kwilonja-lonja pyi i mihayo.
40017012	Aliyo nalimuwila giki u Eliya wamalile u kwiza, niyo bung'witila git'umo batogelilwe, kwike batang'witegelegije. H'umo ili nu kuli Ng'wana wa Munhu, nanghwe ali hihi kuluha-luhiwa mu makono gabo."
40017013	Huna luulu a bahemba bitegeleja, giki wabawilaga mihayo ya ng'wa Yohana Matiija.
40017014	Aho bashika u kwibita lya banhu, ngosha umo ung'wegeela, ushika untugija mazwi.
40017015	Ung'wila giki, "Seeba kaka kitunja kane kakulilagwe, kali na makoye ga kugwa lusalo; nghangala ningi kakagwila na mu moto, nuulu mu minzi!
40017016	Nakenhaga u ku bahemba bako, aliyo balemeelagwa u kukapija."
40017017	U Yesu ushosha uhaya, "Bing'we shibyalilwe sha butuzunya na shihubikile, nakwikala ning'we kushisha nanali? Nakwiyumilija ning'we kushisha nanali? Ng'wenhagi hali nene."
40017018	Huna u Yesu ulihama i lisamva lyufuma, u nyanda upila i likanza lyenilo.
40017019	Aho wasaaga iyene u Yesu, bung'wegeela a bahemba bakwe; bumuja giki, "Nibuli a bise twali twalemeelagwa u kulipeeja?"
40017020	Nanghwe uhaya, "Kulwa nguno ya budo wa kuzunya kwing'we. Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, u kuzunya kwing'we ulu kubiza kushikanu giti kabiyu ka haladali, mudugije nuulu kuluwila lugulu git'ulu giki, 'Ingaga ho a henaho'; na nghana lukwinga. Niyo gutiho mhayo uyo gukumulemeela u kugwita. [
40017021	Aliyo i mbika giti iyi, itiko kufuma na hado yaya, ulu iti mu kulomba na kufunga.]"
40017022	Bakiita bumanhija Galilaya pye a bose, u Yesu ubawila giki, "U Ng'wana wa Munhu ali hihi kutuulwa mu makono ga banhu
40017023	bamulage, aliyo akujuuka ha lushiku lo kadatu lwaho." A boi bakapinihala no!
