40017024	Aho bashika Kafalanaumu, basoleleja ba goodi ya mu hekalu bung'wegeela u Petelo bumuja giki, "Bebe, u Nangi wing'we, atatobaga u ng'wene i goodi ya mu hekalu?"
40017025	Uhaya, "Akatobaga." U Petelo wingila mu kaya; aliyo aho ataali kuhaya mhayo, u Yesu ung'wila giki, "Ulibona ginehe Simoni, a basugi ba si bakasolelejaga i goodi nuulu i shihongeelo, kwinga ku banani? Kwinga ku baana babo, nuulu kwinga ku babisa?"
40017026	Aho wahaya, "Kwinga ku babisa;" u Yesu uhaya, "Hu kuhaya giki a baana a bene bali mu wiyabi.
40017027	Kwike iti yawiza u kubipamya; ali luulu, jaga u ku nyanza ukaponeje ilobo ulobe, i ndilo iyo ulagwashe kwandya na kwandya isolage. Ulu uyasamya u mu nomo ukubona mo hela; solaga uje ukatobe i goodi yane ni yako."
40018001	U ng'wikanza lyenilo a bahemba bung'wegeela u Yesu; bumuja giki, "I gisi nghana u ntaale u mu butemi bo ng'wigulu ni munhu ki?"
40018002	Nanghwe witana kanigini, kiza kimiila hamo nabo.
40018003	Huna uhaya, "Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, ulu mutagalukile na kubiza giti banigini, mutudula gete u kwingila u mu butemi bo ng'wigulu.
40018004	Na luulu buli ng'wene uyo widohya giti nigini ng'wenuyu, u ng'wenuyo hu ntaale u mu butemi bo ng'wigulu.
40018005	Hangi uyo ung'wanukula nigini git'uyu mu lina lyane, wananukulaga nene."
40018006	"Hama ulu munhu ung'wenheleja kwipama nuulu umo wa bado-bado abo banisanije nene benaba, ibeelelile atungilijiwe u mu nhingo yakwe iwe lya kushela, akaponejiwe mu nyanza shimu, achile ng'wenumo.
40018007	I si ili mu kwihiga kulwa mihayo ya kwipamya, nguno i yene nghana iliho; aliyo u munhu uyo wenheleja mhayo gwa kwipamya, ali mu kwihiga kutaale no.
40018008	Hu kuhaya nuulu nkono gwako ulu gukwipamya, gubbutage uguponye kule, ulekane nago; pye nuulu ni lupambala lwako. Ibeelelile wingile u mu bupanga uli nemehazu, nuulu uli gigi; kutinda kubiza na makono abili, nuulu mhambala ibili, aliyo uponyiwa mu moto gwa buja na buja.
40018009	Nuulu lyukwipamya liso lyako, likobolage uliponye kule, ulekane nalyo. Ibeelelile wingile u mu bupanga nuulu uli na songo, kutinda kubiza na miso abili, aliyo uponyiwa mu nyanza ya moto."
40018010	"Ilanghanagi mutizundalaha nuulu umo wabo a bado-bado benaba. Nguno nalimuwila giki, a bamalaika babo bakimiilaga buli lushiku ku butongi bo ng'wa Baba uyo ali ng'wigulu, kulwa nguno yabo. [
40018011	U Ng'wana wa Munhu, wizile kukooba na kupija isho shijimiilile.]
40018012	I gisi mulibona ginehe, ulu munhu ali na ngholo igana, huna yujimiila imo yajo, atiko kujileka ijo makumi kenda na kenda ku matumbi, uja akwikoobaga iyo yatagaalijaga?
40018013	Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, ulu wipandika akwiyegela no, kutinda ijo makumi kenda na kenda, ijo jali jitajimiilile.
40018014	H'umo ili nu kuli Sing'we uyo ali ng'wigulu, atatogilwe ajimiile nuulu umo wabo a bado-bado benaba."
40018015	"Ali luulu, ulu nduguyo uhuba, jaga iyene ukanghugule muli babili giko duhu; ulu ukwigwa, ukubiza wangunaana u nduguyo.
40018016	Aliyo ulu ulema u kukwigwa, solaga hangi umo nuulu babili uje nabo; nguno buli mhayo shiigelile gukaanilwe na banhu babili nuulu badatu.
40018017	Ulu ubalemeela na a benabo, iwilagi i kanisa; ulu ulinda wilemeela na kanisa, ng'wisaabagi giki ataamanile Mulungu, nuulu giti ntobisha wa goodi.
40018018	Zunyagi nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, yose-yose iyo mukwitunga mu si, ikubiza yatungagwa ng'wigulu; ni yiyo mukwizunilija mu si, ikubiza yazunilijiagwa ng'wigulu.
40018019	Na hangi nalimuwila giki, nuulu babili bing'we bizunilija kulwa mhayo gose-gose mu si, shose-shose isho bakulomba bakwitilwa nu Baba uyo ali ng'wigulu.
40018020	Iki aho bali babili nuulu badatu bibilingaga mu lina lyane, a henaho nu nene naliho hamo nabo."
40018021	Kwimanila u Petelo wang'wegeela; umuja giki, "Seeba, u ndugu wane ulu kushisha nghangala jinga akunihubaga, nane nakumanaga nunekeja duhu? Angu mmho ulu kushisha nghangala mpungati!"
40018022	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila giki, "Natukuwilaga kushisha nghangala mpungati, aliyo makumi mpungati nghangala mpungati.
40018023	Huna luulu, u butemi bo ng'wigulu bukwikolanijiwa na ntemi nebe, uyo akabona ibeelelile kuloja basese bakwe kalanghanile ka sabo jakwe.
40018024	Wahayandya u kubaloja, wenhwa umo wali na bugasa bo talanta shihumbi ikumi (10,000) Shilingi milyoni magana mingi, nuulu dola ja kukila ha 10,000,000.'.
40018025	Aho wagayiwa i sha kufunya, u ntemi ulagila giki ajinjiwe u wei ng'wenekili, nu nke na a baana bakwe; ni shikolo shakwe pyi i shose, bulipwe u bugasa!
40018026	U nsese ng'wenuyo ugwa u ku magulu ga ntemi undayiila alihaya; 'Iyumilijage baba ntemi unilinde ho hado niyanga-yangile, nakukulipa duhu u bugasa pyi u bose!'
40018027	U ntemi unchila shigongo u nsese ng'wenuyo; untungula, nu bugasa unekeja.
40018028	"Aliyo u nsese ng'wenuyo aho winga duhu a henaho, umona umo wa basese biye, wali na bugasa kuli we bo denali igana limo Shilingi shihumbi shigehu. I denali imo yali ilenganilile na mheela ya lushiku lumo kuli ntumami wa ha silili.'. Unghaja mu nhingo kunu aling'wila, 'Lipaga u bugasa wako!'
40018029	Nanghwe u nsese ng'wiye untugija mazwi undayiila alihaya, 'Iyumilijage unilinde ho hado nakukulipa duhu!'
40018030	Aliyo atankulililwe, unsola uukansoosela mu jeela kushisha aho alamalilaga kubulipa u bugasa bokwe.
40018031	A basese biye aho babona yaja giko bupinihala no, buukang'wila u saabo-bugonzo pyi i yose umo ikajila.
40018032	Huna u ise-bugonzo ung'witana; ung'wila giki, 'Gashi u bebe uli nsese wabubi giki. U nene namala kukulekeja pyi u bugasa haha yeniyi duhu, nguno wali wanikumbilija!
40018033	Yali itakwigeleelilwe nu bebe u kunkulilwa u ng'wiyo git'umo naali nakukulilwa u bebe?'
40018034	U ise-bugonzo usaaya no, untuula mu makono ga baluhya, aluhe kushisha aho alamalilaga kubulipa pyi u bugasa.
40018035	Huna luulu, na a bing'we ulu mutudula kwilekeja kufuma mu gati ya ngholo buli munhu na nduguye, h'umo akung'witila u Baba uyo ali ng'wigulu."
40019001	Huna u Yesu aho wakalicha u kulanga i mihayo yeniyo, winga i Galilaya, uja mu si ya Buyudaya, ku nkilo gwa Yolodani.
40019002	Na mabita mataale ga banhu gunondeela koi, nanghwe uyubapija.
40019003	Bafalisayo balebe bung'wegeela kungema, bumuja giki; "Angu, iliho nguno yose-yose iyo idugije kung'wenheleja ngosha kumpeeja nke wakwe?"
40019004	Nanghwe ubashokeja uhaya, "Mutaali u kusoma i giki uyo akaseema a ha wandijo akabaseema ngosha na nkima?"
40019005	Ongeja kuhaya giki, "Na luulu u ngosha akuneka ise na nina adimane na nke wakwe. U mu bubili wabo bakubiza mili gumo.
40019006	Bati babili hangi, bali mili gumo. Kulwa nguno yeniyo, abo badimanyiwe na Mulungu atizigela munhu wa kubalekanya."
40019007	Bumuja hangi giki, "Nibuli luulu u Musa alagilile bayinhwa talaka balekwa?"
40019008	Ubashokeja ubawila; "U Musa akamuzunilija u kubaleka a bake bing'we kulwa nguno ya buganghanazu wa ngholo jing'we, kwike gwali gutahelilwe giko kufuma a ha wandijo.
40019009	Aliyo u nene nalimuwila giki, buli ng'wene uyo uneka nke wakwe ulu iti kulwa bushihani, huna utoola ungi, u ng'wenuyo wabizaga nshihani."
40019010	A bahemba bakwe bung'wila giki, "Angu gashi i mihayo ya ng'wa munhu na nke ulu ili chene, hambu-hambu kuleka duhu u kutoola!"
40019011	Nanghwe ubawila; "U gwenuyo batudula kuguzunya pye a banhu; na nghana baliho abo bagudugije, nguno binhwa u budula wenubo.
40019012	Baliho abo batadugije u kutoola nguno babyalilwe giko, bangi kulwa kwenhelejiwa na banhu, aliyo bangi kulwa kwiyingija boi benekili u budula bo kutoola, nguno ya butemi bo ng'wigulu. Uyo adugije u kugwita ni agwitage."
40019013	Huna wenhelwa baana giki abatuulile makono na kubalombela, aliyo a bahemba bakwe bubahama.
40019014	Nanghwe u Yesu uhaya; "Bazunilijagi a baana bize a hali nene. Mutabahangijage, nguno u butemi bo ng'wigulu buli wabo a ba mbika yeniyi."
40019015	Ubatuulila makono, huna winga ho a henaho.
40019016	Kuhayimanila, munhu umo wang'wegeela, umuja giki, "Nangi, niite mhayo ki u gwawiza nane nabupandike u bupanga bo welelo na welelo?"
40019017	Nanghwe ung'wila; "Nibuli ulinibuja nghulu ja mihayo yawiza? U wawiza aliho umo duhu! Aliyo ulu utogilwe kwingila mu bupanga shidimage i shilagilo."
40019018	U munhu ng'wenuyo umuja, "Shilagilo ki?" Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Yaya u kubulaga, Yaya u kushihya, Yaya u kwiba, Yaya u kukaanila bulomolomo.
40019019	Nkujage so na noko, na Ntogagwe nzenganwa ng'wiyo, git'umo witogelilwe bebe ng'wenekili."
40019020	Nanghwe u sumba ung'wila, "I yeniyo pyi nidimile, numho nalileba ho mhayo ki gungi?"
40019021	U Yesu unshokeja ung'wila giki, "Ulu utogilwe kubiza nshikanu, jaga ukashijinje i shikolo shako ubinhe bahabi. U wibikija wako wa sabo bukubiza ng'wigulu, huna wize unilondeele."
40019022	Aliyo u sumba ng'wenuyo aho wagwigwa u mhayo gwenuyo winga ho onzololokaga, nguno wali na sabo ningi.
40019023	Huna u Yesu ubawila a bahemba bakwe alihaya; "Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, ili shilambu no u nsabi u kwingila u mu butemi bo ng'wigulu.
40019024	Hangi niyo zunyagi gete giki, ili shinogu i ngamila u kubita u mu kapundu ka lushinge, kutinda u nsabi kwingila mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu."
40019025	A bahemba bakwe aho bigwa giko bakakumya no, bandya kwiwila boi benekili giki, "Yee! Aliyo luulu, nani uyo adugije u kupila?"
40019026	U Yesu ubakalalila, huna ubawila giki, "U gwenuyu gutadulikanile u ku banhu. Aliyo u kuli Mulungu pyi i yose idulikanile."
40019027	Huna u Petelo ushosha ung'wila; "I gisi, angu ulibona giki a bise twaleka pyi i shose kulwa kukulondeela bebe, guliho mhayo ki luulu u gwise?"
40019028	Nanghwe u Yesu ubawila; "Zunyagi nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, ulu lyushika i likanza lya Ng'wana wa Munhu kwigasha h'isumbi lyakwe ly'ikujo u mu butemi bokwe, na a bing'we abo muli balondeeji bane mukwigasha ha masumbi ikumi na abili ga butemi, mubize balamuji ba ng'anda ikumi n'ibili ja Baisilaeli.
40019029	Niyo buli ng'wene uyo waleka numba, nuulu baana ba ng'wawe bagosha na bakima, nuulu ise, nuulu nina, nuulu baana bakwe, nuulu malaale kulwa nguno ya lina lyane, akwanukula nghangala igana. Hama akubiza ng'wingiji u mu bupanga bo welelo na welelo.
40019030	Aliyo baliho bingi abo bali ku butongi, bakubiza ku numa; hama abo bali ku numa bakubiza ku butongi."
40020001	"Nguno u butemi bo ng'wigulu bubizile giti namugi ha ng'wakwe, uyo akipuuna dilu kujukooba batumami ba mu ngunda gwakwe gwa mizabibu.
40020002	Wiyigwa nabo kubinha mheela ya denali imo ku lushiku lugima buli ng'wene. Huna ubatuma buja u mu ngunda gokwe, buukandya kutumama.
40020003	Mu liimi giti lya sa idatu giko ufuma hangi, ubona bangi bimiilaga ng'wigulilu bati na nimo gose-gose.
40020004	Na a bene ubawila; 'Jagi ning'we u mu ngunda gwane gwa mizabibu, nakung'winha isho shiigeleelilwe.'
40020005	Nabo buja; mu makanza ga liimi ntwe-gati hangi wahayufuma, wenha bangi; nu mu sa kenda.
40020006	Kujiliila mu makanza ga sa ikumi n'imo ufuma hangi ubona bangi, nabo bimiilaga duhu bati na nimo; na a bene ubabuja giki, 'Bing'we nibuli ng'walocha ng'wimiilaga aha duhu, muti na nimo shi?'
40020007	Nabo bunshokeja buhaya, 'Tutaali kupandika u wa kutwinha u nimo.' Ubawila; 'Jagi ning'we u mu ngunda umo!'
40020008	"Aho lyabiza lya mhindi, u ng'wenekili ngunda ung'wila nanghani o sabo jakwe giki, 'Bitanage ko a batumami ubinhe buli ng'wene i mheela yakwe; wandije abo biza numa, ukamaligije abo batongaga u kushika.'
40020009	Aho biza abo bakashika sa ikumi n'imo, busola buli ng'wene denali imo.
40020010	Abo baali batonga bandya kwiganika giki bakusola ningi a bene; aliyo nabo aho bashika busola denali imo buli ng'wene.
40020011	Huna luulu aho balanukula, bandya kuyung'ung'uula, bakung'ung'uulilaga u ng'wenekili ngunda.
40020012	Buyuhaya giki, 'A bing'wana aba biza haha yeniyi tulimalija, bagelela kutumama sa imo duhu, ni ginehe watulenganija nabo, aliyo a bise twalochaga tukutumamaga mu kwiyumilija na kupya liimi!'
40020013	"Nanghwe unshokeja umo wabo ung'wila giki, 'Ng'wanong'wise, natukwiboneelaga. Angu, twali tutizuniligije giki ukusola denali imo?
40020014	Natogagwa nene u kung'winha u wa kumalija git'umo nakwinhila u bebe. Bebe, solaga i sabo yako uje!
40020015	Nuulu hamo u nene itanigeleelilwe kujitumamila i sabo jane umo natogelilwe? Kolaga hamo wasaaya shi iki wabubona u wiza-ngholo bone?'
40020016	H'umo ikubizila; a ba kumalija bakubiza ba kwandya, hama a ba kwandya bakubiza ba kumalija!"
40020017	U Yesu aho ali mu lugendo alilinha kuja Yelusalemu, u mu nzila akabapunja ha mhujo abo ikumi na babili; ubawila giki,
40020018	"I haha tulilinha kuja Yelusalemu, u Ng'wana wa Munhu akujutuulwa mu makono ga bagabiji bataale na balangi ba shilagilo, banamule nsango gwa kubulagwa.
40020019	Ha numa bakuntuula mu makono ga banhu ba mahanga U mhayo gwenuyu gukatumamilagwa u mu Bibilia kubahaya banhu abo bati Bayudaya; nuulu banhu abo nhungwa jabo jitanyegije Mulungu (Bfe 4:17).', bangimbe nyachilu na kuntula, hama bakunkoma ha nsalaba. Aliyo akujuuka ha lushiku lo kadatu lwaho."
40020020	Kuhayimanila nke wa ng'wa Zebedayo na bitunja bakwe ong'wegeela u Yesu, ushika untugija mazwi alinomba mhayo.
40020021	Nanghwe u Yesu umuja; "Ulitogwa ki?" Ngikulu nanghwe ushosha alihaya, "Seeba, ka lagilaga shi giki a bitunja bane a babili aba baligashe nangho u mu butemi wako, umo ku nkono gwako gwa bulyo, nu ungi u ku gwa lumoso!"
40020022	Nanghwe u Yesu ushosha ubawila, "A bing'we angu mutagumanile uyo muligulomba! Mudugije kushing'wa i shikombe isho nali hihi kushing'wa u nene?" Bung'wila; "Tudugije!"
40020023	Ubawila, "Na nghana mukushing'wa i shikombe shane; aliyo u gwa kwigasha ku nkono gwane gwa bulyo na gwa lumoso, guti gwa kumuzunilija nene; u gwene guli gwa banhu abo balonja-longejiwe na Baba."
40020024	Abo ikumi aho bigwa, bubapelanila a bichabo a ba shikulu na shizuna.
40020025	Huna u Yesu ubitana ubawila; "Mumanile giki a basugi ba mahanga h'a balomani, na giki a bataale babo h'abo bakabatumamyaga bo nguzu!
40020026	U ku bing'we itigeleelilwe ibize giko, aliyo buli ng'wene uyo atogilwe kubiza ntaale u mu bing'we, shing'wigeleelilwe abize ntumami wing'we.
40020027	Nu yuyo atogilwe kubiza ntongeeji u mu bing'we abize nsese wing'we.
40020028	Nguno nu Ng'wana wa Munhu atizile kutumamilwa, aliyo kutumama, na kufunya bupanga bokwe kubiza shikomoolelo kulwa nguno ya bingi."
40020029	U Yesu na a bahemba bakwe aho balinga i Yeliko, ibita itaale lyunondeela.
40020030	Baaliho na babboku babili bigashije bbihi na nzila; aho bigwa giki Yesu alibita, bandya kuhamuka balihaya, "Ng'wana wa ng'wa Daudi, tukulilagwe!"
40020031	A banhu buyubahama giki bahuumule, aliyo a bene hu bongeja gete u kuhamuka balihaya; "Seeba, Ng'wana wa ng'wa Daudi; tukulilagwe!"
40020032	U Yesu wimiila ubitana. Ubabuja giki, "Mutogilwe nang'witile ki?"
40020033	Nabo bunshokeja baling'wila giki, "Seeba, ka a miso gise gabone!"
40020034	U Yesu ubasaatwa, ugakuumya a miso gabo; haho na haho bandya kubona, bunondeela.
40021001	Bahayutumbya Yelusalemu, bubiza bashika Betifage, ku lugulu lo mizeituni, u Yesu utuma babili ba bahemba bakwe.
40021002	Ubawila giki, "Jagi u mu chalo isho shili ku butongi wing'we shenisho, ulu mulashike mukubona nzobe ili na ng'wana itungilwe, italigulilagi munenhele.
40021003	Ose-ose uyo alamuwile mhayo ng'wilagi giki, 'Seeba ali na nimo najo, akujishosha haha yeniyi duhu.' "
40021004	U gwenuyo gukaja giko kulwa kushikilijiwa kwa mhayo uyo guhayiwe kubitila muli nghangi; giki,
40021005	"Guwilagi u nzengo gwa Sayuni, 'Managa giki, u Ntemi wako u ng'widohya, aliza kuli bebe adamhilile nzobe; ali ha nzobe, ng'wana wa nzobe.' "
40021006	A bahemba benabo aho baja, buukiita umo akabawilila u Yesu.
40021007	Biyenha i nzobe nu ng'wana wayo, aho bajishisha bujituulila myenda a ha migongo yajo, udamhila.
40021008	Mabita mataale ga banhu bandya kuja balamba myenda yabo u mu nzila, bangi buyubbuta matambi mado-mado ga miti bagaponangija u mu nzila.
40021009	A mabita ayo gaali u ku butongi bokwe na a yayo gakuubijaga gandya kuhamuka galihaya; "Ikujo libize u kuli Ng'wana wa ng'wa Daudi. Akumilijiwe uyo aliza mu lina lya ng'wa Seeba; ikujo libize higulya no!"
40021010	Aho oshika u mu nzengo gwa Yelusalemu, pye a hose hubiza tagambi, pyi buyibuja giki, "I gete, nani u ng'wenuyu?"
40021011	A mabita gushosha galihaya, "U ng'wenuyu nghangi, Yesu wa Nazaleti ya Galilaya!"
40021012	U Yesu aho wingila u mu hekalu, ubapeeja pye abo biitilaga mo byashala ja kujinja na kugula shikolo, ujisalingula i meza ja bakaabanya ba hela, pye na a masumbi ga bajinja ba mhunda.
40021013	Ubawila; "Yandikilwe giki, 'I numba yane ikwitanwa numba y'ilomba; aliyo a bing'we mukwiyitaga kubiza ipilinga lya basambo!' "
40021014	Aho ali mu hekalu bung'wegeela babboku na balemehazu, ubapija.
40021015	A bagabiji bataale na a balangi ba shilagilo bakapelana no aho bashibona i shakukumya isho akabeeja; bubabona na banigini u mu hekalu balihiliila buhaya giki, "Ikujo libize kuli Ng'wana wa ng'wa Daudi!"
40021016	Bung'wila giki, "Ulibigwa umo balihayila a benaba?" Nanghwe u Yesu ubashokeja; "Bugatu! A bing'we mutaali u kusoma umo guhayililwe giki, 'Bebe walangile banigini na beleele kulamya na milomo yabo?' "
40021017	Huna ubaleka winga ho a henaho, ufuma hanze ya hekalu, uja Betania uukalaala kwenuko.
40021018	A ha ntondo yaho i dilu ulinha ngulya ashokile hangi u mu nzengo, aliyo wali atuubile.
40021019	Aho ali mu nzila ubona ntini, uliga ho kulola; kwike ugayiwa shikolo shose-shose, gwali na maduutu duhu. Uguwila u nti giki, "Utalatwaja matwajo ilali!" Haho na haho guuma u ntini gwenuyo!
40021020	A bahemba aho babona bukumya no, buhaya, "Yee, aliyo nibuli guuma haho na haho u ntini?"
40021021	Nanghwe u Yesu ubashokeja uhaya, "Zunyagi nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, ulu ng'ubiza na kuzunya kuti na kutawa-tawa, mudugije kugwita u mhayo gwenuyu; niyo iti ku ntini duhu, aliyo nuulu lugulu git'ulu mudugije kuluwila giki, 'Ingaga a henaho ukagwe mu nyanza,' na nghana ikuja chene.
40021022	Niyo hangi buli shikolo isho mukulomba mu kuzunya, mukupandika."
40021023	Aho washika hangi u mu hekalu wandya kulanga, kuhayimanila bansanga bagabiji bataale na banamhala; bumuja balihaya giki, "Bebe, iyo ukwiyitaga yeniyi, ukwiyitaga mu budula ki? Niyo hangi nani uyo wakwinhile u budula wene?"
40021024	Nanghwe u Yesu ushosha ubawila giki, "Nane namubuje mhayo gumo, ulu mulanishokeje nane nakumuwila i yeniyi nakwiyitaga mu budula ki.
40021025	U bubatiija bo ng'wa Yohana, boli bufumile hali? Ng'wigulu, nuulu ku banhu?" Bandya kwilunjalunja baliwila giki, "Ulu tulahaye boli bufumile ng'wigulu akutubuja, 'Nibuli luulu mutizunije i mihayo yakwe?'
40021026	Aliyo hangi u kuhaya giki, 'Boli bufumile ku banhu,' ni chene tulogoha, nguno pye a banhu bamanile giki u Yohana wali nghangi."
40021027	Huna luulu bukalila kunshokeja u Yesu balihaya giki, "Tutamanile!" Nanghwe ubawila, "Nu nene natumuwilaga i yeniyi nakwiyitaga mu budula ki."
40021028	"I gisi luulu, himba mulibona ginehe? Waliho munhu umo, wali na bitunja babili. Uja kung'wila u wa kwandya giki, 'Bebe ng'wanone, lelo jaga ukatumame u mu ngunda go mizabibu umo.'
40021029	Nanghwe ushosha uhaya; 'Mm, yaya natudula!' Aliyo a ha numa ya henaho ugalucha a maganiko uja.
40021030	U namhala uukang'wila nu wa kabili u mhayo gwenuyo; u ng'wene uhaya, 'Bugatu baba, nakuja;' aliyo atajile.
40021031	U mu bubili wabo, ali ginehe uyo akiita umo wali atogelilwe u saabo?" Buhaya, "U wa kwandya!" Nanghwe u Yesu ubawila; "Huna luulu zunyagi nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, a batobisha ba goodi na a bamalahya bakumutanga u kwingila u mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu.
40021032	Nguno u Yohana akiza kung'oolekeja a bing'we nzila ya butungilija ng'unemeja i yakwe; aliyo a batobisha ba goodi na a bamalahya buzunya. Lelo a bing'we nuulu aho ng'wabona a ha numa yaho, nahene mutagalukile giki muzunye!"
40021033	"Degelekagi lusumo lungi, oliho munhu nebe namugi ha kaya yakwe, akalima ngunda uguhamba mizabibu, huna ugupindilija ngitili, usimba mo n'ikamilo lya divai. Ulola uzenga mo na numba ya balanghani, hanuma ugutuula mu makono ga balimi, u wei winga ho.
40021034	Aho lyegeela ikanza lya matwajo, utuma basese bakwe, baje u ku balimi bakasole a matwajo gakwe.
40021035	Aliyo a balimi benabo buukabadima a basese bakwe; umo buntulagula milangha, ungi bumulaga, na ungi bumponda mawe.
40021036	Utuma hangi basese bangi, lelo bingi ho kukila a ba kwandya; aliyo na a bene buukabiitila giko duhu.
40021037	Wanoga nose untuma ng'wana wakwe, kunu alihaya giki, 'Bakunkuja u ng'wana wane!'
40021038	Aliyo a balimi benabo aho bamona u ng'wana, biwila giki, 'Uyu angu hu ng'wene u ng'wingiji gete, tumulagagi tubusole bise u wingiji bokwe!'
40021039	Nghana bundima, bundutanja kuja hanze ya ngunda, buukamulaga!
40021040	I gisi luulu, u ng'wenekili ngunda ulu wiza, akubiita ginehe a balimi benabo?"
40021041	Bunshokeja giki, "Akwiza abakenaagule nguno bali balimi babubi, nu ngunda ugutuula mu makono ga balimi bangi, abo badugije kung'winha a matwajo ga mu ngunda mu makanza ayo gigelile."
40021042	A henaho u Yesu ubawila; "A bing'we mutaali u kushisoma i shandikwa isho shihayile giki, 'I liwe ilo bakalilema bazengi h'ilo lyabizile lya kwigoloolela i numba; u mhayo gwenuyu gufumile kuli Seeba, niyo guli gwawiza no u mu miso gise?'
40021043	"Huna luulu, nalimuwila mukutaajiwa u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu, linhwe ihanga lingi; ilo likutwaja matwajo ayo gigeleelilwe. [
40021044	Nose ulu munhu uligwila i liwe lyenili, akupaanaguka paza-paza, lelo uyo lyungwila, u ng'wene likuntobagula tobo-tobo!]"
40021045	A bagabiji bataale na a Bafalisayo aho bajiigwa i sumo jakwe jenijo, bumana giki akajihaya kulwa nguno yabo.
40021046	Aliyo u kundima bakagogoha a mabita, nguno a banhu bamonaga giki ali nghangi.
40022001	Ha numa hangi u Yesu ongeja kubawila shigemenghejo; uhaya giki,
40022002	"U butemi bo ng'wigulu tukuwikolanija na ntemi nebe, uyo akabeeja bukombe kulwa nguno ya ng'witunja wakwe.
40022003	Huna utuma basese bakwe baje bubawila abo baali balaalikwa giki bize u ku buyegi; aliyo bulema!
40022004	Utuma hangi basese bangi; ubawila, 'Jagi mukabawile pye abo baali balaalikilwe giki: Pyi i shose shilonja-longije; niyo nasinzaga na ng'ombe jane kulwa nguno y'ikubi, hama i haha i shiliwa shalindaga balyi duhu. Ka nzugi u ku bukombe!'
40022005	Aliyo batadililile; bukuluja bajile, buli ng'wene ku yakwe. Umo ku ngunda gokwe, ungi ku byashala yakwe.
40022006	Lelo a bangi bubadima a basese bakwe bubaluhya na kubabulaga!
40022007	U ntemi akasaaya no, utuma bashilikale bakwe buukababulaga a bahunga benabo, nu nzengo gwabo bugutiima moto.
40022008	Huna ubawila a basese bakwe giki, 'Bing'we; u bukombe butang'anhilile, lelo a balyi abo baali balaalikilwe, a bene batigeleelilwe nuulu hado.
40022009	Huna luulu jagi pye a hose uko mayila gamanhigije; buli bene abo mulayubabona bawilagi bize u ku bukombe.'
40022010	Na nghana a basese benabo buja balibakuminga pye abo bababonaga u mu mayila, a babubi na a bawiza. Biza bigasha kushisha, lyokala i libukombe!
40022011	"Aliyo u ntemi aho wingila giki abalole a bageni bakwe, ubona mo munhu atazwalile shizwalo sha kwingilila u mu bukombe!
40022012	Umuja giki, 'Bebe ong'wise, ni wingilaga ginehe u bebe u ng'wenumu, aliyo ni shizwalo sha kwingilila u mu bukombe utazwalile?' Ugayiwa u gwa kushosha!
40022013	Huna u ntemi ubawila a batumami giki, 'Ntungagi a magulu na a makono gakwe, mumponye ku giiti sha hanze; uko banhu bakulila na kushelanya mino!'
40022014	Nguno a bitanwa bali bingi, aliyo a basolwa bali bagehu!"
40022015	Huna a Bafalisayo buja kubeeja long'we ya kungwasha u Yesu mu kalungalungile.
40022016	Buntumila bahemba babo na ban'ikulu ba ng'wa Helode. Biza kung'wila, "Nangi, tumanile giki u bebe ukashimizilaga mu nghana, ni nzila ya ng'wa Mulungu ukilangaga mu nghana; nguno utiitaga mhayo kuli munhu ose-ose kulwa kulola bushu bokwe.
40022017	Alituwilage umo ukwiganikilaga, u mhayo gwa kutoba goodi ya ng'wa Kaisali guzuniligije, nuulu yaya?"
40022018	Aliyo u Yesu kulwa nguno wali abumanile u bubi wabo, ubashokeja ubawila giki, "Bing'we bibeeleja, nibuli mulinigema?
40022019	Noolekejagi i hela ya goodi." Bung'wenhela denali imo.
40022020	Huna ubabuja giki, "I suso iyi nu wandike wenubu sha ng'wa nani?"
40022021	Bunshokeja, "Sha ng'wa Kaisali." Nanghwe ubawila, "Na luulu, i sha ng'wa Kaisali ng'winhagi Kaisali; ni sha ng'wa Mulungu ng'winhagi Mulungu."
40022022	Aho bigwa bakakumya na kakumije kangi nako, binga ho buneka.
40022023	U mu lushiku lwenulo duhu hangi bunsanga Basadukayo; abo bahayile giki butiho bujuuko. Huna luulu bumuja
40022024	buhaya, "Nangi, u Musa ahayile giki, ulu munhu uzumalika aliyo ati na baana, ng'wanong'wawe akung'wingila u nkima ng'wenuyo, antoole amyalile baana u nduguye.
40022025	Ali luulu, baaliho banhu mpungati ba shikulu na shizuna, bikalaga hamo nise ng'wenumu umu; u tang@i wabo akatoola, aliyo ucha atalekile baana, ng'wanong'wawe ung'wingila u nkima u nchilwa.
40022026	U wa kabili ng'wenuyo nanghwe gung'wilongela u gwenuyo; nu wa kadatu, kushisha bushila pye a bose mpungati!
40022027	Aho bashila pye, nose nu nkima ucha!
40022028	I gisi luulu, u ng'wikanza lya bujuuko, akubiza nke o ng'wa nani u mu bose mpungati, iki pye baali bantoola?"
40022029	U Yesu ubashokeja ubawila giki, "A bing'we mutashimanile i shandikwa, nu budula bo ng'wa Mulungu, h'i chene mulihubila.
40022030	Nguno u ng'wikanza lya bujuuko batubiza ba kuyutoola nuulu kutoolwa, aliyo bakubiza giti bamalaika ba ng'wigulu.
40022031	Niyo u mhayo gwa kujuuka bafu gwenuyu, mutaali u kusoma umo akumuwililaga u Mulungu; i giki,
40022032	'U nene nali Mulungu wa ng'wa Abulahamu, na Mulungu wa ng'wa Isaka, na Mulungu wa ng'wa Yakobo? U wei ati Mulungu wa bafu, ali wa bapanga.' "
40022033	A mabita ga banhu aho gigwa giko gakabukumya no u bulangi bokwe.
40022034	Bafalisayo nabo bung'witinja aho bigwa giki wabahuumuja a Basadukayo.
40022035	Umo wabo (wali nangi wa shilagilo), umuja ibujo mu kungema; uhaya giki,
40022036	"Nangi, i shilagilo i shitaale u mu malange ni shili ginehe?"
40022037	Nanghwe ung'wila, " 'Ntogagwe u Seeba Mulungu wako na ngholo yako yose, na bupanga wako bose, na maganiko gako gose.'
40022038	I shenishi h'i shitaale, hangi h'i sha kwandya.
40022039	Ni sha kabili shili giko duhu; shihayile giki, 'Ntogagwe nzenganwa ng'wiyo git'umo witogelilwe bebe ng'wenekili.'
40022040	U ng'wihando gwa malange gose, na a kalangile ka bahangi bose, guli ha shilagilo shenishi bubili washo."
40022041	Aho bibilinga a Bafalisayo, u Yesu ubabuja
40022042	uhaya giki, "Mukwibonaga ginehe i mihayo ya ng'wa Kilisto, i gete ni ng'wana o ng'wa nani?" Bung'wila, "O ng'wa Daudi!"
40022043	Nanghwe ubawila; "Hama nibuli luulu u Daudi ng'wenekili, akanghaya mu nguzu ja ng'wa Moyo giki Seeba? Nguno akahaya,
40022044	'U Seeba akang'wila u Seeba wane, igashaga ku nkono gwane gwa bulyo, kushisha nabatuule a banishi bako ha silili ya mhambala jako.'
40022045	I gisi luulu, u Daudi ulu aling'witana giki Seeba, numho ali ng'wana wakwe hangi kinehe?"
40022046	Atigelile nuulu umo wa kunshokeja mhayo; niyo kufuma lwise lwenulo atigelile hangi munhu wa kumuja mhayo gose-gose.
40023001	Huna u Yesu wandya kubawila a banhu hamo na a bahemba bakwe
40023002	giki, "A balangi ba shilagilo na a Bafalisayo, bali h'isumbi lya ng'wa Musa.
40023003	Ali luulu, idimagi pyi iyo bakamuwilaga, niyo g'wishikilija. Kwike yaya u kwita umo bakiitilaga a boi, nguno bakayombaga duhu, aliyo yaya u kushikilija.
40023004	Hangi bakatungaga miligo midito bayubaseseja a banhu ku mabega kwibuucha, aliyo a boi benekili bati n'iganiko lya kwibuucha nuulu hado; nuulu ni kukuumya ho na lwala lwabo duhu biya.
40023005	Nguno pyi i milimo yabo bakiitaga giki babonwe na banhu; u gwabo guli gwa kwikala bukulilija fulakitelia jabo, na kulihilija masune ga nghanjo jabo duhu.
40023006	Nu mu masinagogi batogilwe kwigasija masumbi g'ikujo; hama nuulu bulaalikwa kuja ku shigukulu, nu kwene bakakuubilijaga ha magele ga bakujiwa.
40023007	Pye na mu magulilu hose bagaagaanile kwikala bugishiwa na kwitanwa, 'Nangi!'
40023008	A bing'we yaya u kwikala mukwitanagwa, 'Nangi nuulu: Labi, a makulu ga Labi gene Nangi.'.' Nguno u Nangi wing'we ali umo duhu, lelo a bing'we pyi muli badugu.
40023009	Hangi yaya u kung'witana munhu nuulu umo u mu si umu giki, 'Baba,' nguno muli na Sing'we umo ng'wigulu.
40023010	Niyo a bing'we yaya u kwitanwa 'Bataale,' nguno u Ntaale wing'we ali umo duhu, ng'wene Kilisto.
40023011	Hama a bing'we u ntaale wing'we h'uyo akubiza ntumami wing'we.
40023012	Ose-ose u wa kwigunguhya wei ng'wenekili, akudohelejiwa, aliyo u wa kwidohya, u ng'wene akugunguhiwa."
40023013	"Bing'we balangi ba shilagilo na Bafalisayo bibeeleja, muli mu kwihiga; nguno mukabalugalilaga a banhu u butemi bo ng'wigulu. A bing'we mulemeelilwe u kwingila, aliyo na a babo batogilwe u kwingila mutabazunilijaga u kubita! [
40023014	Muli mu kwihiga a bing'we balangi ba shilagilo na Bafalisayo bibeeleja, bing'we abo mukalyaga sabo ja bakima bachilwa, na kulomba kalombele kalihu ka kwiyoolecha; managi giki a bing'we mukupandika nsango ntaale kutinda!]
40023015	Muli mu kwihiga kutaale no a bing'we balangi ba shilagilo na Bafalisayo, nguno mukakilaga manyanza na magunguli kujuhembeka munhu umo; hama ulu ng'wanghembeka huna ng'wang'wenheleja kubiza munhu wa kujimilila mu nsango gwa moto git'umo muli a bing'we, na kutinda ho!
40023016	A bing'we batongeeji muli mu kwihiga, nguno muli babboku: ng'wakuyulanga giki, 'Munhu ose-ose nuulu akitonga kunu akwihayaga hekalu atubonelwa mhayo, aliyo ulu witonga mu kujihaya hela ijo jilimo u mu hekalu, u ng'wenuyo wigwashaga!'
40023017	Bing'we babbuuli na babboku, i shitaale ni shili ginehe? I hela, nuulu i hekalu iyo ikajeejaga i hela?
40023018	Na hangi mukalangaga giki, 'Munhu ose-ose nuulu akitonga mu kuguhaya ng'walilo atubonelwa mhayo, aliyo ulu witonga mu kushihaya i shitambo isho shili a ha ng'walilo, u ng'wenuyo wigwashaga!'
40023019	Bing'we babboku, i shitaale ni shili ginehe? I shitambo, nuulu u ng'walilo uyo gukasheejaga i shitambo?
40023020	Huna luulu managi giki, buli munhu ulu witonga mu kuguhaya ng'walilo, numho witongaga mu lina lyago u ng'walilo, hamo ni shikolo isho shili higulya yago.
40023021	Nu yuyo witonga kunu akwihayaga hekalu, numho witongaga mu lina lyayo, nu yuyo akikalaga mo.
40023022	Hangi nuulu munhu witonga mu kulihaya igulu, numho witongaga ku lina ly'isumbi lya ng'wa Mulungu, nu yuyo aligasigije.
40023023	"Muli mu kwihiga a bing'we a balangi ba shilagilo na Bafalisayo bibeeleja, nguno mukafunyaga imo ya ng'wikumi ya shikolo shido-do-do, giti shisanjo sha mu shiliwa maduutu malebe na miji milebe iyo banhu bakasanjaga mu shiliwa; (lol. na Luk 11:42).'; aliyo i mihayo mitaale i ya mu malange, giti kulamula mu butungilija, na kuchila shigongo, na kuzunya; i yene mukilekaga. Shing'wigeleelilwe kwishikilija i yeniyi, kwike ni yingi iyo yaya u kwileka.
40023024	Bing'we batongeeji babboku, u nimo gwing'we u ntaale guli gwa kuyunga giti ng'wiyungilo, na kuyusolanhya, ng'waponya u bufune, lelo i ngamila ng'wajimila!
40023025	Muli mu kwihiga a bing'we balangi ba shilagilo na Bafalisayo bibeeleja, nguno mukiyoogelelejaga higulya-gulya giti kooja shikombe na mabakuli, aliyo u mu gati ng'okalile wibi na kwikumva kwabubi.
40023026	Bebe Nfalisayo mboku, ojaga tame u mu gati ya shikombe sheele, huna ushooje ni hanze!
40023027	Muli mu kwihiga a bing'we balangi ba shilagilo na Bafalisayo bibeeleja, nguno mubizile giti shigila isho shikabonekanaga shawiza a higulya, iki shizengeelilwe shubilwa na swakala, aliyo u mu gati shokalile maguha ga bafu, na busoso bo mbika jose!
40023028	H'umo mukabonekanilaga u ku banhu; a higulya muli batungilija, aliyo u mu gati ng'okalile wibeeleja na bugomi!"
40023029	"Muli mu kwihiga a bing'we balangi ba shilagilo na Bafalisayo, nguno i shigila sha bahangi mukashizengeelaga, ng'wayugaliila na mashigo ga batungilija.
40023030	Kunu mukuhayaga giki, 'Ulu ni twali tuliho u mu shiku ja bakulugenji bise, ni tutizuniligije nabo u mu kugiita a mininga ga bahangi!'
40023031	U mu kuhaya giko, mukwikaanilaga bing'we benekili giki muli baana ba babulagi ba bahangi.
40023032	Hu kuhaya yokalilijagi i ngelekelo ya basing'we.
40023033	Bing'we abo muli nzoka, na bubyile wa shipili, mukugwiliga ginehe u nsango gwa moto?
40023034	Huna luulu managi giki, nalimutumila hangi bahangi, na banhu bitegeleja na balangi, bamo mukubabulaga na kubakoma ha misalaba, bamo babo mukuyubatulila mu masinagogi ging'we; niyo mukuyuja mukubahigaga hose-hose u mu mizengo.
40023035	Kushisha a mininga ga beela pye a bose gidikile ha mitwe ying'we; pye ayo gaamala kwitwa ha si, kwandija ga ntungilija Abeli, kwiza kukaja ku ga ng'wa Zakalia ng'wana Belekia, uyo mukamulagila mu hekalu ku butongi bo ng'walilo.
40023036	Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, i yose iyi ikubagwila a banhu ba shibyalilwe ishi."
40023037	"Yelusalemu, Yelusalemu, mulagi o bahangi; bebe uyo ukabapondaga mawe abo ukatumilagwa. Nashishaga nghangala jinga nakumanagugema kubakuminga a baana bako, git'umo ngoko ikakumingilaga zwiyu jayo yajibandila mu manana gayo; aliyo utatogilwe!
40023038	Managa giki olekelagwa buyiki i numba yako!
40023039	Nguno nalikuwila utunibona hangi kushisha aho ukuhaya giki, 'Ali na mbango uyo aliza mu lina lya ng'wa Seeba!' "
40024001	Huna u Yesu ufuma u mu hekalu; aho alija a bahemba bakwe bung'wegeela bayung'oolekeja umo gaali gazengelilwe a mabindo gayo.
40024002	Nanghwe ushosha uhaya; "Angu muligabona pye a genaya? Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, litiho iwe a henaha ilo likulekwa higulya y'iwe lichalyo, ilo lituholomolelwa ha si!"
40024003	Huna uukigasha mu lugulu lo mizeituni, a bahemba bakwe bung'wegeela hoi, bali boi duhu. Buhaya giki, "Tuwilage, i yeniyi ikubiza ho nanali; na hangi shikubiza ho shimanikijo ki i sha kwiza kwako, ni sha koolecha kushikiila kw'ikanza?"
40024004	U Yesu ushosha ubawila giki, "Ilanghanagi, munhu ose-ose atizumulemba-lemba.
40024005	Nguno bingi bakuyiza mu lina lyane, balihaya giki, 'U nene hu nali Kilisto!' Niyo bakuhubya banhu bingi .
40024006	Hama mukwandya kuyigwa mabulugu na nghulu ja mabulugu. Aliyo yaya u kufung'wa ngholo, i yeniyo shiigelile ibize ho; kwike i ngelelo ikubiza itaali u kushika.
40024007	Nguno bukubiza ho wiyubukiji ha gati y'ihanga n'ihanga, na butemi ku butemi. Jikuyudinghima nyahinga, na kwilonga nzala mu mapandi mingi.
40024008	Kwike pyi i yeniyi ili giti wandijo wa kulung'wa busungu duhu."
40024009	"Na mukuyulodeelwa ng'wayuluhiwa na kubulagwa. Niyo pye a mahanga gakumukolwa kulwa nguno ya lina lyane.
40024010	Hama bingi bakwipama, na bakuyilodeela kulwa nguno ya kwikolwa benekili na benekili.
40024011	Na bahangi bingi balomolomo bakwilonga, bayubenheleja banhu bingi kwinga u mu nghana.
40024012	Butogwa bo banhu bingi bukupola kulwa nguno ya bugomi kongeja kukwila.
40024013	Aliyo uyo wiyumilija kushisha ku ngelelo, akupila.
40024014	Niyo i Nghulu ja butemi jeniji shiigelile jilomeelwe pye a hose u mu si, wilonge bukaaniji ku mahanga gose; huna luulu i ngelelo ikushika."
40024015	"Ali luulu, i sha malofu i shikenaaguji isho shihayiwe na nghangi Danyeli ulu ng'ushibona shimiila h'ipandi lyeela, (uyo alisoma ni itegelejage),
40024016	a henaho abo bali mu si ya Buyudaya ni bapeelelage ku ngulu.
40024017	Uyo usangwa ali kwigulya ya numba, atizika giki asole shikolo kufuma mu numba yakwe.
40024018	Nu yuyo ali ku malaale atizushoka ku numa kusola shizwalo shakwe.
40024019	U mu shiku jenijo bakubiza mu makoye mataale no abo bakusangwa bali nda, na a babo bakubiza bakonhyaga.
40024020	Lombagi u kupeela kwing'we kutizubiza mu shiku ja mbeho ya mu shiyaga, nuulu ha sabato.
40024021	Nguno u ng'wikanza lyenilo bukubiza ho buluhi butaale no, ubo butaali kwilonga kufuma ha wandijo wa si kushisha haha; hama butalabiza ho hangi na hado yaya!
40024022	Niyo ulu ni iti kugehiwa i shiku jenijo, wali atiho wa kupila nuulu umo, aliyo i shiku jenijo jigehiwe kulwa nguno ya basolwa.
40024023	"Nose ulu ose-ose umuwila giki, 'Lolagi uuy'aha u Kilisto,' nuulu giki, 'Ali kuunu,' yaya u kuzunya.
40024024	Nguno bakwilonga bakilisto balomolomo, na bahangi balomolomo; niyo bakuyoolecha maleeba mataale na mihayo ya kukamaaja, giki ulu yudulikana babahumbuule na a basolwa.
40024025	Managi giki u nene nalimuhugula kuko itaali u kwilonga i yeniyo.
40024026	Hu kuhaya giki nuulu munhu umuwila, 'Lolagi uuyo ali ku matogolo,' yaya u kufuma; nuulu giki, 'Lolagi mu kaya alimo wibisaga,' mutizuzunya.
40024027	Nguno ikubiza git'umo lulabi lukalabijaga mu kiya, aliyo u bung'weku boshika ng'weli. Nu kwiza kwa Ng'wana wa Munhu kukubiza giko.
40024028	Nguno aho guli mimba hu hene aho jikwikumingila ni mbeshi."
40024029	"Aliyo u buluhi wa mu shiku jenijo ulu bubita, haho na haho i liimi likwitilwa giiti, nu ng'weji gukoya u kufunya u bupe wago. Ni sonda jikuyumodaguka kufuma u kwilunde; pyi nu budula bo ng'wigulu bukutinginyiwa.
40024030	Huna luulu u ng'wilunde shikubonwa shimanikijo sha Ng'wana wa Munhu. Pyi i ng'anda ja banhu ba mu si bakulila nghungu; hama bakumona u Ng'wana wa Munhu ali mu malunde ga ng'wigulu aliza, na budula n'ikujo itaale.
40024031	Huna akutuma bamalaika bakwe n'ilaka itaale lya mhembe. Bakuja balibakuminga pye a basolwa bakwe kufuma mhandi ine ja si; kufuma wandijo w'igulu kushisha ku ngelelo yalyo!"
40024032	"I haha u mhayo gwenuyu gwilangilagi ku ntini. A matambi ga nti gwenuyo ulu gandya kusonga na kufuluma maduutu managana, mukamanaga giki gwegeelaga u ng'waka.
40024033	Ni mihayo yeniyi ili giko; ulu ng'ubona yandya kwilonga managi giki ali hihi, nuwe wegeelaga ali ha nyango.
40024034	Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, i shibyalilwe ishi shitubita aho itaali kushikiila pyi i yose iyi.
40024035	I ligulu ni si shikubita, aliyo i mihayo yane itiko kujimiila na hado yaya!"
40024036	"Kwike atiho uyo alumanile u lushiku lwenulo ni likanza; nuulu a bamalaika ba ng'wigulu batamanile, pyi nu Ng'wana; ulu ati Baba wike.
40024037	Nguno u kwiza kwa Ng'wana wa Munhu kukubiza git'umo ikajila mu shiku ja ng'wa Noa.
40024038	U mu shiku jenijo aho lyali litaali kwiza i lihuuma, balyaga na kung'wa; hangi batoolaga na kutoolwa, kushisha mu lushiku ulo Noa akingila mu ngalaba.
40024039	Batachagukile nose lyubasanganija i lihuuma, lyubapyagula pye a bose. H'umo kukubizila nu kwiza kwa Ng'wana wa Munhu!
40024040	Banhu babili bakusangwa bali mu ngunda, umo akutwalwa, umo ulekwa!
40024041	Bakima babili bakusangwa bakwishiishaga, umo akutwalwa, umo ulekwa!
40024042	Na luulu ikalagi nzugulu-matu, nguno mutamanile u Seeba wing'we akwiza lushiku ki.
40024043	Hama managi giki, u namugi ha ng'wakwe ulu ni walideeba i likanza lya kwiza kwa ng'wibi, ni atilekanigije i numba yakwe ikambagulwe!
40024044	Nose luulu na a bing'we shing'wigeleelilwe kwikala nzugulu-matu, nguno u Ng'wana wa Munhu akwiza ng'wikanza ilo mutuliganikilaga."
40024045	"I gisi, nsese ki u nsanyiwa na ng'witegeleja, u wa kutuulwa na ise-bugonzo ha butaale bo kaya yakwe, giki ayubagabanhya banhu ba ha ng'wakwe buli ng'wene shiliwa shakwe ng'wikanza ilo ligeleelilwe?
40024046	U nsese ng'wenuyo ulu usangwa nu ise-bugonzo akwitaga iyo alagililwe, akubiza na mbango ningi no.
40024047	Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki akung'wita abize ntaale wa shikolo shose i sha ha ng'wakwe.
40024048	Aliyo u nsese ng'wenuyo ulu wabubi, huna wandya kwiwila u mu moyo gokwe giki; 'Yu, odilile no niyo u baba-bugonzo!'
40024049	Hama na ulinhya kuyubatula a basese biye, kunu akulyaga na kung'wa na bakolwa-walwa,
40024050	u ise-bugonzo akung'wisanganija u nsese ng'wenuyo mu lushiku ulo atalwiganikilile, n'ikanza ilo atalimanile.
40024051	Akwiza amutagule mapingili-mapingili, ni mheela yakwe ang'wisaabile ng'wigele lya bibeeleja, uko kukubiza kulila nghungu na kushelanya mino!"
40025001	"Huna luulu, u butemi bo ng'wigulu bukwikolanijiwa na banhya ikumi, abo bakasola tala jabo buja kung'wima nzila ntooji.
40025002	A batano babo baali babbuuli, aliyo a bangi a batano bubiza bachaguku.
40025003	A babbuuli bakasola i tala jabo ahene, kwike a maguta a ga kongeja batasolile.
40025004	Aliyo a bachaguku, aho basola i tala jabo busola na maguta mu shiseme sha helegeko.
40025005	U ntooji akadila u kushika, nose butindwa tulo pye a bose, bulaala."
40025006	"U bujiku aho bohuumulija, kuhayimanila yoge na mhundu jazilinghanya; banhu bandya kwiwila, 'Oshika u ntooji, nsung'wanhagi.'
40025007	Huna luulu a banhya ikumi benabo bugulumuka wangu-wangu, bandya kugubeeja u moto gwa tala jabo jibake chiza.
40025008	A babbuuli bubawila a bachaguku giki, 'I tala jise jililimalima jilihaya kujima, tongejagi nise a maguta ging'we.'
40025009	Nabo a bachaguku bubashokeja balihaya giki, 'Gatutwigela a bise na a bing'we; jagi u ku bajinja mukagule ging'we ning'we.'
40025010	Aho balija ushika u ntooji, abo baali bamaliilile bingila nanghwe u mu numba ya bugeni, gulugalwa u nyango!
40025011	"Ha numa ya henaho bushika na a banhya a bangi balihaya, 'Tulugulilage nise baba!'
40025012	Nanghwe ubashokeja alihaya giki, 'Nalimuwila gwa nghana natumumanaga u nene a bing'we!'
40025013	Na luulu, ikalagi nzugulu-matu; nguno mutalumanile u lushiku nuulu i likanza."
40025014	"Na hangi ikubiza giti munhu nebe uyo akahaya kwinga ha ng'wakwe, uleka ogabanhya basese bakwe sabo jakwe.
40025015	Ung'winha buli ng'wene git'umo buli u budula bokwe; umo ung'winha talanta itano, ungi ibili, ungi imo; huna uja u wei.
40025016	Uyo akasola talanta itano haho na haho uja uukandya kujitundanya i sabo jenijo, jibyalana, upandika talanta jingi itano.
40025017	Nu yuyo akinhwa ibili wita giko, nanghwe upandika jingi ibili.
40025018	Lelo uyo akasola imo, u ng'wene uja uukasimba ha si, wifukiila henaho i sabo ya ng'wa ise-bugonzo.
40025019	"Aho jabita shiku ningi wiza u saabo-bugonzo; ushikila kubaloja a katumamile kabo.
40025020	Uyo wali wasola talanta itano ushika; wenha jingi itano uhaya, 'Baba, ukaninha talanta itano, naapandikile jingi itano jiiji.'
40025021	U ise-bugonzo ung'wila, 'Bugatu, u bebe uli nsese wawiza na ntungilija. Iki wabizile ng'wishigwa mu shigehu nakukutuula higulya ya shikolo shingi, ingilaga mu buyegi bo ng'wa so-bugonzo.'
40025022	Ushika nu wa talanta ibili, nanghwe uhaya, 'Baba ukaninha talanta ibili, naapandikile jingi ibili jiiji.'
40025023	Nu ng'wene ung'wila u ise-bugonzo giki, 'Bugatu; uli nsese wawiza na ntungilija. Iki wabizile ng'wishigwa mu shigehu, nakukutuula higulya ya shikolo shingi, ingilaga mu buyegi bo ng'wa so-bugonzo.'
40025024	Wahayukiza uyo oli opandika talanta imo, u ng'wene ushikila kuhaya, 'Baba nakudeebile giki u bebe uli munhu ngugu, hangi ukagesaga nu kuko utabibile, hama ukakumingijaga nu kuko utahambile.
40025025	Huna luulu nakogoha, nuja nukisimbila ha si i talanta yako nibisa; yiyi uliyibona i sabo yako!'
40025026	"U ise-bugonzo unshokeja aling'wila giki, 'U bebe uli nsese wabubi, niyo uli ng'oolo; gashinaga umanile giki nakagesaga ni shisho natashibibile, na giki nakakumingijaga kwingiila nu kuko natahambile!
40025027	Ulu chene yali ikwigeleelilwe kwibika ku basuluja i sabo yane, a ha kushoka ni nayanukula i sabo yane ni mbyalanwa jaho.
40025028	Ntaajagi i talanta yeniyo mung'winhe uyo ali najo ikumi.
40025029	Nguno uyo ali nasho shingi akongejiwa na kutinda ho, aliyo uyo ati na shikolo akutaajiwa ni shisho ali nasho!
40025030	U nsese uyo ati na ngofyoolo mponyagi ku giiti sha hanze u ng'wene, uko kukubiza kulila na kushelanya mino.' "
40025031	"Huna luulu, a ha kushoka kwakwe u Ng'wana wa Munhu, akwiza ng'wikujo lyakwe hamo na bamalaika bakwe. Ulu ushika akwigasha h'isumbi lyakwe lya butemi.
40025032	Huna a banhu ba mahanga gose, bakwimiila ku butongi bokwe. Nanghwe akubakomanya git'umo ndiimi akakomanijaga ngholo na mbuli.
40025033	I ngholo akujituula ku nkono gwakwe gwa bulyo, i mbuli ku lumoso lokwe.
40025034	Ha numa ya yeniyo, u Ntemi akubawila abo bali ku nkono gwakwe gwa bulyo giki, 'Nzugi a bing'we, abo muli na mbango ja ng'wa Baba. Ingilagi u mu butemi ubo mulonja-longejiwe kufuma ha kuseeng'wa kwa si.
40025035	Nguno naali natuubile ng'uninha shiliwa, na naali nakolilwe nota ng'uninha minzi nung'wa, na hangi naali ngeni ng'unanukula.
40025036	Hama naali duuhu ng'uninha shizwalo, naali nsaatu ng'wiza kunigisha, hangi naali mu jeela, nu ng'wene ng'wiza kunilola.'
40025037	"Nabo a batungilija bakunshokeja balihaya giki, 'Seeba, nanali aho tukakubona utuubile tukwinha shiliwa, nuulu ukolilwe nota tukwinha minzi ga kung'wa?
40025038	Na hangi tukakubona nanali uli ngeni tukwanukula, nuulu uli duuhu tukwinha shizwalo?
40025039	Hangi yali nanali aho tukakubona uli nsaatu, nuulu uli mu jeela twiza kukulola?'
40025040	Nanghwe u Ntemi akubashokeja alihaya, 'Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, i yose iyo ng'wabiitilaga a badugu bane a bado-bado aba, ng'waniitilaga nene.'
40025041	"Hama na a babo bali ku nkono gwakwe gwa lumoso akubawila giki, 'Ingagi a henaha a bing'we nguno muzumilwe, jagi ku moto uyo gupembilwe kulwa ng'wa Shetani na bamalaika bakwe.
40025042	Nguno aho naali natuubile na nakolilwe nota, mutaninhile shiliwa nuulu minzi ga kung'wa.
40025043	Naali ngeni, nahene mutananukulile, hangi naali duuhu mutaninhile shizwalo; naali nsaatu, hangi naali mu jeela, aliyo mutizile nuulu kunilola!'
40025044	Nabo bakunshokeja balihaya giki, 'Seeba nanali tukakubona utuubile nuulu ukolilwe nota, nuulu uli ngeni, nuulu uli duuhu, nuulu uli nsaatu, nuulu uli mu jeela; nise tuleka u kukugunaana?'
40025045	A henaho nanghwe akubashokeja alihaya; 'Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, umo ng'wali mutang'witilile mhayo nuulu umo wa bado-bado aba, mutaniitilile nene!'
40025046	Huna luulu a benabo bakuja mu nsango gwa buja na buja; a batungilija nabo bakuja mu bupanga bo welelo na welelo."
40026001	U Yesu aho wakalicha u kusomboola i mihayo i yose iyi, ubawila a bahemba bakwe,
40026002	"Mumanile giki jasaagaga shiku ibili ishike pasaka; na luulu itegelejagi giki, u Ng'wana wa Munhu akutuulwa mu makono ga babulagi akong'we ha nsalaba."
40026003	I likanza lyenilo a bagabiji bataale na a banamhala baali batobanila ha ng'wa Kayafa, uyo wali ntaale wa bagabiji.
40026004	Balomanaga balikooba nzila ya kundima u Yesu mu nyasala-sala bamulage.
40026005	Kwike bakiwila giki, "Yaya u ng'wikanza lya shigukulu, batiziita nsambo a banhu."
40026006	U Yesu aho ali Betania, ha ng'wa Simoni munhu wa mbiji,
40026007	akigasha kulya shiliwa. Kuhayimanila nkima umo wang'wegeela, abuukije jubba ya alabasta, ya maguta ga mpango ntaale; ushika ung'witiila ku ntwe u Yesu a maguta genayo.
40026008	A bahemba bakwe aho babona giko busaaya no; buhaya, "Al'u bukenaaguji ubu nabo bo mbika ki hangi?
40026009	Iki a maguta genaya gaali gashikile kujinjiwa, shilonga shikolo shingi bugabanhyiwa bahabi!"
40026010	Aliyo u Yesu aho wadeeba uhaya giki, "Nibuli mulinkoya u mayu ng'wenuyu? U nimo uyo wanibeegeja nene gwenuyu gwawiza.
40026011	Nguno a bahabi a bene muli nabo gwa-gwa-gwa, aliyo u nene natubiza hamo ning'we shiku jose.
40026012	Umo wanitiilila maguta giki, wagubila u mili gone kulw'ikanza lya kujikwa.
40026013	Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, hose-hose u mu si uko jikulomeelwa i Nghulu Jawiza jeniji, nu mhayo uyo wagwita gwenuyu gukuhayiwa kulwa kung'wizukwa."
40026014	Huna umo wa babo ikumi na babili, lina lyakwe witanagwa Yuda Isikaliote, uja u ku bagabiji bataale.
40026015	Uukababuja giki, "Mukuninha ki nalang'oolekeje u Yesu mundime?" Bunsoloogeja shilingi makumi adatu nuulu: shipande makumi adatu sha feza.'.
40026016	Nghana kufuma ikanza lyenilo wandya kukooba ng'wanya gwa kunodeela u Yesu kubo!
40026017	A ha lushiku lo kwandya lo migati iti na shibimbya, a bahemba bakang'wegeela u Yesu bumuja giki, "Utogilwe kwiliila hali i pasaka tuje tukakulonja-longeje?"
40026018	Nanghwe ubawila, "Jagi u mu nzengo, alimo munhu nebe; mushike mung'wile, 'U Nangi alihaya giki: I likanza lyane lyegeelaga, nakwiza na a bahemba bane a ha ng'wako, tuliile henaho i pasaka.' "
40026019	A bahemba buja buukiita git'umo akabalagiilila u Yesu; bilonja-lonja i pasaka.
40026020	I mhindi wiza wigasha hamo nabo abo ikumi na babili.
40026021	Aho balilya kwimanila obawila alihaya, "Nalimuwila go nghana giki, umo wing'we akunilodeela !"
40026022	Bakapinihala no buyumuja; buli ng'wene wahaya, "Hamo nene Seeba?"
40026023	Nanghwe ushosha uhaya giki, "U nodeeji one alikoja nanghwe i nhonge jakwe umo nalikoja u nene!
40026024	Na nghana u Ng'wana wa Munhu ajile git'umo andikililwe, aliyo ali mu kwihiga kutaale no u munhu uyo alinodeela u Ng'wana wa Munhu. Yali hambu-hambu u munhu ng'wenuyo ulu ni oli atabyalilwe!"
40026025	Nose nu Yuda, uyo oli nodeeji okwe, ubuja giki; "Nangi, hamo nene?" U Yesu ung'wila, "Bebe waguhaya!"
40026026	Huna luulu aho balilya, u Yesu usola ngati. Ulumba huna ugumeganya, ubinha a bahemba kunu alihaya giki, "Anukulagi mulye; u gwenuyu mili gwane."
40026027	Usola na shikombe hu kuhaya shikombe sha divai; (nu mu Mk 14: 23; Luk 22:17).'", wahayumala kulumba ubinha kunu alibawila, "Shing'welagi pye a bose.
40026028	A genaya gali mininga gane g'ilagane, ayo galidika kulwa banhu bingi, nguno ya bulekejiwa bo shibi.
40026029	Aliyo nalimuwila giki, kufuma haha natung'wa hangi matwajo ga nzabibu kushisha mu lushiku lwa kung'wa mapya nali hamo ning'we mu butemi bo ng'wa Baba."
40026030	Aho bamala bimba lyimbo, huna bufuma hanze buja ku lugulu lo mizeituni.
40026031	Huna u Yesu ubawila giki, "U bujiku bo lelo iyi, pye a bose mukunipeela; nguno gwandikilwe giki, 'Nakuntula u ndiimi, jibbalasane i ngholo.'
40026032	Kwike ulu najuuka nakutonga kuja Galilaya, namutange u kushika ko."
40026033	Aliyo u Petelo ushosha aling'wila giki, "Nuulu bakakuleka pye a bangi, u nene ng'wene ngilo u kukuleka."
40026034	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Nalikuwila gwa nghana giki, u bujiku wenubu aho nghungulume itaali kuhila, u bebe ukubiza onilemaga nghangala idatu!"
40026035	U Petelo ung'wila hangi giki, "U nene nuulu yunigeleelwa kucha nangho, natiko u kukulema!" Na a bahemba a bangi pye buhaya giko.
40026036	Aho bashika h'ipandi litanagwa Getisemani, u Yesu ubawila a bahemba bakwe giki, "Igashagi henaha naje aho nakalombe."
40026037	Huna unsola u Petelo na a bitunja ba ng'wa Zebedayo a babili; ugwilwa bupina budito buminya no.
40026038	Ubawila giki, "I ngholo yane ili na bupina budito no, bo kushisha mu kucha. Lembeelagi henaha ng'wikale miso hamo nane."
40026039	Uja ha butongi ho hado, uukiponeja ha si, winama kushisha ha si u bushu bokwe, ulomba alihaya giki, "Baba ulu ilidulikana, i shikombe ishi shinibitiile; kwike it'umo natogelilwe nene, aliyo umo utogelilwe bebe!"
40026040	Wahayushoka aho baali a bahemba, ubasanga balaalaga, ung'wila u Petelo giki, "Ng'walemeelwa u kwiyumilija kwikala miso hamo nane nuulu ikanza lya sa imo duhu?
40026041	Ikalagi miso mulombe mutizingila mu kugeng'wa; nguno u moyo gukalalilwe, aliyo u mili ng'winogolelwa!"
40026042	Uja hangi lukangala lo kabili uukalomba alihaya, "Baba, ulu itadulikanile i shikombe shenishi shibite natashing'wile, ni ishikiilage iyo witogilwe bebe!"
40026043	Aho washoka ni hangi ubasanga balaalile, nguno a miso gabo gaali gadidoha.
40026044	Ubaleka, uja uukalomba hangi lukangala lo kadatu, uhaya mihayo h'i yene duhu.
40026045	Wahayushoka hangi a ha bahemba ubawila, "Ni haha mutaali mulaalile mukwigoloolaga duhu? Managi giki lyegeela i likanza, u Ng'wana wa Munhu atuulwe mu makono ga banhu ba shibi.
40026046	Buukagi tuje, angu mulibona giki wegeela u nodeeji wane!"
40026047	Aho ataali uyomba giko, kuhayimanila washika u Yuda, uyo wali umo wa babo ikumi na babili. Wiza n'ibita itaale lya banhu babuukije mapanga na milangha, bafumile ku bagabiji bataale na banamhala.
40026048	U nodeeji oli obinha shimanikijo; ubawila giki, "Uyo nalambipe U kumbipa munhu guli mhayo uyo gukatumamilagwa na banhu ba mahanga mingi, koolecha butogwa u kuli munhu uyo alibbipwa.' hu ng'wene, ndimagi!"
40026049	Haho na haho ung'wegeela u Yesu; uhaya, "Mhola Nangi!" Huna umbipa.
40026050	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Ng'wichane, gwitage uyo gwakwenhaga!" A banhu benabo bunsanga hoi u Yesu, bundima na makono gabo bunghaja.
40026051	Umo wa babo baali nu Yesu oli na lilushu, ulidima, huna ulisopoola; wahayulihubenga lyubitila gutu go ntumami o ngabiji ntaale, gutinika!
40026052	U Yesu ung'wila, "Bebe, lushoshage mu shilalo u lushu lwako, nguno pye abo bakabuuchaga shu bakayagalaga bo shu.
40026053	Nuulu hamo u bebe uliganika giki natadugije kunomba u Baba mabita ga bamalaika uninha ga kukila nuulu h'ikumi na abili i haha yeniyi?
40026054	Hama luulu numho gukushikilijiwa ginehe uyo gwandikilwe giki, 'Shiigelile ibize chene?' "
40026055	A banhu abo baali biza kundima u Yesu baali ibita itaale; i likanza lyenilo ubayombya alibawila giki, "Ng'wiza u kunidima mubukije mapanga na milangha giti nali nsambo? Iki ng'wali mutunidimaga a makanza ayo naludilaga nigashaga mu hekalu buli lushiku nakulangaga!
40026056	Kwike pyi i yose yajaga giko kulwa kushikilijiwa kwa shandikwa sha bahangi." Bumpeela pye a bahemba, buneka!
40026057	Huna luulu aho bandima u Yesu, buntwala ku ng'wa Kayafa, uyo wali ntaale wa bagabiji; h'uko baali bibilingila a balangi ba shilagilo na a banamhala.
40026058	Nu Petelo unkuubija ali ka kule ho, kushisha nanghwe ushika nose a ha ng'wa ntaale wa bagabiji. Wingila u mu gwalugwa, wigasha na batumami, giki ayibone i ngelelo ya mihayo.
40026059	U ntaale wa bagabiji ni libanza i lyose buyukooba-kooba bukaaniji bo nyalomolomo, giki bapandike nzila ya kumulaga u Yesu.
40026060	Aliyo batapandikile, nuulu iki bingi bakayimiila kufunya bukaaniji bo nyalomolomo. Nose bigela banhu babili;
40026061	buhaya, "U ng'wing'wana ng'wenuyu walikalaga uhaya giki, 'Nadugije kwisambagula i hekalu ya ng'wa Mulungu, hama nizenga hangi ng'wikanza lya shiku idatu!' "
40026062	Kwimanila wimiila u ntaale wa bagabiji; umuja giki, "Nibuli utushoshaga nuulu mhayo u mu yose iyo balikukaanila a benaba?"
40026063	Aliyo u Yesu akikala ahuumulile sele duhu. Huna u ntaale wa bagabiji ung'wila giki, "I haha nalikwilahija mu lina lya ng'wa Mulungu mpanga, tuwilage ulu giki u bebe hu uli Kilisto, u Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu!"
40026064	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Bebe ng'wenekili waguhaya, niyo nalimuwila giki, kufuma haha mukumona u Ng'wana wa Munhu igashije ku nkono gwa bulyo gwa budula, aliza na malunde ga ng'wigulu."
40026065	Huna u ntaale wa bagabiji utandula nghanjo yakwe, kunu alihaya; "Ng'wabona, wagima! Numho tutaali na nguno ki hangi nabo a bakaaniji? Angu ng'wawigwa u bugimu wene!
40026066	I gisi luulu muliganika ginehe?" Bushosha balihaya, "Wigeleelagwa kucha u ng'wenuyu!"
40026067	Bandya na kunswila mate ku bushu, na kuntula mapi;
40026068	kunu baling'wila, "Kilisto, nani wakutula? Alimanijaga!"
40026069	Huna u Petelo aho igashije hanze u mu gwalugwa ng'wenumo, kwimanila ntumami umo nkima wang'wegeela. Ung'wila giki, "Nu bebe walikalaga nanghwe u Yesu, u muna Galilaya!"
40026070	Ulema no, niyo ku butongi wa bose; kunu alihaya, "Bebe mayu, u nene natugumanaga uyo uliguhaya!"
40026071	Winga a henaho uja ng'wibindo; nu ng'wenumo ntumami ungi nkima umona . Nanghwe ubawila abo baaliho a henaho giki, "Nu ng'wenuyu olikalaga nanghwe u Yesu u muna Nazaleti!"
40026072	Ulema hangi; lelo wilahila na kwilahila alihaya, "U nene nataamanile u munhu ng'wenuyo!"
40026073	Banhu balebe baali bimiila ha mhujo. Aho lyabita ikanza iguhi, nabo bung'wegeela ho u Petelo; bung'wila giki, "I gete nghana nu bebe ng'wing'wana uli umo wabo, iki na a kayombele kako kaloolecha chene!"
40026074	A henaho luulu wandya kuzuma na kwitonga, kunu alihaya giki; "U nene nataamanile gete u munhu ng'wenuyo!" Haho na haho yuhila nghungulume!
40026075	Nanghwe u Petelo ugwizukwa u mhayo go ng'wa Yesu uyo wali wang'wila giki, "Aho nghungulume itaali kuhila, u bebe ukubiza wanilemaga nghangala idatu." Gunchima no, ufuma hanze uukalila mu kusaatwa kutaale!
40027001	Huna luulu aho wela i dilu, pye a bagabiji bataale na a banamhala bigasha, bizunilija giki u Yesu abulagwe.
40027002	Huna buntunga, buntongeja bantwalile kuli Pilato, uyo wali nsugi w'ipandi lyenilo.
40027003	U Yuda, u nodeeji o ng'wa Yesu, aho wabona giki walamulwa, ugalucha a maganiko. I shilingi ijo makumi adatu ujishosha u ku bagabiji bataale na a banamhala.
40027004	Uukabawila giki, "Naahubile u kulodeela mininga gati na shilingo!" Nabo bung'wila, "Tuli na mhayo ki hangi a bise? Ukwilonja bebe ng'wenekili i yeniyo!"
40027005	Ujiponeja mu hekalu i hela, u wei winga a henaho uja uukinija!
40027006	Aliyo a bagabiji bataale aho bajisola i hela jenijo buhaya giki, "Iti yawiza u kujituula ng'wibikilo lya manongho, nguno i joi jili hela ja mininga."
40027007	Lyaliho itongo lya mumbi, bizunilija kujitumamila kuligula, giki bayujikila mo bageni.
40027008	I litongo lyenilo lyuyitanwa Itongo lya mininga, kushisha na lelo yene.
40027009	Gubiza gwashikiila uyo guhayiwe na nghangi Yelemia; giki, "Bakajisola i shilingi iji makumi adatu, ijo jili mpango gokwe uyo Baisilaeli bakang'wisaabila,
40027010	bujigula itongo lya mumbi git'umo Seeba akanilagiilila."
40027011	Na nghana u Yesu wimiila u ku butongi bo nsugi; u nsugi umuja giki, "U bebe hu uli ntemi o Bayudaya?" U Yesu ushosha ung'wila, "H'umo ulihayila!"
40027012	Aliyo aho bandya kumuula a bagabiji bataale na a banamhala, atashokije nuulu mhayo!
40027013	Nose u Pilato ung'wila giki, "Bebe, utuyigwaga iyo balikubuula?"
40027014	Nahene atanshokegije nuulu mhayo gumo; u nsugi ukumya no!
40027015	U mu shiku ja shigukulu, u nsugi wali na shimile sha kubataligulila a banhu ntungwa uyo bung'wigongela boi.
40027016	A makanza genayo waliho ntungwa nkumuku witanagwa Balaba.
40027017	Huna luulu u Pilato ubabuja a banhu abo baali bibilinga; uhaya giki, "Mutogilwe namutaligulile nani? Balaba, nuulu u Yesu uyo akitanagwa Kilisto?"
40027018	Nguno wali amanile giki baali bantuula u Yesu mu makono gakwe kulwa wilu.
40027019	U Pilato aho ataali igashije u ng'wibanza, u nke okwe untumila nhung'wa kung'wila giki, "U munhu ng'wenuyo ntungilija nekage u bebe. Nguno u bujiku bo lelo nakoyaga hataale no mu shilooti kulwakwe."
40027020	Kwike a bagabiji bataale na a banamhala, baali babasamilija a banhu giki banombe abataligulile Balaba, u Yesu ng'wene ache!
40027021	Huna luulu u nsugi ushokeela hangi kuhaya giki, "U mu babili aba, mutogilwe namutaligulile ali?" Nabo buhaya, "Balaba!"
40027022	Nanghwe u Pilato ubabuja, "Al'u Yesu uyo akitanagwa Kilisto, nang'wite ginehe u ng'wene?" Pye a bose buhoolanija kuhaya giki; "Nekage akong'we ha nsalaba!"
40027023	Nanghwe uhaya, "Nibuli, witile bubi ki?" A boi bongeja kuhoolanija n'ilaka lya higulya balihaya giki, "Ni akomagwe ha nsalaba!"
40027024	U Pilato aho wabona giki gutusobookaga mhayo ntengeke, ulu iti kongeja kukula nsambo duhu, usola minzi ukalaba a makono gakwe ku butongi wabo a banhu; uhaya giki, "Neela u nene, ninga u mu mininga gakwe u munhu ng'wenuyu, mukwilonja bing'we benekili i yeniyi!"
40027025	Pye a banhu bunshokeja baling'wila giki, "A mininga gakwe ni gabizage ha mitwe yise na baana bise!"
40027026	Na nghana ubataligulila u Balaba. Aho wamala kuntula mbooko u Yesu, untuula mu makono gabo akakong'we ha nsalaba.
40027027	Huna a bashilikale ba nsugi bung'wingija u Yesu mu numba ya h'ikulu, bung'wihoolekela ibita igima.
40027028	Bunzuuja i shizwalo isho wali azwalile, bunzwalikija nghanjo ya nzulunge.
40027029	Hama bubeeja na ngikili ya minghwa, nayo bunzwalikija u ku ntwe gokwe, bulola bundimya na nangha u mu nkono gokwe u gwa bulyo; huna bandya kuyuntugija mazwi u ku butongi bokwe, kunu balingimba nyachilu; buyuhaya giki, "Kulaga uhangame ntemi o Bayudaya!"
40027030	Buyunswila na mate; banoga bugusola u nangha buyuntulila u ku ntwe gokwe!
40027031	Aho bamala u kungimba nyachilu giko, bunzuuja i nghanjo ya nzulunge, bunzwalikija i shizwalo shakwe. Huna buntwala kujunkoma ha nsalaba!
40027032	Aho balija, bumona munhu umo muna Kilene, lina lyakwe Simoni. Bunghadikija amuukije u nsalaba gokwe.
40027033	Huna bunshisha u Yesu h'ipandi likitanagwa Goligota, makulu gaho ipandi lya lupanga.
40027034	Bung'winha divai isangije ndulu giki ang'we; aliyo aho wiloja ating'wile.
40027035	Bahayumala u kunkoma bushigabanha i shizwalo shakwe bo kushesela mbale.
40027036	Huna bigasha henaho kunanghana.
40027037	A ha nsalaba a higulya ya ntwe gokwe, butuulwa ho wandike bo kubuulwa kwakwe buhayile giki, "UYU NG'WENE YESU NTEMI O BAYUDAYA"
40027038	Na basambo babili bakakong'wa hamo nanghwe, buli ng'wene ha nsalaba gokwe, umo ku bulyo bokwe, ungi ku lumoso.
40027039	Abo babitilaga haho hihi buyunsondagula, kunu bakushingishaga mitwe yabo;
40027040	balihaya, "Ni ginehe ng'wing'wana o kusambagula hekalu na kumala kwizenga mu shiku idatu. Alik'ipijage shi luulu ulu uli Ng'wana o ng'wa Mulungu, wike ho a ha nsalaba!"
40027041	Na a bagabiji bataale bandya kwiyineenelegeja na balangi ba shilagilo, hamo na banamhala. Buyuhaya giki,
40027042	"Walupijaga bangi duhu gashi niyo, u wei ng'wenekili walemeelagwa u kwipija. Angu nanghwe ntemi o Bayudaya i giko, ni ikage ho a ha nsalaba i haha, tukunzunya!
40027043	Walihamba-hambaga kunsanya Mulungu, ni ampijage luulu i haha ulu nghana anghayile. Iki walikalaga utwilambagulila alihaya giki, 'Nali Ng'wana o ng'wa Mulungu!' "
40027044	Na a basambo, abo baali bakong'wa hamo nanghwe, nabo buyumbyeedeleja!
40027045	I liimi aho lyashika ntwe-gati, shubiza ho giiti; shikundikija pyi i si, kushisha sa kenda.
40027046	Mu sa giti kenda giko, u Yesu ulila n'ilaka itaale alihaya, "Eli, Eli, lema sabaktani?" Hu kuhaya, "Mulungu wane, Mulungu wane, nibuli wanilekaga?"
40027047	Bamo babo abo baali bimiila henaho aho bigwa buhaya giki, "U munhu uyu ong'witana Eliya!"
40027048	Huna umo upeela haho na haho kujusola ibbupyo, ulilobya mu siki ulitunga kwidete, wiza ung'winha ang'we.
40027049	Aliyo a bangi buhaya, "Lekaga tulole ulu akwiza u Eliya ampije !"
40027050	Huna ulila hangi u Yesu n'ilaka itaale; ugufunya u moyo gokwe!
40027051	Kuhayimanila i lisenge lya mu hekalu lyatanduka kufuma kwigulya kushisha ha si, lyulekana habili; nguno ikadinghima nyahinga nhaale kushisha na mawe gupaanaguka.
40027052	Na shigila shukunduka, mibili ya beela bingi abo baali balaalile yujuuka.
40027053	Bufuma u mu shigila, aho wajuuka kufuma mu bafu u Yesu, bingila u mu nzengo ng'wela biyoolecha ku banhu bingi.
40027054	U ntaale o bashilikale igana uyo onanghanaga u Yesu, hamo na a babo baali bimiila nanghwe bakogoha no aho bibona i nyahinga pyi ni yingi iyo ikilonga. Biwila giki, "Bing'we, u munhu ng'wenuyu wali Ng'wana o ng'wa Mulungu nghana!"
40027055	Ibita lya bakima bingi baali banondeela u Yesu kufuma Galilaya, kulwa kumanungunaana; nabo baaliho biloleelaga bali ka kule.
40027056	U mu benabo baalimo ba Malia Magadalena, nu Malia u nina o ba Yakobo na Yosefu; hamo na nina o ba ng'wana Zebedayo.
40027057	Aho yabiza mhindi, wiza munhu nebe nsabi, muna Alimataya, lina lyakwe Yosefu; nanghwe wali nghemba o ng'wa Yesu.
40027058	U munhu ng'wenuyo uja u kuli Pilato uukagulomba u mili go ng'wa Yesu; u Pilato ulagija winhwa.
40027059	Huna luulu u Yosefu ugusola u mili, ugulingiila ng'wenda gwawiza gwa kitaani.
40027060	Hanuma uukagulaaja mu shigila shakwe shipya, wali wasimba ng'wiwe git'ihalo; a ha nyango upilingitija ho iwe itaale lyuchiba; huna winga ho.
40027061	U Malia Magadalena nu Malia u ungi, baali bigasha balolelile u ku shigila.
40027062	Aho lwabita u lushiku lwenulo, ulo lwali lwa kulonja-lonja, u ku ntondo yaho a bagabiji bataale na a Bafalisayo bikobya buja u kuli Pilato.
40027063	Buukang'wila giki, "Baba, twizukwa umo walikalaga uhayila u ng'wing'wana u nomolomo uyo, aho wali ataali mpanga, angu giki, 'Ha numa ya shiku idatu nakujuuka!'
40027064	Hambu-hambu ni walagija shilugalwe chiza i shigila shidaame, kushisha jishike i shiku ijo idatu. Batiziza a bahemba bakwe bang'wibe, huna bandye kubawila a banhu giki, wajuukile kufuma mu bafu. Ulu yuja giko u bulomolomo wene bukubiza butaale no, kutinda u bo kwandya!"
40027065	Nanghwe u Pilato ubawila, "A balanghani a bene muli nabo, bing'we jagi mukalugale ho mudaamye git'umo mumanilile."
40027066	Buja buukalizengeela i liwe, ilo lyali lichibigije a ha nyango gwa shigila, lyudaama. Bulituulila na lumengho, buleka ho na balanghani.
40028001	Aho yabita i sabato, bohayujiliila kwela u mu lushiku lo kwandya nyuma, u Malia Magadalena nu Malia u ungi, buja kushilola i shigila.
40028002	Kuhayimanila yadinghima nyahinga nhaale, nguno malaika wa ng'wa Seeba akika kufuma ng'wigulu; ulipilingitya i liwe uligasija.
40028003	I suso yakwe yali giti lulabi, i myenda yakwe yali yape giti mawe ga mbula.
40028004	A balanghani bakogoha no, buyudetema duhu, naabo bubiza giti baacha!
40028005	U malaika ubayombya a bakima benabo alihaya, "Mutogohage a bing'we, nguno namanile giki mulinkooba Yesu uyo wali wakomilwe ha nsalaba.
40028006	Atiho a henaha wajuukaga git'umo wali wahayila; nzugi mulole aho wali alaalile!
40028007	Ali luulu, jagi wangu mukabawile a bahemba bakwe, giki wajuukaga kufuma mu bafu; watongaga kuja Galilaya, mukuja mukamonele kwenuko. H'iyo, u nene namuwila."
40028008	Huna binga wangu-wangu a ha shigila, bigwaga u kogoha, aliyo hangi bayegaga kingi nasho; bupeela nhambo kujubamanya a bahemba bakwe.
40028009	Aho bajile, bahayimanila bamanhya nanghwe u Yesu; ubagisha, "Muli mhola!" Bung'wegeela, bundima ku mhambala bunamya.
40028010	Nanghwe u Yesu ubawila, "Mutogohage, jagi mukabawile a baana bang'wise giki nalija Galilaya, tukwibonela kwenuko."
40028011	Aho baja a bakima benabo, bamo ba balanghani ba shigila buja u mu nzengo, buukabawila a bagabiji bataale pyi iyo ikilonga.
40028012	A bagabiji bataale na a banamhala bikobya pye hangi buguhoyela, bizunilija kusola hela kaganda kigelile; bubinha a bashilikale.
40028013	Bubawila; "Hayagi giki, 'Twali twabitilwa tulo i bujiku, biza a bahemba bakwe bung'wiba!'
40028014	U mhayo gwenuyu ulu guliigwiwe nu nsugi, tukunghuumuja duhu a bise, tung'winje a bing'we u mu makoye."
40028015	Na nghana bujanukula i hela, bandya kwita umo bakalangiililwa. U mhayo gwenuyo gukumuchiwa na a Bayudaya kushisha ni lelo iyi.
40028016	A bahemba abo ikumi n'umo bakaja i Galilaya, buukashika u ku lugulu ulo wali wabalagila u Yesu.
40028017	Aho bamona bunamya, aliyo bamo babo bakayutawa-tawa.
40028018	Huna u wei u Yesu ubegeela ubawila giki, "Pyi u budula ubo buli ng'wigulu nu bo mu si ninhilwe nene.
40028019	Huna luulu a bing'we jagi hose-hose u mu mahanga; ng'ubahembeka na kubabatiija mu lina lya ng'wa Baba, na lya Ng'wana, na lya ng'wa Moyo Ng'wela.
40028020	Hama ng'ubalanga kwidima pyi iyo naamalile kumukomeleja, managi giki u nene ng'wenekili nali hamo ning'we pyi i shiku jose na jose, kushisha ku bukalikijo w'ikanza."
41001001	Ubu buli wandijo bo Nghulu Jawiza ja ng'wa Yesu Kilisto, Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu.
41001002	Jikandya git'umo andikile nghangi Isaya, "Mulungu alihaya giki, 'Managa giki, nalintuma ntumijiwa wane ku butongi wako, uyo akukubeeja-beegeja nzila.'
41001003	Ilaka lya munhu alihamuka mu matogolo, 'Beeja-beejagi ikuuwa lya ng'wa Seeba, goloolagi nzila jakwe.' "
41001004	Akilonga Yohana Matiija, wali ku matogolo walomeelaga mihayo ya bubatiijiwa kulwa kugaluka na kwingila mu kulekejiwa kwa shibi.
41001005	Pyi i si ya Buyudaya, na a bana Yelusalemu a bose buyuja u kuli we, baakatambuula i shibi shabo, wababatiija mu mongo gwa Yolodani.
41001006	U Yohana wazwalaga shizwalo sha booya bo ngamila, u mu nkimbili witungaga ngwasho gwa nkoba; i shiliwa shakwe shali njige na buuki bo mu matogolo.
41001007	Walomeelaga alihaya giki, "A ha numa yane aliza uyo ali na budula kutinda nene, u nene natigeleelilwe nuulu kwinama kutaligula matungijo ga shilatu shakwe .
41001008	U nene nalimubatiija mu minzi, aliyo u ng'wene akumubatiija na Moyo Ng'wela."
41001009	Huna u mu shiku jenijo, u Yesu winga i Nazaleti ya Galilaya, wiza kuli Yohana kubatiijiwa mu mongo gwa Yolodani.
41001010	Aho wafuma u mu minzi, haho na haho ulibona i ligulu lyakunduka, na Moyo alika giti nghuulu kwiza hali we.
41001011	Ha numa ilaka lyufuma u ng'wigulu lilihaya giki, "U bebe uli Ng'wana wane Ntogwa, uyo nakuyegelile hataale no."
41001012	Haho na haho u Moyo untwala u Yesu ku matogolo.
41001013	Uukikala kwenuko shiku makumi ane akugemagwa na Shetani; na mashiinu gaalikoi. Aliyo baaliho bamalaika bantumamilaga.
41001014	U Yohana aho waponyiwa mu jeela, u Yesu wiza Galilaya akulomeelaga Nghulu Jawiza ja ng'wa Mulungu.
41001015	Wajaga alilomeela alihaya giki, "I likanza lyashikaga, u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu wegeelaga, galukagi mujizunye i Nghulu Jawiza!"
41001016	Lushiku lumo aho alishimiza ku mbalama ya nyanza ya Galilaya, umona Simoni na Andelea ng'wanong'wawe; bategaga ntego mu nyanza, nguno baali bategi ba ndilo.
41001017	U Yesu ubawila giki, "Nilondeelagi, nakung'wita mubize bazubi ba banhu."
41001018	Nghana haho na haho bileka i mitego yabo, bunondeela.
41001019	Aho waja hangi ha butongi ho hado, umona Yakobo ng'wana Zebedayo na Yohana ng'wanong'wawe; nabo baali mu lyato bakubeeja-beejaga mitego.
41001020	Na a bene ubitana; nabo haho na haho bunondeela, buneka u saabo u Zebedayo mu lyato, hamo na bitumamija ba mheela.
41001021	Buja buukashika Kafalanaumu, aho yashika sabato haho na haho u Yesu wingila ng'wisinagogi kulanga.
41001022	Buyubukumya u bulangi bokwe, nguno walangaga na budula, iti git'umo biitilaga a balangi ba shilagilo.
41001023	U ng'wisinagogi lyabo walimo na munhu ali na moyo nsoso, i likanza lyenilo ulila
41001024	alihaya giki, "Guliho mhayo ki a ha gati yise nu bebe Yesu wa Nazaleti? Wizaga kutuyagaja? Nakumanile uli nani u bebe, uli Ng'wela o ng'wa Mulungu!"
41001025	U Yesu ulihama alihaya, "Huumulaga, niyo unfume!"
41001026	I lisamva lyungalagaja u munhu ng'wenuyo, lyulila n'ilaka itaale, huna lyunfuma.
41001027	Pye bujinjimala, bandya kwiwila giki, "Bing'we, mhayo ki u gwenuyu? A kenaka kalangile kapya, niyo hangi ka budula, nguno na a masamva aliyugahama gang'wigwa!"
41001028	Haho na haho u lukumo lokwe lusambaala pye a hose u mu mapandi ayo gaali gabimbikanilwe ni Galilaya.
41001029	Aho bafuma u ng'wisinagogi, haho na haho buja ha ba Simoni na Andelea, buukingila mu kaya; na a ba Yakobo nu Yohana baali hamo nabo.
41001030	Bunsanga nina-bukwi wa ng'wa Petelo ali mu ndili adadililwe nswiza. Aho bashika haho na haho bung'winha u Yesu i mhola ja nsaatu.
41001031	Nanghwe ung'wegeela undima nkono ungungumula, gunekela u nswiza, ubabeegeja shiliwa.
41001032	Aho lyabiza lya mhindi, bandya kung'wenhela pye a basaatu, na a ba masamva.
41001033	Pye u nzengo gukuunukila a ha kaya yeniyo, bokala pa a ha nyango.
41001034	Akapija banhu bingi ba busaatu bo mbika na mbika, upeeja na masamva gabuyaga, niyo wali atagazunilijaga u kuyomba, nguno a goyi gaali gaamanile.
41001035	Dilu litaali ikingilima, u Yesu ubuuka ufuma, uja hanhu iyene kujulomba.
41001036	U Simoni na a babo baali nanghwe bandya kunkooba;
41001037	aho bamona bung'wila, "Balikukooba pye a banhu."
41001038	Aliyo u wei ubashokeja ubawila giki, "Tujagi na ku mizengo yingi iyo ili hihi-hihi, nu kwene nakalomeele. Nguno hu gwene uyo gwanenhile."
41001039	Huna uja pye a hose u mu Galilaya akulomeelaga u mu masinagogi gabo, na kupeeja masamva.
41001040	Kuhayimanila munhu wa mbiji wiza aho wali u Yesu, utuja mazwi kunu aling'wikumbilija alihaya, "Ulu utogwa udugije kuneeja."
41001041	Unsaatwa, ugoloola nkono unkuumya; kunu aling'wila giki, "Natogagwa, elaga."
41001042	I likanza lyenilo i mbiji jung'winga, wela.
41001043	Huna unghugula na nguzu, hama haho na haho unaga aje.
41001044	Ung'wila giki, "Ilanghanage, utizung'wila munhu nuulu umo mhayo gose-gose. Aliyo jaga ukiyooleche kuli ngabiji, ukafunye na shakwinha kulwa kwejiwa kwako, git'umo Musa alagilile, bubize ho bukaaniji kubo."
41001045	Aliyo wahayufuma a hanze, aho alija wandya kulomeela na kugukumucha no u mhayo gwenuyo. Nose yubiza shilambu u kuli Yesu kwingila mu nzengo gose-gose bo hape. Uyudila hanze ku matogolo, aliyo nu kwene a banhu bankuubijaga duhu kufuma pye a hose.
41002001	Aho jabita shiku, u Yesu ushoka hangi i Kafalanaumu; gukumuka giki aliho a ha kaya.
41002002	Banhu bingi biza kumona, bokala ho bishita; kushisha buchiba a ha nyango. Nanghwe uyubalomeela mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu.
41002003	Kuhayimanila bang'wenhela munhu wa busaatu bo mangwisha, abuuchiwe na banhu bane.
41002004	Aliyo iki baali bingi a banhu, bulemeelwa u kushikiila aho wali u Yesu. Na luulu bulinha kwigulya ya numba, buukachibula ipundu kulingisila aho wali, bushibitija hene i shilago isho wali ashilaalilile u nsaatu, bung'wicha.
41002005	U Yesu aho wakubona u kuzunya kwabo ung'wila u nsaatu giki, "Bebe ng'wana, walekejiagwa i shibi shako."
41002006	Baaliho na balangi ba shilagilo balebe, baali bigasha hoi; bandya kwiganika u mu ngholo jabo giki,
41002007	"Nibuli wayuhaya na mihayo ili giko hangi u ng'wenuyu? U wenubu bugimu! Nani uyo adugije kulekeja shibi ulu ati Mulungu duhu?"
41002008	Haho na haho u Yesu udeeba u mu moyo gokwe umo biganikilaga. Na ubawila, "Nibuli muliganika mihayo ili giko u mu ngholo jing'we?
41002009	I gisi, u nogu guli ginehe? U gwa kung'wila u nsaatu giki, 'Walekejiagwa i shibi shako,' nuulu hamo u kung'wila giki, 'Buukaga ushibuuche i shilago shako ushimize?'
41002010	Ali luulu, shiigelile mumane giki u Ng'wana wa Munhu ali nabo u budula bo kulekeja shibi u mu si." Huna ung'wila u nsaatu giki,
41002011	"Bebe, nalikuwila buukaga ushibuuche i shilago shako uje kaya."
41002012	Nghana ubuuka haho na haho, ushibuucha i shilago shakwe, ugumha ajile balolile a bose! Pyi bujinjimala, buyunkumilija Mulungu duhu balihaya, "Tutaali kubona mhayo guli giki na hado yaya!"
41002013	Huna ufuma, uja alisingija hangi ku nyanza; pye a mabita gunondeela, nanghwe uyubalanga.
41002014	Aho akubitaga uko na uko, umona Lawi ng'wana Alifayo igashije ng'witobisijo lya goodi; ug'wila, "Nilondeelage." Nghana ubuuka unondeela.
41002015	U Yesu aho ali ha ng'wa Lawi akigasha kulya shiliwa, na batobisha ba goodi bingi hamo na banhu ba shibi bigasha kulya nanghwe, na a bahemba bakwe. Nguno abo banondeelaga baali bingi no.
41002016	Aliyo a balangi ba shilagilo abo baali Bafalisayo, aho bamona alilya na banhu ba shibi na batobisha ba goodi, bubawila a bahemba bakwe giki, "Nibuli akulyaga hamo na batobisha ba goodi, buyaga na banhu ba shibi?"
41002017	U Yesu aho wigwa ubawila giki, "A bapanga bati na nguno na nfumu, aliyo a basaatu h'abo bakankoobaga. U nene natizile kwitana batungilija, aliyo ba shibi!"
41002018	A bahemba ba ng'wa Yohana na a ba Bafalisayo baali bafunga. Huna banhu balebe biza kumuja giki, "Nibuli a bahemba ba ng'wa Yohana na a ba Bafalisayo bakafungaga, aliyo a bahemba bako batafungaga?"
41002019	Nanghwe u Yesu ubawila giki, "U ntooji ulu ataali hamo nabo a bageni ba ha bukwilima, nibuli bafunge? U ng'wikanza pye ilo ataali hamo nabo u ntooji, batiko u kufunga.
41002020	Jikushika i shiku ja kwingijiwa u ntooji, u ng'wikanza lyenilo hu bakuyufunga.
41002021	Atiho uyo akasumilijaga shilaka sha ng'wenda mpya ha ng'wenda nkulukulu, nguno ulu wita giko shikugutandula u ng'wenda u nkulukulu gukenaaguke kutinda.
41002022	Na hangi atiho uyo akabikaga divai mhya ng'wibikilo ikulukulu, ulu wita giko, i divai ikulitandula i libikilo likenaaguke, ni divai yidika! Aliyo i divai i mhya shiigelile ibize ng'wibikilo ipya!"
41002023	Yaliho sabato ndebe, u Yesu wabitilaga mu migunda ya busiga, a bahemba bakwe buyubinza mangala gamo aho bajile.
41002024	Huna a Bafalisayo bung'wila, "Bebe, ulibona ahene! Nibuli baliita mhayo uyo guli ngilo kwitwa ha sabato?"
41002025	Nanghwe ubawila giki, "A bing'we mutaali u kusoma umo akiitila u Daudi na a babo wali nabo, aho baali na makoye ga lutuubo?
41002026	I giki u mu shiku ja ngabiji ntaale Abiasali akingila nabo a biye u mu numba ya ng'wa Mulungu, uukalya migati ya kutuulwa ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu, iyo yali ngilo u kwilya u wei na a biye, ulu iti bagabiji duhu?"
41002027	Ongeja kubawila giki, "I sabato ituulilwe ho kulwa nguno ya banhu, iti banhu kulwa sabato.
41002028	Huna luulu, u Ng'wana wa Munhu ali Seeba wayo ni sabato."
41003001	Lwise lungi wingila hangi ng'wisinagogi; walimo na munhu wa nkono guhaamalalile.
41003002	Bamo abo baalimo bandya kunola mu kung'witega-tega, giki bamone ulu akumpija u munhu ng'wenuyo ha sabato, bapandike nzila ya kunsola bubi.
41003003	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila u munhu ng'wenuyo giki, "Al'imiilaga a ha gati aho!"
41003004	Huna ubabuja giki, "A ha sabato izuniligije kubeeja yawiza, nuulu kubeeja yabubi? Kupija munhu, nuulu kubulaga?" Buhuumula sele!
41003005	U Yesu usaaya no, uyubalola-lola pye a bose, ubasaatwa kulwa buganghanazu bo ngholo jabo! Huna ung'wila u munhu ng'wenuyo giki, "Gugoloolage u nkono gwako." Nghana ugugoloola, gubiza gwapila u nkono gwakwe.
41003006	I likanza lyenilo a Bafalisayo bufuma hanze na ban'ikulu ba ng'wa Helode, buukandya kubeeja long'we ya kunyagaja!
41003007	Nanghwe u Yesu na a bahemba bakwe buja ku nyanza, n'ibita itaale lya banhu kufuma mu Galilaya na Buyudaya lyubalondeela.
41003008	Bamo baali ba kufuma Yelusalemu, bangi Idumea na ku nkilo gwa Yolodani. Na bangi bafumaga mhandi ja Tulo na Sidoni: mabita na mabita ga banhu buyunkuubija aho bayigwa iyo wayitaga.
41003009	Huna ubawila a bahemba bakwe bang'wegelegeje lyato, batizunkandikija a banhu;
41003010	nguno wapijaga bingi no. Nose pye abo baali na makoye bichiibilijaga, giki nuulu bankuumye bo kungwila.
41003011	Abo baali na masamva ulu bamona bagwaga u ku butongi bokwe kunu balilila buhaya giki, "U bebe uli Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu."
41003012	Aliyo u wei obalemejaga batizunkumucha akamanwa.
41003013	Huna ulinha mu lugulu, ubitana abo wali abahayile, bunondeela.
41003014	Ubasolanhya ikumi na babili, babize ba kwikala hamo nanghwe, na kuyubatuma kuja kulomeela.
41003015	Hama babize na budula bo kupeeja masamva.
41003016	Huna luulu ubiza wabasola abo ikumi na babili; baali: Simoni uyo akang'winha lina lya Petelo,
41003017	na Yakobo ng'wana Zebedayo hamo na Yohana ng'wanong'wawe, abo akabilika lina lya Boanelige, makulu gaho bagosha ba kuluma kwa mbula!
41003018	Na Andelea na Filipo, na Batolomayo, na Matayo, na Tomaso na Yakobo ng'wana Alifayo, na Tadayo, na Simoni muna Kanaani,
41003019	na Yuda Isikaliote, uyo akabiza nodeeji wakwe!
41003020	Huna wingila mu numba, ibita lya banhu lyung'okaliila hangi, kushisha bugayiwa nuulu ng'wanya gwa kulya shiliwa.
41003021	A bang'wawe aho bayigwa i yeniyo buja ko giki bakandime. Nguno bakandya kwiganika giki, "U ng'wenuyu gabipile a masala."
41003022	Baali biza na balangi ba shilagilo kufuma Yelusalemu, a bene buyuhaya, "U ng'wenuyu ali na Libelizebuli," na giki, "A masamva akugapeejaga mu budula w'itaale lya masamva!"
41003023	Huna u wei ubitana a banhu bung'wegeela, wandya kubawila mu shigemenghejo giki, "Idulikanile ginehe u Shetani ampeeje Shetani?"
41003024	Na giki, "U butemi ulu bugabanika huna wandya kwilwisha boi wenekili na wenekili, butudula u kwimiila u butemi wenubo.
41003025	Nuulu kaya ulu yugabanika huna yandya kwiyubukila yoi yenekili na yenekili, itulama i kaya yeniyo.
41003026	H'umo ili nu kuli Shetani; nanghwe ulu wandya kugabanika na kwilwisha wei ng'wenekili na ng'wenekili, atudula u kwimiila. Numho i ngelelo yakwe yashikaga."
41003027	Aliyo managi giki, "Atiho munhu uyo adugije kwingila mu numba ya ngosha o nguzu, wandya kwinja shikolo shakwe bo makaala; ulu atandije tame antunge u o nguzu ng'wenuyo, h'adule u kwiyiboneela i kaya yakwe.
41003028	Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, a banhu badugije kulekejiwa i shibi i shingi na shingi, nuulu busondaguji ubo bakuwita.
41003029	Aliyo u wa kunsondagula Moyo Ng'wela, u ng'wene atiko u kulekejiwa kushisha welelo bose, nguno witaga shibi sha nsango gwa buja na buja!"
41003030	Akihaya i yeniyo nguno bahayaga giki, "Ali na moyo nsoso."
41003031	Huna u nina wiza hamo na a baana ba ng'wawe u Yesu, bushika bimiila hanze, butumija itanwe.
41003032	Banhu bingi baali bigasha bumpindya, huna bung'wila giki, "Alilolaga a hanze aho, uuyo u noko na a bazunayo na a balumbuyo balikukooba."
41003033	Nanghwe ubashokeja alihaya giki, "Nani u mayu u nene, na a bazuna bane banani?"
41003034	Huna uyubalola-lola pye abo baali bigasha bampindije, kunu alihaya giki, "Baaba mulibabona aha a bamayu na a bazuna bane.
41003035	Nguno buli ng'wene uyo akwitaga iyo Mulungu atogilwe, u ng'wenuyo hu nzuna wane, n'ilumbu lyane, na mayu."
41004001	Ikanza lingi hangi u Yesu akandya kulanga ha ng'walo gwa nyanza. Ibita itaale lyung'okaliila, nose uja mu nyanza uukigasha mu lyato; i libita lya banhu pye a bangi lyubiza ha ng'walo, a ha si nyumu henaho.
41004002	Ubalanga mihayo mingi bo kutumamila shigemenghejo; u mu bulangi bokwe ubawila giki,
