41004003	"Alidegelekagi; mibi akafuma, uja kubiba mbiyu.
41004004	Aho alibiba jingi jugwila mu nzila, jiza noni jujilya.
41004005	Jingi jugwila mu si ya mawe-mawe, jugehelwa i si ya kujifukiila, ahene jikanguha u kuzwa iki jali jitafukiililwe chiza.
41004006	Aliyo aho lyaseba i liimi, lyujoocha jujiga, nguno jali jiti na miji ya kwigela.
41004007	Jingi jugwila mu minghwa, aho jilikula na a minghwa gukulanija najo, gujishiteleja; juduuma u kutwaja a matwajo.
41004008	Aliyo i jingi jikagwila mu si yawiza, juzwa chiza jukula, jutwaja matwajo: jimo makumi adatu, jingi makumi atandatu, na jingi igana."
41004009	Huna uhaya giki, "Uyo ali na matu gakigwaga ni igwage."
41004010	U Yesu aho wasaaga iyene, abo baali hihi nanghwe, na a babo ikumi na babili bumuja i mihayo ya shigemenghejo shenisho.
41004011	Nanghwe ubawila giki, "A bing'we ng'winhilwe i mbisila ja butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu. Aliyo u ku ba hanze, pyi i mihayo ili mu shigemenghejo duhu.
41004012	Ibize giki, 'U kulola balole, aliyo u kubona yaya, nu kudegeleka badegeleke, aliyo u kwitegeleja yaya, batizugaluka, bakalekejiwa!' "
41004013	Huna u Yesu ongeja kubawila giki, "Mutushiitegelejaga i shigemenghejo shenishi? Mukushimana ginehe luulu pyi i shigemenghejo i shingi?
41004014	U mibi akabibaga mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu.
41004015	Aliyo abo bali mu nzila umo gukabibagwa u mhayo gwenuyo, bali abo bakamalaga u kugwigwa, huna haho na haho wiza u Shetani wagupula u mhayo uyo gwabibagwa u mu ngholo jabo.
41004016	Bangi baliho bali giti si ya mawe-mawe, a benabo bali abo bakagwigwaga u mhayo bagwanukula wangu-wangu na buyegi.
41004017	Kwike gwikala guti na miji u mubo, gwabagunaana ikanza iguhi duhu, aliyo ulu gilonga makoye, nuulu buluhi kulwa nguno yago u mhayo, haho na haho bakagwaga.
41004018	Baliho bangi bali giti si izwile minghwa; a bene bali abo bakagwigwaga u mhayo,
41004019	kwike i myatila ya buli lushiku, nu bulemba-lembi bo sabo, nu kwikumva kwa buli mbika, shikagushitelejaga u mhayo gwagaya a matwajo!
41004020	Aliyo bangi bali giti si yawiza; bakagwigwaga u mhayo bagwanukula, batwaja matwajo: bangi makumi adatu, bangi makumi atandatu, na bangi igana."
41004021	Huna ubawila hangi giki, "Angu, i tala ikenhagwa giki ikundikijiwe itangwa, nuulu ituulwe ng'wizungu lya buliili? Iti giki ituulwe h'ikindikilo lya tala?
41004022	Nguno gutiho mhayo uyo gukabisagwa ulu iti giki guloolechiwe, nu yuyo gukakundikijiagwa ulu iti giki gulakundulilwe!
41004023	Ulu munhu ali na matu gakigwaga ni igwage."
41004024	Ubawila hangi giki, "Ilanghanagi nayo iyo mukudegelekaga, i ngelekelo iyo mukugelekelaga, h'iyo mukugelekelwa na a bing'we, niyo hangi mukongejiwa na kutinda ho.
41004025	Uyo ali na shikolo akwinhwa, uyo ati na shikolo ni shisho ali nasho akutaajiwa!"
41004026	Hangi u Yesu uhaya, "U butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu bubizile giti munhu uyo akabibaga mbiyu ha si.
41004027	Ulu wila olaala, wela hangi omisha, aliyo atudula u kumana umo jikazwilaga nu mumo jikakulilaga.
41004028	I si hu yene ikajinhaga kutwaja matwajo; kwandija iduutu, hama lyangala, kushisha kupandika mbeke u mu lyangala.
41004029	Aliyo a matwajo ulu gakomeela, haho na haho akabityaga mo lushu, nguno gashikaga a magesa."
41004030	Hangi uhaya, "U butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu tubulenganije na ki, nuulu tubutuule mu shigemenghejo ki?
41004031	Bubange giti kabiyu ka haladali ako kakahambagwa; a koyi kali kado ka bado u mu mbiyu pyi i jose.
41004032	Aliyo ulu kuuzwa, kakakulaga lyabiza isaka itaale kutinda pye i miti ya masaka. A matambi gakakulaga kushisha na noni ja kulala japandika wikalo u mu mbeho yalyo."
41004033	Buli ikanza u mu kubasomboolela, u Yesu watumamilaga shigemenghejo shingi sha mbika yeniyi, kulenganila nu budula bo kwitegeleja kwabo.
41004034	Wali atabasomboolelaga mhayo ulu iti mu shigemenghejo, aliyo a bahemba bakwe waboolekejaga ulu wasaaga nabo iyene.
41004035	Aho lyabiza lya mhindi u mu lushiku lwenulo, u Yesu ubawila a bahemba bakwe giki, "Tujagi ku nkilo."
41004036	Bulileka i libita lya banhu bingila nanghwe mu lyato, bunjana git'umo wali; na mato gangi gulondeela.
41004037	Aho balija gubuuka nyaga ntaale, mahuuli guyulitula i lyato, nose lyegeela kokala minzi.
41004038	U wei wali ku numa ya lyato alaalile tulo, wisagulaga ha nsago u ntwe gokwe. Bumisha baling'wila, "Nangi, nibuli utudililaga aliyo tulihaya kushila?"
41004039	Aho wabuuka uguhama u nyaga; ni nyanza wiwila, "Lembeelaga, uhuumule." Na nghana gulembeela u nyaga, hubiza sele-sele.
41004040	Huna ubawila, "Nibuli ng'wali ng'ogohaga giko? Mutaali duhu u kubiza na kusanya?"
41004041	Bakogoha na kogohele kataale no, bandya kwiwila boi bike balihaya, "I gete u munhu ng'wenuyu ni nani, wa kwigwiwa buyaga na miyaga na manyanza hose?"
41005001	Bakaja buukashika ku nkilo gwa nyanza, mu si ya Bagelasa.
41005002	U Yesu aho wafuma u mu lyato, haho na haho umanhya na munhu w'isamva, alifuma ku mashigila.
41005003	H'uko wikalaga, na wali atiho munhu nuulu umo uyo wali adugije kumohya nuulu ni bo kutumamila nyololo.
41005004	Nguno nghangala ningi wabohiagwa na nhendele nuulu minyololo; aliyo witinaga duhu i minyololo, ni nhendele wajibinzagula! Wali atiho munhu nuulu umo wa kudula kungheeba.
41005005	Na luulu pyi i shiku wikalaga ku mashigila na mu ngulu; liimi ji na bujiku pe akuhoyookaga, kunu akwichubagulaga na mawe.
41005006	Aho wanoleela u Yesu ataali ka kule, umpeeleela uukantugija mazwi,
41005007	kunu alilila n'ilaka lya higulya alihaya giki, "Bebe Yesu Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu uyo ali higulya no, uli na mhayo ki nu nene? Nilahililage mu lina lya ng'wa Mulungu giki utuniluhya!"
41005008	Akahaya giko nguno u Yesu wali wamala kulilagila i lisamva giki, "Nfumage u munhu ng'wenuyo."
41005009	Huna umuja giki, "I lina lyako uli nani?" Nanghwe ung'wila, "I lina lyane nali Mabita, nguno tuli bingi."
41005010	Hama gundayiila u Yesu giki atizugafunya hanze ya si yeniyo.
41005011	Likasangwa lyaliho idale itaale lya ngulubi jadiimaga hihi na lugulu.
41005012	Huna luulu a masamva gundayiila u Yesu galihaya giki, "Tutwalage u mu ngulubi ijo tukingile mu jene!"
41005013	Nanghwe ugazunilija nghana a masamva genayo, gufuma guja gukingila u mu ngulubi jenijo. I lidale na butaale walyo liyita nhambo kujiliila ku lugegu lo nyanza, jukagwila ng'wenumo jung'wa nhuli juchila mu nyanza, jali giti shihumbi shibili!
41005014	A badiimi bajo bupeela nhambo, buja buukagukumucha u mhayo gwenuyo u mu nzengo, nu ku magunguli. Banhu bufuma kuja kugulola uyo gukilonga.
41005015	Aho bashika a hali Yesu, bunsanga u munhu uyo wali na mabita ga masamva igashije, niyo azwalile shizwalo, na a masala gadeekanaga. Bakogoha no!
41005016	Huna a bambona bubasomboolela iyo ikang'wilongela uyo wali na masamva; pyi ni ya ngulubi.
41005017	A banhu ba kwenuko bung'wikumbilija u Yesu inge u mu si yabo.
41005018	Aho wingila mu lyato, u munhu uyo oli na masamva ung'wikumbilija giki nanghwe anondeele.
41005019	Aliyo atanzuniligije. Ung'wila giki, "Jaga kaya ku bang'wing'we, ukabasomboolele iyo wakubeegejaga u Seeba, umo wakuchilaga shigongo."
41005020	Nanghwe nghana winga a henaho uja Dekapoli makulu gaho: mizengo ikumi.', uukandya kwikumucha iyo akiitilwa na Yesu, buyukumya pye a banhu!
41005021	Huna u Yesu ukila nyanza hangi bo mu lyato, aho washika hangi u ku nkilo, usanga ibita itaale lya banhu, baali banindiila haho bbihi ni nyanza. Wahayika u mu lyato, a banhu bung'witinja.
41005022	Kuhayimanila wiza munhu umo, ntaale w'isinagogi; lina lyakwe Yailo. Aho wamona u Yesu, ungwila mu magulu.
41005023	Ung'wikumbilija mu kwidohya, aling'wila giki, "Kashike kane kalisaata, niyo kali mandetendete, nzugu ukatuulile makono kapile, kinge u mu nhabaala!"
41005024	Ubuuka uja hamo nanghwe, ni libita na butaale walyo nalyo lyunondeela; banhu buyunshiteleja.
41005025	Waliho nkima nebe, wakoyiagwa busaatu bo ngeji, nose umala myaka ikumi n'ibili.
41005026	Wikalaga akusingijaga mu bafumu, aliyo baali balemeelwa u kungunaana, ulu iti kumaja shikolo shakwe dalali duhu, na kumanung'ongegeja makoye!
41005027	Aho walwigwa u lukumo lwa ng'wa Yesu, wiza nanghwe akuchiibilijaga u ng'wibita lya banhu; wiziila ku numa ushika wikuumya i nghanjo ya ng'wa Yesu.
41005028	Nguno wiwilaga giki, "Nuulu nukuumya shizwalo shakwe duhu nakupila!"
41005029	Na nghana haho na haho u ngeji goya, a mininga gakwe gukama, wiyigwa u mu mili gokwe giki, opila a makoye gakwe genayo.
41005030	I likanza lyenilo u Yesu wibona nguzu jang'winga, wikibuka u ku numa ubabuja a banhu alihaya, "Nani okuumya shizwalo shane?"
41005031	A bahemba bakwe bunshokeja balihaya, "Nibuli ulibuja nani onikuumya, aliyo ulibabona giki a banhu bakushitelejaga?"
41005032	U wei wandya kwilalangija pye a hose, amone uyo akagwita u mhayo gwenuyo.
41005033	U nkima ng'wenuyo ogoha wandya kudetema, nguno akagumana uyo gukang'wilongela; wiza ho ushika ugwa mu magulu ga ng'wa Yesu, unsomboolela pyi i yose git'umo ili.
41005034	Nanghwe ung'wila giki, "Nshike wane, u kuzunya kwako kwakupijaga, jaga mu mhola, a makoye gako gakwingaga."
41005035	Aho ataali uyomba giko kwimanila biza banhu, bakatung'wa kufuma u ku ng'wa ntaale w'isinagogi; bushikila kuhaya giki, "U nshike wako wazumalika, numho utaali na mhayo ki gwa kunkoya u Nangi?"
41005036	U Yesu aho wagwigwa u mhayo gwenuyo ung'wila u ntaale w'isinagogi giki, "Utogohage, bebe ng'wene sanyaga duhu."
41005037	Na luulu u Yesu atabazuniligije banhu bangi u kushikiila ho hamo nanghwe, ubasola ba Petelo na Yakobo, nu Yohana u ng'wanong'wawe wa ng'wa Yakobo.
41005038	Aho bashika a ha ng'wa ntaale w'isinagogi, usanga yabizaga myanda-myanda ya yoge; banhu bakufuutagilaga, na kutula nghungu.
41005039	Ubawila, "Nibuli muliyoganya na kulila giko? Atachile u ng'wana, alaalile duhu!"
41005040	Bunseka nyachilu-chilu kulwa kundalaha. Aliyo u wei ubafunya hanze pye a bose. Ubasola duhu a babyaji ba ng'wana, na a babo bakashikiila nanghwe hoi; wingila nabo umo wali u ng'wana.
41005041	Ushika undima nkono u ng'wana; huna witana alihaya, "Talita kumi!" Makulu gaho, "Ng'waniki nalikuwila buukaga!"
41005042	Na nghana haho na haho u ng'waniki ubuuka, wandya kushimiza, nguno wali wa myaka ikumi n'ibili. Bakakumya na kakumije kangi nako.
41005043	Huna ubakomeleja no-no-no, giki atizilonga wa kugumana u mhayo gwenuyu, hama ubawila bang'winhe shiliwa.
41006001	Huna luulu u Yesu winga a henaho, uja ku nzengo go ng'wawe, na a bahemba bakwe bunondeela.
41006002	Aho yashika sabato wingila ng'wisinagogi, wandya kulanga. Abo bakang'wigwa bingi buyukumya balihaya giki, "Bing'we u ng'wenuyu wifunije hali pyi i yeniyi? Winhilwe masala ki a genaya ga kubeeja na makono gakwe mihayo ya koolecha budula butaale giko?
41006003	U ng'wenuyu ati ng'wene u selemala u ng'wana Malia, u nkuluye o ba Yakobo na Yosefu na Yuda na Simoni? Tuhaya hu ng'wene uyo na balumbuye tukwikalaga nabo ng'wenumu umu!" Yubatabanya i mihayo yakwe, bipama!
41006004	Nanghwe u Yesu ubawila giki, "U nghangi atadalahagwa hose-hose ulu iti mu nzengo go ng'wawe na mu baduguye, na mu kaya ya ng'wawe!"
41006005	Nose u ng'wenumo akaduuma u kwita nuulu mhayo gwa koolecha budula, ulu iti kubatuulila makono basaatu bagehu duhu na kubapija.
41006006	Akakumya no kulwa nguno ya butuzunya wabo! Ha numa u Yesu wandya kuja hose pyi u mu machalo akulangaga.
41006007	Wahayita nose ubitana abo ikumi na babili, ubatuma babili-babili, ubinha na budula bo kuheeba myoyo misoso.
41006008	Hangi ubakomeleja, giki batizubuucha mbuukanwa jose-jose ja kuja najo mu nzila, ulu iti nangha duhu. Yaya nuulu shiliwa, nuulu ifulushi, nuulu mbogoshi ya hela.
41006009	Aliyo i shilatu bazwale, kwike batizuzwala nghanjo ibili.
41006010	Ubawila giki, "Ulu ng'ushikila ha kaya ndebe, ikalagi henaho kushisha ng'winge i lipandi lyenilo.
41006011	Hangi ulu ng'ushika ipandi ilebe aliyo bulema u kung'wanukula nuulu kumudegeleka, ingagi. Ulu mulinga i lipandi lyenilo, lukung'unhagi nu lubuubu ulo luli ku mhambala jing'we, koolekeja giki bakugwilwa nsango."
41006012	Na nghana bakaja balilomeela, giki a banhu bagaluke.
41006013	Bupeeja na masamva mingi, na basaatu bingi bubabila maguta, bubapija.
41006014	U ntemi Helode wiyigwa i mihayo yeniyo, nguno i lina lya ng'wa Yesu likakumuka. Bangi bahayaga giki, "Yohana Matiija wajuukile kufuma mu bafu, h'i nguno yene u budula u bose ubu bukutumamaga muli we."
41006015	Kwike bangi banghayaga, "Eliya." Bangi giki, "Nghangi, git'umo baali a bahangi ba kale."
41006016	Aliyo u Helode aho wigwa uhaya, "Tambala shilanga u Yohana uyo nakamuta ntwe wajuukile!"
41006017	Nguno u Helode, hu wei uyo wali walagila uding'wa u Yohana uponyiwa mu jeela, kulwa nguno ya ng'wa Helodia uyo akantoola, aliyo wali nke o ng'wa Filipo ng'wanong'wawe.
41006018	U Yohana akanghama u Helode ung'wila giki, "Iti yawiza u bebe u kunsola u nke o ng'wanong'wing'we!"
41006019	U mhayo gwenuyo gukansaayicha no u Helodia, umpelanila u Yohana, untungila nhungi; ung'wikanwa kumulaga. Kwike wali waduuma umo iitile.
41006020	Nguno u Helode oli ang'ogohile u Yohana, oli andeebile giki oli munhu ntungilija na ng'wela, na luulu oli amaladile. Ahene ozwanganaga ulu ong'wigwa, aliyo ondegelekaga na buyegi.
41006021	Kwike nose likigela i likanza, nguno lukashika lushiku lwa kwizukwa kubyalwa kwakwe u Helode. Ubeeja shigukulu, ulaalika banamhala b'ibanza lyakwe na bataale ba bashilikale, hamo na banangwa ba mu Galilaya.
41006022	Huna nshike wa ng'wa Helodia wingila kubabinila, unyeja no u Helode, pye na a bageni bakwe. U ntemi ung'wila u ng'waniki giki, "Nilombage shikolo shose-shose nakusambe!"
41006023	Niyo ung'wilahilila na kung'wilahilila alihaya giki, "Udugije kunilomba shose-shose, nuulu ikabiza nusu ya butemi bone nakukwinha duhu!"
41006024	U ng'waniki ufuma u mu chumba, uukamuja nina giki, "Nalombe ki?" Nanghwe unshokeja, "Ntwe go ng'wa Yohana Matiija!"
41006025	Haho na haho u ng'waniki ushoka u kuli ntemi; wiza ung'wila, "Nalitogwa i haha yeniyi unisambe ntwe go ng'wa Yohana Matiija, guli ng'wilangahe!"
41006026	U ntemi akazwangana kingi nasho, aliyo iki wali wamala kulahila, niyo hangi ku butongi wa babo wali wabalaalika kwiza ku shiliwa, ulemeelwa u kunemeja.
41006027	Nghana haho na haho u ntemi utuma mulagi, ulagila gwenhwe ng'wilangahe u ntwe go ng'wa Yohana; u mulagi uja u mu jeela uukamuta u ntwe.
41006028	Ugutuula ng'wilangahe wiza ung'winha u ng'waniki, u ng'waniki nanghwe uukang'winha nina!
41006029	Aho bigwa a bahemba ba ng'wa Yohana biza bugusola u mili, buukagujika!
41006030	A batung'wa bushoka u kuli Yesu, bibilinga bunsomboolela pyi iyo bakiita, ni yiyo bakalanga.
41006031	Huna ubawila, "ubingilagi a banhu tuje kuunu kulembeezu mukifuule ho hado." Nguno a banhu baali bingi no, bizaga lwisi-lwisi; ulu balinga aba bashika bangi haho na haho. Nose yali shilambu nuulu kupandika ng'wanya gwa kulya.
41006032	Nghana bingila mu lyato buja kwipandi ilembeezu, uko baali batiko banhu.
41006033	Aliyo bamo aho bababona budeeba uko bajaga, bandya kufuma hose-hose u mu mizengo buyupeela lo magulu bajile koi, bubatanga u kushika ko.
41006034	Ohayika u Yesu u mu lyato, aho olibona i libita umo lyali u butaale, ubasaatwa. Nguno baali giti ngholo jiti na ndiimi, wandya kubalanga mihayo mingi.
41006035	Aho lyandya kubiza lya mhindi bung'wegeela a bahemba bakwe, bung'wila giki, "U ng'wenumu tuli ng'witogolo duhu, niyo ni likanza lyaja.
41006036	Hambu-hambu ni wabalaga a banhu baje ku migunda hihi-hihi mu chalo umu bakigulile na shiliwa!"
41006037	Aliyo u wei ubashokeja ubawila, "Binhagi a bing'we i shiliwa." Nabo bunshokeja buhaya, "Kolaga hamo shi tuje tukagule migati ya denali magana abili hu twize tubinhe balye?"
41006038	Ubabuja, "Muli na migati yinga? Alijagi mukalole!" Aho badeeba bung'wila, "Itano na ndilo ibili."
41006039	Huna ubalagila babawile a banhu bigashe mu magele-magele ha si ha maswa, nguno gaali manilizu.
41006040	Na nghana bigasha pyi chiza-chiza, mu magele-magele ga kubiza aho bigasha banhu igana, aho makumi atano.
41006041	Wisola i migati iyo itano yeniyo, ni ndilo bubili wajo. Ulangamila ng'wigulu ulumba, wimeganya i migati iyo itano yeniyo, ubinha a bahemba bakwe bubagabanhya a banhu. Ni ndilo ijo ibili najo giko, ubagabanhya pye a bose.
41006042	Bulya bigeja pye a bose.
41006043	Huna bugasoleela a mamenyagulwa, pye na a ga ndilo, bokaja matangwa ikumi na abili.
41006044	I lisaabu lya bagosha abo bakalya i migati yeniyo baali shihumbi shitano.
41006045	Haho na haho u Yesu ubakomeleja a bahemba bakwe kwingila mu lyato batonge ku nkilo, baje Betisaida; u wei amalije kulilaga i libita lya banhu.
41006046	Wahayumala u kubalaga, ulinha mu lugulu kujulomba.
41006047	Aho bulingila u bujiku, i lyato lyusangwa lili ku gati-gati ya nyanza, u wei ali iyene ku si nyumu.
41006048	Ubabona balikoya u kubuga nguno u nyaga gwabafumiilaga ku butongi. Huna mu madilu mataale ga ngoko ja kwandya, ubasanga ko alishimiza higulya ya nyanza. Wita giti alihaya kubabitiila;
41006049	aho bamona alishimiza higulya ya nyanza, bakiganika linghangi buyoganya balilila.
41006050	Nguno pye bakamona bogoha kingi nasho! Aliyo u wei ubayombya haho na haho alibawila, "Timbyagi ngholo, mutogohage nali nene."
41006051	Huna ulinha nanghwe u mu lyato, goya na koya u kuhuuyemba u nyaga. Bakakumya no bujinjimala,
41006052	nguno baali bataali u kuyitegeleja i mihayo ya migati. I myoyo yabo yali itaali midito.
41006053	Huna bushika ha ng'walo gwa ku si ya Genesaleti, bukola henaho.
41006054	Aho bika u mu lyato haho na haho a banhu bundeeba.
41006055	Bandya kupeela kuja hose-hose u mu mapandi genayo; buyubenha a basaatu, abo baali batadugije kushimiza, buyubatuula ha buliili bababuucha babatwala buli kwene uko bang'wigwilaga.
41006056	Nguno wajaga hose-hose: ku magunguli, mu mizengo, pyi nu ku matogolo. Akaja na kwigulilu, nu kwene bung'wenhela bingi abo baali na makoye, buyung'wikumbilija bakuumye nuulu ha neno ya shizwalo shakwe duhu. Na nghana buli bene abo bankuumyaga bapilaga.
41007001	Huna Bafalisayo na balangi balebe ba shilagilo, ba kufuma Yelusalemu, bibilinga biza aho wali u Yesu.
41007002	Bubabona bahemba bakwe bamo na bamo bakulyaga shiliwa na makono masoso, hu kuhaya baali batakalabile kulenganila na shimile isho shalekwa na bataale babo.
41007003	(Nguno a Bafalisayo, na a Bayudaya pye a bose, batalyaga shiliwa ulu batakalabile chiza a makono gabo. Biitaga giko kulwa kudima shimile sha kulekwa na bataale babo.
41007004	Nuulu benha shikolo shose-shose kufuma kwigulilu, baali batashilyaga aho bataali kushooja tame. Yaliho na mihayo yingi mingi iyo baali bidimile kulwa shimile shenisho: giti mbika ndebe ja koogeje ka shikombe na nungu na mafulila, buyaga na meza!)
41007005	Huna luulu a Bafalisayo na a balangi ba shilagilo benabo, bumuja u Yesu giki, "Nibuli a bahemba bako bakulyaga shiliwa na makono masoso, batushimizilaga u mu shimile isho twalekelwa na bataale?"
41007006	Nanghwe ubawila, "Bing'we bibeeleja, u Isaya akatungilija u kumuhangila, umo yandikililwe giki, 'A banhu aba banikugije bo ha nomo duhu, aliyo i ngholo jabo jili kule nu nene.
41007007	Bakanilamyaga dalali, kunu bulanga malange ga kulagilwa na banhu.'
41007008	A bing'we h'abo mushilekile i shilagilo sha ng'wa Mulungu kulwa kudima shimile sha banhu!"
41007009	Ongeja kubawila hangi giki, "Niyo a bing'we h'umo muli, nguno mutogilwe kushisundila ha mhelo i shilagilo sha ng'wa Mulungu, giki mudimane na shimile shing'we.
41007010	Nguno u Musa ahayile giki, 'Nkujage so na noko,' na giki, 'Uyo unduka ise nuulu nina shing'wigeleelilwe abulagwe!'
41007011	Aliyo a bing'we muhayile giki, ulu ose-ose ulinda ung'wila ise nuulu nina giki, 'I shikolo shane ishi ni shakugunaana, kwike shili Kolibani (makulu gaho inongho kuli Mulungu);'
41007012	huna nghana mutunzunilija gete ang'witile mhayo gose-gose u ise nuulu u nina!
41007013	U mu giko mukagukenaagulaga u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu kulwa kulondeela shimile shing'we, isho mukilekela-lekelaga, niyo iliho mingi i ya mbika jenijo iyo mukayitaga."
41007014	Huna u Yesu ulitana hangi i libita lya banhu, ubawila giki, "Bing'we nidegelekagi pye a bose ng'witegeleje.
41007015	Shitiho shose-shose isho shili hanze ya ng'wa munhu isho shidugije kunsosohaja ulu shung'wingila, aliyo isho shikanfumaga h'isho shikansosohajaga. [
41007016	Uyo ali na matu gakigwaga ni igwage.]"
41007017	Aho wabingila a banhu wingila mu kaya, a bahemba bakwe bumuja a makulu ga lusumo lwenulo.
41007018	Nanghwe ubawila, "Na a bing'we hu gumo duhu, mutaali u kwitegeleja? Mutamanile giki, buli shikolo isho shili hanze ya ng'wa munhu ulu shung'wingila shitudula u kunsosohaja?
41007019	Mutamanile giki shikingilaga mu nda, iti mu moyo gokwe? Ni giki i nghalilo yaho ikabizaga kufuma hanze kwitogolo?" (U mu kuhaya giko akasheeja pyi i shiliwa).
41007020	Ongeja kuhaya hangi giki, "Isho shikanfumaga u munhu, hu shene isho shikansosohajaga.
41007021	Nguno u mu ngholo ya ng'wa munhu, gakafumaga mo maganiko mabi, bujingi, wibi, bubulagi, bushihani,
41007022	kwikumva kwabubi, bubi, bulomolomo, kalolele ka malofu, wilu, busondaguji, wikumilija, buchilu-chilu.
41007023	I yose i yabubi yeniyi ikafumaga mu gati ya ng'wa munhu yansosohaja."
41007024	Huna ubuuka winga a henaho, uja mhandi ja Tulo. Wingila mu numba, nguno wali atatogilwe munhu ose-ose amane; kwike yali shilambu u kujimilika uko wali.
41007025	Litabitile ikanza, nkima nebe wali na nshike wakwe wakoyiagwa isamva; ujiigwa i mhola jakwe, wiza ushikila kungwila mu magulu u Yesu.
41007026	U nkima ng'wenuyo wali Nyunani, w'ihanga lya Basulofonisa. Wandya kung'wikumbilija ang'wingije u nshike wakwe i lisamva.
41007027	U Yesu unshokeja aling'wila giki, "Lekaga balye tame a baana ba mu kaya bigeje, nguno iti chiza u kushisola i shiliwa shabo ushiponegeja tuwa."
41007028	Nanghwe u nkima unshokeja ung'wila, "Na nghana guli chene baba, aliyo nahene nu tuwa nato tukasolelejaga a malagalikwa ayo gakagwaga kwingiila aho baliliila a baana."
41007029	U Yesu ung'wila giki, "Kulwa nguno ya mhayo gwenuyo, jaga; lyanfumaga i lisamva u nshike wako."
41007030	Aho washoka u ku kaya unsanga u ng'waniki olaalaga ha buliili, lyamalaga kunfuma i lisamva.
41007031	Huna u Yesu winga hangi i mhandi ja Tulo, ubitila Sidoni, ushika ku nyanza ya Galilaya, mu si ya Dekapoli.
41007032	Bung'wenhela munhu wa kata, hangi gulu. Bung'wikumbilija antuulile makono.
41007033	Nanghwe ung'winja a ha banhu, uja nawe ha mhujo iyene. Unkuumya na nzwala u mu matu gakwe, ha numa uswa mate ulukuumya nu lulimi lokwe.
41007034	Ulangamila ng'wigulu, ukiima n'ilaka lya koolecha kusaatwa, huna ung'wila u munhu ng'wenuyo giki, "Efata," makulu gaho, "Lugukaga!"
41007035	Haho na haho a matu gakwe guluguka, na a kata kinga, wandya kuyomba chiza.
41007036	Huna u Yesu ubakomeleja batizung'wila ose-ose. Aliyo nahene a boi bakagukumucha, nuulu iki akabakomeleja batiziita giko.
41007037	Banhu bakakumya no; buyuhaya giki, "Akubeejaga chiza buli mhayo, a bagulu akubinhaga kwigwa, na a bashimuumu akubinhaga kuyomba!"
41008001	U mu shiku jenijo likibilinga hangi ibita itaale, aliyo baali bati na shiliwa. Huna u Yesu ubitana a bahemba bakwe ubawila giki,
41008002	"Nalibasaatwa a banhu nguno i haha jashikaga shiku idatu bali hamo nane, aliyo bati na shiliwa.
41008003	Ulu nubalaga baje kaya bali nzala, badugije nuulu kugwa-wesa mu nzila, nguno bangi bazengile kule."
41008004	Nabo a bahemba bakwe bunshokeja giki, "U mu matogolo umu, munhu adugije kupandikila hali shiliwa sha kubigela a banhu na wingi aba?"
41008005	Nanghwe ubabuja, "Muli na migati yinga?" Buhaya, "Mpungati."
41008006	Huna ulagila giki a banhu bigashe ha si. Wisola i migati mpungati yeniyo, ulumba, wimeganya, ubinha a bahemba bakwe bigabanhye, nghana bubagabanhya a banhu.
41008007	Baali na tudilo tugehu, nu twene u Yesu ulumba kulwato, ulagila nato tugabanhyiwe.
41008008	Bakalya bigeja; aho bagasoleela a masaajiwa, bokaja matangwa mpungati.
41008009	Abo bakalya baali giti banhu shihumbi shine, huna ubalaga busambaala.
41008010	Haho na haho u wei na a bahemba bakwe, bingila mu lyato buja mhandi ja Dalimanuta.
41008011	Huna Bafalisayo bunsanga u Yesu, bandya kung'wihalalija balikooba shimanikijo sha kufuma ng'wigulu.
41008012	Nanghwe ukiima n'ilaka lya koolecha kubasaatwa mu moyo; hama uhaya, "Nibuli i shibyalilwe ishi shikukoobaga shimanikijo? Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, i shibyalilwe ishi shitudula kwinhwa shimanikijo na hado yaya."
41008013	Ubaleka, wingila mu lyato hangi uja ku nkilo.
41008014	Biba kusola migati, bubiza bati na ginhu, ulu iti ngati gumo duhu uyo baali nago u mu lyato.
41008015	Kwimanila u Yesu wabahugula alihaya giki, "Ikalagi miso, ng'wilanghane u ku shibimbya sha Bafalisayo ni sha ng'wa Helode."
41008016	Aliyo a boi bandya kwilunjalunja, baliwila giki; "Hamo shi iki tuti na migati!"
41008017	Aho wadeeba ubawila, "Nibuli muliwila giki, hamo iki muti na migati? Mutaali duhu u kwitegeleja nu kumana? Ni ginehe i ngholo jing'we jitaali ndito giko?
41008018	A miso muli nago, aliyo gashi u kubona nduhu! Na a matu muli nago, aliyo u kwigwa yaya! Mutugemaga u kwizukwa nuulu hado gete.
41008019	Aho nakimeganya i migati iyo itano kulwa banhu shihumbi shitano, mukokaja matangwa ganga a ga masaajiwa?" Bung'wila, "Ikumi na abili."
41008020	"Al'i migati mpungati, iyo baali balya banhu shihumbi shine, aho ng'wagasoleela a masaajiwa ng'wali ng'okaja matangwa ganga?" Bung'wila hangi, "Mpungati."
41008021	Huna ubabuja, "Mutaali duhu u kwitegeleja?"
41008022	Bushikiila Betisaida, a banhu ba kwene bung'wenhela munhu mboku, bung'wikumbilija ankuumye.
41008023	Nanghwe undima nkono u mboku unfunya hanze ya nzengo. Unswila mate u ku miso, untuulila na makono; huna umuja, "Ulibona shose-shose?"
41008024	Aho wabuucha u bushu giki alole, uhaya; "Nalibona banhu baliyeela-yeela, aliyo bali giti miti."
41008025	Untuulila hangi makono u ku miso gakwe, upila. Aho walola ushibona chiza pyi i shikolo.
41008026	U Yesu ung'wila aje kaya, unkomeleja giki, "Niyo utizingila nu mu nzengo."
41008027	U wei u Yesu na a bahemba bakwe bugoloola bajile mhandi ja Kaisalia Filipi. Aho bali mu nzila, ubabuja giki, "A banhu bakunihayaga nali nani?"
41008028	Bunshokeja balihaya, "Uli Yohana Matiija, aliyo bangi giki uli Eliya, na bangi hangi giki uli umo wa bahangi."
41008029	Huna ubabuja nabo giki, "Al'a bing'we mukunihayaga nali nani?" Petelo ung'wila, "Uli Kilisto."
41008030	Na luulu ubahana batizung'wila munhu nuulu umo u mhayo gwenuyo.
41008031	Huna wandya kubalanga giki, "U Ng'wana wa Munhu shing'wigeleelilwe aluhiwe mu mihayo mingi; na kuleng'wa na banamhala, hamo na bagabiji bataale na balangi ba shilagilo." Na giki, "Akubulagwa, aliyo akujuuka ha numa ya shiku idatu."
41008032	U mhayo gwenuyo akaguhaya hape-hape gete. I likanza lyenilo u Petelo umpunja ha mhujo, wandya kunghama.
41008033	Aliyo u wei ubagalukila a bahemba bakwe, huna unghama u Petelo aling'wila giki, "Ingaga u ku butongi bone Shetani. Nguno u bebe utiganikaga ya ng'wa Mulungu, uli mu ya banhu duhu!"
41008034	Ha numa ulitana i libita hamo na a bahemba bakwe; ubawila giki, "Ose-ose uyo atogilwe kunilondeela nene, shiigelile idalahe wei ng'wenekili, ibuukije nsalaba gokwe, h'anilondeele.
41008035	Nguno buli ng'wene uyo atogilwe kubupija bupanga bokwe, akubujimiija, aliyo uyo ubujimiija u bupanga bokwe kulwa nguno yane na kulwa nguno ya Nghulu Jawiza, u ng'wenuyo akubupija.
41008036	Angu, u munhu akubiza na solobo ki nuulu akipandika pyi i si, aliyo u bupanga bokwe ubujimiija?
41008037	Nuulu hangi u munhu adugije kufunya shikolo ki kulwa kukomoola bupanga bokwe?
41008038	Nguno ose-ose uyo unibonela minala u nene ni mihayo yane u mu shibyalilwe isho shitankugije Mulungu na sha shibi ishi, nanghwe u Ng'wana wa Munhu akumonela minala u munhu ng'wenuyo, u ng'wikanza lya kwiza hamo na bamalaika beela, ng'wikujo lya ng'wa Ise."
41009001	Hangi ongeja kuhaya, "Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, baliho bamo u mu banhu abo bimiilaga aha batuloja icha na hado yaya, kushisha babubone u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu buliza mu budula."
41009002	Ha numa ya shiku itandatu u Yesu ubasola ba Petelo na Yakobo na Yohana, benabo duhu, ubatongeela ajile mu lugulu lulihu, ulinha nabo. Kuhayimanila i lihanga lyakwe lyagaluka balolile.
41009003	Ni shizwalo shakwe sheela pe, shiyung'weka-ng'weka; atiho nfuji nuulu umo u mu si uyo adugije kweja giko.
41009004	Bubilongela ba Eliya na Musa, bandya kulungalunga nanghwe u Yesu.
41009005	Huna u Petelo ung'wila u Yesu giki, "Nangi, yabeelela iki twabiza tuliho aha, i gete tuzenge maheema adatu, limo lyako, limo lya ng'wa Musa, na limo lya ng'wa Eliya."
41009006	Bakogoha no, ubbaha uyuhaya mihayo iyo wali atimanaga.
41009007	Bahayimanila bafikijiwa ilunde, n'ilaka ligela kufuma u ng'wilunde lilihaya, "Uyu ng'wene Ng'wana wane Ntogwa, ng'wigwagi wei."
41009008	Hama hangi bahayimanila haho na haho boya kumona ose-ose, ulu ati Yesu duhu hamo nabo.
41009009	Aho balika u mu lugulu, ubahana batizung'wila munhu ose-ose iyo bakibona yeniyo, kushisha aho Ng'wana wa Munhu alajuuke kufuma mu bafu.
41009010	Na nghana u mhayo gwenuyo bakagulanghana gubiza gwabo duhu, kwike bakayibuja-buja a makulu ga kujuuka kufuma mu bafu.
41009011	Bakiita nose bumuja balihaya, "Nibuli a balangi bakahayaga giki, shiigelile ize Eliya tame?"
41009012	Nanghwe ubashokeja alihaya giki, "U Eliya u ng'wene nghana ntongi u kwiza, kulwa kulonja-lonja yose. Al'i gisi nibuli u Ng'wana wa Munhu andikililwe giki, shing'wigeleelilwe aluhiwe no-no-no, na kuleng'wa?
41009013	Aliyo nalimuwila giki, u Eliya wamalile u kwiza, niyo bung'witila git'umo batogelilwe; umo andikililwe!"
41009014	Aho bashika u ku bahemba a bangi, bubasanga bapindiagwa ibita itaale; baaliho na balangi ba shilagilo bihalalijaga nabo.
41009015	A banhu aho bamona bakakumya, aliyo haho na haho bumpeeleela kujungisha.
41009016	Nanghwe ubabuja, "Mulihalalija mhayo ki nabo?"
41009017	Umo u ng'wibita lyenilo unshokeja alihaya giki, "Nangi, kaka kitunja kane nakwenhelaga, kali n'isamva lya bushimuumu.
41009018	Ulu lyakadadila likakagalagajaga, kayufuluuta ifulo duhu, u kunu kaligadaguja a mino, nose kaakaba! Naali nabawila a bahemba bako balipeeje, aliyo balilemeelagwa!"
41009019	U Yesu ubashokeja alihaya, "Bing'we shibyalilwe sha butuzunya, nakwikala nali ning'we kushisha nanali? Nakwiyumilija hamo ning'we kushisha nanali? Ng'wenhagi hali nene aha!"
41009020	Buntwala a hali Yesu. U nyanda aho wamona duhu u Yesu, lyuntaalika ha si i lisamva, wandya kufuluuta ifulo.
41009021	U Yesu umuja u ise o nyanda giki, "Ali na makanza ki gandimile a makoye genaya?" Nanghwe unshokeja, "Kufuma ha bunigini bokwe.
41009022	Niyo nghangala ningi likakagwisijaga na mu moto, nuulu mu minzi, giki likabulage. Ulu udugije kwita mhayo gose-gose, tukulilagwe utugunaane!"
41009023	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Giki ulu udugije? Angu pyi i yose idulikanile u kuli munhu wa kuzunya!"
41009024	Haho na haho u ise o nyanda ulila alihaya, "Baba nazunije, kwike ningijage u buhana-hani bone!"
41009025	U Yesu aho wabona giki i libita lya banhu lyandya kwiza lilipeela nhambo, ulihama i lisamva, uliwila, "Bebe moyo nsoso gwa bushimuumu na bugulu, nalikulagila unfume, niyo utizunshokela hangi."
41009026	Lyunghaja hangi u nyanda, wandya kufuluuta ifulo, huna lyunfuma, lyuneka giti waacha, nose a bingi buyiganika giki hamo waacha.
41009027	Aliyo u Yesu, undima u nkono gokwe, ungungumula, wimiila.
41009028	Huna u wei wingila mu kaya. Aho wasaaga iyene na bahemba bakwe duhu, bumuja giki, "Nibuli a bise twali twalemeelagwa u kulipeeja?"
41009029	Nanghwe ubashokeja giki, "I mbika giti iyi itiko kufuma na hado yaya ulu iti mu kulomba."
41009030	Aho binga a henaho bubitila Galilaya. U Yesu wali atatogilwe munhu adeebe.
41009031	Nguno obalangaga a bahemba bakwe giki, "U Ng'wana wa Munhu akutuulwa mu makono ga babulagi bamulage, aliyo ulu ucha akujuuka ha numa ya shiku idatu."
41009032	Kwike batagwitegelegije u mhayo gwenuyo, hama nu kumuja baali bogoha.
41009033	Bakiita bushika Kafalanaumu, aho bingila mu kaya ubabuja giki, "U mu nzila ng'walihalalijaga mihayo ki?"
41009034	Buhuumula sele, nguno u mu nzila bihalaligijaga mhayo gwa butaale; giki nani u ntaale kubatinda pye a biye.
41009035	Aho wigasha ubitana abo ikumi na babili, ubawila giki, "Ulu munhu utogwa kubiza wa kwandya, shiigelile abize ku numa ya bose, na ntumami wa bose."
41009036	Huna witana kanigini ukawila kimiila hamo nabo, wanoga ukakumbatila na makono gakwe. Huna ubawila giki,
41009037	"Ulu munhu ung'wanukula umo wa banigini git'uyu mu lina lyane, wananukulaga nene. Hama uyo unanukula nene, atananukulile nene duhu, aliyo wang'wanukulaga uyo anitumile."
41009038	Kuhayimanila u Yohana wang'wila giki, "Nangi, twali twamonile ng'wing'wana alipeeja masamva mu lina lyako; tunemeja nguno ati umo wise!"
41009039	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Yaya u kunemeja, nguno atiho munhu wa kubeeja mhayo gwa budula mu lina lyane, huna hangi ushoka kunihaya kibi haho na haho.
41009040	Uyo ati ng'wilwisha wise, u ng'wenuyo ali ku lwandi lwise.
41009041	Nguno buli munhu uyo ung'winha a bing'we minzi ga kung'wa, iki muli ba ng'wa Kilisto, nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, u ng'wenuyo atujimiija i mheela yakwe."
41009042	"Na hangi ulu munhu ung'wenheleja kwipama nuulu umo wa bado-bado abo banisanije nene benaba, ikubiza hambu-hambu atungilijiwe u mu nhingo yakwe iwe lya kushela, akaponejiwe mu nyanza shimu, achile ng'wenumo.
41009043	Huna luulu, nuulu nkono gwako ulu gukwipamya, gubbutage, ili hambu-hambu wingile u mu bupanga uli nemehazu, kutinda kubiza na makono abili aliyo uponyiwa mu nsango gwa moto gwa buja na buja. [
41009044	U ng'wenumo jilimo shagembe jitachaaga, nu moto gwamo gutajimaga.]
41009045	Nuulu lupambala lwako ulu lukwipamya lubbutage, ili hambu-hambu wingile u mu bupanga uli gigi, kutinda kubiza na mhambala ibili, aliyo uponyiwa mu nsango gwa moto, [
41009046	uko shagembe jabo jitachaaga, nu moto gutajimaga.]
41009047	Nuulu liso lyako lyukwenheleja kwipama, likobolage ulyinje ho. Nguno ili hambu-hambu wingile u mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu uli na songo, kutinda kubiza na miso abili aliyo uponyiwa mu nsango gwa moto.
41009048	Uko shagembe jabo jitachaaga, nu moto gutajimaga!
41009049	Nguno buli ng'wene akubitiwa mu munhu ejiwe u busoso bokwe, git'umo shitambo shikeejiagwa bo kutuulilwa munhu.
41009050	Na nghana u munhu guli ng'wiza, aliyo ulu gulinda gusuuka, i gisi mukugutwila ki gusanduke hangi? Na luulu bizagi na munhu u mu bing'we, hu mukwikala muli mhola buli ng'wene na biye."
41010001	Huna ubuuka winga a henaho, ukila mongo gwa Yolodani, wingila mu si ya Buyudaya. Mabita mataale gunondeela hangi, wandya kubalanga git'umo witilaga shiku jose.
41010002	Bafalisayo balebe bung'wegeela kungema, bumuja giki; "Angu, u ngosha azuniligije u kumpeeja u nke okwe?"
41010003	Nanghwe ushosha alibabuja giki, "U Musa amulagilile ginehe?"
41010004	Nabo buhaya, "U Musa azuniligije kung'wandikila talaka na kuneka."
41010005	Nanghwe u Yesu ubashokeja uhaya giki, "I shilagilo shenisho akang'winha kulwa nguno ya buganghanazu bo ngholo jing'we.
41010006	Aliyo a ha wandijo wa kuseema, u Mulungu akabaseema ngosha na nkima.
41010007	Nose hu kuhaya u munhu akuneka ise na nina adimane na nke okwe.
41010008	U mu bubili wabo bakubiza mili gumo, bati babili hangi, bali mili gumo.
41010009	Kulwa nguno yeniyo, abo badimanyiwe na Mulungu, atizigela munhu wa kubalekanya."
41010010	Aho ali mu kaya, bumuja hangi a bahemba bakwe i mihayo yeniyo.
41010011	Nanghwe ubawila uhaya giki, "Buli ng'wene ulu uneka nke wakwe utoola ungi akubiza alishihya.
41010012	Nu nkima ulu uneka ngoshi uukatoolwa kungi, nanghwe akubiza alishihya."
41010013	Bung'wenhela na banigini giki abakuumye, kwike a bahemba bubahama.
41010014	Aliyo u Yesu aho wabona giko usaaya. Ubawila giki, "Bazunilijagi a baana bize a hali nene, mutabahangijage. Nguno u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu buli wabo a ba mbika yeniyi.
41010015	Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, ose-ose uyo atuwanukula u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu giti ng'wana, atiko u kwingila mo na hado yaya."
41010016	Ubakumbatila na makono gakwe, hama ubatuulila makono, huna ubinha mbango.
41010017	Ha numa ya yeniyo ubuuka ajile. Aho ali mu nzila, kuhayimanila munhu umo washika alimpeeleela, ushikila kuntugija mazwi. Umuja giki, "Nangi wawiza, niite mhayo ki nabize ng'wingiji u mu bupanga bo welelo na welelo?"
41010018	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Nibuli ulinitana wawiza? Atiho wawiza nuulu umo, ulu ati Mulungu wike!
41010019	U bebe ushimanile i shilagilo umo shihayilile; i giki, 'Yaya u kubulaga, Yaya u kushihya, Yaya u kwiba, Yaya u kukaanila bulomolomo, Yaya u kunyeecha, Nkujage so na noko.' "
41010020	Nanghwe ung'wila giki, "Nangi i yeniyi nidimile pyi kufuma ha buyanda bone."
41010021	U Yesu unkalalila mu butogwa butaale, huna ung'wila giki, "Ulileba ho mhayo gumo, jaga ukashijinje i shikolo isho uli nasho ubinhe bahabi, ukubiza na wibikija wa sabo ng'wigulu, huna wize unilondeele."
41010022	U wei aho wagwigwa u mhayo gwenuyo, ugwa-loolo u mili, winga ho onzololokaga, nguno wali na sabo ningi.
41010023	Huna u Yesu wandya kubalola-lola pye a bahemba bakwe, hama ubawila giki, "Ili shilambu no abo bali na sabo u kwingila u mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu!"
41010024	A bahemba bakakumya aho wahaya giko. Nanghwe u Yesu ushosha hangi ubawila giki, "Bing'we baana, ili shilambu no u kwingila u mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu.
41010025	Niyo ili shinogu i ngamila u kubita mu kapundu ka lushinge, kutinda u nsabi kwingila mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu!"
41010026	A henaho a kakumije kabo kakakilanija. Bandya kwiwila giki, "Yee! Aliyo luulu, nani uyo adugije u kupila?"
41010027	U Yesu ubakalalila, huna ubawila giki, "U gwenuyu gutadulikanile u ku banhu, aliyo u kuli Mulungu iti giko, nguno u kuli Mulungu pyi i yose idulikanile."
41010028	Huna u Petelo ung'wila, "I gisi angu ulibona giki a bise twaleka pyi i shose kulwa kukulondeela bebe!"
41010029	Nanghwe u Yesu uhaya, "Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, atiho nuulu umo uyo waleka numba nuulu baana ba ng'wawe bagosha na bakima, nuulu nina, nuulu ise, nuulu baana bakwe, nuulu malaale kulwa nguno yane na kulwa nguno ya Nghulu Jawiza,
41010030	uyo atanukula numba nghangala igana i haha u ng'wikanza ili, na baana ba ng'wawe na balumbuye, na banina, na baana bakwe, na malaale, hamo na buluhi; hama u ng'wikanza ilo liliza akupandika bupanga bo welelo na welelo.
41010031	Aliyo baliho bingi abo bali ku butongi, bakubiza ku numa; na a babo bali ku numa, abo bakubiza ku butongi."
41010032	Baali mu lugendo, mu nzila ya kulinha kuja Yelusalemu, u Yesu wali ku butongi wabo. Niyo baja balikumya no, hama abo balondeelaga baali bogoha kingi nasho! Huna ubasola abo ikumi na babili ubapunja ha mhujo, wandya kubawila iyo ilang'wilongele.
41010033	Uhaya giki, "I haha tulilinha kuja Yelusalemu, u Ng'wana wa Munhu akujutuulwa mu makono ga bagabiji bataale na balangi ba shilagilo, banamule nsango gwa kubulagwa. Ha numa bakuntuula mu makono ga banhu ba mahanga,
41010034	bangimbe nyachilu na kunswila mate na kuntula, hama bakumulaga. Aliyo akujuuka ha numa ya shiku idatu."
41010035	Kuhayimanila bang'wegeela ba Yakobo na Yohana, a bitunja ba ng'wa Zebedayo, bushika bung'wila giki, "Nangi, tuli na mhayo tutogilwe utwitile."
41010036	Nanghwe ubashokeja ubawila, "Mutogilwe nang'witile ki?"
41010037	Bunshokeja balihaya, "Lagilaga giki, a bise bubili wise tuligashe nangho u ng'wikujo lyako; umo ku bulyo wako, ungi ku lumoso lwako!"
41010038	Nanghwe u Yesu ubawila, "A bing'we angu mutagumanile uyo muligulomba! Mudugije kushing'wa i shikombe isho nalishing'wa u nene? Nuulu mudugije kubatiijiwa u bubatiijiwa ubo nalibatiijiwa u nene?"
41010039	Bunshokeja giki, "Tudugije!" Nanghwe u Yesu ubawila, "I shikombe isho nalishing'wa u nene mukushing'wa, nu bubatiijiwa ubo nalibatiijiwa u nene mukubatiijiwa.
41010040	Aliyo u gwa kwigasha ku nkono gwane gwa bulyo na gwa lumoso, guti gwa kumuzunilija nene, u gwenuyo guli gwa banhu abo balonja-longejiwe!"
41010041	Abo ikumi aho bigwa bakabapelanila a ba Yakobo nu Yohana.
41010042	Huna u Yesu ubitana pye a bose; ubawila, "Mumanile giki abo bakanukulagwa na banhu ba mahanga kubiza basugi h'abo bakabalomaga, na giki a bataale mubo h'abo bakabatumamyaga bo nguzu!
41010043	U ku bing'we itigeleelilwe ibize giko, aliyo buli ng'wene uyo atogilwe kubiza ntaale u mu bing'we, shing'wigeleelilwe abize ntumami wing'we.
41010044	Nu yuyo atogilwe kubiza ntongeeji u mu bing'we abize nsese wa bose.
41010045	Nguno nu Ng'wana wa Munhu atizile kutumamilwa, aliyo kutumama na kufunya bupanga bokwe kubiza shikomoolelo kulwa nguno ya bingi."
41010046	Nose bushika Yeliko, aho alinga u mu nzengo gwenuyo wali nabo na a bahemba bakwe, hamo n'ibita itaale. Waliho na munhu mboku akasangwa wigashaga haho na nzila alilombeleja; i lina lyakwe witanagwa Batimayo, ng'wana Timayo.
41010047	Aho wigwa giki Yesu wa Nazaleti, wandya kuhamuka n'ilaka lya higulya alihaya, "Yesu Ng'wana wa ng'wa Daudi, nikulilagwe!"
41010048	Bingi buyunghama giki ahuumule, aliyo u wei hu ongeja u kuhamuka alihaya, "Ka nikulilagwe Ng'wana wa ng'wa Daudi!"
41010049	U Yesu wimiila ubawila, "Ng'witanagi." Bung'witana u mboku baling'wila giki, "Timbyaga ngholo, buukaga alikwitana."
41010050	Wiponya i kabbuudi yakwe, wikindika ng'wigulya, huna ugangila ajile u kuli Yesu.
41010051	U Yesu umuja alihaya, "Utogilwe nakwitile ki?" Nanghwe u mboku unshokeja aling'wila, "Nangi, ka nabone!"
41010052	Huna u Yesu ung'wila, "Jaga, u kuzunya kwako kwakupijaga." Na nghana haho na haho, i likanza lyenilo wandya kubona, uja nanghwe u mu nzila alinondeela.
41011001	Bahayutumbya Yelusalemu, bubiza bashika Betifage na Betania, ku lugulu lo mizeituni, utuma babili ba bahemba bakwe.
41011002	Ubawila giki, "Jagi u mu chalo isho shili ku butongi wing'we shenisho, ulu mulashike mo, haho na haho mukubona nzobe muuga ikungilwe. Itaali kudamhilwa na munhu nuulu umo, italigulilagi muyenhe.
41011003	Ose-ose uyo alamuwile giki, 'Nibuli muliita giko?' Hayagi giki, 'Seeba ali na nimo nayo, haha yeniyi duhu akwishosha hangi aha.' "
41011004	Aho baja busanga nghana muuga ya nzobe, ikungilwe hanze ya mita, hihi n'ipanda, bandya kwitaligulila.
41011005	Bamo ba banhu abo baali bimiila haho hihi nayo bubabuja giki, "Nibuli muliyitaligulila i nzobe?"
41011006	Nabo bubashokeja git'umo wali wabawilila u Yesu, bubaleka buja.
41011007	Huna bung'wenhela u Yesu i muuga ya nzobe yeniyo, aho bishisha bituulila myenda yabo a ha ngongo, udamhila.
41011008	Banhu bingi bandya kuja balamba myenda yabo u mu nzila, bangi buyubbuta matambi mado-mado ga miti kufuma mu malaale, bagaponangija u mu nzila.
41011009	Abo baali ku butongi, na a babo bakuubijaga bandya kuhamuka balihaya, "Hosana! Akumilijiwe uyo aliza mu lina lya ng'wa Seeba.
41011010	Bukumilijiwe u butemi bo nkulugenji wise Daudi ubo buliza. Akujiwe u Mulungu wa ng'wigulu!"
41011011	Aho washika u mu Yelusalemu wingila mu hekalu, wandya kushilola-lola pyi i shikolo isho shalimo. Aliyo iki yali mhindi, ufuma winga nabo abo ikumi na babili, uja Betania.
41011012	A ha ntondo yaho, aho balifuma Betania, u Yesu wali atuubile.
41011013	Wahayuloleela ntini guli na maduutu, uliga ho kulola ulu ninga guli na matwajo gose-gose. Aliyo aho washika ho atabonile shose-shose, ulu iti maduutu duhu, nguno i likanza lya matwajo ga mitini lyali litaali u kushika.
41011014	Uguwila giki, "Kufuma lelo atiho wa kulya matwajo gako hangi nuulu na hado!" A bahemba bakwe nabo bigwa umo akahayila.
41011015	Aho bashika i Yelusalemu, u Yesu wingila u mu hekalu wandya kubapeeja abo biitilaga mo byashala ja kujinja na kugula. Ujisalingula ni meza ja bakaabanya ba hela, pye na a masumbi ga bajinja ba mhunda.
41011016	Niyo atazuniligije nuulu umo kubita u mu hekalu abuukije shikolo shose-shose sha byashala.
41011017	Ubalanga alibawila, "Itandikilwe giki, 'I numba yane ikwitanwa numba y'ilomba kulwa mahanga gose?' Ni ginehe a bing'we ng'wigalukije kubiza ipilinga lya basambo?"
41011018	Aho bigwa a bagabiji bataale na a balangi ba shilagilo bogoha, bandya kukooba nzila ya kunyagaja, nguno u bulangi bokwe bukabinha kukumya pye a banhu.
41011019	Aho yabiza mhindi, u Yesu na a bahemba bakwe buja hanze ya nzengo.
41011020	I ntondo yaho i dilu aho balibita, bugubona u ntini guumaga kwandija ng'witina.
41011021	U Petelo wizukwa, huna ung'wila u Yesu giki, "Nangi, aligulolage u ntini uyo ukaguzuma, guumaga!"
41011022	Nanghwe u Yesu ushosha ubawila, "Nzunyagi Mulungu Shiyunani shihayile: Bizagi na kuzunya kwa ng'wa Mulungu.'.
41011023	Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, munhu ose-ose uyo uluwila nuulu lugulu git'ulu giki, 'Dubbukaga uje ukagwe mu nyanza'; ulu ati na kuhana-hana u mu ngholo yakwe, aliyo ubiza na kusanya giki, uyo aliguhaya gukubiza ho, nghana akushikiligijiwa.
41011024	Huna luulu nalimuwila giki, shose-shose isho mukukooba mu nzila ya kulomba, sanyagi giki, ng'wanukulaga; na nghana shikubiza shing'we.
41011025	Niyo hangi ulu ng'wimiila kulomba lekejagi ulu muli na mhayo na munhu ose-ose. Ulu ng'wita giko ning'we akumulekeja u busobya wing'we u Sing'we uyo ali ng'wigulu. [
41011026	Aliyo ulu mutudula u kulekeja, ning'we atumulekeja u busobya wing'we u Sing'we uyo ali ng'wigulu.]"
41011027	Huna bushikiila hangi u mu Yelusalemu, aho alishimiza-shimiza mu hekalu, kwimanila bansanga bagabiji bataale na balangi ba shilagilo, hamo na banamhala.
41011028	Bumuja giki, "Bebe, iyo ukwiyitaga yeniyi, ukwiyitaga mu budula ki? Niyo hangi nani uyo wakwinhile u budula bo kwita giko?"
41011029	Nanghwe u Yesu ubawila giki, "Nane namubuje mhayo gumo, ulu mulanishokeje nu nene nakumuwila i yeniyi nakwiyitaga mu budula ki.
41011030	U bubatiija bo ng'wa Yohana boli bufumile ng'wigulu nuulu ku banhu? Nishokejagi!"
41011031	Bandya kwilunjalunja baliwila giki, "Ulu tulahaye boli bufumile ng'wigulu, akutubuja, 'Nibuli luulu mutizunije i mihayo yakwe?'
41011032	Hamo tuhaye giki, 'Boli bufumile ku banhu?' " Ni chene bogoha u kuhaya, nguno pye a banhu baali bamanile giki, u Yohana wali nghangi.
41011033	Huna bukalila kunshokeja duhu u Yesu giki, "Tutamanile!" Nanghwe ubawila, "Nu nene natumuwilaga i yeniyi nakwiyitaga mu budula ki!"
41012001	Huna wandya kubasomboolela lusumo alihaya giki, "Munhu akalima ngunda, uguhamba mizabibu, huna ugupindilija ngitili, usimba mo n'ikamilo lya divai. Ulola uzenga mo na numba ya balanghani, ha numa ugutuula mu makono ga balimi, u wei winga ho.
41012002	U ng'wikanza lya matwajo utuma nsese wakwe, giki aje u ku balimi benabo, bakang'winhe matwajo kufuma u mu ngunda.
41012003	Aliyo a balimi benabo buukandima buntulagula milangha, buneka uja makono dalali.
41012004	U ng'wenekili ngunda utuma nsese ungi, lelo u ng'wene bumelagula nguma, niyo bung'witila ya minala kibi no!
41012005	Utuma ungi hangi, u ng'wene bushikila kumulaga! Akatuma na bangi bingi duhu; bamo babo buukatulagulwa, bangi bubulagwa!
41012006	Wali ataali nanghwe umo; ng'wana wakwe ntogwa, nose u ku nghalilo yaho untuma ng'wenuyo, u kunu akwiwilaga giki, 'Bakunkuja u ng'wana wane!'
41012007	Aliyo a balimi benabo biwila giki, 'Uyu angu hu ng'wene u ng'wingiji gete, tumulagagi bubize wise u wingiji!'
41012008	Na nghana bundima, bumulaga, buukamponya hanze ya ngunda!"
41012009	"I gisi luulu, u ng'wenekili ngunda akwita mhayo ki? Tuhaya akwiza abakenaagule a balimi benabo, nu ngunda ugutuula mu makono ga balimi bangi!
41012010	A bing'we mutaali u kushisoma i shandikwa isho shihayile giki, 'I liwe ilo bakalilema bazengi h'ilo lyabizile lya kwigoloolela i numba
41012011	U mhayo gwenuyu gufumile kuli Seeba, niyo guli gwawiza no u mu miso gise?' "
41012012	Bakadeeba giki, u lusumo lwenulo akaluhaya kulwa nguno yabo, huna luulu bandya kukooba nzila ya kundima, kwike bubogoha a banhu binga ho, buneka.
41012013	Ha numa ya yeniyo, buntumila Bafalisayo balebe, hamo na ban'ikulu ba ng'wa Helode, giki bakangwashe mu kalungalungile.
41012014	Bahayushika bung'wila, "Nangi, tumanile giki u bebe ukashimizilaga mu nghana, nguno utibeelejaga kuli munhu ose-ose giki unyeje; na hangi utadililaga banhu mu kulola bushu wabo, aliyo u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu ukagulangaga mu nghana. Angu, izuniligije u kung'winha goodi u Kaisali nuulu yaya? Twikale tutoba i goodi nuulu tooye?"
41012015	Aliyo iki wali abumanile u wibeeleja wabo, ubawila giki, "Nibuli mulinigema? Nenhelagi aha hela imo nilole."
41012016	Bung'wenhela; hanuma ubabuja, "I suso iyi nu wandike wenubu, sha ng'wa nani?" Bunshokeja, "Sha ng'wa Kaisali."
41012017	Huna luulu u Yesu ubawila, "I sha ng'wa Kaisali ng'winhagi Kaisali, ni sha ng'wa Mulungu ng'winhagi Mulungu." Bakankumya no!
41012018	Huna Basadukayo, abo bahayile giki butiho bujuuko, bunsanga kumuja; buhaya,
41012019	"Nangi, u Musa atwandikilile giki, ulu ndugu uzumalika uneka nke aliyo atalekile ng'wana, ng'wanong'wawe akung'wingila u nkima ng'wenuyo, amyalile baana u nduguye.
41012020	Ali luulu, baaliho bagosha mpungati ba shikulu na shizuna. U tang@i wabo akatoola, aliyo ucha atalekile bubyile.
41012021	U wa kabili ung'wingila u nkima ng'wenuyo, nanghwe ucha atalekile bubyile, nu wa kadatu giko duhu.
41012022	Kushisha bushila pye a bose mpungati; batalekile bubyile. Aho bakalika, nose nu nkima ucha!
41012023	I gisi luulu, u ng'wikanza lya bujuuko, ulu bujuuka, akubiza nke o ng'wa nani, iki pye a bose mpungati baali bantoola?"
41012024	U Yesu ubawila, "A bing'we ahene mutuhubilaga kulwa kubiza mutashimanile i shandikwa nu budula bo ng'wa Mulungu?
41012025	Nguno ulu bujuuka kufuma mu bafu batubiza ba kuyutoola nuulu kutoolwa, bakubiza giti bamalaika ba ng'wigulu.
41012026	Niyo u mhayo gwa bafu gwenuyu giki bakujuuka, mutaali u kusoma u mu shitabo sha ng'wa Musa, umo Mulungu akang'wilila aho wali h'isaka; i giki, 'U nene nali Mulungu wa ng'wa Abulahamu, na Mulungu wa ng'wa Isaka, na Mulungu wa ng'wa Yakobo?'
41012027	Mulihubila hataale no, nguno u wei ati Mulungu wa bafu, ali Mulungu wa bapanga."
41012028	Umo wa balangi ba shilagilo akiza, ubigwa baliyomba nanghwe, ubona giki u Yesu wabashokeja umo ili. Huna umuja giki, "I shilagilo i shitaale kutinda shose ni shili kinehe?"
41012029	Nanghwe u Yesu unshokeja giki, "I shilagilo i shitaale shene shiishi, 'Igwaga Isilaeli, u Seeba Mulungu wise ali Seeba umo wike,
41012030	huna luulu, ntogagwe u Seeba Mulungu wako na ngholo yako yose, na bupanga wako bose, na maganiko gako gose, na nguzu jako jose.'
41012031	I sha kabili nasho shiishi, 'Ntogagwe nzenganwa ng'wiyo git'umo witogelilwe bebe ng'wenekili.' Shitiho shilagilo shingi sha kushiheeba i shenishi."
41012032	U nangi wa shilagilo ng'wenuyo, ung'wila, "Watungilija Nangi, wahaya gwa nghana i giki u Mulungu ali umo wike, niyo atiho ungi ulu ati we wike.
41012033	Na nghana u munhu shiigelile antogwe na ngholo yose, na maganiko gose, na nguzu jose, hangi shiigelile antogwe nu nzenganwa ng'wiye git'umo itogelilwe wei ng'wenekili. U gwenuyu guli gwawiza kutinda kufunya manongho nuulu shitambo sha mbika yose-yose."
41012034	U Yesu aho wamona washosha na witegeleja ung'wila giki, "U bebe uti kule nabo u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu." Atigelile hangi ungi wa kugima kumuja mhayo nuulu na hado yaya.
41012035	Huna u Yesu aho alilanga mu hekalu, ubabuja uhaya giki, "Nibuli a balangi ba shilagilo bakahayaga giki u Kilisto ng'wana o ng'wa Daudi?
41012036	U Daudi ng'wenekili akatongeelwa na Moyo Ng'wela kuhaya giki, 'U Seeba akang'wila u Seeba wane, Igashaga ku nkono gwane gwa bulyo kushisha nabatuule a banishi bako ha silili ya mhambala jako.'
41012037	U Daudi ng'wenekili alinghaya giki Seeba, nose adugije kubiza ng'wana wakwe hangi mu ginehe?" I libita lya banhu lyandegelekaga na buyegi no.
41012038	U Yesu aho alibalanga akabawila na giki, "Bilanghanagi a balangi ba shilagilo, abo batogilwe kugishiwa na kuja buyeela mu magulilu bazwalile nghanjo.
41012039	Nu mu masinagogi batogilwe kwigasija masumbi g'ikujo, hama nuulu bulaalikwa kuja ku shigukulu, nu kwene bakakuubilijaga ha magele ga bakujiwa.
41012040	Hangi bakalyaga sabo ja bakima bachilwa, banhu ba kalombele kalihu kulwa kwiyoolecha. A benabo bakupandika nsango ntaale kutinda!"
41012041	Huna u Yesu wigasha alolelile h'ibikilo lya sabo, ayugalola a mabita ga banhu batuulaga manongho gabo u ng'wibikilo lya sabo, a basabi batuulaga mo shingi.
41012042	Kuhayimanila wiza na nkima nchilwa, niyo nghabi; nanghwe utuula mo hela jakwe ibili.
41012043	Huna u Yesu ubitana a bahemba bakwe ubawila, "Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, u nkima u nchilwa na nghabi ng'wenuyu watuula shingi u ng'wibikilo lya sabo, kutinda pye abo batuulaga mo.
41012044	Nguno pye a bangi balituula kufuma mu bushiigo bo sabo jabo, lelo u nkima ng'wenuyu nuulu iki ali na makoye, aliyo nahene watuula mo pyi isho wali nasho; pye gete i shiigunaanilo sha mu bupanga bokwe."
41013001	Huna ufuma u mu hekalu, aho alija, umo wa bahemba bakwe ung'wila giki, "Nangi, uligabona umo gali a mawe genaya na a manumba aya!"
41013002	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila giki, "Uligabona umo gali u butaale a manumba genaya? Litiho iwe a henaha ilo likulekwa higulya y'iwe lichalyo, ilo lituholomolelwa ha si!"
41013003	Huna uukigasha mu lugulu lo mizeituni, ulolela u ku hekalu, ba Petelo na Yakobo hamo na Yohana na Andelea baali nanghwe boi duhu; bumuja balihaya,
41013004	"Alituwilage, i yeniyi ikubiza ho nanali, na hangi shikubiza ho shimanikijo ki ulu yegeela kushikiila pyi i yose?"
41013005	Huna luulu u Yesu ubawila giki, "Ilanghanagi, munhu ose-ose atizumulemba-lemba.
41013006	Nguno bingi bakuyiza mu lina lyane balihaya giki, 'U nene hu nali ng'wene!' Niyo bakuhubya banhu bingi no.
41013007	Hama ulu ng'wandya kwigwa mabulugu na nghulu ja mabulugu, yaya u kufung'wa ngholo, nguno i yeniyo shiigelile ibize ho; aliyo i ngelelo ikubiza itaali u kushika.
41013008	Nguno bukubiza ho wiyubukiji ha gati y'ihanga n'ihanga, na butemi ku butemi. Jikuyudinghima nyahinga, na kwilonga nzala mu mapandi mingi. I yeniyi ili giti wandijo duhu wa kulung'wa busungu."
41013009	"Kwike a bing'we ilanghanagi, nguno bakuyumutwala ku mabanza, hangi mukuyutulilwa na mu masinagogi. Mukubita na kushishiwa ku butongi bo basugi na batemi kulwa nguno yane, bubize ho bukaaniji kubo.
41013010	I Nghulu Jawiza shiigelile jilomeelwe tame hose pyi u mu mahanga.
41013011	Ulu bamudima kumutwala, yaya u kwandya kwiganika-ganika umo mulasomboolele, aliyo gose-gose uyo ng'winhwa u ng'wikanza lyenilo guhayagi. Nguno mutubiza mukuhayaga bing'we; u ng'wenuyo Moyo Ng'wela.
41013012	Munhu akunodeela kubulagwa nuulu ng'wanong'wawe, nu namhala akunodeela nuulu ng'witunja wakwe. Hama a baana bakuyubatalukila a babyaji babo bababulaga!
41013013	Niyo pye a banhu bakumukolwa kulwa nguno ya lina lyane; aliyo uyo wiyumilija kushisha ku ngelelo akupila."
41013014	"Huna luulu ulu ng'ushibona i sha malofu i shikenaaguji shimiila h'ipandi ilo shitigeleelilwe, (uyo alisoma ni itegelejage), a henaho abo bali mu si ya Buyudaya, ni bapeelelage ku ngulu.
41013015	Uyo usangwa ali kwigulya ya numba atizika, giki ingile mu kaya yakwe kusola shose-shose kufuma moi.
41013016	Nu yuyo ali ku malaale atizushoka ku numa, kusola shizwalo shakwe.
41013017	U mu shiku jenijo, bakubiza mu makoye mataale no abo bakusangwa bali nda, na a babo bakubiza bakonhyaga.
41013018	Lombagi u mhayo gwenuyo gutizubiza mu shiku ja mbeho ya mu shiyaga.
41013019	Nguno u mu shiku jenijo, bukubiza ho buluhi butaale no, ubo butaali kwilonga kufuma ha wandijo wa buseemi aho Mulungu akaseema, kushisha haha, na butalabiza ho hangi na hado yaya!
41013020	Niyo ulu ni iti kugehiwa na Seeba i shiku jenijo, atiho wa kupila nuulu umo. Aliyo i shiku jenijo, ajigehije kulwa nguno ya basolwa, abo abasolile."
41013021	"Huna luulu ulu munhu ose-ose umuwila giki, 'Lolagi uuy'aha u Kilisto,' nuulu giki, 'Lolagi uko,' yaya u kuzunya.
41013022	Nguno bakwilonga bakilisto balomolomo, na bahangi balomolomo; niyo bakuyoolecha maleeba na mihayo ya kukamaaja, giki ulu yudulika, babahumbuule na a basolwa.
41013023	Huna luulu chagukagi, u nene namuwilaga pyi i yose kuko itaali kwilonga."
41013024	"Aliyo u mu shiku jenijo ulu bubita u buluhi wenubo, i liimi likwitilwa giiti, nu ng'weji gukoya ukufunya u bupe wago.
41013025	Ni sonda jikuyumodoka kufuma u kwilunde, nu budula bo ng'wigulu bukutinginyiwa.
41013026	Huna bakumona u Ng'wana wa Munhu ali mu malunde, aliza na budula butaale n'ikujo.
41013027	Ha numa ya henaho akutuma bamalaika baje hose-hose u mu si bakubabilingaga a basolwa bakwe, kufuma wandijo wa si kushisha ku bugelelo w'igulu."
41013028	"I haha u mhayo gwenuyu gwilangilagi ku ntini. A matambi ga nti gwenuyo ulu gandya kusonga na kufuluma maduutu managana, mukamanaga giki gwegeelaga u ng'waka.
41013029	Ni mihayo yeniyi ili giko. Ulu ng'ubona yandya kwilonga managi giki, ali hihi, nuwe wegeelaga ali ha nyango.
41013030	Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, i shibyalilwe ishi shitubita aho itaali kushikiila pyi i yose iyi.
41013031	I ligulu ni si shikubita, aliyo i mihayo yane itiko kujimiila na hado yaya!"
41013032	"Kwike atiho uyo alumanile u lushiku lwenulo, ni likanza; nuulu a bamalaika ba ng'wigulu batamanile, pyi nu Ng'wana, ulu ati Baba wike.
41013033	Ali luulu, ilanghanagi ng'wikale nzugulu-matu, nguno mutalimanile i likanza lili nanali.
41013034	Ili giti namugi kwinga ha ng'wakwe uja lugendo, wileka i kaya yakwe ililanghanwa na batumami bakwe, buli ng'wene ung'winha nimo gokwe. U nanghani o ha mita unkomeleja kwikala nzugulu-matu!
41013035	Huna luulu ikalagi nzugulu-matu, nguno mutamanile aho alizile u ng'wenekili kaya. Adugije kudila, hamo wiza bujiku ha gati, hamo dilu mu mahila ngoko, nuulu hamo adugije kwanguha.
41013036	Langhanagi atiziza akang'wisanganija mulaalile.
41013037	Iyo nalimuwila bing'we hu nalibawila pye a bose, ikalagi nzugulu-matu!"
41014001	Aho jasaaga shiku ibili ishike pasaka na shigukulu sha migati iti na shibimbya, a bagabiji bataale na a balangi ba shilagilo, bandya kukooba nzila ya kundima u Yesu mu nyasala-sala bamulage.
41014002	Aliyo bakiwila giki, "Yaya u ng'wikanza lya shigukulu, batiziita nsambo a banhu."
41014003	Aho ali Betania akigasha kulya shiliwa mu numba ya ng'wa Simoni, munhu wa mbiji. Kuhayimanila wiza nkima abuukije jubba ya alabasta, yali na maguta ga mpango ntaale ga nalido. Ushika wibela, ung'witiila u Yesu ku ntwe a maguta genayo.
41014004	Bamo busaaya no, bandya kung'ung'uula balihaya, "Al'u bukenaaguji bo maguta ubu nabo bofuma he hangi?
41014005	Nguno a maguta genaya gaali gashikile kujinjiwa, jilonga denali ja kukila ha magana adatu, bugabanhyiwa bahabi!" Akabapelanya no u nkima ng'wenuyo.
41014006	Aliyo u Yesu ubawila giki, "Nekagi u mayu ng'wenuyu, nibuli mulinkoya? U nimo uyo wanibeegeja nene gwenuyu gwawiza.
41014007	Nguno a bahabi a bene muli nabo gwa-gwa-gwa, ikanza lyose-lyose mudugije kubiitila i yawiza ulu ng'utogwa, aliyo u nene natubiza hamo ning'we shiku jose.
41014008	U wei wagwita uyo agudugije, wagubila maguta u mili gone kulwa ikanza lya kujikwa.
41014009	Niyo nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, hose-hose u mu si uko jikulomeelwa i Nghulu Jawiza, nu mhayo uyo wagwita gwenuyu gukuhayiwa kulwa kung'wizukwa."
41014010	Huna u Yuda Isikaliote, uyo wali umo wa babo ikumi na babili, uja ku bagabiji bataale, uukabawila umo alaboolekegeje bandime u Yesu.
41014011	Aho bigwa buyega no, bung'wisagija kung'winha hela nuulu: shipande sha feza.'. Huna wandya kukooba ng'wanya gwa kuboolekeja balandime.
41014012	A ha lushiku lo kwandya lo migati iti na shibimbya, ulo lwali lwa kusinzwa shitambo sha pasaka, a bahemba bakwe bakamuja giki, "Utogilwe kwiliila hali i pasaka tuje tukilonja-lonje?"
41014013	Huna ubatuma babili ba bahemba bakwe; ubawila giki, "Jagi u mu nzengo, ulu mulashike mo mukumona ngosha aseselile shisaabo sha minzi, nondeelagi.
41014014	Aho alakingile, mukushika mung'wile u ng'wenekili kaya, 'U Nangi alibuja giki: Shili hali i chumba shane umo nakuliila pasaka hamo na bahemba bane?'
41014015	Akung'oolekeja ku golofa, shiliko chumba shitaale shigolanije nghana-nghana, tulonja-longejagi ng'wenumo."
41014016	A bahemba benabo aho baja u mu nzengo busanga git'umo akabawilila, nghana bilonja-lonja i pasaka.
41014017	Yahayubiza mhindi, wiza nabo abo ikumi na babili,
41014018	ushika wigasha hamo nabo. Aho bandya kulya, u Yesu uhaya, "Nalimuwila go nghana giki, a bing'we abo mulilya hamo nane, umo wing'we akunilodeela !"
41014019	Bakapinihala no buyumuja; buli ng'wene wahaya, "Hamo nene?"
41014020	Nanghwe u Yesu uhaya, "Umo wing'we abo ikumi na babili, niyo alikoja nanghwe i nhonge jakwe umo nalikoja u nene!
41014021	U Ng'wana wa Munhu ajile git'umo andikililwe, aliyo ali mu kwihiga kutaale no u munhu uyo alinodeela u Ng'wana wa Munhu. Yali hambu-hambu u munhu ng'wenuyo ulu ni oli atabyalilwe!"
41014022	Huna luulu aho balilya, usola ngati. Ulumba huna ugumeganya, ubinha kunu alihaya giki, "Anukulagi mulye, u gwenuyu mili gwane."
41014023	Usola na shikombe, aho wamala kulumba ubinha bushing'wela pye a bose.
41014024	Huna ubawila giki, "A genaya gene mininga gane g'ilagane, ayo galidika kulwa nguno ya banhu bingi.
41014025	Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, natalang'wa hangi sha kufuma mu matwajo ga nzabibu na hado yaya kushisha mu lushiku lo kung'wa shipya mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu."
41014026	Aho bamala bimba lyimbo, huna bufuma hanze buja ku lugulu lo mizeituni.
41014027	Huna u Yesu ubawila giki, "Pye a bose mukunipeela, nguno gwandikilwe giki, 'Nakuntula u ndiimi, jibbalasane i ngholo!'
41014028	Kwike ulu najuuka, nakutonga kuja Galilaya, namutange u kushika ko."
41014029	Aliyo u Petelo ung'wila giki, "Nuulu bakakuleka pye a bangi, u nene ng'wene ngilo !"
41014030	U Yesu ung'wila, "Nalikuwila gwa nghana giki, u bujiku wenubu, aho nghungulume itaali kwishokeela kuhila, u bebe ukubiza onilemaga nghangala idatu!"
41014031	Aliyo u Petelo ongeja kuhaya giki, "U nene nuulu yunigeleelwa kucha nangho, natiko u kukulema!" Na a bangi pye buhaya giko.
41014032	Aho bashika h'ipandi litanagwa Getisemani, u Yesu ubawila a bahemba bakwe giki, "Igashagi aha, u nene nakalombe."
41014033	Huna ubasola ba Petelo na Yakobo na Yohana, ugwilwa bupina budito buminya no.
41014034	Ubawila giki, "I ngholo yane ili na bupina budito no bo kushisha mu kucha. Lembeelagi henaha ng'wikale miso."
41014035	Uja ha butongi ho hado, uukiponeja ha si, ulomba giki ulu yudulika, i likanza lyenilo limitiile.
41014036	Uhaya, "Aba, Baba, pyi i yose idulikanile u kuli bebe, ningijage i shikombe shenishi, kwike it'umo natogelilwe nene, aliyo umo utogelilwe bebe!"
41014037	Wahayushoka aho baali, ubasanga balaalaga, ung'wila u Petelo giki, "Simoni, olaalaga? Olemeelwa u kwiyumilija kwikala miso nuulu ikanza lya sa imo duhu?
41014038	Ikalagi miso mulombe mutizingila mu kugeng'wa, nguno u moyo gukalalilwe, aliyo u mili ng'winogolelwa!"
41014039	Uja hangi uukalomba alihaya mihayo h'i yeniyo duhu.
41014040	Aho washoka ni hangi ubasanga balaalile, nguno a miso gabo gaali gadidoha; bulemeelwa nu mumo bang'wilile.
41014041	Wahayushoka hangi lukangala lo kadatu ubawila, "Ni haha mutaali mulaalile mukwigoloolaga duhu? Ng'wigejaga luulu. Lyashika i likanza, u Ng'wana wa Munhu atuulwe mu makono ga banhu ba shibi.
41014042	Buukagi tuje, angu mulibona giki wegeela u nodeeji wane!"
41014043	U Yesu aho ataali uyomba giko, kuhayimanila haho na haho washika u Yuda, uyo wali umo wa babo ikumi na babili. Wiza n'ibita lya banhu babuukije mapanga na milangha, bafumile ku bagabiji bataale na balangi ba shilagilo, na banamhala.
41014044	U nodeeji oli obinha shimanikijo; ubawila giki, "Uyo nalambipe hu ng'wene, ndimagi muntwale munkalaganile!"
41014045	U Yuda aho oshika, haho na haho ung'wegeela u Yesu kunu alihaya, "Nangi!" Huna umbipa.
41014046	Na nghana bundima na makono gabo, bunghaja!
41014047	Umo wa babo baali nu Yesu oli na lilushu, ulisopoola; ulihubenga lyubitila gutu go ntumami o ngabiji ntaale, gutinika!
41014048	Huna u Yesu ubawila a banhu benabo giki, "Ng'wiza kunidima mubuukije mapanga na milangha giti nali nsambo?
41014049	Iki ng'wali mutunidimaga a makanza ayo naludilaga nigashaga mu hekalu buli lushiku nakulangaga! Kwike leka shishikilijiwe i shandikwa!"
41014050	Huna bumpeela pye a bahemba, buneka!
41014051	Sumba nebe unkuubija igumiilile kache-mbeho, bundima nanghwe.
41014052	Kwike ubipuluka upeela; uja ali duuhu, wileka i kache-mbeho!
41014053	Huna luulu buntwala u Yesu ku ng'wa ntaale wa bagabiji. Pye a bagabiji bataale, na a banamhala na a balangi ba shilagilo baali bibilingila henaho.
41014054	Nu Petelo unkuubija ali ka kule ho, kushisha nanghwe ushika nose a ha ng'wa ntaale wa bagabiji. Wingila u mu gwalugwa, wigasha na batumami wandya koota moto, gwaligimaga!
41014055	A bagabiji bataale ni libanza i lyose, buyukooba-kooba bukaaniji, giki bapandike nzila ya kumulaga u Yesu, aliyo batapandikile.
41014056	Bakaaniji bingi balomolomo buyunkaanila, kwike u bukaaniji wabo walemaga u kulenganila.
41014057	Nose bimiila banhu balebe, bunkaanila mu kunembekeja balihaya,
41014058	"U ng'wing'wana ng'wenuyu twang'wigwile alihaya giki, 'I hekalu ya kubeejiwa na makono yeniyi nakwisambagula, ha numa ya shiku idatu nabize naazengile yingi, iyo iti ya kubeejiwa na makono!' "
41014059	Aliyo na a bene hu gumo, u bukaaniji wabo butalenganilile.
41014060	Kwimanila u ntaale wa bagabiji wimiila u ng'wibanza; umuja u Yesu, "Nibuli utushoshaga nuulu mhayo u mu yose iyo balikukaanila a benaba?"
41014061	Aliyo u Yesu akikala ahuumulile sele duhu, atashokije nuulu hado. U ntaale wa bagabiji umuja hangi alihaya giki, "U bebe, h'uli Kilisto ng'wana wakwe u nkumilijiwa?"
41014062	U Yesu uhaya, "Nali ng'wene, niyo nalimuwila giki, mukumona u Ng'wana wa Munhu igashije ku nkono gwa bulyo gwa budula, aliza na malunde ga ng'wigulu."
41014063	U ntaale wa bagabiji utandula nghanjo yakwe kunu alihaya giki, "Tutaali na nguno ki hangi nabo a bakaaniji?
41014064	Angu ng'wawigwa u bugimu bokwe! I gisi luulu mulibona ginehe?" Pye a bose bunamula giki, wigeleelagwa kucha.
41014065	Bamo babo bandya na kunswila mate, na kuyunkundikija u ku miso, bantula kunu baling'wila giki, "Manijaga!" Huna a balanghani ba hekalu bunsola, bukalinhya kuntula mapi!
41014066	U Petelo aho ali ha si u mu gwalugwa ng'wenumo, kwimanila nkima wiziila hoi; wali umo wa batumami ba ha ng'wa ntaale wa bagabiji.
41014067	Wahayumona u Petelo aloota moto unkalalila, huna ung'wila giki, "Tuhaya nu bebe walikalaga nanghwe u Yesu, u muna Nazaleti!"
41014068	Ulema no; kunu alihaya, "Bebe mayu, u nene natugumanaga uyo uliguhaya, niyo natugwitegelejaga nuulu hado!" Ufuma winga a henaho, uja ku gwalugwa ya ku butongi, (nghungulume yuhila).
41014069	U ntumami nkima ng'wenuyo umona hangi; wandya kubawila abo baali bimiila hihi henaho giki, "Nu ng'wenuyu ali umo wabo!"
41014070	Aliyo ni hangi ulema usheshanila! Aho kabita kakanza kado, nabo abo baali bimiila haho nanghwe, bung'wila giki, "I gete nghana nu bebe ng'wing'wana uli umo wabo, angu niyo nu bebe uli muna Galilaya!"
41014071	A henaho luulu wandya kuzuma na kwilahila; akuhayaga giki, "U nene nataamanile gete u munhu uyo mulikala ng'unghaya ng'wenuyo!"
41014072	Haho na haho yishokeela kuhila i nghungulume. Nanghwe u Petelo ugwizukwa u mhayo uyo Yesu wali wang'wila giki, "I nghungulume aho itaali kwishokeela kuhila, u bebe ukubiza wanilemaga nghangala idatu!" Wahayugwideedenghanya ulila!
41015001	Huna aho wela i dilu, haho na haho ligasha ibanza: baaliho bagabiji bataale na banamhala, hamo na balangi ba shilagilo, niyo lyaliho pyi i libanza i lyose; bizunilija kuntunga u Yesu. Buntongeja bantwalile kuli Pilato.
41015002	U Pilato umuja giki, "U bebe hu uli ntemi o Bayudaya?" Ushosha ung'wila giki, "H'umo ulihayila!"
41015003	A bagabiji bataale bandya kumuula mihayo mingi.
41015004	Nanghwe u Pilato umuja hangi giki, "Nibuli utushoshaga nuulu mhayo? Hu kuhaya utuyigwaga pyi iyo balikubuula?"
41015005	Aliyo u Yesu atashokije mhayo gungi gose-gose, u Pilato uyukumya duhu!
41015006	U mu shiku ja shigukulu u Pilato wali na shimile sha kubataligulila ntungwa umo, uyo bunomba.
41015007	Waliho nkenaaguji nebe, witanagwa Balaba, wali watungwa hamo na biye kulwa kwenheleja nsambo; u wei ubulaga u mu nsambo gwenuyo.
41015008	Huna luulu a banhu bung'wegeela u Pilato kunomba abiitile git'umo oli obamaniligija.
41015009	Nanghwe ubabuja giki, "Mutogilwe hamo namutaligulile u ntemi o Bayudaya?"
41015010	Nguno wali amanile giki, a bagabiji bataale baali bantuula u Yesu mu makono gakwe kulwa wilu.
41015011	Niyo a bagabiji bataale benabo baali babasoosela a banhu, giki banombe abataligulile Balaba.
41015012	Huna luulu u Pilato ubabuja hangi giki, "Mutogilwe nang'wite ginehe uyo mukung'witanaga ntemi o Bayudaya?"
41015013	Nabo buhoolanija n'ilaka lya higulya giki, "Nkomage ha nsalaba!"
41015014	U Pilato aho wababuja giki, "I gete witile bubi ki?" Bongeja kuhoolanija duhu n'ilaka lya higulya balihaya, "Nkomage ha nsalaba!"
41015015	Nose u Pilato ubona giki hambu-hambu abayeje a banhu, na luulu ubataligulila nghana u Balaba. Aho wamala kuntula mbooko u Yesu, untuula mu makono gabo, giki akakong'we ha nsalaba.
41015016	Huna a bashilikale buntwala u Yesu ng'wibindo lya numba ya h'ikulu (litanagwa plaetolio), biyitana ibita igima, bung'wihoolekela.
41015017	Bunzwalikija nghanjo ya nzulunge. Bubeeja na ngikili ya minghwa, nayo bunzwalikija u ku ntwe.
41015018	Huna bandya kungimba nyachilu, buyung'wila giki, "Kulaga uhangame ntemi o Bayudaya!"
41015019	Buyuntula na nangha u ku ntwe, kunu bakunswilaga na mate, biita bantugija mazwi kunamya!
41015020	Aho bamala u kungimba nyachilu giko, bunzuuja i nghanjo i ya nzulunge bunzwalikija i shizwalo shakwe, huna buntwala hanze kujunkoma ha nsalaba!
41015021	Munhu umo, muna Kilene, Simoni ise o ba Isikanda na Lufo, akasangwa alifuma ku ngunda, bunghadikija amuukije u nsalaba gokwe.
41015022	Huna buntwala u Yesu, buukanshisha h'ipandi likitanagwa Goligota, (makulu gaho, "Ipandi lya lupanga.")
41015023	Bung'winha divai isangije bugota bo ngazu, giki ang'we; aliyo atayanukulile.
41015024	Huna bunkoma ha nsalaba, i shizwalo shakwe bushigabanha bo kushesela mbale, babone buli ng'wene akubuucha ki!
41015025	Aho balinkoma ha nsalaba lyali ikanza lya sa idatu.
41015026	Na wandike bo kubuulwa kwakwe butuulwa ho, boli buhayile giki, "NTEMI O BAYUDAYA."
41015027	Na basambo babili bukong'wa hamo nanghwe, buli ng'wene ha nsalaba gokwe, umo ku bulyo bokwe, ungi ku lumoso. [
41015028	Shubiza shashikiila i shandikwa isho shihayile giki, "Akabalanijiwa hamo na bagomi."]
41015029	Abo babitilaga haho hihi bansondagulaga kunu bakushingishaga mitwe yabo balihaya giki, "Haho luulu ng'wing'wana o kusambagula hekalu na kumala kwizenga mu shiku idatu.
41015030	Alik'ipijage shi luulu, winge ho a ha nsalaba!"
41015031	Na a bagabiji bataale bandya kwiyineenelegeja boi bike, hamo na balangi ba shilagilo. Buyuhaya giki, "Walupijaga bangi duhu gashi niyo, u wei ng'wenekili walemeelagwa u kwipija!
41015032	Angu nanghwe Kilisto, ntemi wa Bayudaya i giko, ni ikage ho a ha nsalaba i haha, tubone tuzunye!" Na a babo baali bakong'wa hamo nanghwe nabo buyumbyeedeleja!
41015033	I liimi aho lyashika ntwe-gati, shubiza ho giiti; shikundikija pyi i si, kushisha sa kenda.
41015034	Mu sa kenda u Yesu ulila n'ilaka itaale alihaya, "Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?" U kushomelejiwa kwaho giki, "Mulungu wane, Mulungu wane, nibuli wanilekaga?"
41015035	Bamo babo abo baali bimiila henaho aho bigwa buhaya, "Bing'we, ong'witana Eliya!"
41015036	Huna umo wabo upeela kujusola ibbupyo, ulilobya mu siki ulitunga kwidete, wiza ung'winha ang'we; kunu alihaya, "Leka tulole ulu akwiza u Eliya ang'wiche!"
41015037	Aliyo u Yesu ufunya ilaka itaale, uzumalika!
41015038	Huna i lisenge lya mu hekalu lyutanduka kufuma kwigulya kushisha ha si, lyulekana habili.
41015039	U ntaale o bashilikale igana, uyo oli wimiila haho hihi, aho wabona waacha giko uhaya; "Bing'we, u munhu ng'wenuyu nghana oli Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu!"
41015040	Ka kule ho hado, baaliho bakima biloleelaga. U mu benabo baalimo ba Malia Magadalena, Salume, nu Malia u nina o ng'wa Yakobo u ndo na Yosefu.
41015041	A bakima benabo bajaga bunondeela u Yesu kungunaana aho wali Galilaya. Baaliho na bakima bangi bingi, abo baali banondeela u Yesu kwiza i Yelusalemu.
41015042	U lushiku lwenulo lwali lwa kulonja-lonja, nguno a ha ntondo yaho yali sabato. Huna luulu aho yabiza mhindi,
41015043	Yosefu, muna Alimataya utimbya ngholo, uja u kuli Pilato, uukanomba u mili go ng'wa Yesu. U munhu ng'wenuyo oli namhala w'ibanza nkujiwa, niyo nanghwe ol'abulindiilile u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu.
41015044	U Pilato akakumya aho wigwa giki u Yesu omalaga kucha. Ung'witana u ntaale o bashilikale igana uyo onanghanaga u Yesu, umuja ulu nghana omalaga kucha.
41015045	Aho wamana u kufuma u kuli munhu ng'wenuyo giki ili chene, ung'winha u Yosefu u mimba.
41015046	Huna aho wagwicha u mimba a ha nsalaba, uukagula ng'wenda gwawiza gwa kitaani, ugulingiila u mimba, ugulaaja mu shigila, shali shisimbilwe ng'wiwe git'ihalo. A ha nyango gwa shigila upilingitija ho iwe, lyuchiba.
41015047	A ba Malia Magadalena nu Malia u nina o ng'wa Yosefu, bubona aho akalaajiwa.
41016001	Aho yabita i sabato, u Malia Magadalena nu Malia u nina o ng'wa Yakobo, hamo na Salume, bugula bugota bo ng'waso nsoga, giki balaaje bakagubile u mili go ng'wa Yesu.
41016002	I dilu makingo u lushiku lo kwandya nyuma, bubuuka bajile u ku shigila. Aho lilifuma i liimi nabo balishikiila hoi.
41016003	Kwike bandya kwibuja giki, "Nani akulipilingitya i liwe, atwingije a ha nyango go shigila?"
41016004	Nguno lyali itaale no! Aliyo aho baponya a miso, bulibona i liwe lyamalaga kupilingitiwa lyinjiagwa ho.
41016005	Aho bingila u mu shigila bibakila no, bujinjimala. Nguno bakabona sumba azwalile nghanjo yape, igashije ku lwandi lo nkono gwa bulyo.
41016006	Ubawila giki, "Mutibakilage, tuhaya mulinkooba Yesu u muna Nazaleti uyo wali wakomilwe ha nsalaba! Atiho a henaha, ojuukaga. Nzugi mulole aho baali banaagije.
41016007	Huna luulu, jagi mukabawile a bahemba bakwe, pyi nu Petelo; giki watongaga kuja Galilaya, h'uko mukujumona git'umo akamuwilila!"
41016008	Aho binga a ha shigila, bandya kupeela kunu bakudetemaga, niyo babbahaga. Bulemeelwa nuulu kuwila munhu mhayo gose-gose, nguno baali bogoha no! [
41016009	Aho wajuuka u Yesu, i dilu ya lushiku lwenulo u lwa kwandya mu nyuma, uyo akang'wilongela kwandya wali Malia Magadalena, uyo wali wang'wingija masamva mpungati.
41016010	U nkima ng'wenuyo, aho oja kubawila abo bikalaga nu Yesu, ubasanga bataali mu bupina bakulilaga nghungu.
41016011	Na luulu nuulu aho bigwa giki wamonaga ali mpanga, batazunije.
41016012	Hama hangi akiita ubilongela babili babo ali mu suso yingi, a bene bashimizaga bajile ku malaale.
41016013	Nabo aho bashoka u ku bichabo bubawila, aliyo batabazuniligije.
41016014	Ha numa ya henaho ubilongela a bahemba abo ikumi na umo, bakulyaga. Ubahugula kulwa butuzunya na buganghanazu bo ngholo jabo. Nguno baali batazunije iyo bakawilwa na a babo baali batonga u kumona aho wajuuka.
41016015	Huna ubawila giki, "Jagi hose pyi u mu si, ng'ujilomeela i Nghulu Jawiza ku banhu bose.
41016016	U wa kuzunya ubatiijiwa akupila, u wa kulema akugwilwa nsango.
41016017	I shimanikijo ishi shikubiza hamo nabo a bazunya: bakuyupeeja masamva na kulungalunga mu ndimi jingi, mu lina lyane.
41016018	Bakudima nuulu nzoka na makono gabo, niyo nuulu bung'wa shikolo isho shidugije kubulaga, shitubakenaagula. Na a basaatu bakuyubatuulila makono bapila."
41016019	Huna luulu u Seeba Yesu aho wamala u kubawila, wanukulwa ng'wigulu. Wigasha ku nkono go bulyo go ng'wa Mulungu.
41016020	Aliyo a boi bandya kuja hose-hose bakulomeelaga, nanghwe u Seeba uyutumama hamo nabo, mu koolecha shimanikijo kulwa kuguguzuhya u mhayo.]
42001001	Banhu bingi bifunije kwandika busombooji bo mihayo iyo yashikilijiwe mu bise,
42001002	kulenganila nu mumo baatuwililile a batumami, abo bakujikumuchaga i Nghulu jeniji; a bambona bayo i mihayo kufuma aho ikandija.
42001003	Huna luulu baba nkujiwa Teofilo, nu nene naabonile ikubeelela nakwandikile pyi i yose mu bugaliili, nguno nigisiligije chiza mu welwa-ngholo, kufuma ha wandijo wayo.
42001004	Ikubeelela ubumane u bunghana wayo i mihayo iyo wawililwe yeniyo.
42001005	Mu shiku ja ng'wa Helode aho ali ntemi wa Buyudaya, waliho ngabiji witanagwa Zakalia, o ng'wigele lya ng'wa Abia. Oli antoolile Elizabeti, umo wa bakima ba mu luganda lo ng'wa Alooni.
42001006	A bose bubili wabo, baali batungilija u kuli Mulungu. Hangi u mu kashimizile kabo baali bashidimile pyi i shilagilo sha ng'wa Seeba; nu mu katongeelele kakwe baali bati na shisembo.
42001007	Kwike baali bati na ng'wana, nguno u Elizabeti oli ngumba, nose ugiguluha, nu Zakalia unamhaala.
42001008	Ali luulu, i ligele lya ng'wa Zakalia likapandikwa ludiima, wandya kutumama nimo gwa bugabiji ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu.
42001009	Huna usolwa bo mbale, git'umo shali shimile sha bugabiji, wingila mu hekalu ya ng'wa Seeba kuzuukija ngazu.
42001010	U ng'wikanza lya kuzuukija ngazu lyenilo, pye a banhu a bangi baali hanze bakulombaga.
42001011	Kuhayimanila wilongelwa na malaika o ng'wa Seeba; wimiila ku lwandi lo bulyo lo ng'walilo go kuzuukija ngazu.
42001012	U Zakalia aho wamona wibakila, ugwilwa booba butaale no!
42001013	Aliyo u malaika ung'wila giki, "Utogohage Zakalia, nguno u kulomba kwako kwigwiwe; u nke wako u Elizabeti akukubyalila ng'wana ngosha, i lina lyakwe ukung'wilika Yohana.
42001014	Ukuyega na kusangabala, na banhu bingi bakukuyegela u kubyalwa kwakwe,
42001015	nguno akubiza ntaale u ku butongi bo ng'wa Seeba. Akwizujiwa na Moyo Ng'wela kufuma mu nda ya ng'wa nina. Huna luulu, ati wa kung'wa divai nuulu shikoji shose-shose na hado yaya.
42001016	Baisilaeli bingi akubiita bangalukile Seeba Mulungu wabo.
42001017	Akutonga ku butongi bo ng'wa Seeba mu moyo na nguzu ja ng'wa Eliya, kwiza kugalucha ngholo ja babyaji babadilile baana babo, na bashitiigwa bagalukile witegeleja na butungilija. Hu ng'wene uyo akubeeja nimo gwa kubalonja-lonja banhu babize bamaliilile kulwa ng'wa Seeba."
42001018	U Zakalia unshokeja u malaika ung'wila giki, "Nakugumana ginehe u mhayo gwenuyu? Iki u nene nali namhala giki, nu nke one ngikulu o shiku ningi!"
42001019	U malaika unshokeja ung'wila alihaya, "U nene nali Gabulieli, nakimiilaga ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu. Natumagwa nize nahoye nangho, nakwinhe i Nghulu Jawiza jeniji.
42001020	Ali luulu iki utuyizunyaga i mihayo yane, aliyo hu shiigelile ishikilijiwe ng'wikanza lyayo, ukubiza shimuumu. Utudula u kuyomba kushisha lushiku ulo ikushikiila."
42001021	Nose a banhu abo baali hanze banindiilile u Zakalia buyukumya, nguno akadila u kufuma u mu hekalu.
42001022	Aliyo aho wafuma walemeelagwa u kuyomba, budeeba giki wali wabona sha koolechiwa u mu hekalu. Huna wandya kuyubagemeelela bo makono duhu, nguno akabiza shimuumu.
42001023	Jahayukwindanha i shiku ja butumami bokwe, uja ku ng'wakwe.
42001024	Shiku jitabitile ningi, u nke wakwe u Elizabeti ubiza nda; aho wabona giko ubiza wa kwikala wibisaga mu kaya duhu, kushisha yubita myeji itano. Nguno akahaya giki,
42001025	"Nose nane wanibona u Seeba u mu shiku iji, wanibeegeja mhayo gwa kuningija budalahwa mu banhu!"
42001026	''Mu ng'weji gwa katandatu, u malaika Gabulieli utung'wa na Mulungu kuja Galilaya, ku nzengo gwitanagwa Nazaleti;
42001027	kuli munhya nebe ng'wilindu, lina lyakwe Malia, wali alunjiwe na ngosha witanagwa Yosefu, wa luganda lwa ng'wa Daudi.
42001028	U malaika aho washika ungisha; huna ung'wila giki, "Yegaga u bebe nguno wilukilagwa mbango; u Seeba ali hamo nangho!"
42001029	U munhya ng'wenuyo uzwangana, wandya k''wiganika akwibujaga giki, "U bugishiwa wenubu buli na makulu ki!"
42001030	U malaika ung'wila, "Utogohage Malia, nguno wilukilagwa mbango ja ng'wa Mulungu.
42001031	Ukubuucha nda ubyale ng'wana ngosha, ung'wilike i lina lyakwe Yesu.
42001032	Akubiza ntaale, nguno akwitanwa Ng'wana wakwe uyo ali higulya no. U Seeba Mulungu akung'winha i lisumbi lya nkulugenji wakwe Daudi.
42001033	Akubiza nsugi wa numba ya ng'wa Yakobo welelo na welelo, niyo u butemi bokwe buti bo kushila ho."
42001034	U Malia unshokeja u malaika giki, "U mhayo gwenuyu gukudulikana ginehe, iki u nene nataali kutoolwa?"
42001035	U malaika unshokeja ung'wila giki, "Moyo Ng'wela akukwikiila, huna u budula bokwe uyo ali higulya no bukukukundikija. Na luulu uyo alabyalwe akubiza Ng'wela, Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu.
42001036	Nu'' nduguyo u Elizabeti'', nanghwe ali nda ya ng'wana ngosha mu bugikulu bokwe; munhu uyo wali amanikile giki ngumba. Niyo u gwenuyu ng'weji gokwe go katandatu.
42001037	Nguno gutiho mhayo nuulu gumo, uyo gutadulikanile u kuli Mulungu."
