42001038	Huna u Malia uhaya, "U nene nali nkima nsese o ng'wa Seeba; ni gushikiilage git'umo waniwilila." Huna u malaika winga ho, uneka.
42001039	U mu shiku jenijo u Malia atadilile, ubuuka wangu uja ku si ya Buyudaya, ku nzengo gumo gwa ku magulya ga kwenuko.
42001040	Wahayushika ko wingila u mu ng'wa Zakalia kungisha u Elizabeti.
42001041	U Elizabeti aho waliigwa i lilaka lya kugisha kwa ng'wa Malia, ubina u ng'wana uyo oli mu nda yakwe, huna okajiwa na Moyo Ng'wela.
42001042	Uhamuka n'ilaka lya higulya alihaya giki, "U bebe ufuuhilwe mbango kutinda pye a bakima. Nu ng'wana uyo ali mu nda yako nanghwe afuuhilwe mbango.
42001043	Wilukilwa ki nabo ubu, giki u nina wa ng'wa Seeba wane wiza kunigisha u nene!
42001044	Nguno i lilaka lya kugisha kwako aho lyashika duhu u mu matu gane, haho na haho obina na buyegi u ng'wana uyo ali mu nda yane!
42001045	Niyo ali na mbango u wa kuzunya giki ikushikilijiwa iyo wawililwe kufuma kuli Seeba."
42001046	Huna u Malia uhaya giki, "I ngholo yane ilinyegela Seeba,
42001047	nu moyo gwane gulinkumilija Mulungu, Mpija wane.
42001048	Nguno wabubonile u budalahwa wa nsese wakwe nkima, iki kufuma haha pyi i shibyalilwe, shikunibala giki nali nfuuhwa.
42001049	Nguno u wa budula wanibeegegije mitaale; lina lyakwe lili lyeela.
42001050	Shigongo shakwe shiliho kulwa, shibyalilwe na shibyalilwe sha banhu abo bang'ogohile we.
42001051	Iyo wabeegije na makono gakwe ili mitaale, wababbalasanije abo bakigunguhyaga mu maganiko ga ngholo jabo.
42001052	Wabingije batemi ha masumbi, ubagunguhya a bidohya.
42001053	A batuubile wabigutije shizeeze, lelo a basabi ubapeeja makono dalali.
42001054	Wangunaanile u ntumami wakwe u Isilaeli, kulwa kwizukwa shigongo shakwe;
42001055	git'umo kuli kwisagija kwakwe ku bakulugenji bise; kwandija kuli Abulahamu na bubyile wakwe, kushisha welelo na welelo."
42001056	U Malia akalenda nu Elizabeti ikanza lya myeji giti idatu, huna ushoka kaya.
42001057	Aho lyashika i likanza lya kubyala kwa ng'wa Elizabeti, ubyala ng'wana ngosha.
42001058	A bazenganwa biye na a baduguye aho bigwa, bakayega no hamo nanghwe na kunkumilija Seeba, kulwa kunchila shigongo.
42001059	Aho lwashika lushiku lo kanaane, buntwala u ng'wana kujusaalwa. Buhaya kung'winha i lina lya ng'wa ise Zakalia.
42001060	Aliyo u nina ulema uhaya, "Yaya; akwitanwa Yohana."
42001061	Nabo bunshokeja baling'wila: "Hama iki atiho nuulu umo uyo akitanagwa lina lyenilo u mu luganda lwako!"
42001062	Huna bumuja u ise o ng'wana, bo kungemeelela na makono, i lina ilo wali atogilwe kung'witana.
42001063	Ubalomba lubbawa lo kwandikila; wandika giki, "Akwitanwa Yohana." Bukumya pye.
42001064	Haho na haho utungulilwa; u nomo gokwe nu lulimi shudula u kuyomba, wandya kunkumilija Mulungu!
42001065	Pye a bazenganwa bugwilwa idedebaja; niyo pye a banhu u mu magunguli ga Buyudaya buyikala bakwihoyelaga i mihayo yeniyo.
42001066	Buli bene ulu biyigwa bituulaga mu moyo, pyi buyuhaya, "I gete u ng'wana ng'wenuyu akubiza wa mbika ki?" Nguno u nkono go ng'wa Seeba gwali hamo nanghwe!
42001067	Huna u Zakalia, u ise o ng'wana, okajiwa nguzu ja ng'wa Moyo Ng'wela, wandya kuhanga alihaya,
42001068	"Akumilijiwe u Seeba Mulungu wa Baisilaeli. Nguno watugenihile, wenhile butungulwa ku banhu bakwe.
42001069	Watubuukigije mhembe ya bupiji, kufuma mu numba ya ntumami wakwe Daudi.
42001070	H'umo wahayila kwingiila kale na kale, kubitila mu milomo ya bahangi bakwe beela.
42001071	Giki tupile kufuma mu makono ga banishi bise; mu makono ga bose abo batukolilwe.
42001072	Wabakulililwe a bakulugenji bise, hangi walizukilwe i lilagane lyakwe i lyeela.
42001073	U wilahiji ubo akang'wilahilila nkulugenji wise Abulahamu, giki akutwitila,
42001074	kutupija kwinga mu nkono go ng'wanishi, tudule kuntumamila we tuti na booba;
42001075	mu wela na mu butungilija shiku jise jose.
42001076	U bebe nangho ng'wana, ukwitanwa uli nghangi wakwe uyo ali higulya no; nguno ukubiza ku butongi bo ng'wa Seeba, umeeja-beegeje nzila yakwe.
42001077	A banhu bakwe ubamanikije bupiji, kulwa kulekejiwa kwa shibi shabo.
42001078	U Mulungu wise watusaatilwe na kutuchila shigongo; Isana lyutugeniha kufuma kwigulya,
42001079	kulwa kubaakila abo bakwikalaga mu giiti, na mu nengeeji gwa lufu; na kutongeela mhambala jise mu nzila ya mhola."
42001080	Huna luulu u ng'wana ukula, ubiza na nguzu ja moyo. Uja ku matogolo uukikala kwenuko, kushisha lyushika i likanza lya koolechiwa kwakwe ku Baisilaeli.
42002001	U mu shiku jenijo shikafunyiwa shilagilo na Kaisali Augusto, giki pye a banhu u mu si bandikwe.
42002002	U wenubo bukabiza wandikwa bo kwandya aho Kilenio ali nsugi wa Sulia.
42002003	Huna luulu pye a banhu buja kwandikwa, buli ng'wene ku nzengo go ng'wawe.
42002004	U Yosefu nanghwe ubuuka i Galilaya, kufuma mu nzengo gwa Nazaleti. Ulinha kuja Buyudaya ku nzengo go ng'wa Daudi, gwitanagwa Betelehemu, nguno wali wa numba ya ng'wa Daudi na bubyile bokwe.
42002005	Uja akandikwe hamo nu Malia uyo wali anungije, u mu shiku jenijo u Malia usangwa ali nda nhaale.
42002006	Aho bali kwenuko lyushikiila i likanza lyakwe lya kubyala.
42002007	Ubyala ng'wana ngosha; tang@i wakwe. Unkumba myenda ya sheleele, huna unaalikija ng'wiliilo lya mitugo, nguno bakagayiwa u ng'wanya u mu numba ya bageni.
42002008	I mhandi jenijo baaliho badiimi ba ngholo baali lugundiiga; baali ku matogolo bakulanghanaga madale ga ngholo jabo makanza ga bujiku.
42002009	Bahayimanila malaika o ng'wa Seeba obilongela, bupindiwa na bupe w'ikujo lya ng'wa Seeba, bogoha na kogohele kataale no!
42002010	Aliyo u malaika ubawila giki, "Mutogohage, nguno nang'wenhela Nghulu Jawiza, ijo jikubiza ja buyegi butaale ku banhu bose.
42002011	I lelo yeniyi, u mu nzengo go ng'wa Daudi ng'wabyalilagwa Mpija, Kilisto Seeba.
42002012	I shimanikijo shing'we shili giki, mukumona Ng'wana ng'weleele alingiililwe myenda ya sheleele, alaajiwe ng'wiliilo lya mitugo!"
42002013	Kuhayimanila lilonga ibita itaale lya ng'wigulu, nu malaika ng'wenuyo wisanja nabo. Bunkumilija Mulungu balihaya giki,
42002014	"Ikujo libize kuli Mulungu higulya no, nu mu si ibize ho mhola u ku banhu abo banyegije."
42002015	A bamalaika aho binga baja ng'wigulu, a badiimi benabo biwila giki, "Tujagi i Betelehemu tukagubone u mhayo uyo gwilongaga gwenuyu, uyo watoolekeja u Seeba."
42002016	Nghana bihuuta bajile ko, buukansanga u Malia nu Yosefu, hamo nu Ng'wana alaalile ng'wiliilo lya mitugo.
42002017	Aho bamona u Ng'wana bisomboola i mihayo yakwe, git'umo baali bawililwa.
42002018	Pye abo bakigwa iyo bakawilwa na a badiimi bukumya no.
42002019	Aliyo u Malia wisumbya pyi i mihayo yeniyo, wibika mu ngholo yakwe, uyuyideedenghanya.
42002020	A badiimi aho bibona pyi i yeniyo, bushoka balinkumilija Mulungu, na kungongoola. Nguno iyo baali bawilwa bakibona i yose, giki yali git'umo baali bigwila.
42002021	U Ng'wana aho washisha shiku inaane bunsaala, bung'winha i lina lyakwe i lya Yesu, ilo wali winhwa na malaika kuko ataali nuulu kutungilwa nda.
42002022	Jahayushika i shiku ja kwejiwa kwabo, buntwala Yelusalemu kujuntuula ku butongi bo ng'wa Seeba, git'umo shihayilile shilagilo sha ng'wa Musa.
42002023	H'umo yandikililwe mu shilagilo sha ng'wa Seeba, giki, "Buli ng'wana ngosha u wa kuhangula nda ya ng'wa nina, akwitanwa ali ng'wela kuli Seeba."
42002024	Bufunya na shitambo git'umo shilagilo sha ng'wa Seeba shihayilile: nghuulu ibili, nuulu nghune ibili ja mhunda.
42002025	U mu Yelusalemu walimo ngosha witanagwa Simioni, munhu ntungilija na wa logohano. Wali akulindiilile u kulungujiwa kwa Baisilaeli; nu Moyo Ng'wela wali hamo nanghwe.
42002026	Niyo u Moyo Ng'wela wali wamanikija giki, atucha aho ataali kumona Kilisto Shiyunani Kilisto: Shihebulania Masiya; lina h'i limo.' o ng'wa Seeba.
42002027	Huna u Moyo utongeela u munhu ng'wenuyo kuja ku hekalu, uukingila mo. Aho bang'wenha a babyaji bakwe u Ng'wana u Yesu, kwiza kwitilwa git'umo shali shimile sha shilagilo, u munhu ng'wenuyo
42002028	ung'wanukula u Ng'wana mu makono gakwe. Huna unkumilija Mulungu alihaya giki,
42002029	"Seeba, i haha luulu wanzunilija u nsese wako kwinga, aje mu mhola git'umo ukahayila.
42002030	Nguno a miso gane gabubona u bupiji wako,
42002031	ubo ubalonja-longegije banhu bose.
42002032	Isana lya kwakila mahanga, n'ikujo kulwa banhu bako a Baisilaeli."
42002033	U ise nu nina wa Ng'wana bakikumya iyo ikahayiwa kulwakwe.
42002034	Huna u Simioni ng'wenuyo ubafuuha mbango. U nina u Malia u ng'wene ung'wila, "Managa giki, u Ng'wana ng'wenuyu ahelelilwe nimo uyo gukwenheleja banhu bingi u mu Baisilaeli kugwa, na bangi kugungumuka; hama akubiza shimanikijo sha kwihalalijiwa.
42002035	Hangi maganiko ga ngholo ja banhu bingi gakutendwa ha ng'wape; niyo nu bebe u bupanga boko bukuching'wa lilushu!"
42002036	Waliho na nghangi nkima, Ana ng'wana Fanueli; ngikulu o shiku ningi, o luganda lo ng'wa Asheli. A ha bunhya bokwe wali watoolwa, wikala nu ngoshi ikanza lya myaka mpungati,
42002037	uchilwa! Huna wikala giko duhu atatoolilwe, kushisha myaka makumi anaane n'ine. Wali atingaga u mu hekalu, wikalaga ng'wenumo liimi ji na bujiku pe; nimo gokwe kulomba na kufunga.
42002038	Nanghwe i likanza lyenilo wiza hoi, ubawila i mihayo ya Ng'wana ng'wenuyo, pye a bana Yelusalemu abo baali balindiilile bupiji.
42002039	Aho bimala pyi i myanya git'umo shali shihayilile i shilagilo sha ng'wa Seeba, bushoka Galilaya ku nzengo gwabo gwa Nazaleti.
42002040	U Ng'wana ukula, ubiza na nguzu, na a masala ukwija, hama ni mbango ja ng'wa Mulungu jali hamo nanghwe.
42002041	Buli ng'waka a babyaji bakwe bajaga Yelusalemu, ku shigukulu sha pasaka.
42002042	Na a haho washisha myaka ikumi n'ibili, bulinha bajile ko git'umo shali shimile sha shigukulu.
42002043	Aho jang'wa i shiku ja shigukulu, bubuuka kushoka kaya. Aliyo u ndinha u Yesu usaaga Yelusalemu, kwike a babyaji bakwe baali batamanile.
42002044	Bushimiza lugendo lwa lushiku lugima, baliganika giki nanghwe alimo duhu u ng'wibita lya banhu. Bahayungayiwa, bandya kunkooba u mu badugu nu mu bimane babo.
42002045	Aho baduuma u kumona, bushoka i Yelusalemu bakunkoobaga.
42002046	Jubita shiku idatu, bahayuja ku hekalu buukansangila mo, wigashaga na balangi, alibadegeleka na kuyubabuja mabujo.
42002047	Pye abo bang'wigwaga babukumyaga u witegeleja bokwe, na a mashosho gakwe.
42002048	A babyaji bakwe aho bamona budedebala! U nina ung'wila giki, "Bebe Ng'wana, nibuli watwitilile mhayo guli giko? U nene nu so watupinihagije no, tukukukoobaga!"
42002049	Nanghwe ubashokeja ubawila, "Nibuli mulinikooba? Mutamanile giki shinigeleelilwe kubiza mu numba ya ng'wa Baba?"
42002050	Kwike batagwitegelegije u mhayo uyo akabawila gwenuyo.
42002051	Aliyo ushoka nabo, butulumenha bajile i Nazaleti, uyubigwa mu yose. U nina wibika mu ngholo yakwe pyi i yeniyi.
42002052	U Yesu ukula, ongeja u mu witegeleja, nu mu kunyeja u Mulungu, na a banhu.
42003001	Mu ng'waka gw'ikumi n'itano gwa busugi bo ng'wa Kaisali Tibelio, u nsugi wa Buyudaya wali Pontio Pilato. U ntemi wa Galilaya wali Helode, u Filipo u ng'wanong'wawe wali ntemi wa Itulea na Tulakonio; Lisania nanghwe wali ntemi wa Abilene.
42003002	U nimo gwa bugabiji butaale gwali ha silili ya ng'wa Anasi na Kayafa. U mu shiku jenijo u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu gung'wiziila Yohana, u ng'witunja o ng'wa Zakalia, u ku matogolo uko wikalaga.
42003003	Wandya kuja akulomeelaga pye a hose u mu si ja mbalama ya mongo gwa Yolodani. Walomeelaga ya bubatiijiwa kulwa kugaluka na kwingila mu kulekejiwa kwa shibi.
42003004	Git'umo gwandikilwe mu shitabo sha mihayo ya nghangi Isaya giki, "Ilaka lya munhu alihamuka mu matogolo, beeja-beejagi ikuuwa lya ng'wa Seeba, goloolagi nzila jakwe.
42003005	Buli longa lukufukiilwa, i ngulu jikutubijiwa, ni migunguli i yose; hama i nzila ijo jiigomagomile jikugoloolwa, ni ja magagala-gagala jikulenganijiwa.
42003006	Ha numa ya henaho pye a banhu bakububona u bupiji bo ng'wa Mulungu."
42003007	Mabita mataale ga banhu gakayiza u kuli Yohana kubatiijiwa, aliyo uyubahugula alibawila giki, "Bing'we bubyile wa shipili, nani wamuchagulile giki mugupeele u nsango uyo guliza?
42003008	Ali luulu, twajagi matwajo kulwa koolecha bukaaniji bo kugaluka kwing'we. Mutizandya kwiwila giki, 'Tuli na nkulugenji wise Abulahamu.' Nguno nalimuwila nuulu kufuma mu mawe git'aya, u Mulungu adugije kumukija baana u Abulahamu.
42003009	Niyo i haha iliho mbasa ituulilwe nghana-nghana a ha matina ga miti. Hu kuhaya buli nti uyo gututwaja matwajo gawiza, gukubbutwa, guponyiwe mu moto."
42003010	Huna a mabita ga banhu guyumuja galihaya, "I gisi luulu twite ginehe?"
42003011	Nanghwe ubashokeja ubawila giki, "Uyo ali na nghanjo ibili ang'winhe uyo ati nayo, nu yuyo ali na shiliwa iite chene."
42003012	A batobisha ba goodi nabo biza u kuli we giki ababatiije. Aho bamuja, "Nangi, al'a bise twite ginehe?"
42003013	Nanghwe ubawila, "Ng'ushikilija u kwita iyo mulagililwe, kwike yaya u kukilanija."
42003014	Na bashilikale bumuja giki, "A bise nise twite ginehe?" Nanghwe ubashokeja, "Oyagi u kubiboneela a banhu, nu kubalembekeja, niyo muyufujiwa ni mishahala ying'we."
42003015	Pye a banhu baali balindiila mu kwisagilwa, kunu bakwideedenghanyaga u mu ngholo jabo ulu giki u Yohana hu wali ng'wene u Kilisto.
42003016	Aliyo u wei ng'wenekili u Yohana akabashokeja pye a bose ubawila giki, "U nene nghana nalimubatiija na minzi, aliyo aliza uyo anikilile u budula, uyo natigeleelilwe u nene nuulu kutaligula matungijo ga shilatu shakwe; u ng'wenuyo h'uyo akumubatiija na Moyo Ng'wela na moto.
42003017	U luhungo lokwe ali nalo mu nkono gokwe wei ng'wenekili, hama u lubuuga lokwe akulupyagula alweje pe. U busiga akubukuminga chiza abutuule ng'wiluuli lyakwe; aliyo a meela akugapemba mu moto guti gwa kujima!"
42003018	Niyo akabalomeela na kubahugula a banhu mihayo mingi ya mbika na mbika.
42003019	Nu ntemi Helode unghugula kulwa nguno ya ng'wa Helodia uyo wali nke wa ng'wanong'wawe, na kulwa mihayo yingi-yingi i yabubi iyo wiyitaga.
42003020	Aliyo u Helode akamponya u Yohana mu jeela, ubiza ongeja gwabubi gungi a higulya ya mibi i yose!
42003021	Bahayubatiijiwa pye a banhu, nu Yesu ubatiijiwa; aho alilomba, kuhayimanila i ligulu lyaluguka.
42003022	Moyo Ng'wela wika ali mu mili giti gwa nghuulu izile a hali we; n'ilaka liza kufuma u ng'wigulu lilihaya giki, "U bebe uli Ng'wana wane Ntogwa, uyo nakuyegelile hataale no."
42003023	U Yesu aho alandya kutumama wali na myaka giti makumi adatu, wiganikilagwa giki oli ng'witunja o ng'wa Yosefu, uyo oli ng'wana Eli;
42003024	ng'witunja o ng'wa Matati, o ng'wa Lawi, o ng'wa Meliki, o ng'wa Yanai, o ng'wa Yosefu.
42003025	O ng'wa Matatia, o ng'wa Amosi, o ng'wa Naumu, o ng'wa Hesili, o ng'wa Nagai.
42003026	O ng'wa Maati, o ng'wa Matatia, o ng'wa Semei, o ng'wa Yosefu, o ng'wa Yuda.
42003027	O ng'wa Yonani, o ng'wa Lesa, o ng'wa Zelubabeli, o ng'wa Salatieli, o ng'wa Neli.
42003028	O ng'wa Meliki, o ng'wa Adi, o ng'wa Kosamu, o ng'wa Elimadamu, o ng'wa Eli.
42003029	O ng'wa Yoshwa, o ng'wa Eliezeli, o ng'wa Yolimu, o ng'wa Matati, o ng'wa Lawi.
42003030	O ng'wa Simioni, o ng'wa Yuda, o ng'wa Yosefu, o ng'wa Yonamu, o ng'wa Eliakimu.
42003031	O ng'wa Melea, o ng'wa Mena, o ng'wa Matata, o ng'wa Nasani, o ng'wa Daudi.
42003032	O ng'wa Yese, o ng'wa Obedi, o ng'wa Boazi, o ng'wa Salimoni, o ng'wa Naasoni.
42003033	O ng'wa Aminadabu, o ng'wa Lamu, o ng'wa Esilomu, o ng'wa Falesi, o ng'wa Yuda.
42003034	O ng'wa Yakobo, o ng'wa Isaka, o ng'wa Abulahamu, o ng'wa Tela, o ng'wa Naholi.
42003035	O ng'wa Selugi, o ng'wa Leu, o ng'wa Pelegi, o ng'wa Ebali, o ng'wa Saala.
42003036	O ng'wa Kainamu, o ng'wa Alifakisadi, o ng'wa Shemu, o ng'wa Noa, o ng'wa Lameki.
42003037	O ng'wa Matusela, o ng'wa Enoka, o ng'wa Yaleti, o ng'wa Mahalaleeli, o ng'wa Kainamu.
42003038	O ng'wa Enosi, o ng'wa Seti, o ng'wa Adamu, o ng'wa Mulungu.
42004001	Huna luulu u Yesu winga i Yolodani okajiwe na Moyo Ng'wela; h'uyo untongeela kuja ku matogolo,
42004002	uukamala ko shiku makumi ane, akugemagwa na Shetani. U mu shiku jenijo atalyile shose-shose; aho jashila utuuba.
42004003	I likanza lyenilo, u Shetani ung'wila, "Ulu uli Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu lilagilage i liwe ili libize shiliwa."
42004004	Nanghwe u Yesu unshokeja, "Yandikilwe giki, 'U munhu atudula kubiza mpanga kulwa shiliwa duhu.' "
42004005	Ha numa u Shetani untongeela kulinha kwigulya, uukang'oolekeja pye a mabusugi ga mu si ng'wikanza ido.
42004006	Huna ung'wila giki, "Nakukwinha bebe pyi u budula wenubu ni likujo lyamo, nguno namala kwinhwa nene, nadugije kung'winha ose-ose uyo nutogwa.
42004007	Na luulu u bebe ulu unilamya, shikubiza shako pye."
42004008	Nanghwe u Yesu unshokeja ung'wila, "Gwandikilwe giki, 'Namyage Seeba Mulungu wako, na untumamile wei duhu!' "
42004009	Huna untongeela kuja Yelusalemu, uukantuula higulya ya hekalu; ung'wila, "Ulu uli Ng'wana o ng'wa Mulungu iponejage ha si kufuma aha!
42004010	Nguno gwandikilwe giki, 'Akulagila bamalaika bakwe kulwako, bakulanghane.
42004011	Na bakukubuucha mu makono gabo, utizipama lupambala lwako h'iwe.' "
42004012	Nanghwe u Yesu unshokeja ung'wila, "Guhayiwe giki, 'Yaya u kungema u Seeba Mulungu wako.' "
42004013	U shetani aho wamala pyi u bugemi, uneka kakanza ho.
42004014	U Yesu ushoka i Galilaya ali mu budula bo ng'wa Moyo; u lukumo lokwe lusambaala pye a mapandi genayo.
42004015	Buyunkumilija pye a banhu ulu olanga u mu masinagogi gabo.
42004016	Nose ushika ni Nazaleti uko wali wakulila; a ha lushiku lo sabato wingila u ng'wisinagogi git'umo witilaga na kale, wimiila kusoma.
42004017	Huna winhwa shitabo sha nghangi Isaya, ushikundula ukooba ipandi aho handikilwe giki,
42004018	"U Moyo wa ng'wa Seeba ali hamo nu nene, nguno wanibilile maguta giki nabalomeele a bahabi Nghulu Jawiza. Wanitumile kubasomboolela batungwa mhola ja kulekejiwa kwabo, na a babboku kubinha kubona; kubinha kwiyagalula abo basheedekejiwe makoye.
42004019	Kulomeela ng'waka go ng'wa Seeba uyo guzunilijiwe."
42004020	Huna ushikundikija i shitabo ung'winhilija u ntumami; u wei wigasha. Pye abo baalimo u ng'wisinagogi bunkalalila.
42004021	Nanghwe ubawila, "Lelo i shandikwa ishi shashikilijiwa mudegelekile."
42004022	Pye buyunghaya chiza bakwikumyaga i mihayo iyo yafumaga u mu nomo gokwe; buyiwila giki, "Bing'we u ng'wenuyu ati ng'witunja wa ng'wa Yosefu?"
42004023	Nanghwe ubawila, "Namanile ng'wigeleelagwa na kuniwila lusumo lwa giki, 'Bebe nfumu, angu u zunzu atinunaga; al'ilagulage bebe ng'wenekili shi. Iyo twigwile giki oluyitaga Kafalanaumu, yitage nu mu nzengo gwa ng'wing'we umu!' "
42004024	Huna ubawila, "Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, atiho nghangi uyo akanukulagwa mu nzengo go ng'wawe.
42004025	Niyo nalimuwila gwa nghana giki baaliho bachilwa bingi u mu Isilaeli u mu shiku ja ng'wa Eliya, aho ilunde likalugalwa myaka idatu na myeji itandatu, yugwa nzala nhaale hose pyi u mu si.
42004026	Aliyo u Eliya atatumilwe nuulu kuli umo wabo, ulu iti kuli nchilwa o Saleputa, mu si ya Sidoni.
42004027	Hama nu mu shiku ja nghangi Elisha, baalimo bingi a ba mbiji u mu Isilaeli, aliyo ateejiwe nuulu umo wabo, ulu ati Naamani muna Sulia duhu!"
42004028	Aho biyigwa i yeniyo, pye abo baalimo u ng'wisinagogi bupelana no.
42004029	Bubuuka, bunfunya hanze ya nzengo, buja nanghwe ku lugegu lo h'ing'ongho aho goli guzengelilwe u nzengo gwabo, giki bakanshindike witaalike ha si.
42004030	Aliyo u wei ubita ha gati-gati yabo, ubingila, uja.
42004031	Huna utulumenha ajile, uukashika Kafalanaumu, nzengo gumo gwaho gwa mu Galilaya; a ha sabato ubalanga.
42004032	Buyubukumya u bulangi bokwe, nguno u mhayo gwakwe gwali na budula.
42004033	U ng'wisinagogi ng'wenumo walimo na munhu wa moyo nsoso gw'isamva; wandya kulila n'ilaka lya higulya alihaya,
42004034	"Yesu wa Nazaleti, guliho mhayo ki a ha gati yise nu bebe? Wizaga kutuyagaja? Nakumanile uli nani u bebe, uli Ng'wela wa ng'wa Mulungu!"
42004035	U Yesu ulihama alihaya, "Huumulaga, niyo unfume!" I lisamva lyungalagaja haho gati-gati, lyunfuma nghana, lyuneka litaaminije nuulu hado.
42004036	Pye bujinjimala, bandya kwiwila boi benekili na benekili giki, "Mhayo ki nago u gwenuyu hangi? Na a masamva aliyugahama bo nguzu gafuma!"
42004037	Haho na haho u lukumo lokwe lusambaala pye a hose u mu mapandi ayo gaali gabimbikanilwe nalyo i lipandi lyenilo.
42004038	Huna ubuuka winga u ng'wisinagogi uukingila mu numba ya ng'wa Simoni. Nina-bukwi wa ng'wa Simoni wali mu ndili adadililwe nswiza nkali, bung'wila u Yesu i mhola jakwe.
42004039	Ung'wegeela, wimiila hihi nanghwe, uguhama u nswiza gunekela; haho na haho ubuuka ubabeegeja shiliwa.
42004040	Aho lyayujiliila kugwa i liimi, bandya kung'wenhela pye abo baali na busaatu bo mbika na mbika. Buli ng'wene uyo ontuulilaga makono opilaga.
42004041	Banhu bingi gakayubafuma masamva kunu galilila guhaya, "U bebe uli Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu!" Kwike u wei wagahamaga, wagalemeja u kuyomba, nguno gaali gandeebile giki Kilisto.
42004042	Aho wela i dilu, ufuma uja hanhu iyene, a mabita ga banhu gandya kunkooba, nose bumpandika bunemeja atizinga akabaleka.
42004043	Nanghwe ubawila, "Shinigeleelilwe naje na ku mizengo yingi, nu kwene nakajilomeele i Nghulu Jawiza ja butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu; nguno natumilwe kulwa mhayo gwenuyu."
42004044	Huna uja akulomeelaga mu masinagogi ga mu si ya Buyudaya.
42005001	Lwise lungi u Yesu wali wimiila ha ng'walo gwa nyanza ya Genesaleti, a banhu bung'okaliila kudegeleka mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu.
42005002	Ubona mato abili gali a ha ng'walo gwa nyanza; aliyo a bategi baali bagaleka, boojaga mitego ha mhujo.
42005003	Wingila mu limo lyago, lyali lya ng'wa Simoni, ung'wila alisegeje ho hado, libize giti lyagwingila u ng'walo. Huna wigasha mo, wandya kubalanga a banhu.
42005004	Aho wamala u kulanga ung'wila u Simoni giki, "Bugaga uje ku bujiba, ukategele kwene i mitego ying'we, mukugwasha."
42005005	Nanghwe u Simoni ung'wila, "Seeba twakoyaga no bujiku pe, aliyo nduhu nuulu kugwasha shose-shose; kwike iki ulihaya, nahene naje ko nakitege i mitego."
42005006	Aho wita giko bugwasha ndilo ningi no, nose i mitego yabo yandya kutanduka!
42005007	Baali na bichabo mu lyato lingi, bubashinyela bize babambilije. Aho bashika bugokaja pyi bubili wago a mato, nose guyuhaya kutubila kulwa budito bo ndilo!
42005008	U Simoni aho wabona giko, utuja mazwi u ku butongi bo ng'wa Yesu uhaya giki, "Ingaga Seeba unileke u nene, nguno nali munhu wa shibi!"
42005009	Nguno aho bapandika ndilo ningi giko, akakumya no, pye na a bangi abo wali nabo.
42005010	Pye na a bategi biye u Simoni, a ba Yakobo nu Yohana, a bitunja ba ng'wa Zebedayo nabo bakakumya no. Huna u Yesu ung'wila u Simoni giki, "Utogohage; kufuma haha ukubiza nzubi wa banhu, kubingija mu bupanga."
42005011	Aho bagakoja ha ng'walo a mato, buleka pyi i shikolo, bunondeela wei.
42005012	Ikanza ilebe wali mu nzengo gumo gwaho, waliho ngosha umo wali watowa mbiji, aho wamona u Yesu, winama kushisha ha si; kunu aling'wikumbilija alihaya, "Seeba ulu utogwa udugije kuneeja!"
42005013	U Yesu ugoloola nkono unkuumya; kunu aling'wila giki, "Natogagwa elaga!" Haho na haho i mbiji jung'winga.
42005014	Huna unkomeleja u munhu ng'wenuyo giki atizung'wila munhu nuulu umo, aliyo ung'wila, "Jaga ukiyooleche kuli ngabiji, ukafunye na shakwinha kulwa kwejiwa kwako, git'umo Musa alagilile; bubize ho bukaaniji kubo."
42005015	U lukumo lokwe lukasambaala, buyung'okaliila banhu bingi kwiza kundegeleka, na kupijiwa ndwala jabo ja buli mbika.
42005016	Kwike u wei wisundaga waja ku mapandi gati na banhu, kujulomba iyene.
42005017	Na lushiku lungi hangi walangaga, baali bigasha ho na Bafalisayo hamo na balangi ba shilagilo, ba kufuma mu magunguli gose, a ga mu Galilaya, ni Buyudaya; pye na Yelusalemu. U budula bo ng'wa Seeba boli hamo nanghwe kulwa kupija basaatu.
42005018	Kuhayimanila bashika bagosha babuukije munhu ha shilago, wali na busaatu wa mangwisha; i nghumbu jabo jali kunshisha ha butongi bo ng'wa Yesu.
42005019	Aliyo iki a banhu baali bingi bugayiwa i nzila ya kunshisha aho wali u Yesu. Bulinha kwigulya ya numba buukagahega a malongo na a mazengo I numba ja Baisilaeli i shiku jenijo jaali ja mbika ya matembe.', huna bung'wicha ni shilago shakwe buntuula ha gati-gati ha butongi bo ng'wa Yesu.
42005020	U Yesu aho wakubona u kuzunya kwabo, uhaya, "Bahebu, olekejiagwa i shibi shako."
42005021	A balangi ba shilagilo na a Bafalisayo bandya kung'ung'uula balihaya, "U munhu ng'wenuyu ni nani i gete aguhayaga mihayo ya nyagimu giko? Nani uyo adugije kulekeja shibi ulu ati Mulungu duhu!"
42005022	U Yesu ubudeeba u bung'ung'uuji wabo, huna ushosha alibawila giki, "Nibuli mukung'ung'uulaga u mu ngholo jing'we?
42005023	I gisi, u nogu ni guli ginehe? U gwa kuhaya giki, 'Walekejiagwa i shibi shako;' nuulu hamo u gwa kuhaya giki, 'Buukaga ushimize?'
42005024	Ali luulu, shiigelile mumane giki u Ng'wana o Munhu ali nabo u budula bo kulekeja shibi u mu si." Huna ung'wila u nsaatu giki, "Nalikuwila buukaga, ushibuuche i shilago shako uje kaya."
42005025	Nghana ubuuka haho na haho mu butongi wabo, ushibuucha i shilago isho wali ashilaalilile, ugumha ajile kaya akunkumilijaga Mulungu.
42005026	Pye bugwilwa idedebaja, bogoha no; buyunkumilija Mulungu gwike, kunu bakwiwilaga giki, "Lelo twabona mihayo ya kukamaaja!"
42005027	Yahayubita i yeniyo, ufuma winga a henaho; umona ntobisha wa goodi, lina lyakwe Lawi, igashije ng'witobisijo lya goodi; ung'wila, "Nilondeelage."
42005028	Ushileka pyi i shikolo, ubuuka unondeela.
42005029	U Lawi aho washika ha ng'wakwe umeegeja shigukulu shitaale u Yesu. Lyaliho n'ibita itaale lya batobisha ba goodi na banhu bangi; nabo bigasha u kulya i shiliwa.
42005030	Kwike a Bafalisayo na a balangi babo ba shilagilo buyuduguma u ku bahemba bakwe; bakubawilaga giki, "Nibuli mukulyaga na kung'wa hamo na batobisha ba goodi, buyaga na banhu ba shibi?"
42005031	Aliyo u Yesu ushosha ubawila, "A banhu a bapanga bati na nguno na nfumu, aliyo a basaatu h'abo bakankoobaga.
42005032	U nene natizile kwitana batungilija, aliyo ba shibi; giki bagaluke."
42005033	Huna bung'wila giki, "Nghangala ningi a bahemba ba ng'wa Yohana bakabizaga na ikanza lya kufunga na kulomba, pye na a ba Bafalisayo bakiitaga i giko; lelo a bako bene ni bakulyaga na kung'wa duhu shi!"
42005034	Nanghwe u Yesu ubawila giki, "Mudugije kubiita bafunge a bageni ba ha bukwilima, aliyo nu ntooji ataali hamo nabo?
42005035	Jikushika i shiku ja kwingijiwa u ntooji, u mu shiku jenijo hu bakuyufunga!"
42005036	Ubawila lusumo giki. "Atiho uyo akatandulaga shilaka kwinga ha ng'wenda mpya wasumiila ha ng'wenda nkulukulu. Ulu wita giko akubiza wagutandula nu mpya, yukenaaguka bubili wayo; nguno u ng'wenda u nkulukulu gutizunilija ni shilaka i shipya.
42005037	Na hangi atiho uyo akabikaga divai mhya ng'wibikilo ikulukulu, ulu wita giko, i divai i mhya ikulitandula i libikilo i likulukulu; yidika ha si i divai, ni libikilo lyukenaaguka.
42005038	Aliyo i divai i mhya shiigelile ibikwe ng'wibikilo ipya.
42005039	Nuulu hangi atiho munhu wa kung'wa shakung'wa sha kale huna hangi ushoka kwikumva shisuhya; nguno akuhaya giki i sha kale shinonu!"
42006001	Lushiku lumo lwa sabato u Yesu wabitilaga mu migunda ya busiga, a bahemba bakwe buyubinza mangala banuka masha na makono gabo balya i mbeke.
42006002	Bamo ba Bafalisayo bubawila giki, "Nibuli mukwitaga mhayo uyo guli ngilo kwitwa ha sabato?"
42006003	Aliyo u Yesu ubashokeja ubawila giki. "A bing'we mutaali u kusoma uyo akagwita u Daudi aho wali watuuba, hamo na a babo wali nabo?
42006004	I giki akingila mu numba ya ng'wa Mulungu, usola migati ya kutuulwa ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu, wilya ubinha na a babo wali nabo; aliyo yali ngilo kulyiwa ulu iti na bagabiji duhu?"
42006005	Huna ubawila, "U Ng'wana o Munhu ali Seeba wayo ni sabato."
42006006	Ha sabato yingi hangi u Yesu akingila ng'wisinagogi kulanga. Walimo na munhu uyo nkono gwakwe gwa bulyo gwali guhaamalalile.
42006007	A balangi ba shilagilo na a Bafalisayo buyunola mu kung'witega-tega, giki bamone ulu akupija ha sabato, bapandike nzila ya kunsola bubi.
42006008	Aliyo akagamana a maganiko gabo, na ung'wila u munhu uyo wali na nkono guhaamalalile giki, "Bebe, alibuukaga wimiile a ha gati aho." Nanghwe ubuuka wimiila.
42006009	Huna u Yesu ubawila giki, "Guyu mhayo namubuje, a ha sabato izuniligije kubeeja yawiza, nuulu kubeeja yabubi? Kupija bupanga, nuulu kubulaga?"
42006010	Huna uyubalola-lola pye a bose umo baali bampindiligije; wanoga ung'wila u munhu ng'wenuyo giki, "Gugoloolage u nkono gwako." Nghana wita chene, haho na haho u nkono gakwe gupila.
42006011	Aliyo a bene bupelana no, bandya kulomana umo balang'witile u Yesu.
42006012	U mu shiku jenijo, likabiza ho ikanza ilebe, u Yesu uja mu lugulu uukakeyula akunombaga Mulungu.
42006013	Aho wela ubitana abo banondeelaga, usolanhya ikumi na babili kwingiila mubo, ubitana batung'wa.
42006014	Baali: Simoni, uyo akang'witana Petelo, na Andelea ng'wanong'wawe, Yakobo na Yohana, Filipo na Batolomayo;
42006015	Matayo na Tomaso, Yakobo ng'wana Alifayo, na Simoni witanagwa Zelote.
42006016	Na Yuda ng'wana Yakobo; hamo na Yuda Isikaliote, uyo akabiza nodeeji.
42006017	Huna wika nabo uja ha mbuga halenganizu, uukimiila henaho hamo n'ibita itaale lya bahemba bakwe. Gibilingila ho na mabita mataale ga banhu kufuma hose-hose u mu Buyudaya, ni Yelusalemu; na bangi bafumaga mhandi ja ku nghilimva ya nyanza, mu si ja Tulo na Sidoni.
42006018	Bizaga kundegeleka na kupijiwa busaatu wabo; na a babo bakoyiagwa masamva, bakayupila.
42006019	Pye a bose bakoobaga kunkuumya, nguno bonfumaga budula bo kupija.
42006020	Huna ubuucha a miso gakwe ubalola a bahemba bakwe, ubawila giki, "Muli na mbango a bing'we, abo muli bahabi, nguno u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu buli wing'we.
42006021	Muli na mbango abo mutuubile i haha, nguno mukwiguta. Muli na mbango abo mukulilaga i haha, nguno mukuyega.
42006022	Muli na mbango a bing'we ulu bayumukolwa a banhu na kumukindika, nuulu kumusondagula na kulisukilija i lina ling'we giki lyabubi kulwa nguno ya Ng'wana wa Munhu.
42006023	U mu lushiku lwa kwitilwa giko, yegagi na musangabale ; managi giki i mheela ying'we ili nhaale u ng'wigulu, nguno na a basaabo babiitilaga ili giko a bahangi."
42006024	"Aliyo muli mu kwihiga, a bing'we a basabi, nguno muli nasho i sha kumulunguja.
42006025	Muli mu kwihiga abo muli nasho i sha kung'wigela i haha, nguno mukutuuba. Muli mu kwihiga abo mukusekaga i haha, nguno mukupinihala na kulila!
42006026	Muli mu kwihiga, ulu bayumuhaya chiza pye a banhu, nguno na a basaabo babiitilaga giko a bahangi a balomolomo."
42006027	"Aliyo nalimuwila a bing'we abo muli bigwi, batogagwi a banishi bing'we; ng'ubiitila yawiza abo bamukolilwe.
42006028	Abo bakumuzumaga ng'ubalombela mbango, na a babo bakumusondagulaga ng'ubalombela.
42006029	U wa kukupaala ipi ku lusaya ngalukijage ni lipandi i lingi; nu yuyo ukutaaja nghanjo yako utizunemeja ni lishati.
42006030	Buli ng'wene uyo ukulomba shikolo ng'winhage, nuulu munhu usola shikolo shako utizunomba akushokeje.
42006031	Umo mutogelilwe bayung'witila a banhu, na a bing'we biitilagi giko.
42006032	I gisi mukulumbilijiwa ginehe ulu muyugelela kubatogwa duhu abo bamutogilwe a bing'we? Nguno na a ba shibi nabo babatogilwe abo babatogilwe a boi duhu!
42006033	Nuulu hangi ulu ng'ugelela kubiitila yawiza abo bakang'witilaga yawiza duhu a bing'we, numho mukulumbilijiwa ginehe? Nguno na a ba shibi nabo bakiitaga giko!
42006034	Nuulu muyugelela kubinha a balandi abo muli na kwisagilwa giki bakumushokeja, numho mukulumbilijiwa ginehe? Iki na a ba shibi nabo bakinhaga bali mu kwisagilwa giki bakushokejiwa kulenganila nu mumo buli u winhi wabo!
42006035	Aliyo a bing'we batogagwi a banishi bing'we, hangi ng'ubabeegeja yawiza. Na bizagi binhi abo bati ba kwikala bisagilagwa solobo, u mu giko i linongho ling'we likubiza itaale. Huna mukubiza baana bakwe uyo ali higulya no, nguno u wei ali na shigongo ku banhu bose; abo batalumbaga na a babubi."
42006036	Bizagi na shigongo, git'umo Sing'we ali na shigongo.
42006037	"Mutabalamulage a biching'wi, ning'we mutulamulwa, mutasolage banhu bubi, ning'we mutusolwa bubi; lekejagi ning'we mukulekejiwa.
42006038	Inhagi, ning'we mukwinhwa; bakung'winha ngelekelo yawiza, yokalile yutindagilwa yidikila na kwandikila. Nguno i ngelekelo iyo mukutumamilaga kugelekela bangi, h'iyo ikutumamilwa kumugelekela na a bing'we."
42006039	Ubawila hangi lusumo giki, "U mboku wadula kuntongeela ginehe u mboku ng'wiye? Angu, batugwila ng'wichongo pyi bubili wabo?
42006040	U nghemba atudula kubiza higulya ya nangi, aliyo buli ng'wene ulu umala u bulangwa akalenganilaga nu nangi wakwe.
42006041	Nibuli ukunojaga ng'wiyo kasasala ka kapalala ako kali mu liso lyakwe, aliyo u ngamba uyo gulimo u mu liso lyako u bebe utugulonjaga?
42006042	Ukudula ginehe u kung'wila u nduguyo giki, 'Bebe ong'wise, alilembeelaga nakwingije kasasala ka kapalala, kalimo u mu liso lyako,' aliyo u mu liso lyako u bebe gulimo ngamba uyo utugubonaga? Bebe ng'wibeeleja, gwinjage tame u ngamba uyo gulimo u mu liso lyako, hu udule u kubona chiza, ung'wingije nu ng'wiyo a kasasala ka kapalala ako kali mu liso lyakwe!"
42006043	"Nguno gutiho nti gwawiza uyo gukatwajaga matwajo gabubi; hangi gutiho nti gwabubi uyo gukatwajaga matwajo gawiza.
42006044	Buli nti gukamanilagwa ku matwajo gago; nguno a banhu batayobaga shisuumo sha ntini kwingiila mu malula; nuulu batayobaga mizabibu kwingiila mu magwata!
42006045	U munhu wawiza, akafunyaga shikolo shawiza kwinga u mu shikolo shawiza isho abikile mu moyo gokwe. Nu wa malofu akafunyaga sha malofu kwinga u mu sha malofu isho abikile; nguno u nomo go ng'wa munhu gukahayaga kwingiila mu yose iyo yokalile mu moyo gokwe."
42006046	"Nibuli mukunitanaga Seeba, Seeba, aliyo mutitaga iyo nakwilangaga?
42006047	Nakung'oolekeja umo ali buli ng'wene uyo akwizaga kuli nene wadegeleka iyo nakwilangaga, huna wishikilija.
42006048	Ali giti nzengi o numba uyo akandya usimba tame ushimya, huna ugutuula u nsingi gwayo h'iwe. Na luulu nuulu aho yahumiilwa ihuuma i numba yeniyo, itatinginile. Nguno yali izengilwe chiza.
42006049	Aliyo u wa kwigwa huna uleka u kwita, u ng'wene atikilile na munhu uyo akazenga numba yakwe ha si, ubiza atisimbilile nsingi gose-gose. Aho yahumiilwa na mihuumo ya minzi, yugwa haho na haho; a kagwile kayo i numba yeniyo kakabiza kabubi no!"
42007001	Aho wamala kubasomboolela pyi i mihayo yakwe, wingila mu nzengo gwa Kafalanaumu.
42007002	Walimo ntaale nebe wa bashilikale igana, wali na nsese wakwe antogilwe jigi; aliyo u nsese ng'wenuyo wali nsaatu hihi na kucha.
42007003	Huna luulu u ntaale wa bashilikale igana ng'wenuyo aho wajiigwa i mhola ja ng'wa Yesu, utuma banamhala ba Bayudaya bampeeleele, bakang'wikumbilije ize ampije u nsese okwe.
42007004	Aho bashika a hali Yesu bung'wikumbilija balihaya giki, "U munhu ng'wenuyo ikubeelela ung'witile u mhayo gwenuyu.
42007005	Nguno alitogilwe no i lihanga lise; niyo watuzengela n'isinagogi."
42007006	Nghana u Yesu ugumha ajile nabo, aliyo aho wegeela kushika a ha kaya, u ntaale wa bashilikale igana ng'wenuyo utuma banwani biye kuja kung'wila u Yesu giki, "Seeba, uti na nguno ya kwikoya; u nene natigeleelilwe u bebe ushike ha ng'wane.
42007007	H'i nguno yene naali nabona giki u nene ng'wenekili natigeleelilwe nuulu u kwiza u kuli bebe; u bebe ng'wene hayaga mhayo duhu akupila u nsese wane.
42007008	Nguno nane nali munhu uyo atuulilwe ha silili ya busugi; nali na bashilikale a ha silili yane. Nadugije kung'wila uyu giki, 'Jaga;' nghana akuja. Nuulu ungi giki, 'Nzugu;' nghana akwiza. Nuulu nsese wane nashikile kung'wila, 'Itaga giki;' na nghana akwita!"
42007009	U Yesu aho wigwa giko akankumya u munhu ng'wenuyo, uligalukila i libita lya banhu ilo lyanondeelaga; ubawila giki, "Nalimuwila nataali kubona na hado yaya kuzunya kwa mbika iyi hose-hose u mu Isilaeli."
42007010	Aho bashoka i kaya abo baali batung'wa busanga u nsese opilaga.
42007011	A ha ntondo yaho, u Yesu uja nabo a bahemba bakwe, hamo n'ibita itaale, buukashika ku nzengo gumo gwitanagwa Naini.
42007012	Ohayegeela a ha mita umanhya na banhu balifuma u mu nzengo, babuukije mimba. Wali wazumalika ndinha nebe, ng'witunja myalwa umo wike wa nkima uyo wali wamala kuchilwa ngoshi; n'ibita itaale kufuma u mu nzengo lyali hamo nanghwe.
42007013	U Seeba aho wamona u nkima ng'wenuyo unsaatwa; ung'wila, "Utalilage!"
42007014	Huna wegeela wikuumya i macheela, bimiila abo baali bibuukije; nanghwe uhaya giki, "Nsumba nalikuwila buukaga!"
42007015	Uyo wali achile ugungumuka wigasha, wandya na kuyomba; huna u Yesu ung'winha kuli nina.
42007016	Pye a bose bakogoha no, buyunkumilija Mulungu duhu balihaya, "Nghangi ntaale watwilongelile." Na giki, "U Mulungu wabagenihile a banhu bakwe."
42007017	U lukumo lokwe lusambaala pye a hose u mu si ya Buyudaya, nu mu si ijo jibimbikanilwe nayo.
42007018	A bahemba bakwe u Yohana bung'wila pyi i yose yeniyo.
42007019	Huna ubitana babili ba bahemba bakwe, ubatuma kuja u kuli Seeba bakamuje giki, "U bebe hu uli ng'wene uyo izile, nuulu hamo tunindiile ungi?"
42007020	A bahemba aho bashika u kuli Seeba buhaya, "U Yohana Matiija watutumaga twize tukubuje giki, 'U bebe, hu uli ng'wene uyo izile, nuulu hamo tunindiile ungi?' "
42007021	U ng'wikanza lyenilo u Yesu wapijaga banhu bingi kufuma mu busaatu na bulemehazu; bangi wabingijaga masamva, na babboku bingi wabinhaga kubona.
42007022	Huna ubashokeja ubawila, "Jagi mukang'wile u Yohana iyo muliyigwa na kwibona: a babboku balibona, na a balema balishimiza, a ba mbiji bakwelaga, a bagulu bakwigwaga; pye na a bafu balijuuka, na a bahabi balilomeelwa Nghulu Jawiza.
42007023	Niyo ali na mbango buli ng'wene uyo ati na kwipama kulwa nguno yane."
42007024	Aho binga abo baali batung'wa na Yohana, u Yesu wandya kubawila a banhu mihayo ya ng'wa Yohana. Uhaya giki, "Aho ng'wajaga ku matogolo, ng'wajaga kujulola ki? Kadete kakuyengejiagwa nyaga?
42007025	Ng'wali mutogilwe kubona ki? Hamo munhu nkondooku azwalilile nyasabi? Managi giki abo bakazwalaga myenda ya nyasabi na kuyegela bupanga bo mili, bali mu kaya ja batemi.
42007026	Numho luulu ng'wajaga kulola ki? Hamo nghangi? Alichene, niyo nalimuwila ali ntaale kutinda nghangi.
42007027	U ng'wenuyu hu ng'wene uyo gwandikilwe kulwakwe giki, 'Managa giki nalintuma ntumijiwa wane ku butongi wako, akutonga kukubeeja-beegeja nzila.'
42007028	Nalimuwila giki u mu bose abo babyalilwe na bakima, atiho nuulu umo uyo ali ntaale kuntinda Yohana. Aliyo uyo ali ndo wa bado u mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu ankilile u wei."
42007029	(Pye a banhu abo bandegelekaga, hamo na a batobisha ba goodi bakazunya giki u Mulungu ntungilija; nguno baali babatiijiwa mu bubatiija bo ng'wa Yohana.
42007030	Aliyo a Bafalisayo na a balangi ba shilagilo, bakabulema u buhuguji bo ng'wa Mulungu u kubo, iki baali batabatiijiwe nu Yohana.)
42007031	"Himba nabikolanije na ki a banhu ba shibyalilwe ishi? Nabalenganije na ki?
42007032	Batikilile na baana bigashaga ng'wigulilu bakwihamukilaga na bichabo; bakuhayaga giki, 'A bing'we, ni ginehe twalumufuulilaga mbiilulu aliyo ning'we u kubina yaya; hama hangi aho twandya kulila nghungu nahene mutapinihalile!'
42007033	Nguno u Yohana Matiija akiza atulyaga shiliwa nuulu kung'wa divai yaya; muyuhaya, 'Ali n'isamva!'
42007034	U Ng'wana wa Munhu aho wiza akulyaga na kung'wa hangi, nahene ng'wandije kuhaya giki, 'Nolagi u munhu uyu; naku na neevi, niyo anwanile na batobisha ba goodi, buyaga na banhu ba shibi!'
42007035	Kwike a baana bago a masala, a bose bagisaabile giki gali butungilija."
42007036	Huna umo wa Bafalisayo ung'wegeleja u Yesu ha ng'wakwe, giki ize kulya shiliwa hamo nanghwe; nghana wingila u mu numba ya Nfalisayo ng'wenuyo, wigasha kulya i shiliwa.
42007037	U mu nzengo gwenuyo walimo nkima wa shibi; aho wadeeba giki u Yesu wali wigasha u mu ng'wa Nfalisayo ng'wenuyo, wiza na jubba ya alabasta yokalile maguta.
42007038	Ohayushika wimiila ha numa ya ng'wa Yesu, hihi na mhambala jakwe, kunu akulilaga. Ujilobya shisoji i mhambala ja ng'wa Yesu, huna wandya kujipyagula na nzwili jakwe; wanoga uyujibbipa, hama ujibila maguta ayo wali nago.
42007039	U Nfalisayo uyo wali wang'wegeleja aho wabona giko, wandya kwiwila u mu ngholo yakwe giki, "U munhu ng'wenuyu ulu ni nghangi, ni wandeebaga u nkima uyo alikala unkuumya-kuumya ng'wenuyu, pyi ni nhungwa jakwe; nguno wabubi no!"
42007040	U Yesu unshokeja ung'wila giki, "Simoni, nali na mhayo gwa kukuwila." Nanghwe uhaya, "Yombaga Nangi."
42007041	U Yesu uhaya, "Baaliho banhu babili, baali na bugasa na munhu nebe. Umo bugasa bo denali magana atano, ungi denali makumi atano.
42007042	A bose bakagayiwa i sha kunshokeja u ng'wenekili sabo, wanoga nose ubalekeja pyi bubili wabo. U mu bubili wabo giko, ali kinehe uyo akubiza na buyegi kutinda?"
42007043	U Simoni ushosha uhaya, "Naliganika uyo akalekejiwa bugasa butaale." Nanghwe u Yesu ushosha ung'wila, "Watungilija u mu kalamulile."
42007044	Huna ungalukila u nkima ng'wenuyo, ung'wila u Simoni giki, "Ulimona u mayu ng'wenuyu? Aho nalingila u mu ng'wako, u bebe utaninhile nuulu minzi ga kooja mhambala jane, aliyo u ng'wene wajilobya i mhambala jane na shisoji shakwe, hama ujipyagula na nzwili jakwe.
42007045	Na hangi u bebe utagemile kunibbipa nuulu hado. Aliyo u ng'wene, kufuma haho ningililaga, ataali u koya u kujibbipa i mhambala jane.
42007046	Hama niyo u bebe utaali nuulu kunibila maguta ku ntwe, aliyo u ng'wene wajibila maguta i mhambala jane.
42007047	Huna luulu nalikuwila giki, walekejiagwa i shibi shakwe nuulu iki shili shingi, h'i nguno yene aloolecha butogwa butaale, aliyo uyo alekejiwe shido, nu butogwa bokwe budo."
42007048	Huna ung'wila u nkima ng'wenuyo giki, "Walekejiagwa i shibi shako!"
42007049	Abo baali bigasha nanghwe a ha shiliwa bandya kuduguma kunu baliwila giki, "U ng'wenuyu ni nani i gete wa kuyulekeja na shibi u wei?"
42007050	Aliyo u Yesu ung'wila u nkima ng'wenuyo giki, "Jaga mu mhola, u kuzunya kwako kwakupijaga."
42008001	Ha numa ya henaho, u Yesu uja akulomeelaga Nghulu ja butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu hose pye u mu mizengo i mitaale ni mido. Na a bahemba bakwe abo ikumi na babili wali hamo nabo.
42008002	Baalimo na bakima balebe, bangi baali bingijiwa masamva na bangi bupijiwa busaatu; umo wa bakima benabo wali Malia uyo witanagwa Magadalena, u ng'wene gaali gang'winga masamva mpungati.
42008003	Ungi wali Yoana nke wa ng'wa Kuza, uyo wali nanghani wa sabo ja ng'wa Helode. Walimo na Susana, na bangi bingi duhu, abo babagunaanaga kufuma mu sabo jabo benekili.
42008004	Huna ibita itaale libilinga, banhu bingi kufuma mu buli nzengo bung'wikuunukila u Yesu. Wandya kubalomeela bo kutumamila shigemenghejo; uhaya giki,
42008005	"Mibi akaja kubiba mbiyu jakwe. Aho alibiba jingi jugwila mu nzila, jupandagilwa na kulyiwa na noni ja kulala.
42008006	Jingi jugwila mu si ya mawe-mawe; aho jazwa jucha nguno jikagayiwa u budoto.
42008007	Jingi jugwila mu minghwa, a minghwa gukulanija najo gujishiteleja.
42008008	Aliyo jimo jikagwila mu si yawiza, jukula jutwaja mbeke igana-igana." Aho wamala u kuhaya i mihayo yeniyi ubakomeleja; uhaya giki, "Uyo ali na matu gakigwaga ni igwage."
42008009	A bahemba bakwe bumuja a makulu ga shigemenghejo shenisho.
42008010	Nanghwe ubawila giki, "A bing'we ng'winhilwe bumani, mujimane i mbisila ja butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu, aliyo u ku bangi shili shigemenghejo duhu; ibize giki, 'u kulola balole, aliyo batizubona; nu kwigwa bigwe, aliyo batizitegeleja.' "
42008011	"Huna luulu, a makulu ga shigemenghejo shenishi gali giki, i mbiyu guli mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu.
42008012	Aliyo ijo jili mu nzila, bali abo bakagwigwaga u mhayo; kwike u Ng'wanishi wiza wagupula u mhayo wagwinja u mu ngholo jabo, batizuzunya bakapijiwa.
42008013	Lelo ijo jili mu si ya mawe-mawe, a bene bali abo bakagwigwaga u mhayo bagwanukula mu buyegi, kwike gwabiza guti na miji. Bali ba kuzunya kwa kakanza duhu, aliyo u mu makanza ga kugeng'wa bakashokaga ku numa.
42008014	Hama ijo jigwilile mu si ya minghwa, a bene bali abo bakagwigwaga u mhayo; kwike u mu shimizile yabo bakashitelejiagwa na myatila ya mu si, hamo na busabi wamo na kudoosela bupanga, nose bakalemeelagwa nuulu kutwaja matwajo mashikanu.
42008015	Aliyo ijo jili mu si yawiza, a bene h'abo bakagwigwaga u mhayo mu ngholo yawiza na ya logohano, bagudima; bayutwaja matwajo mu wiyumilija."
42008016	"Huna luulu managi giki atiho uyo akabachaga tala wikundikija itangwa, nuulu wibisa ng'wizungu lya buliili. I tala ikabachiagwa yatuulwa h'ikindikilo lyayo, giki pye abo bakwingilaga u mu kaya bayulibona i lisana lyayo.
42008017	Nguno gutiho mhayo gwibisile nuulu gumo, uyo gutalafunijiwa ha ng'wape! Na hangi itiho mbisila iyo italitenda ikamanwa.
42008018	Hu kuhaya ilanghanagi umo mukudegelekelaga; nguno buli ng'wene uyo ali na shikolo akwinhwa, lelo uyo ati na shikolo, akutaajiwa ni shisho akwiganikaga giki ali nasho."
42008019	Huna u nina wiza hamo na a baana ba ng'wawe u Yesu, baali batogilwe kushika aho wali, aliyo bulemeelwa kulwa nguno y'ibita lya banhu.
42008020	Uwilwa giki, "U noko ali hanze wimiilaga na a bazunayo; balitogwa kukubona."
42008021	Aliyo u wei ubashokeja ubawila giki, "U nene u mayu na a bazuna bane, bali abo bakagwigwaga u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu bagwita."
42008022	Lushiku lungi u Yesu akingila mu lyato hamo nabo a bahemba bakwe; ubawila giki, "Tujagi ku nkilo gwa nyanza;" na nghana bubuga bajile.
42008023	Aho balija, u Yesu ulaala tulo. Kuhayimanila gwabuuka nyaga ntaale bataali u mu nyanza. I lyato lyuyudaha minzi, bibona babiza mu nhabaala ya kuyagala.
42008024	Bumisha balihaya giki, "Seeba, Seeba, twashila!" Aho wamisha, uguhama u nyaga na a mahuuli ga minzi, shulembeela, hubiza sele-sele.
42008025	Huna ubawila, "A bing'we ni kuli hali u kuzunya kwing'we?" Bakogoha no, buyukumya duhu u kunu baliwila giki, "U munhu ng'wenuyu i gete ni nani okuyuhama na miyaga, buyaga na minzi pye shayung'wigwa!"
42008026	Huna bubuga bajile, buukashika ku si ya Bagelasa, yali yilolile ni Galilaya.
42008027	Aho wika ha si nyumu ushimiza ajile, munhu nebe wali na masamva umanhya nanghwe afumile ku nzengo. U munhu ng'wenuyo wali duuhu, na wali wakwija i shiku atikalaga mu kaya, wikalaga ku mashigila.
42008028	Aho wamona u Yesu ulila n'ilaka itaale; ugwa ku butongi bokwe kunu alihaya giki, "Bebe Yesu Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu uyo ali higulya no, uli na mhayo ki nu nene? Nalikwikumbilija utizuniluhya!"
42008029	Akahaya giko nguno u Yesu akalilagila i lisamva linfume u munhu ng'wenuyo. Wikalaga abohiwe minyololo na nhendele, aliyo nghangala ningi i lisamva lyandimaga wagatinagula a mabohejo, lyampeeja kuja ku matogolo.
42008030	U Yesu umuja u munhu ng'wenuyo giki, "I lina lyako uli nani?" Nanghwe ushosha, "Nali Mabita," nguno a masamva ayo gaali gang'wingiliila gaali mingi.
42008031	Huna gundayiila giki atizugalagila gaje ng'wishimayenze.
42008032	Likasangwa lyaliho idale lya ngulubi ningi jadiimaga mu lugulu, gundayiila giki agazunilije gaje gakingile mu jene; ugazunilija.
42008033	A masamva aho ginga u muli munhu ng'wenuyo, gukingila u mu ngulubi jenijo; i lidale i lyose liyita nhambo kujiliila ku lugegu lo nyanza, jukagwila mu minzi, jung'wa nhuli, jucha!
42008034	A badiimi bajo aho babona yabiza giko, bupeela nhambo, buja buukagukumucha u mhayo gwenuyo mu nzengo, nu ku magunguli.
42008035	Banhu bufuma kuja kugulola uyo gukilonga, aho bashika a hali Yesu bunsanga u munhu uyo gakanfuma masamva igashije hihi na mhambala ja ng'wa Yesu azwalile shizwalo, niyo ali na masala madeekanu. Bakogoha no!
42008036	Huna a bambona bubasomboolela umo akapigijiwa uyo wali na masamva.
42008037	Pye a banhu ba mu si ya Gelasa bung'wikumbilija u Yesu abingile, nguno bakagwilwa booba butaale no; nghana wingila mu lyato ushoka.
42008038	U munhu uyo akingijiwa masamva ung'wikumbilija giki nu ng'wene adimane nanghwe. Aliyo u Yesu unaga aje; ung'wila giki,
42008039	"Shokaga kaya ukabawile iyo Mulungu wakwitilaga." Nghana uja hose pye u mu nzengo gwenuyo, akwikumuchaga iyo akiitilwa na Yesu.
42008040	Huna u Yesu aho washoka, ibita lya banhu lyunsung'wanha, nguno pye baali banindiila.
42008041	Kuhayimanila wiza ngosha umo, ntaale w'isinagogi; lina lyakwe Yailo. Aho washika ungwila mu magulu u Yesu, ung'wikumbilija ashike ha ng'wakwe.
42008042	Nguno nshike wakwe, ng'waniki wa myaka giti ikumi n'ibili, wali nsaatu no; niyo hihi na kucha. Hama wali nanghwe umo ng'wenuyo duhu. U Yesu aho wabuuka ajile, na mabita ga banhu gunondeela, guja gang'wishitelegije.
42008043	Waliho nkima nebe wakoyiagwa busaatu bo ngeji, nose umala myaka ikumi n'ibili A henaha shandikwa shingi shongegije na mihayo iyi: Kushisha wali wajimala pyi i sabo jakwe kulwa kujitumamila ku bafumu.'; aliyo wali atiho nuulu umo wa kudula kumpija.
42008044	U nkima ng'wenuyo ung'wiziila u Yesu ku numa, ushika unkuumya kwipindo lya nghanjo yakwe; haho na haho a mininga gakwe goya u kuzwa.
42008045	U Yesu ubuja, "Nani wanikuumya?" Aho bahuumula pye a banhu, u Petelo uhaya, "Seeba, a banhu balikukuumya nguno bakwishitelejaga!"
42008046	Aliyo u Yesu uhaya, "Munhu nebe wanikuumya, nguno niyigwa nguzu janinga."
42008047	U nkima ng'wenuyo aho wabona giki atudula u kwibisa, wiza a hali Yesu alidetema, ushika untugija mazwi unsomboolela hape-hape ku butongi wa banhu bose, i nguno iyo ikang'wenheleja kunkuumya, nu mumo akapilila haho na haho.
42008048	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Nshike wane, u kuzunya kwako kwakupijaga; jaga mu mhola."
42008049	Aho ataali uyomba nabo giko, kuhayimanila wiza munhu afumile u ku ng'wa ntaale w'isinagogi; ushikila kuhaya giki, "U nshike wako wazumalika, nose itiho nguno ya kunkoya u Nangi!"
42008050	Aliyo u Yesu aho wigwa ung'wila giki "Utogohage, bebe ng'wene sanyaga, akupila duhu."
42008051	Aho washika a ha kaya, atanzuniligije ose-ose u kwingila, ulu ati Petelo na Yohana na Yakobo; hamo na ise nu nina wa ng'waniki.
42008052	Pye a banhu balilaga, balinila u ng'waniki! U Yesu ubawila giki, "Mutalilage nguno atachile, alaalile duhu."
42008053	Bunseka nyachilu-chilu kulwa kundalaha, nguno baali bamanile giki u ng'waniki wali wamala kucha.
42008054	Aliyo u wei undima nkono; huna witana alihaya, "Ng'waniki, buukaga!"
42008055	U moyo gokwe gunshokela, ubuuka haho na haho. U Seeba ubalagila bang'winhe shiliwa.
42008056	A babyaji bakwe bakakumya no; aliyo u wei ubalemeja batizung'wila munhu nuulu umo uyo gukilonga.
42009001	Huna u Yesu ubitana a bahemba bakwe abo ikumi na babili, ubinha budula na nguzu kulwa kugaheeba pye a masamva, na kupija busaatu.
42009002	Ubatuma baje bakubukumuchaga u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu, na kupija banhu.
42009003	Ubawila giki, "Mutizubuucha mbuukanwa jose-jose ja kujana mu nzila; yaya nuulu nangha, nuulu nfuko, nuulu shiliwa, nuulu hela; yaya ni giki buli ng'wene abize na nghanjo ibili.
42009004	Ulu ng'ushikila ha kaya ndebe, ikalagi henaho kushisha ng'winge i lipandi lyenilo.
42009005	Ulu buleka kung'wanukula, ingagi ; niyo ulu mulinga u mu nzengo gwenuyo, lukung'unhagi nu lubuubu ulo luli ku mhambala jing'we, koolekeja giki bakugwilwa nsango."
42009006	Nghana buja hose-hose u mu magunguli bakulomeelaga Nghulu Jawiza na kupija banhu.
42009007	U ntemi Helode aho wigwa pyi iyo yabeejiagwa yeniyo uzwangana, nguno bangi bahayaga giki u Yohana wajuukile kufuma mu bafu.
42009008	Bangi giki Eliya wilongile, hama bangi hangi bahayaga giki, umo wa bahangi ba kale wajuukile!
42009009	Huna luulu u Helode wandya kuhaya, "U Yohana nakamuta ntwe, al'uyo nandije kwigwa nghulu jakwe ng'wenuyu nanghwe nani hangi?" Wikumva kumona.
42009010	A bahemba aho bashoka bunsomboolela iyo bakabeeja. Huna ubasola giki aje nabo iyene ku nzengo gwitanagwa Betisaida.
42009011	Aliyo a mabita ga banhu aho gadeeba gunkuubija koi; nanghwe ubanukula, ubasomboolela mihayo ya butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu. Na a babo baali na makoye ubapija.
42009012	Huna aho lyaja i likanza, bung'wegeela ab'ikumi na babili, bung'wila giki, "Hambu-hambu ni wabalaga a banhu baje kujukooba nghambi u mu chalo sha hihi-hihi umu, bakigulile na shiliwa ku migunda; nguno a henaha tuli ng'witogolo duhu!"
42009013	Nanghwe ubawila, "Binhagi a bing'we i shiliwa." Nabo bung'wila, "Tuti na shiliwa sha kukila ha migati itano na ndilo ibili duhu, numho hamo ulu kuja kugula shiliwa sha kubigela pye a banhu benaba!"
42009014	A bagosha duhu abo baaliho baali giti shihumbi shitano. Huna u Yesu ubawila a bahemba bakwe giki, "Bigashagi a banhu mu magele-magele, buli lyene banhu giti makumi atano."
42009015	Biita chene nghana, bubiza bigasha pye a banhu.
42009016	Huna u Yesu wisola i migati iy'itano ni ndilo ij'ibili, ulangamila ng'wigulu, ulumba; ushimeganya, ubinha a bahemba bubagabanhya a banhu.
42009017	Bulya pye a bose bigeja, aho shasolelejiwa isho shikasaagiila, gokala matangwa ikumi na abili.
42009018	Likabiza ho ikanza ilebe, u Yesu wali iyene walombaga, na a bahemba bakwe baali hamo nanghwe; ubabuja giki, "A banhu bakunihayaga nali nani?"
42009019	Bunshokeja balihaya, "Uli Yohana Matiija, aliyo bangi giki uli Eliya, na bangi hangi giki uli umo wa bahangi ba kale wajuukile."
42009020	Huna ubabuja nabo giki, "Al'a bing'we mukunihayaga nali nani?" Petelo unshokeja alihaya, "Uli Kilisto wa ng'wa Mulungu!"
42009021	Huna ubahana batizung'wila munhu nuulu umo u mhayo gwenuyo.
42009022	Hanuma uhaya giki, "U Ng'wana wa Munhu shing'wigeleelilwe aluhiwe mu mihayo mingi; na kuleng'wa na bagabiji bataale, hamo na balangi ba shilagilo na kubulagwa. Aliyo akujuuka ha lushiku lo kadatu lwaho."
42009023	Huna ubawila pye a bose giki, "Ulu munhu atogilwe kunilondeela ni idalahage wei ng'wenekili, ibuukije nsalaba gokwe buli lushiku, hu anilondeele.
42009024	Nguno buli ng'wene uyo atogilwe kupija bupanga bokwe, akubujimiija. Aliyo uyo ubujimiija u bupanga bokwe kulwa nguno yane, u ng'wenuyo akubupija.
42009025	Angu, u munhu akubiza na solobo ki nuulu akipandika pyi i si, aliyo u wei ng'wenekili uyagala nuulu ujimiila?
42009026	Nguno ose-ose uyo ucha minala kulwa nguno yane ni mihayo yane, nanghwe u Ng'wana wa Munhu akucha minala kulwa nguno yakwe u munhu ng'wenuyo, u ng'wikanza lya kwiza ng'wikujo lyakwe na lya ng'wa Ise, na lya bamalaika beela.
42009027	Niyo nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, baliho bamo u mu banhu abo bimiilaga aha batuloja icha na hado yaya, kushisha babubone u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu."
42009028	Aho wihaya i yeniyo jubita shiku giti inaane, ubasola ba Petelo na Yohana na Yakobo; ulinha nabo mu lugulu kujulomba.
42009029	Aho alilomba, i lihanga lya bushu bokwe lyugaluka, ni shizwalo shakwe sheela pe; shuyung'weka-ng'weka.
42009030	Kwimanila wandya kulungalunga na banhu babili, ba Musa na Eliya;
42009031	nabo baali mu suso j'ikujo. Bahoyaga nanghwe mihayo ya kingile kakwe; mhayo uyo wali hihi kujugushikilija mu Yelusalemu.
42009032	Kwike u Petelo na a biye abo wali nabo baali baheewa tulo; aliyo aho bamisha, bulibona i likujo lyakwe na a babo baali bimiila hamo nanghwe.
42009033	Huna a babili benabo aho balilekana nanghwe, u Petelo ung'wila u Yesu giki, "Seeba, yabeelela iki twabiza tuliho aha; tuzenge maheema adatu, limo lyako, limo lya ng'wa Musa, na limo lya ng'wa Eliya." Aliyo wali atagumanaga uyo waguhayaga.
42009034	Aho ataali uhaya giko, kuhayimanila ligela ilunde lyubafikija; bogoha u kufikijiwa ilunde.
42009035	Liza n'ilaka kufuma u ng'wilunde lilihaya, "Uyu ng'wene Ng'wana wane nsolwa, ng'wigwagi wei."
42009036	Aho lyabita i lilaka lyenilo, bumona u Yesu ali iyene. U mu shiku jenijo bakahuumula, batang'wilile ose-ose i mihayo iyo bakibona yeniyo.
42009037	I ntondo yaho aho balika kufuma u mu lugulu, ibita itaale lyunsumbiila u Yesu.
42009038	Kwitulwa u ng'wibita lyenilo ngosha umo wanghamukila alihaya, "Nangi nalikwikumbilija ukalole kaka kitunja kane aha; nali nako kenaka duhu baba.
42009039	Nghangala ningi kakadimagwa isamva, lyakagalagaja ha si, kayufuluuta ifulo duhu; lyakakalekela ku kale kokalaga machubagukile!
42009040	Naali nabikumbilija a bahemba bako balipeeje; aliyo balilemeelagwa!"
42009041	U Yesu ushosha uhaya, "Bing'we shibyalilwe sha butuzunya na shihubikile, nakwikala ning'we mu kwiyumilija kushisha nanali? Ng'wenhage aha u ng'witunja wako!"
42009042	Aho alitwalwa, i lisamva lyuntaalika ha si lyandya kungalagaja; aliyo u Yesu ulihama, umpija u nyanda, unshosha kuli ise.
42009043	Pye a bose bujinjimala buyubukumya duhu u budula bo ng'wa Mulungu. Aho bataali baliyikumya pyi iyo akibeeja yeniyo, ubawila a bahemba bakwe giki,
42009044	"Yiyi mihayo idegelekagi chiza, na ng'widime. U Ng'wana wa Munhu ali hihi kutuulwa mu makono ga banhu."
42009045	Aliyo batagwitegelegije u mhayo gwenuyo, gwali gutaali gubisilwe u kubo batizugumana; niyo bakogoha nu kumuja a makulu gaho.
42009046	Kwimanila a bahemba bakwe bandya kwihalalija, giki nani u ntaale kubatinda pye a biye!
42009047	U Yesu aho wabudeeba u wihalalija ubo wali mu ngholo jabo, witana kanigini. Ukawila kimiila kihela nanghwe.
42009048	Huna ubawila giki, "Buli munhu ulu ung'wanukula nigini git'uyu mu lina lyane, wananukulaga nene. Na buli ng'wene uyo unanukula nene, numho wang'wanukulaga uyo anitumile . Nguno u ndo wa bado u mu bing'we, u ng'wenuyo hu ntaale."
42009049	Huna u Yohana unshokeja ung'wila giki, "Seeba, twali twamonile ng'wing'wana alipeeja masamva mu lina lyako; tunemeja nguno ati umo wise."
42009050	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila giki, "Yaya u kubalemeja, nguno uyo atilwishaga ning'we u ng'wenuyo ali hamo ning'we."
42009051	Aho jang'wa i shiku jakwe ja kwanukulwa kwigulya, pye a maganiko gakwe ugalogeja ha lugendo lwa kuja Yelusalemu.
42009052	Huna utuma banhu baje kunonja-longeja umo alayubitila. Bushika mu chalo shilebe sha Basamalia,
42009053	aliyo bulema u kung'wanukula; nguno a maganiko gakwe gaali ha lugendo lwa kuja Yelusalemu.
42009054	A bahemba bakwe, a ba Yakobo nu Yohana, aho babona giko, bung'wila; "Seeba, ulibona ginehe ulu kulagija moto git'umo akiitila Eliya, gwike kufuma ng'wigulu gwize gubakenaagule?"
42009055	Aliyo ubagalukila ubahugula; ubawila giki, "A bing'we mutagumanile u moyo uyo muli nago. Nguno u Ng'wana wa Munhu atizile kuyagaja bupanga bo banhu, aliyo kubupija Nguno u Ng'wana wa Munhu atizile kuyagaja bupanga bo banhu, aliyo kubupija.'."
42009056	Huna buja ku chalo shingi.
42009057	Aho bali mu nzila bajile, munhu nebe ung'wila giki, "Nakukulondeela buli kwene uko ulaaje."
42009058	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila giki, "I nyamhawa jili na myobo, ni noni ja kulala najo jili na chanjo, aliyo u Ng'wana wa Munhu ati na ha kulaaja nuulu ntwe gokwe!"
42009059	Huna ung'wila ungi giki, "Nilondeelage." U ng'wene uhaya, "Seeba, nizunilijage tame naje nakanjike baba."
42009060	Nanghwe ung'wila, "Balekage a bafu babajike a bafu babo; bebe ng'wene jaga ukakumuche mhola ja butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu."
42009061	Na ungi hangi ung'wila, "Nakukukuubija Seeba, kwike nizunilijage tame naje nakabalage bang'wise."
42009062	Aliyo u Yesu ung'wila giki, "Atiho nuulu umo wa kwandya kulima huna wimiila kwikibuka kulola ya ku numa, uyo igeleelilwe kubiza mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu."
42010001	Ha numa ya yeniyo u Seeba usola bahemba bangi makumi mpungati na babili, ubatuma babili-babili, batonge u ku mizengo na a mapandi ayo wali atogilwe kuja u wei.
42010002	Ubawila giki, "U nimo gw'igesa guli ntaale no, aliyo a batumami bagehu; nombagi u Seeba atume batumami u ku nimo gokwe.
42010003	Ali luulu, jagi; kwike managi giki nalimutuma giti baana ba ngholo kuja kwigulanya na mapuge!
42010004	Mutizusola mbogoshi, nuulu nfuko, nuulu shilatu; hama ulu mulija, yaya u kwikala ng'wituja-tuja mu nzila kugisha banhu.
42010005	Ulu ng'ushika ha kaya ndebe bagishagi tame; ng'ubawila giki, 'A ha kaya iyi, twang'wenhelaga mhola.'
42010006	Ulu ubiza aliho munhu ntengeke, i mhola ying'we ikung'wikalila; aliyo ulu atiho, ikumushokela i mhola ying'we.
42010007	I kaya iyo ilang'wanukule ikalagi henaho, muyulya na kung'wa hamo nabo, nguno u ntumami shing'wigelile kupandika mheela yakwe. Yaya u kwitambukija-tambukija nghambi; kwinga ha kaya iyi kuja kaya yingi.
42010008	Hangi nuulu ng'wingila mu nzengo nebe, ulu bung'wanukula lyagi isho balamutengele.
42010009	Bapijagi a basaatu baamo, niyo ng'ubawila giki, 'U butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu bong'wegeelaga.'
42010010	Aliyo ulu ng'wingila mu nzengo nebe buleka u kung'wanukula, jagi ng'ubita u mu mapanda gabo mulihaya giki,
42010011	'Nu lubuubu lo mu nzengo gwing'we ulo lwadaamiilaga ku mhambala jise luulo twamukung'unhila, aliyo managi giki u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu bong'wegeelaga.'
42010012	Nalimuwila giki, u mu lushiku lwenulo ikubiza hambu-hambu u ku bana Sodoma; kutinda u ku nzengo gwenuyo!"
42010013	"Uli mu kwihiga Kolasini, nu bebe Betisaida uli mu kwihiga, nguno i shitwa sha koolecha budula butaale isho shabeejiwe mu bing'we ulu ni shabeejiwa mu Tulo na Sidoni, a bazengi baamo ni bagaluka kale, mu kuzwala magunila na kwifudika mu mabu.
42010014	Aliyo u ng'wikanza lya kulamulwa, ikubiza hambu-hambu u ku bana Tulo na a bana Sidoni, kutinda u ku bing'we!
42010015	U bebe nangho Kafalanaumu, uliganika giki ukugunguhiwa kushisha ng'wigulu? Ukwichiwa kushisha kulimu!
42010016	U wa kung'wigwa a bing'we numho waniigwaga nene, nu wa kumufikilija a bing'we numho wanifikilijaga nene; hangi uyo unifikilija nene, hu wanfikilijaga uyo anitumile."
42010017	A bahemba makumi mpungati na babili aho bashoka baali na buyegi no; bung'wila giki, "Seeba, na a bana masamva twalubapeejaga mu nguzu ja lina lyako."
42010018	Nanghwe ubawila giki, "Namonile u Shetani aliigwa giti lulabi alifuma ng'wigulu!
42010019	Managi giki a bing'we naang'winhile budula bo kupanda nuulu nzoka na nghomi, nu budula bo ng'wanishi kubupyena u bose; na shitiho shikolo shose-shose sha kung'witila mayanga.
42010020	Kwike u gwa kuheeba masamva gutamuyejage, aliyo yegagi iki a mina ging'we gandikilwe u ng'wigulu."
42010021	U ng'wikanza lyenilo u Yesu ukumilija mu buyegi wa ng'wa Moyo Ng'wela; uhaya giki, "Nalikulumba Baba, bebe uyo uli Seeba w'igulu na si, nguno pyi i mihayo iyi wibisile u ku ba masala na a bitegeleja, wiyoolecha u ku baana. Alichene Baba, nguno h'umo ibeelelile u kuli bebe.
42010022	U Baba ashituulile pyi i shose mu nkono gwane; na atiho nuulu umo uyo aamanile u Ng'wana, ulu ati Baba iyene. Hangi atiho uyo aamanile u Baba, ulu ati Ng'wana wike, na buli ng'wene uyo Ng'wana alatogwe kunfubolela."
42010023	Huna ubagalukila a bahemba bakwe boi duhu; uhaya giki, "Gali na mbango a miso ayo gakwibonaga iyo mukwibonaga a bing'we.
42010024	Nguno nalimuwila giki, bahangi na batemi bingi baali batogilwe kwibona iyo mukwibonaga aliyo batibonile; na kwiyigwa iyo mukwiyigwaga aliyo batayigwile."
42010025	Kwitulwa nangi nebe wa shilagilo wimiila umuja mu kungema, uhaya giki, "Nangi niite mhayo ki nabize na bupanga bo welelo na welelo?"
42010026	Nanghwe ung'wila, "Yandikilwe ginehe u mu shilagilo, ukusomaga ginehe?"
42010027	Unshokeja uhaya, "Ntogagwe u Seeba Mulungu wako na ngholo yako yose, na bupanga wako bose na nguzu jako jose, na maganiko gako gose; nu nzenganwa ng'wiyo git'umo witogelilwe bebe ng'wenekili."
42010028	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila giki, "Watungilija a kashokeje, nu bebe itaga giko: ukupila."
42010029	Aliyo u nangi ng'wenuyo wali atogilwe kwiyoolecha giki ntungilija, na luulu umuja u Yesu giki, "U nzenganwa ng'wichane h'uyo ali?"
42010030	U Yesu wandija henaho; ung'wila giki, "Lwise lumo munhu nebe watulumenhaga kufuma Yelusalemu ajile Yeliko, ohayimanila onyang'wa na banyoli. Buntulagula, hama buntaaja pyi i shikolo, ni shizwalo bunzuuja, buja buneka ali mandetendete, hihi gucha!
42010031	A makanza genayo, ngabiji nebe nanghwe usangwa alitulumenha kubitila i nzila yeniyo. Ung'wipumukija hoi, aho wamona utaja ubitila ku mhelo.
42010032	Na Nawi ushika ho a h'ipandi lyenilo, wahayumona uchaaliila, ubita chaawi.
42010033	Na Nsamalia nebe wali mu lugendo ajile, u ng'wene wahayushika a hali munhu ng'wenuyo, aho wamona unsaatwa.
42010034	Ung'wegeela ung'ooja-ooja na divai a magulagije, umila na maguta, huna ugatunga; hama undamhija ha nzobe yakwe, untwala ku numba ya kulaala bageni uukangaliila chiza kwenuko.
42010035	A ha ntondo yaho usola denali ibili, ung'winha u ng'wenekili numba ya bageni, ung'wila giki, 'Ngaliilage u munhu ng'wenuyu; shose-shose isho ulatumamile kukila a ha hela jeniji, nakwiza nakwinhe ulu nalashoke.'
42010036	Ulibona ginehe a ha gati ya banhu a badatu benabo, ali ginehe uyo akabiza nzenganwa ng'wiye u munhu uyo oli onyang'wa na banyoli?"
42010037	Ung'wila, "Uyo akang'witila ya koolecha shigongo." Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Jaga ukiite giko nangho!"
42010038	U Yesu aho ali mu lugendo na a bahemba bakwe, bakashika mu chalo shilebe. Nkima umo lina lyakwe Malita ung'wegeleja ha kaya yakwe.
42010039	U nkima ng'wenuyo wali na ng'wanong'wawe witanagwa Malia. U ng'wene wigasha ha si hihi na mhambala ja ng'wa Yesu, uyundegeleka iyo wasomboolaga.
42010040	Aliyo u Malita wandya kutagamba na milimo ya kubalonja-longeja. Nose ung'wegeela u Seeba ung'wila, "Seeba, nibuli utulonjaga i giki u ng'wanong'wise onilekanijaga nene duhu pyi i milimo? Ni wang'wila anigunaane !"
42010041	Nanghwe u Seeba unshokeja ung'wila, "Malita, Malita, otagambaga na milimo mingi no, nose ozwangana.
42010042	Aliyo guliho gumo duhu uyo gwigeleelilwe; u ngabo uyo wagusolaga Malia guli gwawiza, atudula kwingijiwa na hado yaya!"
42011001	Ikanza ilebe u Yesu wali hanhu akulombaga, aho wamala u kulomba umo o bahemba bakwe ung'wila giki, "Seeba, tulangage nise u kulomba git'umo Yohana akabalangila bahemba bakwe."
42011002	Huna ubawila, "Ulu mulilomba mulahayage giki, 'Siswe, lina lyako lyeela likujiwe, butemi wako wize.
42011003	Twinhage i shiliwa shise i sha buli lushiku.
42011004	Tulekejage nu buhubi wise, nguno na a bise tukanekejaga buli ng'wene uyo ali na bugasa ku bise. Na hangi utizututwala mu kugeng'wa.' "
42011005	Ha numa ya henaho ubawila giki, "I gisi gemelagi ulu umo wing'we ali na nwani ng'wiye wiza kunuguja bujiku ha gati ung'wila giki, 'Ng'wanong'wise, nigunaanage migati idatu.
42011006	Napandika ngeni, nwani ng'wichane wafuma mu lugendo; aliyo i haha nati na shiliwa sha kuntengela!'
42011007	Uyo ali mu gati ashikile kunshokeja ung'wila giki, 'Utanikoyage, namalaga kupagija u lwigi; niyo a baana bane pyi nu nene tuli mu buliili twalaalaga; i haha natudula u kubuuka, nuulu kukwinha shose-shose!'
42011008	Nalimuwila atudula nghana u kubuuka ang'winhe nuulu iki nwani ng'wiye. Aliyo kulwa kalombele ka luguumi, akunoga nose abuuke ang'winhe; niyo akung'winha kulenganila na a kalombele kakwe.
42011009	Huna luulu nalimuwila lombagi mukwinhwa, koobagi mukupandika, tulagi hoodi ha nyango mukulugulilwa.
42011010	Nguno buli ng'wene uyo akalombaga akinhagwa, nu yuyo akakoobaga akapandikaga, hama nu yuyo akatulaga hoodi ha nyango akalugulilagwa.
42011011	Angu, aliho myaji ki u mu bing'we uyo ashikile kulomva ndilo na ng'wanokwe, nanghwe ung'winha nzoka a ha ng'wanya go ndilo?
42011012	Nuulu hamo ulomva igi, nani uyo adugije kung'winha nghomi?
42011013	Ali luulu, manilagi henaho; a bing'we nuulu iki muli babubi, nahene mumanile u kubinha a baana bing'we shikolo shawiza. U Sing'we uyo ali ng'wigulu, atiita yawiza kutinda a bing'we? Nguno u ng'wene akubinha Moyo Ng'wela abo bakunombaga."
42011014	Lushiku lungi akang'wingija munhu isamva lya bushimuumu; aho lyanfuma u munhu ng'wenuyo udula u kuyomba. A banhu abo baaliho bukumya no.
42011015	Kwike bamo babo bandya kuhaya giki, "A masamva akugapeejaga kulwa budula bo Libelizebuli, i litaale lya masamva."
42011016	Bangi buyungema, kunu balikooba shimanikijo sha kufuma ng'wigulu kwingiila kuli we.
42011017	Aliyo u Yesu iki wali agamanile a maganiko gabo, ubawila giki; "Buli butemi ulu bugabanika huna wandya kwilwisha boi wenekili na wenekili, bukwimala. Nuulu kaya ulu yandya kwiyubukila yoi yenekili ikugwa.
42011018	A bing'we mulihaya giki u nene nakugapeejaga a masamva mu budula bo ng'wa Belizebuli, angu numho hu kuhaya u Shetani ogabanikile. Hama bukwimiila ginehe luulu u butemi bokwe?
42011019	Niyo hangi, u nene ulu nakugapeejaga a masamva mu budula bo ng'wa Belizebuli, al'a baana bing'we, a bene bakagapeejaga mu budula ki? Na luulu managi giki, a benabo bakubiza balamuji bing'we!
42011020	Aliyo ulu nakugapeejaga a masamva mu budula bo nkono go ng'wa Mulungu, managi giki u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu bong'wiziilile!
42011021	U munhu o nguzu ulu adimile shilanga akulanghanaga kaya yakwe, i shikolo shakwe shili mhola.
42011022	Aliyo ulu wiza munhu o nguzu kutinda u wei, huna undumila ungheeba, akuntaaja pyi i shilanga shakwe isho ashisanije, hanuma i shikolo shakwe ushisola ushigabanhya.
42011023	Ali luulu, uyo ati hamo na nene ali ng'wilwisha wane, nu yuyo atukumingaga hamo nane akubbalasanyaga!"
42011024	"U moyo nsoso ulu gunfuma munhu, gukajaga uko na uko gukuhuhuulijaga mu matogolo makalamuku gati na minzi, gulikooba ha kwifuulila. Ulu gugayiwa gukahayaga giki, 'I gete nashoke u ku numba yane umo naafumile!'
42011025	Gwakuhayiza, gwisanga ipyagulilwe, na kugaliilwa chiza.
42011026	Huna guja kujusoleleja myoyo yingi mpungati misoso kuguheeba u goyi, gwiza nayo; pyi yingila yikala mo. I nghalilo ya ng'wa munhu ng'wenuyo ikabizaga yabubi no, kutinda umo wali i kwandya!"
42011027	Aho wakalicha u kuhaya pyi i yose iyi, nkima nebe u ng'wibita uhamuka n'ilaka lya higulya ung'wila giki "Ili na mbango i nda iyo ikakubuucha, ni mbeele ijo ukajongha najo jili na mbango!"
42011028	Nanghwe u Yesu uhaya, "Ulitungilija, aliyo i no-no-no abo bali na mbango, bali abo bakugwigwaga u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu bagudilila."
42011029	A mabita aho gongeja kung'okaliila, uhaya giki, "I shibyalilwe ishi shabubi no; shikukoobaga shimanikijo, aliyo shitinhwa shimanikijo, ulu iti sha ng'wa Yona duhu!
42011030	Nguno git'umo Yona wali shimanikijo ku banhu ba Ninawi, h'umo akubizila nu Ng'wana wa Munhu u ku banhu ba shibyalilwe ishi.
42011031	U ng'wikanza lya kulamulwa, u ntemi nkima wa si ya dakama akwimiila nabo a banhu ba shibyalilwe ishi abenheleje kwinhwa nsango. Nguno u ng'wene akafuma ku si ya kule wiza kuli Solomoni kudegeleka mihayo yakwe ya masala, aliyo i haha uyo aliho aha ng'wene ntaale kutinda Solomoni.
42011032	Na a banhu ba Ninawi bakwimiila nabo a banhu ba shibyalilwe ishi, u ng'wikanza lya kulamulwa, babenheleje kwinhwa nsango. Nguno a bene aho bawigwa u bulomeeji bo ng'wa Yona bakagaluka; aliyo i haha uyo aliho aha ng'wene ntaale kutinda Yona."
42011033	"Atiho munhu wa kubacha tala huna wakituula kwibisu, nuulu wikundikija itangwa. Ikatuulagwa h'ikindikilo lya tala, giki bayulibona i lisana lyayo abo balingila u mu numba.
42011034	I tala ya mili lili liso lyako; i liso lyako ulu lili mhola, numho pyi u mili gwako guli n'isana. Aliyo i liso lyako ulu lyupandika kaagede, u mili gwako gukubiza mu giiti.
42011035	Ali luulu, ilanghanage, i lisana ilo uli nalyo litizugaluka kubiza giiti.
42011036	Niyo u mili gwako ulu guli ng'wisana, gubiza guti na giiti nuulu hado, pyi u gose gukubiza n'isana git'umo ikabizilaga tala ulu ilikutiimila."
42011037	U Yesu aho wamala u kusomboola i yeniyo, Nfalisayo nebe ung'wegeleja giki ize alye nanghwe shiliwa ha ng'wakwe; na nghana wingila wigasha.
42011038	Aliyo u Nfalisayo ng'wenuyo akakumya no u kubona giki u Yesu oleka u kukalaba tame aho ataali kwandya u kulya.
42011039	Nanghwe u Seeba ung'wila giki, "A bing'we Bafalisayo muli na makoye, nguno mukiyoogelelejaga higulya-gulya, giti kooja shikombe na mabakuli, aliyo u mu gati ng'okalile wibi na bunyeecha.
42011040	Bing'we bachilu-chilu, u meeja washo i sha hanze ati hu ng'wene u meeja washo ni sha mu gati?
42011041	Shifunyagi tame i sha mu gati shibize manongho, hu shikumubeelela pyi i shikolo.
42011042	Hangi niyo muli mu kwihiga a bing'we Bafalisayo, nguno mukafunyaga imo ya ng'wikumi ya shikolo shido-do-do, giti shisanjo sha mu shiliwa na maduutu ga mbika ijo na ijo! Aliyo i mihayo ya butungilija na butogwa bo ng'wa Mulungu mukikilanhyaga! Shing'wigeleelilwe kwishikilija i yeniyi, aliyo ni yingi yaya u kwileka.
42011043	Bing'we Bafalisayo muli mu kwihiga, nguno mutogilwe kwigasija masumbi g'ikujo mu masinagogi, na kwikala muligishiwa mu magulilu.
42011044	Muli mu kwihiga, nguno mubizile giti shigila isho shijimilikanile, isho banhu bakabitaga higulya yasho nu kudeeba yaya!"
42011045	Kuhayimanila umo wa balangi ba shilagilo wanshokeja alihaya giki, "Nangi, iyo ukwihayaga yeniyo na a bise ulitudukanija mo!"
42011046	Nanghwe u Yesu unshokeja ung'wila, "Angu na a bing'we balangi ba shilagilo muli mu kwihiga, nguno mukasesejaga banhu miligo midito ku mabega, aliyo a bing'we benekili mutagemaga u kutuula ho nuulu lwala lwing'we lumo kubagunaana.
42011047	Muli mu kwihiga, nguno mukazengeelaga shigila sha bahangi; abo babulagwa na bakulugenji bing'we.
42011048	Hu kuhaya mukikaanilaga bing'we benekili, na kwizunilija ni shitwa sha bakulugenji bing'we, nguno a bene bababulaga, lelo a bing'we mukushizengeelaga i shigila shabo!
42011049	H'i nguno yene u Mulungu nanghwe u mu masala gakwe ahayile giki, 'Nakubatumila bahangi na batung'wa; bakuyubabulaga bamo babo, na bangi bakubaluhya.
42011050	U mu giko gakukoowa kufuma mu shibyalilwe ishi pye a mininga ga bahangi ayo gidika; kwingiila ikanza lya kuseeng'wa kwa si.
42011051	Kwandija mininga ga ng'wa Abeli kwiza kukaja ku ga ng'wa Zakalia uyo akabulagilwa mu hekalu ku butongi bo ng'walilo. Alichene, nalimuwila gakukoowa u mu shibyalilwe ishi.'
42011052	Muli mu kwihiga a bing'we balangi ba shilagilo, nguno muludimile u lufungulo lwa bumani. A bing'we mulemeelilwe u kwingila, aliyo na a babo batogilwe u kwingila mukabahangijaga!"
42011053	Aho alinga a henaho a balangi ba shilagilo na a Bafalisayo bandya kumugilija mihayo mingi, koolecha hape giki baali bapelana no;
42011054	kunu bang'witegeelaga bapandikile ho nzila ya kungwasha mu kalungalungile kakwe.
42012001	U ng'wikanza lyenilo likasangwa likuminga ibita itaale, lya banhu mashihumbi mingi; bishiteleja nose buyipandagila na kwipandagila. U Yesu wandya kubawila tame a bahemba bakwe; uhaya giki, "Ilanghanagi ni shibimbya sha Bafalisayo, u wibeeleja wabo.
42012002	Nguno gutiho mhayo gukundikigije, uyo gutukundulilwa; nuulu gwibisile, uyo gutufunijiwa ha ng'wape.
42012003	Huna luulu, iyo mukwihoyelaga mu mbisila ikwigwiwa hape; ni yiyo mukwihwehwetelaga mu matu, bakwihaya n'ilaka lya kuhamuka, niyo bali higulya ya numba!"
42012004	"Bing'we banwani bichane, nalimuwila mutabogohage abo bakagelelaga kubulaga mili, aliyo bati na gwa kwita hangi a ha numa ya yeniyo.
42012005	Kwike leki namuhugule, nang'oolekeje uyo shiigelile mung'ogohe. Ng'ogohagi uyo ali na budula bo kubulaga, ha numa ya henaho kuponya mu nsango gwa moto; alichene, nalimuwila ng'ogohagi u ng'wenuyo!
42012006	Angu, i tuju ij'itano jitudula kujinjiwa nuulu shilingi ibili duhu? Aliyo itiho nuulu imo yajo iyo itamanilwe na Mulungu.
42012007	Lelo a bing'we bene ni nzwili jing'we i ja mu ntwe pyi i jose jimanilwe u wingi wajo. Nose hu kuhaya mutogohage, nguno a bing'we muli ba mpango ntaale no, kutinda i tuju nuulu jikakwila na ginehe!"
42012008	"Nalimuwila giki buli ng'wene uyo unikaanila ku butongi bo banhu, nu Ng'wana wa Munhu akunkaanila u ku butongi bo bamalaika ba ng'wa Mulungu.
42012009	Aliyo uyo unilema ku butongi bo banhu, nanghwe akuleng'wa u ku butongi bo bamalaika ba ng'wa Mulungu.
42012010	Hama niyo munhu ose-ose ashikile kulekejiwa nuulu akanghaya kibi u Ng'wana wa Munhu, aliyo uyo ugima kunsondagula Moyo Ng'wela, u ng'wenuyo atiko u kulekejiwa.
42012011	Na hangi nuulu bumutwala mu masinagogi, nuulu kumushisha ku butongi bo basugi na bataale, yaya u kwandya kwiganika-ganika umo mulashokeje, nuulu umo mulasomboolele.
42012012	Nguno u ng'wikanza lyenilo u Moyo Ng'wela akumulanga iyo yigeleelilwe ng'wisomboole."
42012013	Kwitulwa u ng'wibita lya banhu, munhu nebe wang'wila giki, "Nangi, nali na ng'wanong'wise, ng'wilage aninhe nane u ngabo go wingiji!"
42012014	Nanghwe u Yesu unshokeja ung'wila, "Bebe, nani uyo wanituulile u nene kubiza namuji nuulu ngabanhya a ha gati ying'we?"
42012015	Huna ubawila giki, "Ikalagi miso; niyo ilanghanagi nayo pyi i mihayo ya kwikumva, nguno u bupanga bo ng'wa munhu buti mu wingi bo shikolo isho ali nasho."
42012016	Ha numa ya henaho ubawila lusumo uhaya giki, "Ngunda gwa nsabi nebe gukapya chiza, upona.
42012017	Na luulu wandya kwideedenghanya aliwila giki, 'Aliyo i gete, niite ginehe iki naligayiwa a ha kwituula i mhona yane yeniyi!'
42012018	Kwimanila ohaya, 'Yu, i gete guyu u gwa kwita: nakubasambagula pye a bana maluuli bane, nabeeje gangi mapya, niyo mataale; nakumingile ng'wenumo pyi i shiliwa ni sabo yane.
42012019	Ulu numala u kwita giko niwila giki, "Haho luulu bupanga bone, uli na shikolo shingi shawiza sha kutumamila myaka mingi; ifuulage ulye na kung'wa, uyege!" '
42012020	Aliyo u Mulungu akang'wila giki, 'Bebe mbuuli, i gisi iki u bujiku bo lelo wenubu bakukwingija u bupanga wako, i shikolo shenishi wibikilaga shikubiza sha ng'wa nani?'
42012021	H'umo ali buli ng'wene uyo akibikilaga sabo jakwe wei ng'wenekili, aliyo u kuli Mulungu ati na sabo yose-yose!"
42012022	Huna u Yesu ubawila a bahemba bakwe giki, "Kulwa nguno yeniyo nalimuwila yaya u kwikala mukukoya-koyelaga bupanga, giki mukulya ki, nuulu mibili ying'we, giki mukuzwala ki!
42012023	Nguno u bupanga buli butaale kutinda shiliwa, nu mili gushiheebile i shizwalo.
42012024	Alijiganikilagi i noni, i joi jitabibaga nuulu jitagesaga, na hangi jiti na numba ya kubikila shiliwa, nuulu jiti na maluuli; aliyo u Mulungu akajilishaga. A bing'we mujikilile kule no i noni!
42012025	I gisi aliho nani nuulu umo wing'we uyo adugije kwiyongeleleja i likanza lya bulamu bokwe kulwa kwiyanga-yangila wei ng'wenekili?
42012026	Na luulu ulu mutadugije nuulu kugwita u mhayo u ndo gwenuyu, nibuli ikumukoyaga i yingi?
42012027	Aligiganikilagi nuulu mabonji umo gakakulilaga; a goyi gatatumamaga, nuulu shizwalo gatabeejaga; aliyo nalimuwila giki nuulu u Solomoni hamo n'ikujo lyakwe pyi i lyose umo lyali, wali atadugije kuzwalila chiza kushisha kulenganila nuulu na limo lyago.
42012028	Bing'we ba kuzunya kudo, u Mulungu uyo akazwalikaga maswa ga mu matogolo chiza giko, ayo galiho i lelo aliyo a ha ntondo gaponyiwa mu moto, angu a bing'we atudula kung'witila mitaale kutinda?
42012029	Huna luulu, oyagi u kwikala mukukoya-koyaga kukooba isho mulalye, nuulu isho mulang'we; yaya u kwikala ng'wenenghalaga.
42012030	Nguno pye a ba mu si abo bataamanile Mulungu hu bene abo bakakoya-koyaga kushikooba i shenishi; aliyo a bing'we, u Sing'we amanile giki shing'wigeleelilwe mubize nasho.
42012031	Hu kuhaya bukoobagi tame u butemi bokwe, ni shose ishi mukongejiwa."
42012032	"A bing'we i chene muli idale ido, kwike mutogohage, nguno u Sing'we gunyegije gwa kung'winha u butemi a bing'we.
42012033	Jinjagi i shikolo shing'we mufunye manongho, ng'wibeegeje mbogoshi jiti ja kukuluhala; mubize na wibikija wa buja na buja ng'wigulu, uko ng'wibi atiko kwegeela, nuulu fufuuji jitudula kukenaagula.
42012034	Nguno aho ubisilile i sabo yako, ni ngholo yako ilolelile henaho."
42012035	"Itungagi i mikimbili, ni tala jing'we jibize jilibaka.
42012036	Mubize giti banhu banindiilile saabo-bugonzo, kushisha aho alashokele kufuma ku bukombe. Ulu ushika utula hoodi ha nyango, haho na haho bunugulila.
42012037	Bakubiza na mbango a basese benabo, u saabo-bugonzo ulu ubasanga bali miso; nalimuwila gwa nghana, akwitunga abinhe ha kwigasha, huna abalonja-longeje shiliwa.
42012038	Adugije kwiza hiilu, nuulu bujiku ha gati, aliyo ikubiza yawiza no u ku basese benabo ulu ubasanga bali miso.
42012039	Kwike managi giki u namugi ha ng'wakwe ulu ni walideeba i likanza lya kwiza kwa ng'wibi ni atilekanigije i numba yakwe ikambagulwe.
42012040	Huna luulu, na a bing'we ikalagi nzugulu-matu, nguno u Ng'wana wa Munhu akwiza ng'wikanza ilo mutuliganikilaga."
42012041	U Petelo ubuja, "Seeba ulituwila bise duhu u lusumo lwenulu, nuulu ulibawila pye na a bangi?"
42012042	Nanghwe u Seeba uhaya, "I gisi nani u mikijiwa u nsanyiwa na ng'witegeleja, uyo ashikile kutuulwa na ise-bugonzo ha nimo gwa kubagabanhya batumami ba ha kaya mheela jabo ng'wikanza ilo ligeleelilwe?
42012043	U nsese uyo usangwa nu ise-bugonzo akwitaga umo alagililwe, akubiza ali na mbango no.
42012044	Nalimuwila go nghana giki, u ise-bugonzo akuntuula ha butaale bo shikolo shakwe shose.
42012045	Aliyo u nsese ng'wenuyo ulu wandya kwiwila u mu ngholo yakwe giki, 'Yu, wadilile no niyo u baba-bugonzo!' Huna ulinhya kuyubatulagula a batumami ba ha silili yakwe, bagosha na bakima; na kuyujilya na kujing'wela i sabo, wayudila aleebilwe,
