42012046	u ise-bugonzo wa nsese ng'wenuyo akwiza mu lushiku ulo atalwiganikilile, n'ikanza ilo atalimanile. Ulu ushika akumutagula mapingili-mapingili, nu ngabo gokwe agutuule ng'wigele lya bagomi.
42012047	Hangi u nsese uyo ayimanile iyo ise-bugonzo atogilwe yitwe, aliyo uleka u kwidilila nuulu kwiyita, akutulwa hataale no.
42012048	Aliyo uyo wita mu butumana mihayo iyo yigeleelilwe nsango gwa kutulwa, u ng'wene akutulwa hado. Uyo winhwa shingi akulomva shingi, nu yuyo abikijiwe shingi kutinda, nanghwe bakunomba shingi kutinda."
42012049	"U nene nizile kuponeja moto u mu si, nose i nghumbu jane jili giki ulu ni gulibaka i haha!
42012050	Nali na bubatiijiwa ubo shinigeleelilwe kubatiijiwa; aliyo u mhayo gwenuyu gulinikoya no kushisha gushikiile!
42012051	Muliganika nenhile mhola u mu si? Iti giko na hado yaya; nenhile wilemeelwa.
42012052	Nguno kufuma ikanza ili, banhu batano bakwikala mu kaya imo; aliyo bakubiza balekanile.
42012053	U namhala akwilemeelwa na ng'witunja okwe, nu ng'witunja akwilemeelwa nu ise; u ngikulu nanghwe akwilemeelwa na nshike okwe, nu nshike akwilemeelwa nu nina. Hangi u ngikulu akwilemeelwa na ng'winga okwe; u ng'winga nanghwe akwilemeelwa nu nina bukwi."
42012054	Na a mabita ga banhu ugawila giki, "Ulu ng'wabona ilunde lyabuuka u ku ng'weli haho na haho mukahayaga, 'Lelo ikutula mbula;' na nghana yaja chene.
42012055	Nuulu gwahemba nyaga gufumile mu dakama nahene mukahayaga, 'Lelo i liimi likuseba' nghana gwashikiila.
42012056	Bing'we bibeeleja, ng'wakuyumanija kagalukile ka si na malunde, aliyo i likanza ili i lyene ni ginehe limulemeelile u kulimanija?"
42012057	"Nibuli a bing'we mulemeelilwe u kububona u butungilija u mu kalamulile king'we benekili?
42012058	Nguno ulu uli na ng'wilemeelwa wako mujile kuli namuji, shiigelile ubeeje masala masoga aho mutaali mu nzila, uwinje u wilemeelwa; wiyigwe nanghwe kuko ataali kukushisha u kuli namuji. Nguno u namuji akukutuula mu makono ga nshilikale, nanghwe u nshilikale akukuponya mu jeela.
42012059	Nalikuwila utalafuma mo nuulu hado, aho utaali kumala kulipa kushisha senti ya kumalija."
42013001	I likanza lyenilo, bamo abo baali henaho bung'wila mihayo ya bana Galilaya balebe, abo Pilato wali wababulaga ng'wikanza lya kufunya shitambo shabo!
42013002	Nanghwe u Yesu ubashokeja alihaya, "Muliganika giki a bana Galilaya abo ikabilongela i yeniyo, baali na shibi kutinda pye a bana Galilaya a bangi?
42013003	Nalimuwila iti giko na hado yaya, aliyo ulu mutagalukile, na a bing'we pyi mukuyagala giko!
42013004	Nuulu hamo muliganika giki a banhu abo ikumi na banaane abo bakagwilwa numba mu Siloamu buucha, baali bakenaaguji no kutinda pye a bikaji ba Yelusalemu?
42013005	Nalimuwila iti giko na hado yaya, aliyo ulu mutagalukile na a bing'we pyi mukuyagala giko!"
42013006	Huna ubinha lusumo uhaya giki, "Munhu nebe wali wahamba ntini mu ngunda gokwe, aliyo buli ikanza ulu wiza ho kulola matwajo wali atapandikaga!
42013007	Nose ung'wila u nimi, 'Ulibona giki yashikaga myaka idatu i haha nakumanaga niza a ha ntini gwenuyu kulola matwajo, aliyo nduhu nuulu kupandika; i gete gubbutage wa, nibuli gwikale gunikenaaguja ilaale lyane sagala duhu!'
42013008	Nanghwe u nimi ung'wila, 'Baba, gulekage nahene u ng'waka gwenuyu duhu nagugeme kugubeeja-beegeja, nagutuulile na maboleela-boleela.
42013009	Ulu gutwaja ikubeelela, aliyo ulu iti chene, nahene ukugubbuta!' "
42013010	Lushiku lungi yali sabato, u Yesu walangaga ng'wisinagogi limo lyaho.
42013011	Walimo na nkima wali wagunghumiwa moyo gwa bugokolo; wali atadugije kugungumuka kushisha ikanza lya myaka ikumi n'inaane!
42013012	U Yesu aho wamona ung'witana ung'wila giki, "Bebe mayu otaligulagwa u mu makoye gako."
42013013	Untuulila makono, haho na haho ugungumuka wandya kunkumilija Mulungu.
42013014	U ntaale w'isinagogi akapelana no aho wabona giki u Yesu wampija munhu ha sabato, ubawila a banhu giki, "Bing'we, jiliho shiku itandatu i ja kutumama milimo, mulizage ng'wapijiwa u mu jenijo, yaya a ha lushiku lo sabato!"
42013015	Nanghwe u Yesu unshokeja giki, "Bing'we bibeeleja, i gisi a ha sabato buli ng'wene u mu bing'we atataligulilaga ng'ombe nuulu nzobe yakwe waja kwing'wisha?
42013016	Al'u munhu uyu oluhiwa na Shetani ikanza lya myaka ikumi n'inaane i yose iyo, niyo hangi nshike o ng'wa Abulahamu gete, nibuli atigeleelilwe u ng'wene u kwifuujiwa a ha sabato?"
42013017	Aho wihaya i yeniyo pye abo bang'witilaga wilu bakagooka kibi no! Pyi i libita lya banhu bikumilija i yawiza iyo akabeeja.
42013018	Huna uhaya giki, "U butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu bubizile giti ki? Himba ulu kuwikolanija na ki?
42013019	U boi buli giti kabiyu ka haladali, ako munhu akakasola uukakahamba mu ngunda gokwe. Kahayuzwa kukula gubiza nti ntaale, kushisha nose na noni ja kulala jupandika wikalo u mu matambi gago."
42013020	Hanuma hangi uhaya, "Nawikolanije na ki u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu?
42013021	Wiyikolile na shibimbya, isho nkima akasola ugulanya mu ngele idatu ja busu, shubududumya pyi u bose."
42013022	U Yesu aho alija Yelusalemu, waja akulangaga u mu mizengo nu mu magunguli.
42013023	Kuhayimanila munhu nebe omuja giki, "Seeba, angu mmho i gete abo bakupijiwa bali bagehu no?" Nanghwe ubawila giki,
42013024	"Igaganijagi u kubitila a ha nyango u mpine, nguno bali bingi abo bakugema u kwingila aliyo bakulemeelwa!
42013025	Managi giki, u ng'wenekili kaya ulu ulinda wimiila kugulugala u nyango, ning'we ng'usangwa mutaali hanze, mukutula no i hoodi, kunu mukuhayaga; 'Seeba tulugulilage nise!' Aliyo u wei akumushokeja amuwile giki, 'A bing'we natumumanaga, pyi nu kuko mulifuma!'
42013026	Ning'we mukuhaya, 'Angu twalyaga na kung'wa hamo nangho; hama niyo u bebe walomeelaga nu mu mapanda gise!'
42013027	Akumushokeja amuwile giki, 'Bing'we biiti ba mihayo yabubi, nalimuwila natumanaga uko mulifuma, ningilagi a henaha!'
42013028	Kukubiza ho kulila, na kushelanya mino; ulu ng'ubabona u mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu a ba Abulahamu na Isaka na Yakobo; hamo na a bahangi a bose, aliyo a bing'we ng'waponyiagwa hanze!
42013029	Banhu bakufuma kiya na ng'weli, bangi sukuma na dakama bize bigashe kulya shiliwa u mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu.
42013030	Kwike baliho aha abo bali ku numa, aliyo bakubiza ku butongi, na a babo bali ku butongi, abo bakubiza ba ku numa!"
42013031	I likanza lyenilo biza Bafalisayo kung'wila giki, "Ni winga a henaha, nguno u Helode alikooba kukubulaga!"
42013032	Nanghwe ubawila, "Jagi mukiwile i nyamhawa yeniyo giki, 'I lelo ni ntondo nalimalija kupeeja masamva na kupija banhu, u lo kadatu lwaho nakubiza namala-maja.'
42013033	Kwike inigeleelilwe nabize mu lugendo i lelo ni ntondo, ni ntondo bungi; nguno itadulikanile u nghangi achile hanze ya Yelusalemu!
42013034	Ee, Yelusalemu, Yelusalemu mulagi o bahangi; bebe uyo ukabapondaga mawe abo ukatumilagwa. Nashishaga nghangala jinga nakugemaga kubakuminga-kuminga a baana bako, git'umo ngoko ikakumingilaga zwiyu jayo, yajibandila mu manana gayo; aliyo mutatogilwe!
42013035	Managi giki ng'walekelagwa i numba ying'we. Nguno nalimuwila mutunibona hangi kushisha aho mukuhaya giki, 'Ali na mbango uyo aliza mu lina lya ng'wa Seeba!' "
42014001	Ikabiza ho sabato ndebe, u Yesu uja ha ng'wa ntaale umo wa Bafalisayo, uukingila mu kaya kulya shiliwa. A boi bandya kung'witega-tega giki bamone umo aliitile.
42014002	Nguno a ha butongi bokwe oliho munhu asaatile busaatu bo kududuma mili.
42014003	Huna u Yesu ubawila a balangi ba shilagilo na a Bafalisayo, uhaya giki; "Bing'we, a ha sabato izuniligije u kupija nuulu yaya?"
42014004	Bugayiwa u gwa kunshokeja. Huna undima u nsaatu umpija, unaga uja.
42014005	Hanuma ubawila a boi giki, "I gisi, a bing'we ulu umo wing'we ali na ng'wana nuulu ng'ombe, huna yugwila ng'wichongo ha lushiku lo sabato, nani uyo atukalagana kwifunya mo haho na haho?"
42014006	Nahene batanshokegije mhayo u mu yeniyi.
42014007	Aho wababona baliyisolela masumbi ga makujo abo baali balaalikwa, ubawila mu shigemenghejo giki,
42014008	"Ulu ulaalikwa na munhu kuja ku buyegi bo bukombe, utizushikila kwigasija isumbi ly'ikujo, atizubiza na munhu ungi alaalikilwe, uyo hamo niyo akujiwe kutinda u bebe.
42014009	Huna uyo wamulaalikile bubili wing'we ashikile kwiza ukuwila giki, 'Bebe, ingaga a henaho igashe u baba uyu!' A henaho ukugooka no, nguno ukushoka ha wigasho bo ha silili.
42014010	Aliyo ulu ulaalikwa shikilaga ha wigasho bo ha silili, huna ulu wiza uyo wamulaalikile, akukuwila giki; 'Ong'wise, jaga ukigasije lilo a higulya aho.' U mu giko ukubonekana uli na shingilima u ku butongi wa bose abo wigashaga nabo.
42014011	Nguno buli ng'wene uyo wigunguhya wei ng'wenekili akudohelejiwa, aliyo uyo widohya akugunguhiwa."
42014012	Uyo wali wang'wegeleja kulya shiliwa nanghwe ung'wila giki, "U bebe nangho ulu ubeeja shiliwa sha kuyega na banhu, yaya u kusolanhya banwani biyo duhu u mu kalaalikile, nuulu hamo ba mu kaya ya ng'wing'we duhu. Nuulu baduguyo na bazenganwa biyo a basabi duhu, abo umanile giki bashikile kukulaalika nu bebe; nangho upandike mheela mu giko.
42014013	Aliyo ulu ubeeja shiliwa sha kuyega na banhu, bitanage a bahabi na a bagokolo, na a balemehazu, na a babboku.
42014014	U mu kwita giko ukubiza na mbango; nguno a boi bati na mheela ya kukwinha, aliyo ukwinhwa ng'wikanza lya bujuuko wa batungilija."
42014015	Umo wa babo baali bigasha nanghwe u Yesu aho wigwa i yeniyo uhaya giki, "Ali na mbango buli ng'wene uyo akulya shiliwa u mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu."
42014016	Nanghwe ung'wila giki, "Munhu nebe akabeeja shigukulu shitaale, ulaalika banhu bingi.
42014017	Aho lyashika i likanza lya shiliwa utuma nsese wakwe kujubitana abo baali balaalikwa. Kubawila giki, 'Bing'we nzugi luulu, nguno i haha pyi i shose shalonjiagwa.'
42014018	Aliyo bakabiza giti baali balagana pye a bose, buli ng'wene ulomba kulekejiwa. Umo ung'wila giki, 'Baba, naagulile ilaale, nalija kulilola, nalikulomba unilekeje nguno natudula u kwiza.'
42014019	Ungi uhaya, 'Baba, naagulile tuyiku ikumi twa kulima, nalija kutugema; na luulu nalikulomba unilekeje, nguno natudula u kwiza.'
42014020	Na ungi hangi nanghwe uhaya, 'Yee, baba ka naatoolile haha no, na luulu natudula u kwiza!'
42014021	U nsese ng'wenuyo wiza wihaya pyi i yeniyo u kuli ise-bugonzo. U ng'wenekili kaya akapelana no, ung'wila u nsese wakwe giki. 'Jaga wangu pye a hose u mu nzengo; ubita-bita u mu nzila i nhaale ni ndo; ubenhe aha a bahabi na a bagokolo, na a babboku, na a balema.'
42014022	Nanghwe u nsese uhaya, 'Baba uyo uliguhaya gwenuyo gwamalaga kwitwa, aliyo i numba itaali u kokala!'
42014023	U ise-bugonzo ung'wila u nsese ng'wenuyo giki, 'Jaga na ku mapanda, pyi nu ku mayila a mataale, uubakomeleja na nguzu bize, kushisha yokale i numba yane!
42014024	Nguno nalimuwila giki, pye abo baali balaalikilwe atiho nuulu umo wabo uyo akushiloja nuulu hado i shiliwa sha ha ng'wane!' "
42014025	Mabita na mabita ga banhu gankuubijaga u Yesu, nanghwe aho wabagalukila ubawila giki,
42014026	"Ose-ose ulu wiza kuli nene aliyo atankolilwe ise nuulu nina, nuulu nke, nuulu baana bakwe, nuulu baana ba ng'wawe bagosha na bakima; pyi nuulu bupanga bokwe wei ng'wenekili, atudula u kubiza nghemba wane.
42014027	Nuulu uyo alinilondeela aliyo atibuukigije nsalaba gokwe wei ng'wenekili, nu ng'wene atudula u kubiza nghemba wane.
42014028	Angu, aliho munhu ki u mu bing'we uyo adugije kwandya nzenga aho ataali kwigasha tame na kubulola u budito bo nzenga yeniyo, abone ulu ali najo i sabo ja kudula kwimala?
42014029	Nguno atizugelela kutuula nsingi duhu, huna ulemeelwa u kwishikilija. A henaho abo bakubonaga bakwandya kuyunseka
42014030	balihaya giki, 'Mulimona u ng'wing'wana uyu; oli wihamba-hambile nzenga, yanemeelile u kwimalija!'
42014031	Nuulu hangi, ntemi ki ulu ali na bashilikale shihumbi ikumi, uyo atandya igashe tame kwiganika chiza ulu adugije kwamba bulugu kwilwisha na ntemi ng'wiye, uyo aliza kundumila na bashilikale shihumbi makumi abili?
42014032	Ulu ubona giki atudula, akutuma nhung'wa wangu u kuli ng'wanishi kuko ataali kule, amane ulu shiliho shose-shose isho shidugije kwenha mhola.
42014033	Nose luulu na a bing'we, buli ng'wene uyo atudula kulekana gete najo i sabo jakwe pyi i jose, atudula u kubiza nghemba wane!
42014034	U munhu nghana guli gwawiza, aliyo u munhu ulu gulinda gusuuka, angu, gudugije kusanduchiwa ki hangi?
42014035	Gutudula nuulu kugunaana si, pyi nuulu ni kutumama giti mboleela; gukubiza gwa kuponyiwa hanze duhu! Uyo ali na matu gakigwaga ni igwage."
42015001	Pye a batobisha ba goodi na a banhu a bangi a ba shibi, bang'wegeelaga kundegeleka.
42015002	A Bafalisayo na a balangi ba shilagilo bandya kung'ung'uula balihaya giki, "U munhu ng'wenuyu akwanukulaga banhu ba shibi; niyo ni shiliwa akulyaga nabo!"
42015003	Huna u Yesu ubawila lusumo ulu uhaya giki,
42015004	"I gisi nani u mu bing'we ulu ubiza ali na ngholo igana huna ujimiija imo yajo, uyo atujileka ijo makumi kenda na kenda ku matogolo, uja akwikoobaga iyo yatagalijaga, kushisha aho alayipandikile?
42015005	Ulu wipandika akuyega no; niyo hangi akwisesela ha mabega,
42015006	itwale kaya. Wa kuhayishisha u ku kaya, ubakuminga banwani biye na bazenganwa; ubawila giki, 'Bing'we, nzugi tuyege, nguno nipandika i ngholo yane iyo yali yajimiilile!'
42015007	Nalimuwila h'umo buli nu buyegi bo ng'wigulu kulwa nguno ya ng'wa munhu nkenaaguji umo ulu ugaluka; kutinda batungilija makumi kenda na kenda abo bati na nguno ya kugaluka!"
42015008	"Nuulu hangi, aliho nkima ki ulu ali na hela i hela ijo jilihayiwa, buli yene u mpango gwayo gwali shilingi shihumbi shingi.' jakwe ikumi, huna ujimiija imo yajo, uyo atiko kubacha tala nuulu na kupyagula u mu kaya akwikoobaga mu welwa-ngholo, kushisha aho alayipandikile?
42015009	Ulu wipandika u buyegi bokwe bukubiza butaale no, kushisha nose akwitana binhya biye na bazenganwa biye abawile giki, 'I hela yane iyi yali yajimiilaga nipandika; nzugi tuyege hamo!'
42015010	Nalimuwila h'umo bukabizilaga u buyegi nu ku bamalaika ba ng'wa Mulungu, kulwa nguno ya ng'wa munhu umo nkenaaguji ulu ugaluka."
42015011	Hangi uhaya, "Munhu nebe wali na bitunja babili.
42015012	U ndo wabo ung'wila u ise giki, 'Baba ninhage u nene u ngabo go wingiji bone.' U namhala ubagabanhya i sabo yakwe.
42015013	Jitabitile shiku ningi, u ndo ukumingija pyi i shikolo shakwe, uhuluja ajile ku masi ga kule. Uukajimala i sabo jakwe kujiponanja mu nzila ja sagala-sagala.
42015014	Aho wamala pyi i shikolo shakwe, kwimanila yagwa nzala nhaale pye a hose u mu si yeniyo, ubiza na makoye mataale no!
42015015	Huna uja ha ling'wana ijigajiga lya mu si yeniyo, lyukang'winha nimo gwa kuyudiima ngulubi.
42015016	Nanghwe uyikumva kulya a muula ayo jalyaga i ngulubi, kwike wali atiho nuulu umo wa kung'winha shose-shose!
42015017	Aliyo aho giyegeela a masala, wiwila giki, 'U baba ali na bitumamija ba mheela banga abo bakulyaga shiliwa biguta bashileka na kushileka, aliyo u nene uuyu nalibulagwa nzala aha!
42015018	I gete naje u kuli baba nakangwile mu magulu nang'wile giki, "Baba naahubile u ng'wigulu nu kuli bebe.
42015019	Natigeleelilwe u kwitanwa giki nali ng'wana wako hangi; niitage kubiza umo wa batumami bako!" '
42015020	Na nghana ubuuka uja u kuli ise, aliyo aho ataali kule, u ise unoleela, unsaatwa. Unsung'wanha bo nhambo. Uukashikila kungwila unkumbatila mu nhingo, kunu akumbipaga.
42015021	U wei u nyanda wandya kung'wibuulila u ise alihaya giki, 'Baba, nali nghubi no, u ng'wigulu nu kuli bebe; natigeleelilwe u kwitanwa giki nali ng'wana wako!'
42015022	Aliyo u ise ubawila a batumami giki, 'Bing'we, enhagi wangu shizwalo shawiza ng'wize munzwalikije; ng'wenhe na pete munzwalikije u ku lwala lokwe, na shilatu sha kuzwala u ku mhambala jakwe.
42015023	I muuga ya ng'ombe, i ng'inu, yenhagi nayo ng'wisinze; tulye tuyege!
42015024	Nguno u ng'witunja wane ng'wenuyu wapulugukaga kwinga mu kucha, wilongaga kwinga mu kujimiila!' Bandya nghana kuyega.
42015025	Kwike u ng'witunja wakwe u ntaale akasangwa oli ku ngunda, aho aliza wahayegeela a ha kaya, uyigwa i mbina, ni mhundu jilizilinghanya.
42015026	Ung'witana umo wa badinha a batumami, umuja a makulu ga mihayo yeniyo.
42015027	Nanghwe ung'wila giki, 'Wizaga u nzunayo, u namhala wamulagilaga i muuga ya ng'ombe i ng'inu, nguno wampandikaga ali mhola o gili-gili!'
42015028	Aliyo u wei akapelana no, wisukula; ulema nu kwingila u mu kaya. Ufuma u ise kung'wikumbilija ingile.
42015029	Nanghwe ushosha aling'wila u ise giki, 'U bebe ng'wenekili umanile gete, giki i myaka na myaka pyi i yose iyi, naliho aha nakukutumamilaga, nataali kukenaagula nuulu shilagilo shako shimo na hado yaya; i gisi oninha ki u nene? Angu nduhu nuulu ni kabuli kamo duhu, giki nane nalye nayege na basumba bichane.
42015030	Lelo aho wiza u ng'wana wako, u ng'wene wantona ing'ombe gete; aliyo hu wakajiponangije i sabo jako sagala-sagala, akulyaga na mamalahya!'
42015031	Nanghwe u ise unshokeja ung'wila, 'Ng'wana wane, u bebe uli ha kaya aha pyi i shiku; pyi i shikolo shane shili shako.
42015032	Na nghana shitwigeleelilwe tuyege na kutambiila, nguno u nzunayo ng'wenuyu wapulugukaga kwinga mu kucha, wilongaga kufuma mu kujimiila.' "
42016001	A bahemba bakwe nabo ubawila lusumo; uhaya giki, "Waliho munhu nsabi, wali na nanghani o sabo jakwe. U nanghani ng'wenuyo ubuulwa, giki akujiponanjaga sagala i sabo ja nsabi ng'wenuyo.
42016002	Huna ung'witana umuja giki, 'Bebe, mhayo ki u gwenuyu nandije kwigwa gukuhayiagwa? Alinoolekejage u nimo gwa bulanghani wako nagulole umo guli. Nalibona i gete ukugoya u nimo gwenuyu, u go kujilanghana i sabo jane!'
42016003	U nanghani o sabo ng'wenuyo wandya kwiwila giki, 'I gisi, niite ginehe iki u baba-bugonzo alininja a ha nimo? U kulima nalemeelilwe, u kwandya kwilombeleja ni chene nalicha minala!
42016004	Yu, i gete namana u gwa kwita; uyo gukubiita bayuneegeleja u mu kaya jabo ulu nalinjiwe a ha nimo!'
42016005	Huna wandya kubitana umo-umo abo batondagwa magasa nu ise-bugonzo. O kwandya ung'wila giki, 'U bebe, ni uli na bugasa ki nghana u kuli namhala?'
42016006	Nanghwe uhaya 'Ngelekelo igana ja maguta.' Ung'wila, 'Anukulaga jiiji aha mbapula jako, wigashe wandike makumi atano; niyo kangilijaga.'
42016007	Na ungi ung'wila, 'Al'u bebe ginehe, uli na bugasa ki?' Uhaya, 'Matangwa igana ga busiga?' Ung'wila, 'Solaga nangho i mbapula jako, andikaga makumi anaane!'
42016008	U ise-bugonzo o nanghani u nyeecha ng'wenuyo akankumilija, iki akatumamila masala u kwiyita i yeniyo. Nguno a baana ba mu si bachaguku u ku mihayo yabo, kutinda a baana ba ng'wisana u mu shibyalilwe shabo.
42016009	Nalimuwila itumamilagi i sabo ya bunyeecha kwibeegeja bunwani, ulu yushila bakung'wanukula u mu wikalo bo welelo.
42016010	U munhu uyo ali ng'wishigwa mu shikolo shido ashikile kusanyiwa nu mu shitaale; aliyo uyo ati ntungilija mu shido, nu mu shitaale atubiza ntungilija.
42016011	Nose luulu ulu ng'ubiza muti bishigwa u ku sabo ya mu si, nani uyo alamusanye u ku sabo ya nghana?
42016012	Na hangi ulu ng'ulemeelwa kubiza bishigwa ku shikolo sha bangi, nani uyo alang'winhe shikolo shibize shing'we benekili?
42016013	Atiho ntumami wa mu kaya uyo adugije kubatumamila bataale babili, nguno adugije kunkolwa umo wabo, untogwa u ungi; nuulu adugije kwiyigwa nu umo, aliyo u ungi undalaha. Mutudula kuntumamila u Mulungu hamo na sabo!"
42016014	A Bafalisayo iki baali batogilwe sabo, aho biyigwa pyi i yeniyo bakandalaha; bandya kung'wineenelegeja.
42016015	Nanghwe ubawila, "A bing'we angu mukiyoolechaga u ku banhu giki muli batungilija, aliyo u Mulungu ajideebile i ngholo jing'we; nguno isho shikakumilijiagwa na banhu shili sha malofu u kuli Mulungu.
42016016	I shilagilo na a bahangi, bagelelile hali Yohana; u kwingiila a h'ikanza lyenilo u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu bukulomeelagwa, na buli ng'wene akwigaganijaga u kwingila moi.
42016017	Aliyo ili shinogu i ligulu ni si u kubita, kutinda kwinga ho nuulu kanuguta kadoololo ka shilagilo.
42016018	Munhu ose-ose ulu uneka nke utoola ungi, akubiza alishihya. Nu yuyo alantoole u nkima uyo alekilwe na ngoshi, nanghwe akubiza akushihyaga.
42016019	"Ali luulu, waliho ngosha nsabi, wikalaga azwalile nghanjo ya nyasabi ya nzulunge, na shikoye shisoga; wali mu kikalile ka kuyegela bupanga pyi i shiku ja bulamu bokwe.
42016020	Hama waliho na kunese nebe witanagwa Lazalo: wali okalile malonda pyi u mili. U munhu ng'wenuyo wenhagwa wiza watuulwa ha mita go nsabi ng'wenuyo,
42016021	giki ayupandika nuulu malagalikwa kufuma a ha meza ya nsabi walya; na mva jizaga ho jayugalambila a malonda gakwe!
42016022	Nose u kunese ng'wenuyo ucha, ubuuchiwa na bamalaika; uukatuulwa ku wikalo bo ng'wa Abulahamu. U nsabi ng'wenuyo nanghwe ucha, ujikwa.
42016023	Aho ali mu kulimu uyuluha no, wahayuponya a miso gakwe unoleela kule u Abulahamu, ali nu Lazalo bigashije dege.
42016024	Ulila n'ilaka; uhaya, 'Baba Abulahamu, nichilage shigongo, untume u Lazalo asombye nuulu lwala lokwe mu minzi alutwinije u lulimi lone alupoje; nguno nali na makoye no u mu moto gwenuyu!'
42016025	Nanghwe u Abulahamu unshokeja giki, 'Bebe ng'wana, izukagwa giki u bebe u mu bupanga wako wapandikaga i yako i misoga. U Lazalo nanghwe wapandikaga yabubi, aliyo i haha nanghwe ali mu buyegi; u bebe uli mu buluhi.
42016026	Niyo hangi a higulya ya yose yeniyi, a ha gati ying'we na a bise lituulilwe ho ishimayenze, nose abo batogilwe kwinga u ku lwandi lwise kwiza ku bing'we batudula; na a babo batogilwe kwiza kuunu kufuma uko muli nabo batudula.'
42016027	Ung'wila hangi giki, 'Nahene shi luulu baba nalikwikumbilija, nuulu untume u ku kaya ya ng'wa baba.
42016028	Nguno nali na baana bang'wise batano; aje akabahugule batiziza nabo u kuunu; kubi no!'
42016029	U Abulahamu ung'wila hangi giki, 'Bali nanghwe u Musa na a bahangi, ni babigwage benabo.'
42016030	Nanghwe unshokeja uhaya, 'Iti chene baba Abulahamu, aliyo ulu wigela munhu wa kufuma mu bafu aje uko bali, badugije u kugaluka.'
42016031	U Abulahamu ung'wila hangi giki, 'Ulu bulinda bulemeelwa kung'wigwa u Musa na a bahangi, batiko u kuhuguka na hado yaya nuulu akilonga ose-ose wa kufuma mu bafu!' "
42017001	Huna ubawila hangi a bahemba bakwe giki, "Itadulikanile i sha kwipamya shileke u kubiza ho; kwike u munhu wa kushenheleja ali mu kwihiga kutaale no!
42017002	Ikumeelela ulu kutungilijiwa u mu nhingo yakwe iwe lya kushela, uukaponejiwa mu nyanza shimu, kutinda kung'wenheleja kwipama nuulu umo wa bado-bado aba.
42017003	Bing'we, ilanghanagi; ulu ng'wiyo ukuhuba nghugulage.
42017004	Nuulu akakuhuba nghangala mpungati u mu lushiku, hama ushisha nghangala mpungati alikala ukushokeela kukuwila giki, 'Nilekejage'; nekejage nghana!"
42017005	Huna a batung'wa bung'wila u Seeba giki, "Tongejage u kuzunya."
42017006	Nanghwe u Seeba ubawila, "Ulu ng'ubiza na kuzunya giti gwa kabiyu ka haladali, mushikile nuulu kuguwila nkuyu git'uyu giki, 'Dubbukaga winge a henaho uje ukihambe mu nyanza.' Nghana gukung'wigwa."
42017007	"I gisi nghana, ulu munhu ali na nsese, huna u nsese ng'wenuyo ubiza wajaga kulima, nuulu wachilulaga mitugo; ulu uukashoka a ha kaya, nani u mu bing'we uyo akushikila kung'wila giki, 'Nzugu wigashe aha ulye?'
42017008	Angu, atung'wila duhu giki, 'Bebe, itungage ukangilije u kunibeeja-beegeja tame u nene i shiliwa unitengele naboneke; ulu nalamale nangho ukwigasha ulye?'
42017009	Akunumbilija u nsese ng'wenuyo kulwa kushikilija iyo alagililwe kwita?
42017010	H'umo ili nu ku bing'we, ulu ng'ulinda ng'umala u kwita pyi iyo mulagililwe, hayagi giki; 'A bise tuti na solobo yose-yose, nguno tuli basese duhu; twabeejaga iyo itwigeleelilwe kwibeeja!' "
42017011	U Yesu aho wabuuka kuja Yelusalemu ubitila nzila ya mu lubimbi lo Samalia na Galilaya.
42017012	Aho washika mu chalo shilebe, umanhya na banhu ikumi basaatile mbiji. Bimiila ka kule,
42017013	huna bunghamukila balihaya, "Seeba Yesu, tukulilagwe!"
42017014	Aho wababona ubawila giki, "Jagi mukiyooleche ku bagabiji." Na nghana bandya u kuja; aliyo aho bataali mu nzila, bahayimanila bapila i mbiji!
42017015	Umo wabo aho wabona wapila, ushoka alinkumilija Mulungu n'ilaka lya higulya.
42017016	Ushikila kugwa mu magulu ga ng'wa Yesu, winama ha si u bushu bokwe unumba; nuwe wali Nsamalia.
42017017	Huna u Yesu ushosha uhaya, "Batapilile a bose ikumi? Al'a bangi abo kenda bali hali?
42017018	Baleka u kwilonga a ba kwiza kunumba u Mulungu, ulu at'u ngeni uyu duhu?"
42017019	Huna ung'wila, "Buukaga uje, u kuzunya kwako kwakupijaga."
42017020	Bafalisayo bakamuja mhayo gw'ikanza lya kwiza kwa butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu. Nanghwe ubashokeja ubawila giki, "U butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu butiza bukuloleelagwa!
42017021	Batandya kwiwila giki, 'Buub'aha;' nuulu giki, 'Buub'uko;' Nguno u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu buli hamo ning'we nuulu: mu bing'we.'."
42017022	Huna ubawila a bahemba giki, "Jikushika shiku ja kwikumva a bing'we kulubona nuulu lumo lwa shiku ja Ng'wana wa Munhu, aliyo mutudula u kulubona.
42017023	Ali luulu, ulu bandya kumuwila giki, 'Lolagi uko', nuulu giki, 'Lolagi aha,' yaya u kuja, yaya nuulu kubakuubija.
42017024	Nguno u mu lushiku lo Ng'wana wa Munhu ikubiza git'umo lulabi lukalabyaga ng'wilunde, kufuma ipandi limo; lwang'weka kushisha ipandi lingi.
42017025	Kwike shiigelile aluhiwe tame mu mihayo mingi na kuleng'wa ni shibyalilwe ishi.
42017026	Umo ikabizila mu shiku ja ng'wa Noa, h'umo ikubizila nu mu shiku ja Ng'wana wa Munhu.
42017027	U mu shiku jenijo balyaga, bang'waga, batoolaga, na batoolagwa; kushisha lushiku ulo Noa akingila mu ngalaba. I lihuuma aho liza lyubayagaja pye a bose!
42017028	H'umo yali nu mu shiku ja ng'wa Lutu; balyaga, bang'waga, bagulaga shikolo na kujinja, balimaga na bazengaga.
42017029	Aho lwashika u lushiku ulo Lutu akafuma u mu Sodoma, bidikilwa moto na bugota bo shibiliti, giti kutulwa mbula kufuma ng'wilunde, bushila pye!
42017030	H'umo ikubizila nu mu lushiku lo kwilonga kwa Ng'wana wa Munhu.
42017031	U mu lushiku lwenulo uyo usangwa ali kwigulya ya numba aliyo i shikolo shakwe shili mu kaya, atizika giki ashisole; nu yuyo ali ku malaale nanghwe atizushokela shikolo ku numa.
42017032	Ng'wizukagwi u nke o ng'wa Lutu!
42017033	Buli ng'wene u wa kwihamba kulanghana bupanga bokwe akubujimiija, aliyo u wa kubujimiija, u ng'wene akubupija.
42017034	Nalimuwila u mu bujiku wenubo, banhu babili bakusangwa balaalile ha buliili bumo, umo akutwalwa ungi ulekwa.
42017035	Bakima babili bakusangwa bakwishiishaga, umo akutwalwa ungi ulekwa. [
42017036	Banhu babili bakubiza bali mu ngunda, umo akutwalwa ungi ulekwa.]"
42017037	Bahayumuja giki, "Seeba, hali?" Nanghwe ubawila, "Aho guli mimba hu hene aho jikwibilingila ni mbeshi!"
42018001	Huna ubinha lusumo lo kubalanga giki shiigelile bakomeele u kulomba, yaya u kugwa ngholo.
42018002	Uhaya giki, "Waliho namuji mu nzengo nebe, wali atang'ogohile Mulungu; na a banhu wali atabadililaga .
42018003	Hama u mu nzengo gwenuyo walimo na nkima wali wachilwa ngoshi; wikalaga uja buli gwa u kuli namuji okandayiila alihaya, 'Nigunaanage baba nali na ng'wanishi!'
42018004	Gakabita makanza atudililaga, aliyo nose wanoga wiyangula wei ng'wenekili. Wiwila giki, 'Nuulu iki natang'ogohile u Mulungu, na a banhu natabadililaga,
42018005	aliyo nahene ikubeelela nangunaane u nchilwa ng'wenuyu, nguno akunikoyaga no; iki nose waninojaga gete!' "
42018006	Huna luulu, u Seeba uhaya, "Ng'wabona umo akahayila u namuji ng'wenuyo nuulu iki wali ati ntungilija?
42018007	Angu, u Mulungu hamo na wiyumilija bokwe u bose umo ali ng'wenumo, atudula u kubagunaana a basolwa bakwe abo bakaniliilaga liimi na bujiku?
42018008	Nalimuwila akubagunaana wangu. Aliyo ulu ushoka u Ng'wana wa Munhu, angu, akusanga kuliho u kuzunya u mu si?"
42018009	Hama hangi ubinha lusumo abo bisanyaga giki a boi hu batungilija no, kunu bubadalaha pye a bangi. Ubawila giki,
42018010	"Banhu babili bakaja mu hekalu kulomba, umo wali Nfalisayo, ungi ntobisha wa goodi.
42018011	U Nfalisayo wimiila wandya kulomba alikumilija wei ng'wenekili giki, 'Mulungu, nalikulumba, nguno nati git'umo bali a banhu a bangi pye: banyeecha, bahunga, bashihani; nuulu nati git'umo ali u ntobisha wa goodi uyu!
42018012	U nene nakafungaga nghangala ibili buli nyuma, na hangi nakafunyaga imo ya ng'wikumi ya shikolo shose isho nakapandikaga!'
42018013	Aliyo u ntobisha wa goodi u ng'wene wimiila ha mhujo, uduuma nuulu kubuucha miso gakwe ng'wigulu. Ugelela kwiyinamiila duhu, uyitula-tula ha shikuba kunu alihaya giki, 'Mulungu nikulilagwe, nali munhu wa shibi u nene!'
42018014	Nalimuwila u ng'wenuyo akaja i kaya obalilagwa butungilija, kutinda u ungi uyo; nguno buli ng'wene uyo wigunguhya ng'wenekili akudohelejiwa, aliyo uyo widohya akugunguhiwa."
42018015	Bung'wenhela na baana giki abakuumye, kwike a bahemba aho bababona bubahama!
42018016	Aliyo u Yesu ubitana bize a hali we; uhaya giki, "Bazunilijagi a baana bize a hali nene, mutabalemejage; nguno u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu buli wabo a ba mbika yeniyi.
42018017	Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki uyo atuwanukula u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu giti ng'wana, atingila mo na hado yaya!"
42018018	Huna nsugi nebe umuja giki, "Nangi wawiza, niite mhayo ki nabize ng'wingiji u mu bupanga bo welelo na welelo?"
42018019	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Nibuli ulinitana wawiza? Atiho wawiza nuulu umo ulu ati Mulungu wike!
42018020	U bebe ushimanile i shilagilo umo shihayilile; i giki, 'Yaya u kushihya, Yaya u kubulaga, Yaya u kwiba, Yaya u kukaanila bulomolomo, Nkujage so na noko.' "
42018021	Nanghwe uhaya, "Pyi i yeniyi nidimile kufuma ha buyanda!"
42018022	Aliyo u Yesu aho wigwa giko ung'wila, "Ulileba ho mhayo gumo, shijinjage pyi i shikolo isho uli nasho ubinhe bahabi, ukubiza na wibikija wa sabo ng'wigulu, huna wize unilondeele."
42018023	Aho wigwa i yeniyo akapinihala no, nguno wali nsabi ntaale.
42018024	U Yesu unkalalila; huna uhaya, "Ili shilambu no abo bali na sabo u kwingila u mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu!
42018025	Niyo ili shinogu i ngamila u kubita mu kapundu ka lushinge, kutinda u nsabi u kwingila mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu!"
42018026	Abo badegelekaga bukumya no, bandya kwibuja giki, "Yee! Aliyo luulu nani uyo adugije u kupila?"
42018027	Nanghwe uhaya, "Iyo itadulikanile u ku banhu, idulikanile u kuli Mulungu."
42018028	Huna u Petelo uhaya, "I gisi angu ulibona giki a bise twaleka i shikolo shise kulwa kukulondeela bebe!"
42018029	Nanghwe u Yesu ubawila, "Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, atiho nuulu umo uyo waleka numba nuulu nke, nuulu baana ba ng'wawe, nuulu babyaji, nuulu baana bakwe kulwa nguno ya butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu,
42018030	uyo atanukula nghangala ningi u ng'wikanza lya haha ili, hama u ng'wikanza ilo liliza bupanga bo welelo na welelo."
42018031	Ubasola abo ikumi na babili, huna ubawila; "I haha tulilinha kuja Yelusalemu, managi giki ikujushikilijiwa pyi iyo yandikilwe mu bahangi kulwa Ng'wana wa Munhu.
42018032	Nguno akutuulwa mu makono ga banhu ba mahanga bangimbe nyachilu na kunsondagula na kunswila mate.
42018033	Huna ulu bumala kuntula bakumulaga, aliyo akujuuka ha lushiku lo kadatu lwaho."
42018034	Kwike batitegelegije nuulu gumo u mu yeniyo, baali bataali babisililwe; hama batamugije na a makulu gayo iyo akihaya.
42018035	Aho wegeela i Yeliko, usangwa aliho mboku nebe igashije hihi na nzila, akwilombelejaga.
42018036	Wahayigwa ibita lya banhu balibita, ubuja ni mhayo ki u gwenuyo.
42018037	Bung'wila, "Yesu wa Nazaleti alibita."
42018038	Huna wandya kuhamuka alihaya giki, "Yesu Ng'wana wa ng'wa Daudi, nikulilagwe!"
42018039	Abo baali ku butongi buyunghama giki ahuumule, aliyo u wei hu ongeja gete u kuhamuka; alihaya, "Ng'wana wa ng'wa Daudi, ka nikulilagwe!"
42018040	U Yesu wimiila ulagila enhwe aho wali; aho wegeela umuja,
42018041	"Utogilwe nakwitile mhayo ki?" Nanghwe uhaya; "Seeba, ka nayubona nane!"
42018042	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Bizagubona, u kuzunya kwako kwakupijaga."
42018043	Na nghana haho na haho wandya kubona, unondeela u Yesu kunu akunkumilijaga Mulungu. Na a banhu abo bakabona bungongoola u Mulungu.
42019001	Huna u Yesu ushikiila mu Yeliko; wabitaga mo duhu alilumbulila ajile.
42019002	Waliho ngosha nsabi, ntaale wa batobisha ba goodi; i lina lyakwe witanagwa Zakayo.
42019003	U munhu ng'wenuyo wali na nghumbu ja kumona u Yesu umo ali, aliyo akalemeelwa nguno y'ibita lya banhu, niyo hangi wali nguhi wa baguhi.
42019004	Huna wimeema nhambo ajile ku butongi, uukalinha mu nkuyu giki amone chiza u Yesu, nguno gwali haho ni nzila iyo wabitilaga.
42019005	U Yesu aho washika a h'ipandi lyenilo, ulangamila koi u kwigulya unola; huna ung'wila, "Bebe Zakayo, ikaga wangu, nguno i lelo yeniyi nakudila ha ng'wako!"
42019006	Akika wangu no, ung'wegeleja na buyegi.
42019007	Aliyo aho babona giko, pye a bose bandya kuduguma balihaya giki, "Bing'we, mulibona, wingila kwigasha mu kaya ya ng'wa munhu o shibi!"
42019008	Kuhayimanila u Zakayo wimiila, ung'wila u Seeba giki; "Seeba, i nusu ya sabo yane nalibinha bahabi; hama niyo nuulu nanyeekeja munhu shikolo, nakunshokeja nghangala ine!"
42019009	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila giki, "I lelo iyi bupiji wigelaga a ha kaya iyi, iki nu ng'wenuyu nanghwe ng'wana wa ng'wa Abulahamu.
42019010	Nguno u Ng'wana wa Munhu wizile kukooba na kupija isho shijimiilile."
42019011	Aho bataali budegeleka i mihayo yeniyo, u Yesu ongeja kubawila lusumo. Nguno akasangwa wegeela kushikiila i Yelusalemu; hama niyo a boi biganikaga giki u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu hu bukwilonga i likanza lyenilo.
42019012	Huna luulu ubawila giki, "Oliho munhu nebe o luganda lo nyatemi, akahaya kwinga kuja ku si ya kule, giki akatemiwe; hanuma alashoke hangi.
42019013	U munhu ng'wenuyo akitana basese bakwe ikumi ubagabanhya migabo ikumi ya hela, ubakomeleja alibawila giki, 'Jitundanyagi jiibyale; nakwiza.'
42019014	Aliyo a banhu ba mu si yakwe baali batantogilwe, huna luulu butuma nhung'wa kunkuubija koi; buhaya giki, 'A bise tutatogilwe abize ntemi wise u ng'wenuyu!'
42019015	Aliyo u munhu ng'wenuyo aho owanukula u butemi ushoka; ushikila kulagila bitanwe a basese abo wali wabalekela hela, amane buli ng'wene wapandikile ginehe u mu kujitundanya.
42019016	Ushika wa kwandya uhaya, 'Baba, u ngabo gwa hela jako gwabyalile migabo ikumi.'
42019017	Nanghwe ung'wila, 'Bugatu, u bebe uli nsese wawiza, iki wabizile ng'wishigwa mu shikolo shido, wabizaga ntaale wa mizengo ikumi.'
42019018	Wiza na wa kabili, nanghwe uhaya, 'Baba, u ngabo gwa hela jako gwabyalile migabo itano.'
42019019	Nu ng'wene ung'wila giki, 'Nangho wabizaga ntaale wa mizengo itano.'
42019020	Na ungi wiza; lelo u ng'wene ushikila kuhaya giki, 'Baba, guyu u ngabo gwa hela jako, naali najibunga ng'widaso nujibika.
42019021	U nene nakogohile no, nguno nakudeebile giki uli ng'wiboneeji, ukasolaga ni shisho utashituulile bebe, hangi ukagesaga nu kuko utabibile!'
42019022	U ng'wenuyo unshokeja ung'wila giki, 'U bebe uli nsese wabubi, na luulu nakukwinha nsango, nguno niyo wikaanila bebe ng'wenekili na nomo gwako. Gashinaga wali umanile giki nali ng'wiboneeji wa kusola ni shisho natashituulile nene, na giki nakagesaga nu kuko natabibile!
42019023	Hama nibuli luulu nahene i hela jane utajitwalile nuulu ku basuluja, giki ulu nushoka nasange jibyalanile?'
42019024	Haho na haho ubawila abo baali bimiila hihi henaho giki, 'Ntaajagi i hela jenijo mung'winhe uyo ali na migabo ikumi ya hela.'
42019025	Nabo bung'wila, 'Baba, hama iki u ng'wenuyo ali na migabo ikumi!'
42019026	'Nalimuwila buli ng'wene uyo ali na shikolo akwinhwa, aliyo uyo ati nasho akutaajiwa ni shigehu isho ali nasho.
42019027	A banishi bane abo batatogilwe nabize ntemi wabo, a bene begelejagi ha butongi bone aha mubabulage.' "
42019028	Aho wamala u kuhaya i yeniyo bubuuka bajile Yelusalemu, u wei wali ku butongi.
42019029	Bahayegeela Betifage na Betania, ku lugulu ulo lukitanagwa lo mizeituni, utuma babili ba bahemba bakwe.
42019030	Ubawila giki, "Jagi u mu chalo isho shili ku butongi shenisho; ulu mulingile mo mukubona nzobe muuga itungilwe, itaali kudamhilwa na munhu nuulu umo, italigulilagi muyenhe.
42019031	Ose-ose ulu umubuja giki, 'Nibuli muliyitaligulila?' Hayagi giki, 'Nguno ali na nimo nayo u Seeba.' "
42019032	Aho baja abo bakatung'wa, buukasanga nghana git'umo akabawilila.
42019033	Bahayandya u kwitaligulila, a benekili nzobe bubabuja, "Nibuli muliyitaligulila i nzobe?"
42019034	Nabo bushosha, "Nguno ali na nimo nayo u Seeba."
42019035	Huna biyenha u kuli Yesu i nzobe yeniyo, aho bishisha bituulila myenda yabo a ha ngongo, bundamhija u Yesu.
42019036	Aho ajile buyuja bakwambaga myenda yabo u mu nzila.
42019037	Wahayegeela ku ntulumenho gwa lugulu lo mizeituni, pyi i libita lya bahemba bandya kunkuja na kungongoola Mulungu n'ilaka lya higulya kulwa budula butaale mu mihayo yose iyo baali bibona.
42019038	Buyuhaya giki, "Akumilijiwe u Ntemi, uyo aliza mu lina lya ng'wa Seeba; Mhola u ng'wigulu, n'ikujo higulya no!"
42019039	Bamo ba Bafalisayo abo baalimo u ng'wibita bung'wila, "Bebe Nangi, bahamage a bahemba bako!"
42019040	Nanghwe ushosha uhaya, "Nalimuwila giki a benaba nuulu bakahuumula, gakuyoganya mawe."
42019041	Aho wegeela hihi wahayugubona u nzengo, uuguliliila
42019042	alihaya giki, "Git'ulu ni wabiza wimanile nangho i mihayo ya mhola i lelo! Al'i gisi, ibisilwe u ku miso gako!
42019043	Nguno jikushika shiku ja banishi bako kukugobanija hose-hose, bakuzengeele ndugu ya kukupindilija, bayukudumila kufuma mhandi jose.
42019044	Bakukutaalika ha si u bebe ng'wenekili, pye na a baana bako abo uli nabo; batukulekela iwe nuulu limo higulya y'iwe lichalyo, nguno utalimanile i likanza lya kusangwa kwako!"
42019045	Aho wingila u mu hekalu ubapeeja abo biitilaga mo byashala bufuma.
42019046	Ubawila, "Yandikilwe giki, 'I numba yane ikubiza numba y'ilomba; aliyo a bing'we mukuyitaga kubiza ipilinga lya basambo!' "
42019047	Uyudila mu hekalu buli lushiku akulangaga; aliyo a bagabiji bataale na a balangi ba shilagilo, hamo na a basugi ba banhu bakoobaga kumulaga.
42019048	Kwike baali bagayiwa u gwa kung'witila, nguno pye a banhu bikalaga hamo nanghwe bakundegelekaga.
42020001	Lushiku lumo u Yesu aho ali mu hekalu akubalangaga a banhu na kubasomboolela Nghulu Jawiza, kwimanila bansanga bagabiji bataale na balangi ba shilagilo, hamo na banamhala.
42020002	Bung'wila giki, "Bebe, tuwilage, iyo ukwiyitaga yeniyi ukwiyitaga mu budula ki, niyo hangi nani uyo wakwinhile u budula wene?"
42020003	Nanghwe ubashokeja giki, "Nane namubuje guyu mhayo niwilagi.
42020004	U bubatiija bo ng'wa Yohana boli bufumile ng'wigulu, nuulu ku banhu?"
42020005	Bandya kwilunjalunja baliwila, "Ulu tulahaye boli bufumile ng'wigulu, akutubuja giki, 'Nibuli luulu mutizunije i mihayo yakwe?'
42020006	Hama hangi ulu tulahaye giki, 'Boli bufumile ku banhu,' a banhu bakutuponda mawe; nguno pye bazunije giki u Yohana wali nghangi."
42020007	Huna bukalila kunshokeja duhu giki, "Tutamanile uko boli bufumile!"
42020008	Nanghwe u Yesu ubawila, "Nu nene natumuwilaga i yeniyi nakwiyitaga mu budula ki."
42020009	Ha numa ya henaho ubawila a banhu lusumo luulu; uhaya giki, "Munhu akalima ngunda uguhamba mizabibu. Huna uguleka mu makono ga balimi; u wei winga ho, udila ikanza ilihu atiho.
42020010	U ng'wikanza lyenilo utuma nsese, aje u ku balimi benabo bakang'winhe matwajo kufuma u mu ngunda. Aliyo a balimi benabo buntula, bumpeeja winga koi makono dalali.
42020011	Utuma nsese ungi, nu ng'wene buukantula bung'witila yabubi no; nanghwe bumpeeja winga makono dalali.
42020012	Wahayutuma na wa kadatu, u ng'wene buukamelagula nguma, bumponya hanze.
42020013	Nose u ng'wenekili ngunda wiwila giki, 'I gete niite mhayo ki shi? Nantume u ng'wana wane u ntogwa, hamo u ng'wene bakujunkuja!'
42020014	Aliyo a balimi benabo aho bamona biwila giki, 'Uyu angu hu ng'wingiji gete, tumulagagi bubize wise u wingiji!'
42020015	Bumponya hanze ya ngunda buukamulagila kwenuko! I gisi luulu u ng'wenekili ngunda akubiita ginehe a banhu benabo?
42020016	Angu akwiza abakenaagule a balimi benabo, nu ngunda agutuule mu makono ga bangi!" Aho bigwa giko buhaya, "U gwenuyu gutudulikana!"
42020017	Ubakalalila; huna ubawila, "I gisi shili na makulu ki i shandikwa isho shihayile giki, 'I liwe ilo bakalilema bazengi, h'ilo lyabizile lya kwigoloolela i numba?
42020018	Buli ng'wene uyo uligwila i liwe lyenilo akupaanaguka paza-paza; lelo uyo lyungwila, u ng'wene likuntobagula tobo-tobo!' "
42020019	I likanza lyenilo, a balangi ba shilagilo na a bagabiji bataale buhaya kundima, nguno bakamana giki u lusumo lwenulo akaluhaya kulwa nguno yabo; aliyo bubogoha a banhu!
42020020	Huna bandya kukooba nzila ya kundima mu nyasala-sala u Yesu; buntumila badati, buja mu kwigimbija giti giki bali batungilija. Baali batogilwe kungwasha mu kalungalungile, bapandike nguno ya kundima, na kuntuula mu makono ga nsugi alamulwe.
42020021	Bahayushika bung'wila, "Nangi, tumanile giki ukalungalungaga na kulanga mu butungilija, na giki utadililaga banhu mu kulola bushu, aliyo i nzila ya ng'wa Mulungu ukilangaga mu nghana.
42020022	Angu, a bise tuzunilijiwe u kutoba i goodi ya ng'wa Kaisali, nuulu yaya?"
42020023	Aliyo iki akabitegeleja i nyasala-sala yabo, ubawila giki;
42020024	"Noolekejagi denali imo. I suso iyi nu wandike ubu, sha ng'wa nani?" Buhaya, "Sha ng'wa Kaisali."
42020025	Nanghwe ubawila, "Hu kuhaya i sha ng'wa Kaisali ng'winhagi Kaisali, ni sha ng'wa Mulungu nasho ng'winhagi Mulungu."
42020026	Bulemeelwa u kungwasha u mu kalungalungile u ku butongi wa banhu, bugelela kulikumya duhu i lishosho lyakwe, buhuumula sele!
42020027	Bamo ba Basadukayo abo bahayile giki butiho bujuuko, bakiza u kuli Yesu; bumuja
42020028	balihaya, "Nangi, u Musa atwandikilile giki, ulu ndugu atoolile huna uzumalika uleka nke, aliyo ati na ng'wana, shiigelile ng'wanong'wawe ang'wingile u nkima ng'wenuyo amyalile baana u nduguye.
42020029	Ali luulu, baaliho bagosha mpungati ba shikulu na shizuna; u tang@i wabo utoola, aliyo ucha atalekile bubyile.
42020030	U wa kabili ung'wingila u nkima ng'wenuyo,
42020031	nu wa kadatu; kushisha pye a bose mpungati bushila kucha batalekile nuulu baana!
42020032	Nose u ku nghalilo yaho nu nkima ucha.
42020033	I gisi luulu, u ng'wikanza lya bujuuko, u nkima ng'wenuyo akubiza nke wa ng'wa nani; iki pye a bose mpungati baali bantoola?"
42020034	U Yesu ubawila giki, "A baana b'ikanza ili h'abo bakatoolaga na kutoolwa.
42020035	Aliyo abo babalilwe giki bigeleelilwe kubiza mo u ng'wikanza lyenilo na kwanukula bujuuko kufuma mu bafu, a bene bati ba kuyutoola nuulu kutoolwa yaya.
42020036	Nguno bakubiza giti bamalaika, batiko nuulu kucha; a boi bali baana ba ng'wa Mulungu, iki bali baana ba bujuuko.
42020037	Niyo u mhayo gwa kujuuchiwa bafu gwenuyu, nu Musa akoolekejiwa a h'isaka; git'umo alihayila giki, 'U Seeba ali Mulungu wa ng'wa Abulahamu, na Mulungu wa ng'wa Isaka, na Mulungu wa ng'wa Yakobo.'
42020038	U Mulungu ati wa bafu, ali wa bapanga; nguno pye a bose bali bapanga u kuli wei."
42020039	Bamo ba balangi ba shilagilo bakizunilija nanghwe buhaya, "Nangi watungilija a kayombele."
42020040	Batagemile kumuja hangi mhayo gose-gose.
42020041	Huna u Yesu ubabuja, "Nibuli bakahayaga giki u Kilisto ng'wana o ng'wa Daudi?
42020042	Iki u Daudi ng'wenekili u mu shitabo sha Zabuli alihaya, 'U Seeba akang'wila u Seeba wane giki: Igashaga ku nkono gwane gwa bulyo,
42020043	kushisha nabatuule a banishi bako ha silili ya mhambala jako.'
42020044	I gisi, u Daudi ulu alinghaya giki 'Seeba,' nose adugije kubiza ng'wana wakwe ginehe hangi?"
42020045	Aho bataali budegeleka pye a banhu, u Yesu wandya kubawila a bahemba bakwe giki,
42020046	"Bilanghanagi a balangi ba shilagilo abo batogilwe kugishiwa na kuja buyeela mu magulilu bazwalile nghanjo. Nu mu masinagogi batogilwe kwigasija masumbi g'ikujo; hangi nuulu bulaalikwa kuja ku shigukulu, nu kwene bakakuubilijaga ha magele ga bakujiwa.
42020047	Balyi ba sabo ja bakima bachilwa, banhu ba kalombele kalihu ka kwiyoolecha. A benabo bakupandika nsango ntaale kutinda!"
42021001	Aho wabuucha miso, ubabona a basabi balituula manongho gabo ng'wibikilo lya sabo.
42021002	Umona na nkima nchilwa hangi nghabi, watuula mo nanghwe hela jakwe ibili.
42021003	Huna u Seeba uhaya, "Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, u nkima u nchilwa na nghabi ng'wenuyu, watuula mo shingi kutinda pye a bose.
42021004	Nguno pye a bangi balituula a manongho gabo kufuma mu bushiigo bo sabo jabo, aliyo u nkima ng'wenuyu, nuulu iki ali na makoye, watuula mo pyi isho wali nasho, kulwa kwigunaanila mu bupanga bokwe."
42021005	Huna bamo na bamo bandya kwihaya i hekalu, umo yali izengilwe na mawe masoga; na a manongho ayo gafunyiagwa moi. Nanghwe uhaya giki,
42021006	"A gose aya muligabona genaya, jikushika shiku litusaaga iwe higulya y'iwe lichalyo, ilo lituholomolelwa ha si!"
42021007	Nabo bumuja giki, "Nangi, i mihayo yeniyi ikubiza ho nanali? Shikubiza ho shimanikijo ki ulu yegeela kwilonga?"
42021008	Nanghwe uhaya, "Ilanghanagi, yaya u kulemva-lemva. Nguno bingi bakuyiza mu lina lyane balihaya giki, 'U nene hu nali ng'wene;' na giki, 'Lyegeelaga i likanza.' Yaya u kubalondeela.
42021009	Nuulu ng'wandya kwigwa nghulu ja mabulugu na mawiyugaguji, yaya u kogoha, nguno i yeniyi shiigelile itonge u kubiza ho, aliyo h'iti giki i ngelelo yashikaga na kushika."
42021010	Hangi ongeja kubawila giki, "Bukubiza ho wiyubukiji ha gati y'ihanga n'ihanga, na butemi ku butemi.
42021011	Na jikuyudinghima nyahinga nhaale, na kwilonga mahuuya, na nzala nghali mu mapandi na mapandi. Ikuyilonga mihayo ya kogohya, na shimanikijo shitaale kufuma ng'wilunde.
42021012	Aliyo aho itaali u kwilonga pyi i yose iyi, bakuyumudima bamutwala ku masinagogi na mu jeela, kujumuluhya; mukushishiwa na ku butongi bo batemi na basugi kulwa nguno ya lina lyane.
42021013	Kwike i yeniyi ikugaluka kubiza ya bukaaniji u ku bing'we.
42021014	Huna luulu a bing'we timbyagi ngholo, yaya u kwandya kwiganika-ganika umo mulayushokeja.
42021015	Nguno nakung'winha kahayile na masala, ayo batudula kugimila nuulu kugaheeba a bilwisha bing'we.
42021016	Hangi niyo nuulu babyaji bing'we bakuyumulodeela, pye nuulu baana bang'wing'we na a badugu bing'we na a banwani biching'wi; na bamo bing'we bakuyubulagwa.
42021017	Niyo pye a banhu bakumukolwa kulwa nguno ya lina lyane.
42021018	Aliyo lutujimiila nuulu ni luywili lo ku ntwe gwing'we duhu.
42021019	Ulu ng'wiyumilija, mukubupija u bupanga wing'we."
42021020	"Kwike ulu ng'ugubona u nzengo gwa Yelusalemu gwapindiwa na mabita, managi giki lyegeelaga i likanza lya kukenaagulwa kwago.
42021021	A henaho abo bali mu si ya Buyudaya ni bapeelelage ku ngulu; na a babo bali mu nzengo bafume mo, hangi abo bali ku chalo sha hanze batiziza kwingila mo.
42021022	Nguno i shiku jenijo jikubiza ja kumalilwa shiili, na kushikilijiwa kwa mihayo yose iyo yandikilwe.
42021023	U mu shiku jenijo bakubiza mu makoye mataale no abo bakusangwa bali nda, na a babo bakonhyaga. Nguno bukubiza ho buluhi butaale no u mu si, na bupelanilwa u ku banhu benaba.
42021024	Bakuyubulagwa bo shu, na bakuding'wa nding'wa basalanghanijiwe mu mahanga gose. U nzengo gwa Yelusalemu gukutobangwa na banhu ba mahanga gangi kushisha gashikiile a makanza ga banhu ba mahanga!"
42021025	"Huna shikubiza ho shimanikijo u ku liimi nu ku ng'weji, nu ku sonda. Hanuma a mahanga ga mu si gakwandya kuyibakila-bakila, kulwa kogoha nghuutumo gwa mahuuli ga nyanza.
42021026	A banhu bakuyuchenuka ngholo kushisha kukaba kulwa boba, nguno ya kwilindiila iyo ilabagwile pye a bikaji ba mu si. Nguno u budula bo ng'wigulu bukutinginyiwa;
42021027	huna bakumona u Ng'wana wa Munhu ali ng'wilunde, aliza na budula n'ikujo itaale.
42021028	Ulu ng'ubona yandya kuja giko, imiilagi higiyi, mubuuche i mitwe ying'we, nguno numho u bupiji wing'we wegeelaga."
42021029	Ubawila lusumo giki, "Gulolagi u ntini, ni miti i yingi pyi i yose.
42021030	Ulu yandya kufuluma mukamanaga giki gwegeelaga u ng'waka.
42021031	H'umo ili ni haha u ku bing'we; ulu ng'ubona yandya kwilonga i yeniyi, managi giki u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu wegeelaga.
42021032	Nalimuwila gwa nghana giki, i shibyalilwe ishi shitubita kushisha pyi i yose yilonge.
42021033	I ligulu ni si shikubita, aliyo i mihayo yane itiko kujimiila na hado yaya!"
42021034	"Huna luulu ilanghanagi mutizilendeja, i ngholo jing'we jitizuheewa na buponanja bo sabo, nuulu buleevi na kukoya-koyela ya bupanga ubu, nose u lushiku lwenulo lung'wisanganije.
42021035	Nguno pye a bikaji ba mu si yose lukubisanganija, giti lutu.
42021036	Hu kuhaya ikalagi nzugulu-matu, mubize ba kulomba mu kwikumbilija buli ikanza, mulapuluguke; itizumugwila i yose iyo ili hihi kwiza. Mubize na budula bo kwimiila u ku butongi bo Ng'wana wa Munhu."
42021037	Buli lushiku i liimi wadilaga mu hekalu akulangaga, aliyo i bujiku wafumaga waja kulaala ku lugulu ulo lukitanagwa lwa mizeituni.
42021038	Ulu wela i dilu pye a banhu bang'wipuniilaga, kwiza kundegeleka u mu hekalu.
42022001	Huna luulu shegeela kushika shigukulu sha migati iti na shibimbya, isho shikitanagwa pasaka.
42022002	A bagabiji bataale na a balangi ba shilagilo busangwa bakukoobaga nzila ya kunyagaja u Yesu; kwike baali babogoha a banhu.
42022003	U Shetani ung'wingila Yuda, uyo witanagwa Isikaliote; wali umo wa babo ikumi na babili.
42022004	Huna u munhu ng'wenuyo uja ku bagabiji bataale na balanghani ba hekalu, uukalomana nabo umo alaboolekegeje u Yesu bandime.
42022005	Bakayega no, bizunilija kung'winha hela.
42022006	Nanghwe wizunilija nabo mili ngima; wandya na kukooba ng'wanya gwa kuboolekeja, balandime aho ibita lya banhu litiho.
42022007	Huna lushika lushiku ulo lwali lwa migati iti na shibimbya; ulo shiigelile isinzwe i ngholo ya pasaka.
42022008	U Yesu ubatuma ba Petelo na Yohana; uhaya, "Jagi mukilonja-lonje i pasaka tulaalye."
42022009	Bumuja giki, "Utogilwe tuje hali uko tukilonja-longeje?"
42022010	Ubawila, "Jagi u mu nzengo, ulu mulashike mo mukumona ngosha aseselile lunno lwa minzi; nondeelagi mukingile ning'we u mu numba iyo alakingile.
42022011	Ulu ng'ushika ng'wilagi u ng'wenekili kaya giki, 'U Nangi alibuja: Shili hali i chumba sha bageni umo nakuliila pasaka hamo na bahemba bane?'
42022012	Akung'oolekeja chumba shitaale shili ku golofa shigolanije nghana-nghana, lonja-lonjagi ng'wenumo."
42022013	Aho baja busanga git'umo akabawilila, nghana bilonja-lonja i pasaka.
42022014	Lyahayushika i likanza, wigasha kulya shiliwa hamo nabo a batung'wa bakwe.
42022015	Ubawila giki, "Naali na nghumbu ningi no ja kwilya hamo ning'we i pasaka yeniyi, kuko nataali kuluhiwa.
42022016	Nguno nalimuwila giki natilya hangi, kushisha aho ikushikilijiwa mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu."
42022017	Huna usola shikombe; aho wamala kulumba, ubinha alihaya giki, "Anukulagi mugabanhe,
42022018	nguno nalimuwila kufuma haha, natung'wa hangi matwajo ga nzabibu kushisha bushike u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu."
42022019	Usola na ngati, aho wamala kulumba ugumeganya; ubinha kunu alibawila giki, "U gwenuyu mili gwane, uyo gulifunyiwa kulwa nguno ying'we, muliitage giki kulwa kunizukwa."
42022020	Aho bamala u kulya, ni shikombe wita giko; ubawila giki, "I shikombe ishi shili ilagane ipya mu mininga gane, ayo galidika kulwa nguno ying'we.
42022021	Kwike managi giki, u nkono gwakwe u nodeeji wane guli hamo nane a ha meza aha!
42022022	U Ng'wana wa Munhu ajile git'umo ihelelilwe, aliyo ali mu kwihiga kutaale no u munhu uyo alinodeela!"
42022023	Bandya kwibuja boi benekili giki himba nani u mubo uyo wahayaga kugwita u mhayo gwenuyo!
42022024	Kuhayimanila yajuuka yombo a ha gati yabo; baliyoja giki himba nani u mubo igeleelilwe kubiza ntaale wabo.
42022025	Nanghwe ubawila, "A batemi ba mahanga h'abo bakabizaga bataale; na a basugi babo bakakumilijiagwa giki bashilela-mhina.
42022026	Aliyo u ku bing'we iti giko, u ntaale mu bing'we ni abizage giti hu ndo, u nsugi nanghwe abize giti ntoneeji.
42022027	Angu u ntaale ni ali; uyo igashije akulyaga shiliwa, nuulu uyo akutagambaga na butoneeji? Ati uyo igashije? Ili git'umo nali u nene u mu bing'we; nali giti ntoneeji!
42022028	Aliyo a bing'we h'abo muli hamo nane u ng'wikanza lya kugeng'wa kwane pyi i lyose.
42022029	Na luulu nu nene namubikilile butemi git'umo Baba anibikilile u nene;
42022030	giki mulabize ba kuyulya na kung'wa hamo nane a ha meza yane u mu butemi bone. Niyo muligashe ha masumbi ga butemi, mubize balamuji ba ng'anda ikumi n'ibili ja Baisilaeli."
42022031	"Simoni, bebe Simoni, managa giki u Shetani ali na nghumbu no-no-no ja kumusungula giti busiga.
42022032	Aliyo naamalile kukulombela, giki u kuzunya kwako kutizuchabagila. U bebe ulu ulanigalukile, ukubaguzuhya na a baana bang'wing'we!"
42022033	U Petelo unshokeja giki, "Seeba, angu niyo u nene nazunije nuulu kutungwa hamo nangho, pyi nuulu kucha nangho!"
42022034	Nanghwe uhaya, "Petelo, nalikuwila i lelo iyi ituhila nghungulume aho u bebe utaali kunilema nghangala idatu giki utanimanile."
42022035	Huna u Yesu ongeja kubawila giki, "Aho nakamutuma kuja muti na mbogoshi, nuulu nfuko, nuulu shilatu, mukagehelwa shikolo?" Buhaya, "Tutagehelilwe."
42022036	Huna uhaya, "Aliyo i haha, uyo ali na mbogoshi ni isolage, nu yuyo ali na nfuko nanghwe iite chene; uyo ati na lushu ni ajinjage nuulu shizwalo alugule.
42022037	Nguno nalimuwila shiigelile gushikilijiwe u mhayo uyo gwandikilwe kulwane; giki, 'Akabalanijiwa mu bagomi'. Na nghana iyo nahelelilwe shiigelile ishikiile a ha bukalikijo wayo!"
42022038	Nabo bung'wila, "Seeba tuli najo shu ibili a henaha." Nanghwe ubawila, "Jigelaga luulu i jenijo."
42022039	Aho winga a henaho, uja ku lugulu lo mizeituni, git'umo witilaga na kale; na a bahemba bakwe bunondeela.
42022040	Wahayushika u kwipandi lyenilo ubawila giki, "Lombagi mutizingila mu kugeng'wa."
42022041	Huna ubingila, uja kabbaala ka bu kule giti bo kuluuta kawe. Uukatuja mazwi wandya kulomba;
42022042	Uhaya giki, "Baba, ulu ulizunya ningijage i shikombe shenishi! Kwike iti git'umo natogelilwe nene, aliyo iyo witogilwe bebe hu yene ishikilijiwe." [
42022043	Malaika ung'wilongela kufuma ng'wigulu, wiza unguzuhya.
42022044	Kulwa kusaatwa kutaale, walombaga na bujangiizu mu kwifunya kose; kushisha luyilo luyutoona ha si, giti mamote ga mininga!]
42022045	Wahayubuuka aho walombelaga, uja aho baali a bahemba, ubasanga balaalaga, nguno ya bupina.
42022046	Ubawila giki, "Nibuli ng'walaalaga? Buukagi mulombe, mutizingila mu kugeng'wa!"
42022047	Aho ataali uyomba, kuhayimanila lyashika ibita alitongeelile u Yuda, uyo wali umo wa babo ikumi na babili. Ung'wegeela u Yesu kumbipa!
42022048	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Yuda, u Ng'wana wa Munhu ulinodeela bo kumbipa?"
42022049	Abo baali nanghwe u Yesu aho babona yaja giko; buhaya, "Seeba tubamamaaje shu!"
42022050	Na nghana umo wabo uhubenga lilushu, lyubitila gutu go bulyo go ntumami o ntaale wa bagabiji; gutinika!
42022051	Nanghwe u Yesu ushosha, "Lekagi i giko." Ugukuumya u gutu, umpija.
42022052	Huna u Yesu ubawila a bagabiji bataale na a balanghani ba hekalu, pye na a banamhala abo baali biza kundima; uhaya giki, "Ng'wiza na mapanga na milangha giti kudima nsambo!
42022053	Iki buli lushiku naludilaga hamo ning'we mu hekalu, aliyo ng'wali mutugemaga u kunidima. Kwike ili lili ikanza ling'we na lya budula bo giiti!"
42022054	Aho bandima buntwala ku ng'wa ntaale wa bagabiji; nu Petelo ukuubija bo ka kule.
42022055	Bahayushika bubacha moto ha gwalugwa bigasha; nanghwe u Petelo wiza hoi wigasha hamo nabo.
42022056	Aho igashije giko, ntumami nkima umona kulwa bupe bo moto, unkalalila; kuhayimanila wahaya, "Nu yuyu wali hamo nanghwe!"
42022057	Ulema no; kunu alihaya giki, "Bebe mayu, u nene nataamanile u munhu ng'wenuyo!"
42022058	Aho kabita kakanza kado ungi umona; nanghwe uhaya, "Tuhaya nu bebe uli umo wabo ahene!" Nanghwe u Petelo uhaya, "Bebe ngosha, nati ng'wene!"
42022059	Lyahayubita hangi ikanza giti lya sa imo, ungi hangi wandya kuhaya, niyo alifunya na bukaaniji giki, "I gete nghana nu ng'wenuyu wali hamo nanghwe, angu niyo nanghwe muna Galilaya!"
42022060	U Petelo uhaya hangi giki, "Bebe baba, u nene natugumanaga gete uyo uliguhaya!" Aho wakalicha duhu u kuyomba giko, haho na haho yuhila nghungulume.
42022061	Nanghwe u Seeba wikibuka unola u Petelo; u Petelo ugwizukwa u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba uyo wali wang'wila giki, "I lelo ukunilema nghangala idatu aho nghungulume itaali kuhila!"
42022062	Gunchima no, ufuma hanze uukalila mu kusaatwa kutaale!
42022063	A banhu abo bananghanaga u Yesu bandya kungimba nyachilu na kuntula, kunu
42022064	bankundikijaga u ku miso; huna bang'wila giki, "Alimanijaga, nani wakutula!"
42022065	Buyumponangija na mihayo yingi mingi ya kunsondagula!
42022066	Aho wela, a banamhala na a bagabiji bataale na a balangi ba shilagilo bikobya, huna wenhwa u Yesu ng'wibanza lyabo.
42022067	Bandya kung'wila, "Bebe, tuwilage ulu uli Kilisto;" nanghwe ubawila giki, "Al'iki nahene nuulu nakamuwila mutiko u kuzunya.
42022068	Hama nuulu numubuja mhayo nahene hangi mutudula nuulu kunishokeja.
42022069	Kwike kufuma haha u Ng'wana wa Munhu akubiza igashije ku nkono gwa bulyo gwa nguzu, gwa ng'wa Mulungu."
42022070	Pye a bose buhoolanija kuhaya giki, "U bebe hu uli Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu?" Nanghwe ubawila, "A bing'we h'abo mulihaya nali ng'wene."
42022071	Huna buhaya giki, "Tutaali na nguno ki hangi na bukaaniji bungi? Angu twang'wigwa wahaya na nomo gwakwe wei ng'wenekili!"
42023001	Huna lyubuuka pyi i libita kuntwala u Yesu kuli Pilato,
42023002	buukandya kumuula balihaya giki, "U ng'wing'wana ng'wenuyu twamonile akulihubyaga i lihanga lise; hangi niyo akubalemejaga a banhu nu kutoba i goodi ya ng'wa Kaisali, akwigimbaga giki u wei Kilisto, angu nanghwe ntemi i giko!"
42023003	Huna u Pilato umuja giki, "Angu u bebe hu uli ntemi wa Bayudaya?" Unshokeja ung'wila, "Bebe h'uyo wahaya!"
42023004	U Pilato ubawila a bagabiji bataale ni libita lya banhu giki, "U nene natubonaga bubi u muli munhu ng'wenuyu!"
42023005	Aliyo bongeja kuhaya giki, "Akujaga ulanga mihayo ya kuyuuga masala ga banhu hose pye u mu Buyudaya; niyo wandigije Galilaya. I haha uuyu washikaga nu kuunu!"
42023006	U Pilato aho wigwa giko ubuja, amane ulu giki u munhu ng'wenuyo wali muna Galilaya.
42023007	Aho wamana giki wali afumile ku busugi bo ng'wa Helode, untuma u kuli Helode, uyo nanghwe akasangwa ali mu Yelusalemu i shiku jenijo.
42023008	U Helode akayega no u kumona u Yesu, nguno wali na shiku ningi akulwigwaga u lukumo lokwe; nose wali na nghumbu ja kumona alibeeja mihayo ya kukumya.
42023009	Huna wandya kumugilija mihayo mingi; aliyo u Yesu atanshokegije nuulu hado.
42023010	Bimiila a bagabiji bataale na a balangi ba shilagilo buteegana kumuula.
42023011	U Helode nanhgwe na a bashilikale bakwe, buyungimba nyachilu u Yesu. Bungumiila ling'wenda ly'ikujo, huna unshosha kuli Pilato.
42023012	Kufuma lushiku lwenulo u Helode nu Pilato bunwana, nguno i kwandya baali na wanishi.
42023013	Huna u Pilato ubitana a bagabiji bataale na a basugi, na a banhu pye a bose.
42023014	Ubawila giki, "Ng'wanenhelaga u munhu ng'wenuyu, giki akuhubyaga banhu; aliyo angu namuja ning'we ng'wabona, giki ati na bubi u mu mihayo iyo mulimuula.
42023015	Niyo pyi nu Helode atabonile bubi bose-bose, nguno watushokeja hangi bise; hu kuhaya ili hape giki atiniita mhayo uyo gwigeleelilwe nsango gwa kubulagwa.
42023016	Ali luulu nahene, iki nanghugule bo mbooko, nanekele aje!" [
42023017	U ng'wikanza lya shigukulu yali ing'wigeleelile kubataligulila munhu umo.]
42023018	Kwike pyi i libita lya banhu lyuhoolanija n'ilaka lya higulya lilihaya giki, "Ng'winjage u ng'wenuyu, ututaligulile Balaba."
42023019	U Balaba uyo wahayiagwa wali watungwa kulwa kwenheleja nsambo nebe mu nzengo, na kulwa bubulagi.
42023020	Nanghwe u Pilato ubawila hangi a banhu, giki wali na nghumbu ja kuntaligulila u Yesu.
42023021	Aliyo buhoolanija balihaya, "Nkomage ha nsalaba, nkomage ha nsalaba u ng'wenuyo!"
42023022	Ubawila hangi lukangala lo kadatu giki, "I gete witile bubi ki u munhu ng'wenuyu? U nene natugubonaga u mhayo uyo gushikile kung'wenheleja kucha; na luulu leki nanghugule bo kuntula nanekele!"
42023023	Aliyo bongeja kuhamuka n'ilaka lya higulya, giki akong'we ha nsalaba; nose a malaka gabo gutinda.
42023024	Nghana u Pilato ulamula giki gwitwe uyo bagulombaga.
42023025	Ubataligulila u munhu uyo bakang'wigongela, uyo oli otungwa kulwa nsambo na bubulagi; unfunya u Yesu git'umo boli u utogwa wabo.
42023026	Aho balintwala bakamanhya na munhu umo, Simoni muna Kilene, wizaga mu nzengo kufuma ku ngunda, bunseseja u nsalaba, huna uja alishimiza a ha numa ya ng'wa Yesu.
42023027	N'ibita itaale lya banhu lyankuubijaga; baalimo na bakima bajaga balilila nghungu, bakunilaga!
42023028	Aliyo u Yesu akiita ubagalukila ubawila giki, "Bing'we bashike ba Yelusalemu mutanililage u nene, ililagi bing'we benekili na baana bing'we.
42023029	Nguno jikushika shiku bakuyuhaya giki, 'Bali na mbango a bagumba, ni nda ijo jitabuukije baana, pyi ni mbeele ijo jitonghilwe.'
42023030	Hanuma bakuyujiwila ngulu giki, 'Tupondejagi;' na a matumbi giki, 'Tukundikijagi!'
42023031	Nguno ulu baligima kugwitila mihayo ili giki u nti aho gutaali ndoto, aliyo ulu gulinda guuma, ikubiza ginehe luulu ahene!"
42023032	Na basambo babili bakatwalwa kujubulagwa hamo nanghwe.
42023033	Aho bashika h'ipandi likitanagwa lupanga, bunkoma ha nsalaba hamo na a basambo benabo; buli ng'wene ha nsalaba gokwe, umo ku bulyo, ungi ku lumoso!
42023034	Huna u Yesu uhaya giki, "Baba balekejage, nguno batugumanaga uyo baligwita." I likanza lyenilo bandya kushigabanha i shizwalo shakwe bo kushesela mbale.
42023035	A banhu bimiila kwiloleela, aliyo a basugi bandya kuyuneeneleja mu budalahi balihaya, "Tuhaya u ng'wenuyu walikalaga upija bangi shi, ni ipijage luulu nu wei ng'wenekili ulu nghana Kilisto, nsolwa wa ng'wa Mulungu!"
42023036	A bashilikale nabo bung'wegeela bandya kungimba nyachilu, bung'winha siki;
42023037	kunu balihaya giki, "Al'ipijage ulu uli ntemi wa Bayudaya!"
42023038	A higulya yakwe a ha nsalaba boliho wandike buhayile giki, "Uyu ntemi o Bayudaya."
42023039	Kuhayimanila, umo wa babo baali bakong'wa ha nsalaba hamo nanghwe, wang'wila u Yesu giki, "Tuhaya uli Kilisto ahene u bebe? Alik'ipijage shi luulu, na a bise utupije!"
42023040	U ng'wiye unghama; ung'wila giki, "U bebe utung'ogohaga na Mulungu shi? Angu ulibona giki na a bise tuli mu nsango hu gumo duhu!
42023041	Niyo hangi a bise tulanukula mu nghana git'umo shitile shise shali; lelo u munhu ng'wenuyu atiitile nuulu mhayo gumo gwabubi!"
42023042	Huna uhaya, "Yesu, ulanizukwe nane u mu butemi wako ulu washoka!"
42023043	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Zunyaga nalikuwila gwa nghana giki, i lelo iyi ukubiza hamo nane mu paladiso."
42023044	Aho yashika giti sa itandatu shubiza ho giiti, shikundikija pyi i si, kushisha sa kenda.
42023045	I liimi lyoya u kwaaka, ni lisenge lya mu hekalu lyutanduka ha gati na ha gati lyulekana.
42023046	U Yesu ulila n'ilaka itaale uhaya, "Baba nagutuula mu makono gako u moyo gwane!" Aho wamala kuhaya giko uzumalika!
42023047	U ntaale wa bashilikale igana aho wabona umo ikajila, unkumilija Mulungu alihaya giki, "Bing'we, u munhu ng'wenuyu nghana wali ntungilija!"
42023048	Pye abo baali biza kwiloleela aho balishoka buli ng'wene waja alitula-tula ha shikuba kulwa bupina.
42023049	Aliyo pye abo baali baamanile, na a bakima abo baali banondeela kufuma Galilaya, bayiloleelaga i mihayo yeniyi bimiilaga ka kule ho hado.
42023050	Waliho umo wa banamhala b'ibanza; munhu ntungilija, hangi wawiza. Witanagwa Yosefu,
42023051	muna Alimataya; nzengo gumo gwaho gwa mu mizengo ya Buyudaya. U wei wali atizuniligije nalyo i libanza u mu bulamuji walyo; niyo nanghwe wali abulindiilile u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu.
42023052	U munhu ng'wenuyo uja u kuli Pilato uukagulomba u mili gwa ng'wa Yesu.
42023053	Aho wagwicha ugulingiila ng'wenda gwawiza ugulaaja mu shigila shipya shali shisimbilwe ng'wiwe git'ihalo. Gwali gutaali kulaajiwa mo mili nuulu gumo.
42023054	U lushiku lwenulo lwali lwa kulonja-lonja kulwa sabato; niyo nayo yusangwa yegeela kushika.
42023055	A bakima abo baali biza nanghwe kufuma Galilaya bakakuubija, buukashibona i shigila, nu mumo gukalaagijiwa u mili gokwe.
42023056	Huna bushoka kujulonja-lonja bugota bo ng'waso nsoga na maguta. Aliyo a ha sabato bifuula, git'umo shilagilo shihayilile.
42024001	Huna a ha lushiku lo kwandya nyuma a bakima benabo bipuna dilu makingo, bubusola nu bugota bo ng'waso nsoga ubo baali balonja-lonja, buja u ku shigila.
42024002	Bahayushika koi, bulisanga i liwe lyamalaga kupilingitiwa lyinjiagwa a ha shigila.
42024003	Aho bingila moi batagusangile u mili go ng'wa Seeba Yesu.
42024004	Huna aho bataali bugukumya u mhayo gwenuyo, bagosha babili bimiila haho bbihi nabo, bazwalile myenda ya bupe bung'weku no-no-no.
42024005	A bakima benabo bogoha no, buyudetema duhu biyinamiilaga; a bagosha benabo bubawila giki, "Nibuli mulinkoobela mu bafu u mpanga?
42024006	Atiho a henaha wamalaga kujuuka. Izukagwi umo akamuwilila aho wali Galilaya;
42024007	giki, 'U Ng'wana wa Munhu shing'wigeleelilwe kutuulwa mu makono ga banhu ba shibi akong'we ha nsalaba, hanuma u mu lushiku lo kadatu lwaho akujuuka.' "
42024008	A bakima benabo buyizukwa i mihayo yakwe.
42024009	Bahayushoka u kufuma u ku shigila, bubahwegeja pyi i mihayo yeniyo ab'ikumi na umo, na a bangi pye a bose.
42024010	A bakima abo bakabasomboolela a batung'wa i mihayo yeniyo baali ba Malia Magadalena, na Yoana, nu Malia u nina wa ng'wa Yakobo, na bichabo bangi abo baali nabo.
42024011	Aliyo aho babawila batizunije i mihayo yabo, nguno ikabiza giti ya nyachilu-chilu duhu.
42024012	Kwike u Petelo ubuuka, upeela ajile u ku shigila; aho winama kulola moi wibona i myenda ya kujikilwa ilekilwe giko duhu. Ukalila kushoka kaya, alikumya ushingisha giki himba gwigelega mhayo ki!
42024013	U lushiku lwenulo babili babo bubuuka lugendo kuja kwigunguli lya Emau, u kwinga i Yelusalemu boliho bu kule bo kushika giti kilomita ikumi n'imo.
42024014	U mu lugendo lwabo baja bakwisomboojaga pyi iyo yali yilonga yeniyo.
42024015	Aho bali mu kwisombooja na kulungalunga giko, u Yesu ng'wenekili ubegeela, uyushimiza nabo.
42024016	Kwike nuulu iki a miso gabo gamonaga, aliyo baali batang'witegelejaga.
42024017	Huna ubabuja giki, "Bing'we, mulishimiza ng'wiwila mihayo ki i yeniyi?" Bimiila bujinjimala!
42024018	Umo wabo, lina lyakwe Kileopa, unshokeja ung'wila giki, "U bebe, i gete uli ngeni iyene duhu shi u mu Yelusalemu? Utamanile umo ikujilaga i mihayo yamo i shiku jeniji?"
42024019	Nanghwe ubabuja, "Mihayo ki?" Bunshokeja, "I ya ng'wa Yesu, u muna Nazaleti. Uyo wali nghangi, na munhu wa budula mu shitwa na mu kalangile, ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu; nu ku banhu bose!
42024020	A bagabiji bataale na a basugi bise bakanfunya ulamulwa nsango gwa kubulagwa, ukong'wa ha nsalaba!
42024021	Aliyo a bise twalisagilagwa giki hu ng'wene akwikomoola i Isilaeli! Niyo i lelo luli lushiku lo kadatu kwingiila aho yilongelile i mihayo yeniyi.
42024022	Hama hangi i lelo bakima balebe ba mu bise batwibakija; nguno baali bipuunaga dilu kuja u ku shigila.
42024023	Aliyo twahayagimanila bashoka balihaya batagubonile u mili gokwe, na giki angu baali bilongelwa na bamalaika bubawila giki ali mpanga!
42024024	Ahene bamo bise baali baja ko u ku shigila, buukasanga git'umo baali bahayila a bakima; aliyo u wei batamonile!"
42024025	Huna u Yesu ubawila, "A bing'we muli bachilu-chilu, niyo ni myoyo ying'we midizu no u kwizunya pyi iyo ihayiwe na bahangi.
42024026	Yali itang'wigeleelilwe u Kilisto kuluha u mu mihayo yeniyi, hanuma kwingila u ng'wikujo lyakwe?"
42024027	Na luulu wandya kubasomboolela pyi iyo yandikilwe kulwakwe, kwandija kuli Musa, na a bahangi a bose.
42024028	Aho balyegeela i ligunguli ilo bajaga, u ng'wene wita giti alihaya kubitiila.
42024029	Nabo bundayiila bung'wila, "Bebe, ni olaala henaha; nguno ni likanza lyajaga, wila u bujiku!" Wingila nghana wikala nabo.
42024030	Aho lyashika i likanza lya kulya wigasha hamo nabo, usola ngati, ulumba, huna ugumeganya ubinha.
42024031	A henaho a miso gabo gukundulilwa bundeeba; aliyo haho na haho u wei ujimiila balolile.
42024032	Bandya kwiwila giki, "Jali jitubililaga i ngholo jise u mu nzila, aho walulungalungaga nise, akutoolekejaga i mihayo ya mu shandikwa?"
42024033	I likanza lyenilo bubuuka bashokile kuja Yelusalemu, buukabasanga abo ikumi na umo bibilingaga na a babo baali hamo nabo,
42024034	balihaya giki, "Gashi nghana u Seeba wajuukaga; wang'wilongelaga nu Simoni."
42024035	Huna bubasomboolela i ya mu nzila, nu mumo bakandeebela aho wagumeganya u ngati!
42024036	Aho bataali bubasomboolela giko, bahayimanila wimiila ha gati yabo ubagisha, "Muli mhola!"
42024037	Bakibakila no, hama bogoha; nguno bakiganika babona linghangi.
42024038	Ubawila, "Nibuli mulogoha giko na kwiganilija u mu ngholo jing'we?
42024039	Nali nene ng'wenekili, galolagi a makono gane ni mhambala jane; munikuumye na kunikuumya mubone, nguno u moyo guti na nofu na maguha, git'umo mulinibonela u nene giki nali nasho i shenisho."
42024040	Aho wamala u kuhaya i yeniyo, uboolekeja a makono gakwe ni mhambala jakwe.
42024041	Huna aho bataali u kuzunya chiza, aliyo bokalaga buyegi na kukumya kutaale; ubabuja, "Muli na shiliwa shose-shose a henaha?"
42024042	Bung'winha ibudika lya ndilo ya booche.
42024043	Uyanukula wilya balolile.
42024044	Huna ubawila giki, "I yeniyi h'i mihayo yane iyo nikalaga numuwila aho naali nataali hamo ning'we, giki shiigelile ishikilijiwe pyi iyo yandikilwe kulwa nguno yane, mu shitabo sha ng'wa Musa na mu bahangi, na mu Zabuli."
42024045	Huna ugakundulila a masala gabo, bushiitegeleja i shandikwa.
42024046	Ubawila, "H'umo yandikililwe; giki u Kilisto shiigelile aluhiwe, aliyo a ha lushiku lo kadatu lwaho ajuuke kufuma mu bafu.
42024047	Huna a banhu ba mahanga gose, kwandija Yelusalemu, bakulomeelwa mu lina lyakwe, mihayo ya kugaluka na kulekejiwa kwa shibi.
42024048	A bing'we hu muli bakaaniji bayo i mihayo yeniyi.
42024049	Niyo nakumutumila isho wang'wisagija u Baba; kwike ikalagi duhu u mu nzengo, kushisha mugumiilwe budula bo kufuma kwigulya."
42024050	Hanuma ufuma nabo hanze abatongeelile; bahayushika Betania ubuucha a makono gakwe kubinha mbango.
42024051	Aho alibinha mbango giko, kwimanila walekana nabo, ubuuchiwa ng'wilunde.
42024052	Bahayumala kunamya bushoka Yelusalemu bokalaga buyegi hataale.
42024053	Bakayudila mu hekalu gwa-gwa-gwa bakunkumilijaga Mulungu.
43001001	Kufuma haho wandijo waliho Mhayo; nanghwe u Mhayo wali hamo na Mulungu; niyo u Mhayo ng'wenuyo ali nuulu: wali. Mulungu.
43001002	U wei ali hamo na Mulungu kufuma haho wandijo.
43001003	Pyi i shikolo shikabeejiwa mu nzila yakwe, hama ulu ni ati wei ni shitabeejiwe nuulu shimo, u mu shose isho shibeejiwe.
43001004	U muli wei bulimo bupanga. U bupanga wenubo buli isana lya banhu.
43001005	I lisana likwaakaga mu giiti, niyo i giiti shitudula u kuliheeba!
43001006	Akilonga munhu wali atumilwe kufuma kuli Mulungu, lina lyakwe Yohana.
43001007	U munhu ng'wenuyo akiza kulwa bukaaniji, alikaanile i lisana, giki pye a bose bazunye kulwa nguno yakwe.
43001008	U wei wali ati i lisana lyenilo, aliyo akiza giki afunye bukaaniji, kulikaanila i lisana lyenilo;
43001009	i lisana lya nghana, ilo lizaga u mu si kulwa kung'wakila buli munhu.
43001010	Wali mu si; niyo i si ikabeejiwa mu nzila yakwe, aliyo a ba mu si batang'witegelegije.
43001011	Akiza ku bakwe, kwike a bakwe batang'wanukulile.
43001012	Aliyo pye abo bakung'wanukula na kulizunya i lina lyakwe, akubinha budula bo kubiza baana ba ng'wa Mulungu;
43001013	abo bati ba kubyalwa mu nhungwa ja mili, nuulu iti mu kusola na kwikumva kwa banhu: aliyo kufuma kuli Mulungu.
43001014	U Mhayo akabiza munhu, wigasha hamo nise. Ni likujo lyakwe tuulibona, ikujo giti lya Myalwa umo wike uyo afumile kuli Siswe, okalile shigongo na nghana.
43001015	U Yohana akahamuka n'ilaka lya higulya akunkaanilaga alihaya giki, "Uyu hu ng'wene nakanghaya giki, 'Uyo aliza ha numa yane ali ntaale wane, nguno u wei anitangile u kubiza ho.'
43001016	A bise bose tukwanukulaga mbango ja buli mbika kufuma kuli we, uyo ali nshikanu mu yose.
43001017	Nguno i shilagilo tukinhwa mu nzila ya ng'wa Musa; aliyo i haha shizile shigongo na butungilija mu nzila ya ng'wa Yesu Kilisto.
43001018	Nduhu munhu nuulu umo uyo wabita kumona Mulungu ikanza lyose-lyose; Myalwa umo wike, uyo ali Mulungu hamo na Siswe; h'uyo wang'oolekije!"
43001019	Ubu hu bukaaniji bo ng'wa Yohana, aho Bayudaya ba Yelusalemu bakatuma bagabiji na Balawi kujumuja giki, "U bebe, uli nani?"
43001020	Akahaya hape, atabisile nuulu hado; ubawila giki, "U nene nati Kilisto."
43001021	Bumuja hangi giki, "Hama luulu u bebe uli nani i gete, kolaga uli Eliya?" Uhaya hangi, "Nati ng'wene!" "Hamo u bebe hu uli ng'wene u Nghangi?" Ushosha hangi, "Mm, yaya."
43001022	Huna bung'wila hangi giki, "Hama uli nani luulu? Tutogilwe ishosho lya kubatwalila abo batutumaga; u bebe ulihaya ginehe?"
43001023	Uhaya, "Nal'ilaka likuhamukaga mu matogolo; giki, 'Goloolagi nzila ya ng'wa Seeba;' git'umo nghangi Isaya ahayilile."
43001024	Abo baali batung'wa baali bafuma ku Bafalisayo;
43001025	huna bumuja balihaya giki, "Hama nibuli luulu ukubatiijaga, ulu uti Kilisto nuulu Eliya, nuulu u Nghangi ng'wenuyo?"
43001026	Nanghwe u Yohana ubashokeja uhaya giki, "U nene nakubatiijaga na minzi; aliyo aliho umo wimiilaga hamo ning'we, uyo mutaamanile a bing'we.
43001027	Hu ng'wene uyo aliza ha numa yane, niyo u nene natigeleelilwe nuulu kutaligula matungijo ga shilatu shakwe u wei!"
43001028	Pyi i yose iyi ikiitwa Betania ku nkilo gwa Yolodani, uko wabatisijaga u Yohana.
43001029	Ku ntondo yaho u Yohana umona u Yesu aliza kuli wei: uhaya giki, "Nolagi u Ng'wana wa Ngholo wa ng'wa Mulungu, uyo ali mucha wa shibi sha ba mu si.
43001030	U ng'wenuyu hu ng'wene uyo nakamuwila giki, 'A ha numa yane aliza munhu ntaale kutinda u nene, nguno u wei anitangile u kubiza ho.'
43001031	U nene naali nataamanile, aliyo nizile nakubatiijaga na minzi giki amanike hape u ku Baisilaeli."
43001032	Hangi u Yohana ukaanila alihaya giki, "Namonile u Moyo alika kufuma ng'wigulu, ali mu mili giti gwa nghuulu; wiza ulembeela a hali we u ng'wenuyu.
43001033	U nene naali natandeebile, aliyo uyo akanituma kubatiija na minzi, akaniwila giki, 'Uyo ulamone Moyo wang'wikiila na kulembeela hali wei, u ng'wenuyo hu ng'wene uyo akuyubatiija na Moyo Ng'wela.'
43001034	Na nghana naabonile; huna luulu nalikaanila, giki u ng'wenuyu ali Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu."
43001035	U ku ntondo yaho hangi, u Yohana wali wimiila na babili ba bahemba bakwe.
43001036	Umona u Yesu alishimiza; uhaya giki, "Nolagi uuyo u Ng'wana wa Ngholo wa ng'wa Mulungu!"
43001037	A bahemba a babili benabo aho bang'wigwa alihaya giko, bunondeela u Yesu.
43001038	U Yesu wikibuka ubabona balinondeela, ubabuja giki, "Mulikooba ki?" Bung'wila, "Labi (makulu gaho Nangi), ukwikalaga hali?"
43001039	Nanghwe ubawila, "Tujagi mukabone ho." Buja nanghwe nghana, buukabona aho wikalaga, budila nanghwe u lushiku lwenulo; gaali makanza ga sa giti ikumi.
43001040	Umo wa babili benabo, abo bakang'wigwa u Yohana bunondeela Yesu, wali Andelea; ng'wanong'wawe na Simoni Petelo.
43001041	U ng'wene akajunkooba tame Simoni ng'wanong'wawe; ung'wila giki, "Twamonaga u Masiya, (makulu gaho Kilisto)."
43001042	Untonga u kuli Yesu. U Yesu aho wamona uhaya, "U bebe uli Simoni ng'wana Yohana, ukubizitanwa Kefa (kushomeleja kwaho Petelo makulu gaho: Shiganga. )."
43001043	U ku ntondo yaho u Yesu wali atogilwe kuja Galilaya, umona Filipo ung'wila, "Nilondeelage."
43001044	U Filipo wali muna Betisaida, nzengo uyo gwali gwa fumo ya ba Andelea na Petelo.
43001045	Nanghwe u Filipo aho wamona Natanaeli ung'wila giki, "Twamonaga uyo andikilwe mu shilagilo sha ng'wa Musa, na mu bahangi; Yesu wa Nazaleti, ng'witunja wa ng'wa Yosefu."
43001046	U Natanaeli nanghwe ung'wila giki, "Shikolo ki shawiza shidugije kwilonga kufuma Nazaleti?" U Filipo ung'wila, "Nzugu ukubona!"
43001047	U Yesu aho wamona u Natanaeli aliza kuli we uhaya, "Uyu ng'wene Ng'wisilaeli wa Baisilaeli gete, u muli we nduhu buka bose-bose!"
43001048	Nanghwe u Natanaeli ung'wila, "Wanideeba ginehe?" U Yesu unshokeja ung'wila, "Naakubonaga kufuma aho ataali kukwitana u Filipo, aho oli wimiilaga mu mbeho ya ntini."
43001049	U Natanaeli unshokeja ung'wila, "Labi, nabona giki u bebe uli Ng'wana o ng'wa Mulungu; uli Ntemi o Baisilaeli."
43001050	U Yesu unshokeja ung'wila, "U bebe hu wazunya iki nakuwila giki naakubonaga kufuma aho oli wimiilaga mu mbeho ya ntini? Ukubona mitaale kutinda iyi."
43001051	Ongeja kung'wila, "Niyo nalimuwila gwa nghana giki mukulibona i ligulu lyalugukaga, na bamalaika ba ng'wa Mulungu baliyulinha ko, hangi bika a hali Ng'wana wa Munhu!"
43002001	Ha lushiku lo kadatu lwaho, shikabiza ho shigukulu sha bukwilima mu Kana ya Galilaya; nu nina wa ng'wa Yesu waliko.
43002002	Nu Yesu waliko hamo na a bahemba bakwe, nguno baali balaalikwa.
43002003	Bahayimanila yashila i divai; huna u nina ung'wila, "Bamala i divai!"
43002004	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila giki, "Mayu, nilekage u nene, i likanza lyane litaali u kushika!"
43002005	U nina ubawila a batoneeji giki, "Ulu alamuwile mhayo gose-gose gwitagi."
43002006	Jikasangwa jiliho hoi nno itandatu ja mawe, ja kutuulila minzi ga kumanooja mhambala, umo shali shimile sha Bayudaya. Buli lunno lwali lushikile kokala madebbe atano nuulu mpungati.
43002007	Huna u Yesu ubawila giki, "Jokajagi minzi i nno." Bujokaja pa-pa-pa.
43002008	Ha numa ya henaho ubawila hangi, "Dahagi magehu luulu muntwalile u ntaale wa shigukulu!" Nghana buntwalila.
43002009	U ntaale wa shigukulu aho wagaloja a minzi genayo, ubona giki ili divai; kwike ujimiilwa uko yafumaga, aliyo a batoneeji abo baali bagadaha a minzi baali bamanile. Huna u ntaale wa shigukulu ung'witana u ntooji.
43002010	Ung'wila giki, "Pye a banhu bakatengaga tame i divai i nonu; ulu bung'wa a banhu bigeja, nuulu uliyifunya luulu ni yiyo ichoomeelile shi! Hama u bebe nibuli wibikaga i divai i nonu, nose gashika makanza aya?"
43002011	U wenubo wali wandijo wa shimanikijo isho Yesu akabeeja mu Kana ya Galilaya; shoolecha ikujo lyakwe, a bahemba bakwe bunsanya.
43002012	Aho yabita i yeniyo u Yesu akaja Kafalanaumu; nu nina na a baana ba ng'wawe buja koi, hamo na a bahemba bakwe, kwike batikalile ko shiku ningi.
43002013	Huna luulu aho yegeela kushika pasaka ya Bayudaya, u Yesu ulinha kuja Yelusalemu.
43002014	Uukasanga balimo u mu hekalu basuluja ba ng'ombe na ngholo na mhunda, na bakaabanya ba hela bigashaga.
43002015	Usola ngoye ubeeja mbooko, ujipeeganja i ngholo ni ng'ombe jufuma u mu hekalu; ni meza ja bakaabanya ba hela ujisalingula, ubitaguja i hela jabo.
43002016	A bajinja ba mhunda ubawila, "Ginjagi a genaya u ng'wenumu, i numba ya ng'wa Baba mutigaluchage kubiza ya basuluja!"
43002017	A bahemba bakwe bugwizukwa uyo gwandikilwe; giki, "Bukunilya u wilu kulwa numba yako."
43002018	Huna luulu a Bayudaya bunshokeja bung'wila, "Ulitoolekeja shimanikijo ki, i giki u bebe wigeleelilwe kwiyita pyi i yeniyi?"
43002019	Nanghwe u Yesu ubashokeja ubawila, "Isambagulagi i hekalu iyi, nane nakwiyimilija hangi mu shiku idatu."
43002020	A Bayudaya bung'wila, "Mm! I hekalu iyi yashishaga myaka makumi ane n'itandatu ikuzengagwa, u bebe hu wiyimilije mu shiku idatu duhu!"
43002021	Kwike u wei ohayaga hekalu ya mili gokwe.
43002022	U Yesu aho wajuuka kufuma mu bafu, a bahemba bakwe bizukwa giki wali waguhaya u mhayo gwenuyo, bushisanya i shandikwa, pyi ni mihayo iyo wihayaga u Yesu.
43002023	Aho ali mu Yelusalemu kulwa nguno ya shigukulu sha pasaka, bingi bakalizunya i lina lyakwe aho bashibona i shimanikijo isho wabeejaga.
43002024	Aliyo u wei ng'wenekili u Yesu, wali atiitaga mhayo mu kwiyoolecha giki babone bansanye, nguno u wei wali abamanile hape pye a banhu.
43002025	Nose yali itiho nguno ya kung'wila mihayo ya ng'wa munhu ose-ose, iki u wei wali amanile isho shili mu gati ya ng'wa munhu.
43003001	Waliho munhu nebe, umo wa Bafalisayo, nsugi wa Bayudaya; lina lyakwe Nikodemo.
43003002	U munhu ng'wenuyo akiza kuli Yesu ikanza lya bujiku ung'wila, "Labi, tumanile giki uli Nangi uyo afumile kuli Mulungu, nguno atiho uyo adugije kushita i shimanikijo isho ukushitaga bebe, ulu Mulungu ati hamo nanghwe!"
43003003	U Yesu unshokeja ung'wila, "Zunyaga nalikuwila go nghana giki, u munhu ulu atabyalilwe bupya, atudula u kububona u butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu ."
43003004	Nanghwe u Nikodemo ung'wila, "U munhu ulu ntaale adugije kubyalwa ginehe? Adugije kwingila mu nda ya ng'wa nina lukangala lo kabili giki abyalwe hangi?"
43003005	U Yesu ushosha uhaya, "Nalikuwila go nghana giki, ose-ose uyo atubyalwa na minzi na Moyo, atudula u kwingila u mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu.
43003006	Isho shibyalilwe na mili shili mili, ni shisho shibyalilwe na Moyo nasho shili moyo.
