43017003	U bupanga bo welelo na welelo wene kukumana bebe uyo uli Mulungu wa nghana; Mulungu umo wike, hamo na Yesu Kilisto, uyo untumile bebe.
43017004	U nene naagushikiligije u nimo uyo uninhile kugubeeja, nukwenhela ikujo u mu si.
43017005	Ali luulu Baba, nigunguhyage hamo nangho i haha, nabize mo u ng'wikujo ilo naali nalyo hamo nangho kufuma na a haho si itaali kuseeng'wa.
43017006	A banhu abo ubasolile kufuma mu si uninha nene, naaboolekegije i lina lyako. A boi baali bako, aliyo waninhile nene, niyo i haha bagudimile u mhayo gwako.
43017007	Bamanile giki pyi i shikolo isho uninhile shili shako.
43017008	Nguno i mihayo yako iyo uninhile nene, naamalile kubinha buyanukula. Huna luulu, i haha bamanile gete giki, u nene nafumile kuli bebe. Na bazunije giki u bebe hu ng'wene uyo unitumile.
43017009	A benaba h'abo nalibalombela; natulombelaga banhu ba mu si, aliyo abo uninhile, nguno a benaba bali bako.
43017010	Pye a bane bali bako, na a bako bali bane. Na luulu nakukujiagwa u mubo.
43017011	U nene i haha natimo u mu si, naliza kuli bebe; aliyo a bene bataali balimo u mu si. Baba ng'wela, balanghanage mu lina lyako ilo uninhile, babize mu bumo, git'umo bise tuli umo.
43017012	Aho naali nataali hamo nabo, nalubalanghanaga na kubakingitiila mu lina lyako ilo uninhile. Atayagalile nuulu umo wabo, ulu ati u ng'wana wa kuyagala duhu; kulwa giki shishikilijiwe i shandikwa.
43017013	I haha naliza kuli bebe, i mihayo yeniyi naliyihaya mu si, giki babize nabo u buyegi bone u mubo; niyo bubize bushikanu.
43017014	U nene naamalile u kubinha u mhayo gwako, huna luulu a ba mu si baabakolilwe iki a bene bati ba mu si, git'umo nene nati wa mu si.
43017015	Natulombaga ubinje u mu si, aliyo ubalanghane u kuli Mi.
43017016	A boi bati ba mu si git'umo nene nati wa mu si.
43017017	Beejage mu nghana yako; u mhayo gwako hu yene i nghana.
43017018	Umo ukanitumila nene u mu si, nu nene h'umo nalibatumila a boi u mu si.
43017019	Naliyeeja nene ng'wenekili kulwa nguno yabo, giki nabo babize beejiagwa mu nghana."
43017020	"Natubalombelaga aba duhu, aliyo na a babo balanizunye kulwa mhayo gwabo aba.
43017021	Nabo pye babize bali mu bumo git'umo bebe Baba uli muli nene, nu nene umo nali muli bebe. Na a bene babize u mu bise; i si izunye giki nghana unitumile bebe.
43017022	Na hangi u nene naabinhile i likujo ilo uninhile u nene, giki babize bali mu bumo, git'umo bise tuli umo.
43017023	U nene mubo nu bebe muli nene; u bumo wabo bushikane mu giko, i si imane giki u bebe h'uyo unitumile, na hangi giki ubatogilwe nabo git'umo unitogelilwe u nene.
43017024	Baba, natogilwe abo wamalile kuninha babize hamo nane. Balibone i likujo ilo uninhile, nguno unitogilwe kwingiila kale, na a haho si itaali kuseeng'wa.
43017025	Baba ntungilija, a banhu ba mu si batakumanile, aliyo u nene nakumanile; na a benaba bamanile giki hu bebe uyo unitumile.
43017026	A benaba naabalangile i lina lyako, hangi nakongeja u kubalanga, u butogwa wako umo unitogelilwe na a bene babize nabo, nu nene nabize hamo nabo."
43018001	U Yesu aho wamala kuhaya i yeniyo winga a henaho, ukila longa lo Kiduloni; gwaliko ngunda, uukingila ng'wenumo hamo na a bahemba bakwe.
43018002	U Yuda, u nodeeji wakwe, oli alimanile i lipandi lyenilo; nguno nghangala ningi u Yesu na a bahemba bakwe bamanhijaga mo.
43018003	Huna u Yuda usola ibita lya bashilikale na balanghani ba hekalu, kufuma ku bagabiji bataale na Bafalisayo. Biza babachaga chenge na tala, kunu babuukije na shilanga.
43018004	U Yesu oli ayimanile iyo yizaga kung'wilongela; huna ufumila ha welekele ubabuja, "Mulinkooba nani?"
43018005	Bunshokeja, "Yesu wa Nazaleti." Nanghwe ubawila, "Nene uuy'aha." Nu Yuda, u nodeeji wakwe, wali wimiila hamo nabo.
43018006	Aho wabawila giki, "Nene uuy'aha," bulelengeta bashoka-shokile shigongwanuma, buukagwa ha si!
43018007	Nanghwe ubabuja hangi, "Bing'we mulinkooba nani?" Buhaya, "Yesu wa Nazaleti."
43018008	U Yesu ubashokeja, "Angu namuwila giki nene uuy'aha! Na luulu ulu mulinikooba nene, balekagi aba baje."
43018009	Akahaya giko kulwa kushikilijiwa kwa mhayo uyo wali waguhaya; giki, "Abo wamalile kuninha natanjimiigije nuulu umo wabo."
43018010	U Simoni Petelo wali na lilushu, ulisopoola; wahayulihubenga lyubitila gutu go bulyo go ntumami o ngabiji ntaale, gutinika! I lina lyakwe u ntumami ng'wenuyo witanagwa Maluko.
43018011	U Yesu ung'wila u Petelo giki, "Bebe lushoshage mu shilalo u lushu; nibuli naleke u kushing'wa i shikombe isho waninhile u Baba?"
43018012	Huna i libita lya bashilikale nu ntaale wabo, hamo na a balanghani ba hekalu abo baali bafuma ku Bayudaya benabo, bundima u Yesu buntunga.
43018013	Buntwala ku ng'wa Anasi tame; nguno wali nkwiye o ng'wa Kayafa, uyo oli ntaale o bagabiji u ng'waka gwenuyo.
43018014	U Kayafa hu ng'wene uyo akabawila a Bayudaya giki, "Shiigelile munhu umo abachilile a banhu."
43018015	U Simoni Petelo nanghwe unkuubija u Yesu, hamo na nghemba ungi; u nghemba u ungi ng'wenuyo wali amanikile a ha ng'wa ntaale o bagabiji, na luulu u wei akingila nu Yesu u mu gwalugwa ya ha ng'wa ntaale o bagabiji.
43018016	U Petelo wimiila hanze, ha nyango. U nghemba u ungi, uyo oli amanikile a ha ng'wa ntaale o bagabiji, ufuma wiza ho uyomba nu nanghani wa ha nyango, ung'wingija nu Petelo.
43018017	Huna u ng'waniki uyo walanghanaga a ha nyango umuja u Petelo giki, "Gashinaga nangho uli umo wa bahemba bakwe u munhu ng'wenuyo?" Nanghwe uhaya, "Mm yaya u nene!"
43018018	A batumami na a bashilikale baali bapemba moto bimiila henaho koota nguno yali mbeho, nu Petelo uukimiila ho wandya nanghwe koota.
43018019	Huna u ntaale o bagabiji wandya kumugilija mihayo ya bahemba bakwe, ni ya kalangile kakwe.
43018020	U Yesu unshokeja giki, "U nene nalubalangaga bo hape-hape a ba mu si; buli gwa naalulangaga mu masinagogi na mu hekalu, umo bakibilingilaga pye a Bayudaya, natalangile mu kwibisa-bisa na hado yaya.
43018021	Nibuli ulinibuja nene? Babujage abo baliigwaga iyo nalulangaga; baaba ulibabona abo bimanile iyo nalulangaga."
43018022	Aho wahaya giko, umo wa balanghani ba hekalu abo baali bimiila hihi nanghwe, untula ipi u Yesu. Ung'wila giki, "Ulinshokeja ginehe i giko u ntaale o bagabiji?"
43018023	Nanghwe u Yesu uhaya, "Ulu nahaya mhayo guhubile bukaanilage u buhubi, aliyo ulu natungilija, numho ulinitulila ki?"
43018024	Huna u Anasi untwala atungilwe, ku ng'wa Kayafa.
43018025	U Simoni Petelo wali ataali imiilile akootaga moto; kwimanila bamuja hangi giki, "Bebe ngosha, uti umo wa bahemba bakwe gete u munhu ng'wenuyo?" Ulema no; alihaya, "Yaya gete nati ng'wene!"
43018026	Huna umo wa batumami ba ha ng'wa ntaale o bagabiji, nduguye uyo Petelo akantina gutu; uhaya giki, "Bebe, tungilijaga; natakubonile nanghwe gete u mu ngunda?"
43018027	Ulema no hangi u Petelo; haho na haho yuhila nghungulume!
43018028	Huna mu dilu makingo, bung'winja u Yesu a ha ng'wa Kayafa, buntwala kwikulu. Kwike a boi buleka u kwingila u mu numba ya h'ikulu, giki batizusosohala, bakaduuma kulya pasaka.
43018029	Huna u Pilato ufuma i hanze aho baali; ubabuja giki, "Bing'we muli na mihayo ki i ya kumuula u munhu ng'wenuyu?"
43018030	Bunshokeja buhaya giki, "U ng'wenuyu ulu ni atiitile yabubi ni tutang'wenhile u kuli bebe."
43018031	Huna u Pilato ubawila giki, "Nsolagi bing'we benekili mukaanamule git'umo shihayilile i shilagilo shing'we." A Bayudaya bung'wila hangi giki, "A bise tutazunilijiwe kubulaga munhu ose-ose!"
43018032	Ikaja giko kulwa kushikilijiwa kwa mhayo gwakwe u Yesu, uyo wali waguhaya mu koolecha mbika ya lufu ulo akucha.
43018033	U Pilato wingila hangi u mu kaya, ung'witana u Yesu umuja giki, "U bebe, uli ntemi o Bayudaya?"
43018034	Nanghwe u Yesu unshokeja, "U gwenuyo uliguhaya bebe ng'wenekili duhu, nuulu bangi bakuwilaga?"
43018035	U Pilato ushosha, "Uliganika giki u nene nali Nyudaya? Angu a banhu b'ihanga lyako na a bagabiji bataale hu bene bakwenhaga u kuli nene; okenije ki?"
43018036	U Yesu ushosha giki, "U butemi bone buti bo mu si ; u butemi bone ulu ni bo mu si, ni banilwililaga a batumami bane, natizutuulwa mu makono ga Bayudaya, aliyo i haha u butemi bone buti w'ikanza ili."
43018037	Huna u Pilato ung'wila; "Chu, gashinaga hu kuhaya uli ntemi nghana!" Nanghwe u Yesu ushosha, "Bebe ulihaya giki nali Ntemi. U nene nakabyalwa kulwa nguno ya mhayo gwenuyu, nizile u mu si umu kulwa kwikaanila i nghana; buli ng'wene uyo alimo u mu nghana akwidegelekaga iyo nakwihayaga."
43018038	U Pilato umuja giki, "I nghana ni ki?" U Pilato aho wamala kuhaya i giko ufuma hangi u ku Bayudaya. Ubawila giki, "U nene natubonaga bubi u muli munhu ng'wenuyu.
43018039	A bing'we muli na shimile sha kutaligulilwa munhu umo a ha pasaka, hamo namutaligulile u ntemi wing'we Bayudaya?"
43018040	Buyoganya balihaya giki, "Yaya u ng'wenuyu; ulu Balaba." Aliyo u Balaba oli nsambo!
43019001	Huna u Pilato unsola u Yesu, untula mbooko.
43019002	A bashilikale nabo baali babeeja ngikili ya minghwa, bunzwalikija u ku ntwe, bungumiila na lishizwalo lya nzulunge.
43019003	Bandya kuyung'wegeela: ulu bashika bahaya, "Hangamaga ntemi o Bayudaya"; huna bantula mapi!
43019004	U Pilato akiita ufuma hanze hangi, ubawila a banhu giki, "Leki namufunije hanze u munhu ng'wenuyo, mumane giki u nene natubonaga bubi bose-bose u muli we."
43019005	Ufunyiwa hanze u Yesu azwalile ngikili ya minghwa, ni lishizwalo lya nzulunge; huna u Pilato ubawila giki, "Nolagi uuyu u munhu ng'wene!"
43019006	A bagabiji bataale na a balanghani ba hekalu aho bamona buhamuka balihaya giki, "Nkomage ha nsalaba, nkomage ha nsalaba!" U Pilato ubawila, "Nsolagi a bing'we muje mukankome; u nene natububonaga u buhubi bokwe."
43019007	A Bayudaya bunshokeja balihaya, "A bise tuli na shilagilo, huna luulu kulwa shilagilo shenisho wigeleelagwa kucha, nguno akwigimbaga giki u wei ali Ng'wana o ng'wa Mulungu!"
43019008	U Pilato aho wigwa u mhayo gwenuyo ogoha no.
43019009	Wingila hangi u ng'wibanza; umuja u Yesu giki, "U bebe ufumile hali i gete?" Aliyo u Yesu atanshokegije nuulu hado!
43019010	U Pilato ung'wila, "Utuniyombyaga, utamanile giki u nene nali na budula bo kukutaligula nuulu kukukoma ha nsalaba?"
43019011	U Yesu unshokeja giki, "U bebe uti na budula bo kuniitila mhayo nuulu gumo ulu ni utinhilwe kufuma kwigulya; na luulu uyo wanenhaga kuli bebe ali na shibi shitaale kutinda!"
43019012	Kufuma ikanza lyenilo u Pilato wandya kukooba nzila ya kuntaligula; aliyo a Bayudaya buyoganya balihaya giki, "Ulu ulantaligule u ng'wenuyu, ukubiza uti nwani ng'wiye wa ng'wa Kaisali; nguno buli ng'wene uyo wiyita ng'wenekili kubiza ntemi, u ng'wenuyo ng'wilwisha o ng'wa Kaisali."
43019013	U Pilato aho wiyigwa i mihayo yeniyo unfunya hanze u Yesu, wigasha h'isumbi lya kulamulila, lyali ng'wibindo lya mawe (u mu Shihebulania litanwa Gabata).
43019014	U lushiku lwenulo lwali lwa kulonja-lonja kulwa pasaka; i likanza likashika giti sa itandatu. Huna ubawila a Bayudaya giki, "Nolagi uuyu u ntemi wing'we!"
43019015	Buhoolanija kuyoganya balihaya, "Ng'winjage, ng'winjage a henaha ukankome!" Nanghwe u Pilato ubawila, "Nankome u ntemi wing'we?" A bagabiji bataale buhaya, "A bise tuti na ntemi ungi ulu ati Kaisali duhu!"
43019016	Nghana nose untuula mu makono gabo, bakankome! Huna bunsola u Yesu buntwala.
43019017	Nuwe waja wibuukijaga u nsalaba gokwe, uukashika h'ipandi likitanagwa lupanga: u mu Shihebulania Goligota.
43019018	Aho bashika henaho bunkoma a ha nsalaba; na bangi babili bukong'wa hamo nanghwe: umo kuunu na ungi kuunu, u Yesu ha gati.
43019019	U Pilato wandika wandike butuulwa a higulya ya nsalaba; boli buhayile giki, "Yesu muna Nazaleti, ntemi o Bayudaya."
43019020	Bayudaya bingi babusomaga u wandike wenubo, nguno i lipandi ilo akakomelwa u Yesu lyali hihi nu nzengo; hama u wandike boli ndimi idatu: Shihebulania, na Shilatini, na Shiyunani.
43019021	A bagabiji bataale ba Bayudaya bung'wila u Pilato, "Utandikage 'Ntemi wa Bayudaya,' andikaga giki, 'U munhu ng'wenuyu olihayaga wei giki ntemi o Bayudaya.' "
43019022	Nanghwe u Pilato ushosha, "Iyo nandikaga namalaga kwandika!"
43019023	Huna luulu a bashilikale abo bananghanaga u Yesu bushisola i shizwalo shakwe bushigabanhya magele ane, buli ng'wene upandika shakwe. U ng'wenda gwa kuzwala mu gati gwali guti na bulungijo u mu kasumilwe kago, gwali gumo na gumo duhu; gushibanyiwe kwingiila kwigulya kushisha ku silili.
43019024	Biwila giki, "Tutizugutandula, tutulijagi mbale tubone gukubiza go ng'wa nani." U mu kwita giko shushikiila i shandikwa isho shihayile giki, "Bakashigabanha i shizwalo shane, ng'wenda gwane bugwesela mbale!" H'umo bakiitila a bashilikale benabo.
43019025	U nina oli wimiila haho hihi nu nsalaba; baali hamo na ng'wanong'wawe, na Malia nke wa ng'wa Kilopa, hamo na Malia Magadalena.
43019026	U Yesu umona u nina wimiilaga hihi nu nghemba uyo wali antogilwe; ung'wila giki, "Mayu nolage u ng'witunja wako."
43019027	Nu nghemba ung'wila giki, "Ndililage u noko!" Na nghana kufuma ikanza lyenilo u nghemba ng'wenuyo uja nanghwe ku ng'wakwe.
43019028	Ha numa ya yeniyo, u Yesu aho wamana giki yashikana pyi i yose shishikilijiwe i shandikwa, uhaya ; "Nakolwa nota."
43019029	Haho bbihi henaho shaliho shiseme shokalile bugota bululu, busola ibbupyo bulilobeka u mu bugota wenubo, bulitunga kwigito lya nti gwa husopo, bulinunja buntuulila u ku nomo.
43019030	U Yesu aho wabung'wa u bugota wenubo uhaya, "Yashila!" Winamya u ntwe ugufunya u moyo gokwe.
43019031	U lushiku lwenulo lwali lwa kulonja-lonja kulwa sabato; a Bayudaya buja u kuli Pilato buukalomba giki abo baali bakong'wa ha misalaba babinzwe a magulu binjiwe ho, i mibimba itizikala henaho i likanza lya sabato; nguno i sabato yeniyo yali nhaale.
43019032	Biza a bashilikale, buminzagula a magulu u wa kwandya, uyo wali akomilwe hamo nu Yesu. Bunsanga nu ungi, nanghwe buminzagula.
43019033	Aliyo aho bashika a hali Yesu, bubona giki wali wamala kucha, buleka u kuminza a magulu gakwe.
43019034	Kwike umo wa bashilikale unchima n'ichimu lyakwe mu lubazu; haho na haho gidika mininga na minzi!
43019035	Uyo akabona hu ng'wene alikaanila, niyo u bukaaniji bokwe buli bo nghana. Amanile giki alihaya ya nghana, nguno atogilwe ning'we muzunye.
43019036	I yeniyi ikaja giko kulwa kushikilijiwa kwa shandikwa isho shihayile giki, "Iguha lyakwe litubinzwa."
43019037	N'ipandi lingi shihayile giki, "Bakung'wiloleela uyo bakanchima!"
43019038	Ha numa ya yeniyo Yosefu muna Alimataya uja u kuli Pilato, uukanomba agusole u mili go ng'wa Yesu. U Pilato unzunilija u munhu ng'wenuyo, ushika ugubuucha u mili go ng'wa Yesu. Niyo nanghwe oli nghemba okwe, kwike mu mbisila kulwa kubogoha Bayudaya.
43019039	Nu Nikodemo uyo i kwandya wali waja u kuli Yesu bujiku, wiza abuukije latili igana ja bugota, busangije maguta ga ngazu.
43019040	Huna bugubuucha u mili go ng'wa Yesu, bugulingiila shitambaala sha ng'wenda gwa kitaani, hamo nu bugota wenubo; git'umo shali shimile sha kajikile ka Bayudaya.
43019041	A h'ipandi lyenilo akakomelwa u Yesu gwaliho ngunda: u mu ngunda gwenuyo shalimo shigila shipya, gutaali kulaajiwa mo mimba go munhu.
43019042	Na luulu iki i shigila shenisho shali hihi henaho, buntuula ng'wenumo u Yesu; nguno niyo u lwenulo lwali lushiku lwa kulonja-lonja kwa Bayudaya.
43020001	A ha lushiku lo kwandya nyuma, u Malia Magadalena akaja u ku shigila dilu makingo, usanga i liwe lyinjiagwa a ha shigila.
43020002	Winga ko alipeela ajile kuli Simoni Petelo nu nghemba u ungi, uyo Yesu wali antogilwe. Uukabawila giki, "Bang'winjaga u Seeba u mu shigila, tutamanile himba bantuulaga hali!"
43020003	Huna u Petelo nu nghemba u ungi ng'wenuyo, bubuuka bajile u ku shigila.
43020004	Bandya kupeela nhambo pyi bubili wabo. Aliyo u nghemba u ungi unshiga u Petelo, ubiza o kwandya u kushika a ha shigila.
43020005	Winama kusuula moi, kunu akwilola-lolaga i myenda ya kujikilwa; kwike atingilile mo.
43020006	Ushika nu Simoni Petelo a ha numa yakwe, u ng'wene ushikila kwingila mo u mu shigila; wibona i myenda umo yali ituulililwe.
43020007	Ni shitambaala isho shali shikonzeelilwe u ku ntwe gokwe ushibona; i shene shilinga-lingilwe shutuulwa heeke, shiti hamo ni myenda i yingi.
43020008	Huna nu nghemba u ungi, uyo akashika kwandya a ha shigila, wingila moi; ubona uzunya.
43020009	Kushisha ikanza lyenilo baali bataali u kushiitegeleja i shandikwa: i giki yali yigelile ajuuke kufuma mu bafu.
43020010	Huna bushoka kaya a bahemba benabo.
43020011	Kwike u Malia ulekwa imiilile haho hanze ya shigila akulilaga. Aho alilila giko, winama kulola hangi u mu shigila.
43020012	Ubabona mo bamalaika babili bazwalile myenda yape, bigashaga aho gwali gulaajiwe u mili go ng'wa ''Yesu: umo wali uko gaali magulu, ungi uko gwali ntwe.
43020013	Bumuja giki, "Ulililiila ki mayu?" Nanghwe ubawila, "Bang'winjaga u Seeba wane, aliyo natamanile uko bantwalaga!" Aho wahaya giko ugaluka kulolela ku numa, umona u Yesu wimiilaga, aliyo atang'witegelegije giki wali hu ng'wene u Yesu.
43020015	Nanghwe Yesu umuja, "Ulililiila ki mayu? Ulikooba ki?" U wei wiganika giki hamo ntumami wa mu ngunda. Ung'wila, "Baba ulu wang'winjaga niwilage uko wantuulaga, nanjile ko!"
43020016	Huna u Yesu ung'witana, "Malia!" Ungalukila ung'witana mu Shihebulania, "Laboni!" (makulu gaho, "Nangi!")
43020017	U Yesu ung'wila, "Yaya u kunidimiila, nguno nataali u kulinha kuja kuli Baba. Aliyo jaga u ku bang'wise, ukabawile giki nalija kuli Baba, uyo ali Sing'we na a bing'we; kuli Mulungu wane, uyo ali Mulungu wing'we na a bing'we."
43020018	U Malia Magadalena aho washika u ku bahemba ubawila giki, "Bing'we, namona u Seeba uniwila i mihayo yeniyi!"
43020019	I mhindi ya lushiku lwa kwandya nyuma lwenulo, a bahemba baali bilugalila mu numba, kulwa kubogoha Bayudaya. Bahayimanila u Yesu wimiila ha gati-gati yabo; ubagisha, "Muli mhola!"
43020020	Aho wamala u kubagisha uboolekeja a makono gakwe, nu lubazu. Bakayega no a bahemba u kumona u Seeba.
43020021	Na ubawila giki, "Ikalagi mu mhola; umo anitumilile u Baba nu nene nalimutuma giko a bing'we."
43020022	Aho wamala u kuhaya i yeniyo ubahaahila; huna ubawila giki, "Ng'wanukulagi Moyo Ng'wela.
43020023	Bose-bose abo mukubalekeja shibi shabo bakubiza balekejiagwa, ulu ng'ubatunga numho batungagwa."
43020024	Aliyo umo wabo abo ikumi na babili, lina lyakwe Tomaso, lina lingi witanagwa Didumo, u ng'wene osangwa alinduhu aho aliza u Yesu.
43020025	Na luulu bung'wila a bahemba biye, "Twamonaga u Seeba," u wei ubawila giki, "U nene natiko u kuzunya ulu natagabonile a malanda ga mizumali u mu makono gakwe, nugakuumya na kugakuumya na lwala lone; hangi nutuula nu nkono gwane a ha lubazu lokwe!"
43020026	Ha numa ya shiku inaane, a bahemba busangwa bali mu kaya hangi, ni milyango ilugalilwe, lelo nu Tomaso ali hamo nabo; kwimanila u Yesu wimiila ha gati-gati yabo: ubagisha hangi, "Muli mhola!"
43020027	Huna ung'wila u Tomaso giki, "Enhaga u lwala lwako aha ugalole a makono gane, wenhe nu nkono gwako ugutuule a ha lubazu lone, uzunye ooye u kuhana-hana."
43020028	U Tomaso unshokeja aling'wila, "Seeba wane na Mulungu wane!"
43020029	Nanghwe u Yesu ung'wila, "Hu wazunya iki wanibona? Aliyo bali na mbango abo bakazunyaga nuulu aho bataali u kubona."
43020030	U Yesu wabeeja shimanikijo shingi no u ku butongi bo bahemba bakwe. Isho shitandikilwe u mu shitabo shenishi, shiliho shingi.
43020031	Aliyo i shenishi shandikilwe kulwa kumugunaana, muzunye giki u Yesu ali Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu, ulu ng'uzunya mukupandika bupanga u mu lina lyakwe.
43021001	Hanuma hangi u Yesu akiita wiyoolecha u ku bahemba bakwe baali ku nyanza ya Tibelia. U mu kwiyoolecha kwakwe i mihayo yali giki:
43021002	u Simoni Petelo wali hamo na Tomaso, uyo witanagwa Didumo, na Natanaeli u muna Kana ya Galilaya; hamo na ba ng'wana Zebedayo, na bahemba bangi babili.
43021003	Huna u Simoni Petelo ubawila a biye giki, "Bing'we bagosha, naja kutega ndilo u nene." Nabo bung'wila, "Nise tulija hamo nangho!" Nghana buja buukingila mu lyato. Aliyo u bujiku wenubo batagwashije shose-shose.
43021004	Aho wela i dilu, bahayimanila u Yesu wimiila a ha ng'walo; kwike a boi a bahemba batang'witegelegije giki hu wali ng'wene u Yesu.
43021005	Ubahamukila uhaya giki, "Bing'we basumba, muli na shiliwa shose-shose?" Nabo bunshokeja, "Mm yaya!"
43021006	Ubawila, "Tegagi u ntego a ha lwandi lwa bulyo bo lyato aho, mukugwasha!" Na nghana aho bagutega, bulemeelwa nu kuguzubula kulwa wingi bo ndilo.
43021007	Huna u nghemba uyo Yesu wali antogilwe ung'wila u Petelo giki, "Bebe hu ng'wene u Seeba u ng'wenuyo!" U Simoni Petelo aho wigwa giki u ng'wenuyo wali Seeba, witunga ng'wenda; nguno wali duuhu, huna wiponeja mu nyanza.
43021008	Aliyo a bahemba a bangi bushikiila bo lyato baliguduta u ntego go ndilo, nguno baali bati kule nu ng'walo. Boli bu kule bo magulu giti igana.
43021009	Aho bashika a ha ng'walo busanga moto gwa makala gobachiagwa, a higulya yago iliho ndilo na ngati.
43021010	U Yesu ubawila giki, "Enhagi aha ndilo jimo ijo ng'wagwasha haha."
43021011	U Simoni Petelo uja uukaguduta u ntego ugwenha ha ng'walo; gwali gokala pa, ndilo nhaale-nhaale igana na makumi atano n'idatu. Aliyo nuulu iki gwali gokala giko, nahene gutatandukile!
43021012	Huna u Yesu ubawila giki, "Nzugi aha mulye." Aliyo nuulu umo wa bahemba atagimile kumuja, "Uli nani?" Nguno bakamana giki hu ng'wene u Seeba.
43021013	U Yesu wiza ugusola u ngati ubinha; ni ndilo wita giko.
43021014	U lwenulo lubiza lukangala lo kadatu u Yesu kwiyoolecha u ku bahemba bakwe kufuma a h'ikanza lya bujuuko.
43021015	Bahayumala u kulya, u Yesu umuja u Simoni Petelo giki, "Simoni ng'wana Yohana, u bebe unitogilwe kubatinda a benaba?" Ung'wila, "Alichene Seeba; u bebe umanile giki nakutogilwe." Ung'wila, "Balishage a baana ba ngholo bane."
43021016	Umuja hangi lo kabili, "Simoni ng'wana Yohana, unitogilwe?" Nanghwe ung'wila, "Alichene Seeba; umanile nakutogilwe." Ung'wila "Jidiimage i ngholo jane."
43021017	Umuja hangi lo kadatu, "Simoni ng'wana Yohana, unitogilwe?" Nose u Petelo upinihala, nguno u Yesu akamuja lukangala lo kadatu giki, "Unitogilwe?" Na ung'wila, "U bebe Seeba umanile pyi i yose, umanile gete i giki nakutogilwe." Huna u Yesu ung'wila, "Jilishage i ngholo jane.
43021018	Kwike nalikuwila gwa nghana giki, aho utaali uli nsumba ukumanitunga bebe ng'wenekili waja uko utogelilwe. Aliyo ulu ulanamhaale, ukugagoloola a makono gako, na munhu ungi akutunge akutwale uko utatogilwe kuja."
43021019	U mukuguhaya u gwenuyo, akoolecha umo akuchila u Petelo, kulwa kunkuja Mulungu. Aho wamala kuhaya giko ung'wila; "Nilondeelage."
43021020	U Petelo aho wikibuka umona u nghemba uyo Yesu wali antogilwe, uyo h'ikanza lya shiliwa wali wigasha wihela nanghwe haho bbihi; umuja na giki, "Seeba nani uyo akukulodeela?" U ng'wenuyo nanghwe wakuubijaga.
43021021	U Petelo aho wamona u nghemba ng'wenuyo ung'wila u Yesu giki, "Seeba al'uyu nanghwe hangi ginehe?"
43021022	U Yesu ung'wila "I gisi guliho mhayo ki u kuli bebe, ulu nubiza natogilwe u ng'wenuyu ashinge ho kushisha nashoke? U bebe ng'wene nilondeelage duhu!"
43021023	Huna u mu badugu gukumuka gwa giki u nghemba ng'wenuyo atucha! Aliyo u Yesu atahayile giki atucha. Akahaya duhu giki, "I gisi guliho mhayo ki u kuli bebe, ulu nubiza natogilwe u ng'wenuyu ashinge ho kushisha nashoke?"
43021024	U nghemba u ng'wandiki wayo i mihayo yeniyi hu ng'wene u mbona wayo, na hangi tumanile giki u bukaaniji bokwe buli bo nghana.
43021025	Na yingi mingi iliho iyo wabeeja u Yesu; ulu ni kwandikwa pyi i yose buli gwene gumo-gumo, naliganika nuulu i si yenekili ni itadugije u kushibuucha i shandikwa: Alichene!
44001001	Baba Teofilo, i mihayo ya kwandya iyo naamalile kukwandikila, yoolekije pyi iyo wiyitaga u Yesu, ni yiyo walangaga, kufuma ha wandijo wa butumami bokwe,
44001002	kushisha aho akanukulwa ng'wigulu; u mu lushiku ulo akabinha shilagilo mu nzila ya ng'wa Moyo Ng'wela, a banhu abo wali wabasola kubiza batung'wa.
44001003	Aho lyabita i likanza lya kuluhiwa kwakwe, jikashika shiku makumi ane akumanagiyoolecha u ku banhu benabo, mu shimanikijo shabuyaga, isho shitiko kuhalalijiwa. Jukwila i nghangala akwiyoolechaga giki ali mpanga, wabasomboolela na mihayo ya butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu.
44001004	U ng'wikanza ilo wali hamo nabo, akabakomeleja ubawila giki, "Mutizinga i Yelusalemu; aliyo shilindiilagi i shakwinha isho wang'wisagija u Baba, git'umo ng'wigwilile kufuma kuli nene.
44001005	Nguno u Yohana wabatiijaga na minzi, aliyo aho jitaali kubita shiku ningi, a bing'we mukubatiijiwa muli Moyo Ng'wela."
44001006	Huna aho bibilinga hamo bumuja giki; "Seeba, angu mmho lyashikaga luulu i haha i likanza, ubashokeje u butemi a Baisilaeli?"
44001007	Nanghwe ubawila, "Guti gwing'we u gwa kwimana i ya kajile na kagalukile ka makanza, iyo Baba ayituulile mu budula bokwe.
44001008	Aliyo ulu alang'wiziile u Moyo Ng'wela mukwanukula nguzu; mubize bakaaniji bane u mu Yelusalemu, ni Buyudaya i yose, ni Samalia; kushika ku ngelelo ya si."
44001009	Aho ataali uhaya i mihayo yeniyo, bahayimanila obuuchiwa balolile; ilunde lyunshikija, boya u kumona.
44001010	Baali bataali bakalalilile ng'wigulu, u ng'wene ubiza omalaga kuja, kwimanila bimiila haho nabo banhu babili bazwalile shizwalo shape.
44001011	Bubawila giki, "''Bing'we bana Galilaya, nibuli ng'wimiilaga ng'ukalalila ng'wigulu? U Yesu uyo wamala kwanukulwa ng'wigulu kufuma ku bing'we ng'wenuyu, akwiza hangi git'umo ng'wamonelaga ajile ng'wigulu giko."
44001012	Huna bushoka Yelusalemu, binga u ku lugulu ulo lukitanagwa lo mizeituni; luli hihi ni Yelusalemu, giti lugendo lwa ha sabato.
44001013	Aho bashika bingila mu chumba sha ku golofa; h'uko buyikala: baali ba Petelo na Yohana na Yakobo na Andelea, Filipo na Tomaso, Batolomayo na Matayo, Yakobo ng'wana Alifayo na Simoni Zelote na Yuda ng'wana Yakobo.
44001014	Pye a benaba baali na moyo gumo gwa bukomeezu mu kulomba gwa-gwa-gwa. U ng'wigele lyenilo baalimo na bakima; hamo nu Malia u nina wa ng'wa Yesu, na a baana ba ng'wawe u Yesu.
44001015	Huna u mu shiku jenijo, u Petelo wimiila u ng'wigele lyabo a badugu, (baali giti igana na makumi abili); uhaya giki,
44001016	"Bing'we bababa badugu bane, yali igelile shishikiile i shandikwa isho shihayiwe na Moyo Ng'wela kubitila muli Daudi, kunghaya u Yuda, uyo akabatongeela abo bakandima u Yesu.
44001017	Nguno nanghwe wali abalilwe hamo nise, wali na ngabo u mu nimo gwenuyu."
44001018	(U munhu ng'wenuyo akapandika mheela mu nzila ya nhungwa jakwe jabubi, witumamila kugula itongo; uukitaalika ha si ng'wenumo, utanduka i nda, widika pyi u bula bokwe!
44001019	U mhayo gwenuyu aho gwamanika u ku bana Yelusalemu a bose, bulitana i litongo lyenilo mu lulimi lwabo giki Akelidama, makulu gaho itongo lya mininga.)
44001020	"Nguno u mu shitabo sha Zabuli handikilwe giki, 'U wikalo bokwe bulekwe dalali, niyo atizuzenga mo munhu ungi;' na giki, 'U nimo gokwe gusolwe na ungi.'
44001021	"Ali luulu, u mu banhu abo bajaga hamo nise buli kwene u ng'wikanza i lyose ilo Seeba Yesu wingilaga na kufuma hamo nise;
44001022	kwandija mu shiku ja bubatiija bo ng'wa Yohana, kushisha aho watwalililwe ng'wigulu utwingila, shiigelile umo wabo abize hamo nise u mu kubukaanila u bujuuko bokwe."
44001023	Huna busola banhu babili, umo wabo Yosefu, lina lingi witanagwa Balisaba, nuulu Yusto; na Matiya.
44001024	Hanuma bulomba balihaya, "Seeba, u bebe wimanile i myoyo ya banhu bose, toolekejage uyo ulinsola u mu babili benaba;
44001025	uyo igeleelilwe agusole u ng'wanya gwa butumami nu butung'wa wenubu, ubo wabulekile Yuda, uja kwipandi lyakwe ng'wenekili."
44001026	Huna bubatuligija mbale, yungwila Matiya, ubalwa kubiza umo wabo a batung'wa abo ikumi na umo.
44002001	Lushika lushiku lo Pentekosite, busangwa pye a bose bali hamo, ng'wipandi limo.
44002002	Bahayimanila gwigela nfuutumo, giti gwa nyaga ntaale gulifuma ng'wigulu; guyokaja pyi i numba umo baali bigasha.
44002003	Jubilongela ja kubiza giti ndimi ja moto jigabanikile, jubikalila buli ng'wene.
44002004	Pye a bose bokajiwa na Moyo Ng'wela, bandya kuyomba mu ndimi jingi, git'umo Moyo akabinha kuyomba.
44002005	U mu Yelusalemu baalimo Bayudaya; banhu batungilija ba kufuma mu si jose ijo jili ha silili y'igulu.
44002006	Aho gwigela u nfuutumo gwenuyo, libilinga ibita itaale lya banhu, bandya kukumya. Nguno aho baliyomba, buli ng'wene obigwaga mu lulimi lwa ng'wawe.
44002007	Banhu bujinjimala buyukumya baliwila giki, "Bing'we, abo baliyomba benaba, bati bana Galilaya pye a bose?
44002008	Hama nose ilidulikana ginehe pye a bose twigwe buli ng'wene mu lulimi lo ng'wawe?
44002009	Bapaliti, Bameedi, Baelami, bana Mesopotamia, na a ba mu Buyudaya umu, na bana Kapadokia, Ponto na Asia,
44002010	pye na bana Fulugia na Pamfulia na Misili; na bangi ba mhandi ja Libya kuko na Kilene; na bageni ba kufuma Lumi,
44002011	(Bayudaya na a bahembekwa), Bakileti na Balabu: pyi umo tugelelile tulibigwa baliyomba mu ndimi jise mihayo mitaale ya ng'wa Mulungu!"
44002012	A bose bakakumya, niyo gubakoya no u mhayo gwenuyo; buli bene buyibuja giki, "Bing'we, mhayo ki u gwenuyu?"
44002013	Kwike bamo buyudalahija balihaya, "Mm, bakolagwa walwa!"
44002014	Huna u Petelo wimiila hamo na a biye abo ikumi n'umo; uhamuka n'ilaka lya higulya alibawila giki, "Bing'we bababa Bayudaya, na a bangi pye abo mukwikalaga mu Yelusalemu, nidegelekagi ng'witegeleje umo nalihayila.
44002015	A banhu benaba batakolilwe walwa git'umo muliganikila, nguno mulibona giki i haha itaali dilu no, sa idatu duhu.
44002016	Aliyo u gwenuyu hu gwene u mhayo uyo guhayiwe na nghangi Yoeli giki,
44002017	'U ku shiku ja ku mhelo, alihaya Mulungu, nakubitiila Moyo wane pye a banhu; a bitunja bing'we na a bashike bing'we bakuyuhanga, niyo a badinha bing'we bakuyubona sha koolechiwa, na a banamhala bing'we bakuyuloota shilooti.
44002018	Hama a batumami bane bagosha na bakima nakubitiila Moyo wane bayuhanga.
44002019	Huna u kwigulya u ng'wigulu, nakoolecha shakukumya, na a ha silili u mu si nakoolecha shimanikijo; mininga na moto, na kudundumuka kwa lyochi.
44002020	I liimi likugaluchiwa kubiza giiti, u ng'weji nago gukubiza gwaza giti mininga, aho lutaali kushika u lushiku lo ng'wa Seeba, u lutaale na lw'ikujo.
44002021	Hanuma ikubiza giki, buli ng'wene uyo ulililiila lina lya ng'wa Seeba akupijiwa.'
44002022	"Bababa Baisilaeli, idegelekagi chiza i mihayo yeniyi; u Yesu wa Nazaleti ali munhu uyo Mulungu wamalile kung'oolecha hape u ku bing'we, mu nzila ya katumamile ka budula, na kubeeja mihayo ya kukumya, na shimanikijo isho Mulungu walubeejaga muli we aho ali hamo ning'we, git'umo mumanilile bing'we benekili.
44002023	U munhu ng'wenuyo mukinhwa git'umo kali kahelele ka ng'wa Mulungu na bumani bokwe, u bo kale na kale. Aliyo a bing'we ng'untuula mu makono ga banhu babubi, ng'umulaga!
44002024	Kwike u Mulungu unjuucha, untungula u mu nguzu ja lufu, nguno yali itadulikanile lwikale lundimile.
44002025	H'umo nu Daudi alihayila; giki, 'Kufuma kale nakaamonaga u Seeba, buli gwa ali hamo nane, nguno ali ku bulyo bone, nose natiko kunengenyiwa.
44002026	Huna luulu, i ngholo yane ili na buyegi, nu lulimi lone luli na busangabazu. Nu mili gwane gukwikala mu kwisagilwa,
44002027	nguno u bupanga bone utubuleka mu kulimu, nu Ng'wela wako utunekanija ashike mu kubola.
44002028	Wanoolekegije nzila ja bupanga, ukunokaja buyegi, nguno uli hamo nane.'
44002029	"Ali luulu badugu bane, leki namusomboolele mu kwiyagalula i mihayo ya nkulugenji wise u Daudi. Guli giki, u wei akacha ujikwa, ni shigila shakwe tuli nasho kushisha lelo iyi.
44002030	Aliyo iki u wei oli nghangi, na oli amanile giki u Mulungu wali wang'wisagija, ung'wilahilila giki akubiza na ng'wingiji wa kufuma mu bubyile bokwe, wa kwigasha h'isumbi lyakwe lya butemi.
44002031	Akaguloleela u mhayo gwenuyu, uhaya mihayo ya kujuuka kwa ng'wa Kilisto; giki, 'Atalekilwe mu kulimu, nuulu u mili gokwe gutabolile.'
44002032	U Mulungu wanjuukije u Yesu ng'wenuyu: pye a bise aba tuli bakaaniji bago u mhayo gwenuyu.
44002033	Wagunguhiwe, ali ku nkono gwa bulyo go ng'wa Mulungu; niyo wang'wanukulile u Moyo Ng'wela kufuma kuli Ise, git'umo kwisagija kuli. Huna washiitaga luulu isho mulishibona na kushiigwa shenishi.
44002034	Nguno u Daudi atalinhile ng'wigulu, aliyo akahaya giki, 'U Seeba akang'wila u Seeba wane, igashaga ku nkono gwane gwa bulyo;
44002035	kushisha nabiite a banishi bako kubiza butuulilo bo mhambala jako.'
44002036	"Nose hu kuhaya giki, pye a Baisilaeli shiigelile bamane hape giki, u Yesu uyo mukankoma ha nsalaba ng'wenuyu, u Mulungu wang'witile kubiza Seeba na Kilisto!"
44002037	Aho bigwa i yeniyo buching'wa u mu ngholo, bung'wila u Petelo na a batung'wa a bangi giki, "Badugu bise, i gisi luulu twite mhayo ki?"
44002038	Nanghwe u Petelo ubashokeja giki, "Galukagi, na buli umo wing'we abatiijiwe mu lina lya ng'wa Yesu Kilisto, mukulekejiwa i shibi shing'we, ng'wanukule shakwinhwa; ng'wene Moyo Ng'wela.
44002039	Nguno u kwisagija kwenuku, kuliho kulwa nguno ying'we na baana bing'we, pye na a banhu a bangi, abo Seeba Mulungu wise alabitane; nuulu bubiza bali kule no."
44002040	Akabinha na bukaaniji bungi mu mihayo mingi, ubakomeleja alihaya giki, "Ipijagi ng'winge u mu shibyalilwe i shabubi ishi!"
44002041	Abo bakagwanukula u mhayo gokwe bakabatiijiwa; u mu lushiku lwenulo biyongeja banhu giti shihumbi shidatu.
44002042	Bakabiza bakomeezu no u kwilanga iyo yalangagwa na batung'wa; hamo na mu kusangila, na kumega ngati, nu mu kulomba.
44002043	Pye a banhu bugwilwa booba butaale, nguno mihayo ya kukumya na shimanikijo shingi shuyigela; buyubeeja a batung'wa.
44002044	A bazunya baali mu kikalile ka bumo pye a bose, ni shikolo basangilaga i shose.
44002045	Ni shikolo shabo buyujinja bagabanha i sabo, buli ng'wene wapandika ja kungunaana kulenganila na makoye ayo ali nago.
44002046	Buli lushiku bibilingaga u mu hekalu na moyo gumo; na bajaga bakumegaga ngati mu buli kaya, ni shiliwa basangilaga na moyo gwa buyegi na bumo,
44002047	kunu bakunkumilijaga Mulungu, na kuyegelwa na banhu bose. U Seeba ongejaga buli lushiku abo bapijiagwa.
44003001	Lushiku lumo makanza ga sa kenda, Petelo na Yohana bajaga mu Hekalu kujulomba.
44003002	Waliho ngosha nemehazu kufuma mu nda ya ng'wa nina, wabuuchiagwa buli lushiku, wiza watuulwa ha nyango gwa hekalu, gwaliho gwitanagwa "Nsoga." Huna a banhu ulu balingila u mu hekalu, wayulomba bang'winhe shose-shose.
44003003	Aho wababona a ba Petelo nu Yohana begeela kwingila u mu hekalu, ubalomba bang'winhe shikolo.
44003004	Nabo a ba Petelo nu Yohana bunkalalila; huna bung'wila giki, "Bebe alitulolage!"
44003005	Nghana ubalola, kunu alisagilwa kwanukula shikolo kufuma kubo.
44003006	Aliyo u Petelo ung'wila giki, "U nene nati na sabo nuulu hela, kwike nakukwinha isho nali nasho. Mu lina lya ng'wa Yesu Kilisto wa Nazaleti, buukaga ushimize."
44003007	Huna undima u nkono gwa bulyo, ungungumula; i likanza lyenilo uguzuhiwa u mu mhambala, nu mu maguha ga mu shing'ongwa shakwe.
44003008	Ubuuka, wikindika; wandya kushimiza. Wingila nabo u mu hekalu akushimizaga kunu usata-sata na kunkumilija Mulungu!
44003009	Pye a banhu bumona alishimiza, kunu akunkumilijaga Mulungu.
44003010	Bung'witegeleja giki, hu ng'wene uyo wikalaga igashije akwilombelejaga ha nyango gwa hekalu uyo gukitanagwa Nsoga. Bakakumya no, gubajinjimaja u mhayo uyo gukang'wilongela gwenuyo.
44003011	Uyo akapijiwa kufuma mu bulemehazu ng'wenuyo, akikala abadimile a ba Petelo nu Yohana, nose bushika ng'wibindo litanagwa lya ng'wa Solomoni. A banhu bakakumya no, pye a bose buyupeela bajile mo.
44003012	U Petelo aho wababona a banhu ubawila giki, "Bing'we bababa Baisilaeli, nibuli muligukumya u mhayo gwenuyu, nuulu nibuli mulitukalalila a bise giti twagwitaga na budula wise, nuulu giki u munhu ng'wenuyu twang'winhaga budula bo kushimiza kulwa wela wise?
44003013	U Mulungu wa ng'wa Abulahamu na Isaka na Yakobo; u Mulungu wa bakulugenji bise, wangunguhije u Ntumami wakwe u Yesu, uyo mukanodeela, na kunema ku butongi bo ng'wa Pilato, nuulu iki u Pilato ng'wenekili wali wamala kulamula giki antaligule.
44003014	Aliyo a bing'we ng'unema u Ng'wela na Ntungilija, ng'ulomba kwinhwa munhu mulagi.
44003015	Lelo u Ng'winhi wa bupanga ng'umulaga, aliyo u Mulungu wanjuukije kufuma mu bafu, hama a bise hu tuli bakaaniji bakwe.
44003016	Huna luulu, kulwa kulizunya i lina lya ng'wa Yesu, u munhu uyu muumanile na kale ng'wenuyu mulimona waguzuhiagwa mu lina lyenilo. U mhayo gwa kulizunya i lina lyenilo hu gwene uyo gwang'winhaga mhola nshikanu giki ku butongi wing'we!
44003017	Kwike badugu bane, namanile giki a bing'we na a batongeeji bing'we ng'wiyita i yeniyo mu butumana.
44003018	Aliyo u mu giko gukashikiila u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu, u gwa kuluhiwa kwa ng'wa Kilisto wakwe, git'umo wali wahayila kufuma kale, mu nzila ya bahangi bose.
44003019	Ali luulu, galukagi ng'winge u mu shibi shing'we, shijimanguchiwe; makanza ga kwifuujiwa gize kufuma kuli Seeba.
44003020	Antume u Yesu Kilisto, uyo ahelilwe kulwa nguno ying'we kufuma kale na kale,
44003021	uyo shing'wigeleelilwe kwikala ng'wigulu kushisha gashike a makanza ga shikolo shose kugaluchiwa shibize hangi git'umo shaali na kale; umo Mulungu ahayilile kufuma kale, mu nzila ya bahangi bakwe beela.
44003022	Nguno u Musa akahaya giki, 'U Seeba Mulungu wing'we akumubuukija kufuma mu badugu bing'we nghangi wa kubiza giti nene; u ng'wenuyo shiigelile mung'wigwe mu yose iyo alamuwile.
44003023	Munhu ose-ose uyo atung'wigwa u nghangi ng'wenuyo, akukenaagulwa injiwe gete u mu banhu.'
44003024	Pye a bahangi, kufuma kuli Sang'weli, na a babo bakalondeela ha numa yakwe, bajihayaga na kujikumucha i shiku jeniji.
44003025	A bing'we muli baana ba bahangi, na ba bulagane ubo Mulungu akabeeja na bakulugenji bise; git'umo akang'wilila Abulahamu giki, 'Pyi i ng'anda ja mu si jikwilukilwa mbango mu nzila ya bubyile wako.'
44003026	U Mulungu aho wanjuucha u Ntumami wakwe akantuma ku bing'we tame, giki anekeje na kung'winha mbango buli ng'wene uyo alagaluke kwinga mu shibi shakwe."
44004001	A ba Petelo nu Yohana aho bataali bubalomeela a banhu, kuhayimanila babasanga ho bagabiji na Basadukayo, hamo na ntaale wa balanghani ba hekalu.
44004002	Baali bapembeka na bupelanu kibi no, nguno babalangaga a banhu na kubalomeela mhola ja bujuuko bo bafu, mu lina lya ng'wa Yesu.
44004003	Aho bashika bubadima; kwike iki yali mhindi buukabalugalila giki balanghanwe kushisha ntondo yaho.
44004004	Aliyo abo bakagwigwa u mhayo gwabo bakazunya, i lisaabu lya bagosha lyushika giti shihumbi shitano.
44004005	Aho wela i ntondo yaho i dilu, a basugi na a banamhala na a balangi ba shilagilo bibilinga u mu Yelusalemu.
44004006	(U ntaale wa bagabiji, u Anasi, waliho; nu Kayafa, na Yohana na Isikanda; pye a ba luganda lwa ntaale wa bagabiji).
44004007	Aho babenha bubimilija, huna bubabuja giki, "U mhayo gwenuyo mukagwita mu budula ki, na mu lina ki?"
44004008	U Petelo ubashokeja kunu okajiagwa na Moyo Ng'wela; ubawila giki, "Bing'we basugi ba banhu, na a bing'we banamhala,
44004009	i lelo yeniyi ulu tuligisilijiwa kulwa nguno ya mhayo gwawiza uyo witililwe u munhu uyo wali nemehazu, giki wapijiwe ginehe;
44004010	a bing'we pye a bose managi, na a Baisilaeli a bose bamane, giki u munhu uyo imiilile ku butongi wing'we ng'wenuyu, ali mpanga wa gili-gili mu lina lya ng'wa Yesu Kilisto wa Nazaleti, uyo mukankoma ha nsalaba; aliyo u Mulungu wanjuukije kufuma mu bafu.
44004011	Huna ng'wene uyo ali Iwe ilo mukalidalaha a bing'we bazengi, ilo lyabizile lya kwigoloolela i numba.
44004012	Niyo butiho bupiji muli munhu ungi ose-ose, nguno nduhu lina lingi hangi pye a hose a ha silili y'igulu ilo binhwa a banhu, giki shitwigeleelilwe kupijiwa mulyo."
44004013	Aho babubona u bugimu bo ng'wa Petelo nu Yohana, budeeba ni giki baali banhu batalangilwe, bakakumya no; aliyo bubitegeleja giki bikalaga hamo na Yesu.
44004014	Bakagayiwa u gwa kuhaya, nguno bamonaga nu munhu uyo wali wapijiwa, imiilile hamo nabo a ba Petelo nu Yohana.
44004015	Huna bubalagila kufuma hanze, binga u ng'wibanza; a boi buguhoyela u mhayo gwenuyo bu maasaga.
44004016	Buhaya giki, "I gete tubiite ginehe a banhu benaba? Nguno pye a bana Yelusalemu bamanile hape giki baabeegije shimanikijo shitaale, isho tutadugije kushijimangucha?
44004017	I gete tubalemejagi u kuyomba na munhu ose-ose u mu lina lyenili, u mhayo gwenuyu gutizongeja kusambaala mu banhu bose."
44004018	Huna bubitana bubalemeja batizulihaya nuulu hado i lina lya ng'wa Yesu, nuulu ni kulanga duhu u mu lina lyenilo yaya!
44004019	Nabo a ba Petelo nu Yohana bubashokeja buhaya giki, "Lamulagi bing'we benekili, ulu gutungiligije u kuli Mulungu u gwa kung'wigwa bing'we kutinda kung'wigwa Mulungu.
44004020	Nguno a bise dutudula u kuleka u kwisomboola iyo twamalile kwibona na kwiyigwa."
44004021	Bongeja kubakanga, huna bubalekela buja, aliyo batabonile nzila ya kubinha nsango, kulwa nguno ya banhu, iki pye a bose bankumilijaga Mulungu kulwa mhayo uyo gwali gwilonga gwenuyo.
44004022	Nguno u munhu uyo wali witilwa i shimanikijo shenisho wali ntaale, wa myaka ikilile ha makumi ane.
44004023	Aho balekelwa buja u ku bichabo, buukabawila iyo bakawilwa na a bagabiji bataale na a banamhala.
44004024	Aho bigwa, pye a bose bumuukija Mulungu a malaka gabo buhaya giki, "Seeba, hu bebe uli nseemi walyo i ligulu ni si, pye na a manyanza, ni shose isho shilimo.
44004025	Bebe ng'wenekili ukalungalunga mu nguzu ja ng'wa Moyo Ng'wela kubitila mu nomo go ng'wa siswe Daudi, u ntumami wako; ukahaya giki, 'Nibuli a mahanga gakupelanaga, na a banhu bakulyaga gwinda ya dalali?
44004026	A batemi ba mu si bakulomanaga; na a basugi bakwibilingaga mabanza mabanza giki bilwishe nu Seeba, hamo nu Kilisto wakwe!'
44004027	"Nguno nghana u Helode nu Pontio Pilato, na a Baisilaeli, bakikuminga u mu nzengo uyu, hamo na banhu ba mahanga, buniila gwinda u Ntumami wako ng'wela, u Yesu, u Milwa-maguta.
44004028	Bung'witila iyo bebe ng'wenekili wihelile na nkono gwako kufuma kale giki ikubiza ho.
44004029	Ali luulu Seeba, galolage a makango gabo i haha, a batumami bako ubinhe bugimu wa kugusomboola u mhayo gwako.
44004030	Gugoloolage u nkono gwako kulwa kupija, na koolecha shimanikijo; mihayo ya kukumya ibeejiwe mu lina lya ng'wa Yesu, u Ntumami wako ng'wela."
44004031	Aho balomba giko, i lipandi lyenilo aho baali lyutinginyiwa, pye a bose bokajiwa na Moyo Ng'wela. Bugulomeela mu bugimu u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu.
44004032	U ng'wibita lya bazunya, pye a bose baali na ngholo imo, na moyo gumo; wali atiho nuulu umo wabo wa kuhaya giki i sabo iyo wali nayo yali yakwe ya ng'wenekili. Aliyo pyi i shikolo shali sha busangi.
44004033	A batung'wa baali na nimo ntaale gwa kubukaanila u bujuuko bo ng'wa Seeba Yesu. Pye a bose baali ha silili ya mbango ja ng'wa Seeba.
44004034	Wali atiho nuulu umo wabo uyo wakoyiagwa makoye ga bugayiwa, nguno abo baali na numba nuulu migunda bakayujinja bajenha i sabo ijo bapandikaga,
44004035	biza bajituula ku butongi wa batung'wa jagabanhyiwa; buli ng'wene wapandika kulenganila na makoye gakwe.
44004036	Waliho munhu umo lina lyakwe Yosefu; wa luganda lo Balawi, muna Kupulo. A batung'wa baali bang'wilika lina lya Balinaba, makulu gaho nunguja wa banhu.
44004037	U munhu ng'wenuyo wali na ngunda, ugujinja; isho akapandika pyi i shose ushenha, wiza ushituula ku butongi wa batung'wa.
44005001	Aliyo waliho munhu nebe, lina lyakwe Anania na nke okwe Safila; u ng'wene ohayujinja u ngunda gokwe,
44005002	ulekeela ibudika lya sabo iyo akapandika, giki inonghe wei ng'wenekili, nu nke ubiza amanile! I libudika ilo likasaaga ulisola ulitwala ku batung'wa.
44005003	Aliyo u Petelo ung'wila giki, "Bebe Anania, nibuli u Shetani okalaga u mu ngholo yako, nose wabisaga ibudika lya sabo iyo wapandikile u mu mpango gwa ngunda, giki unembe u Moyo Ng'wela?
44005004	I sabo yeniyo, aho yali mu nkono gwako yali iti yako? Na a haho wijinja yali iti mu budula wako? Nibuli wabisaga mhayo guli giko u mu ngholo yako? Utalembile banhu, wanembaga Mulungu!"
44005005	U Anania aho wigwa i mihayo yeniyo ugwa, ucha! Abo bakigwa bakagwilwa booba butaale no.
44005006	Basumba bubuuka bungolanya, bunfunya hanze, buukanjika.
44005007	Aho lyabita ikanza lya sa giti idatu, wiza nu nke, nanghwe wingila; kwike usangwa ataali u kwimana iyo yagwaga.
44005008	U Petelo ung'wila nanghwe giki, "Bebe aliniwilage, i sabo yeniyi, h'iyo ng'wapandikile aho ng'wagujinja u ngunda?" Nu ng'wene uhaya, "Alichene, h'i yene!"
44005009	U Petelo ung'wila, "Aliyo nibuli ng'walomanaga kungema u Moyo wa ng'wa Seeba? Managa giki a ha nyango henaho, galiho magulu ga banhu bajaga kunjika u ngoshi wako, nu bebe bakukubuucha!"
44005010	Nanghwe i likanza lyenilo ugwa ha si u ku magulu ga ng'wa Petelo, ucha! Bahayingila a basumba bunsanga waacha; bumucha nanghwe buukanjika, bung'wiheja nu ngoshi wakwe.
44005011	I kanisa i yose yugwilwa booba butaale, pye na a bangi abo bakayigwa i yeniyi!
44005012	A batung'wa bakayubeeja na makono gabo shimanikijo na mihayo mingi ya kukumya u mu banhu; a bose bibilingaga na moyo gumo ng'wibindo lya ng'wa Solomoni.
44005013	Aliyo u mu bangi wali atiho nuulu umo wa kugima kwisangija nabo; kwike ahene a banhu babakumilijaga.
44005014	Hama a bazunya bakongeja u kukwila; nguno mabita ga bagosha na bakima gakayungalukila Seeba.
44005015	Nose a banhu buyubenha na basaatu bababuukije ha buliili nuulu ha shilago, biza babatuula hihi na nzila, giki ulu alibita u Petelo guyubakuumya bamo babo nuulu nengeeji gokwe duhu.
44005016	Bangi buyufuma na ku mizengo yingi, iyo yali hihi-hihi na Yelusalemu, balibenha bababuukije a basaatu na a babo bakoyiagwa masamva; pye bapilaga.
44005017	Huna u ngabiji ntaale ubuuka osaayaga kingi nasho, hamo na a b'igele lya Basadukayo abo baali nanghwe.
44005018	Bushika bubadima bo hape-hape a batung'wa, buja buukabasoosela mu jeela.
44005019	Aliyo i bujiku wiza malaika o ng'wa Seeba, ugulugula u nyango gwa ha jeela. Ubatongeela abafunije kuja hanze, huna ubawila giki,
44005020	"Jagi u mu hekalu mukabalomeele a banhu pyi i mihayo ya bupanga wenubu."
44005021	Aho bigwa giko nghana bubuuka dilu makingo, buja u mu hekalu buukandya kulanga. U ngabiji ntaale aho wiza na a babo baali nanghwe, bulibilinga i libanza, na a basugi ba Baisilaeli a bose bubiza ho; huna butumija u ku jeela giki bakenhwe a batung'wa.
44005022	Aliyo a bashilikale aho bashika ko batabasangile u mu jeela, bushoka biza bujifunya i mhola.
44005023	Buhaya giki, "I jeela twisanga ilugalile chiza no, na a balanghani bimiilaga a ha milyango, kwike twahayulugula tutasangile mo munhu u mu gati!"
44005024	U ntaale wa balanghani ba hekalu na a bagabiji bataale aho bagwigwa u mhayo gwenuyo buzwangana, buyiganika giki himba bakubiza bagwilagwa mhayo ki!
44005025	Wiza munhu nebe ubawila giki, "Alibalolagi abo ng'wali ng'wabatuulile mu jeela, babo bali mu hekalu bimiilaga balibalanga banhu!"
44005026	Huna uja u ntaale wa bashilikale na balanghani ba hekalu, buukabenha; kwike iti bo nguzu, nguno bakogoha giki a banhu bakubaponda mawe.
44005027	Aho babenha, bushikila kubimilija u ng'wibanza. Huna u ntaale wa bagabiji ubabuja
44005028	alihaya giki, "Bing'we, tutamulemegije tumuwila giki yaya u kulanga hangi u mu lina lyenilo? Hama iki hu mulibona luulu giki i haha pyi i Yelusalemu ng'wiyokajaga mamihayo ging'we ayo mukulangaga, nose a mininga gakwe u munhu ng'wenuyo mulihaya kutubilija bise!"
44005029	Huna u Petelo na a batung'wa biye bushosha giki, "A bise itwigeleelilwe tung'wigwe Mulungu kutinda banhu.
44005030	U Mulungu wa bakulugenji bise wanjuukije u Yesu uyo mukamulaga bo kunungeleja ha linti.
44005031	U Mulungu wangunguhije u Munhu ng'wenuyo, i haha ali ku bulyo wakwe, Ntemi na Mpija kulwa kubinha a Baisilaeli budula bo kugaluka na kulekejiwa shibi shabo.
44005032	A bise tuli bakaaniji bayo i mihayo yeniyi, nu Moyo Ng'wela uyo Mulungu akubinhaga buli bene abo bung'wigwa."
44005033	Aho bigwa giko, buching'wa u mu ngholo jabo, bubona giki bababulage.
44005034	Aliyo u ng'wibanza ng'wenumo walimo Nfalisayo nebe, nangi wa shilagilo, lina lyakwe Gamalieli. U munhu ng'wenuyo baali bankugije pye a banhu. Huna wimiila ulagila bafunyiwe hanze a banhu benabo kakanza kado.
44005035	Uliwila i libanza giki, "Bing'we bababa Baisilaeli, ilanghanagi umo mulihaya kubiitila a banhu benaba.
44005036	Nguno aho jitaali u kushika i shiku jeniji, akilonga munhu nebe; Teuda, uyuja akwigimba-gimbaga giki shadiima. Na nghana akapandika bahemba: bagosha ba kushika giti magana ane; aliyo akabulagwa, na a bahemba bakwe pye a bose busalanghana, gugaya nu yuyo wagwitaga.
44005037	Aho wabita u ng'wenuyo, wigela hangi ungi u mu shiku ja banhu kwandikwa; wali Yuda muna Galilaya. Nanghwe uduta banhu, aliyo nu ng'wene akayagala, abo baali bang'wigwile busalanghana pye a bose.
44005038	Nose u nene nalimuwila i haha giki, lekanagi nabo gete a banhu benaba, ng'ooye u kwikala mukubakuubilijaga. Nguno i liganiko lyenili nuulu u nimo gwenuyu ulu gubize gufumile ku banhu gukucha duhu.
44005039	Aliyo ulu gufumile kuli Mulungu, mutudula u kugukenaagula na hado yaya; ilanghanagi mutizubiza mukwilwishaga na Mulungu!" Nghana bung'wigwa.
44005040	Huna bubitana a batung'wa, bubatula mbooko; hama bubalemeja u kulihaya i lina lya ng'wa Yesu, bubalekela buja.
44005041	A batung'wa binga u ng'wibanza bayegaga no, nguno bakabona bisaabagwa giki bigeleelilwe kugoolwa kulwa lina lya ng'wa Yesu.
44005042	Bakongeja kuyuja buli lushiku u mu hekalu kulanga, hama batooyile nu kuja hose-hose u mu kaya ja banhu bakulomeelaga ya ng'wa Kilisto Yesu.
44006001	U mu shiku jenijo aho bakwila a bahemba, bukilonga budugumi. A Bayudaya ba Shiyunani buyubadugumila a Bayudaya ba Shihebulania, nguno a bachilwa babo bakayubitiilwa u kugunaanwa u mu mihayo ya buli lushiku.
44006002	Huna luulu ab'ikumi na babili bubitana pye a bahemba buhaya giki, "Iti yawiza a bise tuguleke u nimo gwa kugulanga u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu, tuyulonja mihayo ya shiliwa.
44006003	A bing'we badugu solanhyagi banhu mpungati u mu bing'we, tubatuule a ha nimo gwenuyu. Babize bakukaanilagwa giki bokajiwe na Moyo, hangi bali na witegeleja.
44006004	Lelo a bise bene tukomeeje u kugwita u nimo gwa kulomba na kugulomeela u mhayo."
44006005	I liganiko lyenilo lyubayeja pye a badugu; bunsola Stefano, munhu wa kuzunya na okalile Moyo Ng'wela, na Filipo na Pilokolo na Nikanola na Timona na Palimena na Nikolao, nghembekwa wa Antiokia.
44006006	A banhu benabo bubenha u ku batung'wa, bubalombela na kubatuulila makono.
44006007	Ha numa ya henaho, u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu gongeja u kuja gukusambaalaga; ni lisaabu lya bahemba u mu Yelusalemu lyongeja u kukula, na bagabiji bingi buyugwanukula u kuzunya kwenuku.
44006008	Huna u Stefano kulwa kokajiwa nguzu na budula, uyubeeja mihayo ya kukumya na shimanikijo shitaale u mu banhu.
44006009	Kwimanila bigela banhu balebe ba ng'wisinagogi litanagwa lya Wiyabi, na bana Kilene na Isikandelia, na bana Kilikia, na bana Asia; buyung'wihalalija u Stefano.
44006010	Kwike batawimilile u witegeleja bo kasomboolele kakwe, nu Moyo uyo wali muli we.
44006011	Banoga nose bukobya banhu bubahana; bahaye giki, "U ng'wenuyu twang'wigwile alinsondagula u Musa nu Mulungu!"
44006012	Bubabipya a masala a banhu na a banamhala, pye na a balangi ba shilagilo; biza bundima u Stefano buntwala kwibanza.
44006013	Butuula bakaaniji balomolomo; buhaya giki, "U munhu ng'wenuyu alemile gete u koya u kulisondagula i lipandi lyeela ili, ni shilagilo.
44006014	Nguno twang'wigwile alihaya na giki, angu u Yesu wa Nazaleti ng'wenuyu akulikenaagula i lipandi lyenili, ajigaluche ni nhungwa ijo twalekelwa na Musa!"
44006015	Pye abo baali bigashije u ng'wibanza aho banola u Stefano, bububona u bushu bokwe bobizaga giti bo ng'wa malaika.
44007001	U ntaale o bagabiji umuja, "Angu, i mihayo yeniyi ili chene?"
44007002	Nanghwe uhaya giki, "Bing'we bagosha, badugu bane na bababa, nidegelekagi! U Mulungu akiyoolecha kuli Abulahamu aho ali Mesopotamia, ataali nuulu kusaamila Halani.
44007003	Ung'wila giki, 'Fumaga u mu si yako nu mu banhu ba luganda lwako; uje ku si iyo nalakoolekeje.'
44007004	Winga nghana u mu si ya Bakalidayo, uja Halani uukazenga kwenuko. Aho ali kwenuko uzumalika u ise, huna usaamijiwa u mu si yeniyi mukwikalaga i haha.
44007005	Aliyo u Mulungu atang'winhile wingiji moi, nuulu ni katogolo kado duhu ka lupambala lumo. Kwike akang'wisagija giki akung'winha ibize ya wingiji bokwe, hamo na bubyile bokwe, nuulu iki wali ataali kubyala ng'wana ose-ose.
44007006	Hama hangi u Mulungu uhaya giki, a banhu ba bubyile bokwe balabiza bageni mu si ya banhu bangi, baliitwa kubiza basese kushisha ikanza lya myaka magana ane.
44007007	Aliyo u Mulungu uhaya giki, 'I lihanga ilo lilabiita kubiza basese lyenilo nalalinha nsango, ha numa ya yeniyo bafume bize u ng'wipandi ili bayunilamya nene.'
44007008	Huna ung'winha bulagane bo kusaalwa; aho wamyala u Isaka unsaala ha lushiku lo kanaane. U Isaka nanghwe umyala Yakobo, nanghwe u Yakobo ubabyala a bakulugenji bise abo ikumi na babili.
44007009	"A bakulugenji bise benabo bunjinja u Yosefu nguno bakamonela wilu; utwalwa Misili. Aliyo u Mulungu wali hamo nanghwe.
44007010	Umpija u mu makoye gakwe pye a gose, hama ung'winha masala na kwanukulwa u ku butongi bo ng'wa Falao, uyo wali ntemi wa Misili. U ntemi ng'wenuyo ung'wita kubiza ntaale wa si yose ya Misili, hamo ni kaya yakwe i yose.
44007011	Huna yugwa nzala nhaale u mu si ya Misili ni Kanaani; a bakulugenji bise bumala i shiliwa, bubiza na makoye mataale.
44007012	U Yakobo wigwa giki shiliko shiliwa i Misili, ubatuma a bakulugenji bise, buja koi lukangala lwa kwandya.
44007013	Bahayushoka koi u lwa kabili, u Yosefu uukimanicha u ku baduguye; u luganda lo ng'wa Yosefu lumanika u kuli Falao.
44007014	Huna u Yosefu ubatuma buukang'witana u ise u Yakobo, na a banhu bakwe pye a bose; u bukumi wabo baali banhu makumi mpungati na batano.
44007015	Nghana u Yakobo utulumenha kuja Misili; uukachila kwenuko, pye na a bakulugenji bise.
44007016	Kwike bakabuuchiwa buukajikilwa Shekemu, mu shigila isho Abulahamu wali wagula ku bitunja ba ng'wa Hamoli, mu Shekemu ng'wenumo."
44007017	"Aho lyegeela i likanza lya kushikilijiwa kwa wisagija ubo Mulungu wali wang'winha Abulahamu, a banhu busangwa bibyala bakwila no u mu si ya Misili.
44007018	Wanoga utema ntemi ungi u mu Misili, uyo wali ataamanile u Yosefu.
44007019	U munhu ng'wenuyo wandya kubiitila nyasala-sala a banhu ba luganda lwise, uyubaluhya na kubahadikija a babyaji kuyubaponya ku matogolo a baana a beleele, baachila kwenuko.
44007020	U mu shiku jenijo ubyalwa Musa; ng'wana wawiza u kuli Mulungu, ulanghanwa mu kaya ya ng'wa ise ikanza lya myeji idatu.
44007021	Aho wafunyiwa hanze kujulekwa ku matogolo, nshike o ng'wa Falao unsola unela, ung'wita kubiza ng'witunja wakwe.
44007022	U Musa akalangwa pyi u bumani bo mu Misili, ubiza na budula u mu kalungalungile, nu mu katumamile."
44007023	"Aliyo aho washisha myaka makumi ane, lyung'wiziila iganiko lya kujubalola a baduguye a Baisilaeli.
44007024	Umona umo wabo aliboneelwa, ungunija; untula u muna Misili umulaga.
44007025	U wei wiganikaga hamo a baduguye bakwitegeleja, giki u Mulungu atogilwe kubinha bupiji kubitila mu nkono gokwe, aliyo batitegelegije.
44007026	Ha lushiku lwa ntondo yaho ubasanga babili babo bizwanjaga, ugema kubayangula giki bigwindanye; ubawila, 'Bing'we bagosha, nibuli mulikenya aliyo muli ba ludugu lumo?'
44007027	Kwike uyo wang'wiboneelaga ng'wiye umpama u Musa, kunu alinfikilija uhaya giki, 'U bebe i gete nani wakutuulile butaale na kubiza namuji wise?
44007028	Utogilwe kunibulaga nu nene git'umo ukamulagila muna Misili igolo?'
44007029	U mhayo gwenuyo gung'wenheleja u Musa kupeela, uja uukikala mu si ya Midiani; aho ali kwenuko ubyala bitunja babili.
44007030	Yubita myaka makumi ane ali kwenuko, lwise lumo wilongelwa na malaika o ng'wa Seeba mu nzila ya ndali ja moto ng'wisaka, kwitogolo lya ku lugulu lo Sinai.
44007031	U Musa aho ogubona u mhayo gwenuyo akakumya no; wahayihamba kwegeela giki alole chiza, ligela ilaka lya ng'wa Seeba, lilihaya giki,
44007032	'Nali Mulungu wa bakulugenji bako, Mulungu wa ng'wa Abulahamu na Isaka na Yakobo.' U Musa ogoha uyudetema, ulemeelwa u kulola.
44007033	U Seeba ung'wila giki, 'Injaga i shilatu shako u ku mhambala jako, nguno aho wimiilaga henaha lil'ipandi lyeela.
44007034	Naalolile ko i Misili nububona u buluhiwa wa banhu bane, ni nghungu yabo nayigwile. Ali luulu, nikaga kubakomoola, i haha nzugu nakutume uje ko i Misili.'
44007035	"U Musa uyo bakanema balihaya giki, 'Nani wakutuulile butaale na kubiza namuji?' hu ng'wene uyo akatung'wa na Mulungu mu nkono go ng'wa malaika uyo akang'wilongela ng'wisaka, ung'wita kubiza ntongeeji na nkomooji.
44007036	U munhu ng'wenuyu h'uyo ubiza ntongeeji wabo, ubafunya u mu Misili; wita shimanikijo na mihayo ya kukumya u mu si yeniyo, nu ku Nyanza Yaza, na haho bali ng'witogolo ikanza lya myaka makumi ane.
44007037	U Musa ng'wenuyu hu ng'wene uyo akabawila a Baisilaeli giki, 'U Seeba akung'winha nghangi wa kubiza giti nene, wa kufuma mu badugu bing'we.'
44007038	Hu ng'wene uyo wali nayo i kanisa u ku matogolo, hamo nu malaika uyo akayomba nanghwe ku lugulu lo Sinai, uyo wali hamo nabo a bakulugenji bise abo bakanukula mihayo ya bupanga; giki batwinhe nise.
44007039	"Hu ng'wene uyo bakalema u kung'wigwa a bakulugenji bise; bumpamila ku mhelo, bushoka Misili u mu ngholo jabo.
44007040	Bung'wila Alooni giki, 'Tubeegejage bamulungu bayututongeela, nguno u Musa uyo watwingije Misili ng'wenuyu tutamanile iyo yang'wilongelile.'
44007041	Na nghana u mu shiku jenijo bubeeja shiikolile sha ndama; lishiikolile buyulifunija shitambo, buyegela milimo ya makono gabo!
44007042	Nanghwe u Mulungu ugaluka, ubalekanija bubiza balamya ba mabita ga kwilunde, git'umo gwandikilwe mu shitabo sha bahangi; giki, 'Bing'we numba ya Isilaeli, i likanza lya myaka makumi ane aho ng'wali ku matogolo, ng'wanifunijaga shitambo u nene, nuulu shakwinha shose-shose?
44007043	Tuhaya ng'wabuuchaga iheema lya ng'wa Moloki, na sonda ya ng'wa mulungu wing'we Laifani duhu, mashiikolile ayo ng'wali ng'wibeegeja giki muyugalamya! Nakumuponya muje kule gukila Babuloni!'
44007044	"A bakulugenji bise aho bali ku matogolo baali n'iheema lya kubeejiwa git'umo wali walagiilila uyo akang'wila Musa kulibeeja, libize git'umo shaali i shigemelo isho akashibona.
44007045	A bakulugenji bise bulyanukula i liheema lyenilo, bulyenhanija aho baliza na Yoshwa ng'wikanza lya kudima wingiji mu mahanga, ayo Mulungu akagapeeja gubingila. Baali nalyo kushisha mu shiku ja ng'wa Daudi,
44007046	uyo akilukilwa mbango ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu. Nose ubuja ulu adugije kunzengela wikalo u Mulungu wa numba ya ng'wa Yakobo.
44007047	Kwike u nzengi wayo i numba yeniyo akabiza Solomoni.
44007048	Aliyo nahene uyo ali higulya no, atikalaga mu numba ja kuzengwa na makono; git'umo ahayilile u nghangi giki,
44007049	'I ligulu lyene isumbi lyane, lelo i si buli butuulo bo mhambala jane; nose mukunizengela numba ki u nene, nuulu ipandi ki lya kwifuulila? Alihaya Seeba!
44007050	Angu, u nkono gwane gutashibeegije pyi i shose ishi?'
44007051	"Bing'we ba mitwe midiimu, ba maganiko masoso na matu gatigwaga, bilwisha ba ng'wa Moyo Ng'wela ba shiku jose na jose! Umo baali a basing'we na a bing'we h'umo muli.
44007052	I gisi nghangi ki uyo batanuhije a basing'we? Iki bababulagaga abo balomeelaga nghulu ja kwiza kwakwe u Ntungilija, uyo ng'wabizile balodeeji na babulagi bakwe a bing'we!
44007053	Angu niyo a bing'we hu muli bene a banukuji ba shilagilo mu nzila ya bamalaika, aliyo hu mutashidimile!"
44007054	Aho biyigwa i yeniyo buching'wa u mu ngholo jabo, bung'wilumila nghaya.
44007055	Aliyo u ng'wene wali akalalilile ng'wigulu kunu okalaga Moyo Ng'wela, ulibona i likujo lya ng'wa Mulungu, nu Yesu wimiilaga ku nkono gwa bulyo go ng'wa Mulungu.
44007056	Huna uhaya, "Lolagi nalilibona i ligulu lyakundukaga, nu Ng'wana wa Munhu wimiilaga ku nkono gwa bulyo go ng'wa Mulungu."
44007057	Buyoganya n'ilaka lya higulya, bichibija a matu gabo; pye a bose bubuuka bung'wihoolekela.
44007058	Bunfunya hanze ya nzengo buukamponda mawe. A bakaaniji butuula i shizwalo shabo mu magulu ga sumba umo witanagwa Saulo.
44007059	U Stefano aho balimponda mawe, ulomba alihaya, "Seeba Yesu, gwanukulage u moyo gwane."
44007060	Utuja mazwi ulila n'ilaka itaale giki, "Seeba utizubabalila i shibi shenishi." Aho wamala u kuhaya i giko ugwa, ulaala!
44008001	U Saulo akayega no u kubona giki, obulagwa nghana. U mu lushiku lwenulo i kanisa ya Yelusalemu ikagwilwa buluhiwa butaale no, pye a bose busambaala, buja uko na uko u mu si ya Buyudaya ni ya Samalia; bulekeelwa duhu a batung'wa.
44008002	Banhu ba logohano kuli Mulungu bumucha u Stefano bukanjika; bakaanila hataale niyo no!
44008003	Aliyo u Saulo hu ulinhya kwikenaagula i kanisa, uyuja akwingilaga mu buli kaya wabadutanja pye bagosha na bakima, kubatwala mu jeela!
44008004	Huna, abo bakasambaala, baja bakugulomeelaga u Mhayo.
44008005	U Filipo utulumenha ajile, uukashika ku nzengo gwa Samalia, wandya kubalomeela ya ng'wa Kilisto.
44008006	Mabita na mabita ga banhu gikuminga na moyo gumo, kudegeleka iyo wihayaga u Filipo. Aho bashibona i shimanikijo isho wabeejaga budilila kutinda.
44008007	Nguno bingi abo baali na masamva guyubafuma galilila n'ilaka itaale, hama bingi abo baali na busaatu wa kuuma buhaama nuulu bulemehazu buyupila.
44008008	Niyo bubiza buyegi butaale no u mu nzengo gwenuyo.
44008009	Walimo na munhu nebe u mu nzengo gwenuyo witanagwa Simoni, wali na maleeba ga nyalogi kufuma kale; na luulu wali wabakamaaja pyi u ng'wihanga lya Basamalia, kulwa kwigimba-gimba giki u wei hu wali magaatala!
44008010	Pye a banhu, bado na bataale, baali bang'ogohile; nguno bahayaga giki, "U munhu ng'wenuyu hu ng'wene uyo ali budula bo ng'wa mulungu, ubo bukahayiagwa 'Budula Butaale!' "
44008011	Na nghana baali bang'ogohile no, nguno wali wabahehenaja ikanza ilihu kulwa maleeba gakwe ga nyalogi.
44008012	Aliyo u Filipo aho wabalomeela mhola ja butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu na lina lya ng'wa Yesu Kilisto, bagosha na bakima bakayuzunya babatiijiwa.
44008013	Nu wei u Simoni uzunya ubatiijiwa, niyo uyikala adimanile nu Filipo; uyukumya no u kushibona i shimanikijo isho shabeejiagwa mu budula butaale, pyi ni yingi i ya kukamaaja.
44008014	Aho bigwa a batung'wa i Yelusalemu giki ni Samalia yagwanukulile u Mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu, bubatuma ko ba Petelo na Yohana.
44008015	Bahayushika ko bubalombela bang'wanukule u Moyo Ng'wela;
44008016	nguno wali ataali kwikiilwa nuulu umo wabo, iki baali babatiijiwa mu lina lya ng'wa Seeba Yesu duhu.
44008017	Huna bubatuulila makono, bung'wanukula u Moyo Ng'wela.
44008018	U Simoni aho wabona bang'wanukula Moyo Ng'wela mu nzila ya kutuulilwa makono ga batung'wa, ufunya hela giki abinhe.
44008019	Uhaya, "Ninhagi nu nene u budula wenubu; nane buli ng'wene uyo nalantuulilage makono ayung'wanukula u Moyo Ng'wela!"
44008020	Aliyo u Petelo unshokeja ung'wila, "Jiliilaga uko na hela jako ukache najo kwenuko; nguno gashinaga u bebe uliganika, i shakwinha sha ng'wa Mulungu shikapandikagwa bo hela.
44008021	U bebe uti na ngabo gete, hangi uti na fiilu nuulu hado u mu mhayo gwenuyu; nguno u moyo gwako gutatungiligije u kuli Mulungu.
44008022	Ali luulu, galukaga winge u mu bubi wako wenubu, unombe u Seeba, ulu yudulikana akulekeje a maganiko ayo gali mu ngholo yako.
44008023	Nguno nalibona uli n'isubi lyabubi no giti ndulu yokalile busungu, niyo uli mu butungwa bo mihayo iti ya butungilija!"
44008024	Nanghwe u Simoni ushosha uhaya giki, "Nilombelagi a bing'we u kuli Seeba, gutizunigwila nuulu gumo u mu yeniyo ng'wihaya!"
44008025	Bahayumala kufunya u bukaaniji na kugulomeela u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba, bushoka Yelusalemu, buja bakulomeelaga mu magunguli mingi ga Basamalia.
44008026	Aliyo u Filipo uwilwa na malaika o ng'wa Seeba giki, "Buukaga uje dakama; ubitile i nzila ya ng'witogolo i likalamuku, iyo itulumenhile kufuma Yelusalemu kuja Gaza."
44008027	Nghana ubuuka uja; waliho ngosha asoloolilwe, muna Esiopia, nanghani wa sabo jose ja ng'wa Kantake, ntemi nkima wa si ya Esiopia; u munhu ng'wenuyo wali waja Yelusalemu kujulamya.
44008028	I likanza lyenilo akasangwa alishoka kaya, igashije ng'wigogoteni lyakwe akusomaga mu shitabo sha nghangi Isaya.
44008029	Huna u Moyo ung'wila u Filipo giki, "Egeelaga ho uje hamo nalyo i ligogoteni lyenilo."
44008030	U Filipo upeela ajile ho, ung'wigwa alisoma mu shitabo sha nghangi Isaya; umuja giki, "Uliyitegeleja iyo uliyisoma yeniyo?"
44008031	Nanghwe uhaya, "Nadugije ginehe u kwiyitegeleja ulu munhu atanilangile?" Ung'wikumbilija u Filipo ulinha mo wigasha hamo nanghwe.
44008032	I libudika lya shandikwa ilo wasomaga lyali ili; "Akatwalwa giti ngholo ya kusinzwa, nuwe atafunije nuulu ilaka lyakwe, wali sele giti ngholo kuli munhu akwibbutilaga booya.
44008033	Kulwa kudalahwa atalamulilwe mu butungilija; nani uyo adugije kwisomboola i mihayo ya shibyalilwe shakwe? Nguno u bupanga bokwe bukinjiwa u mu si!"
44008034	U nsoloolwa ng'wenuyo ung'wila u Filipo giki, "Nalikwikumbilija uniwile, u nghangi alihaya mihayo ya ng'wa nani? Alihaya wei ng'wenekili, nuulu alinghaya munhu ungi?"
44008035	U Filipo wandija h'ipandi lyenilo u mu shandikwa, unomeela ya ng'wa Yesu.
44008036	Aho bajile u mu nzila, bahayimanila bashika h'ipandi galiho minzi; u nsoloolwa uhaya giki, "Gaya minzi aha, i gisi ki i sha kunilemeja natizubatiijiwa?" [
44008037	Nanghwe u Filipo ung'wila, "Ulu ulizunya na moyo gwako gose idulikanile." U nsoloolwa ushosha uhaya, "Nazunyaga giki u Yesu Kilisto ali Ng'wana o ng'wa Mulungu."]
44008038	Huna ulagila lyimichiwa i ligogoteni; u Filipo nu nsoloolwa bika bubili wabo, buja u mu minzi uukamatiija.
44008039	Aho balifuma u mu minzi, Moyo wa ng'wa Seeba unghwehula u Filipo; u nsoloolwa atamonile hangi, aliyo aho ali mu nzila waja okalaga buyegi.
44008040	U Filipo akiita ubonelwa Azota, wajaga akulomeelaga hose-hose u mu mizengo, nose uukashika Kaisalia.
44009001	Aliyo u Saulo wali ataali afuulile maleewe kulwa bupelanu na kubilumila nghaya a bahemba ba ng'wa Seeba, huna uja kuli ngabiji ntaale.
44009002	Uukalomba nyaluba ja kuja ku masinagogi ga Damasko, giki ulu alabapandike ko bose-bose abo balimo u mu Nzila yeniyi, bagosha na bakima, abadime abatunge na kubatwala Yelusalemu.
44009003	Huna aho ajile, ohayegeela i Damasko, kwimanila bupe bung'weku bo kufuma ng'wigulu bong'wikiila bumpindije.
44009004	Ugwa ha si pu; wigwa ilaka liling'wila giki, "Saulo Saulo, nibuli uliniluhya?"
44009005	Ubuja, "Uli nani Seeba?" Nanghwe ushosha, "Nali Yesu uyo uliniluhya!
44009006	Aliyo buukaga ushikiile u mu nzengo, ukujuwilwa ng'wenumo uyo gukwigelile ugwite."
44009007	A banhu abo washimizaga nabo bimiila badedebalile, nguno i lilaka baliigwaga aliyo batamonile munhu!
44009008	U Saulo aho wabuuka a ha si, wahayuloleecha a miso gakwe, atabonile nuulu hado; bundima nkono bunshikilija u mu Damasko.
44009009	Akamala shiku idatu atubonaga, hama nduhu kulya nuulu kung'wa shose-shose.
44009010	U mu Damasko ng'wenumo walimo nghemba nebe witanagwa Anania, u Seeba ung'witana mu koolechiwa, "Anania;" nanghwe uhaya, "Naliho Seeba."
44009011	Huna u Seeba ung'wila, "Buukaga uje u kwikuuwa ilo likitanagwa igololoku, ulu ulashike ko ubuje ha ng'wa Yuda. Aliho hoi munhu akitanagwa Saulo, muna Taso, alilomba.
44009012	Wamonaga mu koolechiwa munhu umo akitanagwa Anania, alingila na kuntuulila makono giki abone."
44009013	Nanghwe u Anania ushosha uhaya, "Seeba u munhu ng'wenuyo nayigwile mingi i mihayo yakwe iyo akubiitilaga a beela bako i Yelusalemu.
44009014	Na a henaha ali na budula winhilwe kufuma ku bagabiji bataale, giki abatunge pye abo bakulikumilijaga lina lyako!"
44009015	Nanghwe u Seeba ung'wila, "Jaga ko duhu, nguno u munhu ng'wenuyo ali shitumamilo shane shisolwa, kulwa kulitwala lina lyane ku mahanga na batemi, na ku Baisilaeli.
44009016	Nakung'oolekeja mingi iyo shiigelile aluhiwe muyo kulwa lina lyane."
44009017	Huna u Anania uja nghana; aho wakingila u mu numba, untuulila makono, uhaya giki; "Ndugu Saulo, u Seeba Yesu uyo wali wakwilongelile mu nzila aho uliza, wanitumaga. Ali luulu, anukulaga budula bo kubona; niyo okajiwe na Moyo Ng'wela."
44009018	Haho na haho gulagala kufuma u ku miso gakwe, maginhu ga kubiza giti magambala, wandya hangi u kubona, ubuuka ubatiijiwa.
44009019	Huna ulya shiliwa, upandika nguzu. I Damasko akashinga ikanza lya shiku ndebe, ali hamo nabo a bahemba.
44009020	Atadilile wandya kuyulomeela u mu masinagogi; giki, "U Yesu hu ng'wene u Ng'wana o ng'wa Mulungu."
44009021	Pye abo bang'wigwaga buyukumya balihaya, "Tuhaya u ng'wenuyu h'uyo walubaluhyaga i Yelusalemu abo bakulilamyaga i lina lyenili, nu kuunu wizile kubatunga abatwale ku bagabiji bataale?"
44009022	Aliyo u Saulo ongeja kubiza na nguzu, a Bayudaya ba Damasko uyubahuumuja hape-hape, ulu aliboolekeja giki u Yesu hu ng'wene u Kilisto.
44009023	Aho jabita shiku ningi, a Bayudaya busigana mhayo gwa kumulaga!
44009024	Buyudila balanghanile mu welwa-ngholo a ha mita liimi na bujiku, giki balandime bamulage! Kwike u Saulo ubumana u busigani wabo.
44009025	Huna a bahemba bakwe buntuula mu shigabbu makanza ga bujiku, bunsheepeleja ng'widilisha lya mu ndugu, bung'wicha.
44009026	Aho washika i Yelusalemu ugema u kwisangija u mu bahemba, aliyo pye a bose bung'ogoha, batazunije i giki wali nghemba nghana.
44009027	Kushisha nose Balinaba unsola, untwala u ku batung'wa, uukabawila umo akamonela u Seeba aho ali mu nzila, na giki u Seeba akayomba nanghwe; pyi ni ya kulomeela na bugimu mu lina lya ng'wa Yesu aho wali Damasko.
44009028	Huna bung'wanukula u mu busangi wabo i Yelusalemu, wandya kuyingila na kufuma hamo nabo; nu kulomeela uyulomeela hape-hape mu lina lya ng'wa Seeba.
44009029	Akayudila akubasomboolelaga a Bayudaya ba Shiyunani, na kwihalalija nabo; nose bandya kukooba nzila ya kumulaga.
44009030	Aliyo aho bagumana a badugu, buntwala Kaisalia; buukanumbulija kuja Taso.
44009031	Huna luulu i kanisa yubiza yalembeela hose pyi u mu Buyudaya ni Galilaya, ni Samalia. Yongeja kukula na kubiza na nguzu, kunu ikushimizilaga mu logohano lwa ng'wa Seeba, na kulungujiwa na Moyo Ng'wela.
44009032	Makanza malebe u Petelo wandya kuja akubitaga buli ipandi, nose uukashika ku beela bikalaga Luda.
44009033	Unsanga koi munhu umo, lina lyakwe Ainea; wali na myaka inaane ali mu buliili kulwa busaatu bo mangwisha.
44009034	U Petelo ung'wila giki, "Ainea, u Yesu Kilisto wakupijaga, buukaga ububeeje u buliili wako." Nghana ubuuka haho na haho.
44009035	Aho bamona pye a bazengi ba Luda na Shaloni, bungalukila Seeba.
44009036	Waliho nghemba mu Yopa, lina lyakwe Tabiza, makulu gaho Dolika I lina lya Dolika (Shiyunani) lili limo ni lya Tabiza (Shialamayo); a makulu galyo "Laala" (i ndimu).'; u nshike ng'wenuyo wali akangiligije u mu shitwa i shawiza, hangi wali ng'wiza-ngholo kalalamba!
44009037	U mu shiku jenijo usaata, uzumalika. Aho bamala u kung'ooja, buntuula ku chumba sha ku golofa.
44009038	I Luda yali hihi ni Yopa, na luulu iki a bahemba baali bigwa giki u Petelo wali kwenuko, butuma koi banhu babili, buukang'wikumbilija balihaya, "Utizudila u kwiza uko tuli."
44009039	U Petelo ubuuka, uja nabo. Aho washika ko, buntonga u ku chumba sha ku golofa, pye a bachilwa bimiila bampindije, balilila kunu baling'oolekeja u Petelo i shizwalo ni myenda iyo wali wabeeja u Dolika aho wali ataali hamo nabo.
44009040	U Petelo ubafunya hanze pye a bose. Huna utuja mazwi ulomba, aho wamala ugugalukila u mili uhaya, "Tabiza, buukaga!" Uloleecha a miso gakwe; aho wamona u Petelo wigasha.
44009041	Nanghwe undima nkono ungungumula, ubitana a beela na a bachilwa ung'winha kubo, wapilaga.
44009042	U mhayo gwenuyo gukumuka pye a hose u mu Yopa, bunzunya Seeba.
44009043	U Petelo wikala makanza malihu u mu Yopa ng'wenumo, ha ng'wa Simoni nkomi wa makunza.
44010001	Waliho ngosha umo mu Kaisalia witanagwa Kolinelio, ntaale wa bashilikale igana; w'ibita litanagwa lya Italia.
44010002	U munhu ng'wenuyo wali ntungilija, ni kaya yakwe i yose, hangi wali ang'ogohile Mulungu; niyo wali ng'wiza-ngholo no u ku banhu, na wanombaga Mulungu gwa-gwa-gwa.
44010003	Lwise lumo makanza giti ga sa kenda ya liimi, u munhu ng'wenuyo umona malaika hape-hape mu koolechiwa. Akingila u mu ng'wakwe; ushika ung'witana, "Kolinelio."
44010004	U Kolinelio unkalalila kunu ogohaga; wanoga nose uhaya, "Ni ginehe Seeba!" Ung'wila giki, "U kulomba kwako nu wiza-ngholo wako shanukulilwe nuulu: shalinhile.' kwigulya, kubiza shizukijo kuli Mulungu.
44010005	Ali luulu, i haha tumaga banhu baje Yopa, bakang'witane aliko koi Simoni akitanagwa Petelo.
44010006	Alendile ha ng'wa Simoni nkomi wa makunza, numba yakwe ili hihi na nyanza!"
44010007	Aho winga u malaika uyo wayombaga nanghwe, u Kolinelio ubitana babili ba batumami ba ha ng'wakwe, na nshilikale umo, uyo wali ng'wishigwa mu kulamya, umo wa bashilikale abo bikalaga hamo nanghwe gwa, kulwa kuntumamila.
44010008	A banhu benabo ubasomboolela pyi i mihayo yeniyo, huna ubatuma i Yopa.
44010009	U ku ntondo yaho aho balija, bahayugwegeela u nzengo, u Petelo nanghwe usangwa walinha kwigulya ya numba mu makanza ga kulomba, giki akalombe kwenuko; yali giti sa itandatu.
44010010	Aliyo iki wali watuuba, wandya kwiganika mhayo gwa shiliwa, kwike baali bataali buzugija; wahayimanila wahweelwa.
44010011	Huna ubona i ligulu lyakunduka, na shikolo sha kubiza giti nguto gwa ng'wenda ntaale gulichiwa ha si, gudimililwe ku mhembeelo jago ine.
44010012	U mu gati jalimo shiinu ja buli mbika: ja magulu ane, ni ja kwigwesa ha si, na noni ja kulala ja buli mbika.
44010013	Lyung'wiziila n'ilaka lilihaya giki, "Petelo, buukaga usinze ulye."
44010014	Nanghwe u Petelo uhaya, "Yaya Seeba; u nene nataali kulya shikolo sha sagala nuulu shisoso."
44010015	I lilaka lyung'wiziila hangi lukangala lwa kabili lilihaya, "Isho wamalaga kusheeja Mulungu, utashihayage u bebe giki shili shisoso."
44010016	U mhayo gwenuyo gushokeelwa nghangala idatu, huna haho na haho i shiseme shenisho shudutwa kulinhyiwa ng'wigulu.
44010017	U Petelo aho ataali akwibuja-bujaga a makulu ga mhayo uyo akagubona gwenuyo, a banhu abo baali batung'wa kufuma ku ng'wa Kolinelio kwiza kwikooba i numba ya ng'wa Simoni, bushika bimiila ha mita.
44010018	Bubuja ulu aliho hoi Simoni uyo akitanagwa Petelo.
44010019	U wei u Petelo akasangwa ataali aligwideedenghanya u mhayo gwenuyo, huna u Moyo ung'wila giki, "Baliho banhu badatu balikukooba.
44010020	Buukaga wike uje hoi ukababone, utizususanya nguno nabatumile nene."
44010021	Wika nghana u Petelo uja aho baali a banhu benabo; ushikila kubabuja giki, "Angu mmho mulinikooba nene, muli na mhayo ki?"
44010022	Nabo bung'wila, "Kolinelio wawililwe na malaika ng'wela, giki akwitane uje ku ng'wakwe ukansomboolele mihayo milebe iyo uli nayo. U wei nshilikale, munhu ntungilija na wa logohano kuli Mulungu; ni lihanga lya Bayudaya likankaanilaga giko."
44010023	Huna ubeegeleja bingila mu kaya, ulenda nabo. A ha ntondo yaho ubuuka uja nabo, hamo na badugu bangi ba kufuma Yopa.
44010024	Buukashika i Kaisalia ku ntondo yaho hangi. U Kolinelio oli abalindiilile, niyo oli olaalika na badugu bakwe, hamo na banwani biye.
44010025	U Petelo aho alingila, u Kolinelio ung'wanukula, kunu alingwila mu magulu giki anamye.
44010026	Aliyo u Petelo ungungumula ung'wila, "Buukaga; nu nene nali munhu duhu giti bebe."
44010027	Aho wamala u kuyomba nanghwe, wingila u mu kaya usanga balimo moi bingi bibilingaga.
44010028	Ubawila, "A bing'we mumanile giki itazuniligije u munhu u Nyudaya kwisangija na banhu ba mahanga gangi, nuulu kubageniha; aliyo u nene wanilemegije u Mulungu natizung'witana munhu nuulu umo giki wa sagala nuulu nsoso.
44010029	H'i nguno yene aho nawilwa natahalalilile, niza duhu; nose luulu i haha nalibuja, himba ng'wanitanilaga mhayo ki?"
44010030	U Kolinelio uhaya giki, "Jabitaga shiku ine, naali mu ng'wane ng'wenumu nalombaga makanza giti genaya ga sa kenda, kuhayimanila munhu wimiila ku butongi bone, azwalile myenda yape.
44010031	Uhaya, 'Kolinelio, u kulomba kwako kwigwiwe, na a manongho gako gizukililwe u kuli Mulungu.
44010032	Ali luulu, tumaga banhu baje Yopa, bakang'witane Simoni, lina lingi Petelo; aliho alendile ha kaya ya ng'wa Simoni nkomi wa makunza, ili haho na nyanza.'
44010033	Na nghana haho na haho nutuma banhu kwiza u kuli bebe, wabeeja no u kwiza. Niyo luulu, a bise tuliho aha, pye a bose tuli ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu, twalindaga kwigwa duhu iyo ulagililwe kufuma kuli Seeba."
44010034	Huna u Petelo wandya u kubasomboolela alihaya giki, "Gashinaga nghana u Mulungu ati na busolanhya,
44010035	aliyo pyi u mu mahanga akanukulaga buli munhu ulu ubiza ntungilija.
44010036	U gwenuyu hu mhayo uyo akabatumila Baisilaeli, ubenhela bulomeeji bo mhayo gwa mhola mu nzila ya ng'wa Yesu Kilisto, uyo ali Seeba wa bose.
44010037	A bing'we mugumanile u mhayo uyo gukilonga mu Buyudaya, gusambaala hose pye u mu si yeniyo kwandija Galilaya, aho bobita u bubatiija ubo Yohana wabulomeelaga.
44010038	U Mulungu wali ang'witiilile Moyo Ng'wela na budula u Yesu wa Nazaleti, uyo wajaga hose-hose akubeejaga yawiza na kubapija pye abo bali mu buhedekwa bo ng'wa Shetani, iki u Mulungu wali hamo nanghwe.
44010039	A bise tuli bakaaniji bayo pyi iyo wabeejaga u mu si ya Bayudaya ni Yelusalemu; u munhu ng'wenuyo bakamulaga bo kunungeleja ha linti.
44010040	Aliyo u Mulungu unjuucha ha lushiku lwa kadatu lwaho, ung'oolecha hape;
44010041	kwike iti ku banhu bose, aliyo ku bakaaniji duhu, abo Mulungu abasolile. H'a bise abo twalyaga na kung'wa hamo nanghwe u mu shiku ja giki wajuukile kufuma mu bafu.
44010042	A bise hu bene abo akatulagila kuja tulibalomeela a banhu, na kufunya bukaaniji giki u ng'wenuyu huna ng'wene uyo ahelilwe na Mulungu kubiza Namuji wa bapanga na a bafu.
44010043	Hu ng'wene uyo bankaanilile pye a bahangi, hama hu ng'wene uyo bulekejiwa bo shibi shose budugije kwanukulwa mu nzila ya lina lyakwe."
44010044	U Petelo aho ataali wisomboola i yeniyo, u Moyo Ng'wela ubikiila pye abo bakagwigwa u mhayo.
44010045	A Bayudaya Shiyunani: Basaalilwe. U mu shandikwa buli hene aho balihayiwa basaalilwe, nuulu ba nhungwa ja kusaalwa, numho balihayiwa Bayudaya.' abo baali biza nu Petelo bukumya, nguno na a banhu ba mahanga bakitiilwa u Moyo Ng'wela uyo ali shakwinhwa.
44010046	Bubigwa baliyomba mu ndimi jingi, hamo na kunkumilija Mulungu. Huna u Petelo uhaya giki,
44010047	"Nani uyo adugije kulemeja minzi batizubatiijiwa a banhu aba, aliyo nabo bang'wanukula u Moyo Ng'wela git'umo bise tukang'wanukulila?"
44010048	Ulagila babatiijiwe mu lina lya ng'wa Yesu Kilisto. Huna bunomba ikale hamo nabo ikanza lya shiku bulebe.
44011001	A batung'wa na a badugu ba mu si ya Buyudaya i yose, bakigwa nabo i giki na a banhu ba mahanga bagwanukulile u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu.
44011002	Kwike u Petelo aho waja i Yelusalemu, buukashikila kunyogeela abo basendamilile mhayo gwa kusaalwa.
44011003	Buhaya giki, "U bebe wajile ku banhu batasaalilwe, niyo uukalya na kulya hamo nabo!"
44011004	Nanghwe u Petelo wandya kubasomboolela chiza mu kwihela, uhaya giki,
44011005	"U nene naali mu nzengo gwa Yopa naalombaga, nahayimanila nahweelwa, nubona koolechiwa kwa shikolo sha kubiza giti nguto gwa ng'wenda ntaale gulichiwa ha si kufuma ng'wigulu, gudimililwe ku mhembeelo jago ine, gulenhwa aho nali.
44011006	Nahayulola u mu gati, nubona mo shiinu ja mu mapoolu: ja magulu ane na ja kwigwesa ha si, na noni ja kulala.
44011007	Niigwa n'ilaka lilihaya giki, 'Buukaga Petelo usinze, ulye.'
44011008	Nane nuhaya, 'Yaya Seeba, nguno u mu nomo gwane shitaali kwingila shikolo shose-shose sha sagala nuulu shisoso!'
44011009	I lilaka lyushosha lo kabili kufuma ng'wigulu lilihaya, 'Isho wamalaga kusheeja Mulungu utashitanage u bebe giki shisoso.'
44011010	U mhayo gwenuyo gukashokeelwa nghangala idatu, huna pyi i shose shushoshiwa ng'wigulu hangi.
44011011	Kuhayimanila banhu badatu bimiila a hanze ya numba iyo naali nashikilile; baali baatung'wa kufuma ku ng'wa Kolinelio, kwiza kuli nene.
44011012	Huna u Moyo uniwila kuja nabo, natizususanya nuulu hado. A badugu a batandatu aba nabo bakiza hamo nane, tuukingila u mu numba yakwe u munhu ng'wenuyo.
44011013	Utuwila umo akamonela u malaika wimiilaga mu kaya yakwe; ung'wila giki, 'Tumaga banhu kuja Yopa bakang'witane Simoni uyo akitanagwa Petelo.
44011014	Akwiza akuwile mihayo iyo ikukwinha bupiji u bebe na a ba mu ng'wako.'
44011015	Huna u nene aho nandya u kuyomba, u Moyo Ng'wela ubikiila nabo git'umo akatwikiila duhu a bise a ha kwandya na kwandya.
44011016	A henaho nuyizukwa i mihayo ya ng'wa Seeba umo akahayila giki, 'U Yohana wabatiijaga na minzi, aliyo a bing'we mukubatiijiwa na Moyo Ng'wela.'
