44011017	I gisi luulu iki u Mulungu akabinha i shakwinha isho akatwinha na a bise abo tunzunije u Seeba Yesu Kilisto, u nene nali nani nose nanghangije u Mulungu?"
44011018	Aho biyigwa i yeniyo bufulika sele; banoga bandya kunkumilija Mulungu balihaya giki, "Hu kuhaya u Mulungu wabinhaga kugaluka nabo a banhu ba mahanga, bingile mu bupanga."
44011019	Huna luulu, abo bakasambaala nguno ya buluhiwa ubo bukilonga kulwa ng'wa Stefano, bakaja buukashika Foenike na Kupulo na Antiokia; kwike batagulomeelile u mhayo ulu iti ku Bayudaya duhu.
44011020	Aliyo baaliho bamo babo, baali bana Kupulo na Kilene; a benabo aho bashika i Antiokia, bujisomboola i nghulu ja ng'wa Seeba Yesu na ku Bayudaya ba Shiyunani.
44011021	U nkono go ng'wa Seeba gwali hamo nabo, banhu bingi buzunya, bungalukila Seeba.
44011022	U mhayo gwenuyo gwahayushika u mu matu ga banhu ba Yelusalemu, buntuma Balinaba kuja i Antiokia.
44011023	Aho washika ko uyega no u kushibona i shigongo sha ng'wa Seeba. Huna ubakomeleja pye a bose giki badimane na Seeba mu moyo gumo.
44011024	Niyo iki u wei wali munhu wawiza, na okalile Moyo Ng'wela na kuzunya, banhu bingi biza u kuli Seeba; lyukula i libita.
44011025	Akiita uja Taso kujunkooba Saulo.
44011026	Aho wampandika wiza nanghwe i Antiokia; bumala ng'waka ngima u mu kanisa bakulangaga ibita itaale lya banhu. Niyo i Antiokia h'uko a bahemba bakandija kwitanwa giki Bakilisto.
44011027	U mu shiku jenijo biza bahangi i Antiokia kufuma Yelusalemu.
44011028	Umo wabo, witanagwa Gabata, huna wimiila uhanga mu nguzu ja ng'wa Moyo giki nzala nhaale ili hihi kwilonga hose pyi u mu si; (na nghana ikilonga mu shiku ja ng'wa Kilaudio).
44011029	Huna pye a bahemba bizunilija, giki buli ng'wene uyo wali na budula asooge sha kubagunaana a badugu ba mu si ya Buyudaya.
44011030	Na nghana bushikilija, bubatwalila banamhala ba kwene mu makono ga ng'wa Balinaba na Saulo.
44012001	U ng'wikanza lyenilo, u ntemi Helode ubalogeja nkono gokwe a banhu ba mu kanisa; ubiitila yabubi bamo babo.
44012002	Umulaga na lilushu u Yakobo, u ng'wanong'wawe wa ng'wa Yohana.
44012003	Aho wabona giki a Bayudaya bayega, ongeja ho; undima nu Petelo, (lyali ikanza lya shigukulu sha migati iti na shibimbya.)
44012004	Huna luulu aho wandima umponya mu jeela, untuula ha silili ya ndiima ine ja balanghani, buli ludiima balanghani bane. Wali n'iganiko lya kunfunya ulu yubita i pasaka.
44012005	Hu kuhaya u Petelo ubiza watuulwa mu jeela giki alanghanwe; aliyo i kanisa yanombelaga mu welwa-ngholo u kuli Mulungu.
44012006	U bujiku bo giki u Helode akunfunya ha ntondo yaho, u Petelo wali alaalile ha gati-gati ya bashilikale babili, hama atungilwe na minyololo ibili, na balanghani babili balanghanaga a ha nyango gwa jeela.
44012007	Kuhayimanila wiza malaika o ng'wa Seeba; heela pe u mu jeela, ushika unkuumya ha lubazu u Petelo. Umisha aling'wila giki, "Buukaga wangu." Yulagala i minyololo iyo wali atungilwe u mu makono gakwe.
44012008	U malaika ung'wila, "Itungage, uzwale ni shilatu shako." Wita chene nghana. Hama ung'wila, "Yigumiilage i kache-mbeho yako unilondeele."
44012009	Huna bufuma hanze alinondeela, aliyo wali atamanaga giki iyo yitagwa nu malaika yeniyo yali ya nghana; u ng'wene wiganikaga alibona sha koolechiwa duhu.
44012010	Bubabita a balanghani a ba kwandya, na a ba kabili. Gwaliho mita gwa chuma gwa kubita ujile mu nzengo; aho bashika ho gubalugukila goyi duhu, bubita bajile buukashika kwibbalabbala limo; kwitulwa u malaika waneka.
44012011	Huna u Petelo witegeleja; uhaya, "I haha luulu namana giki, gashinaga i gete u Seeba wantumaga malaika wakwe, kwiza kunitungula kwinga u mu makono ga ng'wa Helode, kuninja u mu kwisagilwa kose kwa Bayudaya."
44012012	Aho witegeleja giko, uja ku numba ya ng'wa Malia, nina wa ng'wa Yohana uyo witanagwa Maliko; hu uko baali bibilinga bingi bakulombaga.
44012013	Ushika utula hoodi a ha nyango gwa ku butongi, wiza ng'waniki ntumami lina lyakwe Loda, giki adegeleke.
44012014	Ulimana i lilaka lya ng'wa Petelo, uyega no; kwike atalugulile, ushoka alibawila giki; "U Petelo ali hanze wimiilaga."
44012015	Nabo bung'wila, "Bebe hamo osala shi!" Aliyo u wei ongeja u kuhaya giki hu ng'wene; nose buhaya, "Numho malaika okwe duhu u ng'wenuyo!"
44012016	Nanghwe u Petelo ongeja u kutula i hoodi a ha nyango. Aho balugula bumona, bakakumya no!
44012017	Ubahungija nkono bahuumule, huna wandya u kubasomboolela umo Seeba akanfunija u mu jeela. Hanuma ubawila balang'winhe nu Yakobo i mhola jenijo, pye na a badugu a bangi. U wei ufuma, winga; uja ipandi lingi.
44012018	Aho wela a bashilikale bakazwangana no, nguno baali batamanile iyo yali yang'wilongela u Petelo.
44012019	U Helode aho wankooba, ubagisilija na a bashilikale ungayiwa, ulagila babulagwe! U wei winga i Buyudaya uja Kaisalia; uukalenda kwenuko ikanza lya shiku ndebe.
44012020	Kwimanila makanza malebe u Helode wabapelanila banhu ba Tulo na Sidoni; huna luulu a boi bizunilija kwiza u kuli we. Waliho ntumami ntaale wa ha ng'wa ntemi, witanagwa Bulasto, bushika bung'wikumbilija, giki u mhayo gwenuyo guhoyelwe ituulwe ho mhola; nguno i si jabo japandikaga i shiliwa kufuma mu si yakwe u ntemi.
44012021	Huna lusolwa lushiku, u ntemi uzwalila myenda y'ikujo, ya nyatemi. Wigasha h'isumbi lya butemi, aho pye a bose badugije kumona, huna wandya kubaloma!
44012022	A banhu buyunkumilija n'ilaka balihaya giki, "I lyenilo ilaka lya ng'wa mulungu, liti lya ng'wa munhu yaya!"
44012023	I likanza lyenilo malaika wa ng'wa Seeba untula, nguno atang'winhile ikujo u Mulungu; ulyiwa ngino ucha!
44012024	Aliyo u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba gongeja kubiza na nguzu na kusambaala pye a hose.
44012025	U Balinaba nu Saulo aho bamala u nimo uyo gwali gwabatwala i Yelusalemu, bushoka; biza nanghwe u Yohana uyo witanagwa Maliko.
44013001	U mu kanisa ya Antiokia baaliho bahangi na balangi: ba Balinaba, Simioni uyo witanagwa ng'wilabuzu, Lukio muna Kilene, Manaeni ng'wanong'wawe na Helode mu kulelwa, na Saulo.
44013002	Makanza malebe baali bafungile, lwise lumo aho balinamya Seeba, u Moyo Ng'wela ubawila giki, "Nikomanijagi u Balinaba nu Saulo kulwa nimo uyo naabitanila."
44013003	Aho bamala u kufunga, bulomba, bubatuulila makono, huna bubatuma.
44013004	Aho baatung'wa nu Moyo Ng'wela, bakaja buukashika Seleukia; u kwinga a henaho, bubuga nyanza bajile Kupulo.
44013005	Bahayushika Salami bandya kugulomeela u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu, u mu masinagogi ga Bayudaya; baali nanghwe nu Yohana, wajaga akubagunaanaga.
44013006	Bubita pye a hose u ng'wijinga buukashika Pafo, bumona Nyudaya nebe, wali nogi na nghangi nomolomo; lina lyakwe Bali-yesu.
44013007	Wali hamo na Seligio Paulo, munhu o masala; nuwe oli nsugi. U munhu ng'wenuyo akabitana a ba Balinaba nu Saulo, nguno wali atogilwe kugwigwa u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu.
44013008	Kwike u nogi u Elima (h'a makulu ga lina lyakwe) akabalemeja, nguno wali atogilwe kunghangija u nsugi atizuzunya.
44013009	Aliyo u Saulo, uyo witanagwa na lina lya Paulo, unkalalila u munhu ng'wenuyo, kunu okalaga nguzu ja ng'wa Moyo Ng'wela.
44013010	Huna ung'wila giki, "Bebe ng'wana wa ng'wa Shetani na ng'wanishi wa butungilija bose, uyo okalile buliganya na bubi wa buli mbika, utudula u kuleka u kujichaamya i nzila ja ng'wa Seeba i ngololoku?
44013011	Managa giki i haha u nkono go ng'wa Seeba guli higulya yako, ukubbokula ooye u kulibona i liimi ikanza ho." Haho na haho ugwilwa wiija na giiti, wandya kuja alibbabbasha na nkono, akukoobaga batongeeji.
44013012	U nsugi aho wagubona u mhayo gwenuyo ubiza nzunya, u bulangi bo ng'wa Seeba ubukumya no.
44013013	Huna u Paulo na a biye binga i Pafo, bulinhya itanga bubuuka bajile buukashika Peliga ya Pamfulia. U Yohana ubaleka ushoka Yelusalemu.
44013014	Aliyo a boi bubita mo u mu Peliga buja buukashika Antiokia ya Pisidia; u lushiku lo sabato bingila ng'wisinagogi bigasha.
44013015	Aho shamala kusong'wa shilagilo na shitabo sha bahangi, a bataale b'isinagogi bubatumila nhung'wa bubawila, "Bababa ulu muli na mhayo gwa kuganikila banhu, somboolagi!"
44013016	Ubuuka u Paulo ubahungija nkono; huna uhaya giki, "Bababa Baisilaeli na a bing'we abo mung'ogohile Mulungu; degelekagi.
44013017	U Mulungu wa banhu benaba, a Baisilaeli, akabasola a bakulugenji bise. Buukikala mu si ya Misili giti bageni; aho bali kwenuko a banhu benabo ubagunguhya, huna ubafunya u mu si yeniyo alibatongeela na nkono gwa budula butaale.
44013018	Bumala ikanza lya myaka ya kushika makumi ane bali ku matogolo, nanghwe ali hamo nabo mu kwiyumilija.
44013019	Aho wamala kuginja mahanga mpungati u mu si ya Kanaani, ubinha bene i si yeniyo kubiza wingiji wabo.
44013020	Bahayikala mo ikanza giti lya myaka magana ane na makumi atano, ubinha balamuji, kushisha ikanza lya nghangi Sang'weli.
44013021	Huna u ng'wikanza lyenilo bulomba ntemi; u Mulungu ubinha Saulo ng'witunja o ng'wa Kishi, munhu wa luganda lo ng'wa Benjamini, ubasuga ikanza lya myaka makumi ane.
44013022	Aho wang'winja u ng'wenuyo ubabuukija Daudi kubiza ntemi wabo; uyo akankaanila alihaya giki, 'Naapandikile munhu uyo ali ha ngholo yane, Daudi ng'witunja wa ng'wa Yese, h'uyo akushikilija pyi iyo nitogilwe.'
44013023	Nghana lyushika nose i likanza, u Mulungu ugushikilija u mhayo uyo wali wang'wisagija u Daudi. U kufuma u mu luganda lokwe ubenhela a Baisilaeli Mpija, ng'wene Yesu.
44013024	Aho ataali u kushika u ng'wenuyo, Yohana wandya kubalomeela pye a Baisilaeli mihayo ya bubatiijiwa na kugaluka.
44013025	U Yohana aho wegeela kumala u nimo gokwe ubawila giki, 'A bing'we muliganika u nene hu nali ng'wene? Nati ng'wene u nene, aliyo managi giki a ha numa yane aliza u wei. U nene natigeleelilwe nuulu kutaligula shilatu ku mhambala jakwe u wei.'
44013026	"Bababa, badugu bane, ba luganda lo ng'wa Abulahamu, na a bing'we abo mung'ogohile Mulungu, u mhayo gwa bupiji wenubu gwatumilwe kulwa nguno yise.
44013027	Nguno a banhu ba Yelusalemu na a batongeeji babo baali batang'witegelegije u munhu ng'wenuyu, aliyo aho banamula, bubiza bishikilija iyo ihayiwe na bahangi abo bakasomagwa buli sabato.
44013028	Nguno nuulu iki batapandikile mhayo gose-gose gwa kung'wenheleja kucha u Yesu, aliyo nahene bakangaagaanila u Pilato giki anamule nsango gwa kubulagwa.
44013029	Aho bamala-maja pyi iyo yandikilwe kulwakwe, bung'wicha a ha linti, bunaaja mu shigila.
44013030	Kwike u Mulungu akanjuucha kufuma u mu bafu.
44013031	Wiyoolecha ikanza lya shiku ningi u ku banhu abo wali wiza nabo Yelusalemu kufuma Galilaya; abo bakunkaanilaga ku banhu i haha.
44013032	A bise nise tulimulomeela giki, u kwisagijiwa uyo bakinhwa bakulugenji bise kwashikilijiwe.
44013033	Nguno u Mulungu watushikiligigije a bise baana, unjuucha u Yesu, git'umo gwandikilwe mu Zabuli ya kabili; giki, 'U bebe uli Ng'wana wane, i lelo yeniyi naakubyalaga.'
44013034	Nguno wanjuukije kufuma mu bafu atiko kushoka hangi mu bukenaaguku, git'umo guhayiwe giki, 'Nakukwinha bebe i shikolo sha ng'wa Daudi, isho shili sheela na sha nghana.'
44013035	H'i nguno yene alihaya n'ipandi lingi giki, 'Utunekanija u Ng'wela wako ashike mu bukenaaguku.'
44013036	Nguno ili hape giki u Daudi aho wamala u nimo u mu shibyalilwe shakwe, akacha git'umo kali kahelele ka ng'wa Mulungu, ujikwa, ulaala hamo na bakulugenji bakwe, ubola.
44013037	Aliyo uyo wajuuchiwe na Mulungu, u ng'wene atakubonile u kubola.
44013038	Ali luulu bababa badugu bise, managi giki u muli munhu ng'wenuyu u Yesu, mulilomeelwa mihayo ya bulekejiwa bo shibi.
44013039	Niyo buli ng'wene uyo unzunya u munhu ng'wenuyu, akubalilwa butungilija nu mu yingi iyo mutadugije kubalilwa butungilija mu nzila ya kudima shilagilo sha ng'wa Musa.
44013040	Nose hu kuhaya ilanghanagi gutizung'wiziila uyo guhayiwe na bahangi giki,
44013041	'Bing'we badalahi lolagi, na mukumye kushisha muche, nguno u mu shiku jing'we nalibeeja nimo, nimo uyo mutuguzunya nuulu munhu umuwila.' "
44013042	Huna aho bafuma u ng'wisinagogi, a banhu bubalomba babasomboolele hangi i mihayo yeniyo na ha sabato yingi.
44013043	Lyahayushila i libilinga, Bayudaya bingi na bahembekwa abo baali bakomeezu mu kulamya, bubalondeela a ba Paulo nu Balinaba. Bakabahugula na kubakomeleja giki bikale mo u mu shigongo sha ng'wa Mulungu.
44013044	A ha sabato i yingi, hihi pyi u nzengo gwikuminga kwiza kudegeleka mhayo go ng'wa Seeba.
44013045	A Bayudaya aho bagabona a mabita bakokala wilu, bandya kung'wihalalija u Paulo, na kwisondagula iyo wihayaga.
44013046	Aliyo a ba Paulo nu Balinaba buyomba na bugimu butaale giki, "U mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu gwali gwigelile gwenhwe ku bing'we tame; kwike i haha iki muliguponya, twabagalukila banhu ba mahanga. Bing'we benekili mulibala giki mutigeleelilwe kuwanukula u bupanga bo welelo na welelo.
44013047	Hu gwene u mhayo uyo atulagilile u Seeba; nguno alihaya giki, 'Nakutuulile kubiza isana ku mahanga, ubize wa kutwala bupiji hose-hose, kushisha ku ngelelo ya si.' "
44013048	A banhu ba mahanga aho bigwa giko bakayega bugukuja u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba. Pye a bose abo baali babalililwe bupanga bo welelo bakazunya.
44013049	U mhayo go ng'wa Seeba gusambaala pye a hose u mu si yeniyo.
44013050	Aliyo a Bayudaya bakabahumbuula bakima balebe, baali bakujiwa na bakomeezu mu kulamya, hamo na bagosha abo baali batongeeji ba mu nzengo; bubabuukija buluhiwa a ba Paulo nu Balinaba, hanuma bubapeeja u mu si yabo.
44013051	Nabo binga nghana, niyo bulukung'unha nu lubuubu ulo lwali ku mhambala jabo; buja buukashika Ikonio.
44013052	Aliyo a bahemba bakokala buyegi na Moyo Ng'wela.
44014001	Aho bali Ikonio, bakingila bubili wabo ng'wisinagogi lya Bayudaya bulomeela, kushisha ibita itaale lya Bayudaya na Bayunani buzunya.
44014002	Kwike a Bayudaya abo baali batazunije bubabipya maganiko a banhu ba mahanga, bubasoba giki babakolwe a badugu.
44014003	Aliyo nahene a ba Paulo nu Balinaba bakashinga mo ikanza ilihu kulwa ng'wa Seeba, bakulomeelaga mu kwisandaala, u Seeba nanghwe akugukaanilaga u mhayo gwa shigongo shakwe; akubinhaga budula bo kwita shimanikijo na mihayo ya kukumya mu nzila ya makono gabo.
44014004	A banhu ba mu nzengo gwenuyo bugabanika, bangi budimana na Bayudaya, aliyo bamo budimana nabo a batung'wa.
44014005	Aho gwandya nsambo, a banhu ba mahanga na a Bayudaya na a batongeeji babo, buyukooba nzila ya kubiitila yabubi a batung'wa, na kubaponda mawe.
44014006	Aliyo bugudeeba u mhayo gwenuyo; bunyenyeka, bupeelela Lukaonia, ku mizengo ya Lustila na Delibe, na mapandi gangi ayo gaali hihi-hihi;
44014007	buja bakulomeelaga Nghulu Jawiza kwenuko.
44014008	U mu Lustila waliho munhu wikalaga igashije, nguno wali nemehazu u mu mhambala jakwe kufuma mu nda ya ng'wa nina, na luulu wali ataali kushimiza nuulu hado kufuma kubyalwa kwakwe.
44014009	U munhu ng'wenuyo wali wandegeleka u Paulo aho akulomeelaga; u Paulo aho wanola chiza, umona ali na kusanya giki adugije kupijiwa.
44014010	Huna ung'wila n'ilaka itaale giki, "Buukaga wimiile na magulu gako!" Wikindika, wandya na kushimiza.
44014011	A banhu aho bagubona uyo akagwita u Paulo, bandya kwihamukila mu lulimi lwabo lwa Shilukaonia; balihaya giki, "Bamulungu batugenihile mu suso ja banhu!"
44014012	U Balinaba bung'witana Zeu, lelo u Paulo bung'witana Helime, nguno h'uyo wali ntongeeji u mu kuyomba.
44014013	U ngabiji wa ng'wa Zeu wikalaga hihi u mu nzengo ng'wenumo, wiza na nzagamba ya ng'ombe, n'ibbipi lya mabonji gahelilwe chiza gutunganyiwa hamo; i shenisho ushenha ha mita gwa nzengo, giki u wei na a banhu bafunye shitambo.
44014014	Aliyo a batung'wa, a ba Balinaba nu Paulo aho bagudeeba u mhayo gwenuyo, butandula shizwalo shabo; bupeela bajile u kwibita lya banhu, kunu balihamuka n'ilaka itaale
44014015	balihaya giki, "Bing'we bababa, nibuli muliita giko? A bise nise tuli banhu duhu giti bing'we. Tulimulomeela giki mulekane nayo i mihayo ya dalali giti yeniyi, mungalukile Mulungu mpanga, u Meeja w'igulu na si na manyanza, ni shose isho shilimo!
44014016	Shibyalilwe na shibyalilwe isho shamala kubita wali wagaleka a mahanga ga banhu bashimizile mu nzila jabo ja benekili git'umo batogelilwe.
44014017	Kwike nahene atalekile u kwikaanila wei ng'wenekili, uyutwitila yawiza mu kutwinha mbula kufuma ng'wilunde, na makanza ga kupandika matwajo; giki atwinhe shiliwa, jiyege i ngholo jise!"
44014018	Nuulu iki bakahaya mihayo ili giko, nahene bakakoya no; ahene nose bakabahangija ku kale a banhu u kubafunija i shitambo.
44014019	Aliyo bahayiza Bayudaya ba kufuma Antiokia na Ikonio, bubahumbuula a banhu, bumponda mawe u Paulo; huna bundutanja bantwalile hanze ya nzengo baliganika wachaaga!
44014020	Aliyo a bahemba aho bibilinga bumpindya ha gati, ubuuka wingila hangi u mu nzengo. Ha ntondo yaho winga mo nu Balinaba, buja Delibe.
44014021	Aho balomeela u mu nzengo gwenuyo, bupandika bahemba bingi, huna bubuuka bashokile Lustila na Ikonio na Antiokia.
44014022	Baja bakubatimbyaga ngholo a bahemba, bakubakomelejaga bikale bahandatilile u mu kuzunya; na kubawila giki, "Shiigelile twingile u mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu mu nzila ya buluhi butaale."
44014023	Buli mu kanisa yene babizaga ulu bamala kubasolela banamhala na kulomba mu kufunga, babatuulaga mu bulanghani bo ng'wa Seeba uyo banzunije.
44014024	Bahayumala kubita u mu Pisidia, buja buukashika Pamfulia.
44014025	Huna aho bamala kugulomeela u mhayo mu Peliga buja Atalia.
44014026	Kufuma kwenuko bushikiila Antiokia, uko baali balombelwa na kutuulwa mu bulanghani bo ng'wa Mulungu, kulwa nimo uyo bakagumala gwenuyo.
44014027	Aho bashika bibilinga i kanisa, bisomboolela iyo Mulungu wajaga akubeejaga hamo nabo, ni giki a banhu ba mahanga nabo baalugulililwe u nyango gwa kuzunya.
44014028	Bakikala kwenuko ikanza ilihu bali hamo nabo a bahemba.
44015001	Aliyo kuhayimanila banhu balebe batulumenha bizile kufuma Buyudaya, aho bashika i Antiokia buyubalanga a badugu giki, "Ulu mutasaalilwe git'umo shili shimile isho tulangilwe na Musa, mutudula u kupijiwa!"
44015002	Yubuuka yombo na wihalalija butaale, kwike a ba Paulo nu Balinaba bimiila higiyi kwishokeja nabo a banhu benabo; nose yubonwa giki hambu-hambu u Paulo nu Balinaba batung'we hamo na bangi, balinhe kuja i Yelusalemu u ku batung'wa na a banamhala, kulwa nguno ya halali yeniyo.
44015003	Aho balagwa ni kanisa, bubitila Foenike na Samalia, buja bakwisomboolaga mu welwa-ngholo pyi i mihayo ya kugaluka kwa banhu ba mahanga; pye a badugu bakayega no.
44015004	Aho bashika i Yelusalemu, begelejiwa ni kanisa hamo na a batung'wa, na a banamhala; bubasomboolela iyo Mulungu wabeejaga hamo nabo.
44015005	Huna bimiila Bafalisayo, abo baali bakwanukula u kuzunya; bandya kuhaya giki, "A banhu ba mahanga shiigelile bayusaalwa na kukomelejiwa kushidima i shilagilo sha ng'wa Musa!"
44015006	A batung'wa na a banamhala bibilinga kugulola u mhayo gwenuyo.
44015007	Lyubita ikanza baliguhoyela, huna wimiila u Petelo ubawila giki, "Bababa badugu bane, a bing'we benekili mumanile umo Mulungu akasolela makanza malebe; yabizaga ka kale ho, giki a banhu ba mahanga bagwigwe u mhayo gwa Nghulu Jawiza kufuma kuli nene, bazunye.
44015008	Huna u Mulungu uyo ayimanile i myoyo, ubakaanila mu kubinha Moyo Ng'wela git'umo akatwinhila a bise.
44015009	Aho bazunya atasolanije a ha gati yise na a boi u mu kujeeja i ngholo jabo.
44015010	Hama nibuli luulu i haha mulingema u Mulungu, mu nzila ya kubatuulila ijoki idito mu nhingo a bahemba, ilo tulilemeelilwe a bise u kulibuucha, pye na a bakulugenji bise baali balilemeelilwe?
44015011	Nguno a bise tuzunije giki, tuli bapijiwa kulwa shigongo sha ng'wa Seeba Yesu, git'umo ili nu ku bene."
44015012	Huna pyi i libanza lyuhuumulija sele kubadegeleka a ba Balinaba nu Paulo; nguno bakandya kusomboola umo Mulungu wabeejaga shimanikijo na mihayo ya kukumya u ku banhu ba mahanga kubitila mubo.
44015013	Aho bamala, u Yakobo ushosha alihaya giki, "Bing'we bababa, nidegelekagi badugu bane.
44015014	U Simioni watusomboolela git'umo kufuma kale u Mulungu abizukilile a banhu ba mahanga, hama niyo wamala kwisolela banhu kulwa lina lyakwe kufuma u mubo.
44015015	U gwenuyu gwideebelile nu mhayo gwa bahangi umo gwandikililwe; giki,
44015016	'Ha numa ya mihayo yeniyi nakushoka, nizenge bupya i numba ya ng'wa Daudi iyo igwile, nakwizenga hangi, yinge u mu busagambuke wayo, nibeeje bupya yimiile hangi.
44015017	Nguno shiigelile na a banhu a bangi bankoobe u Seeba, pye a banhu ba mahanga abo bakwitanilagwa ku lina lyane; alihaya Seeba uyo akuyitaga i yeniyi,
44015018	iyo imanikile kufuma kale na kale.'
44015019	"Ali luulu, u bulamuji bone buli giki, tutizubazwanja a banhu ba mahanga abo bakungalukilaga Mulungu.
44015020	Aliyo tubandikilagi giki bikomanye nabo u busoso bo kwitongeleja ku mashiikolile, nu bujingi; hama yaya nuulu kulya ndimu ja kunigwa, na a mininga yaya.
44015021	Nguno kufuma shibyalilwe sha kale na kale, u Musa ali na bahemba bakwe hose-hose u mu mizengo; buli sabato akasomagwa u mu masinagogi."
44015022	Gukabayeja a batung'wa na a banamhala, ni kanisa i yose, gwa kubasola banhu kufuma mubo, giki babatume baje i Antiokia hamo nu Paulo nu Balinaba. Usolwa Yuda, uyo witanagwa Balisaba na Sila, bamo ba banhu bataale u ng'wigele lya badugu.
44015023	Bubinha na nyaluba ya kuja nayo; ihayile giki, "Bise badugu bing'we batung'wa, hamo na banamhala: Ku badugu bise a ba mahanga, abo bali Antiokia na Sulia, na Kilikia. Tulimugisha.
44015024	Twigwile giki bamo ba mu bise baashikile kwenuko, bumukoya na mihayo ya kumuzwanja maganiko; tutabatumile bise a benabo!
44015025	Ali luulu, a bise u kuunu tuli n'iganiko limo, twabonile ili yawiza kusola banhu tubatume bize uko muli, hamo na a batogwa bise, a ba Balinaba nu Paulo;
44015026	banhu abo bifunya bupanga wabo kulwa lina lya ng'wa Seeba wise Yesu Kilisto.
44015027	Babo kwenuko luulu ba Yuda na Sila, twabatumaga bize ko hamo nabo; bakumuwila i mihayo yeniyi git'umo ili.
44015028	Nguno yabonekanile u kuli Moyo Ng'wela hamo nu ku bise giki, itiho nguno ya kumuseseja nigo gungi gose-gose, ulu iti mihayo iyi giki:
44015029	Yaya u kulya i shitambo sha mu mawitongeleja, na a mininga, pyi ni ndimu ja kunigwa; yaya nuulu kwisanja mu mihayo ya bujingi. Ulu ng'ulekana nayo i yeniyo, mukutungilija. Ikalagi mu mhola."
44015030	Huna aho balagwa, buja buukashika i Antiokia; aho balikuminga pyi i libita, bubinha i nyaluba.
44015031	Yahayumala u kusong'wa bakayega no, hangi bulungujiwa nu bukomelejiwa wenubo.
44015032	U Yuda nu Sila bubatimbya ngholo na kubaguzuhya a badugu; nguno nabo baali bahangi.
44015033	Aho bikala nabo ikanza lya shiku ningi ho hado, bulagwa bashoke mhola u ku badugu abo baali babatuma. [
44015034	Aliyo u Sila utogwa kwikala nabo u ng'wene.]
44015035	Na a ba Paulo nu Balinaba bulenda i Antiokia, budimana na bangi bingi mu nimo gwa kulanga na kugulomeela u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba.
44015036	Aho jabita shiku ndebe u Paulo ung'wila u Balinaba giki, "Tushokage ko hangi tuje tubageniha a badugu u mu mizengo i yose, uko twagulomeelile u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba; tuje tubalola umo balijila."
44015037	U Balinaba ubona ibeelelile banjane nu Yohana, uyo witanagwa Maliko.
44015038	Aliyo u Paulo ubona ikubeelela ulu kuleka kunsola u munhu ng'wenuyo, nguno aho bali Pamfulia akabaleka, winogolelwa u kuja nabo u ku nimo.
44015039	Yu, niyo bubiza ho wizwanja butaale; kushisha nose bulekana. U Balinaba unsola u Maliko uja nanghwe Kupulo.
44015040	U Paulo u ng'wene unsola Sila; aho bamala kulombelwa shigongo sha ng'wa Seeba na a badugu,
44015041	ubuuka ajile. Ubita mu Sulia na Kilikia, uja akujiguzuhyaga i kanisa.
44016001	Huna utulumenha ajile uukashika Delibe, ulumbulila kuja Lustila; a henaho waliho nghemba umo lina lyakwe Timoteo, ng'witunja wa nkima Nyudaya nzunya, u ise wali Nyunani.
44016002	U nghemba ng'wenuyo wakaanilagwa chiza na a badugu ba Lustila, na a ba Ikonio.
44016003	U Paulo utogwa kuja nanghwe, huna unsola unsaala, kulwa nguno ya Bayudaya abo baali bazengile i mhandi jenijo, iki pye a bose baali bamanile giki u ise wali Nyunani.
44016004	Huna aho balibita hose-hose u mu mizengo, buyubinha i shilagilo isho shali shafuma ku batung'wa na banamhala ba Yelusalemu.
44016005	I kanisa jikaguzuhiwa u mu kuzunya, niyo juyongeja u kukula buli lushiku.
44016006	Aliyo u mu si ja Fulugia na Galatia bakabita mo duhu, nguno u Moyo Ng'wela wali wabalemeja u kugulomeela u mhayo u mu Asia.
44016007	Aho batumbya Musia, bugema kwingila mu Bitunia, kwike nu kwene atabazuniligije u Moyo wa ng'wa Yesu.
44016008	Huna bubita baliyikilimbija i Musia, buukashika Tiloa.
44016009	Makanza ga bujiku u Paulo umona mu koolechiwa, muna Makedonia; imiilile aling'wikumbilija alihaya giki, "Kilaga wize kuunu Makedonia utugunaane!"
44016010	Aho wakubona u koolechiwa kwenuko, haho na haho twandya kukooba kuja Makedonia, nguno akamana giki u Mulungu watwitanaga kuja koi kubalomeela Nghulu Jawiza.
44016011	Aho twinga i Tiloa tulinhya itanga, tugoloola kuja Samotilake; aho wela tushika Neapoli.
44016012	Huna u kufuma a henaho tuja tuukashika Filipi, u kwenuko tukikala ko shiku ningi. I lipandi lyenilo lyali lisugilwe na Balumi, hama u gwenuyo hu gwali nzengo gwabo ntaale.
44016013	A ha ntondo yaho yali sabato, twinga u mu nzengo tufuma hanze ya mita, nguno twali na nghumbu ja kupandika ipandi lya kulamija. Tuja tuukigasha ha nghilimva ya mongo, tulungalunga na bakima bakiza kwibilinga henaho.
44016014	Waliho umo wabo, lina lyakwe Ludia, njinja ntaale wa myenda ya langi ya nzulunge, nshike wa mu nzengo gwa Siatila, hangi munhu wa logohano kuli Mulungu. U nkima ng'wenuyo aho wigwa, u Seeba wilugula i ngholo yakwe, uyanukula iyo yahayiagwa na Paulo.
44016015	Ubatiijiwa u wei, ni kaya yakwe; huna utwikumbilija uhaya, "Ulu mulibona giki nali nsanyiwa u kuli Seeba, nzugi ng'wikale ha ng'wane." Niyo akatudayiila no u mu mhayo gwenuyo!
44016016	Lwise lumo twajaga kwilomba, tumanhya na ng'waniki nsese, wali n'isamva lya buchuuja, lyang'winhaga budula bo kubapandikila solobo nhaale a ba ise-bugonzo kulwa kuchuuja.
44016017	Huna wandya kunkuubilija u Paulo na a bise, kunu alilila uhaya giki, "A banhu benaba batumami ba ng'wa Mulungu uyo ali higulya no, baliho u ng'wenumu kulwa nguno ya kumulomeela nzila ya bupiji."
44016018	Jikakwila i shiku akugwitaga u mhayo gwenuyu, nose gunkoya u Paulo; ugaluka uliwila i lisamva giki, "Nalikulagila mu lina lya ng'wa Yesu Kilisto, nfumage!" Lyunfuma nghana i likanza lyenilo duhu.
44016019	A ba ise-bugonzo aho babona giki bajimiija u kwisagilwa kwabo kwa solobo, bubadima a ba Paulo nu Sila, bubadutanja babatwalile kwigulilu, ku butongi bo basugi.
44016020	Buukabashisha ku balamuji, buhaya giki, "A banhu benaba Bayudaya, aliyo balituyugagulila u nzengo gwise.
44016021	Bakujaga bulomeela mihayo itatwigeleelilwe a bise, iyo tutudula u kwiyanukula nuulu kwiyita, nguno tuli Balumi a bise!"
44016022	Pye a banhu bubazanzamukila. A balamuji bulagila bazuujiwe i shizwalo, batulwe mbooko.
44016023	Aho bamala kubatulagula mbooko ningi, bubaponya mu jeela; bunkomeleja u nanghani wa jeela abalanghane na witegeleja.
44016024	Nanghwe aho wamala kukomelejiwa giko ubaponya mu chumba sha mu gati ya jeela, hama ulola ubatunganija ha manti a magulu gabo.
44016025	Mu makanza ga bujiku ha gati, u Paulo nu Sila balombaga na kungongoola Mulungu mu mimbo; a batungwa bichabo badegelekile.
44016026	Kuhayimanila yadinghima nyahinga nhaale; pyi i jeela yutinginyiwa, nu nsingi gwayo. I milyango yuluguka pye, ni minyololo iyo baali batungilwe a batungwa yutaliguka.
44016027	U nanghani umisha, aho wibona i milyango ya jeela yalugukaga, usopoola lushu giki ibulage, nguno akiganika a batungwa bapeelaga.
44016028	Aliyo u Paulo uhamuka n'ilaka itaale uhaya giki, "Utiziyagaja, tuliho pye a bose!"
44016029	Ulomba yenhwe tala, huna wiza wangu-wangu kunu akudetemaga, ushika ugwa u ku butongi bo ba Paulo nu Sila.
44016030	Ubafunya hanze; huna ubabuja giki, "Bababa, niite mhayo ki napandike kupila?"
44016031	Nabo bung'wila, "Nzunyage Seeba Yesu, ukupijiwa u bebe ng'wenekili ni kaya yako!"
44016032	Bunsomboolela u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba, pye na a ba mu kaya yakwe.
44016033	I likanza lyenilo itaali bujiku giko, ubasola uukabooja a machubagukile ga butulwa, hama ubatiijiwa u wei pye na a ba mu kaya yakwe.
44016034	Ubingija mu kaya yakwe ubabeegeja shiliwa; kaya ngima yokala buyegi nguno bakanzunya Mulungu.
44016035	Aho wela, a balamuji butuma nhung'wa u ku jeela balihaya giki, "Balekelagi a bing'wana benabo."
44016036	U nanghani wa jeela ung'wila u Paulo giki, "A bataale bahaya mulekelwe; jagi mhola luulu!"
44016037	Aliyo u Paulo unshokeja alihaya giki, "Baatutulile mu butongi wa banhu liimi-nyange, hama butuponya mu jeela, nduhu nuulu kutudegeleka ng'wibanza aliyo tuli Balumi, i haha hu balihaya kutupeeja mu kwibisa-bisa duhu? Yaya i giko, ni bizage a boi benekili batufunye!"
44016038	Abo baali batung'wa aho bishisha i mihayo yeniyo u ku balamuji, bakogoha no aho bigwa giki baali Balumi.
44016039	Buja buukabagwila mu magulu; aho babafunya hanze bubiyandiila bafume u mu nzengo.
44016040	Aho bafuma u mu jeela, buja ha ng'wa Ludia; bahayumala kubatimbya ngholo a badugu, bugumha bajile.
44017001	U mu lugendo lwabo bubitila Ampifoli na Apolonia, buukashika Tesalonike, lyaliko isinagogi lya Bayudaya.
44017002	U Paulo ushisha sabato idatu akwingilaga mo wahoya nabo mihayo ya mu shandikwa, git'umo witilaga na kale.
44017003	Wabakundulilaga na kuboolekeja hape, giki yali ing'wigelile u Kilisto aluhiwe na kujuuka kufuma mu bafu. Ubawila giki, "U Yesu uyo nalimusomboolela mhola jakwe ng'wenuyu, huna ng'wene u Kilisto."
44017004	Bamo babo bakaguloleela bizunilija nabo a ba Paulo nu Sila; u mu benabo baalimo na Bayunani bingi, abo baali balamya ba ng'wa Mulungu, hamo n'iganda lya bakima bakujiwa.
44017005	Aliyo a Bayudaya bakabona wilu, busoleleja ibita lya banhu bahunga kufuma ng'wigulilu. Aho balibilinga i libita lyenilo, bandya nsambo u mu nzengo. Biza ha ng'wa Yasoni badaalulaga, balibakooba giki babafunije hanze ku banhu.
44017006	Aho babagayiwa hoi, bundutanja u Yasoni hamo na badugu bangi, bubatwala ku basugi ba nzengo; kunu baliyoganya balihaya giki, "Baashikile nu kuunu a banhu abo bakujaga buyugagula si;
44017007	u Yasoni h'uyo wabanukulile. Aliyo bashidalahile i shilagilo sha ng'wa Kaisali, bakuhayaga giki angu aliho ntemi ungi Yesu!"
44017008	Bubayuugagula a banhu na a batongeeji aho biyigwa i mihayo yeniyo.
44017009	Bumbiisha ihyu u Yasoni na a biye, huna bubalekela buja.
44017010	Haho na haho i bujiku, a badugu bubafunya a ba Paulo nu Sila, bubatwala Beloya; aho bashika ko bingila ng'wisinagogi lya Bayudaya.
44017011	A bene baali balembeezu kutinda a bana Tesalonike, bakagwanukula u mhayo na bukalalwa bose, buyushilola i shandikwa buli lushiku, babone ulu ili giko i mihayo yeniyo.
44017012	Bingi bakazunya, bamo baali bakima bakujiwa ba Shiyunani, na a bagosha nabo baali bati bagehu.
44017013	A Bayudaya ba Tesalonike aho bigwa giki u Paulo akugulomeelaga u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu ni Beloya, buja nu kwene, buukabayugagula na kubazwanja a banhu.
44017014	Aliyo haho na haho a badugu bung'winja u Paulo buja nanghwe ku ng'walo gwa nyanza, buneka u Sila nu Timoteo.
44017015	Abo bakaja nu Paulo bakajushika nanghwe Atene. Aho wamala kubalagija giki bakabawile a ba Sila nu Timoteo banguhe u kwiza u kuli we, a boi bushoka Beloya .
44017016	U Paulo aho ali mu nzengo gwa Atene abalindiilile a biye, akabona mo mbika na mbika ja shiikolile sha kulamiwa; u mhayo gwenuyo gunkoya no u mu moyo gokwe!
44017017	Uyingila ng'wisinagogi lya Bayudaya wahoya nabo, hamo na a bangi abo bizaga mo kulamya. Na kwigulilu wajaga buli lushiku wakahoya na a babo baaliko.
44017018	Baaliho na basomi bataale, bitanagwa Baepikuleo na Bastoiko; bamo babo aho bamanhya nanghwe u Paulo buyuhaya giki, "U nghalahala uyu nanghwe ni aligaagaana kuhaya ki shi?" Bangi buyuhaya giki, "Alibonekana kubiza nomeeji o mihayo ya bamulungu bageni!" Bakahaya giko nguno u Paulo wabalomeelaga nghulu ja ng'wa Yesu na ja bujuuko.
44017019	Nose banoga bundima, buntwala kwinumba lyabo lya kwibilingila litanagwa Aleo-Pago; buukamuja kwenuko giki, "Bebe a malange ayo ulilanga genaya mapya, tudugije kugamana nise?
44017020	Nguno i mihayo iyo ulitwenhela yeniyi, migeni gete u mu matu gise! Na luulu tuli na nghumbu ja kugamana a makulu gayo!"
44017021	Nguno pye a bana Atene na a bageni abo bikalaga mo baali bati na gwa kwita gungi, ulu iti kwiyinha suusu duhu, nuulu kudegeleka mihayo migeni.
44017022	Huna ubuuka u Paulo wimiila u ng'winumba lya Aleo-Pago; uhaya giki, "Bababa bana Atene, nalibona a bing'we mukalalilwe no i mihayo ya dini.
44017023	Nguno u mu kubita-bita kwane, buli kwene ulu nalola nakwibonaga i mihayo ya kalamije king'we. Naabitile na kubona wandike ha ng'walilo nebe buhayile giki, 'Kuli Mulungu uyo atamanikile.' Ali luulu, u nene nalimulanja uyo mukanamyaga mu butumana ng'wenuyo.
44017024	U Mulungu u Meeja wa si ni shose isho shilimo, atikalaga mu maduku ga kubeejiwa na makono, nguno u wei hu Seeba w'igulu na si.
44017025	Niyo atagongile kutumamilwa na makono giti giki ngayiwa, nguno hu ng'wene uyo akabinhaga pye a bose u bupanga ni myuyi, ni shikolo i shingi pyi umo shigelelile.
44017026	Huna ng'wene uyo akagabeeja pye a mahanga ga banhu kufuma muli munhu umo, giki bisambaalile pyi i si, bazenge mo. Ubatuulila na makanza, ni mbimbi: mihayo iyo ihelilwe kufuma kale kulwa wikalo wabo;
44017027	giki bayubbabbasha-bbabbasha, nose bampandike u Mulungu, nuulu iki ati kule na buli umo wise.
44017028	Nguno u muli we h'umo buli u bupanga wise, nu kuyeela-yeela kwise kuli muli we. Pyi nu bumunhu wise h'umo buli, git'umo na bamo ba bimbi bing'we bakahayilaga giki, 'Na a bise tuli shiseeng'wa shakwe.'
44017029	Nose iki tuli shiseeng'wa sha ng'wa Mulungu, tutiziganika giki u Mulungu ashikile kugelanijiwa na shikolo giti zahabu nuulu feza, nuulu mawe ga mpango ntaale ayo gakabeejiagwa na bugaliili bo banhu.
44017030	U mu makanza ga butumana, u Mulungu wali abalekile duhu a banhu, aliyo i haha alibalagila pye a banhu hose-hose giki bagaluke.
44017031	Nguno luliho lushiku alutuulile, lo kubalamula pye a banhu mu butungilija, mu nzila ya ng'wa Munhu uyo ansolile we. U Mulungu akanjuucha u Munhu ng'wenuyo kufuma mu bafu, uboolekeja hape pye a banhu giki akugushikilija u mhayo gwenuyo."
44017032	Aho bigwa mhayo gwa bujuuko wa bafu, bamo bandya kuneeneleja mu budalahi balihaya, "Yu, wigejaga luulu, tukwidegeleka n'ikanza lingi hangi i mihayo yako!"
44017033	Huna ubingila hoi u Paulo.
44017034	Aliyo bamo na bamo bakazunya budimana nanghwe; mu benabo walimo Dionisio, umo wa banhu ba mu Aleo-Pago, na nkima lina lyakwe Damali, na bangi abo baali hamo nabo.
44018001	Aho yabita i yeniyi u Paulo winga i Atene, uja Kolinto.
44018002	Wibona na Nyudaya nebe myalilwa wa Ponto, witanagwa Akula; akasangwa hu washikile makanza genayo duhu kufuma Italia, hamo na nke wakwe Piliskila. Nguno u ntemi Kilaudio akalagila giki pye a Bayudaya binge u mu nzengo gwa Lumi. Huna luulu u Paulo uja ha kaya yabo uukalenda nabo.
44018003	Buyutumama hamo, nguno baali bamanile nimo gwa mbika imo; baali babeeja ba maheema.
44018004	Kwike u wei u Paulo buli sabato wajaga ng'wisinagogi kulanga; upandika Bayudaya na Bayunani ba kwizunilija nanghwe.
44018005	A ba Sila nu Timoteo aho biza kufuma i Makedonia, bunsanga u Paulo gundadilile no u nimo gwa kugulomeela u mhayo, na kubakaanila a Bayudaya giki u Yesu hu ng'wene u Kilisto.
44018006	Aliyo aho balema buyunsondagula, akagunghumula shizwalo shakwe kunu alibawila giki, "A mininga ging'we ni gabizage ha mitwe ying'we, neelaga u nene. Kufuma haha naja ku banhu ba mahanga!"
44018007	Ubingila uja mu numba ya ng'wa Tito Yusto, yali hihi ni lisinagogi. U munhu ng'wenuyo wali namya o ng'wa Mulungu.
44018008	U ntaale w'isinagogi wali Kilispo, nanghwe unzunya Seeba pyi ni kaya yakwe; na Bakolinto bingi abo bakigwa bakanzunya u Seeba bubatiijiwa.
44018009	Lwise lumo makanza ga bujiku u Seeba ung'wila u Paulo mu koolechiwa giki, "Utogohage; u bebe yombaga duhu, yaya u kuhuumula.
44018010	U mu nzengo gwenuyu nali na banhu bingi, atiho nuulu umo wa kukuubukila na kukwitila yabubi, nguno nali hamo nangho."
44018011	Akikala mo ng'waka na myeji itandatu akubalangaga mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu.
44018012	U mu shiku jenijo Galio ubiza nsugi wa Akaya, a Bayudaya aho babona giko buniila gwinda u Paulo, bundima buntwala kwibanza.
44018013	Buukamuula balihaya, "U munhu ng'wenuyu akubalangaga a banhu giki bayunamya u Mulungu mu nzila ja hanze ya shilagilo!"
44018014	Aliyo u Paulo aho wibeeja-beeja giki andye kusomboola, u Galio ubawila a Bayudaya, "Bing'we Bayudaya, ulu ni gwali mhayo gwa bukenaaguji nuulu gwa wibonya wabubi, ni niyumilija u kumudegeleka.
44018015	Aliyo ulu ya wihalalija kulwa nguno ya mihayo na mina ga mu shilagilo shing'we duhu, i yeniyo ilonjagi bing'we benekili. U nene natatogilwe u kubiza namuji wayo i mihayo yeniyo."
44018016	Ubapeeja a h'ibanza.
44018017	Huna pye a bose bundima Sostene, uyo wali ntaale w'isinagogi; bandya kuntulagula haho butongi w'ibanza. Aliyo u mu yose yeniyo, u Galio atafumilwe ngholo nuulu hado.
44018018	U Paulo ongeja u kulenda nabo a badugu. Ha numa ya shiku ningi ubuga nyanza ajile Sulia, na a ba Piliskila nu Akula baali hamo nanghwe. Aho ali mu Kenkilia umooga u ntwe gwakwe, nguno wali mu shilahilo.
44018019	Bahayushika Efeso ulekana nabo, u wei wingila ng'wisinagogi kujuhoya na Bayudaya.
44018020	Aho banomba giki alende ikanza ilihu ho hado ulema.
44018021	Ubalaga alihaya giki, "Ulu Mulungu utogwa, nakwiza ikanza lingi u ku bing'we." Huna ubuga nyanza ajile, winga i Efeso.
44018022	Aho washika Kaisalia ulinha ngulya kuja kwigisha i kanisa, hanuma utulumenha kuja Antiokia.
44018023	Akikala ko ikanza ilebe; wanoga ubuuka hangi ajile akusingijaga mu si ja Galatia na Fulugia, alibagisha na kubaguzuhya pye a bahemba.
44018024	Nyudaya nebe nanghwe uja ko i Efeso; i lina lyakwe wali Apolo, myalilwa wa Isikandelia. Oli ngosha o budula mu kuloma na mu shandikwa.
44018025	U munhu ng'wenuyo wali alangilwe i nzila ya ng'wa Seeba, hama wali nsebu kingi nasho u mu moyo gokwe. Niyo nuulu iki wali amanile bubatiija bo ng'wa Yohana duhu, aliyo nahene wisomboolaga na budeeba i mihayo ya ng'wa Yesu.
44018026	Huna wandya kulomeela mu kwisandaala u ng'wisinagogi; a ba Piliskila nu Akula aho bang'wigwa, bunsola buukananja chiza i nzila ya ng'wa Mulungu.
44018027	Wahayubuuka kuja Akaya, a badugu buntimbya ngholo, bandika na nyaluba kuja u ku bahemba ba kwenuko giki bang'wanukule. Aho washika ko, akabagunaana no a bahemba abo baali bamala kuzunya kulwa shigongo.
44018028	Nguno akayubahehenaja kingi nasho a Bayudaya; uyubagoola hape-hape, akuboolekejaga kufuma mu shandikwa, giki u Yesu hu ng'wene u Kilisto.
44019001	U Apolo aho ali Kolinto, u Paulo wajaga akubitaga ku si ja ku magulya. Huna utulumenha ajile Efeso; usanga koi bahemba balebe.
44019002	Ubabuja, "Aho ng'wazunya mukang'wanukula u Moyo Ng'wela?" Bunshokeja balihaya, "Tutaali nuulu kwigwa giki aliho na Moyo Ng'wela!"
44019003	Ubabuja hangi giki, "Hama ng'wabatiijiwa bubatiijiwa ki luulu?" Nabo bung'wila, "Mu bubatiija bo ng'wa Yohana Matiija."
44019004	Huna u Paulo ubawila giki, "U Yohana wabatiijaga bubatiija kulwa nguno ya kugaluka; wabakomelejaga a banhu kunzunya Yesu, uyo oli giki akwiza ha numa yakwe."
44019005	Aho bigwa giko bubatiijiwa mu lina lya ng'wa Seeba Yesu.
44019006	U Paulo aho wabatuulila makono ubikiila u Moyo Ng'wela, bandya kulungalunga mu ndimi jingi, na kuhanga.
44019007	Baali bagosha giti ikumi na babili.
44019008	Akamala myeji idatu akwingilaga ng'wisinagogi walungalunga nabo mu kwisandaala, kunu akubalomeelaga na kubaduta mu mihayo ya butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu.
44019009	Aliyo bamo babo baali baganghanazu na badalahi, bandya kwisondagula i Nzila yeniyo ku butongi bo banhu. U Paulo ubaleka, ubinja a bahemba; wandya kuyubalanga buli lushiku ng'widalasa lya ng'wa Tulano.
44019010	Umala myaka ibili akugutumamaga u nimo gwenuyo, kushisha pye a bikaji ba Asia, babize Bayudaya nuulu Bayunani, bugwigwa u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba.
44019011	I shitwa isho akayubeeja u Mulungu mu nzila ya makono ga ng'wa Paulo shali sha kukumya no, shikilile kasomboolele!
44019012	Nose na basaatu buyupijiwa kulwa kutwalilwa shizwalo na shitambaala isho shali shakuumiwa ha mili gokwe; na a babo baali na masamva gabafumaga.
44019013	U mu shiku jenijo bakigela na Bayudaya balebe, bayeelaga hose-hose bakugemaga kupeeja masamva mu lina lya ng'wa Seeba Yesu. Balitumamilaga u ku banhu ba masamva balihaya giki, "Nalimupeeja mu lina lya ng'wa Yesu uyo akulomeelagwa na Paulo."
44019014	U mhayo gwenuyu bakagwita na bitunja mpungati ba Nyudaya umo ngabiji ntaale, witanagwa Sikewa.
44019015	Aliyo i lisamva lyubashokeja lilihaya, "U Yesu naamanile, nu Paulo nang'witegelegije, al'a bing'we muli banani?"
44019016	U munhu uyo wali n'isamva ubasakamila, ubaheeba kibi-kibi; ubatandaguja i shizwalo! Kwike bupuluguka, bupuluka u mu numba yeniyo, aliyo bali duuhu, na bajimaga machubagukile!
44019017	U mhayo gwenuyo bugumana pye a bikaji ba mu Efeso; a bose, Bayudaya na a Bayunani, bugwilwa booba. I lina lya ng'wa Seeba Yesu lyukujiwa.
44019018	Bingi abo bakazunya buyufunya bukaaniji bakwisomboolaga iyo biyitaga.
44019019	Bamo baali balogi; bingi babo bushikuminga i shitabo shabo shupemva ku butongi wa banhu bose. Aho gwabalwa u mpango gwa shitabo shenisho, shubonekana shipande shihumbi makumi atano sha feza nuulu dilakima: jali dilakima shihumbi makumi atano. I dilakima imo yali na mpango gwa hela ja kunipa munhu mheela ya lushiku lugima.'.
44019020	U mu giko u mhayo gukongeja kubiza na nguzu, na kusambaala hose pye kulwa budula bo ng'wa Seeba.
44019021	Aho yabita i yeniyi, u Paulo ubona u mu moyo giki abite Makedonia akaje Akaya, huna akalumbulile kuja Yelusalemu; uhaya, "Ulu nalashike u kwenuko shinigelile naje ni Lumi nakabone nu kwene."
44019022	Huna ubatuma babili ba bagunaani bakwe, ba Timoteo na Elasto, butonga i Makedonia; u wei ulenda ho hado u mu Asia.
44019023	Jubita shiku kaganda ataali aliho, kuhayimanila gwigela nsambo kulwa nguno yayo i Nzila yeniyo.
44019024	Waliho nsuji nebe o feza witanagwa Demetilio, wabeejaga shiikolile sha feza sha hekalu ya ng'wa Alitemi. U mu giko batumami bapandikilaga milimo mingi a ha ng'wakwe.
44019025	Huna luulu u munhu ng'wenuyo ubakuminga abo baliilaga u mu nimo gwenuyo; ubawila giki, "Bagosha, angu mulibona giki u niilo gwise guli mu nimo gwenuyu.
44019026	Aliyo i haha hu mulibona, nu kwigwa muliigwa, giki u Paulo ng'wenuyu wahumbuulile banhu bingi. Niyo iti mu Efeso umu duhu, hihi pye a hose u mu Asia; akujaga uhaya giki angu bati bamulungu abo bakabeejiagwa na makono.
44019027	Nose hu kuhaya u niilo gwise gwenuyu guli mu nhabaala ya kwingila mu kudalahwa; hama ni hekalu ya ng'wa mulungu wise u nkima, u Alitemi ni yene ili mu kwihiga kwa kubalwa giki iti na solobo. Ni likujo lyakwe nalyo likwika, aliyo i Asia i yose ikanamyaga; niyo pyi duhu a hose u mu si."
44019028	Aho bigwa giko bupelana no, bandya kuyoganya balihaya giki, "U Alitemi wa Baefeso ng'wene ntaale!"
44019029	Pyi u nzengo guyuuguka, bubahaja biye ba ng'wa Paulo, ba Gayo na Alistako bana Makedonia, bubatwala kwinumba lya kwiloleelela mabina na mawigusha; pye a banhu bulilimuka nhambo bajile ko.
44019030	Aliyo u Paulo aho wihamba u kuja kwigulanya u ng'wibita, bunemeja a bahemba.
44019031	Hama bamo ba batongeeji baali banwani biye, butuma nhung'wa baling'wikumbilija atizukiyoolecha u kwinumba lyenilo.
44019032	Abo baaliho hoi, buli bene bayoganyaga balihaya mihayo yabo duhu. Niyo iki gwali nsambo, a bingi baali batamanaga ni shisho shali shabenheleja kwibilinga.
44019033	U ng'wibita lyenilo baalimo na Bayudaya; huna a bene bunsola Isikanda, bung'wila abahuumuje a banhu. Nghana wandya kubahungija nkono giki abasomboolele.
44019034	Kwike aho badeeba giki wali Nyudaya nanghwe, buhoolanija pye a bose bakuyoganyaga n'ilaka lya higulya, nose lyushika ikanza lya sa giti ibili balihamuka buhaya giki, "U Alitemi wa Baefeso ng'wene ntaale!"
44019035	Nose kalani ntaale wa mu nzengo ubahuumuja, huna wandya kubawila giki, "Bing'we bababa Baefeso, munhu ki uyo atamanile giki u nzengo gwa Baefeso gukalanghanaga hekalu ya ng'wa Alitemi u ntaale, hamo ni shikolo isho shikagwa kufuma ng'wigulu?
44019036	Ali luulu iki i mihayo yeniyi atiho munhu nuulu umo uyo ashikile kwiyihalalija, ili yawiza muhuumule; itiho nguno ya kwita nsambo.
44019037	Nguno ahene nghana a banhu benaba ng'wabenhaga, aliyo batasolile shikolo shose-shose sha mu hekalu ying'we, nuulu bataali kundukagula u mulungu wing'we.
44019038	Hu kuhaya u Demetilio na a batumami biye ulu giki bali na mhayo gwa kumuula munhu ose-ose, galiho a mabanza, na a balamuji baliho; ni bajage kwenuko bakimiile.
44019039	Hama nuulu gubize guliho mhayo gungi gose-gose uyo muligukooba, pyi i yose yeniyo ikulolwa ha lubanza ulo luzuniligije.
44019040	Al'i mbika iyo twabeejaga i lelo iyi, ishikile kutwenheleja kwinhwa nsango kulwa kwenheleja nsambo, nguno tuti na nzila yose-yose ya koolecha ni shikolo ki isho shatubilingaga giki aha."
44019041	Aho omala kuhaya giko ubawila a banhu kusambaala.
44020001	Aho yabita i yose yeniyo u Paulo ubitana a bahemba ubatimbya ngholo, na ubalaga ubuuka kuja Makedonia.
44020002	Waja alibita hose-hose i mhandi jenijo akulungalungaga mihayo mingi ya kubakomeleja a banhu, nose ushika i Buyunani.
44020003	Akamala mo myeji idatu; aho wahaya kubuuka kuja Sulia kubitila mu nyanza, ugalucha a maganiko; ushoka ubitila Makedonia, nguno akabona giki a Bayudaya baali basigana mhayo gwa kumulaga.
44020004	Bakaja nanghwe bana Tesalonike, ba Sopatilo ng'wana Piliho muna Beloya na Alistako na Sekundo, na Gayo muna Delibe, hamo nu Timoteo; na bana Asia ba Tikiko na Tulofimo.
44020005	Aliyo iki a banhu benaba baali batonga u kuja, bahayushika Tiloa butulinda.
44020006	Aho shabita shigukulu sha migati iti na shibimbya, nise tubuga nyanza twinga i Filipi, tumala shiku itano huna tushika i Tiloa uko baali; tushinga ho shiku mpungati.
44020007	A ha lushiku lo kwandya mu nyuma tukibilinga kumega ngati, u Paulo ulomeela kushisha bujiku ha gati, nguno wali ahelile kwinga a ha ntondo yaho.
44020008	U mu chumba umo twali twibilingila jalimo tala ja kugunaana.
44020009	Ndinha nebe, lina lyakwe Yutiko, wali wigasha ha lugala lw'idilisha, wanoga ubitwa tulo, utindila iki u Paulo akalomeela ikanza ilihu. Kuhayimanila u ndinha ng'wenuyo wagwa ha si; bumucha omalaga gucha, nguno akagwa kufuma ku golofa ya kadatu.
44020010	U Paulo aho wika ushikila kungwila unkumbatila; huna ubawila, "Mutogohage ataali mpanga!"
44020011	Winga ho ulinha hangi u ku golofa, umega ngati ulya, ongeja hangi u kuhoya nabo; nose wela huna uja.
44020012	Aho bamucha u nsumba buyega no, nguno bakamona ali mhola.
44020013	Twahayandya u lugendo, a bise twingila mu meli tutonga kuja Aso, gukahelwa giki tukujunsolela kwene u Paulo; nguno u ng'wene akaja lwa magulu.
44020014	Aho watusanga i Aso, tumbakija tubuuka tujile tuukashika Mitulene.
44020015	A henaho twinga hoi ku ntondo yaho, tubuga nyanza tuukakola ha ng'walo gwa Kio; hama a ha ntondo yaho hangi tushika Samo, u ku lungi tushikiila Mileto.
44020016	U Paulo wali atogilwe kubitila Efeso; aliyo wali atatogilwe kusola ikanza ilihu u mu Asia, nguno wali wangu-wangu; giki ulu yudulikana u lushiku lo Pentekosite lushike ali Yelusalemu.
44020017	Huna aho ali Mileto utumija bukitanwa a banamhala ba kanisa ya Efeso.
44020018	Aho bashika ubawila giki, "Mumanile umo nashimizilaga u ng'wikanza i lyose aho nikalaga hamo ning'we, kwandija lushiku lo kushika kwane mu Asia.
44020019	Nantumamilaga u Seeba mu widohya na kulila, nguno ya kugeng'wa kutaale, kulwa kwitilwa yabubi na Bayudaya.
44020020	Niyo hangi mumanile giki natamubisile mhayo nuulu gumo uyo gwali gudugije kumugunaana, giki himba naleke kumuwila nuulu kumulanga hape-hape ku butongi wa banhu, na mu buli kaya.
44020021	Najaga nubahugula a Bayudaya na a Bayunani, giki bangalukile Mulungu na kunzunya Seeba wise Yesu Kilisto.
44020022	Aliyo i haha nalija Yelusalemu, u Moyo anitungile; hama iyo nalakamanhye nayo natimanile.
44020023	Kwike namanile duhu giki, u Moyo Ng'wela akujaga unikaanila mu buli nzengo, uniwila giki nalindiililwe butungwa na buluhi.
44020024	Aliyo nahene u nene natububalaga u bupanga bone giki buli na solobo u kuli nene, kutinda kulumalija u lugendo lwane, nu nimo gwa kukumucha Nghulu Jawiza ja shigongo sha ng'wa Mulungu, nimo uyo nakagwanukula kufuma kuli Seeba Yesu.
44020025	"I haha namanile giki, pye a bing'we abo nabitaga nakumulomeelaga nghulu ja butemi, mutalanibona hangi u mu mili.
44020026	Huna luulu, u lushiku lwa lelo lwenulu nalikaanila ku butongi wing'we giki, u nene nali wape. Natiko u kusayilwa nuulu bugwilwa nsago a banhu nuulu: neelaga u mu mininga.'.
44020027	Nguno natalekile u kumuwila pyi iyo ayihelile u Mulungu.
44020028	Hu kuhaya ilanghanagi a bing'we benekili, ni lidale i lyose ilo Moyo Ng'wela amutuulile kubiza balanghani balyo; idiimagi i kanisa ya ng'wa Mulungu, iyo wipandika mu kwita mininga gakwe wei ng'wenekili.
44020029	U nene namanile giki, ulu nalinge jikwandya kung'ubukila mhuge ndaku, ijo jitulisaatwa i lidale.
44020030	Hama nu mu bing'we benekili bakwandya kwigela banhu ba kuja bakuyombaga mihayo ichaama-chaamile, bayubahumbuula a bahemba giki babalondeele boi.
44020031	Huna luulu ikalagi miso, ng'wizukwe giki ikanza lya myaka idatu nikalaga nakulilaga liimi na bujiku, natalekile kunghugula nuulu umo wing'we.
44020032	Aliyo i haha luulu, nalimutuula mu makono ga ng'wa Mulungu, na mu mhayo gokwe uyo gudugije kumuzenga, na kung'winha wingiji hamo na bose abo bakwejiagwa.
44020033	U nene natikumbilwe na hado yaya hela ja ng'wa munhu ose-ose, nuulu sabo jingi, nuulu ni shizwalo duhu yaya.
44020034	A bing'we aba mumanile giki naatumamaga na makono gane aya nene ng'wenekili, giki napandike sha kwigunaanila u nene, na a babo nikalaga nabo.
44020035	U mu yose iyo niitaga, nang'oolekejaga giki shiigelile kutumama giko, tuyubagunaana abo batidugije; tuyugwizukwa u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba Yesu; uyo guhayile giki, 'U kwinha kuli na mbango kutinda kwanukula.' "
44020036	Aho wamala u kuyomba i yeniyo utuja mazwi, ulomba hamo nabo pye a bose.
44020037	Pye bakalila no, kunu balinkumbatila u Paulo, na kumbipa.
44020038	Gukabaminya u mhayo uyo akaguhaya, u gwa giki batalamona hangi u mu mili. Huna bunshindikila, buukanshisha a ha meli.
44021001	Aho lyashika i likanza, tulinhya itanga tugoloola tujile tuukashika Kosi, u ku ntondo yaho tushika Lodo, u kufuma a henaho tuja Patala.
44021002	Tubona meli ijile Foenike, twingila ng'wenumo, tubuuka tujile.
44021003	I Kupulo twiloleela duhu, twitula ku nkono gwa lumoso, a bise tuja nalo u lugendo tulolile Sulia; tuukakola Tulo, nguno i meli yabbakuulaga miligo hoi a henaho.
44021004	Tubona hoi bahemba, twikala nabo shiku mpungati; bunghugula na kunghugula u Paulo mu nguzu ja ng'wa Moyo, giki atizuja i Yelusalemu.
44021005	Aliyo aho jashika i shiku ja kubuuka, twandya duhu u lugendo; a bose butushindikila, pye na a bakima na a banigini bufuma hamo nise i hanze ya nzengo; aho twashika a ha ng'walo tutuja mazwi kulomba.
44021006	Twahayumala u kwilaga nabo, twingila mu meli a bise, nabo bushoka kaya.
44021007	Tuja nalo u lugendo lwise u kufuma i Tulo, aho twashika Putolemai tubagisha a badugu, tulenda nabo hoi lushiku lumo.
44021008	A ha ntondo yaho tushika Kaisalia, tuukikala ha ng'wa nomeeji Filipo, uyo wali umo wa bagunaani abo mpungati.
44021009	Wali na bashike bane bahangi, baali batatoolilwe.
44021010	A henaho tukikala ho shiku ningi, kwitulwa washika nghangi nebe kufuma si ya Buyudaya, lina lyakwe Agabo.
44021011	Wahayushika aho twali, usola ngwasho go ng'wa Paulo, wibohya a magulu na a makono; huna uhaya, "U Moyo Ng'wela alihaya giki, 'A Bayudaya bakuja bakamohye giki u ng'wenekili ngwasho uyu, bantuule mu makono ga banhu ba mahanga.' "
44021012	Pye a bise, a bageni na a baho na kale, twandya kung'wikumbilija atizuja i Yelusalemu.
44021013	Aliyo u Paulo ushosha uhaya giki, "Bing'we muliita mhayo ki u gwenuyu, mulilila giki munigwishe ngholo? Managi giki u nene natazunije kutungwa duhu, aliyo nuulu kuchila ko i Yelusalemu, kulwa lina lya ng'wa Seeba Yesu!"
44021014	Aho twabona giki atiko kugaluchiwa, tuhaya, "Leka ishikiile iyo Seeba atogilwe ibize ho; tuhuumula tuneka."
44021015	Ha numa ya shiku ndebe, tugolanya lugendo lwise; tubuuka tujile Yelusalemu.
44021016	Bahemba balebe bana Kaisalia biza hamo nise, butushikija ha kaya ya ng'wa Naasoni, giki tulende ha ng'wakwe. Wali nghemba wa shiku ningi, fumo yakwe Kupulo.
44021017	Aho twashika i Yelusalemu, butwanukula na buyegi a badugu.
44021018	A ha ntondo yaho tuja nanghwe u Paulo kwibona na Yakobo; na a banamhala baaliho pye a bose.
44021019	Twahayumala u kubagisha, u Paulo wandya kubonzoolela gumo-gumo, pyi iyo yali yabeejiwa na Mulungu kubitila mu butumami bokwe.
44021020	Aho bigwa bunkumilija Mulungu, bung'wila u Paulo giki, "Bebe ndugu wise, ulibona giki a Bayudaya abo baazunije bali mashihumbi makumi mingi; na pye a bose bali na bujangiizu butaale no u ku shilagilo!
44021021	Aliyo hu baamalile kuwilwa giki, u bebe ukujaga ubawila a Bayudaya abo bali mu si ja mahanga, giki balekane nanghwe u Musa; booye nu kuyubasaala a baana babo, pyi nu kushimizila u mu shimile shise.
44021022	I gisi luulu, guliho mhayo ki u go kwita? Nguno bakwigwa duhu i giki wizile!
44021023	Ali luulu, leka tukuwile guyu mhayo ugwite; baliho banhu bane hamo nise aha bali mu shilahilo.
44021024	Basolage wiyeeje hamo nabo, ubafunije bebe i sabo ja kumoogelwa i mitwe yabo. U mu giko pye a banhu bakumana giki, i mihayo iyo bakuwilagwa kulwa nguno yako iti ya nghana; bakubona giki u bebe ukushimizilaga mo u mu shilagilo, na hangi ushidimile.
44021025	I mihayo ya banhu ba mahanga i yene twamala kwizunilija kale, tubandikila na kubandikila, giki balekane nu bufunya bo shitambo ku mashiikolile, nu kulya a mininga nuulu ndimu ja kubulagwa na kwitwa mininga yaya; balekane nayo gete i yeniyo, pyi nu bujingi."
44021026	Na nghana a ha ntondo yaho u Paulo ubasola a banhu benabo wiyeeja hamo nabo; huna wingila mu hekalu kubasomboolela i likanza lya kwejiwa kwabo; na giki ulu lyung'wa, shikufunyiwa i shitambo kulwa buli umo wabo.
44021027	Aho jegeela kushila i shiku ijo mpungati, Bayudaya balebe, ba kufuma Asia, bumona u Paulo ali mu hekalu. Bunghaja na makono gabo kunu baliyoganya, bakwitanaga banhu.
44021028	Balihaya giki, "Bagosha Baisilaeli twanguhilagi, u ng'wing'wana ng'wenuyu hu ng'wene uyo akujaga hose-hose, ulanga mihayo ya kuligomela i lihanga lise ni shilagilo; pyi ni lipandi lyenili. Niyo wingijaga na Bayunani u mu hekalu, kulisosohaja i lipandi lyeela ili!"
44021029	Bakahaya giko iki baali bamona u Paulo u mu nzengo ali na Tilofimo muna Efeso, biganikaga giki wali wingila hamo nanghwe nu mu hekalu.
44021030	Huna pyi u nzengo guyogooka i likanza lyenilo; yubiza bbidibbidi a banhu. Bundima u Paulo, bundutanja banfunije hanze ya hekalu; haho na haho yulugalwa i milyango!
44021031	Aho bataali buhadikija kuhaya kumulaga, jushika i mhola kuli ntaale wa mabita ga bashilikale, giki yayogooka i Yelusalemu.
44021032	Nanghwe haho na haho witana bashilikale na bataale babo, bupeela bajile u ku yombo. A Bayudaya aho bamona u ntaale wa mabita, hamo na a bashilikale abo wali nabo, boya u kuntulagula u Paulo.
44021033	Huna u ntaale wa mabita wegeela ho undima, ulagila atungwe minyololo ibili abujiwe ali nani, hangi witaga mhayo ki!
44021034	A banhu bandya kuyoganya u ng'wibita: abo balihaya kingi na a babo nabo balihaya kingi. U ntaale wa mabita uduuma u kwimana iyo yahayiagwa kulwa nguno ya yombo, nose ukalila kulagila duhu giki, u Paulo akingijiwe mu nghambi ya bashilikale.
44021035	A bashilikale aho bashika a ha nyango, yubigeleelwa kumucha u Paulo, u kung'wingija u mu nghambi, nguno u nsambo gwa banhu gukongeja u kukula.
44021036	I libita lya banhu abo bakuubijaga bajaga balihaya giki, "Mulagagi!"
44021037	U Paulo aho wegeela u kwingijiwa u mu nghambi ya bashilikale, ung'wila u ntaale wa mabita giki, "Nadugije kukuwila mhayo?" Nanghwe uhaya, "Bebe, umanile Shiyunani?
44021038	Uti ng'wene u muna Misili uyo wali wenhelegije nsambo makanza malebe u mu shiku ijo jabitile ijo, ukuminga n'ibita lya banhu babulagi shihumbi shine, uja nabo ku mapoolu?"
44021039	Nanghwe u Paulo uhaya, "Mm yaya, u nene nali Nyudaya muna Taso ya Kilikia, nzengo uyo guti gwa kwibengelejiwa; nalikulomba unizunilije nayombe nabo a banhu."
44021040	Unzunilija nghana. U Paulo wimiila ha malinhilo ga kwingilila u mu numba ya nghambi, ubahungija nkono a banhu buhuumulija sele. Huna ubawila mu lulimi lo Shihebulania alihaya giki,
44022001	"Bing'we bagosha badugu bane na bababa, nidegelekagi namusomboolele u wibuuji bone."
44022002	Aho bigwa alibayombya mu lulimi lo Shihebulania, bongeja u kuhuumula. Huna uhaya giki,
44022003	"U nene nali Nyudaya, myalilwa wa Taso ya Kilikia. Aliyo naakulilaga mu nzengo gwenuyu uyu; hama naalangagwa na Gamalieli i mihayo ya shilagilo sha bakulugenji bise, nubiza na bujangiizu butaale kulwa ng'wa Mulungu, git'umo muli duhu na a bing'we pye a bose i lelo iyi.
44022004	Abo bakushimizilaga u mu Nzila yeniyi naabaluhyaga kushisha kubabulaga; naabadutanjaga, naakabaponya mu jeela, pye bagosha na bakima.
44022005	U ntaale wa bagabiji adugije kunikaanila u mu mhayo gwenuyu, pyi na a banamhala. Nguno nakanukula na nyaluba kufuma kubo, giki naje najo Damasko u ku badugu, nakabatunge abo baali kwenuko, nabenhe Yelusalemu bize binhwe nsango.
44022006	"Aliyo aho negeela i Damasko uko najaga, nahayimanila mu makanza giti ga liimi ntwe-gati, napindiwa na bupe bung'weku hataale no, bo kufuma ng'wigulu.
44022007	Nugwa ha si; huna niigwa ilaka liliniwila, 'Saulo, Saulo, nibuli uliniluhya?'
44022008	Nane nushosha, 'Uli nani Seeba?' Nanghwe uniwila, 'Nali Yesu wa Nazaleti uyo uliniluhya!'
44022009	Na a babo baali hamo nane bakabubona u bupe wenubo, aliyo batitegelegije umo lyahayilaga i lilaka lyakwe uyo waniyombyaga.
44022010	Huna nung'wila, 'Niite ginehe luulu Seeba?' Nanghwe u Seeba uniwila giki, 'Buukaga ushikiile u mu nzengo gwa Damasko, ukujuwilwa ng'wenumo iyo ihelilwe kulwa butumami wako.'
44022011	Aliyo iki nakoya u kubona kulwa nguno y'ikujo lya bupe wenubo, abo baali hamo nane bunidima nkono bunitongeela nushikiila u mu nzengo gwa Damasko.
44022012	"I Damasko kwenuko waliho Anania, munhu ng'wishigwa mu kashimizile ka mu shilagilo, pye a Bayudaya ba kwenuko bankaanilaga chiza.
44022013	U munhu ng'wenuyo akiza aho naali nashikila; wahayushika uniwila giki, 'Ndugu Saulo, anukulaga kubona!' I likanza lyenilo nandya kubona, numona.
44022014	Hanuma uniwila, 'U Mulungu wa bakulugenji bise akusolile kufuma kale giki ubumane u butogwa bokwe, umone u Ntungilija, na wigwe ilaka kufuma mu nomo gokwe.
44022015	Nguno ukubiza nkaaniji wakwe ku banhu bose, ubawile iyo wibonaga, ni yiyo wigwaga.
44022016	Al'i haha luulu uliganika mhayo ki? Buukaga ubatiijiwe, ulililiile i lina lyakwe ushooje i shibi shako.'
44022017	"Aho nashoka Yelusalemu, lushiku lumo naali mu hekalu nakulombaga, nahayimanila nahweelwa.
44022018	Numona aliniwila giki, 'Kangilijaga wangu winge u mu Yelusalemu, nguno batubuzunya u bukaaniji ubo ulinikaanila kubo.'
44022019	Nane nung'wila, 'Seeba, bamanile giki u nene hu najaga u mu masinagogi naakabatunga na kubaponya mu jeela pye abo bakuzunije.
44022020	Na a haho giitagwa a mininga ga ng'wa Stefano u nkaaniji wako, u nene uyu naali nizunilija mili ngima, naali nimiila kubalanghanija i shizwalo shabo a babulagi bakwe!'
44022021	Huna uniwila giki, 'Jaga, nguno nakukutuma kule ku banhu ba mahanga.' "
44022022	Baali bandegeleka sele-sele kushisha ha mhayo gwenuyo; aho waguhaya duhu i giki, pye a bose bandya kuyoganya balihaya, "Ng'winjagi u mu si u ng'wenuyu, nguno u munhu giti ng'wenuyu atigeleelilwe kwikala mpanga!"
44022023	Bakayoganya no, kunu balitandula na shizwalo, na kusaamula lubuubu ng'wigulya.
44022024	U ntaale wa mabita ga bashilikale ulagija, u Paulo ingijiwe mu gati atulwe mbooko, abujiwe chiza imanwe i nguno iyo yali yenheleja nose banhu banyoganije giko.
44022025	Aliyo aho bandya kuntunga giki bantule, u wei u Paulo ung'wila u ntaale wa bashilikale uyo wali wimiila hihi nanghwe; uhaya giki, "A bing'we gashi muzuniligije duhu u kubatula na a Balumi, nuulu ataali u munhu u kulamulwa na kumanika giki nghubi?"
44022026	U ntaale wa bashilikale ng'wenuyo aho wigwa giko uja uukang'wila u ntaale wa mabita; giki, "Bebe ulihaya kwita mhayo ki u gwenuyu? U munhu ng'wenuyo umo wa Balumi!"
44022027	U ntaale wa mabita ung'wegeela ung'wila, "Bebe aliniwilage, uli umo wa Balumi?" Nanghwe uhaya, "Alichene!"
44022028	U ntaale wa mabita ushosha giki, "U nene nakafunya hela ningi hu nubiza umo wa Balumi!" Nanghwe u Paulo uhaya, "U nene kwingiila kubyalwa kwane!"
44022029	Huna abo bahayaga kumugilija bisunda ha mhelo i likanza lyenilo; u ntaale wa mabita akogoha no aho wabona giki gashinaga u Paulo wali umo wa Balumi, aliyo hu wali wantunga!
44022030	U ku ntondo yaho, u ntaale wa mabita ng'wenuyo ubiza na bukalalwa bo kumana ni nguno ki a Bayudaya bamuulaga giko; huna untaligulila, ulagija bikuminge a bagabiji bataale ni libanza. Biza ku butongi bokwe, ung'wenha u Paulo kwimiila nabo.
44023001	U Paulo ubakalalila no-no-no a b'ibanza; huna uhaya giki, "Bababa badugu bane, u nene u mu kikalile kane ka buli lushiku u ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu, nali na wiyanguji wawiza u mu ngholo kushisha ni lelo iyi."
44023002	U ngabiji ntaale Anania ubalagila abo baali bimiila haho nanghwe bantule u ku nomo gokwe.
44023003	Nanghwe u Paulo ung'wila, "Akukutula u Mulungu, bebe ndugu ibilile swakala; wigashaga kunilamula mu nghana ya shilagilo aliyo hu walinhya kushikenaagula na kulagila giki natulwe!"
44023004	Nabo abo baali bimiila haho nanghwe bung'wila, "Bebe, uling'wila mihayo ki i yeniyo u ngabiji ntaale wa ng'wa Mulungu?"
44023005	U Paulo uhaya, "Badugu bane, naali natamanile giki ngabiji ntaale, nguno gwandikilwe giki, 'Yaya u kunghaya kibi u ntongeeji wa banhu bako.' "
44023006	Huna luulu u Paulo aho wadeeba giki abo baaliho, bamo baali Basadukayo na bangi Bafalisayo, uhamuka u ng'wibanza n'ilaka itaale uhaya, "Bababa badugu bane, u nene nali Nfalisayo, ng'wana wa Bafalisayo, nalilamulwa kulwa nguno ya kwisagilwa kwa bujuuko wa bafu!"
44023007	Aho wahaya giko yubuuka yombo a ha gati ya Bafalisayo na a Basadukayo, lyugabanika i libita.
44023008	Nguno a Basadukayo bakahayaga giki butiho u bujuuko, na a bamalaika batiho, pye ni myoyo itiho; aliyo a Bafalisayo bazunije giki pyi i shenisho, shiliho.
44023009	Aho yakula i yombo, bimiila nose bamo ba Bafalisayo, a balangi ba shilagilo. Bandya kuyomba mu kwigambila balihaya giki, "Niyo a bise tutubonaga nuulu bubi u muli munhu ng'wenuyu. I gisi guliho mhayo ki ulu ubiza wayombiwe na moyo nuulu na malaika?"
44023010	U ntaale wa mabita ga bashilikale aho wabona giki gwakula u nsambo, ubalagila a bashilikale bang'winje u Paulo; bung'wingija mu nghambi, nguno akogoha a banhu batizuntandagula.
44023011	Aho wila u bujiku, u Seeba wimiila aho wali u Paulo; ung'wila giki, "Timbyaga ngholo, nguno shiigelile unikaaniile ni Lumi git'umo wanikaanilaga mu Yelusalemu."
44023012	Aho wela a Bayudaya bubeeja long'we; biyilahija giki batulyaga nuulu kung'wa shose-shose yaya, kushisha bamulage u Paulo.
44023013	Abo bakabeeja i long'we yeniyo baali banhu bakilile ha makumi ane.
44023014	Huna biza u kuli ngabiji ntaale, uko baali na a banamhala; bung'wila, "Twilahilaga giki tutulojaga shose-shose nuulu hado, kushisha tumulage u Paulo.
44023015	Ali luulu, u bebe ni libanza lyako tumaga nhung'wa u kuli ntaale wa mabita ga bashilikale, ang'wenhe; giti giki mulihaya kumugilija chiza i mihayo yakwe. A bise tutang'anhilile gete, tukumulagila mu nzila aho ataali nuulu kwegeela a henaha."
44023016	Kwike ng'wipfwa wa ng'wa Paulo uwigwa u busigani wenubo, huna wiza wingila u mu nghambi, ung'wila u Paulo.
44023017	Nanghwe u Paulo ung'witana umo wa bataale ba bashilikale; ung'wila giki, "U nyanda ng'wenuyu ntwalage u kuli ntaale wa mabita, nguno ali na mhayo gwa kung'wila."
44023018	Aho wantwala uukang'wila giki, "U ntungwa u Paulo wali wanitana uniwila nakwenhele uyu nyanda ali na mhayo gwa kukuwila."
44023019	U ntaale wa mabita undima nkono uja nanghwe ha mhujo uukamuja, "Uli na mhayo ki uyo utogilwe kuniwila?"
44023020	Nanghwe uhaya giki, "A Bayudaya balomanaga kwiza i ntondo kukulomba ulantwale u Paulo kwibanza giti kuhaya kumugilija chiza i mihayo yakwe.
44023021	U bebe utizubazunilija, nguno bamo babo, banhu bakilile ha makumi ane, bakubiza bang'witegeelaga. Bilahilaga giki batulyaga shose-shose nuulu kung'wa yaya, kushisha bamulage; niyo i haha baliho balindaga kwigwa kufuma kuli bebe duhu."
44023022	Huna u ntaale wa mabita uneka aje u nyanda, aliyo unghugula ung'wila, "Utizung'wila munhu nuulu umo, giki waniwilaga i mihayo yeniyi."
44023023	Huna witana bataale babili ba bashilikale ubawila giki, "Solagi bashilikale magana abili, na badamhiji ba falasa makumi mpungati, na bashilikale magana abili ba machimu; bibeeja-beeje bamaliile, nguno luliho lugendo lwa kuja Kaisalia makanza ga sa idatu ja bujiku.
44023024	Jigele na ndamhi aladamhile u Paulo, bantwale kuli nsugi Feliki bakanshishe ko mhola."
44023025	Wandika na nyaluba mu mbika iyi.
44023026	"Kilaudio Lisia: kuli baba nsugi nkujiwa Feliki. Nalikugisha.
44023027	U munhu ng'wenuyu wali wadimilwe na Bayudaya; baali batogilwe kumulaga, aliyo aho namana giki ali umo wa Balumi, nuja na bashilikale nukampija.
44023028	Nung'wenha ng'wibanza, wiza wimiila nabo iki naali natogilwe kumana ni nguno ki bakung'witilaga ili giko.
44023029	Nakabona giki alibuulwa kulwa wihalalija bo mihayo ya shilagilo shabo; mhayo uyo gutigelile kung'wenheleja kwinhwa nsango gwa kubulagwa, nuulu gwa kutungwa.
44023030	Hama hangi nahayagimanila nawilwa giki, iliho gwinda ya kuhaya kung'witila gwabubi u munhu ng'wenuyo; haho na haho nubona nantume kuli bebe. Nabalagilaga na a babuuji bakwe bize basomboole ku butongi wako, i mihayo iyo balimuula."
44023031	Na nghana a bashilikale biita git'umo gukahelelwa, bunsola u Paulo itaali bujiku giko, buukashika nanghwe Antipatili.
44023032	Aho wela i dilu a bene bushoka ku nghambi ya bashilikale, bubaleka a badamhiji ba falasa bushikiila nanghwe i Kaisalia.
44023033	Abo bakaja i Kaisalia aho bingila u mu nzengo, bung'winha i nyaluba u nsugi; nu Paulo buneka mu makono gakwe.
44023034	Wahayumala kwisoma, ubuja u Paulo muna hali; aho wamana giki muna Kilikia,
44023035	uhaya; "Nakwidegeleka i mihayo yako ulu balashike a babuuji bako." Ulagila alanghanwe ng'wikulu lya ng'wa Helode.
44024001	Aho jabita shiku itano, u ngabiji ntaale Anania uja ko i Kaisalia, hamo na banamhala. Bakaja hamo na Tetulo, munhu ndeeba mu kusomboola mihayo; a benaba hu bakajimiila u ku butongi bo nsugi kumuula u Paulo.
44024002	Aho witanwa u Paulo, u Tetulo wandya u kumuula alihaya giki, "U ng'wihanga ili tuli mu mhola yabuyaga kulwa nguno yako; hama ni mihayo ikujaga yongeja kubeela kulwa buloleeji bo maganiko gako
44024003	baba nkujiwa Feliki. Huna luulu, bose pye umo tugelelile tukwiyanukulaga pyi i yeniyi mu kulumba kutaale.
44024004	Kwike natatogilwe nikale nukujimiigija makanza; na luulu i haha baba nalikwikumbilija wiyumilije ho hado utudegeleke.
44024005	Nguno u munhu ng'wenuyu twamonile giki nkenaaguji, akujaga ubasonghanya pye a Bayudaya hose-hose uko bali; niyo ntongeeji o banhu b'igele lya Banazolayo.
44024006	Wali wagemile na kusosohaja hekalu, tundima; aho twahaya kunamula kulondeela katongeelele ka shilagilo shise,
44024007	wiza Lisia, u ntaale wa mabita ga bashilikale, ushikila kunghulumula bo nguzu, ung'winja u mu makono gise.
44024008	Huna ulagila bize kuli bebe a babuuji bakwe. Niyo nu bebe ulu ulamuje ukwimana jigi pyi iyo tulimuulila yeniyi."
44024009	Na a Bayudaya a bangi bakizunilija nayo i mihayo yeniyo, giki yali chene.
44024010	U nsugi unzunilija nanghwe u Paulo u kusomboola; huna ushosha giki, "Nali na buyegi u kukusomboolela i mihayo yane, nguno namanile uli namuji o shiku ningi u ng'wihanga ili.
44024011	Ikubeelela umane giki naali naajile Yelusalemu kujulamya, niyo i haha i shiku jitaali nuulu kubita a h'ikumi n'ibili.
44024012	A banhu benaba batanibonile nakwihalalijaga na munhu nuulu umo mu hekalu; nuulu ni giki nabilingaga banhu ng'wisinagogi, nuulu h'ipandi lingi lyose-lyose u mu nzengo, ni chene batanibonile.
44024013	Batiho nuulu kufunya bunghana wayo i mihayo iyo balinibuula i haha.
44024014	Kwike nalizunya mhayo gumo u ku butongi wako; giki u Mulungu wa bakulugenji bise nakunamyaga mu Nzila iyo bakwihayaga a benaba giki ya nyagomi. U nene nizunije pyi i mihayo iyo yandikilwe mu shilagilo, nu mu bahangi.
44024015	Nagusanije u mhayo uyo aguhayile u Mulungu, git'umo na a boi bagusanigije; giki bukubiza ho bujuuko wa bafu pye a bose, batungilija na a bakenaaguji.
44024016	Nose u nene nakuhadikaga gwa, nabize wape u mu moyo, u ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu nu ku banhu.
44024017	"Aliyo yabitaga myaka mingi natiho, naanogile niza; kwenha shakwinha na manongho ku banhu b'ihanga lyane.
44024018	Abo balinibuula benaba bakanisangila mu hekalu nali ng'wikanza lya kwiyeeja; batanibonile n'ibita lya banhu, nuulu hamo giki nalenheleja nsambo.
44024019	Abo bakiita i giko baali Bayudaya balebe ba kufuma Asia, abo ni yabeelela ulu ni babiza baliho aha, bafunye bukaaniji, babukaanile u bubi bone umo bamanilile.
44024020	Nuulu a benaba baliho aba ni babusomboolage u bubi ubo banibonile nabo, kuko nataali nimiilaga ku butongi w'ibanza giki.
44024021	Ulu iti kulw'ilaka ilo nakafunya aho nakimiila ha gati yabo nuhaya giki, 'I lelo nalilamulwa ku butongi wing'we kulwa nguno ya mhayo gwa bujuuko wa bafu.' "
44024022	U Feliki wali ayimanile chiza no i mihayo ya Nzila yeniyi, aliyo wijimangucha. Ulisambaaja i libanza; kunu alihaya giki, "Ulu alize u Lisia u ntaale wa mabita ga bashilikale nakwilamula i mihayo yako."
44024023	Huna unagila u ntaale wa bashilikale igana ananghane u Paulo; kwike ang'winhe wiyabi, hama atizubalemeja a banwani biye u kuyungunaana.
44024024	U Feliki wali atoolile Nyudaya, lina lyakwe Dulusila. Jahayubita shiku ndebe wiza hangi hamo nu nke. Aho bashika utumija wenhwa u Paulo, undegeleka u busombooji bokwe bo mihayo ya kunzunya Yesu Kilisto.
44024025	U Paulo akansomboolela mihayo ya butungilija na ya kwilanghana, na ya bulamulwa ubo buliza. U Feliki ogoha; unshokeja giki, "Wigejaga luulu i haha, jaga nakukwitana ikanza lingi hangi."
44024026	Aliyo iki akasangwa wisagilagwa giki u Paulo akunghonga hela, akayikala unagilija kwiza kuhoya nanghwe buli makanza.
44024027	Aho yabita myaka ibili u nimo go ng'wa Feliki gukasolwa na Polikio Fesito; kwike u Feliki wali atogilwe kubayeja a Bayudaya, na luulu uneka u Paulo ali mu butungwa.
44025001	Huna ubiza wingila Fesito a ha nimo gwa busugi u mu si yeniyo; aho jabita shiku idatu winga i Kaisalia uja Yelusalemu.
44025002	A bagabiji bataale na a batongeeji ba Bayudaya buukansomboolela i mihayo ya kubuulwa kwa ng'wa Paulo, niyo bung'wikumbilija
44025003	balinomba abiitile shigongo; alagile ize Yelusalemu, nguno baali balomana kung'wibandiila na kumulagila mu nzila.
44025004	Aliyo u Fesito ubashokeja giki, "U Paulo ali Kaisalia alanghanilwe;" na giki u wei ng'wenekili wali n'iganiko lya kuja ko ulu jabita shiku ngehu.
44025005	Ongeja kuhaya giki, "Bamo ba batongeeji bing'we ni bizage hamo nane bakimiile nanghwe u munhu ng'wenuyo, babooleche u bukenaaguji bokwe".
44025006	Akikala nabo shiku ja kushika inaane nuulu ikumi giko, huna utulumenha ashokile Kaisalia; ha ntondo yaho wigasha kulamula, ulagila witanwa u Paulo.
44025007	Aho washika, a Bayudaya abo baali biza kufuma Yelusalemu, bandya kusomboola mihayo mingi niyo midito, ya kumuula; aliyo nahene bulemeelwa u koolecha u bunghana wayo.
44025008	U mu busombooji bokwe u Paulo uhaya giki, "U nene natiitile mhayo gose-gose gwabubi u ku Bayudaya, nuulu u ku hekalu, nuulu ni kuli Kaisali duhu."
44025009	Kwike u Fesito akabona abayeje a Bayudaya, na luulu unshokeja u Paulo aling'wila giki, "Hamo utogilwe kuja Yelusalemu nakilamulile kwene i mihayo yako?"
44025010	Nanghwe u Paulo uhaya, "A henaha nimiilaga ku butongi w'ibanza lya ng'wa Kaisali, aho hanigeleelilwe kulamulilwa. U bebe ng'wenekili umanile hape giki natabakenije mhayo nuulu gumo a Bayudaya.
44025011	U nene ulu nali nghubi nuulu niitile mhayo gwa kuningija mu kucha, natogohaga u kucha, aliyo ulu gutiho mhayo nuulu gumo uyo balinibuula a banhu aba, atiho uyo adugije kunituula mu makono gabo. Nalilomba kuja kuli Kaisali!"
44025012	U Fesito a henaho wandya kulungalunga na a banhu b'ibanza; aho wamala ushosha giki, "Ali luulu, iki walomba kuja kuli Kaisali, ukuja nghana!"
44025013	Aho jabita shiku ndebe, ntemi Agilipa wiza i Kaisalia hamo na Belinike, kwiza kungisha u Fesito.
44025014	Bakamala ho shiku ningi, nose u Fesito unsomboolela u ntemi i mihayo ya ng'wa Paulo; uhaya giki, "Aliho munhu aha walekilwe na Feliki atungilwe.
44025015	Naali naajile Yelusalemu buukanisomboolela a bagabiji bataale na a banamhala ba Bayudaya, bunilomba nang'winhe nsango.
44025016	Nane nubashokeja giki, shiti shimile sha Balumi kulamula munhu ose-ose aho ataali kumanhya nabo a babuuji bakwe bushu ku bushu, nanghwe afunye busombooji u mu yose iyo balimuulila.
44025017	Huna luulu aho biza natadilile; a ha ntondo yaho nigasha ng'wibanza, nulagila u munhu ng'wenuyo wenhwa.
44025018	Bahayimiila kwandya kumuula a babuuji bakwe, nugayiwa mo nuulu gumo u gwabubi;
44025019	ulu iti ya wihalalija wa mihayo ya dini yabo duhu, na ya ng'wa munhu umo, Yesu, uyo wamala kucha; aliyo u Paulo akugaagaanaga kuhaya giki aliho mpanga!
44025020	U nene i mihayo yeniyo ikanizwanja, nose numuja ulu atogilwe kuja Yelusalemu ikalamulilwe kwenuko.
44025021	Aliyo u Paulo ulomba kujulamulwa na Augusto, huna nulagila alanghanwe kushisha lishike i likanza lya kuntwala u kuli Kaisali."
44025022	U Agilipa ung'wila u Fesito giki, "Ikubeelela nang'wigwe nane u munhu ng'wenuyo." U Fesito uhaya, "Ntondo ukundegeleka."
44025023	Na nghana aha ntondo yaho biza a ba Agilipa nu Balinike baamanukaga, baali hamo na bataale ba bashilikale, pye na a banhu a bataale-bataale a ba mu nzengo. Bushika bingila u ng'wibanza, huna u Fesito ulagila witanwa u Paulo.
44025024	Na luulu u Fesito wandya kuhaya giki, "Ntemi Agilipa na a bing'we bababa pye abo muli hamo nise aha, u munhu uyo mulimona ng'wenuyu, pye a Bayudaya ba Yelusalemu na a ba henaha bakunililiilaga buhaya giki, shitigelile ikale mpanga.
44025025	Aliyo u nene natugubonaga u mhayo uyo witile, u gwa kung'wenheleja kucha; kwike iki walombile kuja kuli Augusto, naabonile ili yawiza nantwale nghana.
44025026	Kwike nati nago gete u mhayo gwa kapanga uyo nalang'wandikile u ntaale wane; h'i nguno yene nang'wenha ku butongi wing'we. I no-no-no u ku butongi wako ntemi Agilipa. Hamo u mu kumuja-buja nakupandika sha kwandika.
44025027	Nguno nakubonekana nali nchilu-chilu ulu nutwala ntungwa aliyo natoolekegije i nghana ya mihayo iyo alibuulilwa."
44026001	Huna u Agilipa ung'wila u Paulo giki, "Wazunilijiagwa hayaga i mihayo yako." U Paulo ugoloola nkono, hama wandya kusomboola; uhaya giki,
44026002	"Ntemi Agilipa, i lelo nibona nali mu kwilukilwa kutaale no, nguno napandika ng'wanya gwa kusomboola ku butongi wako pyi i mihayo iyo Bayudaya bandije kunibuula.
44026003	U mhayo gwa kwandya u bebe ng'wenekili ujimanile i nhungwa ja Bayudaya ni mihayo yabo iyo ikenhelejaga buyombo; ali luulu, nalikulomba wiyumilije u kunidegeleka.
44026004	Pye a Bayudaya bajimanile i nhungwa jane, nguno nali munhu wa ng'wihanga lya ng'wise na mu Yelusalemu kufuma haho wandijo, ha buyanda bone.
44026005	Ulu butogwa badugije kukaanila, iki banimanile kufuma kale na kale, giki u mu nhungwa jane nali umo wa Bafalisayo, a badimi ba shilagilo kutinda pye a banhu.
44026006	Ni haha nimiilaga kulamulwa kulwa nguno ya kwisagija kwa ng'wa Mulungu, umo wabisagigija bakulugenji bise.
44026007	Baba ntemi, a Bayudaya balinibuula kulwa nguno ya kwisagijiwa kwenuko, uko pye a banhu ba ng'anda jise ikumi n'ibili bakalamyaga mu nghana, liimi na bujiku, mu kwisagilwa giki bakubiza mo.
44026008	I gisi nibuli mukubonaga giki guli mhayo gwa kukumya u Mulungu u kubajuucha a bafu?
44026009	Nu nene i chene naabonaga giki shinigelile kutumamila buli nzila, kwilwisha ni lina lya ng'wa Yesu u wa Nazaleti.
44026010	U mhayo gwenuyu nagwitaga u mu Yelusalemu; u budula ubo naali ninhwa na bagabiji bataale nabutumamilaga no, nuyubalugalila mu jeela beela bingi. Niyo u mu butogwa ni nghumbu jane, naali natogilwe bamalwe pye gete!
44026011	Buli gwa najaga hose-hose u mu masinagogi, kujubinha nsango, na kubahadikija kutumamila mihayo ya kubusosohaja u buzunya wabo. Naali nabapelanilile kibi no, pyi nu ku mizengo i ya hanze najaga naakabaluhya.
44026012	"Lushiku lumo nali mu lugendo najile Damasko, naali ninhwa budula na shilagilo kufuma ku bagabiji bataale, naje nakiite git'umo natogelilwe.
44026013	Aho nali mu nzila baba ntemi, nahayimanila nabona bupe bukilile a ha bung'weku bo liimi; wika kufuma ng'wilunde, bunipindya u nene, na a babo bashimizaga hamo nane.
44026014	A bose tugwa ha si, huna niigwa ilaka liliniyombya mu lulimi lwa Shihebulania giki, 'Saulo, Saulo, nibuli uliniluhya? Ili shilambu u bebe u kwikala ukulusaga milambi ku someke!'
44026015	Nane nuhaya, 'Uli nani Seeba?' Nanghwe u Seeba uhaya, 'Nali Yesu uyo uliniluhya.
44026016	Aliyo buukaga wimiile na magulu gako; naakwilongelaga kulwa nguno ya kukwita ubize ntumami, na nkaaniji wa mihayo yane yose, iyo wanibonaga muyo, ni yiyo nakongeja kukoolekeja.
44026017	Nakuja nakukupijaga u ku banhu na a mahanga ayo nalakutume kuja kubo,
44026018	kulwa kubaloleecha a miso gabo; binge u mu giiti, bingile ng'wisana, binge u mu nguzu ja ng'wa Shetani, bize kuli Mulungu banukule kulekejiwa kwa shibi, na wingiji hamo na a babo bamala kwejiwa kulwa kunizunya nene.'
44026019	"Huna luulu baba ntemi Agilipa, natilemile iyo nakawilwa u mu koolekegeje ka kufuma ng'wigulu kenako .
44026020	Aliyo nandya kuja nakubalomeelaga a banhu giki bagaluke banzunye Mulungu, bandye kwita shitile sha koolecha kugaluka. Nakandija Damasko, nuja ni Yelusalemu, ni Buyudaya i yose; pyi nu ku mahanga a gangi.
44026021	A Bayudaya bakanidimila mu hekalu kulwa nguno ya mihayo yeniyi, baali batogilwe kunibulaga.
44026022	Aliyo iki u Mulungu ali ngunaani wane, h'i nguno yene ni lelo iyi nimiilaga aha nalisomboola hape ku butongi wa bose, bataale na bado. Natuhayaga mihayo yingi, ulu iti iyo ihayiwe na bahangi hamo na Musa, giki yigelile ibize ho;
44026023	mihayo ya kuluhiwa kwa ng'wa Kilisto, uyo yali ing'wigelile abize wa kwandya kujuuka kufuma mu bafu, hama aje akulomeelaga isana ku banhu bakwe bose, nu ku mahanga a gangi."
44026024	U Paulo aho wihaya i mihayo yeniyo, kuhayimanila u Fesito wahamuka n'ilaka lya higulya alihaya, "Wasalile u bebe Paulo; lyakusagije i lisoma lyako!"
44026025	Nanghwe u Paulo uhaya, "Baba nkujiwa Fesito nati nsaji, nalihaya mihayo ya nghana, hangi mu masala madeekanu.
44026026	Leka nayombe mu kwisandaala u kuli ntemi iki ayimanile i mihayo yeniyi. Namanile hape gutiho uyo gung'wibisile, nguno u mhayo gwenuyu gutiitilwe mu mbisila.
44026027	Ntemi Agilipa, angu mmho ubazunije a bahangi? Namanile ubazunije!"
44026028	U Agilipa ung'wila u Paulo giki, "U bebe, u ng'wikanza i liguhi lyenili ulihaya ukuniita nabize Nkilisto u nene?"
44026029	Nanghwe u Paulo unshokeja uhaya, "U nene nalinomba u Mulungu giki nuulu ni lyabiza ikanza iguhi, nuulu ilihu, iti bebe kwike; aliyo pye a bose abo mulinidegeleka mubize git'umo nali u nene, kwinja ho duhu i nhendele iji!"
44026030	Ubuuka na kubuuka u ntemi nu nsugi, nu Belinike; pye na a babo baali bigasha nabo.
44026031	Aho balinga, bakaja baliwila, "U munhu ng'wenuyu atiitile mhayo gose-gose gwa kung'wenheleja kucha, nuulu ni kutungwa duhu!"
44026032	U Agilipa ung'wila u Fesito giki, "Niyo u munhu ng'wenuyu ulu ni wali atalombile kujudegelekwa na Kaisali, wali igeleelilwe nuulu kulekelwa duhu."
44027001	Huna aho gwalamulwa giki tubuge nyanza kuja Italia, u Paulo hamo na batungwa bangi butuulwa mu nkono gwa ntaale wa bashilikale igana, wa nghambi ya Augusto; lina lyakwe Juliasi.
44027002	Twingila mu meli ya Adilamuteo, yali ihelilwe kuja ilisingija ikwimaga mu myalo ya Asia. Huna tubuuka tujile; Alistako u muna Tesalonike ya Makedonia wiza hamo nise.
44027003	Ha ntondo yaho tushika Sidoni, u Juliasi ung'witila shigongo u Paulo, unzunilija aje ku banwani biye kujugunaanwa.
