51002011	Na hangi u muli we musaalilwe mu busaalwa ubo buti bo kubeejiwa na makono mu nzila ya kwinja ikoba lya mili ; aliyo musaalilwe busaalwa bo ng'wa Kilisto.
51002012	U mu kubatiijiwa mukajikwa hamo nanghwe, na hangi kulwa kubiza u muli we, mujuuchiwe hamo nanghwe kulwa nguno ya kubuzunya u budula bo ng'wa Mulungu uyo akanjuucha kufuma mu bafu.
51002013	Na nghana ng'wali bafu kulwa bukenaaguji, na butusaalwa u mu nhungwa jing'we i ja mili; aliyo akang'wita kubiza bapanga hamo nanghwe, umulekeja pyi u bukenaaguji wing'we.
51002014	Wabujimangucha u bubuulwa wise ubo wali wandikilwe mu shilagilo isho shali shituchaamile; ububuucha uwinja uukabukomeela ha nsalaba.
51002015	Mabusugi na mabutaale ugazuuja magaka, ugagwesa kuja ha nsalaba, akuboolechaga u butindi bokwe ku bose, ugapyenela henaho, ugaleka gali buyiki gitendegesaga!
51002016	Huna luulu mutizunzunilija ose-ose uyo akumulamulaga kulwa nguno ya shiliwa nuulu shakung'wa, nuulu mihayo ya kukuja shiku ndebe, nuulu makanza ga ng'weji mpya, nuulu sabato.
51002017	I mihayo yeniyo ili nengeeji duhu gwa mihayo iyo iliza; aliyo u gwa nghana ng'wene Kilisto.
51002018	Mutizunzunilija ose-ose uyo akumudalahaga, kunu ung'wenhela mihayo ya wibembu bo higulya-gulya, na ya kubalamya bamalaika umo abonelile wei ng'wenekili. U ng'wenuyo adooshiwe maganiko ga mili gokwe duhu, lekanagi nanghwe nguno ali dalali; atizung'wenheleja kujimiija mheela ying'we.
51002019	Atadimanile nago u Ntwe, uyo pyi u mili gudimanyiwe hamo kulwa nguno yago, mu nzila ya nge na matimba; nose gukulishiagwa giki gukule mu kakulile ka kufuma kuli Mulungu.
51002020	I gisi ulu muchile hamo na Kilisto u ku mihayo ya mu si, numho muli na nguno ki hangi u kubiza giti muli banhu ba mu si, nose mukwikalaga musugilwe na shilagilo sha mu si; giki,
51002021	"Utizukuumya, utizuloja, utizudima?"
51002022	I yeniyo ulu yulinda yutumama ikamalaga u nimo, nguno u ng'wihando gwayo guli ha malange ga banhu.
51002023	Na nghana i chene i yoi ikabonekanaga giti mitengeke, ulu munhu atogilwe kwihedeka wei ng'wenekili mu mbika ndebe ya kalamije, nuulu mu wibembu bo higulya-gulya, nuulu mu mhayo gwa kwiluhya mili; kwike i yoi iti na budula bose-bose bo kuhangija kwikumva kwa mili.
51003001	Huna luulu ulu ng'wamala kujuuchiwa hamo na Kilisto, ikoobagi iyo ili kwigulya, uko ali u Kilisto, igashije ku nkono gwa bulyo go ng'wa Mulungu.
51003002	A maganiko ging'we galogejagi ku mihayo ya kwigulya, yaya u ku ya mu si.
51003003	Nguno a bing'we muchile, niyo u bupanga wing'we bubisilwe muli Mulungu hamo na Kilisto.
51003004	Ulu lyushika i likanza lya koolechiwa u Kilisto uyo ali bupanga wise, na a bing'we hu mukwilonga u ng'wikujo hamo nanghwe.
51003005	Ali luulu, jibulagagi i nhungwa jing'we i ja kashimizile ka mu si, giti: bujingi, busoso, buhahaalizu, kwikumva kwabubi, kwikumva sabo, (uyo guli mhayo gwa kulamya shikolo).
51003006	Nguno u bupelanu bo ng'wa Mulungu bukabiziilaga a bashitiigwa kulwa mihayo yeniyo.
51003007	Na a bing'we h'umo ng'washimizilaga aho ng'wali mutaali u mu mihayo yeniyo.
51003008	Aliyo i haha iponyagi gete i mihayo giti: bupelanu, bukali, bubi; nu mu milomo ying'we winge u busondaguji nu budukani.
51003009	Yaya u kwilemba, nguno ng'wanzuulile u munhu wa kale hamo ni shitile shakwe,
51003010	ng'unzwala munhu mpya, uyo akongejaga kubeejiwa bupya u mu witegeleja, ongeje kubiza mu suso ya Mumbi wakwe.
51003011	U mu mhayo gwenuyu atiho wa kubalwa giki uyu Nyunani nuulu Nyudaya; uyu asaalilwe nuulu atasaalilwe, nuulu giki uyu misa, uyu muna mahanga, uyu nsese, uyu ntungulwa, aliyo u Kilisto ali shose mu bose.
51003012	Huna luulu a bing'we basolwa, abo muli beela na batogwa ba ng'wa Mulungu, zwalagi nhungwa ja kwisaatwa, kwichila shigongo, widohya, bulyehu na wiyumilija.
51003013	Ng'wiyumilija buli ng'wene u ku biye, niyo ng'wilekeja ulu aliho munhu ali na mhayo gwa kunsaayila ng'wiye, na a bing'we ng'wiyitila git'umo wang'witila a bing'we u Seeba.
51003014	A higulya ya yose yeniyo tuulagi ho butogwa, nguno u wene bukubanigije pyi i yose mu bushikanu bose.
51003015	Huna i mhola ya ng'wa Kilisto izunilijagi isuge u mu ngholo jing'we, git'umo kitanilwe king'we kali mu mili gumo; na bizagi banhu ba kulumba.
51003016	Nu mhayo go ng'wa Kilisto gubize mo u mu bing'we, niyo gumukwilile. Mudule kuyilanga na kwihugula bing'we benekili na benekili mu witegeleja bose: mu Zabuli na mimbo, na mimbo ga mu moyo; hamo na kung'wimbila Mulungu na buyegi u mu ngholo jing'we.
51003017	Niyo buli gwene uyo mukugwitaga, ibize mu kayombele nuulu mu shitwa; pye yitagi mu lina lya ng'wa Seeba Yesu, kunu mukunkumilijaga Mulungu Siswe muli we.
51003018	A bing'we bakima ng'widohya u ku bagoshi bing'we git'umo shiigelile kuli Seeba.
51003019	Na a bing'we bagosha batogagwi a bake bing'we, niyo yaya u kubakalihila.
51003020	A bing'we baana ng'ubigwa mu yose a babyaji bing'we, nguno u mhayo gwenuyu guli gwawiza u kuli Seeba.
51003021	Na a bing'we bababa yaya u kubasaayicha a baana bing'we batizugwa ngholo.
51003022	A bing'we basese ng'ubigwa mu yose a basing'we-bugonzo mu mili, iti ng'wikanza ilo balimubona duhu, giti bachooji ba kuyeja banhu, aliyo ng'ogohagi Seeba na ngholo imo.
51003023	Buli gwene uyo muligwita gwitagi kufuma mu gati ya ngholo, giti mulintumamila Seeba, yaya u kubiza giti mukubatumamilaga banhu.
51003024	Managi giki mukwanukula mheela ya wingiji kufuma kuli Seeba, nguno mukuntumamilaga Seeba Kilisto.
51003025	Aliyo uyo akwitaga yabubi, akwanukula iyo yigeleelilwe bubi wa nhumamile yakwe, butiho busolanhyiwa a ha gati ya banhu.
51004001	Na a bing'we basaabo-bugonzo, ng'ubiitila a basese bing'we mihayo ya butungilija na ya longe. Managi giki ning'we muli na Seeba u ng'wigulu.
51004002	Bizagi bakomeezu u mu kulomba, niyo ilanghanagi gete u mu mhayo gwenuyo, na mubize banhu ba kulumba.
51004003	Na a bise ng'utulombela, u Mulungu atulugulile nyango tugulomeele u mhayo gwa mbisila ya ng'wa Kilisto, uyo nali ntungwa i haha kulwa nguno yago.
51004004	Nabize na budula bo kugoolecha git'umo inigeleelilwe kuguhaya.
51004005	Bizagi bitegeleja u mu kashimizile king'we u ku banhu abo bali hanze ya kuzunya; ni likanza ng'ulitumamila chiza.
51004006	Bul'ikanza bizagi na shigongo u mu kalungalungile king'we, kabize kasanduku giti kasanjiwe munhu, mumane umo ing'wigeleelilwe kunshokeja buli munhu.
51004007	I mihayo yane pyi i yose akumumanikija ndugu ntogwa Tikiko, u ng'wenuyo nanghwe ntumami ng'wishigwa; niyo hangi nsese ng'wichane u muli Seeba.
51004008	Nalintuma u ku bing'we kulwa nguno ya mhayo gwenuyu, giki mumane umo tukujilaga, mulungujiwe u mu ngholo jing'we.
51004009	Bali na ndugu Onesimo, munhu ng'wishigwa. U ng'wene ali umo wing'we; huna luulu a benabo bakumumanikija pyi i ya kuunu.
51004010	U ntungwa ng'wichane u Alistako alimugisha, nu Maliko u ng'wipfwa wa ng'wa Balinaba (u ng'wene ng'walanjiwe i ya kung'witila; ng'wanukulagi ulu alize ko).
51004011	Nu Yesu, uyo akitanagwa Yusto, alimugisha. A batumami bichane u mu nimo gwa butemi wa ng'wa Mulungu bali benaba duhu a Bayudaya; niyo h'abo baabizile balunguja bane bataale.
51004012	Alimugisha nu Epafula u nsese o ng'wa Kilisto Yesu, nanghwe u ng'wenuyo ali umo wing'we. Akumulombelaga gwa na bukomeezu no-no-no, giki ng'wimiile mu bushikanu, hangi muyitegelegije iyo Mulungu ayitogilwe.
51004013	Nguno nalinkaanila giki akutumamaga na bukalalwa butaale no kulwa nguno ying'we, hamo na a bana Lodikea, na a bana Helapoli.
51004014	Nu ntogwa Luka, u nfumu, hamo na Dema; nabo balimugisha.
51004015	Bagishagi a badugu ba Lodikea; nu Nimfa, hamo ni kanisa iyo ili mu kaya yakwe u nshike ng'wenuyo.
51004016	Ulu mulamale u kusomelwa i nyaluba yeniyi, itwalagi Lodikea ikasong'we nu ku kanisa ya kwene; na a bing'we musomelwe i ya Lodikea.
51004017	U Alikipo ng'wilagi akalagane u kugushikilija u nimo uyo wagwanukula kufuma kuli Seeba.
51004018	U bugisha ubu nawandika nene Paulo na nkono gwane; ng'unizukwa u mu butungwa bone. Shigongo shibize hamo ning'we: Alichene.
52001001	Nene Paulo, hamo na Silwano na Timoteo; ku kanisa ya Batesalonike iyo ili muli Mulungu Siswe na Seeba Yesu Kilisto. Shigongo na mhola shibize hamo ning'we.
52001002	Tukunumbaga Mulungu gwa kulwa nguno ying'we, niyo tukumuhayaga buli lushiku ulu tulilomba.
52001003	Ni shitwa shing'we i sha mu kuzunya, gwa tukushizukagwa u ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu Siswe; pyi ni milimo i midito iyo mukulwaga nayo kulwa butogwa, nu wiyumilija ubo muli nabo kulwa kung'wisagilwa Seeba wise Yesu Kilisto.
52001004	Badugu, tumanile giki u kuli Mulungu muli baganja na basolwa bakwe.
52001005	Nguno i Nghulu Jawiza jise u ku bing'we yali iti mihayo duhu, aliyo jikamupandika mu budula na muli Moyo Ng'wela, hamo na shimanikijo shingi; git'umo mukatumanila aho twikalaga hamo ning'we kulwa nguno ying'we.
52001006	Ning'we mukabiza balondeeji bise na ba ng'wa Seeba, nguno mukagwanukula u mhayo mu makoye mingi; aliyo hangi na buyegi muli Moyo Ng'wela.
52001007	Kushisha nose ng'ubiza bulolelo u ku bazunya ba Makedonia, na a ba Akaya.
52001008	Nguno u kufuma u ku bing'we, u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba gutakumukile mu Makedonia na Akaya duhu, aliyo u kuzunya kwing'we umo munzunigije u Mulungu kwasambaalile hose-hose; nose a bise tuti na nguno ya kuhaya nuulu mhayo.
52001009	Nguno boi benekili bakujaga bulomeela umo mukatwanukulila aho twashika u ku bing'we. Bakukumuchaga umo mukangalukila u Mulungu, ng'ulekana nayo i mihayo ya kwitongeleja ku mashiikolile, ng'ubiza batumami ba ng'wa Mulungu mpanga na wa nghana.
52001010	I haha mukunindiilaga Ng'wana wakwe uyo akwiza kufuma ng'wigulu, uyo akanjuucha kufuma mu bafu, u Yesu, uyo ali mpija wise kufuma mu bupelanu ubo buliza.
52002001	Nguno a bing'we badugu mumanile giki u kwiza kwise u ku bing'we kutagelelile kubiza kwa dalali.
52002002	Mumanile giki aho twali mu Filipi twali na makoye no, na giki twasondagulagwa kibi no. Aliyo nahene nuulu iki twali mu makoye mingi, twali na bushisha-ngholo kufuma kuli Mulungu wise; h'i nguno yene tukamulomeela u mhayo gokwe.
52002003	Nguno u buganikiji wise buti mu nyalemba-lembi nuulu mu busoso, nuulu mu nyasala-sala.
52002004	Aliyo iki u Mulungu akatubona giki twigeleelilwe kwinhwa nimo gwa kulomeela Nghulu Jawiza, h'umo tukuhayilaga. Iti giti bayeja ba banhu, aliyo ba kunyeja Mulungu, uyo akabonaga mu ngholo jise.
52002005	Nguno a bing'we mumanile gete, niyo nu Mulungu nkaaniji wise, giki aho twali ku bing'we tutatumamilile mihayo ya kulaalikija banhu, nuulu tutikumbilwe shikolo shose-shose mu mbisila.
52002006	Twali tutakoobaga ikujo kufuma ku banhu, ibize kufuma ku bing'we nuulu ku bangi.
52002007	Na nghana twali tudugije kumubuna, nguno tuli batung'wa ba ng'wa Kilisto. Aliyo twali bidohya u ku bing'we git'umo neji akadililaga baana bakwe.
52002008	Huna luulu iki twali tumusaatilwe no-no-no giko, tukayega u kung'winha, iti Nghulu Jawiza ja ng'wa Mulungu duhu, aliyo nu bupanga wise gete, iki mukabiza batogwa bise.
52002009	Nguno badugu izukagwi umo twatumamilaga, nu mumo twanogelaga; twatumamaga liimi na bujiku, giki tutizumuna nuulu umo wing'we, u ng'wikanza lya kumulomeela i Nghulu Jawiza ja ng'wa Mulungu.
52002010	A bing'we benekili muli bakaaniji, nu Mulungu nkaaniji, giki i shimizile yise u ku bing'we a bazunya yali ya banhu beela na batungilija, abo bati na shilingo.
52002011	Mumanile giki ku buli ng'wene u mu bing'we twali giti munhu na baana bakwe.
52002012	Twamuganikilaga na kumutimbya ngholo na kumuhugula, giki mushimize giti banhu abo bigeleelilwe koolecha ikujo lya ng'wa Mulungu, uyo wang'witana kwingila ng'wikujo na mu butemi bokwe.
52002013	Huna luulu a bise nise tutaali u koya u kunkumilija u Mulungu. Nguno aho mukagwanukula u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu uyo mukagwigwa kufuma ku bise, mutagwanukulile giti mhayo gwa banhu, aliyo mukagwanukula git'umo guli nghana, mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu. U mhayo gwenuyo h'uyo gukutumamaga u mu bing'we abo muli bazunya.
52002014	Nguno a bing'we badugu yang'wilongelile iyo ikubilongelaga ba mu kanisa ja ng'wa Mulungu, ijo jili muli Kilisto Yesu, i ja mu si ya Buyudaya. Nguno na a bing'we mukaluhiwa na banhu b'ihanga ling'we, mu mihayo giti iyo bakuluhiagwa nabo u ng'wihanga lya Bayudaya;
52002015	abo bakamulaga Seeba Yesu na bahangi, niyo na a bise bakujaga butwayiga buli kwene. Bati na gwa kunyeja Mulungu, na hangi bati na busangi na banhu bose.
52002016	Batatogilwe tuje tukubalomeelaga a banhu ba mahanga, nguno batatogilwe bapijiwe. Bakushishikilijaga gwa i shibi shabo; kwike nose u bupelanu bo ng'wa Mulungu wabidikilile.
52002017	Aliyo badugu, a bise aho twalekanyiwa ning'we ikanza ido u mu mili, iti mu ngholo, tukabiza na nghumbu ningi no ja kumubona u bushu wing'we.
52002018	H'i nguno yene tukakooba no-no-no kwiza uko muli; niyo u nene Paulo ng'wenekili nakashisha nghangala ja kushika ibili giko naligema, aliyo u Shetani akatuhangija.
52002019	I gisi ulu iti bing'we, numho u kwisagilwa kwise kukufuma he hangi, nu buyegi wise ni ngikili ya kuyegela u ku butongi bo ng'wa Seeba wise Yesu ulu ushoka?
52002020	Nguno a bing'we hu mul'ikujo lise, na buyegi wise.
52003001	Nose iki tukalemeelwa u kwiyumilija, tukabona ili hambu-hambu nuulu kulekwa iyene i Atene.
52003002	H'i nguno yene tukantuma u ndugu wise u Timoteo, uyo ali ntumami wa ng'wa Mulungu kulwa Nghulu Jawiza ja ng'wa Kilisto, ize ko amujaamye na kumulunguja u mu kuzunya kwing'we;
52003003	atizigela nuulu umo wing'we wa kutala kulwa buluhiwa wenubu. Nguno a bing'we benekili mumanile hape giki shitwigeleelilwe kuluhiwa.
52003004	H'umo tukamuwila kufuma haho wandijo aho twali ning'we, giki tuli hihi kwingila mu buluhiwa; na nghana ikaja chene git'umo mumanilile.
52003005	Huna luulu u nene iki nakaduuma u kwiyumilija, nakabona natume munhu, namane umo mulijila u mu kuzunya kwing'we; atizubiza wamugemile u ngemi, gubize gwachile mpandagilo u nimo gwise.
52003006	Aliyo i haha u Timoteo wamalile kushoka kufuma u ku bing'we, i nghulu ja buzunya nu butogwa wing'we ijo watwenhelile jili jawiza no, niyo utuwila nu gwa giki buli gwa mukutwizukagwa; na hangi muli na nghumbu ja kutubona git'umo na a bise tuli na nghumbu ja kumubona a bing'we.
52003007	Nose badugu, aho twajiigwa i mhola ja kuzunya kwing'we twalungujiwe no u mu bupina wise, na a makoye ayo gakatugwila kulwa nguno ying'we.
52003008	Iki i haha hu tuli bapanga, ulu ng'uhandatila kwimiila u muli Seeba.
52003009	Nguno himba tukunumba na kalumbile ki u Mulungu wise, u mu buyegi ubo tuli nabo ku butongi bokwe kulwa nguno ying'we!
52003010	Liimi na bujiku tukulombaga na bujangiizu butaale giki tumubone u bushu wing'we, tumugoloolele iyo iligoma-goma u mu kuzunya kwing'we.
52003011	Ali luulu i haha u Mulungu Siswe ng'wenekili, nu Yesu Seeba wise, leka atutonge i nzila ya kwiza uko muli.
52003012	Na a bing'we, u Seeba ang'winhe kubiza na butogwa wingi bo kuseesekela na kuseesekela, ng'witogwe a bing'we benekili, pye na a banhu a bangi, git'umo tukwitilaga a bise u ku bing'we.
52003013	Amushikanye u mu ngholo jing'we, u ng'wikanza lya kwiza kwa ng'wa Seeba wise Yesu hamo na beela bakwe bose, musangwe muli beela muti na shilingo u ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu Siswe.
52004001	Huna luulu badugu, u gwa kumalija guli giki, tulimulomba na kung'wikumbilija muli Seeba Yesu, mushimizile mu nhungwa ja kunyeja Mulungu, git'umo mukanukulila kufuma ku bise. Shimizagi giko, niyo jangiilagi no-no-no.
52004002	Mukamanile a kahugulile ako tukang'winha muli Seeba Yesu.
52004003	Nguno u butogwa bo ng'wa Mulungu buli giki ng'wejiwe, ng'winge u mu bujingi.
52004004	Buli umo wing'we amane u kugulanghana u mili gokwe mu wela n'ikujo.
52004005	Iti mu kwikumva kwa nyahahaalizu git'umo bali banhu ba mahanga, abo bataamanile Mulungu.
52004006	Atizigela munhu wa kunghunga ng'wiye u mu mhayo gwenuyo, nguno u maji wa shiili u mu yose yeniyi ali Seeba, git'umo tukamuwilila hape kufuma haho wandijo.
52004007	Iki u Mulungu atatwitanile a bise giki twingile mu busoso, aliyo kwingila mu wela.
52004008	Huna luulu uyo alayileme i yeniyi atulemaga ya ng'wa munhu, alilema ya ng'wa Mulungu uyo wang'winha a bing'we Moyo Ng'wela wakwe.
52004009	Kwike i mihayo ya kitogelwe ka nyadugu, nati na nguno ya kung'wandikila i yene, nguno a bing'we benekili ng'wamala kulangwa na Mulungu u kwitogwa.
52004010	Iki i mihayo yeniyo mukubiitilaga na kale pye a badugu ba mu Makedonia i yose; kwike badugu tuling'wikumbilija ng'ongeje na kutinda ho.
52004011	Hangi gemagi no-no-no u kwilanghana, buli munhu ayubeeja milimo yakwe, ng'utumama na makono ging'we git'umo tukamuwilila.
52004012	U mu giko hu mukudula kugoloola a kashimizile u ku banhu abo bali hanze ya kuzunya; niyo mutugwa nu mu makoye ga bugayiwa.
52004013	Ali luulu badugu, tutatogilwe ng'wikale mutimanile i mihayo ya banhu abo balaalile, nguno tutatogilwe mupinihale git'umo bali a bangi, abo bati na kwisagilwa.
52004014	Iki tuzunije giki u Yesu akacha na kujuuka, h'umo akubiitila u Mulungu na a babo balaalile muli Yesu, akubenha hamo nanghwe.
52004015	Leki tumuwile umo guli gete u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba ng'wenekili; giki, a bise abo tukusangwa tuliho a h'ikanza lya kwiza kwa ng'wa Seeba, tutubatanga abo balaalile.
52004016	Nguno u Seeba ng'wenekili akwiza kufuma ng'wigulu n'ilaka itaale lya kulagila, ilaka lya ng'wa malaika ntaale, n'ipembe lya ng'wa Mulungu; huna abo baachila muli Kilisto bakutonga u kujuuka.
52004017	Ha numa nise abo tukusangwa tutaali tuli bapanga, tukuhwehulwa hamo nabo tuje mu malunde kujumanhija kwigulya nu Seeba. Huna tukwikala nanghwe u Seeba welelo bose.
52004018	Na luulu ng'wilunguja mu mihayo yeniyi.
52005001	Aliyo i mihayo ya shiku na makanza, i yene badugu nati na nguno ya kung'wandikila.
52005002	Nguno a bing'we benekili mumanile, giki u lushiku lo ng'wa Seeba lukushika git'umo ng'wibi akizaga bujiku.
52005003	U ng'wikanza ilo bakusangwa bakuhayaga giki mhola na kaholele, bakuhayimanila bisanganijiwa na bukenaaguji, git'umo busungu bo kubyala bukansangaga nkima uyo ali nda; batupuluguka na hado yaya!
52005004	Kwike a bing'we badugu, muti banhu ba mu giiti, nose u lushiku lwenulo lung'wisanganije.
52005005	Nguno pye abo muli baana ba ng'wisana muli ba ng'wikanza lya liimi. A bise tuti ba ng'wikanza lya bujiku nuulu tuti ba mu giiti.
52005006	Huna luulu, tulekagi u kulaala git'umo bali a bangi, aliyo twilanghanagi tubize na masala madeekanu.
52005007	Nguno a balaaji bakalaalaga bujiku, pye na a baleevi nabo bakaleebagwa bujiku.
52005008	Aliyo a bise tuli ba ng'wikanza lya liimi, hu kuhaya tubizagi na masala madeekanu, tuzwale kuzunya na butogwa, shibize shizwalo shise sha chuma sha kulanghana shikuba; hama n'ihima lya kwisagilwa kwa bupiji.
52005009	Nguno u Mulungu atatusolile kulwa kugwa mu bupelanu bokwe, aliyo kulwa kwanukula bupiji muli Seeba wise Yesu Kilisto,
52005010	uyo akacha kulwa nguno yise; giki tubize bapanga hamo nanghwe, u ng'wikanza ilo tuli bapanga nuulu tulaalile.
52005011	Huna luulu ng'wilunguja na kwizenga, buli ng'wene na a biye git'umo mukwitilaga na kale.
52005012	Ali luulu badugu, tutogilwe mubitegeleje a batongeeji abo bakwitaga milimo mitaale kulwa nguno ying'we, na kumuhugula muli Seeba.
52005013	Ng'ubinha ikujo itaale mu butogwa kulwa nguno ya nimo uyo bakugwitaga, hama na a bing'we ng'wikale mu mhola buli ng'wene u ku biye.
52005014	Na hangi badugu tulimukomeleja muyubahugula abo batadililaga; na a babo bakugwaga ngholo ng'ubagunaana, na a bagokolo ng'ubaguzuhya. Hangi bizagi biyumilija ku banhu bose.
52005015	Langhanagi atizilonga wa kuyushosha yabubi kulwa kwitilwa yabubi, mubize na nhungwa ja kwiyitila yawiza gwa a bing'we benekili na benekili; pye na a bangi.
52005016	Yegagi gwa-gwa-gwa.
52005017	Lombagi buli lushiku, yaya u koya.
52005018	Lumbagi mu buli mhayo, nguno h'umo buli u butogwa bo ng'wa Mulungu u ku bing'we, u muli Kilisto Yesu.
52005019	Yaya u kunjimya u Moyo;
52005020	hama yaya nu kubudalahija u buhangi.
52005021	Ng'wilola chiza pyi i mihayo mu budeeba, i yawiza ng'widima;
52005022	aliyo lekanagi nayo gete pyi i yabubi.
52005023	Huna luulu leki u Mulungu wa mhola ang'weje wei ng'wenekili, na amulanghane u mu myoyo nu mu ngholo, pyi ni mibili ying'we. Mubize banhu bashikanu, bati na shilingo u mu lushiku lwa kushoka kwa ng'wa Seeba wise Yesu Kilisto.
52005024	Uyo wang'witana ng'wene nsanyiwa, akushikilija duhu.
52005025	Badugu, ng'utulombela na a bise.
52005026	Bagishagi mu kwibbipa kwela pye a badugu.
52005027	Nalimukomeleja muli Seeba giki, i nyaluba yeniyi basomelwe pye a badugu.
52005028	Shigongo sha ng'wa Seeba wise Yesu Kilisto shibize hamo ning'we: Alichene.
53001001	Nene Paulo, hamo na Silwano na Timoteo; ku kanisa ya Batesalonike, iyo ili muli Mulungu Siswe na Seeba Yesu Kilisto.
53001002	Shigongo na mhola shibize hamo ning'we kufuma kuli Mulungu Siswe, na kuli Seeba wise Yesu Kilisto.
53001003	Badugu, shitwigeleelilwe kunumba Mulungu buli gwa kulwa nguno ying'we. Ili yawiza twite giko nguno u kuzunya kwing'we kukujaga kongeja kukula na kubiza na nguzu; nu butogwa wing'we umo ng'witogelilwe buli munhu na ng'wiye bukujaga bongeja kukwila.
53001004	Nose twabizilikumilija u ku kanisa ja ng'wa Mulungu kulwa nguno ying'we. U gwenuyo tuligwita kulwa nguno ya wiyumilija na kuzunya kwing'we nuulu aho mukuluhiagwa na kukoyiwa.
53001005	I yeniyi iloolecha hape giki u bulamuji bo ng'wa Mulungu butungiligije. Huna luulu a bing'we mukubalwa giki ng'wigeleelilwe kubiza mo u mu butemi bo ng'wa Mulungu ubo bukung'wenhelejaga kuluha.
53001006	Aliyo iki u Mulungu ali ntungilija, akubamalila shiili abo bakumuluhyaga.
53001007	Lelo a bing'we abo mukuluhiagwa, akung'wifuuja hamo nise u ng'wikanza lya kwiza kwa ng'wa Seeba Yesu, kufuma ng'wigulu hamo na bamalaika bakwe ba budula.
53001008	Akwiza mu ndali ja moto abinhe nsango abo bataamanile Mulungu, na a babo batatogilwe kujanukula i Nghulu Jawiza ja ng'wa Seeba wise Yesu.
53001009	Bakwinhwa nsango gwa kuyagala welelo bose, binjiwe gete u ku butongi bo ng'wa Seeba, nu ng'wikujo lya budula bokwe.
53001010	U ng'wikanza lya kwiza kwakwe lyenilo, a beela bakwe bakunkumilija, niyo pye a bazunya bakunyegela; na a bing'we mukubiza mo, nguno mubuzunije u bukaaniji wise ubo tukang'winha.
53001011	U mu mhayo gwenuyu tukumulombelaga gwa, giki u Mulungu wise amubale kubiza ng'wigeleelilwe u kubiza mo u mu witanwa, na giki u mu budula bokwe amushikiligije buli mhayo gose, uyo guli gwawiza mu katumamile ka kuzunya kwing'we.
53001012	U mu giko i lina lya ng'wa Seeba wise Yesu likukumilijiwa u mu bing'we, na a bing'we u muli wei, git'umo shili shigongo sha ng'wa Mulungu wise na Seeba Yesu Kilisto.
53002001	Huna luulu badugu, u mhayo gwa kushoka kwa ng'wa Seeba wise Yesu Kilisto, na a bise u kwibilinga kuli wei, tulimulomba
53002002	mutizulelengetiwa wangu-wangu u mu maganiko ging'we. Na hangi yaya u kuzwanjiwa nuulu na moyo nebe. Nuulu ikabiza mihayo ya mbika ki, nuulu yubiza nyaluba ilihayiwa angu yafumile ku bise, iliyomba giki u lushiku lo ng'wa Seeba lwamalile kushika!
53002003	Munhu ose-ose atizumulemba nuulu hado; nguno shiigelile tame wilonge bukenaaguji butaale, na ngomi ntaale iyooleche ha ng'wape. U wei ali ng'wana wa kuyagala,
53002004	uyo ashilemile buli shikolo isho shikitanagwa mulungu, nuulu isho shikalamiagwa. Niyo akwigunguhya higulya ya shose shenisho. Nu mu hekalu ya ng'wa Mulungu akuja akigashe, kunu akwigimbaga giki u wei hu Mulungu!
53002005	I gisi mutizukilaga giki aho naali hamo ning'we nakamuwila i mihayo yeniyo?
53002006	Ni haha mushimanile isho shihangigije, kushisha lishike i likanza lya kwiyoolecha kwakwe ha ng'wape.
53002007	Kwike ahene nuulu i haha u bugomi buliho bukutumamaga; aliyo mu mbika ya mbisila, nguno shitaali shiliho isho shihangigije. Ulu shilinjiwe,
53002008	akwiyoolecha ha ng'wape u ngomi ng'wenuyo. Aliyo u Seeba Yesu akunkenaagula bo myuyi ya mu nomo gokwe, anyagaje n'ikujo lya kushoka gokwe.
53002009	U kwiza kwa ngomi ng'wenuyo kukwiyoolecha mu budula bose bo katumamile ka ng'wa Shetani, na mihayo mitaale ya kukamaaja kulwa kulemba-lemba;
53002010	na mu mbika jose ja mihayo yabubi, ya kongeja kubajimiija a bajimiiji, nguno batatogilwe u kwiyanukula i nghana giki bapijiwe.
53002011	Kulwa nguno yeniyo u Mulungu akubatumilaga nguzu jabubi, bayuzunya ya bulomolomo.
53002012	U mu giko abo batizunije i nghana, abo bakayejiagwa na mihayo yabubi, bakugwilwa nsango.
53002013	Aliyo badugu batogwa ba ng'wa Seeba, a bise shitwigeleelilwe kunumba Mulungu gwa-gwa-gwa kulwa nguno ying'we, iki u Mulungu wamusola kufuma ha wandijo giki mupijiwe mu nzila ya kwejiwa na Moyo, na kulwa kwizunya i nghana.
53002014	Akang'witana mu nzila ya Nghulu Jawiza ijo tukujilomeelaga, giki ng'wanukule ikujo lya ng'wa Seeba wise Yesu Kilisto.
53002015	Huna luulu i haha badugu, handatilagi, ng'widime i mihayo iyo ng'wamala kulangwa mu nzila ya bulomeeji wise, nuulu mu nyaluba jise.
53002016	Nanghwe u Yesu Kilisto, u Seeba wise ng'wenekili nu Mulungu Siswe uyo atutogilwe, uyo hangi wamala kutwinha bulungujiwa bo welelo na welelo, hamo na kwisagilwa kwawiza kulwa shigongo,
53002017	leki ayilunguje i myoyo ying'we, hangi amuguzuhye mu kalungalungile na mu katumamile kose, ako kali kawiza.
53003001	U gwa kumalija badugu, tulombelagi, u mhayo go ng'wa Seeba gusambaale wangu, hangi gwinhwe ikujo git'umo ikujilaga ku bing'we.
53003002	Na giki tupijiwe u ku banhu a bibonya na a bahunga; nguno a banhu bati bazunya pye a bose.
53003003	Aliyo u Seeba iki nsanyiwa, akumuguzuhya na kumulanghana a bing'we u kuli ng'wanishi.
53003004	Tulinsanya Seeba giki iyo tulimukomeleja yeniyi mukwiyita, na hangi mukwita na kutinda ho.
53003005	Nanghwe u Seeba leki ajitongeele i ngholo jing'we mu butogwa bo ng'wa Mulungu na mu wiyumilija bo ng'wa Kilisto.
53003006	Hama tulimukomeleja badugu mu lina lya ng'wa Seeba Yesu Kilisto giki, lekanagi nanghwe buli ndugu uyo ali na nhungwa ja boolo, uyo atushimizilaga mu malange ayo ng'waganukula kufuma ku bise.
53003007	Nguno a bing'we benekili mumanile giki shing'wigelile kutulondeela, iki twali tuti boolo aho twali hamo ning'we.
53003008	Tutanukulile shiliwa sha dalali kufuma kuli munhu ose-ose, aliyo liimi na bujiku twalwishaga milimo midito, nguno twali tutatogilwe kumuna nuulu umo wing'we.
53003009	Twitaga giko iti kulwa kubiza tuti na budula bo kulagija, aliyo kulwa nguno ya kwituula a bise kubiza bulolelo wing'we, giki ning'we muyita git'umo tukwitilaga a bise.
53003010	Nguno na a haho twali hamo ning'we tukamuwila giki, ulu munhu atatogilwe kutumama milimo, nu kulya atizagulya!
53003011	Twandije kwigwa giki bamo na bamo u mu bing'we bakujaga busingija mu kaya ja banhu, nduhu nuulu kutumama nimo; bati na gwabo gete ulu iti kuja bakwishatya-shatyaga duhu!
53003012	Na luulu a banhu ba mbika yeniyo tulibakomeleja na kubahugula muli Seeba Yesu Kilisto balembeele, batumame milimo yabo; nabo bayipandikila shiliwa shabo benekili.
53003013	Aliyo a bing'we badugu, yaya u kugwa ngholo u kwita i yawiza.
53003014	Ulu aligele wa kulema kugwigwa u mhayo gwise uyo tuling'wandikila, mpambukagi u munhu ng'wenuyo, yaya nu kwisangija nanghwe, ading'we minala.
53003015	Kwike yaya u kunola giti ng'wanishi, ng'unghugula giti ndugu.
53003016	Huna luulu u Seeba wa mhola ang'winhe mhola mu yose gwa-gwa-gwa. Seeba abize hamo ning'we bose.
53003017	Ubu wene bugisha mu nkono gwane nene Paulo ng'wenekili, hu lumengho ulo nakutuulaga mu nyaluba jose; h'umo nakwandikilaga.
53003018	Shigongo sha ng'wa Seeba wise Yesu Kilisto shibize hamo ning'we bose pye: Alichene.
54001001	Nene Paulo ntung'wa wa ng'wa Kilisto Yesu, kulwa shilagilo sha ng'wa Mulungu mpija wise, na Kilisto Yesu uyo ali kwisagilwa kwise.
54001002	Kuli Timoteo ng'wana wane gete u mu kuzunya; shigongo na wiza na mhola shibize hamo nangho, kufuma kuli Mulungu Siswe na Kilisto Yesu Seeba wise.
54001003	Ikalaga mo u mu Efeso git'umo nakakukomelegeja aho najaga Makedonia, nguno balimo bangi baliyulanga malange gatatungiligije; ubahugula booye.
54001004	Na hangi batizimanilija kwikala buponya makanza gabo bakudegelekaga ngano, nuulu mahoya ga mihayo iti na bukalikile ya makwihela ga shibyalilwe. I mihayo yeniyo itagunaanaga nuulu hado u mu kuntumamila Mulungu mu kuzunya, ulu iti kwenheleja halali duhu.
54001005	I nguno ya kukwinha u buganikiji wenubu ili giki, bubize ho butogwa ubo bufumile mu ngholo neela na wiyanguji wawiza, na kuzunya kwa nghana.
54001006	Bamo na bamo bakwijimiijaga pyi i yose iyi bayugalukila mahoya ayo gati na solobo!
54001007	Batogilwe kubiza balangi ba shilagilo, aliyo batimanile nuulu hado iyo bakihayaga, nuulu iki bakigambilaga kulomeela na bugimu butaale.
54001008	Tumanile giki i shilagilo shili shawiza kuli munhu ose-ose uyo wizunilija nasho umo shihayilile.
54001009	Kwike ili yawiza kwitegeleja giki, i shilagilo shitatuulilwe kulwa nguno ya ntungilija, shiliho kulwa nguno ya bashitiigwa na a babo balemile kuhang'wa; kulwa basoso, bakenaaguji, banhu ba malofu na badalahi; na kulwa babulagi ba basaabo na baninaabo, hamo na babulagi ba banhu bose-bose!
54001010	Shiliho kulwa nguno ya bajingi, na bagosha abo bakiyitilaga ya minala na bagosha bichabo; na kulwa babisi ba banhu na balomolomo, pye na a babo batashikilijaga bulagane wabo. Shituulilwe kulwa mihayo yose iyo ikachaamaga malange masoga,
54001011	ayo gizuniligije ni Nghulu Jawiza ja ng'wa Mulungu nkumilijiwa; ijo waninha nene.
54001012	Nakunumbaga no u nguzuhya wane u Seeba wise Yesu Kilisto; nguno akanibona nigeleelilwe, unituula u mu nimo gokwe.
54001013	U nene i kwandya naali nsosohaja wa lina lya ng'wa Mulungu, hangi naali nuhya wa banhu, na ng'wibonya! Aliyo nakachilwa shigongo nguno pyi i yeniyo nayitaga mu buchilu-chilu, kulwa butuzunya.
54001014	Huna u muli Kilisto Yesu nitiilwa shigongo shingi, na kuzunya, hamo na butogwa kufuma kuli Seeba wise.
54001015	U mhayo uyu gutungiligije gete, hangi gwigeleelilwe kuzunyiwa na banhu bose; giki: U Kilisto Yesu akiza u mu si kupija ba shibi. U mu benabo, u nene nali wa kwandya!
54001016	Aliyo i nguno iyo ikenheleja nachilwe shigongo yali giki, u muli nene uyo naali nkenaaguji ntaale, u Yesu Kilisto abooleche pyi u wiyumilija bokwe. Bubize ho bulolelo ku bose abo batogilwe kunzunya we, na kwingila mu bupanga bo welelo bose.
54001017	Huna luulu, i haha akumilijiwe na kugongoolwa u Ntemi wa welelo bose, uyo ati wa kuyagala, nuulu kubonwa, u ng'wene h'uyo ali Mulungu umo wike.
54001018	Bebe Timoteo ng'wana wane, i mihayo yeniyi nalikulagila git'umo buhangi bukafunyiwa kulwa nguno yako, giki udule kwilwisha mu kalwile kawiza.
54001019	Ubize na kuzunya, na wiyanguji wawiza u mu moyo; nguno i haha baliho bangi bali mu nhabaala ya kutubila, kulwa kuleka kukudilila u kuzunya.
54001020	Niyo bamo, giti ba Humaneyo na Isikanda, naanekelile Shetani balangwe, booye u kwikala busosohaja lina lya ng'wa Mulungu.
54002001	Ali luulu, u mhayo gwa kwandya nalikomeleja giki kubize ho kwikumbilija na kulomba na kulombela, hamo na kulumba kulwa banhu bose.
54002002	Kulwa basugi na batongeeji bose, giki twikale mu mhola na bulembeezu, n'ikujo mu wela bose.
54002003	U mhayo gwenuyu guli gwawiza, na guzunilijiwe nu Mulungu u mpija wise,
54002004	uyo atogilwe pye a banhu bapile, na bashike mu kwiyitegeleja i nghana.
54002005	Nguno aliho Mulungu umo, na Munhu umo, uyo ali ntuuji wa busangija ha gati ya banhu na Mulungu, ng'wene Kilisto Yesu;
54002006	uyo akifunya wei ng'wenekili kubiza shikomoolelo kulwa nguno ya bose, mhayo uyo gukaanililwe ng'wikanza lyago.
54002007	U nene nakasolwa nutuulwa kubiza nkumucha wa mhayo gwenuyo, na ntung'wa wa kulanga banhu ba mahanga; giki bingile mu kuzunya, na babize batungilija; nalihaya ya nghana natulomalomaga.
54002008	Ali luulu natogilwe giki, buli kwene a bagosha bayulomba babuukije ng'wigulya makono meela, yaya u kusugwa na bupelanu nuulu halali.
54002009	A bakima nabo u kwigaliila kwabo kubize mu kazwalile kalongile; niyo mu bukoonu na budeekanu bo masala, iti mu kushiba nzwili na kuzwalila zahabu na luulu, nuulu myenda ya mpango ntaale.
54002010	Aliyo babize mu shimile isho shibigelile bakima ba nhungwa jawiza, mu kashimizile ka logohano kuli Mulungu.
54002011	U nkima ni ilangage mu bulembeezu na widohya bose.
54002012	Natunzunilijaga u nkima kunanga nuulu kunsuga ngosha, aliyo abize nembeezu.
54002013	Nguno u Adamu hu ng'wene uyo akabumva kwandya huna wiza nu Eva.
54002014	Hama u Adamu atalemba-lembilwe, aliyo u nkima h'uyo akalemva-lemva, ugwa mu bubi.
54002015	Kwike akupijiwa kulwa kubyala baana, ulu wikala mu kuzunya na butogwa na wela na kwilanghana.
54003001	Ulu munhu ukalalwa nimo gwa bulanghani bo kanisa nuulu: buasikofu.', akubiza wikumbagwa nimo gwawiza; u mhayo gwenuyu guli gwa kusanyiwa.
54003002	Huna luulu shing'wigelile u nanghani wa kanisa abize ati na shilingo, abize ngoshi wa nkima umo, ng'wilanghani, ng'witegeleja, ngaliili na ng'wiza-ngholo, hangi amanile kulanga.
54003003	Atizubiza nkolwa wa shikoji nuulu ntuji wa banhu, aliyo abize ng'wiyumilija, ati nyombo, ati ng'wikumvi wa sabo.
54003004	Abize amanile kusuga kaya yakwe, a baana bakwe babize bidohya, hangi banhu b'ikujo.
54003005	(Ulu munhu atamanile kusuga kaya yakwe wei ng'wenekili, akudula ginehe u kwisuga i kanisa ya ng'wa Mulungu?)
54003006	Atizubiza mpya u mu kuzunya, nguno adugije kudoosa agwe mu nsango go ng'wa Shetani.
54003007	Na hangi shing'wigeleelilwe abize akukaanilagwa chiza na a banhu abo bali hanze ya kuzunya, atizubiza wa kuyusaayilwa mihayo, nguno akwitulwa wagwashiwa na lutu lwa ng'wanishi.
54003008	Na a bagunaani nabo shibigelile babize banhu abo bigeleelilwe ikujo, bati na magalu-galu, batizubiza bakolwa-walwa, nuulu batizubiza bayegelile sabo ja bunyeecha.
54003009	Babize bagudimile u mhayo gwa mbisila ya kuzunya mu ngholo neela.
54003010	Nabo a benaba shibigelile bayugeng'wa tame; ulu bubonekana bati na shilingo, bagutumame u nimo gwa bugunaani.
54003011	Na a bake babo nuulu: a bagunaani a bakima.' giko; nabo babize bigeleelilwe ikujo, bati basonghanya, babize balembeezu na bishigwa mu yose.
54003012	Buli ngunaani ing'wigeleelilwe kubiza atoolile nkima umo, na buli ng'wene abize amanile kubalanghana chiza a baana bakwe, pyi ni kaya yakwe.
54003013	Nguno a bagunaani bawiza bakapandikaga isumbi lyawiza, hama bakigalihijaga u mu mhayo gwa kunzunya Kilisto Yesu.
54003014	I mihayo yeniyi nalikwandikila, nuulu iki nalisagilwa kwiza wangu u kuli bebe.
54003015	Natogilwe giki nuulu nudila u kwiza, wikale umanile umo shiigelile kushimizila u mu numba ya ng'wa Mulungu, i kanisa ya ng'wa Mulungu mpanga, iyo ili nghingi na shiganga sha butungilija.
54003016	I mbisila ya logohano kuli Mulungu ili nhaale no, a henaho itiho halali. Akabonekana mu mili, oolechiwa na Moyo giki ali ntungilija, wiloleelwa na bamalaika; ukumuchiwa ku mahanga, wanukulwa mu si, hama utwalwa kwigulya ng'wikujo.
54004001	Aliyo u Moyo akukaanilaga hape giki, u ku shiku ja ku bukalikijo bangi bakukuleka u kuzunya, bayushimizila mu malange ga masamva na myoyo ya kujimiija,
54004002	mu wibeeleja wa banhu balemba-lembi na bagunu, abo wiyanguji bo mu ngholo jabo botindihala, bobiza giti buchuumilijiwe chuma sha moto.
54004003	Bakuyulemeja na mihayo giti ya witooji, nuulu kulya shiliwa isho shibeejiwe na Mulungu, giki shanukulwe mu buyegi na a bazunya abo bayideebile i nghana.
54004004	Nguno buli shiseeng'wa sha ng'wa Mulungu shili shawiza; shitiho sha kuponyiwa u mu shose isho shikanukulagwa mu kulumba.
54004005	I shose shikeejiagwa na mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu na kulomba.
54004006	Ulu uboolekeja a badugu i mihayo yeniyi ukubiza ntumami wa ng'wa Kilisto Yesu, uyo akulile mu mihayo ya kuzunya na ya malange gawiza, ayo ukugalondeelaga.
54004007	Aliyo bulemage pyi u busoso, ni ngano ja nyagikulu; u bebe imanilijage mu mihayo ya wela duhu.
54004008	Nguno nghana i chene iliho solobo u kugumanilija u mili kutumama, kwike iti nhaale. Aliyo u wela buli na solobo mu buli mhayo, hangi buli na kwisagilwa u mu bupanga bo haha, nu ng'wikanza ilo liliza.
54004009	U mhayo gwenuyu guli gwa nghana, na gwigeleelilwe kuzunyiwa.
54004010	H'i nguno yene tukutumamaga mu wiyumilija butaale kugulwilila, iki u kwisagilwa kwise tuntuulilile Mulungu mpanga, uyo ali mpija wa banhu bose; i no-no-no a bazunya.
54004011	Balagilage na kubalanga i mihayo yeniyi;
54004012	atizigela nuulu umo wa kubudalaha u budinha wako. U bebe boolekejage bulolelo a bazunya, u mu kalungalungile nu mu kashimizile, nu mu butogwa; pye nu mu kuzunya, nu mu wela.
54004013	Gudililage u mhayo gwa kubasomela a banhu i shandikwa, ubakomeleja na kubalanga kushisha aho nalize ko.
54004014	Yaya u kushilekanija i shakwinhwa isho uli nasho, isho ukinhwa mu nzila ya buhangi na kutuulilwa makono ga banamhala.
54004015	I mihayo yeniyi igoyelage, hangi wifunye gete kulwa nguno yayo; uboolekeja hape pye a banhu i nhungwa ja kashimizile kako.
54004016	Hama u bebe ng'wenekili ilanghanage, pyi ni yiyo ukwilangaga. Handatilaga mo u mu mihayo yeniyo, nguno ulu wita giko hu ukwipija u bebe, pye na a badegeleki bako!
54005001	U munhu ulu namhala, ntongage mu kwidohya n'ikujo giti so. A basumba lungalungaga nabo giti baana bang'wing'we.
54005002	A bagikulu giti banoko, lelo a bashike giti balumbuyo mu wela bose.
54005003	A bachilwa abo bati na munhu wa kubagunaana, ubagunaana.
54005004	U nchilwa ulu ali na baana nuulu bizukulu, a benaba ni bilangage tame kujiitila yawiza i kaya jabo, bayubiitila yawiza a bataale babo, nguno u mhayo gwenuyu guzunilijiwe nu Mulungu.
54005005	Aliyo u nchilwa uyo ati na wa kungunaana gete, u ng'wenuyo antuulilile Mulungu pyi u kwisagilwa kwakwe makanza gose; liimi na bujiku akadilaga mu kulomba na kulombela.
54005006	Kwike u nchilwa ulu akikalaga mu mihayo ya kuyeja mili gokwe duhu, u ng'wenuyo achile nuulu iki akweshemaga!
54005007	Ni yeniyi balangage, batizugwa mu bubi.
54005008	Hama ulu aliho munhu atabalonjaga a banhu bakwe, i no-no-no a ba mu kaya yakwe, u munhu ng'wenuyo abudalahile u buzunya bokwe, niyo ali wabubi kutinda uyo ati nzunya.
54005009	U nchilwa atizutuulwa u mu shitabo sha bachilwa ulu ataali kushisha myaka makumi atandatu, niyo abize wali nke wa ngosha umo duhu.
54005010	Hangi niyo u nchilwa abize akukaanilagwa giki ali na shitwa shawiza mu mihayo giti ya kulela baana, kugunaana bageni, kooja mhambala ja beela, kugunaana baluhi; abize nondeeji wa buli mhayo gwawiza.
54005011	Aliyo a bachilwa abo bataali bashike, balemage a benabo; nguno u kwikumva kwabo ulu kubaheeba bashikile kwinga u mu kwifunya kwabo u kuli Kilisto, bikumva butoolwa.
54005012	U mu giko bakugwa mu nsango, kulwa nguno ya kulekana nu kuzunya kwabo u kwa kwandya.
54005013	Nguno niyo u mu giko bakwilanga boolo, buyikala bakusingijaga mu kaya ja banhu. Hama batugelela ha mhayo gwa boolo duhu, aliyo bakubiza basigani na bishatya-shatya, hangi bakalomo-njoocho.
54005014	Huna luulu natogilwe a bachilwa a bashike bayutoolwa, babize banisaale, babyale baana. Yaya u kung'winha ng'wanya gwa kutusondagula u ng'wanishi.
54005015	Nguno niyo ni haha baliho bamo bamala kugaluka bubiza balondeeji ba ng'wa Shetani.
54005016	Ulu aliho nshike ali na bachilwa ni abagunaanage, atiziseseja nigo i kanisa. I kanisa ibagunaane a bachilwa abo bati na wa kubagunaana.
54005017	A banamhala, abo bamanile kusuga, shiigelile binhwe ikujo idito ho, i no-no-no abo bakwitaga nimo gwa kulomeela na kulanga.
54005018	Nguno i shandikwa shihayile giki, "I ng'ombe ulu iliita nimo gwa kutula busiga, yaya u kwitunga u ku nomo gwayo." na giki, "U ntumami shing'wigelile kupandika mheela yakwe."
54005019	Yaya u kwanukula bubuulwa bo namhala, ulu batigelile bakaaniji babili nuulu badatu.
54005020	Ubahugula hape-hape abo bali mu nhungwa ja shibi, babize na logohano a bangi.
54005021	Nalikutonga mu welwa-ngholo ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu na bo ng'wa Kilisto Yesu, na ku butongi bo bamalaika basolwa; balangage chiza i mihayo yeniyi, hama yaya u kufumaasi wafunyaga bulamuji, na hangi yaya u kubiza na busolanhya.
54005022	Hama yaya u kutuulila makono munhu wangu-wangu, niyo yaya u bebe u kwisangija mu shibi sha banhu; aliyo ilanghanage wikale uli ng'wela.
54005023	Oyaga u kugelela kung'wa minzi duhu, bizagung'wa na divai ya malingiila, kulwa nguno ya makoye gako ga mu nda, pye na a gangi ayo gakikalaga gukushokela gwa-gwa-gwa buli makanza.
54005024	I shibi sha banhu bamo shili ha ng'wape, niyo shibatongeelile u kuja u mu nsango; aliyo i sha bangi shiliho a ha numa yabo shibalondeelile.
54005025	H'umo ili nu mu milimo i yawiza, nayo ili ha ng'wape, ni yiyo itaali u kumanika nayo itikala ibisilwe makanza gose.
54006001	A basese ni babisaabage a basaabo-bugonzo giki bigeleelilwe ikujo lyose, litizudalahwa i lina lya ng'wa Mulungu, nu bulangi wise.
54006002	Abo bali na basaabo-bugonzo bazunya, yaya u kubibengeleja iki bali badugu, aliyo ni babatumamilage chiza kutinda. Nguno a bazunya abo bakatumamaga chiza, bakabizaga na busangi u mu solobo iyo ikigelaga, iki bali baganja. Balangage i mihayo yeniyi, niyo ubakomeleja gete.
54006003	Ulu munhu ose-ose wandya kulanga mihayo yingi nayo, ulema kudimana nayo iyo yideebelile na ya ng'wa Seeba wise Yesu Kilisto, akubiza wagalemaga a malange a meela.
54006004	U ng'wenuyo ndalahi, na atamanile mhayo gose-gose. Ali na makoye ga buhalali na buyombi bo mihayo iyo ikenhelejaga wilu, wilemeelwa, bugayilija, kwiting'wa kwabubi,
54006005	na wiyugaguji bo shiku jose u mu banhu abo bahuganile masala, abo baamala kwijimiija i nghana, nose bakiganikaga giki u wela ili nzila ya kupandikila solobo!
54006006	Na nghana i chene u mu wela ilimo solobo nhaale, ulu munhu uzunya kwigelwa ni shikolo isho ali nasho.
54006007	Nguno u mu si umu tutizile na shikolo, nose tutiko kwinga na shose-shose.
54006008	Aliyo ulu tupandika shiliwa na shizwalo, tukubiza twapandikaga isho shitwigelile.
54006009	Iki abo bakakoobaga busabi bakagwilaga mu bugeng'wa na mu mbeto, na mu kwikumva kwa nyachilu-chilu kwa buli mbika ja nyakenaaguji, mihayo iyo ikabenhelejaga banhu kujimilila mu kwihiga kutaale, nose kushika mu kuyagala!
54006010	Nguno u kutogwa sabo ili mbuuki ya mihayo ya bubi wa buli mbika, bangi baliho bakwingaga u mu kuzunya kulwa kuguhahaalila u mhayo gwenuyo, nose bakwiyenhelejaga kukenaaguka, kulwa kugwila mu makoye mingi ga kupinihaja!
54006011	Aliyo u bebe munhu o ng'wa Mulungu, ipeelage i yeniyo; londeelaga butungilija, wela, kuzunya, butogwa, wiyumilija na bufula.
54006012	Lwaga kalwiile kawiza ka mu kuzunya; bulanghanage u bupanga bo welelo na welelo ubo ukitanilwa aho ukafunya bukaaniji busoga ku butongi wa banhu bingi.
54006013	Nalikukomeleja ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu, uyo ali ng'winhi wa bupanga ku shose isho shili na bupanga; na ku butongi bo ng'wa Kilisto Yesu, uyo akafunya bukaaniji wawiza ku butongi bo ng'wa Pontio Pilato.
54006014	Shihandatilage i shilagilo shenishi, yaya gete u kushileka nuulu hado. Utizubiza na shilingo, kushisha lishike i likanza lya kwilonga kwa ng'wa Seeba wise Yesu Kilisto.
54006015	U mhayo gwa kwilonga kwakwe akugushikilija ng'wikanza ilo lihelilwe na Mulungu, uyo we wike ali nkumilijiwa wa budula bose; Ntemi wa batemi na Seeba wa baseeba.
54006016	Hu ng'wene umo we wike, uyo ati wa kucha, na apindiwe bung'weku ubo buti bo kwegeelwa. Ataali kubonwa na munhu nuulu umo, na hangi atiho wa kumona na hado yaya. Ikujo na budula shibize kuli we welelo na welelo: Alichene.
54006017	A basabi ba ng'wikanza ili bahugulage batizudoosa, nuulu batizutuula kwisagilwa kwabo ha busabi ubo buti wa kushinga ho; aliyo bang'wisagilwe Mulungu, uyo akatwinhaga shikolo shose mu wila giki tushiyegele.
54006018	Baganikilage babize biiti ba mihayo yawiza, babize basabi mu shitwa shawiza, bazunye kuyugabila na bangi i shikolo; babize biza-ngholo.
54006019	U mu kwita giko bakubiza balibikila sabo boi benekili, bakubiza balituula nsingi gwawiza kulwa shiku ijo jiliza ku butongi, balanukule bupanga bo nghana.
54006020	Bebe Timoteo, shilanghanage gete isho ubikijiwe; lekanaga nayo i mihayo ya malofu, i miduhu na ya halali; iyo ikakumilijiagwa giki ya nyamani, aliyo gutimo nu gwa kusola.
54006021	Baliho bangi bakutalaga binga u mu kuzunya bayushimizila muyo. Shigongo shibize hamo nangho: Alichene.
55001001	Nene Paulo ntung'wa wa ng'wa Kilisto Yesu, kulwa butogwa bo ng'wa Mulungu, git'umo kuli kwisagilwa kwa bupanga ubo buli muli Kilisto Yesu.
55001002	Kuli Timoteo ng'wana wane ntogwa. Shigongo na wiza na mhola shibize hamo nangho kufuma kuli Mulungu Siswe, na kuli Kilisto Yesu Seeba wise.
55001003	Nakunumbaga Mulungu uyo nakanamyaga na ngholo neela, git'umo bakulugenji bane biitilaga. Nataali u koya u kukwizukwa ulu nalilomba liimi na bujiku.
55001004	Na hangi nataali nushizukwa i shisoji shako, huna luulu nali na nghumbu no ja kukubona nayege.
55001005	Nu kuzunya kwako u kwa nghana nakukwizukagwa, uko kwali muli mamayo Loisi i kwandya, na muli noko Eunike; uko namanile hape giki nu muli bebe kulimo.
55001006	Huna luulu kulwa mhayo gwenuyu, nalikwizukija giki, i shakwinha sha ng'wa Mulungu isho ukanukula kufuma aho nakakutuulila makono, shizalabanyage shandye kutumama.
55001007	Nguno u Mulungu atatwinhile moyo gwa booba, aliyo gwa budula na butogwa na masala madeekanu.
55001008	Hu kuhaya yaya u kuding'wa minala u kunkaanila u Seeba wise, nu nene uyo nali ntungwa kulwa nguno yakwe; aliyo zunyaga u kubiza mo u mu busangi bo kuluha kulwa nguno yajo i Nghulu Jawiza, mu budula bo ng'wa Mulungu,
55001009	uyo watupija. Hangi watwitana mu kwitana kwela, iti kulwa wiza bo shitile shise; aliyo kulwa kasolele kakwe na shigongo shakwe, git'umo atwinhilile muli Kilisto Yesu kufuma kale, kuko ikanza litaali kwandya kubiza ho.
55001010	Isho i haha shamalile koolechiwa kulwa nguno ya kwilonga kwakwe u Kilisto Yesu mpija wise, uyo wakwingije u kucha, wenha bupanga na butuucha mu nzila ya Nghulu Jawiza.
55001011	U nene nakatuulwa kubiza nkumucha wajo i Nghulu Jawiza jenijo, na ntung'wa na nangi wa kujilanga ku banhu.
55001012	H'i nguno yene nakuluhaga giki; aliyo natuding'wa minala iki nandeebile uyo nansanije, hama namanile hape giki adugije kushilanghana isho nashibika kuli we, kushisha lushiku lwenulo.
55001013	Iyumiilage i mihayo iyo wa kufuma kuli nene, nguno ili mu kwihela kwa kugunaana, ilanghanage mu kuzunya na butogwa muli Kilisto Yesu.
55001014	I shawiza isho ubikijiwe, shilanghanage mu nguzu ja ngwiyigwa Moyo Ng'wela uyo akwikalaga mu bise.
55001015	Umanile giki pye a bana Asia banipeelile, a ba Figelo na Helimogene bali bamo babo!
55001016	U Seeba ni ichilage shigongo i kaya ya ng'wa Onesifolo, nguno nghangala ningi waluniifuujaga, hama nu butungwa bone atabubonelile minala.
55001017	Nguno na a haho wiza Lumi akashikila kunikooba mu bukomeezu, kushisha unipandika.
55001018	U Seeba ni ang'winhage kuchilwa shigongo u ku butongi bo ng'wa Seeba u mu lushiku lwenulo. Niyo nu bebe wimanile i mihayo iyo wanibeegejaga i Efeso.
55002001	Huna luulu, u bebe ng'wana wane handatilaga kulwa shigongo isho shili muli Kilisto Yesu.
55002002	I mihayo iyo waniigwaga nakwihayaga ku butongi bo banhu bingi, binhage banhu basanyiwa, abo nabo badugije kubalanga bangi.
55002003	Iyumilijage ubize mo nangho u mu buluhi, git'umo ing'wigeleelilwe nshilikale wawiza wa ng'wa Kilisto Yesu.
55002004	Atiho nshilikale uyo atogilwe kunyeja uyo wantuula mu nimo, aliyo u kunu wisangilija na mu milimo yingi hangi.
55002005	Nuulu u munhu ulu wingila mu wigusha kulwa kwitinda na biye, atupandika i mheela ulu atigushije kulondeela umo shili i shilagilo sha wigusha wenubo.
55002006	U nimi uyo akukoya-koyaga na nimo, shiigelile apandike matwajo ga kwandya u mu nimo gwenuyo.
55002007	Gwiganikage chiza uyo naliguhaya, nguno u Seeba akukwinha witegeleja mu yose.
55002008	Ng'wizukagwe u Yesu Kilisto, u wa luganda lo ng'wa Daudi, uyo akajuuka kufuma mu bafu; git'umo jihayilile i Nghulu Jawiza jane,
55002009	ijo jikunenhelejaga kuluha mu butungwa giti nali nkenaaguji. Aliyo nahene u mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu gutiko u kutungwa.
55002010	H'i nguno yene nakwiyumilijaga mu mihayo yose kulwa basolwa, giki nabo u muli Kilisto Yesu banukule ikujo lya welelo na welelo.
55002011	U mhayo gutungiligije, "Nguno ulu tucha hamo nanghwe tukubiza bapanga hamo nanghwe.
55002012	Ulu twiyumilija tukusuga hamo nanghwe; ulu tunema nanghwe akutulema.
55002013	Nuulu twinga u mu kuzunya a bise, u wei akongeja kubiza ng'wishigwa, nguno atudula u kwilema wei ng'wenekili."
55002014	Ubizukija gwa i mihayo yeniyi, hama ubahugula mu welwa-ngholo ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu, giki yaya u kwihalalija kulwa nguno ya mihayo iyo iti na fiilu. U gwenuyu guti na solobo u ku badegeleki, ulu iti kubasambagula duhu.
55002015	U bebe ng'wene komeelaga, wiyooleche giki uli ntumami azunyiwe na Mulungu, uyo ati na nguno ya kuding'wa minala; ugugoloola chiza u mhayo gwa nghana.
55002016	Aliyo i mihayo i miduhu na ya nyachilu-chilu, yihungage; nguno ikongejaga kubingija mu bubi abo bakikuubilijaga.
55002017	Niyo u mhayo gwabo gukongeja kulandaala, gubize giti ilonda limholela-kulimu; u mu banhu ba mbika yeniyo balimo na a ba Humaneyo nu Fileto!
55002018	A banhu benabo bijimiigije i nghana, bandije kuja bakukenaagulaga kuzunya kwa banhu bamo; bakuhayaga giki u bujuuko bomala kushika!
55002019	Aliyo nahene u nsingi go ng'wa Mulungu gutaali u kugaluka umo gwimiililile: u lumengho lwago luhayile giki, "U Seeba abamanile a bakwe," na giki, "Buli ng'wene uyo akulihayaga lina lya ng'wa Seeba ni alekanage nu bubi."
55002020	Kwike u mu kaya ja banhu shitabizaga mo shiseme shiteemagizu duhu, giti sha zahabu na sha feza, ni sha manti shikabizaga mo, pyi ni sha malongo; shingi shikabizaga sha milimo y'ikujo, shingi sha milimo ya giko-giko duhu.
55002021	Huna luulu ulu munhu wiyeeja, winga u mu mihayo iyo iti y'ikujo, akubiza shiseme sh'ikujo, isho shibeejiwe na kwejiwa kulwa nguno ya ng'wa Seeba, giki shiigeleelwe kutumama buli nimo gwawiza, uyo shibeejiwe kulwago.
55002022	Aliyo u bebe gupeelage u kwikumva kwa shaaluki, udimane na butungilija, kuzunya, butogwa na mhola; ubize na busangi na banhu abo bakulihayaga lina lya ng'wa Seeba mu ngholo neela.
55002023	Ilemage i mihayo ya nyachilu-chilu iyo ifumile mu butumana, nguno managa giki i mihayo yeniyo ikabyalaga wilemeelwa.
55002024	U ntumami wa ng'wa Seeba atigeleelilwe kubiza nyombo, aliyo shiigelile abize nembeezu ku banhu bose, abize adugije kulanga na ng'wiyumilija.
55002025	Abize amanile kubatonga mu widohya abo batogilwe halali, nguno hamo u Mulungu adugije kubinha moyo gwa kugaluka na koya u bubi, bayitegeleje i nghana yose,
55002026	bingile mu masala madeekanu. Binge u mu ntego go ng'wanishi umo wali wabagwasha ubataliginja na kubatuula mu busese bo kwita iyo atogilwe wei ng'wenekili!
55003001	Na mhayo gungi guyu gumanage, u mu shiku ja ku bukalikijo gakubiza ho makanza ga kwihiga.
55003002	Nguno a banhu bakwitogwa boi benekili duhu, hama bakutogwa sabo; niyo bakubiza bikumilija, badooshi, badalahi, bashitiigwa ku babyaji babo, batamanile kulumba, na bati beela.
55003003	Bakubiza batamanile kusaatwa bichabo, batalekejaga, balembekeja, bati bilanghani, bakalahu mu lulimi, batatogilwe mihayo mitengeke.
55003004	Bakubiza bijomboki, bibonya, bikumilija, batogilwe mihayo ya kwiyeja boi benekili kutinda kuntogwa Mulungu.
55003005	U mu kubalola ba kubiza giti bali beela, aliyo i nguzu ja wela bajilemile. A benaba lekanaga nabo gete!
55003006	Nguno bamo babo h'abo batogilwe kuguukuuba kuja mu kaya ja bakima bachilu-chilu; bali banhu abo bakatongeelagwa na kwikumva kwa buli mbika, nguno babunilwe shibi!
55003007	Ahene u kwilanga bakomeezu, aliyo balemeelilwe u kushikiila a ha nghana yenekili.
55003008	Git'umo Yaane na Yambule bakalema butongeeji bo ng'wa Musa; na a benaba nabo bilemile i nghana, nguno a masala gabo gamala kubipa, batimo u mu kuzunya.
55003009	Aliyo nahene batusegenela, nguno u bubi wabo bukumanika ku banhu bose, git'umo ikajila nu ku bangi abo.
55003010	Aliyo u bebe wimanile iyo nakwilangaga u nene, pyi ni nhungwa jane ujimanile; ni yiyo nakwikoobaga, nu kuzunya kwane, nu bushisha-ngholo bone, nu butogwa bone, nu wiyumilija bone;
55003011	pyi ni ya buluhiwa ubo bukanigwila nali Antiokia na Ikonio na Lustila. Ubumanile pyi u buluhi ubo nabubitila kulwa kwiyumilija, nu mumo wanipigija u Seeba u mu yose yeniyo!
55003012	Na nghana pye abo batogilwe shimizile ya wela muli Kilisto Yesu bakuluhiwa.
55003013	Lelo a banhu babubi na a bibeeleja, a bene bakongeja kukula u mu bubi, bakongeja kulemva, na a boi kulemba banhu!
55003014	Aliyo u bebe shimizilaga mo duhu u mu mihayo iyo wamala kwilanga na kwiyanukula; nguno umanile ukilanga kufuma kuli nani.
55003015	Na hangi ushimanile kufuma ha budo wako i shandikwa sheela, isho shidugije kukwita kubiza ng'witegeleja kushisha kwingila mu bupiji, kulwa kunzunya Kilisto Yesu.
55003016	Pye i shandikwa shihaahililwe myuyi ya ng'wa Mulungu, hangi shibeelelile u mu nimo gwa kulanga, kuhama, kuhugula, na kutongeela mu butungilija;
55003017	giki u munhu wa ng'wa Mulungu ashikanyiwe, abize amaliilile ku buli nimo gwawiza.
55004001	Nalikukomeleja ku butongi bo ng'wa Mulungu na bo ng'wa Kilisto Yesu, uyo akubalamula pye a banhu, a bapanga na a bafu, u ng'wikanza lya kwilonga kwakwe mu butemi bokwe.
55004002	Gulomeelage u mhayo, bizaga umaliilile buli ikanza: libize ulihelile nuulu ilo utalihelile; hamaga, hugulaga, ganikilaga mu wiyumilija na kalangile kose.
55004003	Nguno likushika ikanza bakoya u kudegeleka a malange a masoga, bakuyikala bakwalilijaga balangi ba buli mbika, ba kuyubabaabaata u ku matu na mihayo ya kulenganila na kwikumva kwabo!
55004004	Niyo bakugasaamya a matu gabo u ku ya nghana, bagagaluche gabize ga kudegelekela suusu duhu!
55004005	Aliyo u bebe bizaga na masala madeekanu mu buli mhayo; ubize ng'wiyumilija nuulu mu makoye; gutumamage u nimo gwa kujilomeela i Nghulu Jawiza, ugushikilije u nimo gwako.
55004006	Nguno u nene naamalile kufunyiwa giti shitambo, i likanza lya kwinga kwane lyashikaga.
55004007	Naabulwishije chiza u bulugu mu kugulanghana u kuzunya, naalukalichaga u ludiima lwane.
55004008	U ku nghalilo ya yose u mu lushiku lwenulo, iliho mheela ya butungilija, iyo natuulililwe; ngikili ya nyatemi, iyo akuninha u Seeba, u Namuji ntungilija. Hangi niyo iti nene duhu, aliyo pye na a bangi abo bakuyegelile u kwilonga kwakwe.
55004009	Itaga wize u kuunu wangu,
55004010	nguno u Dema wanilekile, watogilwe ya mu si, wajile Tesalonike. U Kulesite wajile Galatia, u Tito nanghwe Dalimatia.
55004011	Luka duhu h'uyo ali hamo nane. Ulu ulabuuke kwiza ng'wizanage nu Maliko, nguno akunigunaana hataale u mu nimo.
55004012	U Tikiko nantumile Efeso.
55004013	I kabbuudi ya mbeho iyo nakileka Tiloa ha ng'wa Kalipo yenhanijage ulu uliza, pyi ni shitabo, i no-no-no i sha ndili.
55004014	U Isikanda u nsuji wa chuma waniitila mihayo mingi i yabubi, u Seeba akung'winha mheela ya kwigeleelwa shitwa shakwe.
55004015	Nu bebe nkangukage, nguno a bise watwihalalijaga kibi no iyo twihayaga!
55004016	A ha busombooji wa kwandya u ng'wikanza lya bubuulwa bone, atigelile nuulu umo wa kwimiila hamo nane, pye bakanileka; u Seeba ni atizagubabalila bubi u mu mhayo gwenuyo.
55004017	Kwike u Seeba akimiila hamo nane uniguzuhya, kulwa giki u bulomeeji wa Nghulu Jawiza bushikilijiwe kubitila muli nene, pye a banhu ba mahanga bigwe, h'i chene nakapijiwa kufuma u mu nomo gwa shimba.
55004018	Niyo u Seeba akongeja u kunipija kufuma mu buli nimo gwabubi, na akunishisha mhola u mu butemi bokwe u bo ng'wigulu. Ikujo libize kuli we welelo na welelo: Alichene.
55004019	Ngishage u Piliska nu Akula, hamo ni kaya ya ng'wa Onesifolo.
55004020	U Elasto akasaaga Kolinto, aliyo u Tulofimo u ng'wene akasaata nuneka Mileto.
55004021	Anguhaga u kwiza kuko i mbeho ya mu shiyaga itaali kwandya. Alikugisha u Ebulo nu Pude, nu Lino, nu Kilaudio, pye na a badugu a bangi.
55004022	Seeba abize hamo na moyo gwako. Shigongo shibize hamo nangho: Alichene.
56001001	Nene Paulo nsese o ng'wa Mulungu, na ntung'wa o ng'wa Yesu Kilisto, kulwa kubagunaana basolwa ba ng'wa Mulungu mu kuzunya kwabo; bayitegeleje i nghana iyo yigwindanije na wela,
56001002	kulwa nguno ya kwisagilwa kwa bupanga wa welelo na welelo, ubo Mulungu, uyo atiko kulomaloma, watwisagija kufuma kale, kuko ikanza litaali kwandya kubiza ho.
56001003	Huna aho lyang'wa i likanza, ugoolecha u mhayo gokwe mu nzila ya bulomeeji ubo nakinhwa nene git'umo shili shilagilo sha ng'wa Mulungu mpija wise.
56001004	Kuli Tito, ng'wana wane gete mu busangi wa kuzunya; shigongo na mhola shibize hamo nangho kufuma kuli Mulungu Siswe, na kuli Seeba Yesu Kilisto Mpija wise.
56001005	Nakakuleka ko i Kuleti giki wigolanye i milimo iyo yigelile kwitwa, na giki uyutuula banamhala mu buli nzengo git'umo nakakutongeelela.
56001006	Uyo igeleelilwe kutuulwa ha bunamhala abize ati na shilingo, atoolile nkima umo. A baana bakwe babize bazunya, na bati na lukumo lwa buluulu, nuulu bulambu.
56001007	Nguno u nanghani wa kanisa ng'wene mikijiwa o ng'wa Mulungu, huna luulu shing'wigelile abize ati na shilingo, ati wa kwiyeja wei ng'wenekili duhu. Ati ng'wangu kupelana, ati nkolwa-walwa, ati ntuji banhu, nuulu ati nchooji wa shikolo mu nzila ja minala.
56001008	Aliyo abize ng'wiza-ngholo, munhu uyo atogilwe mihayo yawiza, ng'witegeleja, ntungilija, ng'wela, ng'wilanghani.
56001009	Abize agudimile mu wishigwa u mhayo umo guhayilile; u mu giko h'akudula kuganikila mu kalangile kawiza, na kubahuumuja a bahalali.
56001010	Nguno baliho bingi a bashitiigwa, bayombi ba mihayo iti mu nzila, na balomolomo ba balomolomo; i no-no-no a ba ng'wigele lya basaalwa.
56001011	Shiigelile bayuhuumujiwa a benabo, nguno bakuhumbuulaga kaya ngima ja banhu, kulwa kulanga mihayo ya kwipandikila solobo mu nzila ja minala, mhayo uyo gutigelile bagwite.
56001012	Umo wa bahangi babo ahayile giki, "A bana Kuleti bene balomolomo pyi i shiku, shiinu ja malofu, balaku ba balaku, niyo hangi boolo!"
56001013	U bukaaniji wenubu butungiligije. Huna luulu bahamage na bukali bagoloole u kuzunya kwabo.
56001014	Booye u kwikala budegeleka ngano ja Bayudaya, na shilagilo sha banhu abo bakwihubyaga i nghana.
56001015	Pye i shikolo shili sheela u ku beela, aliyo u ku basoso na bashitiigwa shitiho i sheela, nguno a maganiko gabo masoso, pyi nu wiyanguji wa mu ngholo jabo.
56001016	A banhu giti benaba batogilwe u kwihaya giki bandeebile u Mulungu, aliyo u mu shitile shabo banemile. Banhu ba malofu na bashitiigwa, niyo batigeleelilwe mu nimo gose-gose u gwawiza!
56002001	Aliyo u bebe hoyaga nabo mihayo mitengeke, ya malange magumunguku.
56002002	A banamhala babize na masala madeekanu, banhu abo bigeleelilwe kwinhwa ikujo. Babize bitegeleja na bapanga u mu kuzunya nu mu butogwa, pyi nu mu wiyumilija.
56002003	Giko na a bagikulu, nabo babize na nhungwa j'ikujo, bati balembekeja, batizusugwa mhayo go bung'wi, babize balangi ba mihayo ya longe.
56002004	Bayubalanga a bashike kubatogwa a bagoshi babo na a baana babo;
56002005	na kubiza bitegeleja, beela, bakomeezu u mu milimo ya mu kaya. Babize bawiza na bidohya u ku bagoshi babo, gutizudalahwa u nimo go ng'wa Mulungu.
56002006	A basumba nabo ubahugula babize balembeezu.
56002007	U bebe ng'wenekili u mu katumamile kako ka milimo yose boolekejage bulolelo busoga, ubize uti na shilingo, nu mu kalangile kako ubize n'ikujo.
56002008	Hangi ubize na mihayo ilongile, iyo itudula kudalahijiwa; u munhu uyo atogilwe kutuhaya kibi agayiwe u gwabubi, agooke.
56002009	A basese ni babizage bidohya mu yose u ku basaabo-bugonzo, babayeje, babize bati ba kwikala bishokeja nabo mihayo.
56002010	Hangi batizubiza banyeecha ba shikolo, aliyo booleche mu yose giki bali basanyiwa na bawiza, a kalangile ka ng'wa Mulungu mpija wise kakujiwe mu yose.
56002011	Nguno i shigongo sha ng'wa Mulungu shiliho kulwa kubapija pye a banhu .
56002012	Shikutulangaga kubulema u busoso nu kwikumva kwa mu si, u ng'wikanza lya haha ; na tubize bitegeleja na beela,
56002013	aho tutaali tukulindiilaga kwisagilwa kwa kuyeja na kwilonga kw'ikujo lya ng'wa Yesu Kilisto, uyo ali Mulungu na mpija wise ntaale.
56002014	U wei akifunya ng'wenekili kulwa nguno yise, giki atukomoole kwinga mu bubi bose, ibeegeje banhu bakwe ba wikomangile, beela, na bakalalilwe kwita yawiza.
56002015	Bawilage i mihayo yeniyi, ubakomeleje na kubahugula mu budula bose. Niyo utizung'winha munhu nuulu umo ng'wanya gwa kukudalaha.
56003001	Ubizukija babize bidohya u ku batongeeji, na bigwi u ku basugi; babize bachaguku ku buli nimo gwawiza.
56003002	Yaya u kubiza badukani nuulu bayombo; babize biyumilija, hangi booleche widohya butaale ku banhu bose.
56003003	Nguno na a bise i kale twali bachilu-chilu, na bashitiigwa. Twali mu bulemva-lemva wa kutumamila buli mbika ja kwikumva, na kwiyeja mu mihayo ya malofu. Na twali banhu ba wilu na ba kwikala twikolagwa bise benekili na benekili.
56003004	Aliyo u wiza nu butogwa bo ng'wa Mulungu Mpija wise aho wilonga,
56003005	utupija. Kwike iti kulwa nguno twali twabeeja shitile sha butungilija, aliyo kulwa shigongo shakwe. Utupija mu nzila ya kutooja kulwa kubyalwa bupya, na kwitwa kubiza bapya mu nzila ya ng'wa Moyo Ng'wela,
56003006	uyo akatwitiila muli Yesu Kilisto Mpija wise.
56003007	Nose yubiza giki, u mu kubalilwa butungilija kulwa shigongo shakwe, tubize bingiji git'umo kuli u kwisagilwa kwa bupanga bo welelo na welelo.
56003008	U gwenuyu guli mhayo gwa kusanyiwa. Huna luulu natogilwe wisomboole mu bugaliili pyi i yose yeniyi, abo banzunije Mulungu bakalalwe kugatumamila a makanza gabo mu shitwa shawiza. I mihayo yeniyi pyi i yose ili yawiza, hangi ili na solobo u ku banhu.
56003009	Aliyo i ya buhalali wa nyachilu-chilu na ya kwihela kwa mashibyalilwe, nuulu ya wilemeelwa na kwikenya kulwa nguno ya shilagilo, lekanaga nayo i yeniyo, nguno iti na solobo na hangi miduhu.
56003010	U munhu uyo atogilwe mihayo ya wilemeelwa nghugulage kamo nuulu kabili, hama lekanaga nanghwe!
56003011	Managa giki u munhu giti ng'wenuyo akwitaga yabubi nguno ahuganile, niyo akwilamulaga wei ng'wenekili.
56003012	Ulu nalantume Alitema nuulu Tikiko kwiza uko uli, u bebe nzugu wangu Nikopoli; nakubiza kwenuko nguno naabonile nakulimalila kwene i likanza lya mbeho ya mu shiyaga.
56003013	U Zena u mani wa shilagilo nu Apolo, batumage bize wangu, na hangi balola-lolelage sha kwigunaanila mu nzila, batizukoya.
56003014	Niyo a banhu bise ni bilangage kwita yawiza, bayugunaana aho buliho bugehelwa, batizubiza bati na matwajo.
56003015	Pye abo bali hamo nane balikugisha. Bagishage abo batutogilwe mu kuzunya. Shigongo shibize hamo ning'we bose: Alichene.
57001001	Nene Paulo ntungwa kulwa ng'wa Kilisto Yesu, na ndugu Timoteo. Kuli ntumami ng'wichiswi ntogwa Filimoni,
57001002	n'ilumbu lise Afia, hamo na nshilikale ng'wichiswi Alikipo; ni kanisa iyo ikibilingaga mu kaya yako.
57001003	Shigongo na mhola shibize hamo ning'we kufuma kuli Mulungu Siswe, na kuli Seeba wise Yesu Kilisto.
57001004	Nakunumbaga u Mulungu wane, bul'ikanza ulu nalikuhaya u mu kulomba kwane.
57001005	Nguno nakujiigwaga i nghulu ja kuzunya kwako, nu butogwa wako umo untogelilwe u Seeba Yesu, na a beela pye a bose.
57001006	Na luulu nalikulomba u buzunya wako ubutumamile mu busangi, huna ukwideeba mu nghana pyi i yawiza iyo ili yise muli Kilisto.
57001007	Naayegile no, hangi naalungujiwe no ndugu wane, kulwa butogwa wako; nguno ojizalabanije i ngholo ja beela.
57001008	Huna luulu, nuulu iki u muli Kilisto nali nabo u bugimu bo kukulagila iyo yigelile wiyite,
57001009	aliyo ili yawiza nakulombe, kulwa nguno ya butogwa. U nene Paulo na bunamhala bone giki, uyo i haha nali ntungwa kulwa ng'wa Kilisto Yesu.
57001010	Nalikulomba kulwa nguno ya ng'wa Onesimo, u ng'wana wane muli Kilisto; uyo naamyalile mu butungwa bone.
57001011	Na nghana wali ati na solobo u kuli bebe i kwandya; aliyo i haha ali na solobo u kuli bebe nu kuli nene.
57001012	U munhu ng'wenuyo nuulu iki nalikushokeja; aliyo i chene u wei ali bupanga bone gete.
57001013	Niyo naali natogilwe kwikala nanghwe nene, ayunigunaana ha ng'wanya gwako u mu nimo gwa Nghulu Jawiza, aho nataali natungilwe.
57001014	Kwike naabonile iti chiza niite mhayo gose-gose aho nataali kugamana a maganiko gako; utiziita mhayo gwawiza mu buhadikijiwa, aliyo wite mu kwifunya.
57001015	Nguno hamo h'i chene akakwingila ng'wikanza iguhi, giki abize wako shiku jose ja welelo na welelo;
57001016	aliyo iti mu busese. I haha akilile a ha busese; u kuli nene ali ndugu ntogwa, lelo u kuli bebe na kutinda ho: u mu mili nu muli Seeba!
57001017	Huna luulu, ulu ulinisanya giki nali ntumami ng'wiyo, ng'wanukulage giti ulinanukula nene.
57001018	Hama nuulu wakuhuba mhayo gose-gose, nuulu hamo ali na bugasa kuli bebe, bubalilage kuli nene.
57001019	Nene Paulo nandika na nkono gwane ng'wenekili giki nakulipa, nati na nguno ya kuhaya giki u bebe hu uli na bugasa u kuli nene.
57001020	Alichene ndugu wane, nigunaanage mu giko u muli Seeba, ubuyeje muli Kilisto u bupanga bone.
57001021	Nalikwandikila mu kusanya giki ukwita na kutinda umo nalikuwilila, nguno nabumanile u wigwi boko.
57001022	Hama niyo nalisagilwa nakushoshiwa ku bing'we kulwa kulomba kwing'we; ali luulu, nilonja-longejage na ha kushikila.
57001023	U Epafula u ntungwa ng'wichane muli Kilisto Yesu alikugisha,
57001024	na a batumami bichane a ba Maliko nu Alistako nu Dema, hamo nu Luka, nabo balikugisha.
57001025	Shigongo sha ng'wa Seeba Yesu Kilisto shibize hamo na moyo gwako: Alichene
58001001	I kale u Mulungu walungalungaga nabo a bakulugenji bise nghangala ningi mu nzila ja mbika na mbika, kubitila mu bahangi.
58001002	Aliyo u mu shiku ja ku bukalikijo iji, walungalungile nise mu nzila ya Ng'wana, uyo antuulile kubiza ng'wingiji wa shikolo shose; niyo i shiseeng'wa shose pye akashibeeja mu nzila yakwe u ng'wenuyo.
58001003	U wei ali kwaaka kw'ikujo lya ng'wa Mulungu, na suso yakwe umo ali gete; hama pyi i shikolo ashidimile na mhayo gwa budula bokwe. Aho wamala kutuula nzila ya kweja shibi, wigasha ku nkono gwa bulyo ; kwikujo lya busugi bo ng'wigulu.
58001004	Hu ng'wene u ntaale kukila pye a bamalaika, nguno u wei ali ng'wingiji wa lina itaale kutinda lyabo.
58001005	I gisi u Mulungu wabita kung'wila malaika ki giki, "U bebe uli Ng'wana wane, i lelo iyi naakubyalaga?" Nuulu hangi giki, "U nene nakubiza Ise; u wei akubiza Ng'wana wane?"
58001006	Na a haho wang'wenha mu si u Myalwa wa kwandya uhaya giki, "Pye a bamalaika ba ng'wa Mulungu banamye wei."
58001007	Lelo u ku bamalaika alihaya, "Hu ng'wene akiitaga bamalaika bakwe kubiza myoyo, a batumami bakwe kubiza ndali ja moto."
58001008	Aliyo u kuli Ng'wana alihaya giki, "I lisumbi lyako lya butemi Mulungu, lil'isumbi lya welelo bose; nu nangha gwako gwa butemi guli nangha gwa butungilija.
58001009	Ee Mulungu, u butungilija ubutogilwe, aliyo u bushitiigwa ubukolilwe; h'i nguno yene u Mulungu wako wakubilile maguta ga buyegi kutinda a biyo."
58001010	Alihaya na giki, "Seeba, a ha wandijo wa yose ukagutuula bebe u nsingi gwa si, ni ligulu lili nimo gwa makono gako.
58001011	I shenishi shikubita, aliyo u bebe uli wa kushinga ho; i shingi pyi shikukuluhala giti shizwalo.
58001012	Niyo ukushilingalinga giti myenda, na shikugaluchiwa giti shizwalo. Aliyo u bebe uli git'umo uli duhu, ni myaka yako iti ya kushila."
58001013	Na hangi ong'wila malaika ki ikanza lyose-lyose giki, "Igashaga ku nkono gwane gwa bulyo, kushisha nabatuule a banishi bako ha silili ya mhambala jako?"
58001014	Angu, a bamalaika a bose bati myoyo mitumami, iyo ikatumagwa kulwa nguno ya babo bakubiza bingiji u mu bupiji?
58002001	Huna luulu, a bise shitwigelile kwidilila na bukalalwa butaale i mihayo iyo twayigwile, tutizuselemiwa tukileka.
58002002	Nguno ulu gwali na nguzu u mhayo uyo gukahayiwa mu nzila ya bamalaika, na buli bubi nuulu bushitiigwa wanukulaga mheela mu butungilija;
58002003	hu kuhaya a bise tukupila ginehe, ulu tuleka kubudilila bupiji butaale giti wenubu? U boi bukandya busomboolwa na Seeba ng'wenekili, hama u ku bise bukaanilwa na a babo bakang'wigwa.
58002004	U kunu u Mulungu nanghwe akujaga oolecha bukaaniji bokwe mu kwita shimanikijo na mihayo mingi ya kukumya na ya budula, na kuntuma Moyo Ng'wela mu kagabanhije ka mbika ningi, git'umo atogelilwe we ng'wenekili.
58002005	Nguno i si iyo tukwihayaga giki ikubiza ho, atituulile ha silili ya busugi bo bamalaika.
58002006	Aliyo aliho umo akaanilile ng'wipandi ilebe alihaya giki, "U munhu nanghwe ali shikolo ki, nose ung'wizukwe? U ng'wana wa munhu ali ki, nose unole?
58002007	Ukang'wita kubiza ha silili ya bamalaika ng'wikanza ido, unzwalika ngikili y'ikujo na bukumilijiwa.
58002008	Pye i shikolo ushituula ha silili ya mhambala jakwe!" Nguno u Mulungu aho washituula pyi i shikolo ha silili ya busugi bokwe, atalekeelile nuulu shimo giki shibize shiti ha silili yakwe. Kwike i haha tutaali u kushibona pyi i shikolo kubiza ha silili yakwe.
58002009	Aliyo tulibona giki, ng'wikanza ido u Yesu akiitwa kubiza ha silili ya bamalaika, huna uzwalikwa ngikili y'ikujo na bukumilijiwa; nguno akaluhiwa mu kucha, ibize giki u mu shigongo sha ng'wa Mulungu, aliloje i licha kulwa banhu bose.
58002010	U wei uyo shose na shose shiliho kulwa nguno yakwe na mu nzila yakwe, gukanyeja u gwa kunshikanya mu nzila ya kuluhiwa u Ng'winhi wa bupiji, na Ntongeeji o baana bingi kwingila ng'wikujo.
58002011	Nguno u wei na a babo bakwejiagwa bali na fumo imo, h'i nguno yene atiko kuding'wa minala u kubahaya giki bali baana ba ng'wawe.
58002012	Git'umo alihayila giki, "Nakulikumucha i lina lyako u ku baana ba ng'wise, nakukwimbila ha gati y'ibita kulwa kukugongoola."
58002013	Hama hangi, "Nakuntuulila we u kusanya kwane;" na hangi giki, "Nene naliho aha hamo na a baana abo Mulungu waninhile."
58002014	Huna luulu iki a baana bali banhu ba mininga na mili, nu ng'wene akabiza na busangi u mu yeniyo, giki u mu kucha kwakwe adule kunyagaja u Shetani, uyo ali na budula bo lufu.
58002015	Abatungule pye abo mu bulamu wabo bose bali mu busese kulwa kogoha icha!
58002016	Nguno atasolile nimo gwa kugunaana bamalaika, aliyo gwa kugunaana bubyile bo ng'wa Abulahamu.
58002017	H'i nguno yene akabiza git'umo bali a baana ba ng'wawe mu mbika jose, giki abize Ngabiji Ntaale wa shigongo, uyo ali nsanyiwa u mu mihayo ya ng'wa Mulungu; abize shitambo kulwa shibi sha banhu.
58002018	U wei iki akaluha aho akageng'wa, hu kuhaya adugije kubagunaana abo bakugemagwa.
58003001	Huna luulu badugu beela, abo muli na busangi u mu kwitanwa kwa ng'wigulu, ng'wideedenghanyagi u Ntung'wa na Ngabiji Ntaale ng'wenuyo; u Yesu uyo tukunkaanilaga.
58003002	U wei wali ng'wishigwa u kuli Mulungu uyo ansolile, git'umo wali nu Musa u mu kaya ya ng'wa Mulungu.
58003003	Kwike u Yesu abalilwe kubiza n'ikujo kutinda Musa; git'umo meeja wa kaya shiigelile akujiwe kutinda i kaya yenekili.
58003004	Nguno buli kaya ikabeejiagwa na munhu nebe, aliyo u meeja wa shose ng'wene Mulungu.
58003005	Huna luulu u Musa wali nsanyiwa mu mihayo yose u mu kaya ya ng'wa Mulungu, giti ntumami kulwa bukaaniji bo mihayo iyo yali yigelile kuhayiwa ku shiku ja ku butongi.
58003006	Aliyo u Kilisto u ng'wene Ng'wana, nsugi wayo gete i kaya ya ng'wa Mulungu; a bise hu tuli ba mu kaya yeniyo, ulu tubuhandatila kushisha ku ngelelo u bushisha-ngholo, nu wisagijiwa ubo tukubuyegelaga.
58003007	Nose h'i nguno yene u Moyo Ng'wela alihaya giki, "I lelo ulu muliigwe ilaka lyakwe,
58003008	yaya u kuganghanaja i ngholo jing'we; git'umo ng'witilaga mu bushitiigwa wing'we, aho ng'wali ku matogolo ng'wikanza lya kunigema.
58003009	Aho banigemaga a bakulugenji bing'we giki banibone; nghana bakashibona i shitwa shane, kushisha ikanza lya myaka makumi ane.
58003010	H'i nguno yene nakashipelanila i shibyalilwe shenisho; nuhaya giki, 'A benaba bali babubi gwa u mu ngholo jabo, ni nzila jane batajimanile!'
58003011	Nose nakilahila kulwa bupelanu bone giki, 'Batiko kwingila u mu kwifuula kwane!' "
58003012	Ali luulu badugu, ilanghanagi atizilonga nuulu umo wing'we uyo ali na ngholo yabubi, ya butuzunya, nose inge u kuli Mulungu mpanga.
58003013	Ng'wihugula buli lushiku ulo lukuhayiagwa giki lelo; atizilonga nuulu umo wing'we wa kuguna kulwa shibi.
58003014	Nguno tukubiza tuli na busangi u muli Kilisto ulu tudimana nako u kuzunya kwise u kwa ha wandijo kushisha ku ngelelo.
58003015	H'umo guhayilile u mhayo giki, "I lelo ulu muliigwe ilaka lyakwe, yaya u kuganghanaja i ngholo jing'we, git'umo ng'witilaga mu bushitiigwa wing'we."
58003016	I gisi abo bakigwa aliyo hu bubiza bashitiigwa baali banani, ulu bati pye abo bakafuma Misili ha silili ya butongeeji bo ng'wa Musa?
58003017	Al'abo bakampelanya ikanza lya myaka makumi ane baali banani, ulu bat'abo bakabiza bakenaaguji, abo mibimba yabo ikagwila ku matogolo?
58003018	Al'abo akabilahilila giki batiko kwingila mu kwifuula kwakwe baali banani, ulu bati abo baali bashitiigwa?
58003019	Huna luulu, tulibona giki a benabo bakalemeelwa u kwingila kulwa nguno ya butuzunya!
58004001	Nose iki u wisagijiwa bo kwifuula butaali buliho, togohagi atizilonga nuulu umo wing'we wa kuleba u kwingila mo.
58004002	Nguno na a bise tukulomeelagwa i Nghulu Jawiza git'umo yajilaga nu kubo; kwike u mhayo uyo bakagwigwa gutabagunaanile, nguno gutamanhije na kuzunya u mubo a badegeleki.
58004003	Aliyo a bise abo tuzunije tulimo u mu kwifuula, git'umo ahayilile; giki, "Kushisha nakilahila kulwa bupelanu bone nuhaya, 'Batiko kwingila u mu kwifuula kwane.' " I milimo i yene yamala-majiwa kufuma kale ha kuseeng'wa kwa si.
58004004	Nguno liliho ipandi ilebe aliluhaya lushiku lwa mpungati giki, "Huna u mu lushiku lwa mpungati u Mulungu akifuula pyi i milimo yakwe."
58004005	Aliyo hangi na a henaha alihaya giki, "Batiko kwingila u mu kwifuula kwane!"
58004006	Hu kuhaya itaali idulikanile bamo na bamo kwingila moi, nuulu iki abo bakalomeelwa i kale bakaduuma u kwingila kulwa bushitiigwa wabo.
58004007	H'i chene atuulile lushiku lungi hangi ulo aliluhaya giki, "Lelo," git'umo akahayila muli Daudi ha numa ya kubita ikanza ilihu. Umo ahayilile kufuma kale giki, "I lelo ulu muliigwe ilaka lyakwe, yaya u kuganghanaja i ngholo jing'we."
58004008	Nguno u Yoshwa ulu ni wabifuuja, u Mulungu ni atahayile mihayo ya lushiku lungi hangi a ha numa ya henaho.
58004009	Hu kuhaya itaali ho sabato ya kwifuula kulwa banhu ba ng'wa Mulungu.
58004010	Nguno uyo alingile mu kwifuula kwa ng'wa Mulungu nanghwe akwifuula u mu milimo yakwe.
58004011	Huna luulu tudililagi, nise twingile u mu kwifuula kwenuko; atizilonga wa kugwa git'umo bakiitila kulwa nguno ya bushitiigwa.
58004012	U mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu guli mpanga, na guli na budula; hangi ng'ugi kutinda lilushu lyose-lyose, nuulu likabiza lya buugi bubili. Gukachimaga gwingila mu gati kushisha kulekanya ngholo na moyo, nuulu bulungilo na mhongo; hama gudugije kugamana a maganiko nu kwikumva kwa mu ngholo.
58004013	Niyo shitiho shiseeng'wa nuulu shimo isho shiibisile u ku butongi bokwe, i shose shili ng'waje; shiitendile ha ng'wape u kuli we, uyo shiigelile twibuule ku butongi bokwe mu yose i ya kikalile kise!
58004014	Huna luulu iki tuli na Ngabiji Ntaale, u Yesu Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu, uyo wamala kwingila ng'wigulu, tubuhandatilagi u bukaaniji wise.
58004015	Nguno tuti na Ngabiji Ntaale uyo atabumanile u bugokolo wise, iki nanghwe akageng'wa mu buli mhayo git'umo tukagemelagwa a bise, kwike u wei atiitile shibi.
58004016	Nose hu kuhaya tubizagi bashisha-ngholo, twegeele u kwisumbi lya butemi i lya shigongo, tukachilwe shigongo; na kwanukula nguzu ja kutugunaana ng'wikanza lya makoye.
58005001	Nguno buli ngabiji ntaale akasolagwa kufuma mu banhu kulwa nimo go ng'wa Mulungu, giki ime ha ng'wanya gwabo, abize nfunya wa shakwinha na shitambo kulwa nguno ya shibi.
58005002	U wei adugije kwiyumilija nabo abo batamanile, na a babo bajimiilile, nguno nu wei ali na bugokolo.
58005003	H'i nguno yene shing'wigelile nanghwe kufunya shitambo kulwa shibi shakwe, git'umo akafunijaga kulwa nguno ya banhu bangi.
58005004	Na atiho uyo akisolelaga ikujo lyakwe wei ng'wenekili ulu atitanilwe na Mulungu, umo akitanilwa u Alooni.
58005005	H'i nguno yene nu Kilisto atigunguhije wei ng'wenekili, kwituula kubiza Ngabiji Ntaale; aliyo akatuulwa nu yuyo akang'wila giki, "U bebe uli Ng'wana wane, i lelo naakubyalaga."
58005006	Na ng'wipandi lingi aling'wila giki, "U bebe uli Ngabiji wa welelo bose mu mbika ya bugabiji bo ng'wa Melikizedeki."
58005007	U mu shiku ja kikalile kakwe mu mili, u Kilisto walombaga mu kwifunya kutaale na kulila shisoji, akung'wikumbilijaga uyo adugije kumpija kufuma mu kucha; na nghana akigwiwa kulwa logohano lokwe.
58005008	Niyo nuulu iki ali Ng'wana, nahene akilanga wigwi kwingiila mu mihayo iyo akaluhiwa.
58005009	Huna luulu aho washikanyiwa, ubiza ng'winhi wa bupiji bo welelo na welelo u ku bigwi.
58005010	Nguno asolilwe na Mulungu kubiza Ngabiji Ntaale mu mbika ya bugabiji bo ng'wa Melikizedeki.
58005011	Tuli nayo mingi i ya kumuwila kulwa nguno yakwe u ng'wenuyo, kwike iki muli badizu u kwitegeleja, ili shilambu u kwisomboola.
58005012	Nguno u kulenganila ni likanza ilo lyabitile, a bing'we ni muli balangi i haha. Aliyo mutaali duhu mugongile munhu wa kumulanga hangi i mihayo ya kwandya, u mu malange ga kwandya a ga mhayo gwa ng'wa Mulungu! Hu kuhaya mutaali ng'wigeleelilwe mabeele, iti shiliwa shitimbu yaya.
58005013	Nguno buli ng'wene uyo akang'waga mabeele ataali ng'weleele, ataali u kugumaniila u mhayo gwa butungilija.
58005014	Aliyo i shiliwa i shitimbu, i shene shili sha banhu bataale, abo bilanga kufuma mu nzila ya kubona mingi; a masala gabo gumana u kwikomanya i yabubi ni yawiza.
58006001	Nose hu kuhaya twingagi u mu malange a ga kwandija u mu mhayo go ng'wa Kilisto, tusegejagi twingile mu mihayo ya nyataale; yaya u kwikala twishokeela kwilanga mihayo h'iyene duhu, giti ya kugaluka kwinga mu nhungwa jichile, na ya kunsanya Mulungu;
58006002	nuulu malange ga mihayo ya bubatiijiwa na ya butuulilwa bo makono, nuulu ya kujuuka kwa bafu na nsango gwa welelo na welelo.
58006003	Na nghana i yeniyo nayo tukwiyita u Mulungu ulu utuzunilija.
58006004	Kwike abo bamala kutiimilwa, bushiloja ni shakwinhwa sha kufuma ng'wigulu, bubiza na busangi nanghwe nu Moyo Ng'wela;
58006005	bubuloja nu wiza bo mhayo go ng'wa Mulungu, pyi ni nguzu ja ng'wikanza ilo liliza;
58006006	a benabo ulu bulinda butala, itadulikanile u kubashosha bupya hangi giki bagaluke, nguno bakongejaga kunkoma hangi boi benekili u Ng'wana wa ng'wa Mulungu, na kundimya minala bo hape-hape!
58006007	H'umo ili nuulu i si, nayo ulu ikutulagwa mbula gwa-gwa-gwa yang'wa minzi, ikubagunaana a balimi bayo ulu yuzwisha isho shikalimagwa; u mu giko ikwanukula mbango kufuma kuli Mulungu.
58006008	Aliyo ulu yubiza ya kuyuzwisha minghwa na kuponeka mo shokolo duhu, ikudalahwa; niyo ikubiza ili hihi na kugwa ng'wizumo; i nghalilo yaho ikupemva nose!
58006009	Kwike nahene badugu nuulu iki tulihaya giko, tuli na kusanya giki a bing'we i mihayo ying'we ili yawiza, ilimo u mu bupiji.
58006010	Huna luulu iki u Mulungu ntungilija, atudula u kwiba umo shili i shitwa shing'we nu butogwa wing'we ubo mukoolechaga kulwa lina lyakwe u mu kubagunaana a beela.
58006011	Aliyo i nghumbu jise jili giki, buli ng'wene u mu bing'we ooleche bukomeezu wa mbika yeniyo mu kwisagilwa kushikanile, kushisha ku nghalikijo.
58006012	Yaya u kwinogolelwa, aliyo bizagi balondeeji babo abo bakwingilaga u mu wisagijiwa mu nzila ya kuzunya na kwiyumilija.
58006013	U Mulungu aho wang'wisagijaga u Abulahamu wali atiho ntaale ungi kutinda we, wa kwitonga mu lina lyakwe; na luulu akitonga mu lina lyakwe wei ng'wenekili.
58006014	Akahaya giki, "Nakukufuuha nghana, nu bubyile wako nakubu kwija."
58006015	Ali luulu u Abulahamu iki wali ng'wiyumilija, akapandika isho wali wisagijiwa.
58006016	A banhu bakitongaga mu lina lya ntaale kutinda boi; huna nuulu buliho wihalalija bukushila, ulu shulinda shutuulwa ho shilahilo.
58006017	Na luulu u Mulungu akatuula ho shilahilo, nguno wali atogilwe no-no-no kubamanikija a bingiji ba mu wisagijiwa, giki u mhayo gwakwe uyo wamala kuguhela guti gwa magalu-galu.
58006018	Huna u mu mihayo iy'ibili yeniyo iyo iti ya kugaluka, iyo Mulungu atudula kwihaya mu bulomolomo, a bise tukulungujiagwa no-no-no; a bise abo tukupeelaga kuja ku butongi kujuwanukula u wisagijiwa ubo butuulilwe ko.
58006019	U wisagijiwa wenubo hu yene i nghingi ya kuzunya kwise, mhayo uyo gukutwinhaga mhola na nguzu ja kwingila mo u mu gati, u ku mpindo y'isenge.
58006020	H'uko watonga kwingila u ntongeeji wise u Yesu; ali kwenuko kulwa nguno yise giki abize Ngabiji Ntaale wa shiku jose ja welelo na welelo, mu mbika ya bugabiji bo ng'wa Melikizedeki.
